28b6(rgyud): brgyan pa dang // bsdigs mdzub dang ni gtun shing lag/ thams cad sems ni rmongs par byed// 'bar ba'i me yi 'od drag mo// thams cad rig pas thams cad sgom// 'di rnams gzugs sogs mdun du
28b7(rgyud): ni dam tshig de bzhin bstan par bya// rlung dang me yis bdun pa'i don// rdo rje'i sa bon gyis ni bskul// thig le sgras ni mnan pas ni// rgyun gyi char ni zhes byar gsungs// gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis
28b8(rgyud): pa'o// // de nas bdag med sgrub pa ni// ci gsungs mdo ru bsdus nas bshad// na mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// 'khor lo sngon du ci rigs pa// lha rnams
29a1(rgyud): // ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// 'khor los dang chu ni sngon// go rims bzhin du byin za dang // lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang // ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba// chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lon// 'bar ma ga
29a2(rgyud): dag skyon med na// ze 'bru las ni gcig yin te// rdo rje can gyi sku gsum mchog/ bcoM lnga'i gdan dang ldan pa yi// raM ni nges par bsam par bya// de yi steng du zla ba yin// zla ba'i steng dus bon nyid// phyi nas bdud
29a3(rgyud): las rgyal bas mnan// gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po// a li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas// ka li'i gzugs kyis sdang byed do// zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus pas// dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags// 
29a4(rgyud): zla ba me long ye shes ldan// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes nyid/ rung lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni// so sor rtog par brjod par bya// thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid// gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa/ 
29a5(rgyud): dag pa'o// mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pas ni// rnam pa lnga po ba/ sgom par bya// a li ka li mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sems/ dpa' nyid kyi gdan// yi ge las byung grong bu la// hUM phaT rnam
29a6(rgyud): par 'dod mi bya// sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba// dkyil 'khor bdag po bsgom par bya// phyag mtshon zhal sogs gong mi bzhin// zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin
29a7(rgyud): las de ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid// a li shes rab ka li thabs// zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas// gang phyir dkar mo la sogs pa// kha dog dbye bas so so yin// de phyir kun tu rab 'bad pas// dkyil 'khon
29a8(rgyud): pa yang rab tu brtag/ rnal 'byor ma lnga 'di dag ni// nang gi 'phar ma yang dag gnas// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu sgom// dbang por rdo rje gshin rjer dkar// chu bdag chu yi rnam
29b1(rgyud): 'byor ma// lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma// phyi rol 'bar ma dkar mo dang // chom rkun de bzhin ro langs ma// g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI// ri khrod ma dang gdol ba mo// brgyad pa/ 
29b2(rgyud): g.yung mos gang ba'o// 'od ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid// 'kha' spyod sa spyod ma zhes brjod// srid dang ni ba'i rang bzhin gyis// ngos su sgyur ma yang dag gnas// lha mo thams cad sna tshogs mdog/ dran chen
29b3(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan// zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma// spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma// 'khor lo rnacha mgul rgyan dang // lag par gdu bu ska rags nyid// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas/ 
29b4(rgyud): 'di lnga phyag rgya dag par gsungs// ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma// / de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad// g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang // de bzhin steng du kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na rdo rje
29b5(rgyud): sngon po dang // de bzhin du yang gri gug nyid// ro la zhon zhing gzi/ brjid 'bar// spyan dmar de bzhin steng skyes sar// kha do/ ga sngon mo ches gsal ma// stag gi lpags pas snam bkris
29b6(rgyud): shing a 'jig pa'i me ni lta bur ni// gsal ba'i gzugs can ma de gnas// g.yas na dkar dang sngo ba ste// g.yon na margad sngo dang mtshungs// phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis
29b7(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// lag pa gcig na thod bsapa brel// g.yas na gri gug 'dzin pa ma// rgod dang khro dang sgeg pa dang // de ni mchod pa'i gzugs gnas pas// sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa yi// 'od zer sna
29b8(rgyud): tshogs kun tu spros/ de nyid gsum gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mkhas pas dbus su bsgom par bya// gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag
30a1(rgyud): // rab tu bshad par bya// rdo rje dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyibs// rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar gsungs// dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas ni// phyag rgya chen por yongasu gzung // thams cad/ 
30a2(rgyud): rnam par bltas nas ni// sngags pas 'di ni bsgrub par bya// sar po legs par bkal ba dang // shin tu tshad ma mdzes pas ni// srid bus thig gdab shes rab can// ji ltar nus par dkyil 'khor nyid// 
30a3(rgyud): grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnams kyis shin tu mdzes// thig pazhi dang ni yang dag ldan// gos dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// mtshams kyi cha rnams thams cad dang // sgo yi khyud kyi grwa rnams su// 
30a4(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ khye kyi she mangs pa la ma nga // nang du yang ni zhugs nas ni// rdo rje thig ni yongs bcug cing // / phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar
30a5(rgyud): mdzes// rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par rgyan// de nas dkyil 'khor nang du ni// sangs rgyas/ gzugs brnyan rnam par dgod// gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor tshe/ 
30a6(rgyud): ga yi// sgrub pa'ang khyod la bshad par bya// de la dang por lha nyid kyi// khyim du sngags bzhugs nas ni// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor no// bsams nas de steng rdo rje ni// dkar po rtsemo lnga pa nyid// tshogs
30a7(rgyud): bsam par byas nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun sogs la// mchod nas phyag 'tshal 'di skad gsol// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol// bdag ni
30a8(rgyud): che ge mo zhes bgyi// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni// ji srid byang chub snying po'o bar// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub du ni nges mdzad pa// byang chub sems ni bla med mchog/ dam pa bdag/ 
30b1(rgyud): gis bskyed par bgyi// dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims dang // tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum// so sor bdag gis brtan por gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge/ 
30b2(rgyud): 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i// sdom pa dang nas brtan por gzung // rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // de nyid las ni
30b3(rgyud): so sor gzung // slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog rnal 'byor gyi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyi ma re re drug byas nas// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las
30b4(rgyud): byung ba// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba theg rab gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang so sor gzung // las kyi rig sa mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// thams ca
30b5(rgyud): so sor bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed bar bgyi// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// sdom pa ma lus
30b6(rgyud): gzung bar bgyi// ma bsgral ba dag bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba dag sgrol bar bgyi// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la gzhag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
30b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rtse mo las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te tshig 'dis bka' stsal pa// de nas bsam gtan gnas 'dug nas// chos rnams thams cad bdag med par// yang
30b8(rgyud): dag rjesu blta bar bya// byi dang nang gi bdag nyid can// 'di dag thams cad sems kyis brtags// sems las ma gtogs pa nyid ni// gzhan du yod pa ma yin no// chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// 
31a1(rgyud): chos kun dang por ma skyes phyir// yid kyis a nut+pa nA brjod// de nas rang sems de nyid 'dis// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// 'dod pa'i sngags kyis bzlas pas ni// zla ba'i// 
31a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam par blta// oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor che dag pa// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// yid gnyis kun las rnam par grol// mchog tu rnam par rtog pa
31a3(rgyud): 'joms// nyon mongs dri ma thams cad dag/ dang po zla ba ltar bzlas nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'dir// a sogs gzugs kyis 'jug par 'gyur// a A i AM u A raM r-I l-i l-I/ 
31a4(rgyud): e aM o oM ai aH/ bcom ldan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ yon tan khyad par ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gru gsum rgya cher rang bzhin can// sangs rgyas
31a5(rgyud): kun gyi yon tan gnas// 'di ni a sogs gzugs kyis ni// / sangs rgyas yon tan 'jug par 'gyur// shel dang zla ba lta bur ni// de yi steng du 'jug par 'gyur// sems ni rang bzhin
31a6(rgyud): 'od gsal bas// de nyid dga' bar byed pa'i rgyu// sngags pas 'di yi sngags kyis ni// byang chub sems ni bskyed par byed// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi// byams pa'i rje su rim 'byung ba// sems can rjesu
31a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa'o// dge ba'i chos kyis yang dag gang // nyon mongs thams cad nges par gnon// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// byang chub zla ba gnyis pa can// 'dir yang skar ma'i rnam pas ni// sangs/ 
31a8(rgyud): rgyas yon tan ga sogs kyi// gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu yi// rnal 'byor gyis ni 'jug par 'gyur// ka khag g+ha / tsa chadza d+ha nya/ Ta war D+haH/ ta thad d+han// ba pa ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha'as/ 
31b1(rgyud): ha k+Sha/ 'di yi dkyil 'khor cho ga kun// rgyud ni gzhan du ma gsungaso// de la dbus su rtse lnga pa// 'od zer dkar po bcas pa nyid// kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa// brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yi phyir// 
31b2(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan du// 'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra// byang chub spyod pa bla na med// de yis ni rtogs pa 'di// ye shes dag po zag pa med// zla bo'i dkyil 'khor
31b3(rgyud): dbus su ni// rdo rje nges par brtag par bya// nam mkha'i khams ni thams cad kyi// tshad du yang dag gang ba yi// rdo rje'i lus kyi bdag nyid du// sngags pas bsgom par bya ba'o// 'dis ni sngags kyi rnal
31b4(rgyud): gyis da spro ba dang ni bsdu bar bya// oM badz+ra At+ma ko hoH/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang ni// snang ba med cing gnas pa med// ma skyes ma byas dag pa nyid// dngos po med pa la sogs spangs// 
31b5(rgyud): bcad med dbyer med bzung du med// chos kyi sku ni gzugs ma/ da pa// rdo rje bdag med yang dag gyur// rdo rje'i sku ni gong na/ ming // de ltar yang rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya ba bcom
31b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyon cig/ yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' ni// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs brnyan ni// 'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya// 
31b7(rgyud): oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tAsta thA haM// sku dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod// spyod yul de nyid rtogs pa ni// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dge/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
31b8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen rdo rje snying po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i rigs kyi ming ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
32a1(rgyud): pa rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gnas// pad+ma'i rigs ni lha mchen po ldam// de sa rdo rdzo dA'i steng du gnas// de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don// 
32a2(rgyud): de nas de ltar bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed nas steng dang 'og tu sngags kyi yi ge bkod de// chog bzhin du ri rab dang / gru gsum rgya chen po bskyed par bya ste/ 'od zer sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
32a3(rgyud): gyis rgyan pa las yang dag par byung ba'i mdzes pa'i gnas bsgoms nas/ der pa las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// rlung dang me dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa yang la was rgyan pa'o// 
32a4(rgyud): de nas de yi steng du sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams da kyis gsol ba btab cing bstod pa rab tu bsngags pa no dar bu rin po che chen po 'od gsal ba dang / kha dog sna tshogs shi
32a5(rgyud): dril bu dbyangs pa dang / rlung gis bskyod pa'i gos dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / do shal dang / do shal byed ba dang / zla bas nye bar mdzes par rdo nor bu'i rtse mor gzhal med
32a6(rgyud): khang bsam par bya'o// hUM gi sngags 'dis rang gi snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du sngags 'di bkod de gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya'o// yang sangs rgyas thams cad spro ba dang bsdu bar bya zhing rdo rje
32a7(rgyud): nyid yang yongasu gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa zla ba'i kha dog gi 'od lta bu ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dpa' bo shes ra
32a8(rgyud): dang dga' ba gcig pus mdzes pas rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu nyid dang / thod pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa nyid do// g.yas pa ni kha dog nag po'o// g.yon pa ni pad+ma rA ga'i 'od // 
32b1(rgyud): nal gsus pa dang / phyag drug pa nyid dang / spya gsum pa nyid dang / dbang por gzugs can te/ rang gi rig pa'i bdul bzhugs pa/ dgyes pa'i dkyil khor sgom par byar// rnam pazas/ 
32b2(rgyud): cad kyi mchog dang ldan par dkyil 'khor pa'ang rab tu brtag par bya'o// shar du ni rnam par snang mdzad do// lhor ni rin chen 'byung gnas so// nub tu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o// byang du ni gdon mi za sa
32b3(rgyud): grub pago/ dadang ldan dun sbyin no// se nan mgo'o// 'don dral du ni gis deg mar// rlung nguni smram ma'o// phyim gyi par ma la drug shul ma ni la dag dag ma'o// ma dun rdo drug zugs
32b4(rgyud): brnyan ma ni kha dog ser mo'o// nub du ni 'dod chags rdo rje mkhwa dog dmar mo'o// byang du ni rdo rje ni ba mo kha dog ljang ku ma'o// // dbang ldan du ni rdo rje gnod sbyin mo kha dog dkar ser ro// me ru ni
32b5(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dmar sar lta bu'o// bden bral du ni sgra'i rdo rje ma ni sngon dmar lta bu'o// rlung du sa'i rdo rje ma ni kha dog ljang sgyu ma'o// phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la dbang ldan du ni gling
32b6(rgyud): bu ma'o// me ru ni pi bi ma'o// bden bral du ni mu kun de me'o// gling bu ma la sogs pa ni phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma'o// phyi rol gyi snam bu la me tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i
32b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma de bzhag par bya ste/ de bzhin du phyag gnyis ma'o// shar gyi sgo la lha me rdo rje lcags kyu ma nam mkha' sngo bsangs ma'i mdog bri bar ste/ zhal g.yas pa dang / gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang / 
32b8(rgyud): dkar po'o// phyag g.yas pa'i dang po na ni lcags kyu'o// gnyis pa na ni ral gri 'phyar ba'o// gsum pa la ni 'khor lo'o// g.yon pa na ni zhags pa dang / bsdigs mdzub dang / dril bu 'dzin pa ste/ 
33a1(rgyud): phyag drug pa bri bar bya'o// lho'i sgor lha ma rdo rje nags pa ma kha dog dkar ser te/ zhal g.yas pa dang / gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dmar ba'o// g.yas pan ni zhags pa dang / rdo rje/ 
33a2(rgyud): dang ral gri 'phyar ba'o// 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can ste drug pa'o// nub kyi sgo la ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ste/ de bzhin du yang kha dog dmar zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ zhal
33a3(rgyud): g.yas pa dang gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dkar ba'o// phyag drug na lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / lcags kyu'o// byang gi sgo la ni rdo rje dril bu ma 'jigs mar byed pa
33a4(rgyud): ste/ zhal gsum ni ljang ku dang / nag mo dang / dkar mo'o// phyag drug na ni dril bu dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / da lcags kyu dang / zhags pa'o// thams cad kyang sgra steng du 'ab
33a5(rgyud): bsteng sna tshogs pad+ma la dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya'o// me'i/ phyogs nas brtsams te me tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya ste phyag gnyis mar
33a6(rgyud): gsungs so// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni rnal 'byor ma lcags kyum dang / zhags pa ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / dril bu ma'i lag pa ste/ sgo srung ma dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// dza hAb
33a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi snying po bstan pa ste the tshom mi za'o// de ltar bkod pa dang byas pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis kyang mtshan ma dang phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro// 
33a8(rgyud): gong ma lta bu'i de'i phyed kyis de'i nang du zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa dang / phyi rol du ri mo bzhis yongasu bskor ba'o// lha mo thams cad kyi
33b1(rgyud): gnas su ji skad gsungs pa'i gdan rnams ni dkar mo la sogs par rab tu brtag par bya'o// de la dbus su rtswa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom par bya'o// de'i shar rtsi'i bu mig lan rje'o// 'un cir/ 
33b2(rgyud): byang du ni dzi'o// me ru ni tI // bden dral du ni dzi // rlung du ni ma do// dbang ldan du tsa // dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bkod pa ni me'i mtshams su a~M ngo // bden bral du ni u'o// rlung du na
33b3(rgyud): i'o// dbang ldan du ni e dgod par bya'o// shar gyi sgo la dza'o// lho ru ni hUM ngo // nub du ni bingo // byang du ni hauHdgod par bya'o// phyi rol du dur khyod brgyad kyis yongasu bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor
33b4(rgyud): bsams te/ der dbang po la sogs pa'i 'byung po chen po brgyad po 'jigs par byed pa dgod par bya'o// shar du ha dri b+ha sa la// lha yi tshogs ni yang dag bri// lho ru tsu ta'i shing
33b5(rgyud): la ni// gshin rje'i gtso bo'i dbang phyug bri// nub tu a sho ka gnas su// sprin gyi rgyal po dar ni dgod // de bzhin byang / du byang chub shing // gnod sbyin sde dpon mnyam par gzhag
33b6(rgyud): de bzhin mer ni ka rany+dzar// drang srong tshogs kyis yang dag khyab// bden dral ta dza ta ra ni// srin po la sogs de nas dgod// rlung du bya li ba lar ni// rlung gi bdag po yang dag bri// dbang ldan pa tas+tha
33b7(rgyud): lar ni/ yi dgas tshogs ni yang dag bri// drag bcas dbang bcas nye dbang bcas// zla bcas nyi ma gshin rje'i cha// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos byas shing // thal ba'i dngos tsam 'tshe bar byed// 
33b8(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyis// g.yon par kha T+wAM brten nasu// dri bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing // khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams// g.yas su rdo rje 'bar ba ste// 'jigs pa yang
34a1(rgyud): ni 'jigs par mdzad// skyil krung phyed pa byas nas ni// nyid kyi brla stengs g.yon pa mnan// tshangs pa la sogs mnan pade// grags pa nye bar mi za ste/ kun tu 'od zer sna
34a2(rgyud): tshogs kyi// sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa 'dis// spro ba yang ni sbyin par bya// de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms nas// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung
34a3(rgyud): ba ste brtag pa'i rgyal po gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i// ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ci// gsang ba nyan par 'tshal lags na// thub pa chen
34a4(rgyud): pos bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skyo dmas par zhugs nas mkha 'gro ma'i dam tshig gis phyag rgya bka'
34a5(rgyud): sU la pa/ kol+la i ren+d+ri a bo lA/ mum+ma ni re kak+ko la/ ga na kaM/ pi Ta ho bAdz+nyA i kA ru Ne ki a i na ro lA/ ta hi ba la khadz+dza saM/ ga Do ma a Na bidz+nyA i a i/ ha li kA lany+tsi ra ba Ni a i/ dud+d+ha/ 
34a6(rgyud): ra badz+dza a i/ tsa u sa ma kAts+tsha ri sah+ni/ kap+sa ra lA i a i/ mA la an+d+ra na sha lany+dzi/ ta hi b+ha ru khA i a i/ pe kha Na khe Ta ka ran+ta/ shud+d+ha a shud+d+ha na mu Ni aM i/ ni raM shu aM ga tsa Ta bI/ ta hi dza sa rA ba pa Ni.a
34a7(rgyud): i/ ma la ya dze kun+d+ra pA Da i/ DiN+Di mai ta hit+t+wa bad+d+hi a i/ mu khi g+ho g+hu/ g+hu g+hu/ mu g+hA/ lu g+hu/ deSh+Ta/ 'di rnams bltas nas rnal 'byor pas mtshan ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba la spro bar bya'o// ga di/ pu/ su/ 
34a8(rgyud): gA yo gyi d+hi lu/ sapa/ gai gi g+ha b+h+yAM/ bi b+hi/ gaM ga/ tri/ ku/ gang / g+ha/ sA/ b+h+yAM/ Sha au/ a/ go/ rA/ de/ mA/ ka/ o tri/ koka/ la kA/ ki pre gri/ sau su/ na/ si mau/ ku/ de nas dog gi ts+tsha mA yi// tshig
34b1(rgyud): rim pa pashad par bya// gang gis spun dang sring mor yang // the tshom med par shes bya ba// po tig dang / pra ti po ti gi dang / ga mu dang / lur+b+ba dang / ni rag dang / tsa tsug dang / hrid ya dang / kor ga dang / kaN+Di ka
34b2(rgyud): dang / a li ka ran dang / b+ha ra ha dang / sra ma Na dang / ma tha Na dang / na ra dang / tI li ka dang / na ra ka dang / a mu ka dang / kA khi lA dang / swa sa na dang / pa ri d+hi dang / bi ra d+hi dang / krur dang / an+ta dang / a li ka dang / b+ha gi nI dang / 
34b3(rgyud): mu ta ka dang / gri hA nA dang / mu dra dang / dan+ta sArA dzi hwa dang / g+han ba hi ni dang / a ka ma na dang / s+than ta dang / ki ra dang / lam po da ra dang / dan+ta dang / ni ro d+ha dang / bidz+nyAp+ti dang / b+hur+ya dang / d+hu mra bri ya dang / sa nu dang / sa ri ta dang / a/ 
34b4(rgyud): gu lA dang / ba de ni dang / ra dzi ka dang / a d+ha na dang / ba ka ti dang / rgyun ha dang / tsa la dang / mrig pa ti dang / maN+Dal dang / swa sa dang / bal+lu la dang / mo hA kA ra dang / ts+tsha na/ go ma khI hi dang / a pya ka dang / 
34b5(rgyud): sgra dang / ngan sma na dang / mu la spyan na dang / sdig dang / shun sma na/ dang / a nu s+phu na dang / steng dang 'og tu yod pa ni phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan du gsungs so// yi ge dang ngag gi rlom sa
34b6(rgyud): bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// / rdo rje snying po snying rje che// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// gzugs can ma dang 'o byad ma// lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo// mi
34b7(rgyud): ldog mo dang 'dod pa mo// 'di dag mkha' 'gro bdun du gsungs// mngon par zhan pas lta ba dang // sprin ma yon por gang zad cing // sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud pa dang // phyis nas 'jigs par byed pa ni// / 
34b8(rgyud): de ni gzugs can ma zhes bya// dpa' bos gnyis med sten pa'o// sdug pa 'am gal te mi sdug pa'i// byis pa lta zhing 'a byed na// de ni 'o byed mar shes bya// mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yin// 
35a1(rgyud): byol song ste stangs khro gnyer gdong // 'di ni smin sgyur bsdigs par byed// gzhan du dbugs kyi 'jigs byed ma// de ni lA mar rnam par bstan// phag dang lce sbrang byi la/ 
35a2(rgyud): dang / rta rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa// de ni yongs gyur ma ru gsungs// rab tu dga' zhing gsal bar dgod// song bar gyur nas mi ldog pa// da ni byis bcas mo ru gsungs// gang zhig skyo bas
35a3(rgyud): lag pa 'am// bong ba 'am ni rkang pas sam// gos mtha' 'am yang na shing gis ni// des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur// de ni mi ldog mar shes bya// dgod dang sgra dang du ba dang // glo bur du ni khro 'gru
35a4(rgyud): ba// de ni 'dod pa mar shes bya// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mor gsungs// thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang // chu srin nga rgyal mtshan ral gri dang // 'phang mdung dang ni bdun du gsungs
35a5(rgyud): yang dag sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu/ mtshon// lus srul mo'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya ste bzhi/ pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// 
35a6(rgyud): de nas lA ma'i mtshan nyid ni// yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang // pad+ma'i mdab ma lta bu'i 'od// dkar po'i gos la rtag dga' zhing // tsan dan sar pa'i dri dang
35a7(rgyud): ldan// bad gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'// chags shing mthong na rjes 'gro ma// khyim du pad+ma 'dri byed pa// pad+ma gar dbang rigs las byung // smin ma'i dbus su rtse gsum son// lus ni
35a8(rgyud): sngo sangs skya ba dang // ud pal sngon po dri dang mtshungs// khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba// de ni mkha 'gro mar shes bya// mig dmar dkar dang / 
35b1(rgyud): dab nga dang // de bzhin nang ba lagra ba dam pa// raskyes khyim byadag gis kyang // rtag tu dga' bar gyur pa dang // de 'i khyim du rdo rjed// bris nas rtag tu mchod byed ba// he ruka dpal rigs drung / 
35b2(rgyud): ba namakha' 'gror 'di la the tshom med// 'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am// lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa'i// ser zhing sngosangs bud med gang // rtag tu gos sor dga' ba nyid// me tog dka
35b3(rgyud): bo dri chen dang // skal bzang bun sum tshogs pa de// khyim du 'khor lo 'dri bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rjes 'gro// gnag cing sngo sangs bud med gang // son dkar ring mtho ba dang / 
35b4(rgyud): rtag tu gdug pa'i g.yon pa ni// ske ni rtag tu grol ba yin// ga tu khrus li dga' ba dang // spyod cing mang du smra ba dang / rdo rje khyim du bris nas ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// rdo rje
35b5(rgyud): mo'i rigs las byung // dkar ning gser dang mtshungs pa dang // 'bar ba'i mig dang ba spu gang // rdo rje gang gi dpral du 'am// lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa// rtag tu rgyal srid
35b6(rgyud): dga' ba dang // snyems shing bden par smra ba dang // ma li ka yi dri dang ldan// khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// dum skyes ma yi rigs las byung // rnal 'byor dbang chen mon
35b7(rgyud): mchog/ shal dga' ba'i bud med gang // mig sman nag po lta bu'i 'od// dpral bar mdung dri'i rnam pa nyid// drag shul las la dga' ba gang // rtag tu dur khrid 'gro gang dang // 'jigs med sdug/ 
35b8(rgyud): bro med pa dang // gang gi dbral bar bsdus nas ni// khyim du thod pa 'dri byed cing // rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// he ru ka yi rigs las byung // char sprin mdog 'dra'i bud med gang // son mi mnyam
36a1(rgyud): bar gnas shing // rtag tu drag shul las rnams dang // g.yon pa'i mche ba byung ba ni// khyim du dgra snga 'dri byed cing // rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung / 
36a2(rgyud): ba 'di ni mkha' 'gror the tshom med// gang gi sgra ni li ba dang // bzhin ni yongs su zlum pa dang // rtag tu kha la slar dang // smin ma ring zhing baspu dang // gos dkar gtsang zhing zhi ba dang // mi bskyod bden
36a3(rgyud): par smra ba dang // rtag tu dam pa'i chos dga' ba// dpa' bo'i sring mor de shes bya// pad+ma'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya// yang na rus sbal phyag rgya bya// ril ba spyi blugs mchod byed pa// phyag rgya lan du brjod par
36a4(rgyud): bya de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la// khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar byed/ ma mchu 'phyang zhing mig yangs ma// mig ni dmar zhing ser ba dang // che zhing skal bzang nor dang ldan// ser zhing tsam pa lta bu nyid/ 
36a5(rgyud): ring zhing lag pa ring ba dang // sna tshogs gos la dga' ba dang / ri mo gsum ni dpral ba 'am// steng gi mtshams su nges bar gnas// dgod pa dang ni dga' ba nyid// lam gyi rnam pa gan/ 
36a6(rgyud): cing mnan// g.yul du shi ba rnams kyi ni// gtam la rtag tu dga' ba nyid// de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni// mdung rtse'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya// rkang pa gsod pa bskums pa yi// garang nyid kyang ni rab bstan pa/ 
36a7(rgyud): g.yon gyis yongasu bskor ba ni// phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya// de'i bcu bzhi 'am brgyad pa la// de khyim mdung rje bris shing mchod// 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshan nyid yin// dpa zhing dkar ba'i bud med
36a8(rgyud): gang mig ni ldang shing sar pa dang // de bzhin sma ni 'khyil ba dang // dang byangs bcings par snang ba nyid// de mi gcig par rab tu gnas// de bzhin steng du nga ba dang / rtag tu gas dmar la dga' ding // rtag tu/ 
36b1(rgyud): dgod cing glu len dang / glo bur du ni khro ba dang // khyad par du ni sems g.yo dang // rtsod pa rtag tu dga' ba nyid// de 'dra'i rab myong mthong nas ni// 'phang mdung phyag rgya rab bstan bya// gnyis pa
36b2(rgyud): yis kyang 'bad pa yis// dril bu'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyin// g.yon nas yongasu bskor ba dang // phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya// thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang // rtag tu gos ser dga' ba dang // mgri/ 
36b3(rgyud): ba nas ni gos 'phyang ba// de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya// gnyis pa'ang rab tu 'bad pas ni// dung gi phyag rgya sbyin par bya// de bzhin yongasu bskor ba nyid// 
36b4(rgyud): de yi dus ni bcu bzhi la// khyim du rdo rje 'dri bar byed// yan dalag kun la ba spur bcas// mig ni gnag cing ser ba dang // gtsigs shing rnam 'gyur 'jigs pa dang // gzhin sbom
36b5(rgyud): 'a ni sdom pa dang // ma mthu 'phyang nga mig dang // sna na nyams par gyur pa dang // rtag tu dri ba 'dod pa dang // s+thi na gyi kha dog lho cho ga/ de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni// klu
36b6(rgyud): yi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya// gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis// 'phang mdung phyag rgya sbyin par bya// yongs su bskor ba gong ma bzhin// de ni bcu gcig tshes la ni// mche ba 'dri zhing rtag tu mchod/ 
36b7(rgyud): mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// / de nas yan lag phyag rgya yi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// bud med gang zhig spyi gtsug reg/ spyi bo de yis/ 
36b8(rgyud): rab bstan bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la// mkhur chos de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig so ni ston pa la// lce ni de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig ma mchu ston pa la// kos ko de yis rab
37a1(rgyud): // bstan bya// gang zhig mgrin pa reg pa la// lto ba de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig lto ba ston pa la// lte ba de yis bstan bya// gang zhig mjug ma ston pa la// sa ni de yis rab/ 
37a2(rgyud): bstan bya// gang zhig gsang ba ston pa la// ling ga da yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig dbus mo ston pa la// dpung pa de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig rkang pa ston pa la// rkang mthil de yis rab
37a3(rgyud): bstan bya// gang zhig sor mo ston pa la// sen mo de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig sa ni ston pa la// na mkha' de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig na mkha' ston pa la// nyi ma de yis rab bstan bya// gang / 
37a4(rgyud): zhig chu bo ston pa la// rgya mtsho de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig sor mo cog ston pa// legs par 'ongs shes badz+radad pa yin// gang zhig sor mo gnyis ston pa// shin tu legs
37a5(rgyud): 'ong brjod pa yin// g.yas pa'i smin ma sgyur tshul dang / ga yon pa'i smin sgyur tshul ston pa// slob dpon gnyis dang 'du ba ston// rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba yang dag par sbyor/ 
37a6(rgyud): ba las byung ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i brda ste brtag pa'i rgyal po bzhi pa'o// de nas skye bo dam pa kun// 'du ba yang dag rab bshad bya// de la zas gcig bza' bar bya// sna tshog su yang ma las brtson/ 
37a7(rgyud): kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas gang ga/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang de bzhin nye ba'i zhing // tsAn+do nyo ba'i tsun+d+ra dang // 'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba// 
37a8(rgyud): dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang // 'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid// 'di rnams ni bcu gnyis te// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid// 'di ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya// kye/ bcom ldan 'das gnas
37b1(rgyud): la sogs pa gang lags// de bzhin du sa bcu gnyis po rnams rgya chen po las 'byung ba bka' drin gyis bskyab du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas ni dzA lan+d+ha rar gsungs// de
37b2(rgyud): bzhin du ni ur+yan nyid// gnas ni ko la gi ri dang // de bzhin a rbung nyid do// nye gnas glod pa ri nyid// de bzhin dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang // de bzhin de bo koTar bshad// de bzhin mA la ba nyid dang // de bzhin
37b3(rgyud): ka ma ru par gsungs// o tre zhing ni nyid du gsungs// nye zhing tI sha ku ni dang // de bzhin ko sha la nyid dang // ka li kar ni ci gsungs pa'o// de bzhin la ba ka nyid dang // kany+tsi kha ba'i gnas nyid ni// ts+tshan+dor ya
37b4(rgyud): dge gsungs pa dang // nye ba yi yang ts+tshan+da'o// pre ta a hi ba si dang 8// de bzhin khyim gyi lha nyid dang // so rAny+dza dang gser gling nyid/ 'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba// na gar dang sin+d+hu ni// dur khrod nyid du
37b5(rgyud): brjod pa dang // ma ru dang ni ku lu ta// nye ba yi ni dur khrod nyid// snyi nga rje de bzhin las kyi brang // ha ri ke nyid dang ni// lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang song dang // bin+d+ha gzhon nu'i grong khyer nyid// 'thung / 
37b6(rgyud): gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod do// de dang nye ba dur khrod nyid// rab song dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i 'gram// bskrad mos tshal gyi rdzing bu'i 'gram// nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya// de nas gnas la lhag par gnas
37b7(rgyud): ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste// rdul bral gnas su nu ta gnas// kong ka nar ni zla ba'i snying // ka rany+dzar gnas tsa ri ta// aT+Ta ha sar ka dam pa// lha mo'i mkhar du ba Ta gnas// ha ri ke la ra ha ri gnas/ 
37b8(rgyud): ur+yan a sho ka ni gnas// dzA lan+d+ha rar gser shing gnas// gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro can// ts+tshan+do mngon du gyu/ 
38a1(rgyud): bar nges// nye ba'i tsAn+do sbyang dka' ba// 'du ba ring du song ba ste// nye ba'i 'du ba mo g.yo ba// dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid// nye ba'i dur khyod chos kyi sprin// pha rol phyin bcu'i
38a2(rgyud): sa rnams la// rnal 'byor ma yi kla klo'i skad// bu la sogs pa ci gsungs pa// phyi dang nang du bsam par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'du ba'i// nyin par nyid kyang legs bshad bo// yi
38a3(rgyud): dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang // brgyad pa la yang khyad par du// rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnan nyid// skye ba bdun pa khyad par du// 'bad pas snying rje bskyed nas ni// mkhas pas bsod par bya/ 
38a4(rgyud): ba nyid snying rje med na mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje yang da dgra bshad// ji ltar bdag bzhin sems can nyid// ji lta ra sems can de bzhin bdag/ 'di ltar sems dpa'i rnal
38a5(rgyud): 'byor bdag/ dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'du ba'i ga/ nas te lnga pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// / gsang ba'i pad+ma'i mtshan nyid ni// ye shes dbang po nyan par/ 
38a6(rgyud): 'tshol// ye shes sems dang 'dres pa yi// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim pa ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas bzhi mnyam par gnas nas ni// rdzogs bya rim pa rdo rje 'dzin// mnyam
38a7(rgyud): nyid sems ni bskyed nas ni// 'dod chags la sogs ring du spangs// yid dang 'thun pa'i gnas su ni// bde ba'i bstan la 'dug nas ni// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun// snying rje phan pa'i bsam
38a8(rgyud): bar bya// spyi bo mod pa'i spyi bo dang // sgra mtha' de bzhin gsang pad+ma// cha ni sna tshogs yig 'bru rnams// de bzhin du yang bstan rnams nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam
38b1(rgyud): par byed// bsdus nas gong bu'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje sems dpar rang nyid 'gyur// chu yi khams dang me yi khams// ro gcig mchog gnasu ni// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sbyor/ 
38b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dbang po drug/ bstan bcos tshad ma slob dpon dang // lung gi rjes 'brangs de nyid shes// gsang don de nyid dngos po yang // de nyid las ni gcig las gcig/ sngar
38b3(rgyud): gyi mtshan nyid thams cad kyi// stong sogs de nyid mtshan nyid kyis// lus kyi dri ma bkrus nas ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par sbyang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes sems
38b4(rgyud): dpa' bsam par bya// mdog dkar kun zla ba yi// 'od dazer rnam par smra ba ni// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // pad+ma'i gnas la yang dag bzhugs// rgyan rnams
38b5(rgyud): kun gyis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par rgyan// phyag rgya chen po phyag gnyis kyis// snying gi gan sa su gzir ba mdzad// gzugs dang gzi brjid yongs
38b6(rgyud): gang ba// ye shes sems dpar sgom pa nyid// chu shing me tog lta bur ni// lte ba ru ni yang dag gnas// langs nas snying khar kun tu gnas// sngar gyi mtshan nyid yongs gang bar// gton nas
38b7(rgyud): dang po pad+ma ni// mdab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// za ba dang ni ze 'brur bcas// yi ge rnam dgod dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yi// phyag gnyis zhal gcig dkar po ni// 
38b8(rgyud): bzang po dri med dbus su bsam// de yi dbus su rnam shes dang // ye shes de nyid sbyar bar bya// dang po shar gyi mdab ma la// byams par ldan pa'i mi bskyod pa// lho yi sgor ni snying rje nyid// rin chen
39a1(rgyud): de nyid sa bon las// nub kyi sgo yi mdab ma la// 'od dpag med pa'i sa bon dgod// byang gi sgo yi gnas su ni// sems kyi don yod gtso bo nyid// dang po'i dbyangs sogs sa bon
39a2(rgyud): gyi/ zla ba'i thig le ji bzhin rim// zla ba'i 'od zer dkar rgyan pa'i// yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya// mtshams rnams su ni ma ning nyid// rnam pa bzhi po sngar gsungs pa// de yi dbus su de yi sems// 
39a3(rgyud): yi ge yis ni sbyar bar bya// sems la the tshom 'khrungs lags pas// bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol// stong pa mtshon du med pa la// yi ge'i rnal 'byor la sogs ci// bcom ldan 'das
39a4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nyid ji ltar rdo rje nyon// mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid// snying po med pa'i chu shing las// / snying po bdud rtsi 'bras 'byung ltar// 'bras bu rnam
39a5(rgyud): ye shes ni// gzugs med pa la ye shes gzugs// ye/ shes sku ni skyon med pa// mtshan nyid mtshon du med pa nyid// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// yig 'bru med
39a6(rgyud): las yig 'bru'i gzugs// de dbus ngo bo stong pa nyid// de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis gzung // ji ltar mtshan nyid shas kyang ni// mnyam nyid ye shes sems kyis ni// de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam// 
39a7(rgyud): myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur// bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni// ye shes rnam shes ngo bo las// mtshan nyid bstan bcos mdor bsdus pa// de nyid dpa' bo ston pa po// 'di yi sgom pa thams
39a8(rgyud): cad kyi/ 'od zer dkar pos rnam par rgyan// lcags sgrog lnga po mchod rten gyi// bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsams nas ni// kha dog dkar po 'od gsal ba// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur// snying / 
39b1(rgyud): gis bon pa dbus su// mthe bong yongs kyi dkyil 'khor da // de yi dbusus can na/ a li ga li yongs brgyas pa/ 'dog dkang zang shin tu mdzes/ zla ba'i 'od bar 'bra zad// de sing ngasu ma rnams
39b2(rgyud): kyi thig le bsam par rab tuglags// skra yi rtsa mo brgya stong char// phra rab gzug su yang dag gnas// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin las// ye shes can gyi mtshan nyid mtshon// go bangs gnas / 
39b3(rgyud): thig le ltos// sems kyi mtshan nyid thabs cad shes// snying la tshangs pa'i sgo yi ni// thig le sgo yi lam las ni// bla ma'i man ngag brtson pa yis// rnam shes ye shes kyi yang blang // lam gyi pha rol
39b4(rgyud): bstan bcos kyang // ma yin ring bar gyur pa min// bstan brgya ngas rnams ni rnyeng sla yang // sbyor ba de la rnyed par dka'/ rnal 'byor pa yi thabs kyis ni// bla ma gsol ba 'debs la
39b5(rgyud): brtson bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni// rnam par mkhas pa sa mthong bar 'gyur// mnyam gzhag dngos po'i rang bzhi/ gyis// g.yo ba med cing 'tshe ba med// yid ni chos rnams sngon/ 
39b6(rgyud): du 'gro/ yid ni dag cing yid ltar mgyogs// yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis// smra ba dang ni byed par 'gyur// de phyir yid kyis bdag nyid kun// yid la byung bar po ldan pas// snying khar sems sgom sdom
39b7(rgyud): pa ni/ gal te 'dod na yo gis bzlas// rgyu ru gyur pa'i sa bon te// de nyid dpyad pas ma yin no// 'bras bu rgyu yi sa bon te// de nyid mthong ba ma yin// gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod kyi/ 
39b8(rgyud): dmigs pa'i sa bon rnam pa lnga// spyi bo spyi med yang dag gnas// kun nas kun tu 'bar bar 'gyur// rtag tu rtsa ba'i sa bon gyi// ye shes rnam shes sa bon las// thig la sgra dang yang dag ldan// 
40a1(rgyud): 'khor ba'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis// yid kyi bzlas pa yang dag ldan// yi ge dag ni rnam par spangs// nges par rtag tu go 'phang gnas// rtag pa dang ni chos kyi
40a2(rgyud): dbyings// rtag tu phra zhing skyon med pa// ye shes la ni rnam shes nub// ye shes dngos pos rnam shes kyi// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim mthong 'gyur// dang por mtshan ma thams cad kyi// mar me'i/ 
40a3(rgyud): rnam pa mthong bar 'gyur// gnyis pa mtshan ma me khyer gyi// rnam pa'i rdul du mtshon par byed// rdul dkar tsa na ka dbyibasu// phyogs bcur de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur// gsum par nyon mongs
40a4(rgyud): bcom pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag/ lha yi longs spyod 'dod pa yang // bzhi par yang ni bstan pa'o// // lha yi gzugs ni thams cad kyang // lnga par sems kyis
40a5(rgyud): brtag par bya// drug pa gzugs ni med pa'i tshe// bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid de// brgyad par rang 'dod rnal 'byor pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu'i don// rdo rje sems dpa'
40a6(rgyud): snying rje che// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// nges par dngos po thams cad kyi// dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod// phyis ni re rer dbye ba yis// lha rnams kyi ni brjod par bya// lus can rnams kyi
40a7(rgyud): phung po dang // khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag/ nyon mongs mi shes sgrib sbyang bya// rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min// / 
40a8(rgyud): yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir// rang gis rig pa'i bde ba mchog/ gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gang dang // gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa snang ba// de kun rang bzhin dag pa ste// de phyir sangs
40b1(rgyud): rgyas sna tshogs dngos// kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzugs la sogs pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i/ 
40b2(rgyud): phyi ro// gsol ba/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mig gis gzugs ni bzung bar bya// sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya// drin sna yis tshor bar bya// lce
40b3(rgyud): yis ro ni rig par bya// lus kyis dngos po rig par bya// yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni// dag pas dug med byas nas ni// bsten bya 'di dge bstan par bya// gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang
40b4(rgyud): mdzad// tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma ste// 'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ de bzhin 'du byed rdo rje rgyal// rnam shes rdo rje sem/ sa dpa' nyid// kun gyi ngo ba he ru ka/ mig la gti mug rdo rje
40b5(rgyud): bshadapa/ zhe sdang rdo rje mngon thos pa// phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin sna// kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer bshad// reg la ser sna rje ma// khams dang skye mched thams cad ni// dam pa'i dbang phyug
40b6(rgyud): he ru ka/ sa yi khams ni ltung byed ma// chu khams gsod par byed mar brjod// me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma// de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang phyug/ na mkha'i khamasu brjod pa ni// pad+ma 'bar ba 'khyil pa nyid/ 
40b7(rgyud): 'di ltar lus can rnams kyi lus// phung po la sogs lha bdag nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin las// nyon mongs la sogs des bskyed pa'i// bskyed pa'i cha la lags gnas pas// srid dang mya ngan
40b8(rgyud): 'das pa thob// phung po dang skye mched rnam par dag pa ste lnga pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas spyod pa rtog pa rnams/ 'jig par byed pa bshad par bya/ chos rnams kun la mnyam byung ba// 
41a1(rgyud): de nyid spyod pa gong na med// sangs rgyas sras la phan pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnams gnas pa// gang zhig yang ni de nyid las// rdo rje yan lag med pa yi// shes/ 
41a2(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen por// rga ba'i rlabs kyis 'khrugs pa las// sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed// tshong pa dge bar 'gro ba dang // myur du dngos grub gsal
41a3(rgyud): byed cing // snying po'i yon tan kun gyi gnas// sems kyi rin chen las byung ba// 'dod don rab tu sgrub par byed// rdo rje 'dzin pas rab bsngags pa'i// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yon tan kun// lus
41a4(rgyud): 'byung 'di las ma gtogs par// dga' ba'i dngos grub 'a byung mi 'gyur// mkhas ma chog spyod pa mtshungs med 'a di// grol bar 'dod pas spyad par gyis// lha yi dgra dang
41a5(rgyud): brgya byin dang // grong khyer sum brtsegs dgra bo dang // nor/ sbyin tshangs pa la sogs pas// zhabs kyi 'dam skyes mchod pa yi// sdig pa 'jog byed 'di la spyod// myur du de
41a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa yi// gnas kyi mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas ni// gang zhig 'gro la phan par ni// kun 'dar gyi ni spyod pa gsungs// de ltar mchog tu bsam pas gnas// 
41a7(rgyud): shin tu gsang ba yo gis sgom// rtog pa thams cad bral ba ni// dam tshig la ni spyod par bya// rgyu 'thun 'bras bu rang bzhin las// dang po'i rtsom par yo gi gnas// de nas bsgoms pas dub pa na// bsdus
41a8(rgyud): nas byis pa'i rtse bar bya// sna tshogs gdul bya'i 'jig rten la// 'jam pa'i gzugs can rang nyid sgom// grub par grags pa ma lus pa// ci gsungs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// spyod pa sha med pa yis// 
41b1(rgyud): kun bzang mtshungs pa med 'grub pas// spyod pa des rig rdo rje can// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// dpal ldan slob dpon rdo kun// kun gyi mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i spyod pas/ 
41b2(rgyud): gnas nas ni// blo gros chen po bya ba byas// de nas rang gi 'dod sgyur bas// sbyor ba kun la kha phyir bltas// kun tu seng ge lta bur ni// de nyid ldan pas bdag gis spyad// ji ltar byung den yang
41b3(rgyud): dag rig/ 'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam po yis// yang dag lta ba rab sgyur bdag/ brtan pa'i se mos ni gnas med pas// phung po khams sogs mtshan nyid ni// thams cad dri lam sgyum ltar/ 
41b4(rgyud): khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni// mdor bsdus nas ni/ dir shes bya// sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol// 'tsho ba dbang phyug 'du ba dang // de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad ni// 
41b5(rgyud): thams cad shin tu ring du spangs// rtag tu rtog pa med gyur pa sa// gnyis su med par nges byas nas// pha rol phyin du garnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas dngos grub rab grub phyi/ 
41b6(rgyud): sems can don la legs nas kyang // sems can yongasu brtag mi bya// byang chub la ni sems bzhag nas// phyogs las rgyal ba'i spyod pa brtsam// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i bdag/ spror
41b7(rgyud): ba kun la rgyab kyis phyogs// de nyid goms par rab byas pas// skye bo 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur// rtog pa kun las rnam par grol// sems can bsam pa'i khyad par las// sbyar ma ltar
41b8(rgyud): sogs rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad nyid ni bza' bar bya// chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung // mi mthun phyogs ni gang yang med// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// ji ltar 'dod par/ 
42a1(rgyud): rab tu bza'// longs spyod rdzogs don 'di dag kun// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sprul// ye shes mtha' yas/ 
42a2(rgyud): thob pa yis// de bzhin gshegs phyag mi bya na// rtag tu sgom pa ldan pa yis// dbang bskur med sogs smos ci dgos// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// de
42a3(rgyud): nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// de phyir de nyid lha rnams nyid// dkyil 'khor bsnyung ba mi bya zhing // phyag rgya mchod rten las mi bya// dpal ldan rdo rje mgon pos ni// gang yang gzhan du bstan pa rnams// 
42a4(rgyud): lhag par mos pas gnas gang yang // de rnams kyis kyang de nga nyid rig/ ji ltar bdud rtsi don gnyer bas// snying po blangs nas/ dngar ba spong // de ltar chos kyi snying po ni// thob nas rtog pa
42a5(rgyud): thams cad spangs// rtog med gang tshe blo ldan pas// dogs pa spangs shing gnas med pa// thugs kyi rdo rje ci gsungs bani na// de tshe 'grub 'gyur the tsom med// rtog pas dmyal bar/ 
42a6(rgyud): 'gro 'gyur te// 'gro ba drug gi 'khor bar ni// 'khor ba ru ni 'khor bar 'gyur// rtog pa med na grol 'gyur zhing // gnas ni dri med zhi ba nyid// de phyir rtog pa'i dra gzhom phyir// dam tshig sangs rgyas
42a7(rgyud): mdzad pa gang // de ni rtag tu goms par bya// gang gis dam tshig gnas gyur pa// sngags shes bsam pa'i nus pas bya// dngos po kun la blta bar bya// nges par thams cad ma skyes pa'i// rnam pa yi/ 
42a8(rgyud): ni rnal 'byor gyis// khyi dang bong bu rnga mo dang // glang po la sogs khrag 'thungs nas// sha yang rtag tu bza' ba nyid// sha chen khrag gis gos pa ni// thams cad khyad par du ni blta// dman pa'i sha ni thams
42b1(rgyud): cad dang // srog chags 'bum phrag brgya ldan bza'// rnam snang shin tu rul ba yi// srin bu brgya phrag ze zir ldan// khyi dang mi skyugs bsres nas ni// sha ni rdo rje'i chu gos ldan// rnal 'byor pas ni
42b2(rgyud): spro ba yi// rnam snang bsres nas bza' bar bya// rdo rje'i chu ni btung bar bya// gang gi tshe sha yang za bar ma gyur na gzhan du rnam par rtog pa'i sha'i rang gi ngo bos bza' bas bza' bar bya ste// gang zhig
42b3(rgyud): gzhan pa'i 'jig rten za ba de bza' bar bya'o// de kho na sgrub pa po'i dbang po gang zhig bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa de la bgrod par bya ba dang / gang zhig bya ba ma yin pa de ni de'i bya ba dang / bgrod pa dang bgrod
42b4(rgyud): bar bya ba ma yin par rnam par rtog pa dang / bza' ba dang ba daza' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang / btung ba dang btung ba ma yin par sngags pas mi bya ste/ sku dang / 
42b5(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// rje ltar yang sems 'khrul pa ma yin pa de ltar chang rnal 'byor/ khas rtag tu btung bar bya ba dang / dman pas shin tu sgeg
42b6(rgyud): ba dang / rigs dang bcas pa dang / rigs med pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa'i sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i tshul gyis rgyal ba lta bur lta ba dang / glegs bam bklags par gsungs pa
42b7(rgyud): mi bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang me tog bsdu bar mi bya ba dang / sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ba dang / lha dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa la phyag mi bya ba dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / pha rol gyi bud med
42b8(rgyud): skal ba bzang mo bsten par bya ba dang / gdug pa can la byams pa mi bya bar gsungs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang srog chags bsad pa dang / rgyal bas mchod po'i slob dpon dang / ye shas kyi
43a1(rgyud): dam tshig sems can te dam tshig rtag tu dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par byed de/ blo dang ldan pa la phyogs bcur rnam par bzhugs pas mchod par byed do// gang gi phyir rdzogs pa'i/ 
43a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang zhig slob dpon gyi ba spu'i khung bu'i rtse mo la mthong ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon la sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa byed pa mthong ngo // 
43a3(rgyud): nges par rang gi dam tshig sangs rgyas 'dod pas dngos grub sbyin par byed pas bla ma sa pa smad par mi bya ba dang / rdo rje spun la mi gus par mi bya ba dang / gang zhig byin pa de
43a4(rgyud): bzung nas mchod rten la phyag mi bya ba dang / spun dang / bu dang /  pa dang / rgyal srid kyi longs spyod dang / gter dang / nor bu dang / 'bru thams cad la rtsa lta bur
43a5(rgyud): mthong nas khams gsum gyi rgyal po bsgrub par bya'o// 'khyud pa'am spyad pa ste lnga pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/ 
43a6(rgyud): spyod pa pha rol phyin mtshan nyid// gang gi sa ring nas shes pa de// rdo rje yo ga ri the tshom med// mkha'agro ma sogs gtor ma ni// ji ltar rnyed dang bza' btung ni// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa yis bza'// 
43a7(rgyud): royi khris mi gos bzang dang // ro bsregs thal bas rnam par rgyan// phru chag shin tu gsang bar ni// mtshan mo'i dus su rgyu bar bya// bani mdo dang ni ri bo dang // shing gcig gapa ni dur
43a8(rgyud): khrod dang // bzhir ni de nas sngags pa yis// sgom pa bzang po bya bar brjod// ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang // yang na dben pa'am pas mthor ni// cung zad drod ni thob pa yis// gal te spyod ba
43b1(rgyud): na bdag nyid gal te 'grub 'dod pas// byis pa bzhin du spyad nas ni// sems can rjes su bzung ba'i rgyur// blo ldan chen pos rgyu bar bya// den pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// kha dog can gyis
43b2(rgyud): rtag sgrib pa// ba spu'i khung bu'i rtse dug nas// phyogs bcu rnamasu dpung bar bya// 'jam pa'i rdo rjer rang gyur nas// dkyil 'khor bar ni rab tu brtag/ pad+ma'i tshal ni nyams dga' ba 'am// chu bo 'dus
43b3(rgyud): pa rnamasu yang // der gnas rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// phug gam ri yi rtse mor ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas gnas// ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du bza'/ 
43b4(rgyud): zos shing zos nas gtor ma sbyin// 'bras bu sna tshogs dngol shal sogs// 'ol ma zi sogs de bzhin spras// sro/ dag chags yan lag gos gon zhing // bde don gnyer la bde ba
43b5(rgyud): sbyin/ res 'ga' legs sbyar zur bcag ni// bzlog pa 'i/ sa ni 'don par byed// bza' dang bza' min ci rnyed pa// smon kha'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya// gzhan pa'i yul 'khor grub
43b6(rgyud): pa dang / ri yi bug dang tshang tshong dang // gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod che// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du yang // der gnas shes rab can gyis sgom// skrag pa thams cad rnam spangs te// de ltar byas nas
43b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas// yang ni phyogs las rnam rgyal brtsam// sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol// phyogs bcur rnam par gnas pa yi// skye ba'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa yi// kun gyi bsam pa yongs su
43b8(rgyud): 'geng so// bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa kun// sgom pas spangs shing rnam par spangs// 'dis ni sgom pa thams cad kyis// phyogs las rnam rgyal mngon par brjod// de ltar re shig gnas byas nas// de
44a1(rgyud): nyid mi shigs rnal 'byor pas// rig ma'i lha mo 'dod pa yi// shin tu gzugs can bsdus nas bya// chus byung yid 'ong rin chen dang // rig pa 'dzin pa'i nyams dga' ma/ 
44a2(rgyud): lha yi bu mo gnod sbyin mo// yang na klu mo rkang 'og tu// gnas pa dang ni lha min mo// 'di nang yo gas rig ma gcig/ rang si sems la mngon 'dod pa// lcags kyu zhags pa'i rab sbyor bas// rnal 'byor
44a3(rgyud): pa yis bkug nas sgrub// nye bar dgos pa rgyas pa kun// ma bslangs par ni lha yis ster// rga dang nad las rnam par grol// gnyis med gnas gsum sdig pa med// lus kyi sbyin pa byin nas ni// phyis
44a4(rgyud): ni spyod pa yang dag brtsam// skal dang skal min rnam dpyad pas // de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya// bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa bza' bar bya// yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog
44a5(rgyud): phyir zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o// bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol// de bzhin ngo tsha'i bya ba nyid// dngos po kun gyis rang bzhin gyis// yo gas rnam dpyad snying rje che// mchod sbyin sbyin
44a6(rgyud): sreg dka' thub 'das// sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs// dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol// shin tu rnal 'byor ldan spyod kyis// nges par sngon du lha min gang // brgya byin lta bu yin na yod// 
44a7(rgyud): de la 'jigs par mi bya ste// sang+ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rtag tu snying rjes btung bar bya// rnal 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa// gzhan pa'i btung bas bzi ba
44a8(rgyud): med// yang na dpal ldan rgyal chab che// brtul zhugs spyod pa'ang bsgrags pa yang // gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// sgom pa po yis rnam bzung ba// rna ba dag
44b1(rgyud): la rna ma bzang // spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin// lag padag la lag gdub nyid// deng pa la ni ska rags nyid// rkang bde bzhin dang gdub bo// dpung ba'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid// mgrin pa la ni nong / 
44b2(rgyud): bu ste/ bgo ba sdug gi lpags pa nyid// bza' ba mi 'chi bcu byed de// he ru ka sbyor smras bu 'di// mnyam par gzhag pas gnas par bya// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// rang gis dbang bskur ste/ 
44b3(rgyud): rje can// rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer nas// spyod pa brtul zhugs rtogs par bya// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos med na// gang zhig rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i// rigs kyis kyang ni bya ba'o// yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung ba// 
44b4(rgyud): byang chub sa bon bcug pa yis// sbyang bar byas te khyer nas ni// gang tshe rdo rje mchog ldan par// de tshe glu ni blang bar bya// / gang tshe dga' ba skyes pa na// thar pa'i rgyur ni gar bya ste// de
44b5(rgyud): rdo rje rkang pas gar// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis bya// 'khoralo'i gzugs kyi mi bskyod pa// sna tsha'i bdag nyid 'ad bag med// mgul gyi phreng bar rin chen bdag/ 'go bar rnam
44b6(rgyud): bar snang mdzad brjod// ska rags lon don yod gnas// shes rab la T+wAM ga gzugs can// thabs kyi gzugs kyi cang te'u// sman ni rnam par bza' bar bya// chu ni rtag tu btung bya ste// rga shis zil
44b7(rgyud): gyis mi non cing // kun tu srung bar gyur pa yin// rkun ma'i sgras byas cod pan can// de la hUM byung sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin// sor lnga'i dum
44b8(rgyud): bur byas nas ni// tsid pan la ni rnam par 'dzin// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// sku yi ska rags nyis skor nyid// thal ba skra yi mchod phyir thogs// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dzin// cang
45a1(rgyud): / te'i sgra ni bzlas pa ste// sems can thams cad 'gron gnyer ba'o// kha T+wAM ga ni shes rab ste// rdo rje bzlas dang sgom pa yin// thod pa can du rang gyur pa// rkam dang rmongs dang de bzhin
45a2(rgyud): 'jigs// khro dang ngo tsha'i bya ba ni// rtag tu rnam par spang bar bya// he ru ka bdag rnal 'byor pa// rigs lnga la ni gnas par bya// rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan par// rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag
45a3(rgyud): rigs gcig du ma nyid kyis ni// gang phyir dbye ba bskyed mi bya// bdag nyid kyis ni gnyid spangs nas// the tsom med par spyod pa bya// dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba las spyod pa'i brtag pa ste/ 
45a4(rgyud): lnga pa'o// / lha logs mnyan por 'tsho dal lags na// rang byin rlab pa'i rim ci lags// gsang ba la nga sogs dgongs pa ci// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying rje che// yid
45a5(rgyud): ni gcig tu gyur par nyon// thams cad rgyud kyi gtan phab pa/ mdor bsdus nas ni bsgrag par bya// e yi rnam pa gang gsu/ ngas pa// gnas kyi mtshan nyid mi gsal bar// 'gro dang rjes
45a6(rgyud): 'ong ba nyid// khams dang sems kyi rtag 'gro nga'o// khams shes bya ba'i sgra ru legs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar gsang ba'i yi ge bcu drug brjod par bya ste// ra yi rnam pa
45a7(rgyud): khrag gi khams// ha ni de bzhin reg bya nyid// s+ye ni bad kan zhes byar gsungs// ba yi rnam pa sems nyid dang // ra yi rnam pas ro nyid de// mes ni de bzhin lho tshol dag/ ra ni me nyid du ni gsungs// ma
45a8(rgyud): ma rnam pa gdugasungs// sa mi rnam pa pashid bar gsungs// dza mi rnam pas de bzhin tshig//  rmugs pa nyid dugasungs// ni ma rnamapas dus pa nyid// sa nigapa pa nyid gas so// 
45b1(rgyud): rnam pas glo ba nyid// s+thi ni pad+ma nyid du gsungs// shin tu mdzes pa'i rdzas dang ldan// ta yi rnam pas khu ba ni// byang chub sems las byung ba yin// rtsa yi sgra yi rang bzhin las// de ltar lha mo
45b2(rgyud): bsgrags pa yin// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// cha yi bdag nyid 'gyur ba nyid// ra ni me zhes bya bar gsungs// khrag las 'khris pa yang dag blangs// mtshan nyid gcig 'dod bdakan/ 
45b3(rgyud): las 'ardul dang chu rgyus yang dag byung // de yi mgon por brjod pa'i rlung // ha ni kun tu 'gro bar gsungs// rus pa'i mtshams ni 'ad rnam su// sa bon lnga ni yang dag btab// rkang tur dang
45b4(rgyud): thams cad du// sa bon bzhi ni dam pa nyid// dang po'i ra/ mig gnas der ni// sa bon lnga ni mdzes pa nyid// ha nI da// byangs kyi drug ldan pa// rnam par shes par yongasu grags// 
45b5(rgyud): ha yi rnam pas thams cad du// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// sgra yi tshul las byung bton zhing // dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul nyid// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka'
45b6(rgyud): ga 'thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas// srub drang srub byed sbyor ba las// ji lta ba ni de bzhin no// sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan// rgyud las gsungs pa mnyam par gyis// rtsa gnyis
45b7(rgyud): skye gnas dbus su ni// g.yon dang g.yas su de bzhin du// g.yon du khu ba rnam shes bya// g.yas pa la ni khrag nyid de// de yi phan tshun bsdu ba yang // chos kyi dbyings ni sdud pa yin// snying stobs sku dang
45b8(rgyud): rdul dag bcas// mun pa sems kyi rang bzhin las// snying stobs khu ba rin chen rdul// mun pa skyed par byed pa nyid// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// dngos dang dngos med ro// cig 'gyur// bshang ba ga ci
46a1(rgyud): / babad kan dang // khrag dang lnga pa khu ba nyid// bdud rtsi lnga yi gong bu dngos// de phyir rdo rje can du brjod// rus pa rkang dang khu ba ni// ba las skyes par de bzhin gsungs// lpags pa dang ni
46a2(rgyud): sha dang khrag/ ma las skyes pa zhes byar bsgrags// gong bu'i bsdu ba rnams kyi yang // tshad ni 'di dag gsungs pa ste// gong bu gcig pu gnyis su 'gyur// gnyis su gyur pa du ma rnams// gcig pu
46a3(rgyud): du ma'i rang bzhin gyis// de phyir rdo rje can 'dir gsungs// rtsa yi spyod yul nyid gsungs pa// de yi sgo yang de gnyis la// de rnams 'du ba'i dus su ni// lha ni dmigs par 'gyur ba yin// steng gi sgo dang / 
46a4(rgyud): 'og nyid de// 'og gi sgon rnam par shes// steng gi sgon dbyings dad do// rtsani thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rnal 'byor pas ni 'jug par bsam// de yi lus kyi steng sgola'ang // rdo rje nan
46a5(rgyud): gyi rtag rgyun bzhugs// steng gi slor ni sbyor ba gsum// sgo gu rna/ sa kyis yongasu bskor// kye/ bcom ldan 'das sbyor du/ gsum ni ci zhes bshad// ji ltar gang gi rnam pa yis// sar+b+ba
46a6(rgyud): kyi rtag tu 'gro ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsum nyid sbyor ba sbyor ba gsum// rnam gsum dbye bas rnam par gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// tha ma 'bring po dam pa
46a7(rgyud): nyid/ ka ba gcig dang sgo dgu pa// sbom po lnga ni lhag pa'i lha// bug par gur ni son pa'i sgo// dgu yi rnam par yongs su grags// tha ma'i sgren skur ldan pa// sbom po lha yi sprul pa'o// sems dang skyes bu/ 
46a8(rgyud): skyes bu can// khyad par rnal 'byor pa yi don// rtag par kun tu dus su ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i khyad par las// rkang med rkang gcig rkang gnyis dang // rkang bzhi las ni sogs pa yi// rlung la sogs pas
46b1(rgyud): rabang bye bas// rtag tu 'gro ba rlung rnam pa'i// sems kyi gnas pa rnam pa gnyis// nub dang rab rgya'i cho ga yis// rtag tu nub dang rab rgyub// sems can kun la 'gro ba'o// de ltar gang zhig mi rig pa/ 
46b2(rgyud): sems med skyes bu med pa dang // yid dang ldan pa med pa dang // rnal 'byor pa yi don med pa// ma nyid gang dang rlung dang ni// dbang chen dang ni bzhin chu// 'khor lo sems kyi kun spyod pa// steng dang ngos
46b3(rgyud): dang drang rog 'gro// dra ba nyi ma'i rab dbyebs// gsum pa'i sgon yid dang bcas// rdub dang dbyung ba gnyis ka yang // sgo yo dam pa nyid yin te// btso ba dam pa yin sgo// snying dang reg tu rab tu grags/ 
46b4(rgyud): 'og gi sgos ni rnam par shes// steng gi sgos ni dbyings nyid de/ rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// steng gi sgor na g.yo zhing gnas// de rnams 'og tu rnam par gnas// steng gis/ 
46b5(rgyud): gshegasu gsol ba nyid// dgug dang gshegasu gsol ba yi// / tshul gyi sems kyis rtag tu 'gro// dus gsum sang / sa rgyas thams cad dang // mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo rnams// 
46b6(rgyud): 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la// yon tan skyon ni rab brjod pas// bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis// lhan cig skyes pa grub pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ 
46b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan lha mos ni// bo la kak+ko lar bcug nas// sems dpa'i chen po mnyes byas te// tshig ni 'di dgo yang dag gsol// dpyid ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags// thig le bgyi ba ji ltar lags// 
46b8(rgyud): mi phyed ma sogs ji ltar gnas// de yi gnas ni ji ltar lags// pul+li ra sogs ci gsungs dang // 'khor lo bkod pa de bzhin gzhan// ji ltar rtsa yi rdzogs pa yi// de yi dbye ba bdag la gsungs// 
47a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo bshad par bya yis nyon// gsang ba las ni ches gsang mchog/ rtsa yi rang bzhin dang / gnas la sogs pa dang / sa bcu
47a2(rgyud): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi 'khor lor son pa gnas kyi nang gi rab tu dbye bas nyi shu rtsa bzhir gsungs pa/ spyi bo ma la ya yi yul// de bzhin spyi gtsug 'bar ba 'dzin
47a3(rgyud): debazhin du ni ur+ya nyid // rna ba g.yas pa nyid du brjod// rtsib ma'i rgyab ni arbu // bzhi ni gnas shes pa bya'o// rna ba g.yon pa'i rang bzhin ni// de bzhin gong ba rir shes// dga' ba'i dbang phyug
47a4(rgyud): bshad pa ni// smin ma'i dbus gnas rab tu bskul// de bzhin mig dag lha mo'i mkhar// lag pa'i rtsa bar mA la ba// de lta ra nye ba'i gnas nyid de// thugs kyi 'khor lor rnam par gnas// 
47a5(rgyud): gnas kyi khyad par rang bzhin gyi// mkha' spyod rnams kyi yang dag bshad// mchan khung kA ma ru pa nyid// nu ma o trer rab tu grags// 'di dag zhing du yang dag brjod// lte ba tri sha ku nir
47a6(rgyud): brjod// sna yi rtse mor ko sha lA// nye ba'i zhing du brjod pa'o// kha ni ka ling ka ru brjod// mgrin pa laM pa ka ru gsungs tsAn+do ha zhes rnam par bshad// snying ni kany+tsir brjod pa ste// dbang po hi ma la ya nyid// 
47a7(rgyud): nye ba yin ts+tshan+dor brjod// de ltar yul rnams thams cad du// gsung gi 'khor lor rnam par gnas// gnas kyi khyad par yul gyi ni// sa spyod rnams kyi yang dag bshad// rtags la yi dgas lhag
47a8(rgyud): par gnas// gsang ba la ni khyim gyi lha// 'di dag 'du bar brjod pa'o// brla ni si ra bya brjod// rje ngar gnyis ni gser gling gi/ rang gi po rnam par bshad// nye ba yi ni 'du ba nyid// sor mon gar ru
47b1(rgyud): 'jo / 'du ba'i chu ngas// du rjong nas das brjod/  ba sa rnam byed// sus mo susu ru dzang // di dag nye pa'i du khrod cing // ma par rdzol ni gsus par// di dag sus
47b2(rgyud): dang rang lus skyes// rang gi ning dang phyi rol gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la// nyi shu rtsa bzhir bye ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni kun gyi gnas// thams cad du ni yang dag bshad// 'di rnams
47b3(rgyud): gnas su mkho 'gro ma// rtsa yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// drug pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// de nas gzhan yang dam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji ltar gnas
47b4(rgyud): son pa'i rtse'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o// snying gi nang son pad+ma da ni// mdab mo brgyad pa snying por bcas// de yi nang du son dpa'i rtsa// mar mo'i rang gi ngo bcan// chu shing gi ni me tog ltar/ 
47b5(rgyud): brkyang zhing kha ni 'og tu'o// de yi nang gnas dpa' bo ni// yungs kar gyi ni sbom phra tsam// mi shigs hUM gis sa bon ni// kha ba lta bur 'dzag pa nyid// lus can rnams kyi snying dga' ba// 
47b6(rgyud): dpyod ces bya bar rnam par bshad// rgod ma'i me yi gzugs kyis ni// bdag med ma ni thig ler brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar// dpyid thob pa yi cho ga
47b7(rgyud): shes pas// snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par gnas// dpa' bo shrI ni he ru ka/ 'di ni dpyid kyi thig ler brjod// rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs 'dzin ma// rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par gnas// sku gsung
47b8(rgyud): thugs kyi dbye bas ni// sgo ni rnam gsum 'byung ba las// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar byed// 'di ni kun gyi lus la gnas// lte bar a yi gzugs kyis ni// thung ngu ru ni rab tu grags// snying le yang ni
48a1(rgyud): hUM da ni// ring po ma mo gnyis dang gnas// mgrin par mo gyi gzugs kyis ni// ma mo gsum brjod bu lu ta// dpral bar cigi rnam pa 'di// sgra dang thig le mi shigs pa// 'a
48a2(rgyud): lo bzhi ni rab dbye bas// so sogs 'byung ba chen po dang // thun bzhir byin gyis brlabs pa dang // pad+ma bzhi las byung ba dang // dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor bzhi yi mngon du'o// mchog tu
48a3(rgyud): dga' ba'i ngo bo yis// bya dang byed pa'i dngos po las// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis ni// 'di ni ji ltar bde bar rol// mdab ma rnams kyi gzhi la yang // 'byung ba bzhi yi rtsa rnams ni// mar me'i rang
48a4(rgyud): bzhin lta bur ni// phyogs bani la ni rnam par gnas// rtsa rnam das bzhi yang mtshams rnams su// rnam par gnas shi dang der son pa'ang // bdud rtsi lnga ni 'bab pa ste// de mchod rang gi
48a5(rgyud): gzugs gnas pas// de yi dngos po'i ngo bo las// mchod pa bzhi ni rnam par bshad// lus kyi snying gi nang du ni/ rtsa lnga rnams ni rnam par gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba
48a6(rgyud): yis// nyi shu rtsa bzhi nye bar brjod// gnas sogs dbye ba la gnas nas// gnas dang gnas la rnam par gnas// spyi bor yang dag byung ba yi// rtsa ni spyi bo skyes zhes brjod// rdul dang snying stobs/ 
48a7(rgyud): mun pa'i tshul// de yi nang nas gcom ni// pul+lI rar ni mi phyed ma// so dang sen mo 'bab par brjod// 'bar ba 'dzin pa phra gzugs ma// de bzhin skra dang bsdu 'bab// ur+yan gnas ni chen po la// rtsebs
48a8(rgyud): ni rnam par gnas// rna ba g.yas par gnas nas ni// lpags pa dri ma 'bab ma gnas// arbu dar ni g.yon pam// mkha 'gro ma ni sha 'bab mo// gang zhig chu rgyus 'bab pa'i rtsa// ba yi mchog sbyin
48b1(rgyud): rnam par gnas// de ni sra ba'i tshul gyis gnas// thub du mar ni rnam par bshad// gang zhig dma' ba'i dbang phyug gnas// de bzhin rus sbal skyes mar grags// sra ba'i dngos po gnas pa'i phyir// dus/ 
48b2(rgyud): pa'i phreng ba 'khrugs par gnas// lha mo'i mkhar du gang zhig rtsa// 'jam pa sgom pa ma ru brjod// de ni rtag tu mtshan pa 'bab// thams cad lus la rtag par gnas// mA la bar ni dbang ma ni// rgyal ba
48b3(rgyud): dbang phyug snying la gnas// rtsa ni gang zhig mig 'bab ma// 'dod pa'i gzugs su rnam par gnas// gzugs ni mthong bar 'dod pa ste// skyon bral ma zhes rnam par bshad// o rer mkhris pa 'bab
48b4(rgyud): pa'i rtsa// gang zhig mjug ma chen mor brjod// tri sha ku neradabyung ba ni// ma mo nges par glo bar bcas// ko sha lar ni ma tshan mo nyid// sgyu ma phreng bzang khyab cing 'bab// ka ling kar ni
48b5(rgyud): bsil sbyin ma// ngos kyi chu rgyus yang dag bshad// tsha mi ni lho gnas nges// laM bA kar ni rab tu grags// tshad ma nyid ni kAny+tsi ri gnas// thams cad du ni bshang ba 'bab/ 
48b6(rgyud): mtshams kyi mtha' yi nang du yang // kha yi gnas su rangs pa'i gdong // shin tu gzugs can ba kan ldan// yi dgas lnga gnas yang dag gnas// gang zhig rtag tu rnag 'bab pa// khyim gyi ltar
48b7(rgyud): ni yang dag gnas// mkha'agro dam pa'i dbang phyug ma// sbyi ma nyid du rnam par bshad// so raSh+Ta ra ni gang zhig rtsa// rgyu sbyin ma ni dmar po 'bab// rdul ni 'bab par gyur pa ni// gser gling du ni yang
48b8(rgyud): dag bshad// yan lag gzi brjid kun khyab mi// sbyor bral mar na rab tu grags// na ga ra ni sdu gum// tshil rtson sbom zhing myos byed 'bab// sin dru shin tu grub ma nyid// mya ngan 'tshom
49a1(rgyud): 'bab mar brjod// ma rur gnas ma lung skam 'bab// 'tsheng bam zhes rnam par bstan// ku lu tar ni yid bzang ma// sha dang snabs ni 'bab ma'o// drug pa las yul
49a2(rgyud): gyi dgod pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// lha lags mnyam par 'tshal lags na// nang ni dkyil 'khor mchod pa las// sogs pa'i las ni ji ltar lags// sbyin sreg las
49a3(rgyud): ni mi 'tshal bas// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// he ru ka la sogs pa'i lha// rtsa gzugs mdzes par yang dag byung // lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams
49a4(rgyud): dga' bar// sgo bzhir ji skad gsungs pa'o// rang gi yan la dag brgyad byung bas// ka ba de yis bskor nas gnas// da su bo kun gyis mnyam pa'i phyir// gru bzhi par ni rab tu grags/ 
49a5(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bos ni// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gci ga tu gsungs// ri ni mgo bo'i ze 'bru la// ji ltar rtsom/ chen la sogs rim// bla ma'i dus thabs rim nyid kyis// de ni/ 
49a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas// rkang pa'i 'thil du rtsom chen rlung // gzhu yi dbyibs su rnam par gnas// sum mdo la ni gnas su ni// de bzhin gru gsum 'bar ba nyid// zlum po'i rnam pa'i gzug
49a7(rgyud): kyis ni// chu ni lte bar rnam par gnas// snying kar yang ni sa nyid de// kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do// sgal tshigs dbyug gu'i gzugs kyis ni// ri rab ri rgyal de bzhin no// de ni spyi bo'i char gnas pa/ 
49a8(rgyud): 'angs skyes med pam sum cu gnyis// dbyangs dang gsapa byed mdzes par gnas// sum nu gnyis byang chub 'dod// pad+mo nadu song pa gang // de ni zla nga'i kyil 'khor brjod/ skye ba'i nang du nga ni// 
49b1(rgyud): gang zhig gnas pa de ru gsungs// de nang haM gi rnam pa nyid// thig la'i gzugs can mi shigs pa// 'jig rten kun gyi rtsa bde// brtan pa'i bdag nyid g.yo ba'i bdag/ gsal dang mi gsal gzug
49b2(rgyud): las ni// sa bon gzugs kyi rnam par gnas// lus can rnams ni kun gyi gzugs// de phyir gdod nas rdzogs pa nyid// bdud rtsi'i gzugs kyis 'dzag par ni// nyin dang mtshan du rnam par gnas// 
49b3(rgyud): de nyid kyis ni sgra 'byed cing // me ni dga' bar byed pa ste// des ni gang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// yin pa nyid du the tsom med// de nyid dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// dngos po rnams kyi snying po mchog
49b4(rgyud): de ni len cing gcod pa'i phyir// lus ni dkyil 'khor nyid du ba nga // rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// 'khor lor yang ni dkyi ga khor brjod// byang chub sems ni rin po che// dkyil 'khor de nyid/ 
49b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid// phyi rol bcas pa'i nang gzugs kyis// sna tshogs khyab cing rnam par gnas// phyi rol gzug/ sa dang sgra la sogs// dbang po thams cad 'jug pa'o// 
49b6(rgyud): nang gi khu ba la sogs pa// grub pa'i rdzas ni rnam par gnas// phyi rol bcas pa'i nang nyid kyis// rdo rje can gyi byang chub sems// sbom dang phra ba'i rang bzhin gyis// 'gro ba'i gnyen gyi rang bzhin can// 
49b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// dam tshig don du gsungs pas ni// dkyil 'khor goms pas skye ba 'dir// sangs rgyas nyid ni thob par 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin/ 
49b8(rgyud): rang rgyal rnams kyi dang // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor goms pas rdzogs pa nyid// shes rab ma ni cher 'bab par// nang gi khu ba la sogs dang // de bzhin phyi rol gzugs
50a1(rgyud): sogs kyi// sreg rdzas kyis ni sbyin sreg bya// skye mched drug dang khams rnams dang // phung po la sogs khyad par las// de rnams kyi ni gzugs can rtsa// de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/ 
50a2(rgyud): des ni de mchod gang gi phyir// rnal 'byor mchod par yang dag bshad// thod pa 'di ni mgo ba nyid// sreg rdzas kyi ni snod du gsungs// thugs bzar ro mar bshad pa ste// snying gi 'khor lo brkyang ma dag/ 
50a3(rgyud): dgang gzar zhes byar yang dag brjod// thab khung lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du// las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa yi// tshangs pa'i me ni sum mdor gnas// sgra ni sngags zhes brjod pa ste// bzlas pa 'khor bar
50a4(rgyud): byed pa yin// sgom pa mtshums par snang ba nyid// dkyil 'kho dar gnyis med rnal 'byor phyir// lhan cig skyes pa zhon pa 'di// de ni rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs// dkyil 'khor
50a5(rgyud): bdag po'i gzugs kyi phyir// slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po nyid / de skad la sogs ci gsungs pa// rgyud ni thams cad / gas par bya// da dung bdag la the tshom mchis// chos dang
50a6(rgyud): longs spyod sprul pa dang // bde ba chen po'i gzugs kyis ni// mgon po ji ltar rol par 'gyur// de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal bas// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
50a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// spyi bo lta son 'khor lo ni// e yi dbyibs su yang dag gnas// snying dang mgran par yang dag gnas// baM gi rnam pa lta bur brjod// lte ba'i nang gnas pad+ma ni// mdab ma drug cu rtsa
50a8(rgyud): bzhin ldan// 'dam skyes mdab ma sum cu gnyis// spyi bo'i nang du rnam par gnas// mgrin pa'i nang du son pa yang // pad+ma lo ma bcu drug nyid// de yi snying ka'i gnas su ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad du
50b1(rgyud): brjod// mdab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi nyid// sprul pa la ni rab tu grags// pad+ma chen po ma ba brgyad par// chos kyi sku ni rab tu bskor// longs spyod rdzogs pa bcu drug rtsings// de bzhin mdab ma sum cu
50b2(rgyud): gnyis// bde chen ye shes chen po la// kun tu yang dag rnam par gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// snga tshan brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// yig 'bru dang po'i ngo bo yis// 'di ni a s+t+waM
50b3(rgyud): ge mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lor rnam bshad pa// hUM ni mi shigs pa ru brjod// dbyangs sgra lnga ni yang dag ldan// ya ra la was rnam par rgyan// longs spyod 'khor lo'i nang gnas pa// oM ni yig
50b4(rgyud): 'bru gsal bar byed// cha ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// kun tu yongasu bskor ba'o// bde chen 'khor lo chen po la// na thig le'i gzugs can no// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos
50b5(rgyud): dag la// zla ba nyi ma rnam par bshad// mgrin pa nas brtsam/ sa g.yon pa'i rtsa// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku can ma/ lte ba'i nang du ngal sos shing // kha ni 'og tu myos byed 'bab// 
50b6(rgyud): gang zhig lte ba las stengs rtsa// de bzhin kha ni steng du 'bab// mgron pa'i nang dungal sos shing // khrag 'bab par ni rab tu grags// myos byed zla ba zhes byar bshad// khrag ni nyi ma zhes byar gsungs// 
50b7(rgyud): sgo gnyis mnyam par zhon nas ni// steng dang 'og du mnyam gnas pa// 'di dag zla ba nyi ma gnyis// rtsa ni gnyis su rab tu grags// dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro ma'i// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba'i rgyur/ 
50b8(rgyud): nub pa dang ni 'char ba nyid// log dang sad pa lta bur gsungs// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos la ni// dbyangs ni bcu gnyis yang dag gnas// kha ni steng du yang dag bshad// ka la sogs pa rnams
51a1(rgyud): kyis bskor// kha ni 'og gi gnas su gnas// lhag par byas nas sbyar ba nyid// k+Sha ni srin po nyid gsungs pa// 'og gi char ni rnam par gnas// gang tshe mgrin par
51a2(rgyud): chags chen gyi// gzugs kyi zla ba gnas pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa'i sku// de tshe longs spyod rdzogs par bshad// gang tshe rdo rje'i rtser gnas pa// de tshe der ni sA rje ro// gang che la
51a3(rgyud): spyod rdzogs sku yang // nub par gnas par 'gyur ba nA// b+ha ga'i nang du song de yang // yungs kar tsamo du rnam par gnas// nyi ma'i gzugs su yang dag bshad// sprul pa'i skur ni brjod pa ste/ 
51a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// spros pa de yis bsku dad pa'o// pad+ma gar dbang rgyal po ni// mdab ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba can// sprul pa'i sku yi gzu gsu ni// der ni nyi ma nub
51a5(rgyud): pa na// gang tshe rdzog pa'i byang chub sems// gong bur gyur pa rlo ga ba med// 'khor ba'i lam ni rnam bcad cing // spros pa nyer zhi dge ba ste// gnyis med mchog tu dag pa nyid// dpal
51a6(rgyud): ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs// shrI ni he ru ka zhes bshad// rgyud ni srin bu'i gzugs can nyid// dgod dang lha dang lag bcangs nyid// rgyud ni de nyid rnam par gnas// 'dod chags nyid dang
51a7(rgyud): chags bral yang // zos nas srin bu gnas pa nyid// rtsa thams cad kyi mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa ste drug pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// 
51a8(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang // rnal 'byor ma bdog med ma la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'khor lo'i sdom pa'i lam dang ni// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung
51b1(rgyud): pa dang // mkha 'gro 'khor lo khyad par dang // dgongs pa'i skad kyis khyad par ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs na// sdom pa'ang bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkan
51b2(rgyud): sprul pa// rnal 'byor ma lus dbus gnas par// a yi rnam par sdom pa'i gnas// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang // sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye// bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje skye mched thams cad
51b3(rgyud): nyid/ 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas// phyi rol gnyis gnyis bstan pa med// sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis brjod par bya// sku gsum yongs su shes pa las
51b4(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor brjod// chos dang longs spyod sprul rab dang // de bzhin bde ba chen po nyid// skye gnas mgrin snying dbus su ni// sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas// ma lus pa yi
51b5(rgyud): sems can gyi// skye ba gang la brjod bya ba// gang zhig sprul/ ba gnas brtan phyir// de la sprul pa'i sku nyid yin// / chos ni sems kyi rang bzhin te// chos kyi 'khor lo snying khar
51b6(rgyud): yin/ ro rnam drug gi gzugs can gyi// bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod// chos rnams kun la brtan pa'i phyir// thams cad yod pa'i rang bzhin can// mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo dang // 
51b7(rgyud): bde ba chen po spyi bor gnas// e ba rnam pa rgyu 'thun nyid// rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las// skyes bu byed pa longs spyod la// bde chen 'khor lor dri med nyid// rgyu 'thun la sogs rab dbye bas// 
51b8(rgyud): 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis// las la bcom ldan shes rab brjod// gang nig sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas brtan brjod/ 
52a1(rgyud): chos ni ngag las byung ba'i phyir// 'khor lo thams cad yod par ste// gang zhig mgrin ba kun bkur phyir// longs spyod 'khor lo kun bkur nyid// gang zhig dade chen
52a2(rgyud): mgor gnas phyir// bde chen 'khor lo dge 'dun che// sde pa sku zhes brjod pa ste// lto ba gnas su brjod par bya// skye gnas 'dod chags bral ba nyid// mngal gyi khrum chos gos te// de bzhi/ 
52a3(rgyud): ma ni mkhan po nyid// mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyis gnas// de bzhin sngags bzlas a dong haM// sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid// gces bu skra dang kha spu
52a4(rgyud): bregs// 'di rnams rkyen gyis sems can rnams// sangs nga rgyas nyid du the tsom med// zla ba bcu yang sa rnams te// da sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go/ btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde
52a5(rgyud): can du/ khu ba zhes bya rnam par gnas// de med pas na bde ma da 'gyur// bde ba spangs na de med 'gyur// nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas// lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba// de phyir
52a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dngos po man// de nyid dngos med tshul kyang min// zhal phyag rnam pa gzugs can nyid// mchog tu bde ba gzugs med pa// de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes// ldan
52a7(rgyud): cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin brjod// rnam dag rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das// zhal phyag kha dog dbyibs las ni// lha yi gzugs kyis rnal 'byor ni// skyes pa tsam gyis
52a8(rgyud): rnam par gnas// 'on kyang bag chags phal bas so// de skad lha mos bshad pa ni// rnal 'byor kun gyi gong na med// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa lha mo thams cad
52b1(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ spyan dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / khro ga nyer can dang / bskul byed ma dang / ri khrod ma shing lo can dang / 'og zhal ma dang / sdom pa ma dang / de dag la sogs pa'i rab tu/ 
52b2(rgyud): rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar bar gyur cing brgyal ba dang / klog par gyur to// de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad
52b3(rgyud): ces gsol to// rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi tshogs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bslang du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa
52b4(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad bslang ba'i pyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid// 'on kyang blo bur dri mas bsgribs// de gsal
52b5(rgyud): bas ni sangs rgyas nyid// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// ri gas kyi bu gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa// btsan dugazos pas brgyal bar 'gyur// rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis
52b6(rgyud): nide yi de nyid yongasu gcod// dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis// skye bo thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur// dug gi de nyid shes pa des// dug gis dug ni 'bigs par byed// ji ltar rlung gis zin de la// ma sha'i
52b7(rgyud): bza' ba sbyin par bya// bzlog pa'i sman ni rtags pa las// rlung gis rlung ni snun par byed// so sor rtog las rnam rtog dang // srid pa nyid kyis srid dag byed// ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa// chu gzhan gyis
52b8(rgyud): ni dgug par bya// de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang // rnam par nges par sbyang bar bya// ji ltar 'tshed pas tshig pa la// yang ni me yis gdung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa// 'dod chags
53a1(rgyud): me yis gdung bar bya// skye bo ma bzad pa yi las// gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba// thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur// 'dod chags/
