125b7(rgyud): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs pa ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i nyi zer gyi rdul ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams so// de rnams kyi rdul
125b8(rgyud): ni dpe byad bzang po rnam so// gsal bar gyur pa de gang zhe na/ gsal ba ni khyad par du yon tan la sogs pa 'dzin ste/ byang chub chen po'i mchod pa ni de rnams kyi tshogs kyi yongasu bskor bya'o// 
126a1(rgyud): bdud kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgru ba ni skyes pa'i bdud de/ nyan thos dang rang byang chub kyi sems gsod pa'i phyir bdud ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o// bdud bzhi ba
126a2(rgyud): ba dang ldan zhing bdud las rgyal bar kha cig tu shAkya thub par gyur pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos dang gang zag tu 'dzin pa tshar bcad pa'i phyir thar pa rnam par dag pa'o// 'jig
126a3(rgyud): rten pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gang zag tshar bcad pa'i phyir dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'dzin pa tshar bcad pa'i phyir de ltar chos dang gang zag la bdag med par rtogs nas ji ltar
126a4(rgyud): gyur pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir thar pa thams cad rnam paradag pa yin te/ 'di'i don du bcom ldan 'das rnam parang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa'o// bdag tu lta
126a5(rgyud): ba rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'dod chags rnam pa tham sa cad dang / de'i rnam par dag pa ste/ de kho na la bad ga mi dmigs pas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir de'i don du spyan ras/ 
126a6(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug yin no// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams thams cad kyi mthar thub pa la 'khor lo dam pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa'i mchog ni lha'i
126a7(rgyud): 'khor lo dam pa'o// 'di lta ste yang na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus pa zhes bya ba la 'du ba ni tshogs pa'o// bde ba can zhes bya ba ni mchog gi dga' ldan te/ rigs kyi bu bde ba/ 
126a8(rgyud): can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams lta bu'o// dper na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pas rgyan pa'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug
126b1(rgyud): dang / dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal du med pas kun tu bskor bas/ de ni bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams lta bu ste/ de'i don du pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug sgrol ba
126b2(rgyud): bo 'byung ba yin no// sbyin pa dang sbyin pa po dang / len pa po mi dmigs pa'i sbyin pas ser sna spang ba'i phyir don dam par rnam par dag pa de'i don du sna can gyi sems can rnams 'khor gsum yongasu/ 
126b3(rgyud): dag pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu sbyin pa la sbyor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to// nyi ma lta bu'i phyag rgya chen po ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o// nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las snying
126b4(rgyud): po bskyed pa'i phyir gang gi 'di ni de de bzhin du gsungs so// dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong bar byed pa ni sems can thams cad kyi rnam pa
126b5(rgyud): thams cad du 'khor lo sgyur ba la sogs par gsol ba 'di khas pa de rnams kyi bsam pa de rab tu sbyin pas thams ca da kyi bsam pa skong bas byed pa ste/ de'i phyir bka' stsal pa/ 
126b6(rgyud): nam mkha' la glang po la sogs pa zhini po che bdun gyi rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa ces bya ba ni rin po che bdun gyi char 'bab pa'o// de'i don tu sgrol ma ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyan pa yin
126b7(rgyud): no// shin tu brtson 'grus dman pa zhes bya ba ni le lo la sogs pa'o// stobs kyi rnal 'byor ni drag po'i rnal 'byor ro// de bas na stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyis rnam par dag pa ni drag shul gyi
126b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis rnam par dag pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas ni de'i don du stobs kyi rnal 'byor rnam par dag pas rta mchog 'byung ba yin te/ rta mgrin yin no zhes bya ba'i don to// dpung pa bzhi
127a1(rgyud): dang lag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni phyag brgyad pa lta bu'o// nabs bzhi zhes bya ba ni g.yon brkyang ba'i sbyor ba'o// de nas g.yas pa'i zhabs gcig gis ni mi
127a2(rgyud): dngos grub ma dang dpal mo mnan to// gnyis pas ni lha mo sha tsaM dang dga' ma mnan pa'o// g.yon gyi dang pos ni mig gsum pa dang khyab 'jug go// gnyis pas ni tshangs padang 'dod lha mnan
127a3(rgyud): nas bzhug so// dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug rta mchog gis ni 'jig rten gsum po lnga chen po la sogs pa de rnams bsdus nas gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam
127a4(rgyud): bar btul ba zhig rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis 'jig rten gsum po tha mas cad bsgral nas/ de'i dkyil 'khor du lha chen pos bla ma la dka' bzlog ma yon du phul nas phyung ba ni rim pa
127a5(rgyud): ji lta bar gru bzhin pa pa ga gdab par bya zhing sgeg mo la sog sa pas yongasu gang ba zhes bya ba'i don to// dkyil 'am ra gyi tshad gang gis thig gdab par bya zhe na/ nad du khru gang
127a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni dbus su khru gang ste/ phyi rol du khru gang nyid dang / 'phar ma gsum pa khru gnyis pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi snying po
127a7(rgyud): zlum po yin no zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum po sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal to// da ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sgom par bshad
127a8(rgyud): bar bya ste/ de la re shig dang por tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni sred pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro// rmongs pa las bden pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni lus la chug/ 
127b1(rgyud): bzhin ma yin pa sgom pa ste/ de yongs su brtags pas gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la 'jug pa'o// de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir tshul bzhin ma
127b2(rgyud): yin pa yid la byed pa ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal te/ de dang lhan cig zag med pa dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi sdug bsngal gang zhig lta ba'i phyir tshor ba ni sred pa'i rgyu'i phyir te yongasasu brtags
127b3(rgyud): bas kun 'byung gi bden pa la 'jug go/ bdag gi dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ni sems de yongasu brtags pa'i phyir 'gog pa'i bden pa la 'jug go/ bdag tu lta ba gcod pas rtogs pa'i
127b4(rgyud): phyir chos la brtags pas gang zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos thams cad la rmongs pa med pa'i phyir lam gyi bden pa la 'jug pa'o// de ltar
127b5(rgyud): bor bden pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'i sgom pa rnam par bzhag par bya ste/ de nas yang dag par spong ba'i sgom pa yongasu shes la/ gang gi phyir 'thun
127b6(rgyud): pa'i phyogs dang / mi 'thun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam pa thams cad du de rtogs na brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhi po 'di rab tu rtsom mo// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgoms pas 'thun pa'i phyogs dang / mi
127b7(rgyud): mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam pa thams cad yongasu shes nas 'thun pa'i phyogs yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhi
127b8(rgyud): yang dag par rab tu rtsom ste/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir zhes rgyas par gong du gsungs so// las nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni de la don thams cad yang dag par rtogs
128a1(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ skyon lnga spang ba dang / 'du byed brgyad brten pas de'i phyir yongs su shes pas brtson 'grus kyi sgom pas sems gnas pa'i las nyid do// rdzu 'phrul gyi dang ba bani/ 
128a2(rgyud): ni don thams cad yang dag par 'phel ba'i rgyu'i phyir gnas pa ni 'dir sems kyi ting nge 'dzin du rig par bya'o// de nas yang dag par spong ba'i mthar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de yang las nyid de/ skyon lnga spang ba
128a3(rgyud): dang nga 'du byed brgyad bsgoms par rig pas bya'o// skyon lnga gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de la la lo dang / shes bzhin ma yin pa dang / rmugs pa dang / bying ba dang / rgod pa
128a4(rgyud): pa nyid do// mngon 'dus ma byas pa dang / de nas mngon par du bya ba skyon lnga spang bar lnga po 'di rnams brjod do// de la byi rab dang rgod pas skyon gcig byed de/ mngon par 'dum byas pa
128a5(rgyud): bying ba dang rgod pa 'jug pa'i dus su skyon no// mngon par 'a dus byas pas rab tu zhi ba la 'di rnams spang ba'i phyir rje/ ltar spang zhing 'du byed brgyad rnam par bzhag ce na/ bzhi yis
128a6(rgyud): lelo lo spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang / rtsol ba dang / dad pa dang / shin tu sbyangs pa de rnams yang rim pa ji lta bar rig par bya'o// gnas dang de nas gnas pa dang / de'i mtshan ma dang / 'bras bu nyid de/ 
128a7(rgyud): gnas ni 'dun pa'o// gnas pa ni rtsol ba'o// de'i gnas 'dun pa'i mtshan ma ni dad pa ste/ yid ches pa dang / dang ba dang / 'dod pa'o// de'i gnas pa rtsol ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu spangs pa ste/ 'dun
128a8(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis khyad par rtogs par bya'o// lhag ma spong ba'i 'du byed bzhi ni dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / sems dpa' dang / btang snyams te/ grangs jiH
128b1(rgyud): bar skyon bzhi'i gnyen po'i phyogs so// de yang dran pa la sogs pa'i rim pa de bzhin du rig par bya ste/ dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas bying ba dang rgod pa rjesu rtogs par bya zhing / de nyid kyi mngon/ 
128b2(rgyud): pabar 'du byed pa zhi ba la shin tu sbyangs pa 'byung ngo // dran pa dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas shes bzhin te/ rmugs pa med par gyur na bying ba dang rgod pa rtog so// ma rtogs pa de rtogs par bya ba'i
128b3(rgyud): don du mngon par 'du byed pa'i sems kyis bying ba dang rgod pa zhi ba la dam pa shin tu sbyangs pa'i sems kyi btang snyoms so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mthar dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po de rnam
128b4(rgyud): kyi rnam par gzhag po ji ltar dgod ce na/ thar pa'i cha dang lnga na pa gang zhig 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag po dang / dadamigs pa na rmugs pa med pas brjed pa med pa'i bdag pa'o// / 
128b5(rgyud): bdag po zhes bya ba ni bsgyur bar byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rka nga pa'i las ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o// thar pa'i cha dang lnga na pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba la bdun pa'i bdag po dang / rab tu sbyor
128b6(rgyud): ba'i bdag po dang / dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pa'i bdag po dang / brjed pa med pa'i bdag po dang / rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag po ste/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po
128b7(rgyud): rnams rig par bya'o// de la za ba po dang bza' bar bya bas stong pa bka' stsal pa/ nang gi skye mched rnams nas brtsams te/ phyi rol gyi bza' ba stong pa nyid dang / de'i lus kyi za ba po dang / bza'
128b8(rgyud): bdag gang zhig byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus de'i stong pa nyid la'ang lta zhing skyo bas 'du byed spong bar byed de/ dge ba mi zad pa dang / gang yang khyad par du bltas pas nang dang phyi rol stong pa nyid du
129a1(rgyud): gsungs so// rab tu gnas pa'i dngos po snod kyi 'jig rten rgyas pa'i phyir de stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid ces gsungaso// de yang nang gi skye mched rnams
129a2(rgyud): la sogs pa gang gis stong pa nyid mthong ba stong pa nyid kyi so de'i stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// ji ltar don dam pa'i rnam pas mthong ba'i de'i stong pa nyid ni don dam pa'i stong pa nyid do// de'i don
129a3(rgyud): du yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu spyod do// de'i stong pa nyid kyi don ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba gnyis 'thob pa'i don du dge ba'i 'dus byas dang / 
129a4(rgyud): 'dus ma byas gnyis so// rtag tu sems can la phan pa'i phyir dang / sems can la shin tu phan pa'i don du 'khor ba ma spang ba'i phyir de'i stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// rgyun
129a5(rgyud): mi 'chad par 'khor ba stong pa nyid du ma mthong bas skyo ste/ 'khor ba yongasu spong bar byed do// gang yang dge ba ni zad par khyad par du lta bas mya ngan las 'das par yang mi
129a6(rgyud): byed cing de'i stong pa nyid spong bar yang mi byed de// 'di ni blang ba dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rigs kyang rnam par dge ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la/ rigs ni rang bzhin te/ ngo bo nyid do// mtshan
129a7(rgyud): dang dpe byad thob par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang / dpe byad dang bcas par thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / dog par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la byang chub
129a8(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams rab tu spyod de// khyad par gyi stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbyang ba'i phyir re shig stong pa nyid bcu bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o// yang 'dir stong pa nyidas
129b1(rgyud): zhe na/ chos dang gang zag gi don dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de/ de'i phyir de las byung ba don dam pa'i dngos po ni der de stong pa nyid dang / phyi rol gyi chos dang gang zag dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las byung
129b2(rgyud): ba'i gcig pa'i dngos po'o// der ji skad gsungs pa'i zab mo la sogs pa sti kyi stong pa nyid bcu drug tu mtshan nyid bshad pa'i don du gzhung gnyisu stong pa nyid rnam par gzhag par bya ste/ dngos po
129b3(rgyud): med pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ chos dang gang zag la yang dag par 'jug pa de'i stong pa nyid ji snyed pa yongs su spang sa'i don du rim pa ji lta ba de ltar stong pa nyid
129b4(rgyud): kyi rab tu dbye bar shes par bya'o// ji ltar sgrub par rnam par shes pa dar bya zhe na/ gal te 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa can du ma gyu/ ru na lus can thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'di rnam
129b5(rgyud): bar dag par ma gyur na brtsams pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur// / gal te chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid blo bur gyi kun nas/ nyon mongs pa ma skyes pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis kun
129b6(rgyud): nas nyon mongs pa can du ma gyur na kun nas nyon mongs pa dngos po med pa'i phyir 'bad pa med pa nyid du sems can thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro// de nos ma skyes pa'i yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis
129b7(rgyud): rnam par dag par ma gyur te// thar pa'i don du rtsom pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang / dag pa dang ma dag pa nyid sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal
129b8(rgyud): ba'i phyir de ji ltar na nyon mongs pa yang ma yin zhing ma dag pa yang ma yin no// nyon mongs pa blo bur gyi phyir ji ltar nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhing dag pa'ang ma yin no// de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye/ 
130a1(rgyud): ba gsungaso// de la stong pa nyid kyi mdor bsdus pa'i don sgrub pa yin no// yang gsungs pa/ 'dod chags kyi gnyen por mi sdug pa la sogs pa dang / zhe sdang gi gnyen
130a2(rgyud): bopor byams pa dang / gti mug gi gnyen por rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// de la ji ltar 'dod chags rnam par ldog ce na/ gal te de dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na/ yin mod kyi gang zhig de skad du
130a3(rgyud): 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid du byed pa na 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no// de bzhin du gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi ye shes
130a4(rgyud): ni rnyog pa med pa ste/ 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags dang bra dal ba bcom nas bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed do// 'dod chags la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba med
130a5(rgyud): ba dang bcas pa ste/ gzhan du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'dod chags rnyed pa yin na de'i 'dod chags la sogs pa yongasu mi spong bar spyod na/ 'on te rim pa'i khyad par las yon tan
130a6(rgyud): gyi khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dper na ke ta ka'i me tog dri'i glang po ches zos na gla rtsil sogs pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro// glang po che phal pas zos na lci ba'i dngos por 'gyur ro// de bas
130a7(rgyud): na de la ka ta ka'i me tog gi skyon ma yin te/ de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa yang rnam par dag pa'i rim pa la gnas pas bsam pa'i khyad par gyi sbyor ba las khyad par du 'phags pa nyid kyi
130a8(rgyud): 'bras bu smin par 'gyur ro// dper na 'o ma sbrul la sogs pas 'thungs na dug gis dngos por 'gyur ro// gzhan yang skyes bus 'thungs na bdud rtsi'i dngos por skye bar 'gyur ro// de ltar
130b1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'dod chags la sogs pa bsam pa'i khyad par gyis rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir sbyor bas dngos po khyad par can gyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyuro// gang
130b2(rgyud): dang gang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyud kyi dngos po dang ldan pa de dang de'i 'bras bu khyad du 'phags pa 'byung ngo // dper na ke ta ka la sogs pa de rnams kyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i rim pa la
130b3(rgyud): gnas pa/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / 
130b4(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ya s+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang // bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ci dang zhus tau gtan la phab pa/ slad nas yang bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba
130b5(rgyud): gzhan rnams kyis bsgyur ba la zur mi 'dra bar bcos nas rA nga gi ming bcug cing / gzhan gyi ming 'phyi ba de dag dang / mi shes pa de dag sun dbyung ba'i phyir srad nas yang rgya gar/ 
130b6(rgyud): gyi rgyud bzhi dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes de nyid kyis gtugs nas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// 6/ rgya gar skad du/ shri gu h+ya badz+ra tan+t+ra ra dza/ bod skad du/ 
130b7(rgyud): dpal gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha'agro la phyag 'tshalo// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// gsang ba'i 'khor lo ma gsungs pa// bdag gis zab mo'i don ma rtogs// 
130b8(rgyud): de phyir khyed kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring // gsang ba'i 'khor lo shin tu zag/ rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa// khyod
131a1(rgyud): ngor mdzad nga yis bshad// gsang ba de rgyud kyi rgyal po las reng sa pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// lnga mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gsang ba zhes bya
131a2(rgyud): ltar lags// de yi 'khor lo ji ltar lags// de yi rdo rje ji ltar lags// de yi pad+ma ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// gsang po'i pha
131a3(rgyud): brang dang po ste// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur phyir// gnyis pa rig pa'i pho brang ste// bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir// gsum pa rta mgrin 'khor lo ste// de yi mgrin par gnas pa'i phyir// 
131a4(rgyud): bzhi pa gsang ba bde skyong ste// sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong yin // de rnams don ni gsang ba ste// brtul zhugs byed cing gtong phod che// e ba zab cing chags la dga'// khu ba
131a5(rgyud): 'dzag cing rak+ta 'bab// 'di la ston gyi gzhan la gsang // rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba// bzhi po gnas pa'i rten yin te/ dper na khang rten ka ba bzhin// rgyud kyi don ni rgyud yin no// 
131a6(rgyud): gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rtog pa sel ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// re re'i dbye bas ma 'tshal bas// 'jig rten kun rdzob
131a7(rgyud): nyid du ltung // 'khrig pa'i zug rngu mi bzad pas// bdag ni 'di nyid du ni 'gum// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// gsang ba'i pho brang rim pa drag/ mdab ma'i grangs ni gnyis
131a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rta mgrin grangs ni dgu ru shes// gsang ba bde skyong rim pa gnyis// brgyad dang lnga bcu'i grangs yin no// rig pa'i pho brang 'dab ma lnga// rigs ni me tog lta bu'o// b+ha ga
131b1(rgyud): rab 'brang gsum yin te// rnal 'byor mkhas pas btsal bar bya// sman dang snum gyi ril bu yis// rnal 'byor sor mo la bskul la// gzhan kha nas ni phye mas bdag/ gsang ba nas kyang
131b2(rgyud): snam gyis bdag/ de nas rnal 'byor po 'am mos// rtsa de sor mos legs par btsal// ring thung tshad ni sor gnyis nas// sor brgyad par ni gar gnas po// shes rab b+ha ga che chung dang / 
131b3(rgyud): de bzhin b+ha ga grang dro dang // chu rnams che zhing bde ba chung // de la rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis// b+ha ga chen bde ba chung // b+ha ga chen chung ngu bya// chung na de bzhin bskyed par gsungs// rbang de zhi/ ba bya
131b4(rgyud): chen drung ba bya// 'di 'dre'i b+ha ga gang la yod// bud med 'di la b+ha go mnga'// de phyir bud med bcom ldan 'das// thab sa kyi rdo rje phra sbom dang // ring ba dang ni thung ba ste// shes rab
131b5(rgyud): ji bzhin thabs la'o// de yi gnas su bzung bar bya// gas nga ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang ba rtogs pa'i le 'u ste gsum pa'o// / lha mos gsol ba bcom
131b6(rgyud): ldan 'das// e ba rnam pa'i dbus gang du// bde ba'i khyad par tshol ba la// 'di las khyad par med dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu dben pa'i gnas btsal la// bzang
131b7(rgyud): ba bcud can sna tshogs dang // btung ba zhim po mang po dang // gur gum la sogs dri zhim dang // shin tu 'jam pa'i stan bting la// rnal 'byor ma yi gnas bcu ru// dri zhing thig le re re bya// rnal
131b8(rgyud): 'byor pa yi gnas lnga ru// de bzhin thig le lnga yang bya// de nas mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab// e las gru gsum bting ring bsam// de yi nang du pa las ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad du bsam// 
132a1(rgyud): de yi dbus su 'khor lo bsam// 'khor lo'i dbus su reg mi bzod// de nas thabs kyi rdo rje yang // hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga bsam// oM las rdo rje mgo bor bsam// phaT las
132a2(rgyud): rdo rje b+ha ga bsam// de nas bde ba'i stan thog tu// sbyor ba rnam pa gsum bya ste// yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos// 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa dgu'am/ chags pa skye ba'i dri yis byug/ bde ba skye ba'i zas
132a3(rgyud): zos nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// thabs kyis gnas dgur 'o yang bya// shes rab kyis kyang gnas lngar bya// thabs kyis shes rab pad+ma la// 'o byas pad+ma rgyas su gnags// shes
132a4(rgyud): rab kyis kyang de bzhin no// chags pa skye ba'i rtags 'byung ste// de nas gcig gis gcig 'khyud nas// he rukadang phag mor bsam// shes rab rkang pa gnyis brkyang nas// 
132a5(rgyud): thabs ni thabs ldan gyis bskyod nas// nang rtags phyi ru bstan pa'i phyir// shes rab ma la rtags gsum 'byung // lus 'dar 'bar ba sku yi rtags// mi bzod skad
132a6(rgyud): 'don dag gi rtags// shes pa brgyad pa thugs kyi rtogs// de la ngo bor bshad pa'i phyir// 'di ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te// 'di yis skra dkar gnyer ma spong // nad kyi zug rngu thams cad
132a7(rgyud): 'joms// 'din gsang ba'i bcud kyis len// phyi yi dkyil 'khor sgom pa min// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la gnas// sbyin bsreg la sogs bya ba min// gsang ba'i rdo rje rgyud 'di ni// kun
132a8(rgyud): gyis thos par mi 'gyur te// glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis bya// glegs bam gsang ba'i gan su swa// yongasu smin pa'i rnal 'byor ma// 'ga' yis mthong gi gzhan la sba// gsang ba ston
132b1(rgyud): ston pa'i bla ma ni// sangs rgyas nyid pas btsun pa yin// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i stan thog tu// gsungs pa'i sbyor thabs kun byas nas// lnga bcu nas bzung stong gi bar// rnal 'byor ma
132b2(rgyud): kun bde med kyang // sbyor thabs mkhas pas bskyod byas nas// bcu gnyis ma dang bde ba mnyam// sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor pas// rlung mkhris bad kan kun nas skye/ shes rab kyis kyang thabs
132b3(rgyud): la ste// sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab ma// thobs kyis rtag tu brten par bya// sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rnal 'byor ma ni gsang la bstan// lha mos gsol pa// gsang ba
132b4(rgyud): bsten po ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi sring tshul lam rje 'bangs tshul// pha spad tshul lam mkhan slob tshul// gzhan gyis mi rig ngo tsha srung // 
132b5(rgyud): dben pa'i gnasu sbyor ba ba// gal te ma bsten dam tshig nya mas// tshe 'di nyid la dmyal bar ltung // lha mos gso la pa bcom ldan 'das// thabs med rnal 'byor ji ltar
132b6(rgyud): lags// bde ba khyab med ji ltar lags// phyag rgya ma bsten ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bde ba la gnas gsang ba'i don// khyod kyi ngor mdzad nga yis bshad// sbyor
132b7(rgyud): thabs mi shes rnam 'byor dang // stan yang gcig la mi 'dug ste// 'dod chags bsam pa yang mi ba// gal te de 'dra sten gyur na// 'jig rten phal pa'i 'dod chags te// shi nas mnar med
132b8(rgyud): dmyal bar skye// 'dod chags sprod pa shal ma ri// lcags kyi sor ni bcu drug pa// yar la 'dzeg cing mar la 'bab// thabs med rnal 'byor 'dra ba 'bod// de phyir sbyor thabs mkhas pas bstan// 
133a1(rgyud): sbyor thabs las ni bde ba skye// de phyir bde ba khyad par 'phags// bde ba thabs med lus zungs nyams// rlung mkhris pa dkan kun nas skyes// las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu bsten// 
133a2(rgyud): phyag rgya ma bstan dam tshig nyams// phyag rgya bston pa'i dus su yang // rnal 'byor mi sring brda yis mtshon// gang zhig 'dzub mo ston pa na// 'ongs sam zhes ni 'dri ba yin// sor mo gnyis ni ston pa
133a3(rgyud): dang // mthe bong drang por ston pa dang // de bzhin sring lag dang por ston// rdo rje bo lo zhes bya ste// pad+ma kak+ko la zhes pa// de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams// brda lib brag ma lus pa// saM pu Ta ru shes par bya// 
133a4(rgyud): lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje pad+ma dga' ba'i/ gnas// de ru bzung ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'ad ngas kyis bka' stsal pa// de ru bzung ba rnam pa gnyis// rab
133a5(rgyud): kyis dbugs dang shes pas bzung // dang po btsan thabs sbyor bas bzung // sbyor ba rnam pa bcu ru bzung // gcig/ ni sbom po khroms bzung // bzung ba'i rten ni rnam pa bzhi/ 
133a6(rgyud): man ngag can gyis shes par bya// gal te de ru ma zin na// 'khor bar ltung bas rang gis su// ting nge 'dzin gyis haM la bsdu// lce yis byang chub sems blangs la// re ma'i 'khor lo ru ni bstim// 
133a7(rgyud): de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyam so// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// shes rab sbyor thabs 'ba' shig gram// thabs kyis bskyod pa 'ba' zhig gam// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma// bdeg
133a8(rgyud): khyad par maud dam ci// bde ba'i ngo bo ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa// bskyod pa bud med kyis kyang bskyod// sbyor thabs kyang ni thabs kyis kyang // de las bde ba khyad par 'a/ 
133b1(rgyud): dper na dar dang snal ma bzhin// thabs kyis snal ma'i cha tsam myong // shes rab dar gyi sham bu tsam// de phyir rnal 'byor ma yin rgyud// rnal 'byor ma yis 'grub par gsungs// rgyud kyi nang ni
133b2(rgyud): mchog yin pas// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // mchod dang bzlas dang gtor ma dang // khrus dang srung ba la sogs pa// gsang ba 'di la so gzhan na med// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog ste// 
133b3(rgyud): ye shes lnga yi spros dang bral// de nas lha mos 'khor dpag tu med pa dang // mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'dod chags kyi the tsom yongs su zad nas// bcom ldan 'das la kun gyis 'khyud nas gsang ba'i mchod
133b4(rgyud): pas bde ba chen po'i ros gang bar mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i yang gsang ba gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'khor lo sdom pa'i rtog pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na bstan pI/ 
133b5(rgyud): le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal phra/ zhes bya ba rdzog so// / paN+Di ta rat+na badz+ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// 
133b6(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sarba ts+tshan+d+ra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
133b7(rgyud): gcig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i
133b8(rgyud): 'khor rnams kyis g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar
134a1(rgyud): lags// de yi gcod pa ji ltar lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags// de yi rgyal po'ang ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba zhes pa rnam
134a2(rgyud): pa bzhi// dang po bum dbang dang 'bral ba'i// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te// rten dang brten par sgom pa ni// snod bcud gzung 'dzin rnam rtog rnams// spong phyir nga yis gsungs pa yin// 
134a3(rgyud): de yi khyab par dgongs pa'i don// dang po stong nyid la sogs pa// rgyud gzhon du ni nga yis gsungs// rten dang brten pa'i bye brag la// dang po rten gyi dgongs pa yang // thugs kha'i yi ge hUM las ni// 
134a4(rgyud): mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// kha dog nag po'i e 'a bros pas// gru gsum rgya che gatring ring bsam// gru gsum sku gsum thugs yin te// dug gsum 'joms pa dgongs
134a5(rgyud): pa'i don// logs ni rnam thar gsum yin te// lus ngag yi da gsum las byung ba'i// mi dag bcu 'joms dgongs ba'i don// chos kyi sku ni dri med kyis// rang bzhin gyis ni kun
134a6(rgyud): la khyab// de phyir rgya chen dgongs pa'i don// 'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // chos sku rtogs pa ma yin pas// gting ring ba ru dgongs pas bshad// 
134a7(rgyud): de nas thugs ka'i hUM las yang // hUM 'phres pa las rdo rjer gyur// rdo rje gur du gyur pa yang // dang po che yi bar chod dang // gnyis pa thar ba'i bar chod de// bgegs ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// 
134a8(rgyud): yi bgegs dang nang gi bgegs// phyi yis tshe yi bar chod byed// nang gi thar pa'i bar chod byed// bar chod rnam pa gnyis srung ba// rdo rje gum gyi dgongs pa'i don// yaM las byung ba'i gong dang 'dra// 
134b1(rgyud): dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu ste// rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang // mi rtog pa ni skye ba la// dbang du byed pas dbang gi don// ba dan bzhi yi dgongs pa yang // chos rnams dus gsum gnas pa yin// 
134b2(rgyud): dgongs pa yin par nga yis gsungs// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor ni// zur gsum drag po'i dgongs pa yin// rdo rje rtse gsum sku gsum don// baM las chu yis dkyil 'khor te// zlum po spros
134b3(rgyud): bzhi bar gsungs// bum pa chos sku'i yan lag bzhi// le las gsar gyi sa gzhi ste// gru bzhi rgyas pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje rtse lnga ye shes lnga// de sdeng ri rab rtse mo brgyad// rnam thar brgyad kyi
134b4(rgyud): dgongs pa yin// snod bcud rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// du ra khrod brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yon// go rims bzhin du grod par bya// re re'i bye brag rnam rtog yang // bla ma'i zhal las shwe/ 
134b5(rgyud): par bya// gnyen po'i stobs ni yongasu rgyas// shing rnams rims bzhin rtag pa dgod// rnam rtog mi dge bcu yi de na// 'joms pa'i rtags phyogs skyong dgod// 'dod chags zhe
134b6(rgyud): sdang ma rig pa// gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// gzugs sku gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis// lus dang ngag gis sems can gyi// don mdzad par ni char sprin mdog/ 
134b7(rgyud): nang dang gsang ba de bzhin no// de bzhin mthar thug bzhi pa yang // snyan nas brgyud pa shes par bya// de nas nang du gzhal yas khang // bruM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de// rtsibs/ 
134b8(rgyud): brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi dngos// yongs su gyur pas rnam snang sku// phyi nas bltas pas nang du gsal// de bzhin nang nas phyi ru gsal// thams cad gcig tu sang ba'i don// rin chen sna lnga sku
135a1(rgyud): lnga'i don// kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga'i don// gru bzhi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir gsungs// logs bzhi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste// sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// ka ba brgyad ni rnam
135a2(rgyud): thar brgyad// gdung bzhi ye shes bzhi yi don// ta ran la sogs pa kun// stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs// de nas nang du gdan rnams ni// pad+ma'i sa bon dbyangs las skyes// 'dod
135a3(rgyud): chags la sogs nyon mongs kyis// ma gos rtag su pad+ma'i gdan// de steng nyi ma zla ba ste// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi brda// dang po ro nang bdag gam// rnam rtog 'joms par gsungs pa
135a4(rgyud): yin// yan lag bzhi ldan gtso bo'i gdan// 'khor la re re gdan du sbyin// gtso bo'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir// dgod sa pa'i don dang bcas pa yi// rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzog/ 
135a5(rgyud): pa'o// de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni// skye ba bzhi yi tshul yin/ te// skad cig las byung brdzus pa'i tshul// dper na chug ting las ni nya// rkyen las skye ba drod gsher tshul// dper/ 
135a6(rgyud): nyi mas pad+ma bzhin// spro zhing bsdu ba sgong skyes tshul// dben na rdo las zangs bzhin no// sbyor ba las byung mngal skyes tshul// yar la sreg cing mar la gso// dper na spra tshol las ni lugs// pho brang
135a7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs// rjesu bskyed pa he ru ka/ dbang bskur bcom ldan mi bskyed pa// bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin// mchod pa don yod grub pa'o// bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med// yan lag
135a8(rgyud): drug las byung ba yi// dngos grub 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de nas bzlas pa 'am sgom pa ni// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i ste// rab kyis yongasu rdzogs pa yi// sgom pa'am bzlas pa bya bar gsungs/ 
135b1(rgyud): 'brang gis gtso bo yab yum yin// thams cad dbu ma'i spyan la 'jug dbu ma'i spyan la brtan gyur nas// sum cu rtsa bdun rdzogs par sgom// 'bring po yis kyang de bzhin te// gnas pa rtsa dang / 
135b2(rgyud): g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa sems dang dman pa dbyibs// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug chos dang yan lag bdun// 'di yis bstan pa shin tu zab// gong du gsungs pa thams cad
135b3(rgyud): kyang / rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// du ma'i tshul ni shin tu zab// phyi dang nang ni sngags kyi don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phye yi don// phyi la ltos nas nang yin te// de/ 
135b4(rgyud): nyid gsang ba gsang ba'i don// los su rung ba mthar phyin don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don// nang du dkyil 'a khor mtshan nyid ni// phung po skye mched khams rnams la// re re
135b5(rgyud): lha ru byin rlabs la// lnga 'am drug gam sum cu bdun// gan sa g.yon steng 'og sgo la sogs// bla ma'i zhal las / sa par bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// sum cu rtsa bdun
135b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i// yongasu rdzogs pa ji ltar lags// bskyed pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi rim pa ji ltar lags// gzhan yang rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang // thun dang thun mtshams ji ltar 'jug/ lha/ 
135b7(rgyud): spyod zung du ji ltar lags// dga' bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag rgyu// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed// de phyir 'bras
135b8(rgyud): bu sngon 'gro ba'i// rgyu ni gtso bor gyur pa yin// he ru kar gyur gcig la yang // rgyu rnams yongasu rdzogs pa ste// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi sogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyu nor ba
136a1(rgyud): las ma yin te// gro las nas kyi myu gu min// ma tshang ba las ma yin te// 'bru nyams pa las myu gu med// rgyu med pa las ma yin te// nam mkha'i me tog las ni dri// rgyu/ 
136a2(rgyud): de rkyen med pa las min// nags sreg ma la rlung med bzhin// de ltar yan lag bzhi ldan pa'i// las dang po yis rnam rtog spang // lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas pas// bskyed pa zhes ni gsungs pa/ 
136a3(rgyud): yin/ phyi dang nang du du ma'i cha// de yi rim par bshad pa yin// rten gyi dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang // khyams dang bla gab med pa dang // bla gab bcas dang rnam pa gsum// mos pa'i dbang du gsungs
136a4(rgyud): pa yin// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba las// nyin thun bzhi yi du bye ba yi// nyin thun bzhi ru gsungs pa yin// mtsham sa kyang bzhi ru shes par bya// dbyug gu chu tshod 'pho ba dang // 
136a5(rgyud): thun brgyad sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thun dang mtshams ni mnyam par gsungs// mtshams kyi tshe na rnal 'byor/ pa// dbang po 'bring dang tha ma yis// lha rnams rdzogs par smra/ 
136a6(rgyud): byas pas// mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya// lta ba zhes pa mnyam gzhog ste// rjes thob spyod pa ru ni bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa la// rgyan
136a7(rgyud): drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnang // gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel pa la// rgyan dang bdud rtsi'i spyod pa gnang // rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs// spyod pa
136a8(rgyud): gnang ba rang yis gsungs// shes rab ye shes dang 'brel bas// gong du gsungs pa thun ming ste// khyad par phyag rgya'i spyod pa gnang // lta ba mi ldan spyod pa dang // spyod pa mi ldan lta ba gnyis/ 
136b1(rgyud): 'di ni gsang sngags dam sra ste// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// de phyir lha med spyod pa spang // srin po khros pa'i spyod pa'o// spyod med lnga'ang spang ba med// dka' thub kyis ni lus gdungs
136b2(rgyud): shing phung sigs rnam snang la sogs pa// brnyas pa rtog ge skam po yin// des na lta spyod zung du 'jug/ glang chen bzhengs kyang rnam par bzhengs// glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par bzhugs/ 
136b3(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bdud rtsi zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi spyod pa ji ltar lags// de yi yon tan ji ltar 'byung // rgyan la sogs pa'i don rnams kun// gtso bos bdag la bshad du
136b4(rgyud): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi rnam pa gsum du gsungs// dang por phyi yi bdud/ rtsi sten// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la// lcags kyu lnga ni dgod pa
136b5(rgyud): sted ra brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang por 'dzag/ si h+la mi bskyod lung skam blang // bcu gnyis bcu drug dang por 'dzag/ he ru ka dang rnam snang dang // lung skam snying po blang bar ga/ yar gyi
136b6(rgyud): dang mar gyi ngo // brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga la// thams cad bzang po'i dus su gsungs// seng ge'i gzugs ni dkar po bzang // lus ngag sdom zhing nyes pa med// 'di ni sha yi sgrub pa'i rten// glang
136b7(rgyud): bo glang po chen po ste// ke ta ke yi rgyu nyid las// glang rtsi la sogs 'byung ba'i sha/ ba glang gi wang ldan pa'i sha/ rta ni rta yi rgyal po ste// kha dog dkar min dmar ba min// dbyibs dang kha dog mi
136b8(rgyud): 'gyur sha/ mi ni skye ba bdun pa'i sha/ lus ngag yid la mkhas pas brtag/ bza' ba'i snod ni dum bu cig/ de yi nang du bsgrub par bya// rab 'bring tha ma'i mtshan ma ni// 'bor dang dud paspo ba rnams
137a1(rgyud): mtshan ma phyi yi yin par bshad// gzhan skyes don ni rgas chen sel// skad ma byin na dngos grub med// sang phyung bas ni tshangs par 'gyur// nang gi bdud rtsi rang 'thung yin// 
137a2(rgyud): dril can bug dgu lam nas// 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyun chad nas// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// a bo d+hA ti dbugs chung bas// steng gi drug pa'i sgru ba yin// si h+lag pur dbus na gnas// 'og tu
137a3(rgyud): drug pa rgyu ba yin// 'di ni gsang ba'i bdud rtsi ste/ sgra dkar gnyer ma 'chi ba spong // spyod pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing / 
137a4(rgyud): rigasu 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir// phyi yi drug pa'i bdud rtsi sbyin// dalas dang po la phyi nang gnyis// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste/ skra dkar med cing rnam rtog 'joms// dkyil 'khor bzhi la ra
137a5(rgyud): tu gnas// lnga pa gosaso par gyur pa yis// drug pa bzung ra gsungs pa s+ho// kun rdzob steng gi hU~M rtse nas// si wa~M/ zhe nas ni dbus su gzhug/ lte ba'i gan su dbugs gnas pa/ 
137a6(rgyud): steng gi drug pa zin pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste// sred pa med cing yang ba'o// 'dab chags rgyal po ji bzhin du// nam pa' 'phur zhing ltung ba med// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// 
137a7(rgyud): 'og gi drug pa yin par bshad// gang zag mchog la gsungs pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste// dril can bu ga 'gag par byed// rgyan gyi dang po zhe sdang 'joms// dur khrod chen po sa~M hA ling / 
137a8(rgyud): ru tra 'dul ba'i rim pa'o// bdud rtsis rnam rtogs la sogs 'joms// phrin las bzhi ni thun mong yin// phyag rgyas 'dod chags rnam par dag/ rdo rjes snying pos yang gsol pa// drug pa zhes pa/ 
137b1(rgyud): ji lta bu// gang zag mchog ni ji lta bu// 'dod chags ji ltar rnam par dag/ dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi las ni// lnga
137b2(rgyud): pa na mkha' 'byung ba yin// lnga pa rang bzhin med pa ste// drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dga' ba ma chog dga' lhan cig dga'// bral bI dga' ba sngon 'gro bas// lnga pa bde ba chen po 'byung // bang
137b3(rgyud): che na rang bzhin med par dag/ 'og gi sgo yi drug pa yin// de phyir drug pa 'dod pas kyang // bzhi pa sngon du song ba yis// lnga pa yongasu rdzogs pa sgom// dper na zangs kyi dngos po la// gser 'gyur rtsi
137b4(rgyud): yi nus pa yis// zangs nyid gser du 'gyur ba ste// zangs los kyi gtogs gser nyid dang // lde pa las gzhan drug pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// lo dang zla bzla ba byed/ 
137b5(rgyud): nyin zhag dus drug dus gnyis la// skad cig re tsam drug la 'bru nga // las dang po yi spyod yul min// dper na chu yi ste/ da nang du// bdud rtsi thigs pa gcig bzhag pa// chu ru nyam su
137b6(rgyud): myong ba las// gcig shos nyams su myong ba med// tshu la rten nas bdud rtsi yang // nyams su myong bar byed pa ste// de bzhin spros bcos lnga pa la// brten nas spros med drug pa 'byung // rgyud gzhin
137b7(rgyud): du ni nga yis gsungs// mtshan ma lnga 'am ro brgyad dam// sa brgyad non nas mngon shes ldan// las kyi phyag rgya yongasu spangs// ye shes phyag rgya la gnas shing // phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa// 'di ni
137b8(rgyud): gong zag mchog yin te// 'di yis drug bzin par bshad// 'dod chags zhes pa 'khor ba ste// rnam dag mya ngan 'das par gsungs// de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang // gsang ba'i dbang dang 'dre/ 
138a1(rgyud): ba ste// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo'i don// dang po lha yi nga rgyal bya// mkha'agro rtsa ru shes par bya// dpa' bo byang chub sems su shes// 'khor lo'i gnas dang 'khor long/ 
138a2(rgyud): de nas bsgrub bya shes par bya// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas// tshangs mdo'i bar du sor mo'i tshad// bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad yin to// sor gsum la ni 'khor lo ro// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin
138a3(rgyud): yin/ dbang gi gnas dang 'khor lo'i gnas// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// tshangs mdo me la gzhang kha rlung // sor gsum sor bzhi mkhas pas brtag/ gnas gsum gsang ba'i
138a4(rgyud): gnas yin te// de bzhin gnas gsum rig pa'o// sor ba shi rta mgron gnas yin te// sor brgyad gsang ba bde skyong gnas// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i// lus
138a5(rgyud): kyi rten gyi bye brag las// sor mo bzhi bcu brgyad nyid las/ brgyad ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gnas// bzhi bcu la ni 'khor lo gzhan// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// 
138a6(rgyud): thams cad rgal tshigs dbyug gu ste// phyi dang nang du mkhas pas brtag/ 'khor lo la yang rnam pa gnyis// dang por 'khor lo gnyis par rtsa// rkyen dang gsang ba rab bzhin dang // dbang dang rnam pa
138a7(rgyud): bzhi ru gsungs// rkyen la gnyis te gsang ba bzhi// rang bzhin bcu drug dbang ni gnyis// tsan+da lI ni nyi shu bzhi// 'khor lo bzhi ru sbas pa ste// tshogs nang bla ma mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs// man ngag
138a8(rgyud): gzhan du spel zhing 'phyar la dga'// 'dod chags spyod phyir sbas pa'i rim pa nod// gab pa'i don la rgyab kyi phyogs shing skur pa 'debs// gsang sngags par du gcod cing rnal 'byor gzhan la gshe/ 8
138b1(rgyud): ni mnar med sems can dmyal ba chen por skye// sangs rgyas stong dang rtsa gcig rdzogs pa che yi ched// 'di la sbas kyi thams cad la// nga yis spa bar ma gsung so// de phyir rgyung gzhan du ni sras// rgyud 'dis
138b2(rgyud): nga yis rgyas par bshang // sum cu rtsa gnyis g.yas g.yon cha// drug cu rtsa bzhi grangasu sbas// sum cu rtsa gnyis las ni zung // bcu drug grangasu sbas pa yin// sum cu rtsa gnyis phyogs dang mtshams// 
138b3(rgyud): brgyad kyi grangasu sbas pa'o// spyi gtsug 'khor lo spyi bor sbas// gsang ba bde skyong lte bar sbas// bcu drug las ni zung 'gyur ba// brgyad kyi grangasu sbas pa yin// bcu drug las ni g.yas g.yon cha// 
138b4(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis grangasu sbas// bcu drug las ni bzhi bzhir 'gyur// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangasu sbas// mgrin pa long spyod 'khod lo ru// ro drug la ni longs spyod pas// rom long spyod 'khor lo
138b5(rgyud): sbas// rta mgrin 'khor lo mgrin par sbas// brgyad las g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi cha// bcu drug grangasu sbas pa yin// ba rgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs/ 
138b6(rgyud): sbas// brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi// mtshams bzhi dang ni brgyad kyi cha// drug cu rtsa bzhi grangasu sbas// tshangs mdo'i me ni me la sbas// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo ru// chos kun rig pas rig
138b7(rgyud): pa sbas// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni zung // sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs sbas// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni bzhi// bcu drug grangs sbas pa yin// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni brgyad// brgyad kyi grangasu sbas pa'o// gzhang kha rlung
138b8(rgyud): ni rlung las sbas// gsang ba'i gtum mo gtum mor sbas// 'khor lo re la 'khor lo bzhi// phyi ru srog gi rnam par 'khyud// chu dang chu bran chu bo rnams// sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed kyang // rgya mtsho chen
139a1(rgyud): bor ro gcig 'gyur// lte bar rol pa bde chen smra// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// snying la chos kyi sku yin te/ rnamathar la sogs de bzhin no// 
139a2(rgyud): mgrin pa long spyod de dang 'dra// bde chen sprul pa'ang de bzhin no// mtshan rnams steng la stong pa 'og/ dang por bde chen kha sbyor yin// rnam thar steng la dpe byad 'og/ bde chen kha sbyor gnyis pa yin// gzhan
139a3(rgyud): ni zhal las shes par bya// stobs bcu rnam dag kha sbyor bcu// rlung ni sgrol ma'i ngo bo ste// rtsa drug dbugs kyi rang bzhin gang // ma ni gos dkar rang bzhin te// zung rtsa gsum ni drod kyis gang // rang bzhin
139a4(rgyud): gyis ni gnas pa la// brgyad dang lnga yi mtshan nyid la// brgyad la dbyangs kyi dang po brgyad// lnga la ka li dang po lnga// rig pa'i pho brang mtha' can lnga// rta mgrin dbyings yig g.yon dang g.yas// 
139a5(rgyud): a gnyis mthar bzhag 'dab dgu yin// gsang ba'i bde skyong 'a/ khor lo ni// ma ning bzhi dang a gnyis dbus// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun yin// de nas rtse yi mtshan nyid kyang // phyi yi
139a6(rgyud): stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// sha la gnas nas tshil bu skyed// nang gi brgyad dang nyi shu ni// tshil la gnas nas rkang skyed pa'o// gsang ba sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// rus par gnas shing ga pur skyed// de kho na
139a7(rgyud): yi rtsa gsum ni// gsang bar gnas shing bde ba skyes/ khang pa stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// khang pa re la khang pa gsum// khang pa der gnas srin bu'i rigs// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis to// grangs ni
139a8(rgyud): 'bum du shes par bya// nang dang gsang ba'i rtsal yang // srin bu'i rigs ni grangasu gsungs// de kho na yi rtsa gsum las// 'dod chags skyed pa'i srin bu dgu/ nyin dang mtshan mo mtshams dang gsum// 
139b1(rgyud): dgu ru mkhas pas shes par bya// rtsa der gnas pa'i ga pur yang // bdud rtsi sbyor ba las byung ba// bdud rtsi la sogs gong du gsungs// ya las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // raM las me yi dkyil/ 
139b2(rgyud): 'khor bsam// de steng a las ka ba la// baM las pad+ma mdab brgyad bsam// nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de ru sha la sogs pa dgod// gtso bo'i steng du sor bzhi 'am// mtho gang tsam
139b3(rgyud): du bsam pa ni// yi ge go bzlog bsam par bya// sngon po dmar po dkar po ste// hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje bsam// de stengs yi ge ma bsam la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor stang du bsam// 'di ni bdud rtsi
139b4(rgyud): kha sbyor ro// sha lnga las ni gdan lngar gyur// lcags kyu ba bdud rtsi lnga ru 'gyur// las kyi rlung gis me bus te// zla ba gtso bo la sogs zhu// tha mal pa yi bdud rtsi yin// yi ge gsu
139b5(rgyud): dang nyi ma nu// lnga yi bdud dri zhes ni bya// 'od zer gyis bdugaye shes kyi// bdud rtsi yin pa rang yis gsungs// lan gsum bskor bar sku gsung thugs// 'di ni byin rlabs rnal
139b6(rgyud): 'byor ro// de nas bdud rtsi myang dang mchod// mchod pa'i rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs// de nas rol pa'i rnal 'byor te// g.yas g.yon dgongs pa shes par bya// de nas zhu ba'i rnal 'byor yang // mnya
139b7(rgyud): po'i rlung dang gtum mo'i mes// ye shes bzhi yo ngo bor gyur// cha gcig mi bskyod rnam snang ste// sha za'i mkha'agro mnyam pa nyid// cha gcig bya ba nan tan te// srin bu las kyis mkha'agro mchod// 
139b8(rgyud): cha gcig rlung dang mkhris pa ste// mkhris pas bad kan la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhol nas shes par bya// rtsa ni ye shes mkha'agro ste// so sor kun rtag ye shes mchod// cha gcig rang bzhin med pa
140a1(rgyud): me ltar lta bu'i ye shes kyis// rdo rje kha 'gro mchod par mdzad// rlung na rdo rje mkha 'gro ste// rtsa ni ye shes mkha 'gro yin// ga pur sha za mkha 'gro yin// srin bu las/ 
140a2(rgyud): kyi mkha 'gro yin// gzhan yang rtsal sogs pa la// mkha'agro rnams kyi bye brag kun// go rims bzhin du shes par bya// sku ni las kyi mkha'agro ste// gsung ni sha za'i mkha'agro'o// thugs na
140a3(rgyud): ye shes mkha 'gro yin// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// gzhan yang 'khor lo dbus gnas ni// mkha' gro'i bye brag shes par bya// dga' ba las kyi mkha'agro ste// mchog dga' sha za'i mkha'
140a4(rgyud): 'gro'o// rang bzhin dga' ba ye shes yin// bde chen rdo rje mkha'agro'o// dpa' bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi ma'o// tsaN+Da lI ni nyi shu bzhi// sbas pa'i 'khor lo
140a5(rgyud): bzhi ru bsdu// bde chen longs spyod 'khor lor bsdu// longs spyod chos kyi 'khor lor bsdu// gong du bsdu ba'i rim pa/ yang // thig le la ni thams cad 'dus// dper na nyi ma'i dkyil
140a6(rgyud): 'khor gcig nyid la// nyi ma'i 'od zer phyogs bcu du mar snang // du ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus// dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gdugs// shing gi 'khrul 'khor
140a7(rgyud): sbyor ba ji bzhin no// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lor bsdus nas kyang // nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tsa na ka yi tshad// de yi dbus su thig le yungs kar gyi ni tshad// sngags kyi phreng ba ba spu'i nyag ma tsam
140a8(rgyud): gyis ni// g.yas bskor g.yon skor ka li a li sbrul ltar 'khyil// de dag thig le'i rnal 'byor te// 'di la sems ni brtan gyur nas// de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom// zla ba a li ka ma?
140b1(rgyud): la a li nyi ma la thim nas// nyi ma zhabs bskyed la thim bsam// zhabs bskyed la sogs rim par thim// yan lag lnga ni ye shes lnga// de ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor te// de nas nad pra mo la// sems/ 
140b2(rgyud): ni rim par sgom pa'o// de nas rang rig ye shes te// chos kun stong par ro gcig pa'o// gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo dang // sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo gnyis// 'bar ba dang ni 'dzag pa'i tshul/ 
140b3(rgyud): bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// phyi yi rnam rtog rtsol ba ste// nang gi rnam rtog srog gi rlung // srog rtsol gnyis 'gags dbu ma ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtsenas// sor bzhi nas ni rtsa gsum gcig
140b4(rgyud): dbugs dgag pa yi gnas yin pas// dang por de ru bzung dbar bya// de nas sprul pa'i gnas su bzung // yang na ba grang bar shes par bya// de nas gsang ba gsum pa ni// shes
140b5(rgyud): rab ye shes dang 'brel ba'i// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid ba sha da ba'o// gzhang kha g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang // dga' ba 'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa// bcu gnyis rang bzhin yin par
140b6(rgyud): gsungs// byang chub sems rgyu mi rtog snyam// mchog dga' mi dmigs nyi shu lnga// gsang ba'i nor bu yongasu gang // lhan cig skyes dga' mi dmigs pa// chos kyi sku ni yin par gsungs// 
140b7(rgyud): bde ba'i rgyun chad bral ba'i dga'// de yi mi dmigs gzugs sku gnyis// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba rnams// yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos// dgongs pa dang bcas rim pa'o// skar
140b8(rgyud): ma'i tshogs ltar du mar spros mod kyang // nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung du 'jug/ nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung 'jug kyang // sgra gcan la bur gnyis su med pa'o// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// skar ma'i tshogs ni/ 
141a1(rgyud): jis bu// zug du 'jug pa ji lta bu// gnyis su med pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun ni// d+hu mi khyad par smras pa'o// skragatu/ 
141a2(rgyud): dang ni ye shes lnga// 'bras bu'i khyad par smras pa yin// rgyu rnams bdun du bsdu ba dang // 'bras bu gsum du bsdu ba'o// rgyu rnams 'bras bu la thim ste// 'bras bu gnyis su bsgom par bya// chos
141a3(rgyud): kun sems kyi ngo bo ste// sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin yi ni// thams cad stong par ro gcig pa// 'di ni blang de ba dbyings// 'dod chags rnam par dag bya'i phyir// 'dod chags sku yi phyag rgya lnga/ 
141a4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po ye shes gnyis// dam tshig chos dang las phyag rgya// 'di la brten pa shin tu zab// 'di ni bde ba chen po ste// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin dag/ bde chen 'khor
141a5(rgyud): lo rnam pa gsum// gsang pa'i sna rtse e la gnas// sbrul pa'i 'khor lo gang ba yin// rig pa la sogs de bzhi na te// gosang ba bang skyong ba la gnas// rang bzhin bde chen
141a6(rgyud): 'khor lo ste// bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba// til dang til mar ji bzhin no// dper na shing sA bcad pa las// 'o ma 'dzag pa ji bzhi no// bde ba chen po de nyid las// sgra yi rtse mo brgya sto/ 
141a7(rgyud): dang // khri dang 'bum gyis rnam pa ste// dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ma lta bu'o// gsum pa glog gi rnam pa ste// bzhi pa mar me lta bu'o// 'di dag kun gyi rim pa yang // sprul pa/ 
141a8(rgyud): la sogs rim pa bzhin// sprin gyi rnam pa skye ba ni// a ni skye ba'i mtshan ma yin// mar me lta bu'i 'chi ba yin// haM gi mtshan mar gsungs pa yin// lnga pa na mkha'i lta bu ni// gnyis med pa pa
141b1(rgyud): mdo'i// mtshan ma stong par shes par bya// gzhan yang 'dar ba la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba gsum pa yang // shes rab ye shes 'brel pa ste// dga'/ 
141b2(rgyud): pa bzhi yi mtshan nyid kyang // gzhang lam g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang // lus 'dar dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// gsang ba rdo rje rtsa lam nas// byang chub sems rgyu bde ba snyam// mchog dga' yi ni ngo bo ste// 
141b3(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma 'gags pa snyam// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo yin// bde ba'i rgyun chad bde ba snyam// bral ba dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// 'di rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // byang chub chen po la sogs pa// 
141b4(rgyud): gong du gsungs par shes par bya// dgo' ba snang ba zhes pa ste// / mchog dga' snang ba mched pa yin// rab tu dga' ba snang ba thob// lhan cig skyes pa 'od gsal lo// ye shes
141b5(rgyud): bzhi yi rang bzhin te// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i bsnyen po yi na// rags pa bzhi yis gsang ba 'joms// phra ba'i ba dud bzhi rang bzhin gyi// 'khor lo bzhi ru 'joms pa yin/ 
141b6(rgyud): 'khor lo la rten dga' ba bzhi// de nyid ye shes bzhi ru snang // de phyir bdud bzhi 'joms pa yin// 'dod chags la rten dug gsum ni// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te// 'dod chags rnam pa// 
141b7(rgyud): bcu gnyis yin// gsang ba'i bde skyong nyon mongs 'joms// kha dog dbyibs ni phung po'i bdud// rta mgrin 'khor lo phung po 'joms// sbas pa bzhi na lha yi bdud// rig pa'i 'khor lo lha bdud
141b8(rgyud): 'joms// skye ba dang bcas 'chi ba ste// gsang ba skye med 'chi bdag 'joms// phra ba'i bdun 'joms de dang 'dra// skad cig bzhi dang snga ba bzhi// bzang po bzhi dang bden pa bzhi// 'byung ba dang / 
142a1(rgyud): yum bzhi dang // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la sogs pa// ye shes bzhi po 'di nyid las// khyad par gzhan ni mi 'byung ste// rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag dang // gzhan yang
142a2(rgyud): mos pa'i bye brag dang // chos tshul du ma'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin// dbang gsum bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste// 'di yis
142a3(rgyud): thams cad bya bar gsungs// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dge slong dbang gsum ji ltar lags// de yis bya ba ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong la sogs rnam
142a4(rgyud): pa gsum// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// rig 'dzin nyi da kyi dge slong ngo // gcig dang bzhi dang bcu dang lnga/ na// gnyis brgya lnga bcu'i go rims kyis// bsnyen gnas
142a5(rgyud): dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong so sor thar pa yin// gtong dang gtong ba chen po dang // shin tu gtong dang rnam par gtong // bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang / 
142a6(rgyud): dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yin// dkyil 'khor du zhugs dge ba ste// de la gnas pa bsnyen gnas yin// bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin// chen po 'di gsum pa brag kyang // bum pa'i
142a7(rgyud): dbang ni dog pa ste// de la bsnyen pas dge bsnyen yin// de phyir bdun ldan chen po yin// gsang ba'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de yi tshul ldan dge tshul yin// bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin// dge
142a8(rgyud): ba shes rab ye shes te// de nyid slong bas dge slong yin// bdun dang ldan pas chen po yin// chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang // phyir mi ldog pa gsum yin te// rnam par smin dang 'khor ba
142b1(rgyud): dang / them pa dman par ldog pa yin// spong ba gsum ni go rims bzhin// theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung zhing // rig 'dzin theg pa 'bras bur gnas// 'bras bu 'dir gnas
142b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa// khyim pa 'am rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// cha lugasu ni gnas byas la// dbang bskur rab gnas la sogs bya// theg pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis// gsang ba'i spyod par ma
142b3(rgyud): gsungs te// dper na rdo las zangasu 'gyur// zangs las gser gyi rnam pa ste// zangs kyi dus ni rdo med de// gser du gyur pas rngo mi snang // rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la// so sor thar dang
142b4(rgyud): byang chub sems// gnyis po gnas pa nyid du ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungaso// de nas gsang ba bzhi po yang // bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa ste// rtag tu g.yo
142b5(rgyud): ba'i sems 'di nyid// gzugs la sogs pa bkug nas ni/ bsgom byar ldan cig bcas pa dag/ dbang du byas te ba sgom par bya// bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yi// dmigs pa

142b7(rgyud): pa'i/  rtog pa bcom pas mkhas ltar 'gyur// rten yod ma yin rten pa med// dpe med gnas kyang yod ma yin// de nyid gnas pa rdzogs pa ste// lhan skyes gnyis med rig pa'o// de nas
142b8(rgyud): gcod pa bka' stsal pa// khro tshul gar dang phyag rgya rnams// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsgoms// dur khrod rgyal po dregs pa can// snying rje med cing sha khrag za// 
143a1(rgyud): de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyi nang sbas dang mthar thug gi// dkyil 'khor du zhugs dbang mnos nas// sgom dang bzlas pa la sogs med// gsang
143a2(rgyud): sngags bar du gcod cing ga she/ rnal 'byor kun la bskur ba 'debs// rdo rje spun tshig slob la 'phyar// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig nyams// bla ma la smod rnam smin gyis// mnar med sems
143a3(rgyud): can dmyal bar skye// rten cing 'bral po zab mo yin// rtsa yi 'khor lo'i don ma rtogs// lcogs gri sor ni bcu drug pa// 'dzeg pa ru ni nga yis bshad// gab pa'i gsang ba ma gtog
143a4(rgyud): par/ sbas pa mi dmigs rnam gsum gyis// thur du sems can dmyal bar skye// shing rta'i 'khor lo 'khor ba ltar// las kyi rnam par smin pas 'khor// shes rab rang gis rang
143a5(rgyud): rig dang // rang rig bde ba gang 'dod dang // rang rig sgyu mar gang 'dod pa// rang rig shes sgong lta bu dang // dbyangs dang nga ye shes la sogs pa// lta ba'i don nyid 'chad pa'o//

143a7(rgyud): shes rab ye shes 'bras bu'i rgyud// skye ba rgyu yi rgyud du gsungs// 'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// bar ma don 'bras bu'i rgyud// rgyud ces pa ni rgyun yin te// rgyal po gsungs ston pa ste// gas
143a8(rgyud): ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// bum pa las dang po la gsang // gsang ba bum pa'i dus su gsang // shes rab ye shes gsang bar gsang // rang rig shes rab ye shes gsang // gsang ba'i 'khor
143b1(rgyud): lo bzhi pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs ri rab kyi rdul rnyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal
143b2(rgyud): gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang // lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes gyis bsgyur ba'o// 
143b3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsikra sa~M ba ra gu h+ya a tsin+ta tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsame gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la/ 
143b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsum dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms
143b5(rgyud): por zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thams ca da kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos la skyo bar gyur to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kye
143b6(rgyud): bcom ldan he ru ka/ kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyi// de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sla ba'i mtha' dang
143b7(rgyud): mtshan mar snang // de nyid kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos// sems nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin no// phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa// bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid kyi// / 
143b8(rgyud): dbye ba mi mthun grangs dag dang // dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dag dang // 'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams dang // gnas pa'i tshad dang rim pa dag/ gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan/ 
144a1(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bag chags nyon mongs ye shes sku// rigs drug rtsa shing 'khril lcug gi/ rang bzhin ngag gi lam 'das la// de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 
144a2(rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo yin// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi gsang // de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// rtag chad skye 'gag la sogs pa'i// mtha' spangs sems nyid rang rig cing // 
144a3(rgyud): gdod nas spras bral bde ba nyid// de don bsam gyis mi khyab nges// de nyid dbye ba rab 'bring mtha'// rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// dang por rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu dang lam rtags bsam/ 
144a4(rgyud): mi khyab// mtha' dang nyon mongs bsam mi khyab// chos dang / lta spyod bsam mi khyab// yi ge bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mdor bstan de nyid rnam par dbye// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos
144a5(rgyud): de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab// a ni yi ge dam pa ste// khrorje nas 'byung ba skye ba med// skye ba kun gyi rgyur gyur pa//  gA dam pa bsam mi khyab// phrag byung khrus dang btsang sbra dang / 
144a6(rgyud): rgyan cha gcer bu thal gos sogs// chang dang bdud rtsi chu dang yang // ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs// rol ba'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab/ nga yis 'dul ba'i sems can la// mos pa'i mtha' la thug
144a7(rgyud): pa med// de phyir theg pa thug med pas// de nyid lte ba bsam mi khyab// rtag chad sgo skur ltos pa'i sgra// de nyid mthar gnas bsam mi khyab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// nyon mongs/ 
144a8(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'dar dang 'ab dang drod la sogs// rtags nyid bsam gyis mi khyabab// lha skem rlung dang rtsa sogs pa// lom nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rang ga nam 'a'i smin char
144b1(rgyud): tshul dang / pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa// rgyu nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyu 'bras tha dad kun dang bral// rtsol ba rdul gyis ma gos pa// sprin med mkha' ltar bcom pa yi// spyi dang rang gi
144b2(rgyud): mtshan nyid dag/ rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// a ni shad dang sbrul sogs kyis// bcu gnyis la sogs dbye ba yis// yi ge'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// gzugs ni sdug dang mi ldog sogs// 
144b3(rgyud): bcu dgu phra rab rdul gyi bar// sgra la sogs pa de bzhin te// sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drug ste// reg bya bcu gcig chos de bzhin// gang zhig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// 
144b4(rgyud): theg pa gsum dang bco brgyad dang // ji snyed 'du shes yo da kyi bar// lta ba'i dbye bas rgyas pa'o// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam// mthong lam sgom lam mthar phyin lam/ 
144b5(rgyud): lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems rtags bdud rtags la byung ba'i rtags// rtags kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// mu steng sa rang rgyal nyan thos nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyas // spyod pa'i
144b6(rgyud): dbye ba rgyas pa'o// rtag dang chad dang sgro skur nas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das mtha' dang // thabs dang shes rab mtha' yi bar// mtha' yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// 'dod chags la sogs nyi khri dang / 
144b7(rgyud): tshig stong rtsa ba nye ba dang // zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin te// nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // 'dod chags che dang sbyin pa sogs// rgyu yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems
144b8(rgyud): dang na mkha' ye shes dang // sangs rgyas 'od gsal zung 'jug sogs// rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o// blos brtags mtshan mar snang ba dang // sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs dang // rim min mos pa
145a1(rgyud): khyad par tshol// rdul tsam khas len blos 'jog cing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgrub byed pa// gang ltar bcos kyang de mtha' ste// gang zhig mthar lhung lta bde// rang rig gzhan rig sem
145a2(rgyud): ma yin// kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang rig rtog ge snam po dang // mthar lung dbu mar khas len pa// de ni sems nyid rang rig dang // brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// mi mthun pa'i
145a3(rgyud): phyogs yin te// de dral bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// rang rig ye shes chen po yin// sbyin sogs dkar po'i chos rnams dang // rang rig spyi yi rnam pa yis// rang rig ye shes chen po la// thabs dang
145a4(rgyud): thabs las byung ba 'am// rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa//  rdul tsam tha snyad yod ma yin// rang byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir// 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis kyang // de la sgrib/ 
145a5(rgyud): pa ma yin te// na mkha' la ni sprin bzhin no// rang rig gzha/ na rig bye brag gis// sems can sangs rgyas gnyisu snang // rang rig sprin med na mkha' la// gzhan rig rnam rtog na mkha'
145a6(rgyud): mtshungs// sprin tshogs rlung gis gtor byas te// sprin mdam kha' 'dra ba nyid// gzhan rig rnam rtog bral ba la// sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhes bya ste// rang rig kho na tsam du zad// dper na skyes bu
145a7(rgyud): nam mkha' lta ba la// sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig la bsgribs pa las// nam mkha' de la ma bsgribs ji bzhin no// grangs ni dang po gcig yin te// gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa las// dag la gzhan
145a8(rgyud): gyis rnam grol min// 'dir ni rang rig gcig kho na// de nyid rig cing nges pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // gzung 'dzin thabs dang shes rab ste// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o// lu
145b1(rgyud): ngag sems kyi rang bzhin las// rnam thar stong dang mtshan ma med// smon pa med dang sku gsung thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o// byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms// sa chu me rlung rang
145b2(rgyud): bzhin las// bzhi yi grangs su nges pa skye// dga' ba la sogs de bzhin no// rigs lnga yi ni sangs rgyas lnga// phung po lnga dang chags sdang lnga// bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa'o// pha rol phyin drug rang
145b3(rgyud): bzhin las// yul drug dbang po drug la sogs// bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid de// brgya sogs grangs ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig rang rig gzhan rig gnyis// thog ma med nas gnas pa ste/ 
145b4(rgyud): lus dang grib ma'i tshul du gnas// rang rig med par gzha/ darig dang // so so skye bo'i dus na 'dod// 'di yang rmongs chen ma rungs pa// gzhan rig ma spangs rang rig 'dod// 'khor ba
145b5(rgyud): spangs nas mya ngan 'das// kha gcig 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ rig pas blang dor ga nyi su rtogs// de la sogs pa lta ba'i gdon// rig pa 'dzin
145b6(rgyud): la brgya rtsa bcu// thag pa mdo sde stong phrag gsum// nyan thos rang rgyal brgya phrag gnyis// khyab 'jug drag po la sogs pa// lta ba'i gdon la bsam mi khyab// rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong
145b7(rgyud): pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub// bde ba chen pa'i ros gang ba// khams gsum 'khor ba kun shes na// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba la// 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// lta ba'i gdon dang bral ba ste// 
145b8(rgyud): rang rig med cing gzhan rig med// don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka spangs// sems med na mkha' chos nyid med// 'khrul pa med cing ma 'khrul med// theg pa med cing rim pa med// dman dang gya nom
146a1(rgyud): / gnyis ka med// ye shes med cing bde ba med// mtha' bral dbu mar mi gnas pa// bsam mi khyab tu gnas pa ste// 'di rtogs khong du chud pa dang // mi 'jigs sgro skur
146a2(rgyud): rtsom pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pas byin rlob cing // mkha' gro kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas// rig 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste// des kyang mnyam
146a3(rgyud): gzhag 'bad de bslab// rig 'dzin sa la gnas par bya// rig 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la 'jug/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gnas te// bco lnga sa yi bdag nyid las// sku ga ci/ 
146a4(rgyud): gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// gzhan gyi las dang smon lam stobs// / de yi stobs kyis snang ba las// yang dag nyid la snang rgyu me da// rim pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// dang po bla ma'i gdams ngag
146a5(rgyud): dang / rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i bar// rang rig spyi yin ma ba ste// chos nyid yul du byas pa'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'i/ sar gyur te// rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid ni// yul dang yul
146a6(rgyud): can la sogs pa'i// rtog med mkha' ltar snang ba yi// khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// bdag gi de nyid tshul gyis ni// mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun spangs te// sgyu ma'i tshul du gang gnas pa
146a7(rgyud): snang ba mthar phyin pa yi tshad// thun dang 'pho ba chu tshod dang // dbyug gu skad cig rim pa la// sems kyi bying rgod la sogs skyon// gal te dben par gnas pa ni// snang med mthar phyin chad yin te/ 
146a8(rgyud): rang rig phyi yi tshad bstan to// snang ba med cing sgyu ma med// bya sul med cing bgrod pa med// rang byung lhun gyis grub pa ru// rtag tu mi 'gyur gang gnas pa// rang rig pa yi mtshan nyid la// mthar byin
146b1(rgyud): pa yi tshad yin no// 'dod chags ro yis myos pa dang // sems bskyed sdom 'dzin dbang bskur dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lo gdung ba'i dus// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// khyad par can du gsungs
146b2(rgyud): pa'o/  gzhan yang rtog pa'i sems dang yang // rtog med sems dang 'dres pa yi// gzugs la rten pa'i mig nyid kyis// rtog pa rgyun chad sems de nyid// sems kyi rgyun bral rgyu de nyid// bsam gyis mi
146b3(rgyud): khyab rgyu yi dus// sgra la sogs pa'i de bzhin no// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// nyon mongs rjes nas rgyu ba ste// byams dang sbyin sogs de bzhin no// bzo sogs btang snyoms de bzhin te// bsam
146b4(rgyud): gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// sbyin dadang tshul khrims la sogs dang // byams dang snying rje la so dgas pa'i// mdor na dkar po'i chos rnams dang // bzo dang sgyu
146b5(rgyud): rtsal la sogs dang // bskyed rdzogs sgom pa'i rim pa kun/ skye ba gcig gam du mas ni// yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa dang // 'khor ba'i chos la gang skyo ba// bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i
146b6(rgyud): dus bskyed dang rdzogs sogs mi gnas shing // rdzogs pa chen po gang 'dod pa// de yang 'jug pa'i dus yin te// bdud rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas// bar mchod par 'jug pa'i dus// gzung ba
146b7(rgyud): thabs ni bco brgyad de// mkha' mnyam gzhi bcas gzhi med dang // g.yul drug dug gsum rten pa dang // lhan cig skyes nyid sgra la brten// sa chu me rlung sgra rten no// chos rnams gzod nas ma skyes pa'i// 
146b8(rgyud): rang rig sgom pa mkhas mnyam ste// bla mas sems gzung dang por gces// chos rnams thams cad sems yin to// sems ni gzod nas ma skyes pa// gzhi bcas rang rig rnal 'byor// sems ni/ 
147a1(rgyud): gzod nas rang rig pa// gzhi med bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i// gzugs sgra dri ro rag bya chos// de brten sems gzung bla ma las// skyes bus 'bad de blang bar bya// de bzhin 'dod/ 
147a2(rgyud): chags zhe sdang dang // gti mug rje su mkhas pas gzung // lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung bzhi la// brten te skye ba med par sgom// bye brag sems bzung bsam mi khyab// nyan thos la sogs theg chen
147a3(rgyud): la/ man ngag yod pa ma yin te// lta ba spyod pa sems gzung dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu lam dang yang // dus dang longs spyod rnal 'byor dang // bdag don gzhan don dgongs pa dang // ngal dub mtha' spangs
147a4(rgyud): tshigs chung dang // tshogs sogs pa yi khyod par dang / khyad par rnam pa bco lnga yis// rig 'dzin tha/ gra pa khyad par 'phags// kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// rang
147a5(rgyud): rig bsam mi khyab pa la// sbyin dang byams sogs dgongs pa ci// sku gnyis gzhan don gang las byung // bsam mi/ khyab la legs gnas pas// de nyid ci lags phyi ru ci// bcom
147a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po// sbyin dang byams pa la sogs pas// gzhan rig rnam rtog 'gags pa dang // sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa'i// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyasu// 'byung ba'i
147a7(rgyud): rkyen du nges par na// bsam mi khyab la mi gnas kyang // sbyin sogs 'bad de bslab par bya// de la bsam mi khyab pa 'byung // sku gnyis stobs dang mi 'jigs dang // gzungs dang ting 'dzin la sogs/ 
147a8(rgyud): kun ni sbyin la sogs pa sbyin byos na// bsam mi khyab po 'byung bar nges// de nyid rtogs na bsam mi khyab// de nyid ma rtogs 'khor ba chos// dbus pas nor bu'i byi de bzhin// bsam mi khyab la/ 
147b1(rgyud): sems gzhag kyang // bskyed rdzogs rim pas sems gnas nas// de ni sngon sbyangs 'phro can te// sems kyi yig mgo bcad pa ces// rang sems las su rung ba na// de ni byi rtags nang du ste
147b2(rgyud): de las nang rtags phyi ru 'byung // lus la dri med srin bu med// skra dkar gnyer mo sogs med pa// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no// 'khor ba sgyu mar snang ba dang // sprin med mkha' lnga
147b3(rgyud): gang snang ba// bsam mi khyab pa'i rtags yin no// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rje su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor
147b4(rgyud): lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa rdzogaso// // paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang // lo ts+tsha ba shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
147b5(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI khaM sa ma tan+ta ra dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal to// 'di ska
147b6(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugaso// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag gi nang nas/ 
147b7(rgyud): mkha' spyod dang // sa spyod dang / sa 'og ni spyod pa ma gsum la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs pa// dad ldan snying rjer ldan dang rtse gcig sems// lus ngag
147b8(rgyud): gus bcas gzhan la phan sems ldan// 'jigs med brtul zhugs ldan zhing zab mo yi// lam la spro bar gyis legs par nyon// mkha'agro khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// nga yis khyod la bshad par bya// mkha'
148a1(rgyud): spyod steng sgo'i rlung yin te// sa spyod par du thig le'i sgo// sa 'od spyod pa shu klu'i sgo// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dang po mkha' spyod mtshan nyid kyang // rnam pa gsum du shes pa/ 
148a2(rgyud): ste/ bems po'i rlung dang rnam rtog rlung // kun gyi mtshan nyid ye shes rlung // mdor bstan de nyid rim pas dbye// gnyis med rlung ni ma ning ste// zung 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung // ldang 'jug sku
148a3(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi rlung // snying dang gzhang kha mgrin pa dang // lta ba'i lus ni khyab pa ru// rigs lnga'i rlung ni khyab par gnas// rgyu ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i rlung // dngas snyigs 'byed pa brgyad du 'gyur// 'di
148a4(rgyud): nyid rlung ni thun brgyad de// thun ra la ni 'pho ba gnyis// rlung gi 'phro ba bcu drug yin// 'phro ba gcig la chu tshod gnyis// chu tshod re la dbyug gu gnyis// rlung gi dbyu gu drug cu bzhi// de
148a5(rgyud): bzhin chu tshod sum cu gnyis// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya sags / sems dang sems med 'dres pa'i rlung // rags pa dang / ni phra ba la// mkhas pas sems kyi bzhin par gzung // rnam
148a6(rgyud): rtog gzung 'dzin sems kyi rta// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas// de nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung // dbye ba thabs dang shes rab gnyis// 'di rnams mkha' spyod rang bzhin te// de dag man/ 
148a7(rgyud): dag mkhas pas brtag/ yon tan skyon dang rtags rnams kyis// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes par bya// de dag kun gyi rten nyid kyang // gzhol ma dang ni g.yon pa ma// 'di ni gzhu yo rnam par gnas// bems
148a8(rgyud): po rlung gi lam yin te// dbang po mngon sum lam yin pa/ sna yayi ri rab gling bani la// nyi na byang nub lhor rgyug gis// thabs dang shes rab skor sogs la// 'bad pas sems ni bzung bar bya// 'dir/ 
148b1(rgyud): bems pos yang dag gnas// mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// 'di ni rnam rtog rlung yin te// 'di nyid kyi ni lam gyur pa// ro ma dang ni chung ma'o// sbrul 'khril lta bu'i
148b2(rgyud): rnam pa ste// rnal 'byor gyi ni dmigs pa'i yul// gnas der rnam rtog rlung 'gag go// rang rig gdong nas ma skyes pa// 'di nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung // kun 'dar ma yi rtsal rten// tsaN+Da li ni shing lta bu/ 
148b3(rgyud): rang rig ye shes spyod yul te// gnas der 'bad de rang rig gzung // mkha' spyod rlung gi rang bzhin phyir// 'di dag rdo rje'i lam yin te// de nas sa spyod bshad bya ste// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas/ 
148b4(rgyud): tsaN+Da li yi bye brag brtan// dang por rang bzhin tsaN+Da li// gnyis gtum mo tsaN+Da li// gsum pa kha sbyar tsaN+Da li// de bzhin ga cer bu'i tsaN+Da li// de nyid la yang dbye ba ste// gcer bu gtum
148b5(rgyud): mo shin tu gtum// yang dag gtum mo gzhan spyir dang // bye bra/ ga kun la sbyor bar bya// gcer bu shin tu gcer bu dang // / shin tu gcer bu gcer bu sogs// 'di dag kun la sbyar ba
148b6(rgyud): byang dbyen rnam pa bcu gnyis te// yan lag bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad// sa spyod ma yin rang bzhin te// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sogs// gzhan skyes kyi ni khro mo tsam// pha ba de las bzlog
148b7(rgyud): pa'o// brgya dang nyi shu skra yi rtse// sum cu rtsa gnyis skra yi rtse// lnga yi cha ste gtso bo gsum// gsum 'dus yungs kar gyi ni tshad// dbus dang g.yas gauyon phra sbom bya// gnyis 'gyur bye brag shes
148b8(rgyud): par bya// dngas ma dang ni snyigs ma'i rtsar// rang bzhin du ni gnas pa la// yi ge lta bu'i rtsa mdud kyang // dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa// sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin no// gnas la sogs pa gzhan nas shes// 
149a1(rgyud): 'di nyid nor bu rin po che// 'di la rten nas thams cad 'byung // rigs 'chol gnas 'chol tshad 'chol dang // dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la sogs// 'chol ba las ni dngos
149a2(rgyud): grub min// de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni// sa spyod ma yi dngos grub ste// thams cad kun gyi rten yin no// sa 'og spyod ma'i rang bzhin te// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// byang chub sems ni rnam pa gsum
149a3(rgyud): dang po chos nyid sems yin te// 'di ni shes brjod yul las 'das// gnyis pa rang rig byang chub sems// dper na rkyen gyis shal sgong bzhin// gsum pa bems po'i byang chub sems// si h+la dang
149a4(rgyud): ni ga pur ste// don dam kun rdzob gnyi su gsungs// las kyi rlung dang las kyi mes// g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub sems // ye shes rlung dang ye shes mes// g.yo ba don dam sems yin
149a5(rgyud): te dngas snyigs las ni rim pa yin// dbyibs dang kha dog/ las kyis ni// sems kyi khyad par shes par bya// las/ kyi rlung gis mi g.yo zhing // las kyi ma yis mi 'dzag par/ 9
149a6(rgyud): ba lta bu'i mtshan nyid las// mi shigs haM gi dbyibs 'dra ste// nor bu kun da'i mdog lta bu// dkar la 'tsher dang gzi mdangs snam// bde ba chen po'i skur byung ba// 'di ni don dam byang chub sems// dam
149a7(rgyud): la gdab pa'i rang bzhin la// khyad par bzhi ni thun mong ste// 'di ni shes rab byang chub sems// de las bzlog pa'i dman pa gnyis// 'og sgor gnas shing srid pa ste// dman pa'i rkyen gyis g.yo
149a8(rgyud): bar byed// de phyir don dam kun rdzob kyis// sems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya// rgyu 'chol ba las dngos grub med// rkyen 'chol ba la de bzhin te// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// don dam sems
149b1(rgyud): kyi spyod yul min// kun rdzob tshor ba bden pa'i yul// sa 'og spyod pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje gsum sgom mi phyed pa// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// yi ge dang ni yan lag dang // bsdus pa'i don dang / 
149b2(rgyud): spri yi don// sbas pa'i don dang mthar thug don// sna tshogs sems las 'byung bar 'gyur// nor bu dang ni sil snyan bzhin// rtog med rkyen las sna tshogs 'byung // a li ka li ma ning dang // drug tu/ 
149b3(rgyud): sbyor ba brtag par bya// sgra mtha'i yi ge bsam mi khyab// yan lag rnam pa gsum yin no// rgyu 'bras brda dang brda can dang // brjod bya dang ni brjod byed do// de las bzlog pa bsdus par bshad// theg pa
149b4(rgyud): gsum dang de las gzhan// thun mong spyi ru nges pa ste// bye brag rang las shes par bya// sbas pa dbang dang sngagasu dbye// sngags la bzhi ste dbang la gnyis// chos ni spyi dang bye brag go// 
149b5(rgyud): de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par/ bya// snod dang snod mini bye brag kyang // bla mas legs pa/ kha rtag bya ste// de nyid yang dag rtogs gyur na/ ston pa med cing
149b6(rgyud): bstan pa med// bsam gtan la sogs 'jig pa med// sangs rgyas gzugs ni sna tshogs 'byung // bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs dang // chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs bskor// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i
149b7(rgyud): rgyun bya med rnal 'byor de lhag la// de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te// rnal 'byor nang pa da ltag la// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// shes rab snying po rtser gyur pa'i// thabs dang shes rab bsrub
149b8(rgyud): shing la// gnyis med thugs kyis bsrubs pa las// bdud rtsi'i ro na nyi shu bzhi// nor bu rin chen rgyud ces brjod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // ji ltar/ 
150a1(rgyud): mi bkrogs 'o ma las// 'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba min// de bzhin lo grangs mang po las// dngos grub myur du 'byung ba min// de phyir rin chen nyi shu bzhi// bdud rtsi ro 'dra seng
150a2(rgyud): ge gzugs// gnas ni nyi shu bzhi nyid kyang // sku gsung thugs kyis byin rlabs te// mkha' gro nyi shu bzhi la gtad// phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab bo// dam du sba zhing dam du spel// rgyal las 'das
150a3(rgyud): na dam tshig nyams// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de yi ngo bor rgyud kun brtag/ sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid// dbyibs kyang gnyis su shes
150a4(rgyud): par bya// re re'i bye brag dbye ba yang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// phyi nang sbas pa mthar thug bzhi// rgyud kun phyag rgya ba bzhi yin te// de nyid dbye ba mkhas pas brtag/ de nyid rtogs na
150a5(rgyud): rgyud dang ldan// de las bzlog pa 'das pa'o// rang bzhin rkyen tsaN+Da li// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// rtsa gsum gis ni byin gyis brlabs// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// mkha 'gro/ 
150a6(rgyud): shu rtsa bzhi la// rgyud ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtad// pu ru rab gtum gsang rdo rje// dza ru gtum mig gsang ba gcod// o ru 'od ldan bsam mi khyab// A ru sA rtse na mkha' mnyam// go ru brtan blo na mkha' che/ 
150a7(rgyud): ra ru mi'u thung sku gsung thugs// de ru lang ka rin chen phreng // ma ru shing grib dam tshig che// ka ru e ra stobs po che// o ru 'jigs byed ye shes gsang // tri ru rlung shugs ye shes phreng // ko ru
150a8(rgyud): chang 'thung ye shes 'bar// ka ru sha ma zla ba'i phreng // la ru shin bzang rin chen 'bar// ka ru r+Nan nyi ma'i 'khor// he ru kha kha ye shes rgyal// pre ru 'khor shugs mkha 'gro gsang // gri ru khartags
150b1(rgyud): me 'bar// so ru shon tigasang bdud rtsi// su ru 'khor lo dur khrod rgyan// nA ru shin dang 'ardo rje rgyal// si ru stobs chen ye shes rgyal// ma ru 'khor sbyar chags pa'i rgyal// ku ru brtson 'grus
