150b2(rgyud): mkha' gro sdom// de dag gtad lo legs par spros// nang du can+da li dag ni// nyi shu bzhi ni gtad pa ste// dang po gsang ba gnyis pa yang // rang bzhin yin te de nas dbang // rkyen ni tha mas gsungs pa
150b3(rgyud): ste mkha 'gro khyed kyi sang bzhin te// de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin// dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pa// dbang dang dam tshig ldan byas te// rta dang glang po la sogs dang // bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ 
150b4(rgyud): 'as kyi sa te// bdud rtsi'i ro yi ra li las// bla ma'i zhal nas dngos grub blang // yid la zung la dran par gyis// de nas 'kho ra 'dus pa de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// sku
150b5(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i/ rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis zhus
150b6(rgyud): shing bsgyur ba'o// 6// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA la sa ma tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal na mkha' dang mnyam pa chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag
150b7(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugaso// gzhan yang dpa' bo dang / 
150b8(rgyud): mkha'agro ma grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos// bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba
151a1(rgyud): lan gsum byas te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol pa/ kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// bcom pa gang lags ldan pa gang // 'jigs
151a2(rgyud): ba gang lags chen po gang // bdag la khyod kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bcom pa bdud bzhi bcom pa ste// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug grangs su
151a3(rgyud): shes par bya// ldan pa de yi gnyen po ste// dang po bum dbang bdud bzhi yang // kha dog dbyibs la log rtog gis// bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin du ma dag/ phung po'i bdud du rab tu grags// 'dod chags
151a4(rgyud): zhe sdang la sogs pa// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no// yang dag lam ston bla ma med// zhe sdang ru drar skye ba yi// rgyu dang la ma ston grogs ngan dag/ lha yi bu yi bdud yin te// las dang / 
151a5(rgyud): nyon mongs pa yi rgyus// srog 'chad ba ni 'chi bdag bdud// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas nas// lha yi bu yi bdud/ kyang bcom// log rtogs du ma'i rtog pa 'gag/ des ni bud
151a6(rgyud): po'i bdud bcom mo// rten dang rten pa ro mnyam pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// dus min 'chi dang tshe zad pas// 'di dag 'chi bdag bdud yin te// tshe lo stong sogs thub pa yi// tshe
151a7(rgyud): 'chi ba'i bdud bcom mo// gzhan yang bdud 'joms bye brag ni// phyi yi tshe yi bdud kyis len// grub na 'chi bdag bdud 'joms so// de bzhin lus kyi phung po ste// longs spyod kyis ni nyon mongs
151a8(rgyud): 'joms// sems kyis lha yi bdud bcom ste// don dang rten ni sgyumar ldan// de nas gsang dbang bdud bzhi yang // phyag mtshan khro tshul gar la sogs// phyi ru dum phung po'i bdud// rags
151b1(rgyud): bas yin ni nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no// dman pa'i lam gang ston pa yi// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// phyi yi tshe yi bdud kyis len// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan
151b2(rgyud): yang bdud kyi bye brag ni// sgo gsum 'khrul par gang ston pa// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// sgo gsum las ni du ma'i cha// de nyid ma shes phung po'i bdud// de nyid 'bad de sgrub byas kyang // 'bras bu mi 'byung
151b3(rgyud): sems nyon mongs// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te// de yi tshe yi bar chad byed// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// rlung sogs gnas pa'i tshul shes pas// lha yi bu yi bdud bcom mo// de nyid sgyu
151b4(rgyud): mar shes pa dang // de nyid shes pas phung po dang // nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// dngos po'i mthar ltung skye bas 'chi// rgyud med las skyes 'chi ba ste// rgyu rkyen ma bskyed rang bzhin
151b5(rgyud): gnas// sgyu mas 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// che la dbang sgyu ra ma lta bu// gnyen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// shes rab ye shes bdud bzhi yang // rtsa dang sha kra la sogs pa'i/ 
151b6(rgyud): dman pa'i lam ston lha yi bdud// de nyid du ma phung po'i bdud// de sgom rang bzhin nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin pas// kha dog dbyibs ni skyes pas 'jig/ de nyid 'chi bdag bdud
151b7(rgyud): yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag kyang // 'dod chags chen po'i lam ston pa'i// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// dga' ba bzhi ni du ma ste// rgyud la spangs pas phung po'i bdud // rang sems nyon mongs
151b8(rgyud): nyon mongs bdud// 'khor bar ltung bas skye ba ste// skye bo las byung 'chi bdag bdud// rnam par rtog pa skye bas so// 'dod chags kyis ni 'tshe bdage bdud// ma spangs sum cu drug nyid dang // nges
152a1(rgyud): pa sum cu rtsa drug gis// lam brten bla mas lha bdud bcom// dga' bzhi rgyu ma rang bzhin med// bde chen ror gyur phung po bcom// 'bras bu rang rig ye shes sbyin// 8
152a2(rgyud): sems nyon mongs sdug bsngal bral// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// de yis 'chi ba dang bral bas// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// 'og gi lam gyi bdud bzhi yi// dman pa'i stobs
152a3(rgyud): kyis zin pa ste// rgyal po dmang su phab pa bzhin// de nyid lam gyi bdud kyis zin// rgyal po rgyal sa shor ba bzhin// bzhi pa dang 'brel bdud bzhi ni// gsum pa'i snod dang ldan pa la// bzhi pa'i la/ 
152a4(rgyud): ston bla ma ni// lha yi bu yi bdud yin te// bdud gsum bla ma'izhal las shes// snod min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang // mar dang kha ra la sogs par// 'thungs te ma zhu dug 'gyur
152a5(rgyud): bzhin// khyad par bdud kyis zin pa ste// rigs ngan rgyal sa 'dzin pa 'dra// dbang dang gdam ngag 'brel bcas pa'i// bdud 'joms lam gyi stobs dang ldan// ye shes lnga 'am
152a6(rgyud): yon tan drug/ ldan pa dag tu rab tu grags// bla ma gcig la snod bcud gnyis// thob na de nyid dam pa ste// bla ma gcig la dbang thob nas// bla ma gcig la mnyan par bya// bla ma rnam pa gnyisu
152a7(rgyud): gsungs// phyi yi bla ma de nyid de// nang gi bla ma bdag po'i lha// bdud dang dgra yi snga rnams kun// thams cad 'jigs shing skrag byed pas// 'jigs pa zhes ni gsungs pa ste// dgra dang bdud kyi g.yul
152a8(rgyud): las rgyal// dmigs pa lha sogs bdun dang ldan// de phyir chen po zhes ni gsungs// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang // thams cad
152b1(rgyud): rgyud la dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal na mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes
152b2(rgyud): kyis bsgyur ba'o// @6// rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA ya bA kIt+ta tan+t+ra ra dza/ bod skad du/ dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
152b3(rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis 'dod chags che// mtshon gyur la ni yang dag gnas// mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// sku ni
152b4(rgyud): bum pa'i ngo bo ste// gsung ni gsang ba'i ngo bo yin// thugs kyang shes rab ye shes te// sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma gi/ dam tshig sgrol ma gos dkar mo// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad
152b5(rgyud): gsol// rgyud kyi don la rab goms shing // smra ba'i tshig gi sa ma rmongs shing // gzhan gyi rtsod pa mi rdzi yang // dbang dang man ngag ma thob par// dbang bskur rab gnas spyan
152b6(rgyud): sreg sogs// sngags spyod ngal bdon med de// shi nas sems can dmyal bar skye// de phyir gtso bas dbang gsum gyi// man ngag yang dag bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// dang / 
152b7(rgyud): bor bum dbang rim pa yang // gnas ni shin tu sngags pa btsal// bkra shis yid dga' shin tu snum// bkra shis bya rnams skad snyan sgrogs// dpag bsam shing rgyas yod par 'dod// gzhan/ 
152b8(rgyud): yang dur khrod shing gcig gam// chu ngogs dag la sogs pa ru// sa bdag sa yi lha mo la// gtor ma sbyin sreg mchod yon gyis// sa blang phyir ni mtho rnams gzugs// de nas dang po bsnyen pa
153a1(rgyud): dbul// bsnyen pa gsum ni rab 'bring tha// mtshan ma grangs dang dus su gsungs// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// mtshan ma gzugs dang 'od dang sgra// grangs ni
153a2(rgyud): stong dang khri dang 'bum// dus ni bco lnga bcu gsum dang // bdun du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // lha rnams bsnyen pas mnyes byas nas// lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun// lhag par gnas pa tshul
153a3(rgyud): bzhin bya// bkra shis lo grangs ldan pa yi// bu mo ku sha'i phyogs 'thun pa'i// ku sha btsal la mtshan ma brtag/ so shing rtse mor me tog dri// srung skud la sogs mtshan ma brtag/ dbang gi
153a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// dkyil 'khor slob ma rab 'bring tha// ting 'dzin me tog rdul tshon rim// gang dang ldan pa de nyid do// de nas mchod rdzas rim pa dgram// kha ba ra yi sngags
153a5(rgyud): kyis kyang // de la rdo rje bab par bya// de nas ku sha la sogs la/ spobs pa'i cho ga dang bcas bya// gzhan yang sngon du 'a gro ba'i rdzas// bla ma mnyes par bya ba dang // dkyil 'khor lnga
153a6(rgyud): rnams mchod pa'i phyir// rta dang glang po ma he dang // rin chen la sogs gter rnams dang // spos dang mar me la sogs pa// brgya'am stong ngam khri 'am 'bum// bla ra rgyan dang ba dan sogs// byin rlabs
153a7(rgyud): tshogs bsag phyi ru dgod// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// khrus dang yan lag dri yi byug/ kye ho khyod ni ji lta bu// 'jig rten 'khrul pa las sad na// he ru kar grags chen po yi// dkyil 'khor chen
153a8(rgyud): por khyod rol lomo// dad pa dang bcas spro bar gyis// rnam rtog dang bral rdo rje sems// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po// rdo rje 'dzin pa dgong su gsol// byang chub chen por lung ston pa// mgon po
153b1(rgyud): po bdag 'tshalo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol// pad+ma las byung bdag la stsol// gsang ba las byung bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog du/ 
153b2(rgyud): mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol// lag sau legaso rigs kyi bu// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rnam rtog thams cad 'jig byed pa// gnyis med khyod kyis blang bar bya// mi bskyod bcom
153b3(rgyud): ldan dang mtshungs pa'i// zil gyis mi non khyod kyi blang // dam tshig spyod pa spyad na ni// mchog gi de nyid blang bar bya// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug/ nam yang khyod kyis spangs mi bya// tshangs spyod
153b4(rgyud): de bzhin bsam gtan la// 'bad pas sems ni brtan par bya// / tshang ni rtag btung khro ma bya// de bzhin sha yang shes pa/ bya// gzhan gyi phyag rgya brten par bya// 'di ni dam tshig brgyad
153b5(rgyud): yin no// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro/ thun mong sdom dang sems bskyed sbyin// bskor ba lan gsum phyag ga/ sum bya// yol bas bar du bcad nas ni// mig la sogs pa
153b6(rgyud): lnga bkab la// lha grangs du yod me tog sbyin// kun byed chu yis bsal dag bya// me tog dong bcas rdo rje yang // de yi snying la bzhag la sgom// slob dpon la ni brnyas byed sogs// ltung ba'i nyes pa brjod
153b7(rgyud): par bya// phyi yi rdo rje 'dzin pa dbab// sngon du sdig pa lan gsum dral// mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang // rna bas sgra dang sna yis dri// lce yis ro dang lus kyis reg/ dngos grub phrin las sos
153b8(rgyud): rung ngamakhas pas shes shing brtag par bya// me tog dor te lha yang sbyin// 'khor rnams gtso bo'i yan lag yin// gtso bo'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// ji ltar gso ba'i sman pa yis// dbang po lnga yi/ 
154a1(rgyud): zug rngu' byin// de bzhin sems dpa' chen po yis// mi shes pa yi rab rib kun// rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bsal// de la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bstan// dbang
154a2(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du// pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa ru// bzhag la rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur// chu khams mi bskyod me long gis// rdo rje rigs kyi phrin las 'grub// dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung
154a3(rgyud): ldan te// mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin gyis// rin chen rigs kyi phrin las 'grub// 'od dpag med pa rdo rje'i dbang // so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// pad+ma'i rigs kyi phrin las byed// dril bu/ 
154a4(rgyud): don yod grub pa ste// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// phrin las sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// rigs las dras nas ming dgi dbang // rdo rje dang sbyar rdo rje sems// rnam snang chen po'i ngo bo ste/ 
154a5(rgyud): chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin las// de bzhin nyid kyi ma chen nyid 'dzin// mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri stengs su// rig byed slob dpon dbang sbyin bya// bdud bzhi 'joms pas rgya
154a6(rgyud): mtshan bzhi// chos rnams mi nub rgyal mtshan 'dzugs// chos kyi sku yis kun la khyab// gdugs kyis steng nas dgab par bya// rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs gnyis// phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsum
154a7(rgyud): yin te// dbugs dbyung ba dang lung bstan dang // rjes su gnang dang phyir mi ldeg/ brtan par byed dang rnam pa lnga// gzhan yang rjes kyi bye brag rnams// rin chen bdun la sogs pa kun// thun mong
154a8(rgyud): yin pa rang yis gsungs// bum pa'i dbang la rnam gsum te// dkyil 'khor du 'jug dang po yin// gnyis pa rig pa'i dbang yin te// brtan par byed pa gsum pa'o// de nas gsang babazha/ 
154b1(rgyud): bya ba// lus ni ri rab lhun po la// byang chub sems kyi gnas bcas nas// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas su// gsang ba'i dbang gis rton gyur pa// rig ma dang po btsal bar bya// dang po shes
154b2(rgyud): pas brtag pa dang // bdag dbang yod par blang ba dang // nyes pa dag par sbyang ba dang // dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ba dang // bar chod bgegs rnams zhi ba dang // srung dang de la tshogs kyis
154b3(rgyud): mchod// dri yi thig le dum bya// g.yon na gnas pa de nyid dang // srub dang bsrub thabs sbyor ba dang // bsrubs las bde ba'i chu rgyun gyis// lus kun khyab na gsang ba ru// dkar la rtsa
154b4(rgyud): dmar lta bur 'dzag/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug gong dang 'dra// da ro ma'i 'khor lor d+h+r-i bsams la// lce de pad+mar byin dbas te// lce yi rtse mor b+hu bsams la/ si hAh+la ga pur 'dres pa
154b5(rgyud): yis// b+hU la bzhag te de la bstim// sor gnyis longs spyod/ mnyam sbyor la// dbus su mi dmigs bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i dbang la rnam gsum ste// rdo rje gtso mos sbyin pa dang // 
154b6(rgyud): khro mo sbom pos sbyin par dang // rdo rje gra tshangs sbyin pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang la yang // dang por shes rab brtag pa ni// lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// 
154b7(rgyud): de nas khyad par lnga brtags te// rigs dang lang tshe longs spyod dang // rgyan dang gzugs kyi khyad par lnga// phyi yi brtag pa yin par gsungs// sems brtan rdo rje yi ni rigs// khyad par yin par nga yis
154b8(rgyud): gsungs// rnam rtog chung ba'i rdo rje yi// lang tsho'i khyad par yin par gsungs// mi rtog pas rgyan shes pa ste// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis khyad par yin// de nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur// mi nus chos kyi
155a1(rgyud): rgyam mtshan te// rdzu dru gzugs kyi khyad par yin// chos rnams thams cad stong ba'ad // de ma rom longs spya bas// rdza pongs spyod khyad bar rar// kun daram sangs
155a2(rgyud): kyi rigs// rigs kyi khyad par yin pa'o// de nyid mda' ltar ma khrang ba ni// thugs kyi lang tshe'i khyad par ro// rtsed dmar la dngas pa dang // byang chub sems ni dkar la dngas// gnyis su med la dka
155a3(rgyud): ba'i tshul// dper na nor bu ke ke ru// tar la brgyus pa ji bzhin du// thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyod par ro// la la nA dang ras nA// a ba d+hU tir gnyis med la// spyod thugs long spyod khyad par ro// 
155a4(rgyud): dang por phyi la gnyis pa nang // gsum pa gsang ba'i rtag pa'o// lus brtag pa ni sku yin te// ngag brtag pa ni gsung du 'gyur// yid brtog thug su 'gyur
155a5(rgyud): ba'o// sgyu ma tsam gyi dgongs pa'i don// kun la khyad par she sra par bya// lus kyi drug la ngag gi bdun// sems kyi bdun po sgyu ma'i tshul// dang por smig rgyu chur 'khrul dang // 
155a6(rgyud): gnyis pa smig rgyu nyid yin te// gsum pa smig rgyu mi snang bzhin// de bzhin zhal nas shes par bya// chu la bdun no mar la gcig/ dri ni bdun te shi la gnyis// sgo bzhi ste 'o ma gsum// 'di
155a7(rgyud): rnams btsal ba'i rten gyur pa// lon gsum bzhi yin par gsums// kar gnyis te bu ram gcig/ chang ni gnyisu shes par bya// rgyan ni bye brag sna tshog so// dgun dang de bzhin ston gyi sha
155a8(rgyud): zhag gcig na ni bcud dang ldan// dbyar dang dpyid kyi sha rnams kyang // drod dang ldan na bcud dang ldan// rang bzhin shi ba'i sha yin te// 'dun pa byas na dam tshig nyams// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag
155b1(rgyud): bcas// gzhan yang 'bras bu la sogs sman// mar dang bcas pas sbyar bar bya// sha yang mar gyis de bzhin no// khabs kun gyi bcud skyed de// mngar ba kun gyis ron byed// bcud brgyan
155b2(rgyud): sha ni gzhon nu ste// ro rtsa sha ni bco lnga yin// bcud bskyed sha dang mar gnyis kyang // lnga dang lnga yi cha yis bsres// chang ni mnyan por gsungs pa'o// ro rtsab yi sha la yang // 'o ma sgong
155b3(rgyud): mnyam par// lnga gsum lnga gnyis gtso bor bya// kho ra'i chang ngam 'o ma'am// sha dang mnyam por sbyin par bya// 'di ni yan lag spros bcas so// de nas mtshams bcad bsnyen pa dang / 
155b4(rgyud): dam tshig sna tshogs bya ba yang // spros pa med pa'i yan lag yin// dbang bskur sngon du sgom pa'i don// dbang dathob phyir ni nga yis gsungs// rig ma gtad dang man ngag sbyin/ 
155b5(rgyud): brda rnams byi zhing 'dod pa'i rtags// rtag pa shin tu spros pa me // phyag dang zhabs la sogs pas 'khyud// dang 'i sbyor thabs zhes gsungaso// dbu rgyan mgul rgyan la sogs
155b6(rgyud): pa sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya ste// langs pa cog pu gan rkyal dang // kha bub phreng dang lnga yin te// 'di rnams kun gyi dgongs pa zab// dgongs med spyad pa spyod byed pa// 'di ni mnar med skye ba'i
155b7(rgyud): rgyu/ tha mal pa las brgya 'gyur gyis// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa'o// bum pa dang ni gsang ba ste// gsang ba las gzhan gsum pa ste// de yi rnam smin brjod mi lang // dkyil 'khor du
155b8(rgyud): 'jug rim pa ni// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// yan lag bdun bsgoms sbyor ba dngos// khyad par rnam pa gsum las byung // sngags dang sman na dang po ste// gnyis pa sbyor thabs yin
156a1(rgyud): par gsungs// gsum pa ting nge 'dzin yin te// sngags dang sman gyis kun dang // rkyad bcing chad dang gnas pa'i tshad// grangs pa'i tshad rnams shes par bya// 'byung ba
156a2(rgyud): bzhi dang rigs 'thun pa'i// rked shing rked pa'i tshad dang mnyam// sor gsum sor bzhi dar ram men// gnas pa'i tshad ni rnam pa drug/ rnam thar gsang ba'i pho brang gnas// skye mched rig par
156a3(rgyud): gnas pa'o// stong pa rta mgrin 'khor lor gnas// khams rnams gsang ba bde skyong ga nas// 'dab la sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas// yang dag spong ba snying khar gnas// he ru kar ni ma gshegs
156a4(rgyud): shing rdo rje mda' yis ma brgyab pa'o// drang ba'i tshad ni sor ba zhi dbyug/ dang por khrus byas gnyis pa la// sman dang sna mra dang dri dang gsum// sum cha sum gnyis stong smad du// lus
156a5(rgyud): la sku zhing me la bdug/ rtse gsum rtse ni shin tu zab// ba spu ba da nga lci ba dang // ram nya ba dang nye'u shing dang // ra mo na gas dang yan lag bcas// rdo rje la sogs lnga sbyar dang / 
156a6(rgyud): gzhan yang sman dang snum dang dri// nga la sogs pa'i nang du blugs// sgo gnyis nas ni tho las bdag/ zab pa'i sngags btang sgom byas nas// dang por mtshan ma shes par bya// chags pa'i gzi ldan sna
156a7(rgyud): tshogs 'byung // tha ma'ang gsum mam bdun na 'byung // dgongs pa'i bye brag shas gyur nas// sngags dang sman gyi khyad par ro// dgongs pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir// sman la sogs pa btsal
156a8(rgyud): mi bya// 'di yi sdig pa bsam mi khyab// gdug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur na// dbus kyi rtsa yi kha 'byed pa// sbyor thabs khyad par yin par gsungs// bde chen go bzlog sbyor ba dang // 'khor lo/ 
156b1(rgyud): go bzlog sbyor ba dang // sku yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // ye shes go bzlog sbyor ba dang // 'byung ba go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yum gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // thig le go bzlog sbyor ba dang // bsam
156b2(rgyud): gtan go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba dang // stong pa'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // dbugs kyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // dga' ba'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // gtum mo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // rtsa
156b3(rgyud): yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // byang sems go bzlog sbyor ba dang // g.yas g.yon go bzlog sbyor ba dang // brda'i yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // rten gyi go bzlog sbyor ba rnams// kun mkhyen gyis kyang ma
156b4(rgyud): gzigs pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsong // byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi yum// sras rnams thun mong ma yin bskyed// ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro// 'di yi khyad par
156b5(rgyud): ma dpags par// zab pa'i don ni yod ma min// dbang bskur ba yi sngon du yang // gdams ngag sbyin par gsungs pa yin// gdoms ngag de yis dbang thob 'gyur// shes rab ma
156b6(rgyud): la brten nas su// bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pas na// shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs// si h+la ga bur shes rab ste// de yi bde ba ye shes yin// si h+la shes rab zhes bya ste// ga pur ye shes
156b7(rgyud): su ni bshad// rtsa gsum 'das pa shes rab ste// de yi thig le ye shes yin// la la na ni ye shes so// ra sa nA ni shes rab ste// rtsa ni shes rab zhes bya ste// byang chub sems ni ye shes so// 
156b8(rgyud): mkha'agro ma ni shes rab ste// dpa' bo ye shes su ni bshad// dga' ba gsum ni ye shes te// rang bzhin dga' be shes rab yin// 'og ni shes rab zhes bya ste// steng la ye shes su yang bshad// 
157a1(rgyud): g.yon pa shes rab zhes bya ste// g.yas pa ye shes su yang bshad// chos dbyings shes rab zhes bya ste// ye shes bzhi ni ye shes yin// phyag mtshan meng dang yi ga
157a2(rgyud): rnams// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// shes rab ye shes la yang gsum// tshig la bslab pa'ong gnang ba yin// gzugs brnyan la ni bshad pa ste// mngon par rtogs pas sgom
157a3(rgyud): pa gsungs// e ba mo ya'i rnam pa yang // e ni sa ste ba ni chu// ma ni me sta ya ni rlung // e ni snying rje ba ni byams// ma ni dga' ba ya btang snyoms// e ni spyan pa mA ma ki/ ma ni gos dka
157a4(rgyud): ya sgrol ma// e ni sbyin pa pa tshul khrims// ma ni bzod pa ya bsam gtan// a ni phyag rgya chen po ste// ba ni dam tshig phyag rgya yin// ma ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste// ya ni shes rab
157a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// a ni shar te baM lnga phyogs// ma ni nub ste ya byang phyogs// e ni sku yi thig le ste// ba ni gsu/ ngal ma ni thugs// ya ni ye shes thig le'o// e ni sngon po tha
157a6(rgyud): ljang khu// ma ni dmar po ya ser po// e ni mkha' 'gro ba lA ma// mni dum skyes ya gzugs can// e ni ye shes mkha'agro sngo// ba ni rdo rje'i mkha 'gro yin// ma ni sha za'i mkha 'gro ste// ya ni las
157a7(rgyud): kyi mkha 'gro'o// a ni 'gog pa ba ni lam// ma ni sdug bsngal ya kun 'byung // e ni bde chen po longs spyod// ma ni mtshan ma po stong pa// ma ni rnam thar ya dpe byad// e ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/ 
157a8(rgyud): bi ni rnam par smin pa'o// ma ni rnam par nyed pa ste// ya ni rnam pa mtshan nyid bral// en chung ngu ba 'bring po// ma ni lhag pa ya cher lhag/ e ni g.yas nas mi rgyu ste// ba ni g.yon nas rlung rgyu'o// 
157b1(rgyud): ma ni 'og nas sa rlung rgyu// ya ni steng nas chu rlung rgyu// e ni gnas brtan pa phal chen// ma ni bskur ba ya thams cad// e ni bsnyen pa pa nye bsnyen// ma ni sgrub pa ya sgrub chen// e ni shar lho za
157b2(rgyud): lho nub// ma ni shar mtshams ya nub mtshams// e ni rgyud la ba ni sngags// ma ni ye shes ya gsang ba// e ni snang ba ba snang mched// ma ni snang thob yi 'od gsal// e ni bdag gi bzang po
157b3(rgyud): yin// ba ni dus kyi bzang po yin// ma ni ye shes bzang bar gsungs// ya ni rlung gi bzang po yin// a ni bdag gi gnas yin te// ba ni rnal 'byor gnas su bstan// ma ni gzhan gyi gnas yi
157b4(rgyud): te/ ya ni rgyud kyi gnas yin no// e ni dga' ba ba mchog dga'// ma ni lhan cig ya dga' bral// e ni me lo/ dang ba mnyam nyid// ma ni kun rtog ya nan tan// e ni chos slu ba
157b5(rgyud): long spyod// ma ni sbrul sku ya bde chen// e ni zhi ba ba ni dab / ma ni rgyas pa ya gsod pa// yi ge btus pa'i sdug sa chen gsum// oM ni sku yi 'khor lo ste// aHni gsung
157b6(rgyud): 'khor lo'o// hUM na thugs kyi 'khor lo yin// oM rnam snang AH'od dpag/ hUM ni mi bskyod rang bzhin no// oM ni phyag g.yon hUM ni g.yas// AHni dbus kyi snying kha yin// oM ni g.yon gyi spyan yin te// 
157b7(rgyud): hUM ni g.yas pa AHdbus ma// oM ni srog la hUM rtsol ba// AHni gnas par shes par bya// oM ni sku la hUM ni thugs// aHni gsung du shes par bya// oM ni lus la AHni ngag/ hUM ni yid du shes pa
157b8(rgyud): bye/ oM na thabs la hUM shes rab/ aHni gnyis su med pa'o// oM na g.yon gyi la la no// spun g.yas kyi ra sa nA// AHni A bad+hU tI yin// oM na g.yas kyi ras na// dz+nyA nani ga yin gyi la lanA/ 
158a1(rgyud): AHni de bzhin dbus na gnas// oM ni ga pur hUM si hA// AHni dkar dmar rtsa dag yin// oM ni mchog dga' hUM khyad dga'// AHni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don// dga' ba lhan/ 
158a2(rgyud): cig skyes dgar 'gyur// lhan cig skyes par dga' bar 'gyur// rgyu la 'bras bu sbyor ba dang // rgyu la rgyu yi sbyor ba dang // 'bras bu la yang 'bar bur skyo// rgyu 'bras gnyis su med par sbyor// thabs la shes rab sbyor/ 
158a3(rgyud): ba dang // shes rab la yang thabs kyis sbyor// shes rab shes rab sbyor ba dag/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor// sbyor ba 'di yi dgongs pa yang // kun mkhyen gyis kyang rtogs par dka
158a4(rgyud): a ni rnam snang mi bskyod pa// na ro rin chen 'byung ldan te// zla tshes 'od dpog med pa yin// thig le don yod grub pa'o// oM ni bau dre gshegs lnga rang bzhin// zhabs bskrad don yod grub pa ste// 2
158a5(rgyud): ni de bzhin 'od dpag med// ha ni rnam par snang mdzad te// zla tshe/ sa rin chen 'byung ldan yin// thig le mi bskyod rang bzhi na no// zhabs bskyed sgrol ma'i rang bzhin te// 'a ni gos dkar
158a6(rgyud): bo yin// ha ni rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// rtswa tshes mA ma ki rang bzhin// thig le spyan du shes par bya// 'byung ba lnga dang sku lnga dang / 'khor lo lnga dang dga' ba lnga// go rims bzhin du shes par bya// naH/ 
158a7(rgyud): bskyed bya ba nan tan yin// 'o ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// ha ni chos kyi dbyings yin te// zla tshes so sor rtog pa'o// thig le me long ye shes so// 'di dag kun gyi dgongs pa'i don// sangs rgyas kun gyi/ 
158a8(rgyud): thugs kyi gsang // kun tu gsang zhes dpyid par dka'// yi ge'i tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang // mkha 'gro ma'i tshogs kyis mchod pas mchod nas mi snang / 
158b1(rgyud): bar gyur to// mkha 'gro ma dra ba'i sngam pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal ba rdzogs/ paN+Di ta ga ya dAr dang / mo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur dar/ 
158b2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI rat+na mA li tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshalo// lha mos gsol pa rdo rje 'dzin// dpal ldan 'khor
158b3(rgyud): lo sdom pa ru// rin chen phreng ba'i don ma rtogs// khyad kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring // dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// ma
158b4(rgyud): gsungs nga yis khyod la bshad// rin po che ni rnam pa gsum// / da yi phreng ba'ang rnam pa gsum/ ma bya 'i lu rin pa che// snod bcud gnyis dang rang bzhin bral// de ni rin chen
158b5(rgyud): gsum pa yin// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// rnam ba gsum du gsungs pa las// de rnams rin chen rdzi ltar lags// de yi phreng ba ji ltar lags// de rnams su yi
158b6(rgyud): spyod yul lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po snron gyi rin po che// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya// ka ka ru ni dkar po che// mi bskyod pa yis byin rlabs te// dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu
158b7(rgyud): larab ni ngang ba'i sgo nga tsam// 'di ni rin chen 'bar ba ste// ba dkar dkar lug dkar mo'i// 'o ma sku zhing spangs pa dang // mi bskyod pa la mchod par bya// de nas spyi bor gdagasau pa'o// mchod pa'i
158b8(rgyud): bye brag kun la bya// shar gyi gdon rnams thub pa dang // gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni gzhan skyes sbom po tsam// 'di ni rin tshon dge ba ste// dngul chu rnam pa gnyis blugs la// rkyen gyi rdzas
159a1(rgyud): rnams tshang ba dang // kha yi nang du gzhug pa ste// ro ma'i 'khor lo lces mnan la// de nas dal gyis bskyod pa dang // gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse ru// bde ba chen po skyes tsam na// 
159a2(rgyud): ro ma'i 'khor lor dog pa mnan// dper na sbrul gyi sha zos pa// mgo ba mnan pas phyi ru 'byung // de bzhin mnan pas byang chubo sems// sna rtse las kyang gyen la ldog/ til dang til mor bzhin du
159a3(rgyud): gnas// khyad par bde ba gyen la skye// bde ba ster phyir rin po che// de yi phreng ba du mar bshad// tha ma skyes pa'i khro mo tsam// e ran la sogs sman lnga dang // spyi bo'i gtsug tu gtags gyur na// lus
159a4(rgyud): kyi gnyer ma zad par byed// de nas yang dag gnyis pa yang / bai DUR+Ya na sngon pa ste// rin chen 'byung ldan byin rlabs te/ dbyibs ni sogs ka lta bu ste// rab kyi tshad ni glang po'i mig/ 'di
159a5(rgyud): ni rin chen myu gu ste// ngang pa'i sgo nga ldong ros dang // spang sha ma dang gsum sbyar nas// de gdugs rna ba g.yasu gang gos// lho yi gdon rnams thub par gsungs// gang la yod pa de
159a6(rgyud): la skyob// 'bring ni ngang pa'i sgong tsam// 'di ni rin chen e ran da// ga pur rak+ta dngul chu gsum// de yi nang blugs lce tog tu// gyen thur gnyis ni sna dang 'jug/ de yis byang chub sems bzung ste// 
159a7(rgyud): 'gal ma'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas// tha ma be'u sgong tshad tsam// a ru ra dang skyu ru ra// ba ru ra dang ldong ros rnams// bsras te lus la byug bskus te// 'di ni d+han d+ha kas pu ra// lus kyi srin bu khyer/ 
159a8(rgyud): bar byed// de nas yang dag gsum pa yang // pad+ma rak+ta dmar po ste// dbyibs ni zlum po lta bu la// 'od dpag med kyi byin rlabs te// rab ni kar sha ba ni stong // gur gum ga pur lnga sbyar la// de la ba
159b1(rgyud): zhing byug bya'o// lte ba'i dbus su bzhag la bcing // 'di ni rat+na ke ru ra// nub kyi gdon rnams thub par gsungs// 'bring ni kar sha ba ni ste// 'di ni rat+na ka ra ste// mar dang sa le sbram dang lnga// bzo/ 
159b2(rgyud): ru byas pa'i dbus chu rnams// de yi nang blugs lte bar mnan// 'di yis byang chub sems gzung ste// chu la chu bzhag ji bzhin no// tha ma kar sha pa ni ste// 'bras bu gsum dang ru rta dang // mar gyi
159b3(rgyud): snying po dang sbyar te// spyi bo'i gtsug tu sba ba dang // 'di ni rat+na bde ba sar// skra dkar med par byed pa'o// de nas yang dag bzhi pa yang // de ni ma rgad ljang ku ste// dbyibs ni gru bzhi lta bu ste// don
159b4(rgyud): yod grub par byin rlabs te// rab ni be con dbyug pa tsam/ 'di ni rata ga ga ni// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// ba skus la rna ba g.yon du gdags// 'di yis byang gi gdon rnams
159b5(rgyud): thub// 'bring ni bya mo'i sgo nga tsam// ma hA de ba u ma de// gnyis kyi ga pur rak+ta yis// byugs la lte ba'i nang / du gzhug/ ga pur si hA gnyis ka 'dzin// tha ma gzhan skyes sgo/ 
159b6(rgyud): nga tsam// ldong ros ser po gser dang gsum// man cha gcig ni byin nas ni// 'di ni a ru na ra ste// srin bu mi skye bde dang ldan// 'di ni rat+na san da ha// de nas yang dag lnga pa yang // kha dog dbyibs
159b7(rgyud): ni du mar snang // rnam par snang mdzad byin rlabs te// don rnams so so du ma byed// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs so so skye bo yis// rin chen gnas rnams gang nas btsal// 
159b8(rgyud): rin chen mi 'tshal dza ltar legs// rin po che ni ji ltar brtag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgya mtsho chen po'i phyi rol na// rin po che yi gling yod de// de yi gnas nas btsal
160a1(rgyud): bar bya// gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni// gser dngul la sogs rdo rnams kyi// gnas ni kun na yod par gsungs// rin chen shes pa rnam pa lnga// dang por rgyud/ 
160a2(rgyud): rnams thams cad la// rmongs pa med pas shes pa dang // bla ma'i man ngag shes pas thob// gnyis pa rnal 'byor bcas pas shes// gsum pa rgyud kyi man ngag la// zhugs pa'i tshong dpon
160a3(rgyud): chen pos shes// bzhi pa yon tan kun ldan pa'i// rgyal po chen po des shes so// lnga pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa dang // rgyal po dang ni 'brel pa yis// gsar mgar mkhas pas rtogs par 'gyur/ 
160a4(rgyud): lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// dang po'i man ngag ji lta yin// gnyis pa rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// gsum rgyud ni ji ltar lags// bzhi pa'i yon tan ji ltar lags// 
160a5(rgyud): lnga pa 'brel pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'a stsal pa// dang po man ngag shes pa yang // rin chen ngo bo gcig nyid la// yon tan du mar shes pa ste// dper na
160a6(rgyud): rdzas kyi pha lam bzhin// tshul mi 'bying 'bigs la sogs// du ma shes pa man ngag yin// rnal 'byor shes pa rtse gcig ste// de yis thams cad shes pa yin// rgyud kyi don ni shes pa yi// / 
160a7(rgyud): tshong dpon de yis shes pa yin// sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa yi// yon tan kun ldan rgyal po shes// rgyal po rnal 'byor dang 'brel ba'i// sa 'og gser gyi blangs pas shes// gser
160a8(rgyud): mag de yis shes pa'o// brtag pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// mngon sum dang ni mtshan ma ste// rdo rje ba lam la sogs dang // oM ran d+ha la sogs pa yi// mngon sum gtan la bab pa yi// ma hAn
160b1(rgyud): la la sogs pa// gdon rnams thub cing lha rnams skyob// dam tshig nyams pa gso ba dang // tshe rnams ring ba la sogs so// dang por gdon gyi mtshan ma ni// mkhas pas brtag cing shes
160b2(rgyud): par bya// de nas rten gyi mtshan ma la// de nyid cho ga tshul bzhin bya// de nas chu mig gtsang ma ru// gtor ma btang la chu gtsang blang // gser dngul snod du chu blugs la// lha 'am klu 'am gnod sbyin
160b3(rgyud): sogs// mtshan ma gnyis kyi maN+Da la// rnal 'byor pa yis bzhag par bya// gom pa gsum gyis bcad par bya// g.yon gyi maN+Dal thog tu ni// chu yi nang du me long bzhag/ phyi ru gtor mtsho
160b4(rgyud): gcig bzhag/ nang du yol ba dkar pos bcang // de ru tshe gras dang bkri shis bzhag/ rnal 'byor yan lag khrus byas la// lha yi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa dang // khro bos drag tu
160b5(rgyud): mtshams bcad la// sbom po khro mo lha ru sgom// de yis/ rin chen dang po bzung // de nas sor bzhi 'phyang du bzhu ga/ thub bam mi thub la sogs pa// mkhas pas brtags
160b6(rgyud): shing shes par bya// dbyibs dang kha dog rin po che// yon tan med pa ga la srid// dper na bu gcig skyes gyur na// pha med pa yang ga la srid// de bas mkhas pas brtag par bya// lha mos gsol
160b7(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das// gser dngul la sogs ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gser ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// rang bzhin dang ni gzor byas yin// rang bzhin gyis
160b8(rgyud): ni 'chi ba slu// bzo byas pa ni rnam pa gnyis// gser 'gyur gser gyi rgyan yin te// bdar ba'i lam ni srid lam 'gegs// lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed// mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya// 
161a1(rgyud): dngul la sogs pa'ang de bzhin te// mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas// thams cad rin po yin te// man ngag can gyis shes par 'gyur// de nas bcud kyi rin po che// lus
161a2(rgyud): kyi ri rab lhun po la// rin chen gsar gyi dbye ba yang // thabs dang shes rab rin po che// shes rab rtsa yi rang bzhin te// thabs ni byang chub sems yin no// dmar dang dang ba shes rab ste/ 
161a3(rgyud): dkar dang dang ba thabs su gsungs// a ba d+h+r-i ti rin chen las// thig le du ma phreng ba yin// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// a ba d+hA ti ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
161a4(rgyud): pad a ba d+hU ti'i rang bzhin las// steng du sgo lnga yang dag gnas// // bar dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin te// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rang bzhin las// yon tan skyon gyi mtshan nyid do// bde chen
161a5(rgyud): thig le haM yin no// oM dang AHhA ha dang bzhi// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ru// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che// 'bar ba bzhi ru yang dag bshad// sku gsung thugs dang brda/ 
161a6(rgyud): ba che// mgrin pa ru ni 'jug pa bzhi// snying khar yang ni 'dzag pa bzhi// sprul pa ru yang de bzhin te// chos kyi sku ni rin chen la// stong pa bcu drug phreng bar bshad// de nas shin tu gsang ba'i don// 
161a7(rgyud): pad+ma rdo rje gnyis pa la// a ba d+hA ti rin po che// a phaT e dang baM dang bzhi// gsang ba'i thig le bzhi ru bshad// a ni me long lta bu ste// phaT ni bya ba nan tan yin// a ni so sor rtog pa ste// 
161a8(rgyud): ni mnyam nyid ye sheso// rin chen chos dbyings ye shes te// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // mtshan dang de bzhin dpe byad rnams// a ni 'khor lo 'byung ba bzhi// phaT kyi gnasu ye shes
161b1(rgyud): ldang/ e yi gnas su snyoms 'jug dgu// baM gi gnas su lnga bcu brgyad// de kho na ru shes par bya// k+Sha e e ta sa bon bzhi// yon tAn skyon gyi mtshan nyid kyis// kun la khyab cing shes par
161b2(rgyud): bya/ lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis gdon rnams ji ltar thub// byang sems dgog pa ji ltar lags// skra dkar gnyer mo ji ltar zhi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 
161b3(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa gdon yin te// mtshan dang dpe byad spong ba dang // phung po lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga// skye mched de ni lnga ru 'gyur// khams rnams rten gyi ngo bo ste// de rnams rten rtsa'i ngo bo ste// rnam rtog/ 
161b4(rgyud): spong phyir rin po che// byang chub sems dgag rim pa yang // g.yas brkyang bas ni thabs kyis te// g.yon gyis shes rab rtsa mdud dgag/ sa gas na mkha' dgag par bya// zlum pos gsad
161b5(rgyud): ba'i sna rtser dgag/ l-i lan dang ra sa na// a ba d+hU ti'i nang chu/ da pa// de ni nam mkha' zlum po ste// dper na sbrul gyi lce/ gnyis la// dug dang sman ni yod pa bzhin// gzhan yang 'dug
161b6(rgyud): stangs bye brag gis// dgag po'i bye brag shes par bya// dgag pa srog dang stsol ba'i rten// de ltar dbus su gnas pa dang // rim nas rim par gyen la drang // skad cig nas bzung lo yi bar// sku
161b7(rgyud): dkar gnyer ma'i rang bzhin 'gag/ gang la rten pa de yi tshad// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// dbus su gnas pa ji ltar lags// rim nas rim du ji ltar drang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
161b8(rgyud): stsal pa// thabs zhes bya ba rtag pa'i mtha'// shes rab zhes pa chad pa'i mtha'// snyoms par zhugs pa dbu ma'i don// g.yas kyi srog ni rtag pa'i mtha'// g.yon gyi rtsol ba chad pa'i mtha'/ 
162a1(rgyud): de gnyis gnas pa dbu ma'i don// rom rtag pa'i byang chub sems// rkyang ma khrag ni tshad pa'o// kun d+har ma rung gang gnas pa/ de ni dbu mar shes par bya// mchog gi dga'
162a2(rgyud): brtag pa'i mtha'// bral ba'i dga' ba chad pa'i mtha'// lhan cig dga' ba dbu mar bshad// oM dang hUM ni mtha' gnyis te// A yi rnam pa dbu mar gnas// a l-i ka li mtha' gnyis te/ 
162a3(rgyud): ma ni yi ge dbu ma yin// skyes pa bud med mtha' gnyis te// ma ning gnyisu med par gsungs// 'di ni sgom bzung du 'jug/ de ni gnas pa dbu ma'i don// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ru// 
162a4(rgyud): 'brel pa zung du 'jug par gsungs// bya ba'i rgyud dang rnal 'byo/ rwa rgyud// snang ba zung du 'jug par gsungs// dpal lnga na gsang ba 'dus pa ru// stang sgo dbug // shes rab
162a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor bla ma ru// si h+la ga pur zung du 'jug/ rim nas rI ma du drang ba yang // gsang ba'i 'khor lo a la ni// bde ba rdzogs pa'i tshad bstan pa// pad+ma rdo rje 'gag pa snyam// 
162a6(rgyud): de ni yongasu rdzogs pa'i tshad// de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo nas// bde chen 'khor lo'i bar du drang // dang por de ltar shes par bya// de ltar sems ni brtan 'gyur na// bde ba chen po'i 'khor
162a7(rgyud): lo nas// gsang ba'i sna rtse'i bar du drang // lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// bcud kyi rin chen gang na gnas// da ni shes pa su yis shes// de yi brtag pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan
162a8(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gnas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo yan chad du// a ba d+hU ti'i tsan dan gnas// la la ra sa sbrul ltar gnas// gzhan rnams pa thag khug par
162b1(rgyud): gnas// 'di rnams rang bzhin kun la gnas// rtsa dang 'khor lo 'di rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por gsungs// phyi yi rtsa dang nang gi rtsa// gsang ba de bzhin mthar thug
162b2(rgyud): ni/ man ngag yod pa steHgsungs// brtag pa rnam pa gnyis su bstan// dang po lus kyi brtag pa ste// gnyis pa dag tu shes par bya// lus la spyi dang bye brag gnyis// sku na rlung gi rang bzhin/ 
162b3(rgyud): te/ yan lag thung na chu yi khams// yan lag rgyas pa sa yi khams// smad zheng chen me yi khams// sna tshogs du ma na mkha'i khams// spyi ru dkor ba chu yi khams// dmar ba me ru shes
162b4(rgyud): par bya// ser na de bzhin sa yi khams// sngon rlung du shes pa ra bya// yang na rlung gi khams yin te// drid rnams chen me yi/ khams// brtan pa sa yi khamasu gsungs// chu khams chen chu yi
162b5(rgyud): khams// de rnams kun ldan na mkha'i khams// 'jug pa ba de chen sa yin te// ldog pa sprul pa chu ru gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud ni bre brag gis// sems kyi gnas pa shes
162b6(rgyud): par bya// shu kra rlung la si h+la me// sbrul dang cho su sbyar ba yin// gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya// de nas bye brag gsungs pa yin// dbyabs dang kha dog mtshan ma gsungs// kun la
162b7(rgyud): mkhas par shes par bya// dang por dbyibs kyi brtag pa yang // dpral ba'i dbyibs la rnam pa bzhi// gru bzhi zlum po zla gam dang // gru gsum du yang shes par bya// dkar po la sogs de dang 'dra// 
162b8(rgyud): rna ba nas bzung rkang pa'i bar// kun lo brtag cing shes par bya// skad ni phra dang sgom pa dang // ring du 'don dang thung ba dang // 'das la sogs bye brag rnams// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya
163a1(rgyud): rtags de brtag pa'i mtshan ma ni// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// 'dod chags sku dang zhe sdang thugs// mun pa gsung du shes par bya// dang po 'dod chags dbye ba
163a2(rgyud): yang / yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum// dbyibs dang kha dog skad gsum la// mkhas pa 'dod pa skye ba brtag/ nyin par bzhi dang mtshan par bzhi/ de bzhin skad cig thang cig rnams// mkhas
163a3(rgyud): pas brtag cing shes par bya// mig 'dzum pa spu ldang la sogs// dbyibs kyi 'dod pa skye ba dang // 'dod pa'i gzugs ldan cu zhig dmar// sna bug dkar la sogs pa dang // skad 'dar kha ni
163a4(rgyud): skam la sogs// 'dod pa skyes pa'i rtag su bshad// gzhan yang 'dod pa skyes pa'i rtogs// kha dog dbyibs la brtag pa ru bya// sra phyir 'dod pa sa yi rtags// chu la sogs pa de bzhino// 
163a5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs la'ang shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags zhes pa ji ltar la/ gas// de yi chen po ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la sogs ji ltar/ 
163a6(rgyud): lags// sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste// grub pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par// sbas pa'i gsang bal zhes
163a7(rgyud): nas/ srid pa'i sa bon mi zad pas// dper na rgyud kyi mda' bzhin du// 'bras bu mnar med dmyal bar skye// chen po mi rtog rang bzhin te// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed// 'dod chags
163a8(rgyud): zhes pa spang bya ste// de yis chen po gnyer por gsungs// 'dod chags zhes pa me tog ste// de yi chen po dri dang 'dra// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// zhe sdang la sogs gong dang 'dra// thams
163b1(rgyud): cad rten bsku ru brtan// brjod pa dang bral gsung du bstan// rnam rtog bral ba thugs su shes// rnam rtog chung zhing gtong bod che// bla ma la gus snying rje che// gzhan yang bye brag kun shes
163b2(rgyud): pa 'di la bstan gyi kun la gsang // bla ma yon tan kun ldan zhing // dbang dang man ngag 'brel shes dang // gsang ba'i don la ma rmongs shing // thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// chos la ser sna
163b3(rgyud): med pa dang // gsal la gsung por smra ba dang // rigs bcas kun gyis bkur ba dang // las kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba dang // dam tshig dang ldan bla ma ste// 'di la bkur gyi thams cad la// bsnyen cing
163b4(rgyud): bkur bar bya ba min// de nas rin cheni gsum pa ni// gnyis med lhan cig skyes pa ste// rtog bral spros pa med pa yi/ na// de rtogs rin chen phreng ba'o// lha mos gsol pa bcom
163b5(rgyud): ldan 'das// gab pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'bras khu ji ltar smin// sbas pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi/ 'bras bu ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
163b6(rgyud): sprul pa// gab pa zhes pa ye shes te// sum cu rtsa bdun sku gsung thugs// chos dang longs spyod sprul sku gsung // dga' ba bzhi ru mdor bsdus pa// dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gsang ba'o// bdun dang
163b7(rgyud): ldan phyir chen pa'o// sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i// gnyen po stobs kyis ma zhugs par// sbas pa pad+ma rdo rje gnyis// snyoms par zhugs na 'dod pa skye// 'di ni rkun mo ma rungs pa// dper na ljon
163b8(rgyud): shing rtsa ba las// yal ga me tog thams cad skyes// nyon mongs rtsa ba 'dod chags la// dus gsum la sogs thams cad do// sbas pa'i gsang ba'i 'khor ba ste// gab pa mya ngan 'das par gsung
164a1(rgyud): / 'khor ba mnar med dmyal ba dang // dur khrod brgyad po drags pa can// snying rje med cing sha khrag za// shing rta'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas// mya ngan 'das bsku gsum ste// sku/ 
164a2(rgyud): pa mya ngan 'das gyur kyang // 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul du ni// tshogs kyi shugs kyi mthu yis su// sems can don la yang dag 'jug/ chos sku spros bral na mkha' bzhin// sku gnyis sprin dang / 
164a3(rgyud): tshar lta bu// sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa// sems can las dang smon lam stobs// de yi stobs kyis snang ba las// yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med// sku gsung de nyid bzhi bcu'i don// 
164a4(rgyud): dur khrod la sogs brda ru shes// sum cu rtsa gnyis chos sku 'i brda// rgyan ni gzugs sku gnyis kyi brda// gzhan ya rang brda yi bye brag ni// sbom po gsang ba'i rdo rje'i brda// khro mo gas
164a5(rgyud): ba'i pad+ma'i brda// sku dang drang ba yon tan skyon// mdzub mo/ la rten mthe'u chung ni// nga yi gan du tshur shog yin/ mthe bo l-i brten mdzub mo bar// khyod kyi gan du 'ong gis yin/ 
164a6(rgyud): mthe bong mdzub gnyis zur gsum ni// b+ha ga rgyas sam dri ba yin// b+ha ga rgyas pa zlum por ston// bde ba'i gnas su 'du ba yang // srod dman ma gung tho rangs gsum// mdzub tshigs dang po nas
164a7(rgyud): bzung nas// tha ma'i bar du brda yin no// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// lan gsum bar du nan tan gnang // gzhan yang brda yi be brag rnams// rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa// gnas
164a8(rgyud): ni thabs kyi 'dug stangaso// nye gnas shes rab 'dug par gsungs// zhing ni thabs kyi bza' ba'i tshogs// de bzhin shes rab nye ba'i zhing // 'du ba thabs ni 'ong ngo ste// shes rab 'ong ba nye 'dra
164b1(rgyud): yin/ tsun+do thabs kyi bstan dang rgyan// shes rab de bzhin nye tsAn+do// dur khrod thabs kyi rnam rtog bral// de bzhin shes rab nye dur khrod// gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams// kha dog de bzhin
164b2(rgyud): dbyibs dang yang // yan lag tshul las shes par bya// de nas lha mo la sogs pas mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal rin chen brang po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po gsang ba
164b3(rgyud): yang gsang bste rang bzhin gyis gsang ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin chen rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o// slad kyis kyang dang
164b4(rgyud): phyi mo la gtugs nas bcos pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA sa ma ya tan+t+ra rA dza na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 
164b5(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skadabadag gis thos pa'i dus cog na// bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
164b6(rgyud): rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / rnal 'byor ma grangs med pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la zhal 'dzum
164b7(rgyud): ba mdzad nas// dam tshig gi rim pa bka' stsal pa// dam tshig dang ni mi ldan na// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// rgyu med pa yi 'bras bu bzhin// tshe yi dus byas dmyal bar 'gro// de phyir
164b8(rgyud): dam tshig shin tu srung // sangs rgyas bla ma las thob phyir// thun mong ma yin bla ma yi// lnga bcu'i bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// thun mong brgyad dang bcu bzhi ste// de rnams nges par shes par bya// de rnams
165a1(rgyud): spyi yi dam tshig ste// bye brag dam tshig bsrung bar bya// phung po lnga ni rigs lnga ste// 'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga'o// skye mched sems dpa' sems ma yin// gzugs phung rnam
165a2(rgyud): par snang mdzad la// brjed dang bskus pa la sogs spang // de la mchid dang bstod sogs bya// don dam par ni rang rig ste// tshogs bsage phyir nang yis gsungs// tshor ba la sogs de dang 'dra// 
165a3(rgyud): sa ni sangs rgyas spyan yin te// spyod lam gsum du ma yangs shig/ gong du gsungs pa'i tshul bzhin srung // chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// mig la sogs pa de bzhin no// gzugs la sogs pa de bzhi/ 
165a4(rgyud): srung dkyil 'khor du zhugs rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin mchod// bskas shing gshi ba la sogs spang // sa mas can po dang mo kun la// dpa' bo dpa' mo dam tshig srung // 
165a5(rgyud): bza' ba la sogs dus su yang // bdud rtsi sbyor bas dam tshig srung // sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams la// rang gi spyod dang gzha na spyod la// rje su yi rang dam tshig yin// mdor na snang zhing srid
165a6(rgyud): pa'i rdzas// dam tshig srung zhing mchod pa'i phyir// lus kyi nyes sdom sku yin te// ngag gi nyes sdom gsung du gsungs// yid kyi nyes sdom thugasu gsungs// oM gyi 'od zer dkar po yis// 'dod khams/ 
165a7(rgyud): dag par gyur pa ni// sku yi dam tshig srung ba'o// de la mchod dam bstod sogs bya// bsdu ba'ang oM du shes par bya// AHni kha dog dmar po yis// gzugs khams dag pa'i gsung dam tshig/ hUM
165a8(rgyud): gi kha dog nag po yis// gzugs med dag pa dam tshig go// oM ni spyi bor yang dag gnas// AHni de bzhin mgrin par gnas/ hUM ni snying khar spro dang bsdu// sku yi mkha 'gro bcu gnyis// 'dod khams dag ni
165b1(rgyud): dam tshig// gsung gi mkha 'gro bcu gnyisu// gzugs khams dag pa'i dam tshig yin// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// gzugs med dag pa'i dam tshig ste// oM dang AHdang hUM la bsdu// oM na/ 
165b2(rgyud): me sku bcu gnyis/ lnga ni lam gyi gru bcu gnyis/ tshun 'bras bu sku bcu gnyis// bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// dpal ldan chos kyi sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// 
165b3(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs// sprul pa yang ni sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// bde chen snying po ha nyid la// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yang // ye shes dang ni rnam
165b4(rgyud): ba bzhi// oM dang AHdang hUM dang yang // yan lag bzhi bzhir thub pas gsungs// rgyu dang la mo dang 'bras bu la// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad shes par bya// oM dang haM gnyis rang bzhin bzhi// sngags
165b5(rgyud): kyi ngo bor shes par bya// sngags kyi grangs ni nyi khri stong // dru ga brgya bzlas par shes par bya// lag pa bskyod rang ba ni/ na gar// rkang pa ring bzhin dkyil 'khor ro// de ltar gnas na/ 
165b6(rgyud): dam tshig go// gzhan yang dam tshig bye brag yang // 'jig rten tha snyad spang ba'i phyir// mi bskyod rnam snang la sogs dang // dpa' ba mkha 'gro ma zhes pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje pad+ma dang // ji ltar rol pa'i
165b7(rgyud): spyod pa kun// tha snyad kyang ni lam la 'jug/ gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag bcu// theg pa che la spyod pa dang // gsang ba'i don la skur 'debs dang // rnal 'byor kun la/ 
165b8(rgyud): gnod pa dang // sems can kun la mche byed pa// 'di bsad pa ni dam tshig yin// sbas pa srung ba'i rim pa yang // ma byin blang ba'i dam tshig ste// 'dod pa chen po dang ldan pa// 'dod chags spyod pa'ang/ 
166a1(rgyud): de dang 'dra// rang gi dam tshig srung ba'i phyir// brdzun du smra ba bzhi pa yin// ro tsa'i sha dang bcud kyi sha/ kha ba'i chang dang mngar ba'i chang // ma la gcig sde 'o ma gnyis// gzhan na/ 
166a2(rgyud): gsum ste yan lag bcu// 'di ltar dam tshig yin par gsungs// bdud rtsi nyid la dus gsum du// bcom ldan sku gsung thugs kyi ste// dang por yungs kar tha ma yang // byi la'i kham gyi tshul du
166a3(rgyud): bza'// mtshan mo shes rab sku gsung thugs// nyin mo thabs kyi sku gsung thugs// nyi ma nub dang nyi ma shar// nyi ma gung gi thabs kyi dus// nam srod nam ni langs pa dang // nam gyi gung ni shes rab
166a4(rgyud): dus dadus drug mchod pa rgyun mo 'chad// dam tshig 'di las mu nyams na// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs 'i// dpa' bo mkha 'gro ma rnams kyi// mchod dang srung ba la sogs
166a5(rgyud): byed/ gzhan yang gsang ba'i bye brag la// gsang ba sgom pa 'i rnal 'byor pas// lus la me dang khrag mi gdon// sro ga gam zug rngu'i phyir ma gtogs// srog chags 'dod pa spyod
166a6(rgyud): mthong na// rang gi rnal 'byor shor mi bya// dam tshig srung phyir dben par 'dug/ las su rung na g.yeng bar 'khyam// 'di skad ces bya yan lag brgyad// bdag gis bcu bzhi yin par gsungs// zos
166a7(rgyud): pa'i dus gcig lnga bcu'i don// bcom ldan 'das ni rtsa ba bzhi// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bcu// sku gsung thugs ni lus ngag yid// rdo rje mi phyed phyir dam tshig/ btsun mo dam tshig gis rgyan
166a8(rgyud): mdzes// b+hag mnyam par 'joms pas so// snyoms pa dus gsam mi 'gyur ba// bzhugs pa bde ba'i b.la'o// rdo rje snying po la sogs pa// bye drag yon pa rang yis gsungs// e ni yan lag
166b1(rgyud): brgyad yin no// bam ni bcu po'i rang bzhin te// ma ni lnga bcu'i rang bzhin no// ya ni gzhan rnams yin par gsungs// e ni srog chags gsod pa ste// ba ni ma byin len pa'o// ma ni brdzun du smra ba'o// ya
166b2(rgyud): ni 'dod chags spyod pa'o// a ni sku yi dam tshig ste// ba ni gsung gi dam tshig go/ ma ni thugs kyi dam tshig ste// ya ni bza' ba'i dam tshig go/ dus gsum dam tshig ma bsrungs na// 'jig rten
166b3(rgyud): pa dang 'bum 'gyur bas// rnam smin che bar nga yis gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa'i mtshan ma ni// lus kyi nyes pa sna tshogs 'byung // ngag gi nyes pa sna tshogs smra// kha dog dbyibs rnams
166b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang // lag gis rdzas rnams mi thub cing // 'bras dang shu ba la sogs 'byung // de tshe rnal 'byor nyams pa dus// dam tshig nyams pa shin tu bsam// bla ma rdo rje spun gral du/ 
166b5(rgyud): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul byas la// gser dngul las gas brgya'am stong // rta dang glang po la sogs dang / bai DUR+Ya dang man shes dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshani brgya'
166b6(rgyud): stong dmar me la sogs dri bzhin no// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor// tshogs bsags pas ni nyams pags// gal te nyams pa ma gsos na// nyams pa de dag rnal 'byor gzhan// 
166b7(rgyud): gnas gcig dang ni chu gcig gam// yul dang lam gyi gnas gcig gam// skad cig tsam yang 'dug ma bya// 'dug na nyes pa bsam mi khyab// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // gto
166b8(rgyud): mamachod dang bzlas pa dang // ril bu mig sman la sogs pa dang // gi rgyas la sogs las rnams dang / 'jig rten mtshan ma brgyad dag dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i mtshan ma ba'i/ sangs rgyas ba'i
167a1(rgyud): mtshan ma gcig/ gzhan yang dngos grub ma lus pa// dam tshig 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur// 'bru rnams sna tshogs skye 'gyur ba// rin chen sa las skyes pa bzhin// dam pa sku
167a2(rgyud): gsung thugs yin te// de las 'das na 'chag par 'gyur// de lta bu ni med pa'i khyim// shi ma thag tu stong par 'gyur// de bzhin dam tshig 'di med na// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// pi wang gling du
167a3(rgyud): sbyor kun sogs// rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung // de bzhin dam tshig med gyur na// sngags bzlas sgom pa la sogs pa// 'bras bu med par brlag par 'gyur// nas las nas kyi myu gu ste// dam tshig las ni rnga
167a4(rgyud): rje 'chang // tshe 'dir thob par gsungs pa ste// dus ni gzhan min rtsod ldan dus// bstan pa gzhan min nga yis te// skye ba gzha na min pa dang ma// man ngag gzhan min sa ma ya// bzhi ni yin par/ 
167a5(rgyud): gsungs pa'o// de ltar dam tshig dang ldan pa// bud med 'dra zhing dga' bar 'gyur// mkha'agro rnal 'byor ma mo ste// sku ga/ sung thugs kyi mtshan mar bstan// nor dang bran dang g.yog 'khor
167a6(rgyud): dang / rgyal po'i 'khor yul la sogs 'dra// ngag ni snyan cing bde bar 'gyur// srog gcod la sogs tshig smras kyang // sems can skrag par mi 'gyur ro// lus kyis sems can bsad pas kyang // rnam
167a7(rgyud): sman 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sku ni thob par gsungs pa'o// ngag gis phra ma'i tshig smras kyang // nyes par mi 'gyur gsung thob 'gyur// yid kyis mnar sems bsam byas kyang // nyes par mi
167a8(rgyud): 'gyur thugs thob 'gyur// dam tshig ldan pa'i yon tan no// a ma'o rgyud ni ngor mtshar// dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya
167b1(rgyud): d+ha ra dang // lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ba la tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 
167b2(rgyud): dpal sdom pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub semadas rdo rje snying po la/ 
167b3(rgyud): sogs pa dpa' bo'i tshogs dang / lA ma la sogs pa mkha'agro ma'i tshogs dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhug so// 'jig rten na ni
167b4(rgyud): cher grags pa// dgra ni chen po drug yin te// ji ltar nyi ma/ nub pa'i tshe// grong khyer gyi ni mi rnams kyis// rta dang glad dpol sogs pa// rdzas rnams yongasu 'phrog par byed// thams
167b5(rgyud): cad dbul por skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin yul drug gi ni dgra sa// shes rab nyi ma nub pa'i tshe// ma rig pa yi mun pa la// so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi// ye shes lnga la sogs pa yi// rdzas
167b6(rgyud): rnams yong su 'phrog par byed// bde ba med pa'i gnas su skye// dgra de yongasu gzhom pa'i phyir// mchod pa med cing bzlas pa med// gtor ma sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor med// klog dang sgom pa bsam ga/ 
167b7(rgyud): meda' g.yeng ba'i chos dang skar ma'i tshogs// thams cad spangs te bde ba yi// stan la bdag nyid legs 'dug ste// shes rab ye shes bsrub par bya// shing rta yi ni 'khor lo ltar// yul la yang dag
167b8(rgyud): rgyug pa'i sems// de dag las ni bzlog nasu// las kyi rlung ni chen po g.yos// ye shes me ni chen po 'bar// rnam rtog sreg ste bdud rtsi'i ros// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// skye ba med pa'i gnas
168a1(rgyud): // bzung // de nas sems ni brtan gyur nas// mtshan mar snang ba 'gag par 'gyur// de nyid las ni bzlog nas su// rang sems stong par bsgom par bya// chos la bdag med rdo/ 
168a2(rgyud): pa na// de tshe sems ni rtogs par 'gyur// thams cad stong par ros gang ste// bde ba chen po'i sku zhes brjod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste// 'di la bsal ba ci yang med// bsnan par bya ba ci yang med
168a3(rgyud): de nyid mthong bas rnam par grol// rigs gcig dang ni rigs gsum dang // rigs lnga rigs ni brgya la sogs// de nyid 'di la tha dad med// ji ltar glang po rnyed gyur nas// glang po'i rjes ni mi
168a4(rgyud): btsal ltar// sems kyi de nyid rnyed gyur na// rnam rtog gang ya dang mi btsal lo// ji ltar dug ni 'dod pa la// sman nyid dugadu sbyar te sbyin// sman las dug 'byung sbyor ba yang // sman pa ma
168a5(rgyud): pas sbyor ba shes// gzhan yang mar dang kha ra dang // mar gyi snyi nga po la sogs pa// 'thungs te zhun sman du 'gyur//  bzhin nga yis gsungs pa yang // drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don// 
168a6(rgyud): sgra ni ji bzhin ji bzhin min// dgongs pa dang ni dgongs pa yin// bsregs bcad bdar ba'i gsar bzhin du// yongasu brtags nas nga yi bka'// blang bar bya yi mos pa 'am// gzhan gyis mkhas pa 'jug
168a7(rgyud): mi bya/ ji ltar skye bo blun po ste// dgra ru gyur pa'i skye bo yis// sman yin byas te dug byin bya// sman du dmigs te dug zos na// zos pa'i rjes la 'chi bar 'gyur// thabs rnams thams cad sgyu mar shes/ 
168a8(rgyud): shos rab brjod du med par gsungs// ji ltar rog pa mkhas pa yis// dug na dug gis 'byin par byed// ji ltar mi yis tshig pa la// de bzhin me yis gdung bar bya// ji ltar 'dod chags che ba la// 
168b1(rgyud): 'dod chags nyid kyis spang bar bya// ji ltar zhe sdang che ba la// zhe sdang nyid kyis spang bar bya// de bzhin gti mug che ba la// gti mug nyid kyis spang bar bya// dpeg rlung ni mar me 'jig pa'i rgyu// de / 
168b2(rgyud): nags sreg me yi grog su 'gyuraro// de bzhin 'dod la rten pa bde ba'i yul// drug gis dgra rnams bcom nas gnyis med thob// ril bu mig sman la sogs pa// 'di nyid las ni thams cad 'byung / 
168b3(rgyud): ji ltar pha rol thabs ldan pas// gzings la rten nas pha rol 'gro// pha rol phyin nas 'dor bar byed// de bzhin rang rig tshol bas kyang // bud med sgyu ma la brten te// rang rig ye shes thob par bya// 8
168b4(rgyud): rig ye shes thob pa dang // bud med sgyu ma dor bar bya// zab mo dgongs pa ma shes shing // zab mo'i dgongs pa ma rtogs par// zab mo'i spyod pa spyod par byed// sems can dmyal ba
168b5(rgyud): chen por ltung // ji ltar ri yi rtse mo nas// skyes bu 'ga' zhig ltung gyur na// de ni ltung ba chen por 'gyur// gzhan yang dang gyi srin bu yis// rang la rang gis 'ching bar byed// mtshan mo me
168b6(rgyud): yi srin bu yang // rang gis rang ni sreg par byed// sgyu ma tsam gyi tshul gnas shing // mtha' bzhi las ni rnam par grol// spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi// mtshon cha mtshon byed ma yin te// lta ba'i dbus na gnas
168b7(rgyud): pa yi/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o// dpal stobs pa tsha'i rgyud las mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / gang zhig brtag par byed pa yang // gnas ni shin tu bsngags pa ru// khru do ba
168b8(rgyud): yi maN+Dal la// dang po pa yi rnam lnga yis// sor gcig tsam du byug par bya// de nas dri chen dri chu yis// byugs te me tog sngon po dgram// rgyal la sogs pas mdzes par rgyan// bum pa lnga ni phyogs dang
169a1(rgyud): // dbus// de nas bzlas dang khri'am 'bum// bdud rtsi chu ru byin rlabs te// gang zhig brtag pa'i mi de la// dang po mtshams bcad khrus byas te// rlog pa nag po phyir bzlog gyon// 
169a2(rgyud): skra ni gyen bcings sha bcings dang // ber ka thogs twe shar sgor bzhag/ tshal chen ma mar shar du bstam// nub tu me long dngul la sogs// dag pa de la sman lnga dang // dri lngas byug sde bkru bar bya// de
169a3(rgyud): nes me long nang du yang // gdon gyi mtshan ma brtag bya te// gtso bo'i sngags kyi mtha' ru ni// gdon gyi ming dang sngags brtags na// lha yi gdon la sogs pa kun// mtshan mar 'byung ba the tsom med// mi de
169a4(rgyud): rgyan ni tha dad de// lha la sogs mthong ba brag go/ dus ni 'byung dbo'i nyi ma sogs// mtshan ma sna tshogs byung ba'i tshe// datsha gdon ni dbang du bsdu// tshe dang bsod nams long spyod dang // mdza'
169a5(rgyud): bshes zug rdul sogs pa// gdon la sogs pa bsal ba 'i phyir// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro ma la sogs// brtag kha'i rdzas kyi bye brag kyang // mchod dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo
169a6(rgyud): sogs// bskor la mtshan ma brtag par bya// dbang bskur dus su ye shes kyang dbab pa de bzhin sdig la sogs// mtshan ma me long dag la ni// brtags te gzhan yang ci 'dod pa'i// mtshan ma brtag pa bla ma yi/ 
169a7(rgyud): zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// nad kyi zug rngung byung ba'i phyir// gso ba'i rig pa las gsungs pa'i// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa dang // 'dus pa dang ni yan lag bcas// gnas bzhir 'khor lor gnas/ 
169a8(rgyud): pa ste// lus kun khrus byas gnas bzhi ru// sngags pas log pas mnye bya ste// me long dkyil du brtag byas na// rlung la sogs pa shes par nges// de rjes 'khor lo de nyid la// gso ba'i sbyor ba shes pa
169b1(rgyud): bya/ dug ni brtag pa'i rim pa yang // nang grol yan lag thams cad la// gang du du gzugs mtshan ma brtag/ de nas gso ba'i sbyor ba yang // sman dang sngags dang chu sbyar te// mkhas pas brdag/ 
169b2(rgyud): nas gso bar bya// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las mtshan ma thams cad brtag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / gang zhig srung ba'i rten de yang // gang dang sen po'i rim pa yis// srung ba'i/ 
169b3(rgyud): 'khor lo brtsom par bya// gtso bo'i bzlas pa khri'am 'bum// bsnyen par byas te de nas yang // gser ram dngul las gzo byas te// nang du dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa 'am// yang na 'dab brgyad lta ba
169b4(rgyud): bcas// rdo rje ra ba la sogs bya// yungs kar la sogs la dbu lnga dang // rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // de nang bzhag ster dab gnas bya// yongasu rdzogs nas bcing bar bya// gzhan yang gro/ 
169b5(rgyud): ga 'am shing shun nam// dur khrod dag gis ro ras la// ba sang dang bgegs bskrad tshul bzhin bya// bzlas pa gong da nga 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs gyur na// sngags
169b6(rgyud): kyang yongasu rdzogs par bri// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis// lus ngag yid la bsrung bar bya// yongasu ma rdzogs zur drug la// dpa' bo drug gi sngags bris te// bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan par ste/ 
169b7(rgyud): rtsibs mtshan drug la g.yung drung gis// yi ge drug ni bris pa ste// bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan par sgom// dbus su yi ge kA bris te// bar chad thams cad bsal bar bas mo// cho ga yongasu rdzogs bya/ 
169b8(rgyud): ste/ bzo byas snod ni kha dog sbyar// legs par sbas te spyi bo'am// mgrin pa de bzhin dpung pa yi// tshangs pa'i bu gar long spyod mnyam// sor bzhi dag tu bcing bar bya// gzhan yang nad pa'am rnal
170a1(rgyud): 'byor pa// dag la srung na dang po yang // gdon bsal bsangs te gnas gsum du// thig le gsum byas sngags gsum dgod// gzhan yang gnas ni sum cu bdun// thig le byas
170a2(rgyud): te sngags rnams dgod// de nas go cha mtshon cha yang // tshul bzhin 'thun par shes par bya// de nas stan nam mal chal// oM oMHbadz+ra ra kA rak+Sha hU~M phaT// bsgom 'am gzhan la'ang bri bar bya// gzhan yang lag
170a3(rgyud): g.yas pa yi// mthil du gur gum dag sbyar te// g.yon gyi sbom mo khra mo yis// spyi bo dpral brnab mig/ sna dang kha dang mgrin pa dang // dpung ba snying la lte ba dang // 'og gi snod gnyis yan lag la// sngags dang / 
170a4(rgyud): bcas nas legs par 'tsho// gzhan yod skud pa sna lnga la// sdug sa dang bcas na srung bar 'gyur// dpal stobs pa che'i rgyud la sa srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// 
170a5(rgyud): mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// de nyid la ni phyag 'tshal te// rdo rje nga pos yang zhus pa// srung ba'i 'khor lo da ltar na// ye shes khyi brag ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

170b1(rgyud): rab gsang ye shes so// de nas ye shes chen po bani// dang po ra mnyams mtha' spangs pa'i// ye shes de nyid yod ba la// rnam rtog spong ste de bzhin 'jog/ de nyid rang rig chen po ste// de nyid ye shes chen pon
170b2(rgyud): de ltar shes na rdor 'dzin gyi// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las ye shes brtag pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas ye shes chen po yi// brtag pa de nyid bshad par bya// dang por
170b3(rgyud): ro mnyam gyur pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi ro mnyam la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa// phung po khams dang skye mched sogs// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dang // dga' dang mchog dga' bral ba dang // de la sogs
170b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kun// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// de nyid gzhan rig ces bya ste// rang rig sems kyi de nyid la// gnyi su med par sgom pa ni// de nyid ye shes chen po ste// mtha' phyir brtag pa rjo/ 
170b5(rgyud): pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las ye shes chen po brtag pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa dang // rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo dang / 
170b6(rgyud): mkha' gro ma dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rje su yi rang nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas/ g.yon phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal
170b7(rgyud): stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 6// rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza// bod skad du/ dpal
170b8(rgyud): ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub che phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi// rang lus rtsa 'khor bzhi yi gtso bo yi// snying po de la yang dag phyag 'tshalo// dbang bzhin
171a1(rgyud): // de nyid bdag la bsrungs// nyon cig rdo rje snying po'i bdag/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams kyi// de nyid dang por bshad pa ste// drug cu rtsa bzhi dpe byad yin// sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub phyogs// 
171a2(rgyud): ni ye shes lnga yin te// dpa' bo gcig pa chos kyi dbyings// phyag mtshan sku mdog gzhan nas gsungs// gu h+ya'i rdo rje dril bu'i tshad// nas dang sor tshogs yin par 'dod// de nyid thabs dang shes ra/ 
171a3(rgyud): yin don dam nyid la dbyer med de// bsgom bya med do sgom pa med// bsgoms pas thob pa ci yang med// rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed du med// sems kyi gzhi la sku lnga dang // ston pa med cing bstan pa med// 
171a4(rgyud): 'jigs dang rnam rtog kun dang bral// de nyid bzhi pa'i de nyid do// dang po rlung gi de nyid do// srog rtsol gnyis ni a dang haM// a ni chos rnams thog ma nas// ma skyes pa yi don yin no// ha ni
171a5(rgyud): gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis stong // ljang 'jug gsum ni sku gsu nga thugs// sems kyi gzhi dang sku lnga dang // rnam par tha/ dang stong pa dang / de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad sogs// de dag rlung gi de nyi
171a6(rgyud): de/ de nas thig le'i de nyid kyang // nyi zla thabs dang shes rab ste// sngags kyi phreng ba mtshan dpe yi// thig le ye shes lnga rang bzhin// gnyi su med pa'i de nyid yin// phra mo la sogs gzhan nas shas// 
171a7(rgyud): nas 'og gi sgo dag ni// de nyid yang dag bshad pa ste// rtsagasum sku gsung thugs ngog/ rtsa lnga ye shes lnga yin no// tsaN+Da li ni nyi shu bzhi// de nyid ye shes nyi shu bzhi// chos sku'i phrin las nyi shu bzhi/ 
171a8(rgyud): kha sbyar thabs dang shes rab ste// 'dzag dang 'bar ba gnyis med yin// 'khor lo bzhi ni sku bzhi ste// drug ni de nyid drug yin te// sgrol ma rlung gi de nyid de// me ni gos dkar ngo ba nyid// bcu drug stong pa bcu
171b1(rgyud): drug yin// bzhi ni ye shes bzhi yin no// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad dang // rig sngags snyoms 'jug phra ba dgu// ye shes lnga bcu la sogs pa// rtsa 'ad ba de nyid yin/ 
171b2(rgyud): par nges// rje de gnas pa'i rim pa yang // 'khor lo ba thag khug pa las// g.yas g.yon sbrul ltar 'khril ba ste// phyi yi g.yas g.yon gzhu lta bu// gsum pa'i dbang gi de nyid kyang // sih+la shes pa
171b3(rgyud): chos dbyings te// ga pur thabs kyi ye shes bzhi// rtsa ni 'og man gnas yin te// dga' bo mchog dga' byang chub phyogs// rang bzhin dga' ba chos sku ste// bral ba'i dga' ba gzugs sku gnyis// 
171b4(rgyud): bcu drug stong pa bcu drug// rgyud kyi tshul du sgyu ma tsam// gang zhig da rang rig 'dod pas kyang // dang por ngo bor shes bya ste// dan ngas de nyid shes par bya// gal te de nyid mi shes par// zab mo
171b5(rgyud): lam nyid sgom byed na// 'bras bu med cing brlag par ngas// lha yi de nyid ma shes na// dur khrod gnas pa'i srin po 'dra// / de bzhin dur khrod srin mo 'dra// spyod pa'i de nyid ma shas na/ 
171b6(rgyud): grong khyer gnas pa'i smon pa 'dra// khyi phag srin bu rak+Sha 'dra// phyag mtshan de nyid ma shes na// brgya byin lag na mtshon thogs 'dra// phyag rgya'i de nyid ma shes na// rgyal po bang gi btsun mo 'dra// rlung
171b7(rgyud): gi de nyid ma shas na// brgya byin spyi bo'i dud pa 'dra// rtsa yi de nyid ma shes na// tsan dan shing gi sbrul sogs 'dra// lus kyi gnyer ma dag dang 'dra// lus kyi dri ma chu dang 'dra// thig le'i de nyid ma shes/ 
171b8(rgyud): natsan dan shing gi 'dzar ba 'dra// 'khor lo di nyid ma shes na// brgya byin lag na 'khor lo 'dra// de bzhin sred pa'i 'khor lo 'dra// pad+ma'i de nyid ma shes na// 'dam bu tshal gyi pad+ma 'dra// stug po 'di ni/ 
172a1(rgyud): ma shes na// mchod rten gyi ni 'khor lo 'dra// kha stor de nyid ma shes na// thal mo g.yas g.yon sbyar ba 'dra// gnas kyi de nyi ma shes na// 'khor lo sbyar rgyal po zang 'dra khru/ 
172a2(rgyud): sems de nyid ma shes na// me gtsang stsa la lug pa 'dra// se rba'i de 'a mi shes na// mtshon sa gas las byung khrag dang 'dra// dgra' ba'i di nyi ma shes na// srad 'tshangs so 'dod chags dra// ts+tsha/ 
172a3(rgyud): bya'i de nyid ma shes na// grong khyer med pa'i rgyal po 'dra// gnyen po'i di nyid ma shes na// rgyal po med pa'i gleng khyer 'dra// rang rig de nyid ma shes na// 'dus byas rnam pa' stong ba 'dra// gzhan yang de ni/ 
172a4(rgyud): bco brgyad ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// thams cad sgra ma'i tshul dang ni// rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu// de nyid san grol bar 'gyur// kye bo mgon po thugs rje ma// rang rig sa/ 
172a5(rgyud): shes tshol ba la// rang dang gzhan gyi sde bo la// 'di la khyod par med dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyad par chen po de nyid de// gzhan ni khyad par dbang bzhi dang / 
172a6(rgyud): de yi lam gyi de nyid brtags// chad pa bdag dang dbang phyug dang // phya dang byed pa po nyid las// rgya sogs rgyud las khyad par 'phags// gang zag bdag dang bral ba'i phyir// nyan thos rang rgyal theg chen da/ 
172a7(rgyud): rlung sogs chos kyi bdag gis bcings// dman pa rnams kyi snang bas khyab// thag chen rang bzhin lnga yis khyad// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po sogs// de nyid kyi ni khyad par che// legs par bstan
172a8(rgyud): gyis legs par rung // de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing yid rangs par gyur to// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes gsang ba 'di kho na nyid kyi rgyal po rdzogaso// rnal 'byor ma tsan+da mA le/ 
172b1(rgyud): dang lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgyu gar skad du/ shrIdz+nyA na mA la tan+t+ra dz+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal lo// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ma
172b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// kye lags gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba bla na med pa yi// lta bzhes pa gang zhig lags// spyod pa gang dang gang lags pa// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'dra
172b3(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// lta ba shes rab pha rol phyin// gdod nas spros bral lhun gyis grub// rang rig ye shes dbyings nas gsal// ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa med// shes rab snying po rtser byung ba// 
172b4(rgyud): lta ba kun gyi yang rtse yin// don dmar rang rig ye shes la// dablang ba med cing dor ba med// dman dang gya non gnyis ka me dang // sgom pa po mid bsgom bya med// dmigs med gnas snying rje
172b5(rgyud): dang / dmigs med gnasu shes rab gnyis// blo dang ldan cig/ gcig gyur pa// na mkhar na mkha'i rang bzhin no// rang rig/ ye shes gang 'dod pas// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog sgom pa min// 
172b6(rgyud): dman pa rnams la skur mi gdab// de nyid la yang sgro mi gdags// dang por bskal par sgom pa dang // rang rig skad cig thob pa gnyis// brgya stong la sogs char mi phod// dpe dang bgrang bar mi nus
172b7(rgyud): te/ dper na mtsho dang rlabs rjes bzhin// dngos po sgom pa sgom pa min// dngos dang dngos med ro mnyam na// ma bsgoms na yang sgom pa nyid// sgom dang mi sgom gnyis ka med// 'od gsal de la sems zin na// 
172b8(rgyud): gzung 'dzin dgra yi dpung rnams 'joms// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i// dpa' bo mkha 'gro mchod pa'i gnas// rab kyis mnyam gzhag rjes thob spang // 'bring gis rjes thob stong pam
173a1(rgyud): blta// tha mas rjes thob sgyu mar blta// seng ge lta bu'i lha spyod ni// bzhi pa yin par nga yis gsungs// de nas spyod pa'i rgyal po bshad// spyod pa rnam pa gsum yin te// kun tu/ 
173a2(rgyud): bzang po 'bu su ku// a ba d+hU ti gsum yin// sbrid pa'i dus dang gnas dang zas// gang zag dang ni dbye ba dang // ngo bo dang ni tshad dang yang // thabs dang dgongs pa dgos pa dang // mkhas pas kun la
173a3(rgyud): sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// rin chen rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs// las kyi rigs dang spyod pa lnga// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa lnga// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yin// sdom pa gsum la
173a4(rgyud): gnas pa dang // dkon mchog gsum ni 'dzin pa dag/ sangs rgya das kyi ni mchog gi spyod// rdo rje dril bu phyog rgya 'dzin// bla ma 'dzin pa rdo rje'i spyod// dam tshig yid 'ong dus bzhi ru// sbyin pa
173a5(rgyud): rnam bzhi rin chen spyod// theg pa gsum dang dam chos 'dzin / pad+ma gar gyi spyod pa yin// dam tshig thams cad ldan ba dang // ma grol la sogs dgrol ba yin// rta yi rgyal po'i// 
173a6(rgyud): spyod pa ni// zab nyal ba 'chag pa gsum// rnal 'byor chen pos gnas bya ste// g.yeng bas g.yeng ba spong ba ni// 'bu su ku yi spyod pa'o// rgyan 'chang ba dang bdud rtsi myang // phyag rgya bsten dang rnam pa
173a7(rgyud): gsum// a ba d+hU ti'i spyod pa ste// rgyan la drug sde phyag rgya lnga// bdud rtsi bcu ste ma gtsang bas// mi gtsang 'khrud pa'i spyod pa'o// gnas ni kha na ma tho med// phye nang g.yeng med gnas yin no// rtog pa
173a8(rgyud): 'joms pa slob pa'i dag/ grub na rdzu 'phrul ston pa'i dus// thabs ni gzhan gyis mthong ba dang // sgo dang skur ba med pa'o// dgongs pa mnyan pa'i stobs yin te// rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa dang / su/ 
173b1(rgyud): rngu'i kha zas ma yin te// bla ma'i dus thabs legs bsten blang // kha zas rnam rtog chung ba yi// las dang po yis bya bar gsungs// dbye ba gsum dang bye brag ni// gong du gsungs pa kho na'o// ngo bo rtog
173b2(rgyud): med sems de nyid// gtsang sme 'gags dang sprul pa ston// 'di nyid grub pa'i tshad yin no// dgos pa la yang gnyis yod de// gtsang sbra spangs pa'i dgos pa las// dgos pa dngos la rnam pa bzhi// rang
173b3(rgyud): sems brtan g.yo brtag pa dang // phyag rgya khyad par tshol ba dang // des 'dul gang zag bzhug pa dang // mi mos skur pa dgag pa'o// gsang sngags rgyal po'i lha spyod kyis// 'khor gyi dpa' bo mkha'
173b4(rgyud): 'gro tshogs// dus dang brgyal dang 'gyes gyur pas// dbugs dbyung ba yi ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad dran pa slar rnyed nas/ thams cad mgrin gcig 'di skad gsol// dngos po ro mnyam
173b5(rgyud): gyur pa yi// lta ba 'di yang ngo mtshar che// g.yeng bas g.yang ba spong ba yi// spyod pa 'di yang mtshar che// chos rnams spong ba ra ro mnyam na// lha dang mi lta ga la yod// gtsang sme bdud rtsin
173b6(rgyud): gcig la// spyod dang mi sprod ga la yod// dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje 'dzin// mnyam gzhag rjes thob ga la yod// thams cad sems kyi ngo bo la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ga la yod// 'jigs byed chen pos
173b7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i bsgribs g.yogs kyis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// zla ba rab rib sal byed de// mig gi rang gi rdul ma mthong // sems kyi de nyid
173b8(rgyud): ma rtogs par// tha dad gzung 'dzin sna tshogs 'dzin// dpyir lta ba'i rgyal po bstan// mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// bdud rtsi'i de nyid ma shes te// gtsang dang mi gtsang la sogs brtags// de phyir spyod pa'i
174a1(rgyud): // rgyal po bstan// gnas pa'i rkyen dang g.yeng ba'i rkyen// de phyir zung 'jug rgyal po bstan// rkyen dang dbang po rab 'bring gis// mnyam gzhag rjes thob rgyal po bstan// mi shes pa
174a2(rgyud): yi rab rib kyis// 'khrul pas gzung 'dzin gnyisu brtags// de phyir sems kyi rgyal po bstan// lha spyod 'di la nan tan gyis// de nas thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas yi rangs te// phyi nang gis mchod pas
174a3(rgyud): mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal ye shes phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po lta spyod zung du 'jug pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang // dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
174a4(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza// bod skad du/ dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal kun tuHdazang po la phyag 'tshalo// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas/ ngom
174a5(rgyud): rmad du byung ba yi// rgyud ni gang legs rgyal po gang // ye shes pa nga lags 'bar ba gang // dpal ni gang lags bdag lag sungs// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// dpal ni gnyis
174a6(rgyud): med ye shes te// gnyis med bde chen ro las byung // gzung 'dzin mtha' spangs rang rig go/ sna tshogs mdud pa ye shes che// rang byin rlab pa lte bar te// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsang bar ro// min
174a7(rgyud): mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu ltar// thung ngu gnas shing ring du 'gyur// de nyid drang dang kha dbye dang // rgyas par bya ba gsum yod de// dang por drang ba'i rnam pa yang // 'drongs pa'i tshad ni gsum yod de// skra
174a8(rgyud): gsum yon tan gsum ldan na// sor bzhi phyi ru 'byung bar nges// 'bring la sor gnyis tha ma la// sor dang nas kyi tshad kyis 'byung // sbom phra gzhan skyes phra mo tsam// dang po bya gdong nyid na gnas/ 
174b1(rgyud): rnam thar sor gnyis skye mched bzhi// stong pa bcu drug khams bco brgyad// nyi shu lte bar nyi shu lnga// snying kha ru nI gnas pa'o// sman la sogs pa kun ldan pas// drang ba'i sbyor ba bcom par bya// rnam
174b2(rgyud): snang sku regs bcing po dang // rgyab yol dbul dang mchod pa 'bul// gdan khri dbul dang sku khrus dbul// sman mchod dbul dang me mchod 'bul// de nas rig bya'i mchod pa dbul// kun rdzob lce yi rtse mo
174b3(rgyud): 'am khro mo mdzub mo'i rtse mo la// bdud rtsi rol bu legs byas te// mkhas par reg bya'i mchod pa 'bul// mngon du shes pa gdon mi ga// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// khams gsum mchod par
174b4(rgyud): gdon mi za// dar ram men tri sor bzhi'i tshad// rked par skur gas dbul bar bya// sprul pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gnyis// ras bal la sogs rgyab yol dbul// shing bu rigs dang 'bru/ 
174b5(rgyud): ba yi// sbom phra rigs kyi bdag po tsam// dri med sman dang bas ma ldan pa'i// zung rdum bskyed mched rdzas kyis// 9 na'i lam du mchod// dri zhim chu yaM khrus byas te// khrus kyis
174b6(rgyud): lus la mchod pa 'bul// sman dang snam gyi phye ma yis// sgo gnyis dag tu mchod pa 'bul// roshini tu dro ba'i me dag gis// gtum mo'i mel mchod pa 'bul// rked pa'i tshang monyam ka ti/ ka/ gdan
174b7(rgyud): khri bsgrub pa'i mchod pa 'dul// de yi sa 'drangs par gdon ma za// de nas rgyas par bya ba yang // gzhan ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma kun// rgyas par byed pa'i lam yin te// rgyas/ 
174b8(rgyud): papa'i sbyar ba gsum byas na// dper na me tog padre bzhin// de nas dbye ba'i rim pa yang // gang du gsungs pa thun mong ste// dus gsum lce yi rna mos kyang // bskyed na ngas par lo 'byed do// de nyid gsung na
175a1(rgyud): me rang bzhin// me 'bar ba yi rkyen gyur pa// rlung nyid yin par gsungs pa ste// rkyen des me nyid 'bar bar bshad// gzhan yang rkyen gyi bye drag dang // srog rtsol rlung nr-i dbu ma
175a2(rgyud): dgag/ bum pa zhabs med rlung dul nas// sgo dgu phyi rol drag tu rung // lus kyi ngal dub cha ba snams te// sbyor ba rdzogs na bde ba'i rkyen// bde ba las rdo rdo rje 'chang // bde ba yas ni bde ba'i grub
