175a3(rgyud): rgyu bde ba las 'bras bu bde// rgyu yi nang na 'di mchog la// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog go// de nas bde ba'i rkyen gyur pa// srid pa dgag dang rlung dgag pa// gnas nas gnas rten gzung ste// g.yas
175a4(rgyud): brkyang bas ni ro ma dgag/ dpa' bo g.yas nas mkha'agro ga/ yon// g.yon brkyang bas ni rkyang ma ste// sa gas kun dang ma ru gzung // de bzhin zlum pos dbu mar gzung // de dag kun
175a5(rgyud): gyi bye brag kyang // dpa' bos g.yas dang gzhan gyis g.yon// / de bzhin kun la sbyar bar bya// gzhan yang gzung ba'i bye brag kyang // dril can bu gu dgu lam gyi// rlung rgyu phyi ru bus
175a6(rgyud): byas te// rkang lag drug tu bsgrims byas na// zin par 'di la the tsom med// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma gnyis kyis// thun mong du ni bya bar gsungs// ba ro tsa na las kyi rlung // gzhan yang lam brgyad rlung
175a7(rgyud): rnams dag/ dang po nyid du bsdams byas na// zin par 'di la the tsom med// dbye ba bsdams pa'i man ngag go// byed pa spel mar song gyur na// mi zin pa la the tsom med// gnas gsum dag tu kA bsams
175a8(rgyud): te/ dbugs gsum pa yis yar drangs te// lte ba'i gyen la drangs kyang zin// 'di ni gang zag mchog gis yin// mdzes pa'i spyi bo de nyid la// gyen du bkan dang thur du bkan// drang por g.yas gas
175b1(rgyud): btsan thabs la// ka ti'i gzer ni bcan thabs gcig/ sbom po khro mos mnan pa ste// bla ma'i zhal nas ma blangs na// lus kyi nang bzhi kun nas skye// chu skyes chu so sbyangs la sogs// lus smad na/ 
175b2(rgyud): sna nyi shu 'byung // gzhan yang btsan thabs bcu gnyis ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// bla ma'i zhal bar bya ba'i phyir// lus srog longs spyod thams cad kyis// dus gsum maN+Dali dang
175b3(rgyud): bcas mchod// lus srog btang bar pangs pa bas// man ngag dam pa de bas pangs// de bas btsan thabs legs par sgo// man ngag chu bo'i rgyun 'dra bas// de nyid rgyun tu shes par bya// zab mo// 
175b4(rgyud): don ston rgyal por gsungs// rdo rje bag mo la sogs rnams // gsang ba'i gsang ba smang byung gi khyod la gtad do ngas nga du skas// kun la spel na dam tshig nyams// kye ma rgyud kyi don
175b5(rgyud): 'di la// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i // dpa' bo mkha 'gro ma yi tshogs// thams cad ngom/  skyes te// dga' zhing mgunas yi rang ngo // dpal ye
175b6(rgyud): shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha 'gro ma'i gsang ba las kyang cher gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdzogs// seng gi gling gi rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang // dge slong shAkya ye shes
175b7(rgyud): kyis bsgyur ba'o// @// rgya gar skad du/ shri tsan+da mA la tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal zla ba'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpral phyag 'tshalo// kye tso mgon pa/ 
175b8(rgyud): can/ sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi// nges pa gang lags chad gang lags// rang bzhin grub pa ji ltar lags// mgon pas bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
176a1(rgyud): rang bzhin grub pa sgrub 'dod pa// bla ma'i bka' drin legs mnos te// dus khrod la sogs sa phyogs su// bar chad gsum med yon tan ldan// brtags pa las dang
176a2(rgyud): bopo yi gnas// gang zag mchog la ba rtag tu med// yon tan ldan pa'i sar 'jug ste// bla med sems gzung rnal 'byor pas// sgo gsum ngal ba'i tshad brtag ste// bcing ba gsum ni nges
176a3(rgyud): bsgoms pas// skye ba gcig gis 'grub par nges// dbugs bcing kun rdzob sna rtse yin// yid bcing sor bzhin namakho'i khams// sems bcing rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu rkyen las na sna
176a4(rgyud): tshogs las// sems can mos pa sna tshogs 'byung // de dag bcing gsum dag pa yis// sems can bcings lus nges par grol// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// 'du she
176a5(rgyud): gsum gyi cha las grol// thig le cha gsum phra mo naM/ yan lag lnga ldan 'byung ba'i rim// sgra dang rang rig re rer/ snang // stong nyid thabs dang shes rab tshul// sa dang lam so ga/ 
176a6(rgyud): rim pa kun// rang bzhin gyis gnas mkhas pas sbyar// de nas sgrol ma'i tshad bstan te// tshad ni spyi dang bye brag ste// brgya phrag gnyis dang bcu gnyis dang // yi ge gsum las nges 'byung ba// 
176a7(rgyud): gsang ba gcod pa'i rgyud kyi tshad// brgya phrag gcig dang sum cu lnga// yi ge bcu dgu las byung ba// rin chen phreng ba'i nges pa'i tshad// brgya phrag gcig dang sum cu bzhi// mi 'gyur bcu gsum las
176a8(rgyud): byung ba// sku gsung thugs kyi sgron ma'o// brgyad cu rtsa lnga'o yo ge bzhis// ma tshang ba las gang 'gyur ba// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// brgyad cu rtsa gnyis yi ge gcig/ rin chen 'bar / 
176b1(rgyud): ldang chad do// sum cu rtsa gcig yi ge ni// nyi shu rtsa gnyis las byung ba// na mkha' mnyam pa'i tshad yin no// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi chad// drug cu yi ge nyi shu/ 
176b2(rgyud): gcig/ gsang ba rdo rje rab tu grags// drug cu rtsa gnyis mi 'gyur ba// bcu drug stobs po che yi tshad // bzhi bcu rtsa gcig yi ge lnga// namakha' chen po'i tshad yin no// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug
176b3(rgyud): ye shes 'bar ba'i ljang tshad do// sum cu rtsa drug yi ge dgu/ ye shes phreng ba'i tshad yin no// sum cu rtsa bzhi nyi shu bzhi// mkha 'gro gsang ba'i tshad yin no// sum cu rtsa bzhi bcu bzhi dag/ me yi phreng / 
176b4(rgyud): ba'i tshad yin no// nyi shu rtsa gnyis bco brgyad dag/ ye / sa rgyal ba'i ljang tshad do// bdun cu rtsa brgyad rkang pa phyed/ chags pa'i rgyal po'i chad yin no// tshig su bcad pa nyi shu lnga/ 
176b5(rgyud): ye shes bsam pa'i ljang tshad do// dgu bcu go brgyad las/ byung ba// ye shes gsang ba'i tshad yin no// nyi shu tham padz+ra nga yin pa// gsang ba rdo rje rgyal po'i tshad// brgya dang nyi shu rtsa
176b6(rgyud): gnyis ni// rdo rje rgyal po ra li'i tshad // lnga bcu rtsa gsum yi ge bcu// dur khrod brgyan gyi ldang tshad do// sum cu rtsa gsum yi ge ni// bcu drug ma 'gro ma sdom tshad// lnga bcu yi ge bco lnga las// b+huH
176b7(rgyud): ba gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyal// bzhi bcu yi ge nyi shu bzhi// nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i gzhung tshad do// sum cu yi ge bcu drug las// byung ba zla ba'i phreng tshad do// de nas nges par bshad bya ste// gsang ba'i
176b8(rgyud): 'khor lo gang ston pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dag/ ston pa dam tshig chen por nges// dgra drug ston pa stobs po che// dbang bzhi dgag sgrub gsang ba gcod// rang rig de ston bsam mi khyab/ 
177a1(rgyud): / yi ge gsum ston rin chen 'bar// sgo gsum lam ston na mkha' mnyam// bcom ldan la sogs the tsom med// ston pa na mkha' chen po ste// dbang bzhi'i de nyid gang ston pa// 
177a2(rgyud): shes gsang ba'i rgyud du nges// lha spyod rmad du gang byung ba// ston pa ye shes phreng bar nges// gleng bslang rnam pa lnga yi don// ston pa mkha'agro gsang ba'i rgyud// he ru ka dpal gang ston pa// me yi phreng ba'i/ 
177a3(rgyud): rgyud du grags// dbang gsum don ni gang ston pa// sku gsung thugs kyi ra li ra ngas// snod bcud rin chen ston byed pa// rin chen phreng ba'i ra lir nges// lhan cig skyes ston ye shes bsam// rdo rje rnyog
177a4(rgyud): pa med pa'o// lha yi de nyid gang ston pa// chags pa'i rgyal po dar lir nges// nges pa lnga ston rdo rje rgyal// ri gi a ra li zhes grags// dur khrod brgyad ston dur khrod rgyan// dam tshig ston pa
177a5(rgyud): mkha' gro gsum// ston pa mkha' gro sdom pa'o// dkyil 'khra ra la sogs drug ston pa// gsang ba bdud brtsi'i rgyal po ma/ 'khrul pa 'khrul bzhi de bsad pa// gsum ston ye shes
177a6(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rgyud// ma spangs nges ston nyi 'khor lo// tshad nges sgrub gsum ston zla phreng // rgyud sogs lnga ston ye shes 'bar// de nas 'khor thams cad dga' nas rgyud thams cad kyi don la yi rang ba
177a7(rgyud): gyur to// dpal zla ba'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
177a8(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI rit+na dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpel kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tsha lo// he he rdo rje snying po dang // mal
177b1(rgyud): 'gro ma la sogs pa dag/ sgo gsum legs par bsdus nas ni// ra li chen po'i dbye ba nyon// la las byung ba thabs kyi rgyud// ra las byung ba shes rab rgyud// i phyis a las gnyis med rgyud/ 
177b2(rgyud): thabs ni skra ste shes rab gsung // gnyis med thugs su shes par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las// nyi shu rtsa ba ni byung ba'o// a la la co i ma'o// thabs ni la las ji ltar byung / 
177b3(rgyud): ra las shes rab ji ltar byung // a las gnyis med ji ltar byung // sku gsung thugasu ji ltar 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa bzhir ji ltar dbye// a ma ho mgon pos bshad du gsol// 'jigs byed chen pos
177b4(rgyud): bka' stsal ba// a las a ba d+hU ti ste// 'di nyid las ni gnyiras med rgyud// 'byung ba'i gnas dang rgyu ru brtag/ la las la la nA yi rtsa// de las thabs kyi rgyud byung ba'i// rgyu dang gnas
177b5(rgyud): dang ngo bor brtag/ ra la sa ra sa nA yi rtsa// 'di nyid las ni shas rab kyi// ra li 'byung ba'i rgyud dang gnas// ran chags pa ra shes rab ste// shes rab yi ga bcu drug brda// la ni nub
177b6(rgyud): phyir thabs yin te// thabs kyi yi ge bcu bzhi'i brda// thog ma med nas ma skyes dang // e na gnyis mad rang bzhin te// gnyis med blo yi spyod yul min// blo dang sgra ni kun rdzob phyir// g.yas
177b7(rgyud): ni thabs yin la la nA// g.yon pa shes rab ra sa nA// a ba d+hU ti gnyisu meng // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med kyi// ra la'i ngo bo shes par bya// 'dod chags rdul la lus ni thabs// la lan ni
177b8(rgyud): sku yin te// gti muge mun pa ngag dang yang // shes rab ra sa nA ni gsung // zhe sdang snying stobs yid yin te// sku gsung thugs kyi 'gyur ba'o// sku la brgyad de gsung la brgyad// thugs la brgyad do nyi shu/ 
178a1(rgyud): / bzhi// ra li nyi shu bzhi ru ngas// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang // tsaN+Da li dang phyag dag dang // mkha 'gro 'byung po nyi shu bzhi// de nyid brda ru nges pa ste// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas/ 
178a2(rgyud): gnas dang mkha'agro ra li dbye// sku gsum du ni de nyid bsdu// dang por rgyud kyi nges pa dang // sa yi gnas dang gnas nges pa// gtad sa nges dang go rims nges// grangs nges rigs nges bco lngar nges// 
178a3(rgyud): mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa yi// dman pa'i rin pa dang por gsungs// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// de rjes rnal 'byor nyid yin te// skyes pa 'dul phyir rnal 'byor rgyud// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma
178a4(rgyud): rgyud ni// bud med yongasu bzung phyir ro// dang po rtsa ba'i rgyud gsungs te// de nas bshad pa'i rgyud nyid do// de nas rgyud ni/ phyi ma'o// de rjes phyi ma'i phyi ma ste// rim pa bcu ni bskor ba
178a5(rgyud): ste/ snod ngan dman pa'i rim pas gsungs// me tog snying po'i bcud bzhin du// phyi yi phyi nas bdud rtsi yi// ra li'i snying po snying po rgyud// dang por l-i las sku yi rgyud// dpa' bo
178a6(rgyud): mkha'agro mas zhus nas// sku yi mkha'agro brgyad la gtad // de rjes ra las gsung gi rgyud// gsung gi mekha 'gro brgyad la gtad// phyi nas a las thugs kyi rgyud// thugs kyi mkha 'gro brgyad la
178a7(rgyud): gtad // gnyis med ya shes bdud rtsi'i ro// lus las lus gsal mig gi lus// gsal ba'i phyir ni sgron ma ste// seng ge'i gzugs 'dra bdud rtsi'i ro// nyi ma'i 'od 'dra zla ba'i zer// 'brug gi sgra
178a8(rgyud): 'dra rgya mtsho'i gting // chu bo'i rgyun 'dra ri rab lhun// u dum par 'dra'i zhing gi rdul// 'di la 'dod 'dod tshol ba dang // rtog ge ba yis dpyad du med// gal te rang 'dod dpyad gyur na// dpa' bo mkha 'gro
178b1(rgyud): khros gyur te// mgo lus chal ba brgya ru 'gas// de bas rang gi chung ma dang // bu dang yul 'khor lus ngag gis// bla ma dam pa mnyes bya ste// chu ba'i rgyun 'dra'i man ngag blang // kye ma'o mgon/ 
178b2(rgyud): bo stong rje can// ra la'i dbye ba de ltar na// de yi chen po ji ltar lags// nang du nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi// nges pa slar yang bdag la gsungs// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// ma spangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// 
178b3(rgyud): ral 'di ni chen por nges// re re la yang chen po bdun// gang zhig 'bras bu 'dod pa la// rgyu nyid gtso bor gyur pa ste// sa lu las ni myu gu bzhin// de phyir dang po rgyu mi spang // lhan cig skyes gnyis/ 
178b4(rgyud): rgyu yin te// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang // lhan cig ldan cig skyes pa'o// thun mong dang ni thun mong min// bla mal/ la nas shes bya'i phyir// dpa' bo mkha 'grore zhol yin te// 
178b5(rgyud): de nyid ston pa'i bka' las 'das// de las 'khrul pa seM / rje// phung sogs rtsa dang shu kra ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu yin te// l-ig tog 'khrul pa rgyur 'dod dang // ngo ba ma grub/ 
178b6(rgyud): rgyur 'dod dang // kun rdzob byang sems rgyur 'dod pa// 'di ni rmongs pa ma rungs pa// phung po 'byung ba dbang po dang // phyi yi skye mched dman pa'i rgyu// brtags pa rgyur 'dod snying re rje// na mkha'i ma
178b7(rgyud): tig gi dri gang // rang bzhin gnas pa'i rtsa rlung sogs// khyad par lam gyi rgyu yin te// rang bzhin gnas pa ma shes par// log par rtogs pa snying rje nyams// don dam byang chub sems kyis ni// 
178b8(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rgyu// bla ma ma brtan de las 'khrul// kun rdzob shu kra rgyur 'dod pa// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'o// rkyen med rgyu yis 'bras mi byin// de phyir rkyen ni spang mi bya// ye she/ 
179a1(rgyud): // rlung dang ye shes me// lhan skyes gnyis med rkyen yin te// de nyid spang bar mi bya zhing // las kyi rlung dang med nyid dang // gzhan du'ang de nyid sbyar bya dang // srid pa len dang bde ba len// 
179a2(rgyud): las mi spang zhing bde ba yang // mi spang ba ni bzhi pa'o// lus dang lus kyi snying po rtsa// gnas dang gnas chen mi spang ba// lnga pa drug pa yin par 'dod// de nyid phyi dang nang du shes// phyi ni dbye ba ma spangs
179a3(rgyud): pa'o/  snang ba dang ni mun pa'i cha// gang ba dang ni stong pa'i cha// 'pho ba ma spangs brgyad pa'o// rgyu yi gnas dang 'bras bu'i gnas// de nyid mi spang shes par bya// rin po che yi pho brang du// rten ni mi
179a4(rgyud): spang shu kri gzung // gal te de ru ma zin na// shor ba mi spang daro mar bstim// gnyen po mi spang gzugs sku gnyis// ma spangs pa ni bcu gnyis pa'o// nor bu'i rten las skyes pa yi// 
179a5(rgyud): bde ba la rten dbang po yi// sgo bsdu ngo bo ma spangs pa'o// rga 'og khyad par shes byas nas// sgyu mas gnyen po ma sa ngas pa'o// dga' ba mchog dga' shes byas te// sngon du 'gra/ 
179a6(rgyud): ba ma spangs pa'o// 'khor ba lugs las bzlog bya ste// gnas nas gnasu bzlog byed pa// gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid rim par 'pho byed pa// bla ma'i bla ma las brgyud shes// / 
179a7(rgyud): 'khor ba'i 'jig ldog bye brag ni// 'pho ba ma spangs rnam pa gnyis// ye shes ma ni cher 'bar bas// phung po 'byung po dbang po sogs// thams cad bdud brtsir gyur pa ni// rkyen gyi khyad par ma
179a8(rgyud): spangs pa'o// lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang // brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun// bde ba'i ngo bor gang snang ba// ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin meng // gnyen po'i khyod par ma sbas
179b1(rgyud): ba'o// bzhin mdzes mig yangs phyag rgya ni// ldan pa phyag rgya ma spangs pa'o// dam tshig chos kyi phyag rgya dang // de nas ye shes phyag rgya che// phyag rgya'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// chags pa'i phyag
179b2(rgyud): rgya las yin te// dam tshig chos ni ma ning gi/ phyag rgya gnyis su shes par bya// ye shes phyag rgya chen po gnyis// grol ba'i phyag rgya yin par 'dod// phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang por
179b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i 'khor lor te// phyi nas rang bzhin 'khor lor yin// 'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang por gsang ba'i gtum mo ste// gnyis par rang bzhin gau tum mo ni// gtum mo'i dbye ba
179b4(rgyud): ma spangs pa'o// las kyi rlung dang me gnyis ni// kun rdzob 'a khor ba'i rkyen yin te// ye shes rlung dang me gnyis ni// do na dam gnyis med rkyen yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// 
179b5(rgyud): srid pa bskyed cing 'dzag pa bde// kun rdzob shu kra'i las yin no// srid pa mi len rang rig skyes// don dam byang sa mas las yin no// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// sbyor thabs
179b6(rgyud): na ni rgyas pa dang // kha 'byed pa yi yis yin to// sbyor thabs bzhi la ma rmongs pa// 'di ni ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// spyi thun las las grub pa yi// mi drug la sogs grangs kyis bstan// rang rtsi/ 
179b7(rgyud): ye shes gang 'dod pas// bla ma'i dus thabs legs bsten te// mi spang nges pa'i gdam ngag blang // 'don rdo rje 'chang gi rgyu// de las byung ba khyad par 'bras// dang por cha ste thig le dang // chug
179b8(rgyud): dang tshul can mchog gzhan mchog/ 'di nyid de nyid drug yin te// de ny-id drug ni na tul// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// tsaN+Da la~M ni nyi shu pa kau/ ra la nyi shu rtsa bzhi nges// phyi ru gnas ni nyi shu bani// 
180a1(rgyud): spyan dang phyag rgya nyi shu bzhi// tsaN+Da li dang ra li yi// phyi dang nang du gragasu nges// he he dpa' bo rdo rje 'chang // ra li'i 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags// ra li'i ngo bo gang gang lags// bcoM
180a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sku dang phyag mtshan rags pa kun// ra li'i ngo bo dman pa'i lam// mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod// sa gsum la gnas khyad par gyi// ra li'i ngo bor gsungs pa
180a3(rgyud): yin/ dga' ba bcu drug rten dang bcas// zab pa'i ra li'i ngo bor brtag/ rang rig stong pa thabs dang bcas// mthar thug ro lir shes par bya// a ni thog mar ma skyes pa// la ni nub dang skyong ba
180a4(rgyud): skye ra ni chags dang rin po che// ra las 'dod chags khrag yi na te// la las zhe sdang khu ba'o// a las gti mug khu ba ste// sems can ra li'i rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga dang sa bcu
180a5(rgyud): sogs// kun la ldan pas ra lir gnas// sku yi ra li spyi bo yi// gtsug tor dag las byung ba'o// gsung ni ljags kyi dbang po las// thugs kyi ra li thugs kanas// byung ba rnam
180a6(rgyud): par nges pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// spyan rnams la ni rang bzhin byung // sku gsung thugs kyi gnas la ste// spyi bo la sogs dag las byung // phyag gi mthil nas rim pas byung // bla ma'i
180a7(rgyud): zhal nas blang bar bye// bye brag 'byung ba'i sgo yin to// he he sems can sangs rgyas kyi// rang bzhin sa dang lam ldan ste// zla bo bcu sogs sa sogs ni// brdzus skyes la sogs ji ltar lags// 'on te/ 
180a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas min nam ci// sems can thams cad gdod ma nas// sangs rgyas yin par gsungs pa ste// brdzus skyes sgong skyes drod gsher sogs// sems kyi gnas bcus bcu ste// rnam shes brgya
180b1(rgyud): ni byang chub lnga// mkhan po sems kyi rgyal po ste// rang bzhin dag pa chos gos yin// rang bzhin gnas pa kha spu bregs// a dang haM gnyis sngags kyi don// thams cad sems la gnas pa ste// 
180b2(rgyud): sems med sangs rgyas ma yin te// ngam grog la sogs bems po yi// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul dang yang // bag
180b3(rgyud): la nyal dang kun du rgyu// nus pa'i tshul dang mngon sum tshul// gzugs can gzugs med mkhas pas brtag/ sangs rgyas sems can de bzhin no// de ltar sems can sangs rgyas pas// ra li sam
180b4(rgyud): can rang bzhin phyir// lus la sku yi phyag rgyas gdab// ngag la gsung gi phyag rgyas gdab// sems la thugs kyi phyagargyas gdab// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du// dngos por
180b5(rgyud): mnyam gyur pa las// sangs rgyas sems can ga la yod// da man dang gya nom ga la yod// 'khor ba yongasu shes pa la// / mya ngan 'das zhes de la brjod// thams cad 'jigs dang rna
180b6(rgyud): rtog spong // 'di la thams cad ngo mtshar gyis// legs par gtad kyis dam du spos// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te mi snang bar gyur to// dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal
180b7(rgyud): po rdzogaso// / rnal 'byor ma zla ba'i phreng ba dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @6// rgya gar skad du/ shrI sUr+ya tsakra
180b8(rgyud): tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma// bod skad du/ dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// dpal bde bo chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho dpa' bo skye// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi// bskyeng dang / 
181a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po ste// ma spangs pa dang nges pa dag/ mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po ma spangs bshad bya ste// phung po la
181a2(rgyud): dang skye mched dag/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rgyu ma spangs// phyag mtshan nyi zla yig 'bru dang // bla ma'i man ngag rkyen ma spangs// lus ngag sgo bsdams dam tshig las// sku gnyis 'byung ba 'bras ma spangs// / 
181a3(rgyud): zhe sdang ru drar skye ba'i las// zhe sdangar rig bskyed pa dang // lus kyi dri ma 'khrud pa las// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// pu li ra dang dza lan sogs// nang du spyi bo spyi gtsug sogs// gnas kyi dbye ba ma/ 
181a4(rgyud): spangs pa'o// shar sogs bdud kyi snying ka ru// zhabs gnas gnas chen ma spangs pa// gnas de phyi dang nang du shes// gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa bzhi
181a5(rgyud): phung sogs lnga ru 'pho byed na// 'di ni 'pho ba ma spangs pa'o// / rgyu yi gnas ni snying ka ste// 'bras bu'i gnas ni phung sog/ sa te// ma spangs pa ni gnyisu shas// phung sogs sgyu mar 'dzin
181a6(rgyud): byed pa// 'di ni rten pa mi spangs pa'o// gal te nang du ma zin na// phyo ru de nyid ngo bor sgom// de nyid shor ba ma spangs pa'o// gnyen po ma spangs sgyu mar sgom// pung sogs la rten lha rnams la// sgo gsum
181a7(rgyud): ngo bo ma spangs pa// tha mal pa dang bskyed rim gnyis// gong 'og khyad par shes bya ste// sgyu mas gnyen po ma spangs pa'o// bdun po rnams de ga la sogs pa// sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// phung
181a8(rgyud): sogs rtog pa las log nas// phra bo'i gnas su gnas pa byed// gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// lha yi rnam par 'jug pa dang // gong du sbyar mar bzlog pa gnyis// 'pho ba'i khyad par ma spangs
181b1(rgyud): nyid la ye shes me ni cher 'bar te// phung sogs sgyu mar gang 'dzin pa// rten gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun 'gags te// thams cad rten dang rten par snang // ngo ba khyad par
181b2(rgyud): ma spangs pa// de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// shes rab phag mo ma spangs pa// phyag rgya ma spangs pa ru 'dod// ma spangs gcig ni gzhan dang 'dra// gong 'og las
181b3(rgyud): kyi khyad par ro// zhe sdang thugs la 'dod chags gsung // gti mug sku yi phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs 'khor lo// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dag/ 'khor lo'i
181b4(rgyud): dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang po sgyu ma'i ye shes me// gnyis pa ri sgyu ma ltar snang me// gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// phung sogs sgyu ma las g.yo zhing // phung sogs sgyu mas yang
181b5(rgyud): dag sreg/ kun rdzob rtogs pa'i rkyen yin te// sgyu ma ltar/ snang las g.yo zhing // sgyu ma de nyid ltar bsregs pa// don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs/ 
181b6(rgyud): pa'o// 'khor ba spel zhing rnam rtog bskyed// kun rdzob bden pa sems kyi las// 'khor ba'i mi 'khos rig bskyed// don dam sems kyi las yin te// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa// 'di dag ma
181b7(rgyud): spangs nyi shu brgyad// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa'o// gsang dbang bla ma'i zhal nas blang // shes rab ye shes gzhan du'o// bzhi pa'i ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// rang rig lhan cig skyes pa yi// chos
181b8(rgyud): nyid ma dag bzhi pa'i rgyu// zhal gyi man ngag rkyen ma spangs// 'gro ba'i chos rnams rang rig mes// bsregs pa las ma spongs pa yin// gong 'og rim pas dbye ma spangs// a ba d+hU ti 'og min gan/ 
182a1(rgyud): gnas dang gnas chen ma spangs pa// de nyid phye dang nang du nges// phyi nang dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// stong pa dang ni gzung 'dzin char// 'thob ma spangs a dang rtsa// rten ma spangs / 
182a2(rgyud): rtog pa la// sems 'phros de nyid rang rig sgom// shor ba ma spangs par rig pa// dbang po'i sgo bsdu ngo ma spangs// rtog bcom gnyen po ma spangs pa// rang rig spyi la sems dpa' las// sngon du
182a3(rgyud): ma spangs ma spangs brgyad// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// spyi dang rang rig mtshan nyid la// 'pho ba ma spangs rang rig sgom// phyag rgya ma spangs rang rig las// phrin las nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'byung // 
182a4(rgyud): las ma spangs te gzhan rnams ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// dad med bla ma ma bsten dang // bla ma dam pa ma rA da dang // ma spangs ngo bor ma shes par// rang rig 'bras bu ga
182a5(rgyud): 'dod pa// de dag mi shes dri mas bsgribs// dper na sbrul gyi 'o ma bzhin// de nas nges pa bco lnga yang // rgyu dang rkyen dang gnas dang yang // gtad pa go rims grangs dang rim// nges pa
182a6(rgyud): bdun ni gzhan du gsungs// sngags ni spros bcas spros med des// rkyen ni ye shes me rlung nges// rgyu 'bras gnas ni a haM nges// dbang bzhi gong 'og khyad par nges// sun 'byin gnyis po nges pa dang / 
182a7(rgyud): ngo bo nges dang dbye ba nges// las nges pa dang bco lnga ste// de las byung ba'i nges pa dag/ bcu bdun bla ma'i zhal nas shes// ma spangs pa dang nges pa yi// mtshan nyid yongasu shes gyur na// 'khrul pa dang / 
182a8(rgyud): ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// thams cad 'di yis spong bar byed// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // gong bu chu dang gzugasu gnas// de bzhin gzugs las
182b1(rgyud): 'das pa ste// gnas pa rnam pa bzhi ru yang // rgyud ni nges pa kho na ste// rgyud ni dbang po'i ngo bor gnas// de phyir dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // 'bad pas bla ma mnyes bya ste// rgyud kyi ngo bo dbang
182b2(rgyud): rnams dang // de yi man ngag shes par bya// bla ma mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs byed pa ni// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// de bas 'bad de
182b3(rgyud): nan tan bya// dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// / rgya gar gyis khan po ga ya d+ha ra dang // lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
182b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na rA dza tAn+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal badri ba chen po la phyaga'atsha lo// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas/ 
182b5(rgyud): ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs// gang phyir sems can tham/ sa cad kyis// mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir// dad dang brtso na 'grus rdzogs byas te// bla ma'i rjesu 'jug par bya// rang rig
182b6(rgyud): gnyisu med pa la// gzhan rig gnyi su 'dzin pas 'khrul// bzad nas ma skyes ma grub la// skye dang grub par 'dzin pas 'khrul// dngos pa ro mnyam gyur pa la// dman dang gya nom 'dzin pas 'khrur
182b7(rgyud): 'khor ba yongasu shes pa nyid// mya ngan 'das par brjod pa la// sangs rgyaso sems can rtog pas 'khrul// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa la// rgyu dang rkyen gyis skye bas 'khrul// brda dang tha snyad
182b8(rgyud): bral ba la// blo yi spyod yul byed pas 'khrul// mtha' bral dbu mar gnas pa la// rtag dang chad par 'dzin pas 'khrul// shes brjod yul las 'das pa la// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas
183a1(rgyud): 'khrul// dngos po mtshan ma la sogs pa'i// rnam rtog kun gyis stong ba la// dngos por rjesu 'dzin pas 'khrul// rang nyid gnyisu med pa la// bden pa gnyis 'dzin pas 'jun
183a2(rgyud): gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul ba yi// theg pa du ma'i gong 'og la// sgo dang skur pa 'debs pas 'khrul// sems can 'khrul pa sna tshogs kyis// las kyi rnam sman la sogs la// blta bas skur ba 'dengs
183a3(rgyud): pas 'khrul// rang rig gzod nas 'od gsal la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa// rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod pas 'khrul// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// 'dod chags 'dod chags chen po s+ho// 
183a4(rgyud): 'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa las 'das na// 'dod chags chen po ba com ldan 'das// zhe sdang zhe sdang chen po dang // de bzhin/ snang bcom ldan 'das// gti mug gti mug chen po ste// de bzhi
183a5(rgyud): gti mug bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis nges par grol 'gyur gyi/ 'di spangs gzhan gyis grol ba min// bdag po lha dang bla me dbun// bdag po lhan cig rnal 'byor tsam// theg pa spyi
183a6(rgyud): bsdus de las gzhan// skye bo'i bems po che dang brgyad// de dag rang rig thob pa'i rgyu// de phyir dam tshig gtso bor srung // 'bras bu'i khyad par rang rig 'byung // kye ma mgon po kyi sangs rgyas// 'dod chags
183a7(rgyud): dbye ba de ltar na// de yi ngo bo ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la sogs de dang 'dra// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// legs par nyon la yid la zung // las dang las kyi rnam smin gyi// rgyu 'bras mi shes gti mug ste/ 
183a8(rgyud): lus sems kun nas 'khrugs pa dag/ zhe sdang yin te sgo gsum gyis// kun nas bslang ste nor bu'i mthar// sa bon 'byung ba 'dod chagaso// dbang sogs ngo bo gang ma shes// 'dod chags la sogs
183b1(rgyud): chen por ranges// rang rig ngo bo gang la gnas// 'og ma spong ba'i gnyen po ste// ngo bor snga mar gang shes dang // dbang po'i sgo bsdus thabs yin te// gong ma skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i// phyir yang chen po/ 
183b2(rgyud): gyur pa ste// gzhan gyi don du gyur pa dang // de las gzhan dag mos 'gyur dang // mang po me mos spong ba dang // nyon mongs spyi yis zil ma non// bye brag 'dod chagos zhe sdang sogs// zil gyis mi non 'og
183b3(rgyud): ma yi// rnam rtog gang yang mi skye dang // nyon mongs spyi dang bye brag spong // gnyen po yin par nges pa dang // nyon mongs sgra rtso tsam mi skye// gnyis ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// bcu gnyis 'dod chags chen po// 
183b4(rgyud): dag/ bcom ldan 'das su gsungs pa ste// zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin no// zab mo'i lta spyod ma rtogs par// sngags spyod bzlas pa la sogs byed// de dag ngal ba don med yin// de dag
183b5(rgyud): bla ma dam pa las// man ngag dam pa btsal ba ste// 'phrul pa dang ni 'khrul gzhi las// sad par byed pa'i cho ga blang // de'i tshe rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing rje su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal
183b6(rgyud): ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zlog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang // lo tsA bo dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
183b7(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra DA ki gu s+ya Shan+d+harA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha'agro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// kye ho mngon rdzogs mgon po kye// dbang rnams
183b8(rgyud): dam pa yod dam ci// gtso 'khor khyad par me dam ci// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas lnga// bye brag tha dad med dam ci// dam tshig che chung ji ltar mchis// de nyams gshegs thabs yod dam ci// @6
184a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang // rang rigi ye shes blugs pa'i phyir// dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo ba ru// 
184a2(rgyud): dbang ni nges pa kho na ste// lus ngag kun nas bzang ba la// de phyir sems kyi dri ma ni// 'khrud dang gtor dang sreg pa dang // mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 'byed pas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam/ 
184a3(rgyud): mkha' lta bur gsungs pa ste// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rims kyis ma dgrod dbang mi thob// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la// thabs
184a4(rgyud): 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dam/ mngon par rtogs pa yan lag go// 
184a5(rgyud): 'di yis ngan 'gro srid las grol// dbang dang man ngag 'bra la bso// de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med// 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// slob dpon sems
184a6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po yid// 'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang // 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya// rdo shing 'dra 'bag la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan yongasu rdzogs/ 
184a7(rgyud): pa dang // ras dang mtshon pa la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan yongasu rdzogs pa la// byin rlabs ye shes dbab byas nas// lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te// bcos me la sogs de ltar/ 
184a8(rgyud): na pung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la// ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// bcos ma nye bar bcos ma dang // 'dra ba yin pa/ 
184b1(rgyud): bu yi/  / dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te// 'og pa'i sred pas sred par 'ching // 'khrul pa'i 'khor los 'khor bar 'khor// de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // lnga yi bu yi bdud spangs te/ 
184b2(rgyud): bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// yid ches rigs dang nges pa skye// lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang // 'og ma spangs shing gong ma thob// man ngag tshad ma yin pablang // mos pa'i rje su 'brang byed cing / 
184b3(rgyud): ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing // 'jig rten lnga spyod dang 'dres pa'i// snod bcud blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas kyi khyad par dbus su ste// rgyan gyi khyad par thal ba'o// rigs
184b4(rgyud): kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigs// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // phyag dang zhabs sogs khyad par gyis// gtso bo 'khor las khyad par 'phags// dper na pha rol phyin drug las// 
184b5(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin med na// pha rol phyin pa lta dag gis/ pha rol phyin pa'i ming mi thog/ dkyil 'khor dbusu gang gnas pa'i// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor to// gang zhig dbus
184b6(rgyud): su mi gnas na// 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du mi 'gyur// dper na rgyal po med pa yi// grong dang grong khyer ji bzhin no// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag da/ 
184b7(rgyud): tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sku gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dang ma byin len pa dang // 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta/ 
184b8(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i dam tshig de dang 'dra// tshul 'chos mi dge mos pa tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // bral ba'i rin chen
185a1(rgyud): bdun po de dag gis// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i ming mthob bzhin// bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang // rdul tsam khyad par med
185a2(rgyud): mod kyang // rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag dang // rang sem sa la su rung ba dang // ma rung ba dang las kyi mtha'// log pa dang ni mo log pa// don byed nas dang mi nus pa// yongasu rdzogs dang ma rdzogs
185a3(rgyud): pas 'a sangs rgyas sems can gnyisu snang // tha dad par ni mi brtag ste// chu khams gser dang na mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang sems rang rigs rtogs pa na// sa
185a4(rgyud): gdod nas sangs rgyas so// rdo rje pag mos yang zhus pa/ srog gcod la sogs dam tshig gi// dbye ba khyed kyis bad ga la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang
185a5(rgyud): lus ngag sems g.yos kyang // gsod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes na// srog gcod nyams pa chung ngu ngos// gan/ gyis gnod par tshor ba dag/ nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa la// 
185a6(rgyud): de las bzlog pa chen por nges// gang zhig ma byin chung blangs kyang // gzhan la nyon mongs cher skyes na// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du nges// cher blangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring // chen po las ni nyon mongs
185a7(rgyud): cher/ 'de ni chen po kho nar nges// tshul 'chos ltung ba chen po ste// mi shes pa dang bag med dag/ brjed ngas la sogs 'bring du gsungs// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa yi// tshe 'bring chung ngu'i ldang
185a8(rgyud): chad dag/ rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga yis// rgyu rkyen dag las shes bya ste// ltung ba 'de bas zin pa dang // byinang rdo rje sleb dben gyi// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs// tshul dang 'dun par bye/ 
185b1(rgyud): pa bya da dam tshig gong 'og bye brag gis// bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shes par bya// gzhan yang gshegs pa'i bye brag la// sbyin sreg gis ni sdig sreg phyir// nang gi sbyin sreg chen po tsam// zab pa'i
185b2(rgyud): me ni rgyun bzhag me// thab kyi rgyun bzhag ma yin te// lo bdun dang ni lo gcig dag/ phyi yi rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// zla ba bdun dang gsum dag ni// 'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs// rgyun
185b3(rgyud): bzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs// rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te// rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi// gtum mo ye shes me rang bzhin// 'di ni rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// thog mtha' med par gan
185b4(rgyud): pa'i phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ya deshes me yi bud shing yi// man ngag can gyis bsregs byas na// nyams pa'i shing sogs 'chag par nges// dag
185b5(rgyud): bzar la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra / rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // thams cad dga' zhing mgu bar gyur// dpal rdo rje mkha'agro gsang ba'i
185b6(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye she sa bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+wa la ag+ni gu h+ya
185b7(rgyud): tan+t+ra rA dza// bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'a tshe lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
185b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugaso// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang na rdo rje phag mos gsol ba// rnal 'byor gang lags 'pho ba
186a1(rgyud): gang // 'chi ba gang lags shib gang // ron gang lags ro tshan gang // de bzhin shi ba chen po gang // thal ba gang lags thal chen gang // tsha tsha gang lags cha tsha yi// chen po
186a2(rgyud): gang lags gnas ni gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug la// rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dus
186a3(rgyud): min lha ni gsod pa ste// dang por 'pho ba'i rtags dang yang // dus chod nges par shes bya ste// bar chad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'khrul 'khor bcas te khyad par gyi// 'bras bu 'byung bar 'pho ba
186a4(rgyud): nges khams dang 'byung ba so sor thim// srog kyang rtsol ba la thim ste// rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i// skad cig/ dang po 'chi ba ste// rdo rje can sogs rigs bzhi dang // rnam snang tha
186a5(rgyud): dang bral ba yi// skad cig dang po shi ba ste// de nas zhag bad+ma na bar du bzhag/ lus kyi mkha' gro mya ngan 'das// de ni sha ba chen por grags// lus ni ta la'i mgo bo 'dra// 'di nyid ro zhes
186a6(rgyud): gsungs pa ste// ye shes dbab dang ye shes bstan// mkha'i spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ka ru// dri yi thig le gsum byas te// sku gsung thugasu byin gyis brlab// thog mar dri zhim
186a7(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis// khrus byas gnas ni bcu gnyi su// dri yi thig le bcu gnyis bya// dpa' bo mkha' gros byin gyis brlab// gzhan yang rgyan la sogs pa kun// dngos su gnas pas rab tu nges// 
186a8(rgyud): ri mor bris pa 'bring po ste// dri yi thig le tha mar nges// g.yas brkyang la sogs 'dug stangs kyis// he ru kar grags chen por bzhengs// rang rig bdag po gang yin pa'i// he ru ka ru nges pa/ 
186b1(rgyud): dang // de la dus drug mchod pas mchod// 'di dag ro ni chen po ste// 'chi ba zhes ni rnam rtog ste// mkha' spyod gnasu khrid par byed// rang bzhin bsregs pa thal ba ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la
186b2(rgyud): brten nas// chos sku gzugs brnyan rim bzhin rtsig/ yang na bum pa lta bu yi// gzhal yas khang pa rtseg mar brtsig/ mi 'chi bcu phyed snying po dang // tsan dan gur gum la sogs pa'i// dri yis
186b3(rgyud): byugs shing bsgo bar bya// tsan dan dmar po la sogs pa'i// dri zhim ldan pa'i shing bu'am// yang na 'bras bu yod pa yi// bud shing tshad dang ldan pa yis// thab khung chen por rdzogs pa brtsig/ 
186b4(rgyud): bla ma ngam pa mnyes byas la// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// zur bzhi rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs bzhi mi 'jig seng ge brgyad// ka ba bzhi dang gdung bzhir ldan// cho ga yong/ 
186b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa dang // rig pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhug pa dang // snga gyi dbang thob rdzogs par bskur// de nas rgyun bzhag me sbar te// me lha la sogs gzhag dang 'dra// de nas rig pa de nyid/ 
186b6(rgyud): kyang 'ame yi khang pa mdzes pa ru// rang bzhin spyan drangs bzhugasu gsol// me mchod sdig pa sreg pa'o// sngags dang rdzas sogs gzhan dang 'dra// me dang du ba rlung sogs kyi// mtshan ma mkhas
186b7(rgyud): pas brtag bya ste// bkra shis rtags rnams byung na legs// med na sdig pa bsreg par bya// gdung la sogs pa byung na rab// ma byung na yang cho ga rnams// rdzogs pa las byung rus pa rnams// 'di ni/ 
186b8(rgyud): thal ba chen po ste// de las gzhan pa thal bar gsungs// de nas rus pa zhag gsum ni// gur gum la sogs dris gtor te// rus pa'i mtshan ma brtag bya ste// kha dog dbyibs dang dri dang ro// bla ma'i
187a1(rgyud): zhal nas shes par bya// gdon bsal khrus bya rus pa brdung // ma nyams dum bu gcig pa la// dri sogs bsgos pa'i nang du ste// dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs pa yi// steng
187a2(rgyud): du seng ge'i khri dag la/ seng ge rgyal chen 'og gi rgyan// steng nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan te// gnas der rus pa bzhag byas la// me tog byas na zhag lnga ru// bsnyen
187a3(rgyud): pa byas te drug pa la// gdung byung sta gon bdun pa la// tsha tsha rab tu gnas par bya// dang por ro sreg dus su yang // shi ba dang po nas bzung ste// zhag lnga ro yi bsnyen pa ste// grung ro yi sta gon no// 
187a4(rgyud): bdun pa dur khrod rab tu gnas// dang por spang ba gnyis par ro// gsum pa rus pa mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das pa/ rnam pa gsum// gzhan la med cing rang la med// dman la
187a5(rgyud): med cing de rjes med// thabasu ma gsungs shes rab kyi// rgyud bshad rgyud phye ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar ma gsungs ba'o// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// bdud rtsi sgron mar/ 
187a6(rgyud): li yi// rgyud du khyod la nga yis bshad// de nas sa tsha'i rim pa yang // snang ba rgyal po la sogs la// 'thun pa'i gtam gyis sa sogs blang // mi snangs bdag la sogs pa// gtor ma me yis
187a7(rgyud): sa sogs blang // de nas skud pa rnam lnga yang // phan pa rdo rje can dang yang // gzi brjid gar dang rdo rje rgyal// srad bus sa gzungs sbyang sogs// cho ga gzhan dang 'thun par bya// dur khrod gnasu rtsab
187a8(rgyud): yi dadakyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par bya// lha grangs du yod gtor mar btang // sbyin sreg dag gis zhi byas te// gcig gam lnga'am bdun nam ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya rtsa brgyad// ci nus pa na
187b1(rgyud): gdab par bya// dus ni mtshan mo zhes pa ste// dang po la ni dkyil 'khor gyi// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa ste// gsum pa bzhi pa gnyis pa dag/ chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan gdab// bum dbang
187b2(rgyud): sa la gdab pa ste// gsang dbang sa dang chu la gdab// gsum pa me dang rlung la gdab// bzhi pa na mkha' gsungs pa'o// dang po 'pho bas ma lhung la// gnyis pa ro bsred ma lhung ba'o// gsum pa
187b3(rgyud): tsha tshas ma ltung na// 'chi ba slu ba'i dam pa ste// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol nges// dman pa'i 'pho ba la sogs pas// ltung zhing 'chi ba kho nar nges// de bas srid las gral 'dod pas/ bla
187b4(rgyud): ma dam pa rab mnyes te// 'pho ba la sogs gdab ngag blang // / rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // de'i tshe 'jig rte/ ngan gyi khams kyi sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// mchod pa
187b5(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i char yang bab po// dpa' bo dang mkha'agro ma da nga dur khrod na gnas pa'i ro langs chen po thams cad / da kyi don la rje su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal gsang ba me
187b6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @6// rgya gar skad du/ shrI a mr-i ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra
187b7(rgyud): rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de ban/ 
187b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+hag la bzhug so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// dkyil 'khor dbye ba ji lta bu// sngags pa
188a1(rgyud): gtor mji lta bu// sbyin sreg mchod sogs ji lta bu// khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// dang po dkyil 'khor dbye ba yang
188a2(rgyud): phyi la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor te// nang du lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro// gsang bar b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor te// bzhi pa rang rig byang chub sems// de rnams lha yi mtshan nyid kyang // sku
188a3(rgyud): mdog phyag mtshan rags pa'i lam// khro tshul drug cu rtsa bzhi dang // 'bar ba'i gar dgu phyag rgya drug/ mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu la// tha mal pa yi rnam rtog spong // lus kyi dri 'khru zhe sdang dag/ 
188a4(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa'o// 'di dag phyi yi dkyil 'kho / pa 'i 'ayongs gang gyur pa// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor/ te// rdo rje can dang phan pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid dang / 
188a5(rgyud): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin rta gdun rdo rje sems// snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te// de dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor yin// de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor yang / 
188a6(rgyud): rnam grol steng du gdan khri rlung // rang rig bdag po lha yin no// dang por de nyid shes bya ste// rags pa dang ni phra ba dang // zung 'jug sgo gsum nyi khri dang // tshig stong drug brgya rgyu ba tsam// la
188a7(rgyud): na rags pa'i lam 'joms shing // ngag gi dri 'khru gti mug dag/ sprul pa'i sku yi rgyur gyur pa// mkha' spyod rlung du shes par bya// gang zhig snang ba sgom pa dang // de bzhin mun be sgom pa dag/ 
188a8(rgyud): nyin dang mtshan mo rab tu grags// gnod mdzes sta stangs dman pa ste// tshul de de las bzlog pa'o// dang por yid bcing sna rtser bya// de bzhin sems bcing rlung bcing yang // namakha' sor bzhide
188b1(rgyud): nas stong // de nas bar du thig le yang // yan lag dang bcas yan lag med// shin tu yan lag med pa ste// yan lag bcas pa bcu gsum ste// thabs la thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// bla ma'i zhal/ 
188b2(rgyud): nas shes par bya// ma ning 'dus pa'i sgo ru gsungs// de nas 'og sgor tsaN+Da li// kha sbyor dang ni stug po sogs// rkyen dang bcas dang rang bzhin dang // bdag sbyar ba dang gzhan sbyang dang // gtum
188b3(rgyud): mo rang bzhin sbar ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang // gtum mo rgyan gyis sbar ba dang // gtum mo zhar la sbyar ba dang // gtum mo bye brag sbar ba dang // spyi yi gtum mo sbar ba dang // grol
188b4(rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin gtum mo dang // chags pa'i rang bzhin ga/ tu mo ste// nang gi lha yi ngo bo ste// gsang ba'i lha yi rim pa'i rgyu// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // dbang po gnyis
188b5(rgyud): sbyor kun tu ru// de yi phyir na b+ha ga yin// dga' ba la sogs sgyu ma yis// phra ba'i lam spong las yin te// sems kyi dri 'khrud 'dod chags dag/ rang rig sems kyi rgyal po'i
188b6(rgyud): rgyul de nas bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// chos sku skye med na mkha' bzhin// rang rig stong par 'od gsal ba// bsgoms pas nyes pa ma yin te// ma bsgoms pas kyang nyes pa yin// sgom pa
188b7(rgyud): nyid kyang rtog pa ste// mi sgom pa yang rtog pa nyid/ sgom du rdul tsam med pa la// yongs su skad cig med pa 'di// lha yi rgyal po yin par 'dod// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// rang rig
188b8(rgyud): ye shes me ba che// thams cad 'di la gnas pa skye// dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dag/ yul dang grong khyer dag tu mi 'gro yang // yul na 'dod pa thams cad sdud ba ltar// mchod dang
189a1(rgyud): gtor ma la sogs pa'i// las dang bya ba sna tshogs kun// sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na// thams cad 'di la bsdud par nges// las ni zab pa'i las spong ste// sgo gsum
189a2(rgyud): rnam dag dug gsum 'joms// gzugs sku gnyis ni 'byung ba'i rgyu// sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi yin te// spyi yi thun mong yin par gsungs// de nas nang gi sbyin sreg kyang // lte ba snying ka spyi bo
189a3(rgyud): mgrin// rigs ni nges pa'i thab khung ste// sku ni spyi bo gsung mgrin pa// stong kar thugs te yon tan dang // phrin las gtum mo gnyisu med// rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang // rang bzhin gnas
189a4(rgyud): pa'i ye shes me// me lha dag pas bdag po'i lho// sku mdog phyag mtshan rnam rtog dang / sreg rdzas bsreg ste/ me mchod bya// nye bar zhi ba sbyin pa dang // rnam rtog sreg byin
189a5(rgyud): sbyin sreg ste// rang lus ye shes me yis ni// rtog pa/ 'i bud shing bsreg bya ba// 'di ni sbyin sreg tshad ma ste// til sogs sdig par nges pa'am// las kyi me nyid ye
189a6(rgyud): shes sam// bsregs pas nges par tshig gam ci// sreg rdzas rtog pa sreg byed mo// dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin te// de phyir las kyi me nyid la// til sogs bsregs pa'i las byas
189a7(rgyud): kyang nges par sdig pa tshig mi 'gyur// mchod pa la sogs de bzhin no// bstan pa tsam du nges po ste// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam rtog pas bstan pa med// gang gzar glugs
189a8(rgyud): gzar la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba'i sbyin sreg kyang // thab lung lte ba 'am sna rtsa ste// chags grol gnas ni nges pa dang // rang bzhin dang ni gsang ba sa/ 
189b1(rgyud): gtum mo ye shes me sbar te// g.yas g.yon dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis// shu kra rtsa dang rlung sogs kyi// phra mo'i rtog pa'i sreg rdzas sreg/ bde ba'i me lha mchod par bya// zhi
189b2(rgyud): rgyas las kyi rim pa dang // bzhi pa zhal nas shes par bya// de nas sngags kyi dbye ba yang // phyi yi sngags ni oM AHhUM// nang du bdud rtsi mtshan nyid de// gsang bar mchog chad dbus na
189b3(rgyud): gnas// mthar thug mtha' bral rang rig go/ spos sogs pi yi mchod pa ste// bdud rtsi la sogs nang du'o// gsang bar bde ba'i ro yis mchod// mthar thug stob pa'i ro yis mchod// 
189b4(rgyud): 'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma ste// dman pa'i bgegs so gus zhi bar byed// a ba d+hU ti'i ka pA lar// sha sogs bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas// rnam rtog bgegs chen zhi
189b5(rgyud): bar byed// bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i ros// phra ba'i gdon chen zhi byas pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i gtor mar gsangs / rang rig stong pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros// bde chen don ni zhi byas
189b6(rgyud): pa/ 'di ni bzhi pa'i gtor mar nges// phyag 'tshal bskor ba la sogs pa// sbrang sogs bla ma'i zhal nas shes// gang gi phyir na sprin sreg ni// dngos grub dam pa ster ba dang // rnam rtog
189b7(rgyud): sreg phyir sbyin sreg ste// shing sogs sreg pa sbyin sreg min// mnyem pa'i don gyis mchod pa ste// spos sogs phul bas mnyes po med// rang sems la su rung ba dag/ mnyes pas mchod
189b8(rgyud): pa chen po ste// gton dang gnod pa zhi ba dang // bor chod zhi dang dngos grub dag/ 'byung ba'i phyir na gtor ma ste// 'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma yis// gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur te// ra
190a1(rgyud): gi sgo gsum rnam rtog dag/ gdon la sogs par snang ba ste// 'khrul pa'i rnam rtog ma spangs par// gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur phyir// sgo gsum rnam rtog
190a2(rgyud): 'joms pa yi// sems kyi gtor ma gtor ma'i mchog/ gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang / dam tshig gso dang lha rnams 'gro/ dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// phyi nang gtor mar
190a3(rgyud): nges pa'o// rgyud rnams nye bar zhi ba dang // lus las 'byung phyir lha yin te// phyi yi dkyil 'khor lha ma yin// lus dang yan lag lha ma yin// kha mig la sogs lha ma yin// lus las
190a4(rgyud): ma byung g.yeng ba'i phyir// dbang po sgo gsum g.yeng ba da dgag/ rang gi lus la rang lus 'byung // sgo gsum zhi phyi dar lha zhes brjod// yid skyob phyir na sngags yin te// 
190a5(rgyud): rang sems las su rung ba dang // rnam rtog gdon rnams las skyob phyir// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal por gsungs / gzhan yang dngos gruba'i dad pa yis// thams cad bla mi/ 
190a6(rgyud): zhal nas blang // rgyud 'di gtad kyis nan tan gyis// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad rgyud kyi don la yi rang bar gyur to// dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so// 
190a7(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mtshan po ga ya d+hA ra dang / lo tsAb dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI sh+ma sAn a la~M ka ra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal du
190a8(rgyud): khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshalo// 'jigs byed che la phyag 'tshal te// zhabs la spyi bas legs btud nas// dur khrod gang lags rgyan gang lags// 
190b1(rgyud): rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legaso rdo rje snying po lags// legs par nyon la legs par zung // dang por dur khrod bshad bya ste// dur khrod
190b2(rgyud): spyi dang bye brag gnas// gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol te// rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol du// 'jigs pa chen po spyi yi gnas// bye brag shar la sogs pa ste// snod kyi zhen pa bzlog pa yang // 
190b3(rgyud): lcogs ri nag po tshun chad de// rdo rje rabs de nyid do// chen po khru ni nyi shu ste// chung ba khru gang tshun chad do// de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// tshad las nges par 'das pa'o// rnam
190b4(rgyud): shes tshogs brgyad rnam rtog brgyad// mi mnga'i rtags su dur khrod brgyad// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu god// tshogs brgyad yon tan brgyad ldan pa'i// rtags
190b5(rgyud): su shing brgyad rim pas dgod// de bzhin gdug pa brgya/ da bcom pa'i// rtagasu klu brgyad rim pas dgod// tshogs brgyad mi dge bcu bcom pa'i// rtag su phyogs
190b6(rgyud): skyong rim pas dgod// lus ngag gnyis kyi sems can gyi// don mdzad phyir ni char sprin dgod// de nyid dur khrod 'jigs pa che// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgyud // rnam rtog/ 
190b7(rgyud): zil gnon brgyad por bshad// mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan yin no// de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir// dang por dur khrod bshad par bya// shar du gtum drag nag po che// lho ru he har dgang
190b8(rgyud): ser che// nub tu mi bzad dmar po che// byang du tshang tshing ljang ku che// me ru g.yer ka can yin to// bden bral mtsham su 'bar ba 'dzin// rlung mtshams dmyal sogs gnas pa ste// dbang ldan
191a1(rgyud): du ni dbyibs can no// b+hU tsa ri khi tsa sha ni// sa stengs shar gyi phyi ru dgod// ba ta li dang bAs ni// sa 'og nub kyi phyi ru dgod// dur khrod 'di rnams gzugs rnams kyang // 
191a2(rgyud): 'bar ba tshig dang mtshig sogs// keng rus thong ba la sogs dang // ro langs 'byung ngo'i tshogs dang bcas// lce spyang sgra yis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// shar du shi ri sha yi shing // lho ru a
191a3(rgyud): shad tha yi shing // nub tu wang ge ling gi shing // byang du tsu ta'i shing dunges// gang dang mtshums pa n+ya grong// parko ti lcug pa thA dag/ me nas dbang ldan mtsham su dgod// ji ltar grags pa'i
191a4(rgyud): gzugasu 'dod// shar du dbang po gnas pa ste// lho ru gai na rje gnas pa'o// nub tu klu dbang gnas pa ste// bya du gnod sbyin yang dag gnas// shad lhor med ni gnas
191a5(rgyud): ba'o// lho nub mtsham su srin po gnas// nub byang mtshams rlung dgod de// byang shar mtsham su dbang ldan dgod/ nyi zla shar las bdag nub// ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs
191a6(rgyud): dgod// shar du nor rgyas gnas pa ste// 'jog po lho ste stobs rgyu nub// pad+ma byang la pad chen me// hu lu hu lu srin por dgod// rigs ldan rlung mtshams dgod pa ste// dung skyong dbang ldan
191a7(rgyud): mtsham su ni// gdug pa sbrul gyi gzugasu dgod// kha dog rigs kyi dbye bas dbye// shar du char sprin dkar por dgod// lho ru pu mi ti dgod do// nub tu 'jigs pa rnam par gnas// byang du a
191a8(rgyud): ba yang dag gnas// sde nyi mer ni yang dag gnas// g+ha nya srin po'i mtshom su dgod// rlung gi mtshamasu par shan// gtum po 'di brgyad char sprin brgyad// cod kyi mdog 'dra gur gum med/ 
191b1(rgyud): namakha'i 'dog 'dra du ba'i mdog/ sprin gyi mdog 'dra sprin gyi gzugs// shar la sogs pa bzhi bzhi ste// 'di dag nang rtags phyi ru 'byung // dang por spangs pa phun sum tshogs
191b2(rgyud): de nas ye shes phun sum tshogs// rang rig don ni phun sum tshogs// gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa yi// rtags su 'jigs pa 'di dag gnas// de nas nang gi dur khrod sogs// 
191b3(rgyud): lpags pa rdo rje ra ba re// rus pa rdo rje gur du nges// dpung pa nye ba'i dpung pa ste// brla dang de bzhin nye ba'i brla// brgyad ni dur khrod brgyad du nges// rje ngar nye ba'i rje ngar bzhi// lag ngar nye
191b4(rgyud): ba'i lag ngar bzhi// brgyad ni nang gi shing brgyad do// tshig/ sa dang de bzhin nye ba'i tshigs// steng dang 'og tu bzhi bzhi ste// nang gi phyogs skyong yin par 'dod// mthil dang de
191b5(rgyud): bzhin nye ba'i mthil// steng 'og de bzhin klu brgyad do// rtsed dang de bzhin nye ba'i rtse// brgyad ni char sprin brgyad yin te/ bskyed rims rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad
191b6(rgyud): ni nang na gnas// rtsa rlung ngo bo shes pa brgyas// de phyir nang gi shing brgyad gnas// rags pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// nang na klu brgyad yang dag gnas// bdag spyod gzhan yang spyod pa'i
191b7(rgyud): phyir 'char sprin brgyad na nang du gnas// de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod kyang // sna rtse rtsa brgyad dur khrod brgyad// lte bar rtsa brgyad shing brgyad do// snying kar rtsa brgyad phyogs skyong brgyad// mgrin
191b8(rgyud): bar rtsa brgyad klu brgyad de// spyi bor rtsa brgyad char sprin brgyad// gsang bar rnami rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni gsang bas gnas// thams cad bde bar snang ba'i phyir// gsang ba
192a1(rgyud): shing brgyad yang dag gnas// phra ba'i mtshan ma'i rnam rtog gi/ bdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// bde bas bdag spyod gzhan sbyor bas// de yi phyir na ma
192a2(rgyud): sprin dgod// de nas bzhi pa'i dur khrod kyang // rnam shes brgyad ni de nyid brgyad// dur khrod brgyad du nges pa'o// dur khrod sogs brgyad de nyid shing // lhag ma go sum dang tshor sogs lnga
192a3(rgyud): brgyad ni phyogs skyong brgyad du nges// nyon mongs drug dang de yi gnyis// brgyad po dag ni klu brgyad do// lnga dang bzhi dag gsum dag ni// de ni bzhi pa'i char sprin brgyad// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog
192a4(rgyud): mi mngon rtogs// bzhi pa yi ni dur khrod brgyad// stob/ sa sogs mkhyen pa'i yon tan rgyas// rtagasu shing brgyad nges pa'o// rnam rtog gdug pa 'dul ba yi// rtag su
192a5(rgyud): klu brgyad nges pa'o// gzugs sku gnyis kyis sems can gyi// don mdzod rtagasu char sprin brgyad// phyogs skye bla ma'i zhal nas shes// de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang // 
192a6(rgyud): ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyun chags phyi nang rgyud ces bya// rgyal po khyad par 'phags pa'o// gzhan yang nga yis gsungs pa'i bka'// gsung gcig nyid du gsungs gyur kyang // du ma nyid
192a7(rgyud): du so sor snang // chos tshul du ma'i bye brag dang // mos pa du ma'i bye brag dang // 'du shes du mi'i bye brag gis// theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// sems gzung yan lag bsam mi khyab// 
192a8(rgyud): nga yis rjes su 'brangs pa yi// bla mas rab non pa dang // de nyid bcu ldan mngon shes skyes// de gsung bcu drug mtha' yi bar// reg pa'i gnas lnga mkhas pas sbyangs// mkha 'gro ma
192b1(rgyud): yis lung bstan pas// brtsams la bzhi yi mtha' yis nges// de lta'i man ngag ma thob par// sngags kyi lha spyod gang spyod pa// rang yang phung la gzhan yang bung // mthong ba'i chos la
192b2(rgyud): dmyal sogs 'tshed// de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bla ma dam pa mnyes byas te// man ngag dam pa blang bar bya// nges pa'i lta spyod ma rnyed par// gsang ba'i lha dang spyod pa dang // mos
192b3(rgyud): paba'i rje su gang byed dang // nyon mongs zil non la sogs dag/ gsang sngags lta bur spyad pa spyod// 'di dag rkun po mi rungs pa// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar skye// dang po srid pa slu ba yang // 
192b4(rgyud): yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum// sah+la'i dang po tha ma dang / 'bras bu sred pa skye bo yi// dus der kun tu ru byed na/ 'byung ba'i rlung gi nang zhugs na// nad gzhi bsdus ri shing nang
192b5(rgyud): gzhi skyes// srog dang tshangs par spyod pa 'byung // de la 'a dod pa'i mtshon chas ni// g.yeng ba med dang gtar ka bya// phyi nas rigs kyi bdag pos so// srid par skye ba'i dus chod
192b6(rgyud): kyang // rgyun chad zhag gsum zhag lnga dang // bdun dang dgu yi dus rnams spang // de ltar rgyud mchog rgyal po'i don// khyod la gtad kyis legs par zung // de nas 'khor thams cad dga'
192b7(rgyud): zhing mgu ste rdza su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogaso// // paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
192b8(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra rarA dza ma hA tan+te/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje rgyal po chen po'i rgyud/ dpal sdom pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos 'dus gcig na// bcom
193a1(rgyud): / ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i blag la rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ma pa 'gro grags med pa dang thabs
193a2(rgyud): gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su phyi nang gsang ba bla med pa'i mchod pas mchod nas// bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa dang // bcom ldan 'das la zhal 'dzum pa mdzad// rdo rje snying
193a3(rgyud): la sogs pas gsol ba// rdo rje gang lags chen po gang // rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// don gyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi'i grangasu shes par
193a4(rgyud): byas rnam rtog 'joms phyir rdo rje ste// de la rnam pa bzhi yin/ te/ phyi nang gsang ba rab gsang gnyis// rdzugasum rtseg ci gu rtse lnga pa// rtse dgu pa ni nyid yin no// bcu gnyis de nyid rdo rje/ 
193a5(rgyud): ste rtags kyi rdo rje bzhi yin no// gnyisu med brtse gcig/ bso// rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa yin// rtse gsum/ sku gsung thugs yin te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug/ 
193a6(rgyud): gsum// 'joms pa'i phyir na bshad pa yin// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog/ bya ba nan tan chos dbyings shes// nyon mongs lnga ni spangs pa ste// zhe sdang nga
193a7(rgyud): rgyal 'dod chags dang // brag dog gti mug 'jom par byed// rdo rje rtse dgu gang yin pa// ye shes rtse dgu bshad pa ste// khams gsum sa dgu 'joms par byed// 'dod khams gzugs/ 
193a8(rgyud): khams gzugs med khams// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas ye shes tshe// sa dgu la ni gang sgrib pa'i// sgrib po sbyong bar byed pa yi// rdo rje rtse dgur bstan
193b1(rgyud): ba yin// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa// 'khor ba'i rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi// spong ba'i ye shes bcu gnyis yin// ma rig pa las 'du byed de// 'du byed rkyen gyis rnam par shes/ 
193b2(rgyud): ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug/ reg dang tshor dang sred dang len// srid pa skye dang rga shi ste// de rnams spong ba'i gnyen po ste// chos kyi ye shes mngon du byas// de las ye she
193b3(rgyud): drug rang bzhin// de las sku gsung thugs ngo bo// de las skye mched drug sangs rgyas// de las gnyis med reg pa ni// de las nyams myong bde chen po// rang rig de nyid srid pa ste// chos kun
193b4(rgyud): ston byed len pa ste// srid pa longs spyod rdzogs sku yin// skye ba sprul pa'i sku ru bshad// rga shi rgyun dang mya ngan la dadas// 'od gsal stong chen dang du thim// de phyir rdo rje bcu
193b5(rgyud): gnyis pa// rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te// 'bigs shing rna ba rmu ro gsum ste// gru bzhes rdzas rnams brdar byas pas/ 'jam zhing dang la 'joms par byed// pha lam zlum pos rtsus
193b6(rgyud): pa 'joms// zur lngas thams cad ci dgar byed// de nas chen po'i don bshad de// dmigs dang bsam pa spyod pa dang // brtul zhugs brtson 'grus ston lam dang // de bzhin ye shes chen po ste// 
193b7(rgyud): re re la yang bdun bdun sbyar// de phyir chen po zhes ni bstan// rgyud ni rnam pa lnga yin te// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rab tu gsang dang gsang ba che// de rnams rgyun tu gnas pa la// rgyu yi rgyud du/ 
193b8(rgyud): bstan pa yin// de rnams don ni ji bzhin rtogs// 'bras bu'i rgyud du bstan pa yin// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa// rgyu ni gnyi su med pa yi// rang rig ye shes mthar thug pa// mthar thug
194a1(rgyud): / bla na med pa'i rgyud// rgyal po la yang lnga yin te// phyi nang gsang dang rab tu gsang // shin tu gsang ba chen po ste// de rnams don la dbang bskur dang // de yi mi mthun phyogs 'jom
194a2(rgyud): phyir de phyir rgyal po lnga ru bstan// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// btsun
194a3(rgyud): mo'i b+ha ga ji ltar lags// rdo rje gang lags snying po gang // dpa' bo gang lags mkha'agro gang // dpag tu med pa ji ltar lags// thabs gcig bzhugs pa ji ltar lags// phyi nang gas
194a4(rgyud): ba bla med pa'i// mchod nas zhes pa ji ltar lags// mngon daphyogs 'khod pa ji ltar lags// zhal 'dzum mdzad pa ji ltar lags// gzigs pa zhes pa ji lags// bcom
194a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs dang ni 'chib dag bdud// phung po'i bdud dang lha yi bdud// bdud pa/ bcom pas bcom pa'o// ldan pa yon tan drug ldan
194a6(rgyud): phyir dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal pa bzang // ye shes phun sum tshogs pa la// drug po de ltar zhes bya ba// 'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te// de ltar
194a7(rgyud): bral phyir 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bcas// 
194a8(rgyud): btsun mo zhes bya chos kyi dbyings// de las byung phyir b+ha ga ste// dbyer mi phyed pas bzhugs par bshad// rdo rje chos rnams 'jigs pa che// snying po ye shes chen po ste// sogs pa mang
194b1(rgyud): po'i don yin te// dpa' bo zhes pa rnam pa lnga// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs kyi// rnam par rtog pa 'joms phyir yin// mkha' la 'gro bas mkha'agro ste// rtsa sogs la yang shes par bya// 
194b2(rgyud): thams cad de las byung ba'i phyir// ma zhes nga yis gsungs pa yin// de yi don la mi dpogs pas// de yi phyin na dpag tu med// thabs gcig bzhugs zhes bya ba 'di// de nyid don
194b3(rgyud): dang dbyer med phyir// gcig gi don du bshad pa'o// gnyis pa ma yin de don du// phyi nang ma yin mchod pa ni// phyi yi mchod pa bshad par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me dang / dri dang lha bsho/ 
194b4(rgyud): btung ba dang // rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang // skrag dang dgod dang gar nyid dang // rta dang glang po chen sogs// de nas nang gi mchod pa ni// b+ha ga btsums la ku tsa btsar// 
194b5(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba lnga// byang chub sems dang ldan byas // phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// de la sogs bas mchod par bya// de nas gsang ba'i mchid pa ni/ 
194b6(rgyud): dang rlung dang thig le ste// de nyid gnyis med bde ba yis// rtsa dang rlung sogs thig les mchod // de nas rab gsang mchod pa ni// dang po dga' dang mchog dga' dang / dga' bral de bzhin lhan
194b7(rgyud): skyes dga'// bde ba'i khyad par de nyid kyis// rang bzhin dga' sogs thams cad mchod// de nas bla med mchod pas ni// rang rig stong par rtogs pa yis// 'od gsal de nyid chos kyi sku// de nyid
194b8(rgyud): bla med mchod pa mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rje su yi rangs par gyur te// g.yon phyogs nas bsko/ 
195a1(rgyud): // bya bas ni sa so sor rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa rdo rje rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya le/ 
195a2(rgyud): shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 6// rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na tsan+na tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// 
195a3(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo dang mkha 'gro ma'i 'khor grangs med pa dang // ye shes gsang ba'i gnas na thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su
195a4(rgyud): dpa' bo ye shes mkha' gro zhes bya bas// bcom ldan 'das/ kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te// thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan ye shes mnga' bdag che// ye shes
195a5(rgyud): kyi ni rang bzhin dang // ye shes skyo gnas gang dang gang // rgya la bo ji ltar lags pa dang // gang la dbang byed gong gis 'dul// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
195a6(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpa' bo ye shes mkha'agro nyon// ye shes zhes bya rnam pa lnga// de nyid don la shes pa dang / log rtog shes pas ma bsgribs phyir// spyi bo'i ye shes bshad pa'o// me long
195a7(rgyud): ye shes mnyam nyid dang // so sor rtog dang bya nan tan// chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o// de la me long ye shes ni// dper na g.ya' dag me long lo// gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang ba bzhin/ 
195a8(rgyud): de bzhin sems kyi me long la// nyon mongs g.ya' ni dag byas na// chos rnams gzugs brnyan sgyu mar mthong // sems kyi me long gang yin la// sgyu ma tsam du snang ba de// tha dad mi phyed mnya
195b1(rgyud): ye shes// mnyam nyid ye shes gang yin pa// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam de ni// las dang mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa// de nyid so sor rtog ye shes// de nyid nan tan sgrub byed de// de nyid don grub ye / 
195b2(rgyud): te/ thams cad chos dbyings gzhan min te// de phyir chos dbyings ye shes yin// ye shes skye gnas gang yin pa// kha sbyar dbus kyi rtsa brgyad do// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med
195b3(rgyud): tshul la/  shar dang lho dang nub dang byang // ye shes bzhi po skye ba'i gnas// de dag kun 'dus lte ba ni// chos dbyings ye shes skye bo'i gnas// me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang // so sor rtog da
195b4(rgyud): bya ba grub// chos dbyings ye shes la sogs pa// bdag bo byed pa'i phyir dang ni// zhe sdang dang ni nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags dang ni phra dog dang // de bzhin gti mug la sogs pa'i// nyon mongs
195b5(rgyud): thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir// rgyal po zhes ni brtan pa yi/ na// ye shes mkha' gros yang gsol pa// byang chub sems ni ji ltar lags// de nyid dbye ba gang lags dang / 
195b6(rgyud): de yi gnas dang gzung ba'i gnas// nges par bzlog pa'i tshul nyid dang // de nyid kyi ni 'bras bu dang // rtags dang yon tan gang lags pa// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom
195b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems ni rang rig ste// dbye ba'i don ni gnyis su bstan// de yi gnas ni rtsa yin te// gzung ba rig pa'i 'khor lor te// nges par bzlog pa'i thabs/ 
195b8(rgyud): dge ni/ go bzlog pa yi tshul yin no// de nyid 'bras bu gnyis med rtogs// rtags ni lus la khrag byung dang // ba spu langs dang 'dar ba dang // kha zas dang chung lus yang dang // skra dkar gnyer
196a1(rgyud): mdengs pa dang // le lo med dang brtson 'grus ldan// de la sogs pa'i rtags rnams 'grub// de nas yon tan bshad pa ni// rkang mgyogs sa stengs sa 'og gi/ 'jin/ 
196a2(rgyud): rten dngos grub gang yin dang // 'jig rten las 'das thob par 'gyur// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi gnas// rang rig 'od gsal de nyid do// ye shes rang bzhin gnas yin te// rtags ni/ 
196a3(rgyud): 'od gsal de nyid do// 'bras bu chos sku 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// rnal 'byor sems gzung sgom pa brtag/ lus sems tshagasu bcug nas ni// rang rig sems kyi de nyid la// de nyid
196a4(rgyud): dbyer med bsgom par bya// de yis thob med 'bras bu thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // ye she ngas mkha 'gro la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad rje su yi rang ni
196a5(rgyud): de kho na nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod de mi snang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud/ kyi rgyal po rdzog so// / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / 
196a6(rgyud): lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI rA ga rA dza tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal chags pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje mkha'agro la
196a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugaso// de nas byang chub
196a8(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ he he dpa' bi 'jigs pa che// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin na// mtshan dang / 
196b1(rgyud): gang dang gang // stong dang de bzhin rnam thar dang // brdzus skyes mngal skyes sgong skyes dang // drod gsher gnyis gsum bzhi char ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// a ni dbus
196b2(rgyud): gtsug tor te// A ni dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil// i ni dpral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa// I ni smin mtshams mdzod spu ste// u ni spyan mig mthon 'thing la// ba yi rdzi ma lta bu'o// U tshems
196b3(rgyud): bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste// r-i r-I tshams mnyam tshems thags bzang // l-i lAM tshems dkar ro bro mchog/ e ni 'gram pa seng ge 'dra// e ljags shin tu srab pa ste// o ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs
196b4(rgyud): dang ldan// oM ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum// a ni mdun mtho ba ru gsungs// aHni thal gong rgyas pa ste// 'di dag bcu drug g.yas bskor ro// de nas g.yon bskor mtshoms
196b5(rgyud): nas kyang // a ni lpags srab mdog gser 'dra// AM ni ba zhengs bzhin ma btud par// phyag gnyis pus mo sleb pa'o// i ni ro stod seng ge 'dra// I ni shing n+ya gro lta bur/ 
196b6(rgyud): chu dang zhang ni gab pa'o// u ni mdzod spu g.ya su 'khyil// U ni spu rnams gyen du phyogs// r-i mdoms lba ba sbubasu nub// rI ba brla legs par zlum pa'o// li ni zhabs long tsha gos mi mngon
196b7(rgyud): l-I ni phyag zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon// lA ni phyag mthil zhabs kyi mthil// 'jam zhing gzhon sha rgyas pa'o// e ni phyag zhabs dra bas 'brel// a ni sen mo ring ba ste// oM ni phyag dang zhabs
196b8(rgyud): mthil la// 'khor lo dang ni ldan pa yin// oM ni zhabs ni shin tu gnas// aM zhabs rting pa yangs pa ste// aHni byin pa ri dgas ni// e na ya yi lta bu ste// spyi bo'i mi shigs snying po ha/ 
197a1(rgyud): ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// ka ni sen mo zangs mdog 'dra// kha ni sen mo mdog snum pa/ ga ni sen ma mtho ba ste// g+ha ni sor mo rnams/ 
197a2(rgyud): zlum pa// da ni sor mo rnams rgyas pa// tsa ni sor rnams byin gyis phra// tsha ni rtsa rnams mi mngon pa// dza na rtsi bdun med pa yin// dz+nyA ni long bu mi mngon pa// nyani zhabs mi mnyam pa
197a3(rgyud): mid Ta ni seng ge'i stabasu gshegs// tha ni glang po'i stobasu gshegs// Da ni ngang pa'i stabasu gshegs// D+hi ni khyu mchog stabasu gshegs// Na ni g.yas phyogs ldog cing gshegs
197a4(rgyud): tani mdzes par gshegs pa ste// tha ni mi g.yo bar gshe dgas pa// da ni sku la 'khril bag chags// d+ha sku byid byas pa 'dra// na sku rim par 'tsham pa'o// ba ni sku gtsang
197a5(rgyud): bsku mdog/ bsku rnam par dag pa'o// b+ha ni mtshan rdzog/ sa ngo bo nyid// me sku kho lag yangs shing bzang // yan gom pasnyems pa'o// ra sku shin tu gzhon mdog can// 
197a6(rgyud): nisku la 'khrul pa med// wa ni sku lus rgyas pa ste// sha ni shin tu grims pa'o// Sha na yan lag thams cad mdzes// sa gzigs rab rib med cing dag/ ha sku zlum pa nyid yin te// k+Sha ni sku
197a7(rgyud): skabs byed pa'o// ya ni sku snyoms pa yin te// ra ni phyal byam me ba yin// la ni lte bzab pa ste// wani lte ba g.yasu 'khyil// da ni kun nas mdzes pa ste// d+he ni kun spyod gtsang ma yin// 'di
197a8(rgyud): dag thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// g.yas nas bskor ba bani bcu yin// de nas g.yon gyi bzhi bcu na// ka na su sme gnag dag mo// kha ni shing ba la ltar 'jam phye/ ga phyag ri mo mdangs
197b1(rgyud): yod pa// g+ha phyag ri mo zab pa dang // nga phyag ri mo ring ba'o// tsa zhal ha cang mi ring ba// tsha zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang // dza dz+ha ljags mnyen ljags srab pa// nya ni ljags
197b2(rgyud): dmar ngo ba ste// glang po'i nga ro 'brug spri Ta// tha ni gsung snyan gnyen 'jam pa// Da D+ha mche ba zlum dang rno// Na ni mche dkA ri ta tshems mnyam// tha ni mche byin gyis phra// da shangs shin
197b3(rgyud): tu mtho ba dang // d+ha shangs shin tu gtsang ba'o// na ni spyan 'od rnam par dag/ pa pa spyan bzang rdzi ma stug/ pa ni dkar nag phye pad ma'i// 'dab ma'i mdangs 'dra pad+ma'i spyan// bla ni de bzhin smin
197b4(rgyud): mtshams ring // ma ya smin mtshams smin spu mnyam//  da ni de bzhin smin ma snum// la ni snya na shal stug cing ring // de bzhin wa ni snyan shal mnyam// snyan gyi dbang po ma
197b5(rgyud): nyams sha/ dpral ba legs par 'byes pa Sha// sa ni dpral ba'i dbyes che ba// ha ni dbu dag shin tu rgyas// dbu skra bu ba ltar gnag k+Sha// dbu skra stug pa ya yin te// 
197b6(rgyud): de bzhin dbu skra 'jam par// dbu skra mi 'dzing ba ni la// dbu skra mi gshor ba ni wa// dbu skra dri zhim da yin te// phyag la dpal gyi be'u deng ni// bkra shis g.yung drung 'khyil pas rgyan// 
197b7(rgyud): sdong ris lta bu d+he yin te// lte ba sprul pa'i snying po aM// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan// a ni phyi nang stong pa nyid// A ni stong pa nyid stong pa// i ni chen po stong pa nyid// I ni don dam stong
197b8(rgyud): pa nyid// u ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid// A ni 'dus ma byas stong pa// r-i ni mtha' las 'das stong pa// r-I ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid// l-i ni dor ba med pa stong // lI ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid// 
198a1(rgyud): / e ni chos rnams thams cad stong // e ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong // oM ni mi dmigs stong pa nyid// oM ni dngos po med stong nyid// oM ni ngo bo stong pa nyid// dngos med dos
198a2(rgyud): stong nyid aH// mgrin pa longs spyod snying po oM// shes rab stong pa bcu drug rtsa// gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam par thar pa dang po a// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas
198a3(rgyud): phyi rol gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam thar gnyis pa ka yin no// sdug pa rnam par thar pa'i lus// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni// de dag rnam thar gsum pa tsa// gzugs kyi 'du she/ 
198a4(rgyud): la 'das pa// sna tshogs 'du shes yas mi byed// na mkha' mtha' yas la gnas Ta/ mkha' mtha' yas las 'dras te// rnam shes mtha' yas la gnas shing // rnam shrI
198a5(rgyud): mtha' yas rdzogs pa ta// rnam shes mtha' yas las 'das na// ci yang med pa la gnas te// de nyid rdzog/ sa pa pa yin no// ci yang med pa las 'das te// 'dus
198a6(rgyud): med min la gnas te// 'du shes med min rdzogs pa yang // 'du shes med min las 'das te// 'du shes tshor ba 'gog pa'i lus// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni// rnam par thar pa
198a7(rgyud): brgyad pa sha/ snying ka chos kyi 'khor lo hUM// gtso bo rnam thar brgyad dang ldan// 'di dag rtsa yi rnam par gnas// 'khor lo'i rgya ni sor gsum ste// sems can kun la rang bzhin gnas// 
198a8(rgyud): de phyir sems can sangs rgyas yin// sna tshogs sdud pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // ring du 'byung zhing thung du gnas// smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu bzhin// chos kyi 'byung gnas lte ba la// g.yas
198b1(rgyud): g.yon bu ga lnga lnga ste// steng 'og kha yi bar nas 'byung // ro ma shar du mngon du phyogs// rkyang ma nub ste 'og gi char// roms rkyang ma la 'khyud cing // g.yas pa'i cha ru zung 'jug nyid// 
198b2(rgyud): rkyang mas ro ma la 'khyud cing // g.yon gyi cha ru zung 'jug nyid// g.yas g.yon rtse mo sku gsung thugs// de sgra sngagasu rab tu grags// sngags dang rgyud dang dngos grub sogs// de nyid las/ 
198b3(rgyud): ni byung bas na// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// skye ba bzhi yi rim pa yang // snod bcud yab yum la thim ste// yab yum nyi ma zla bar 'gyur// snang ba'i thig le yang dag bcas// 'di
198b4(rgyud): dag nang gi mngal skyes tshul// a li ka li nyi zla ste// sam/ sa ni thig le'i ngo bor gnas// nang gi sgong skyes yin pa/ ra 'dod// ka dang a las nyi zla ste// rang byung thig le drod ga
198b5(rgyud): yin pa de dag skad cig rkyen med las// rang bzhin 'byung ba brdzus skyes so// rkyen med sbyor ba sgong sogs las/ bde ba ske dang bde ba'i rgyu// thams cad dran pa gsang ba yi// 
198b6(rgyud): mngal na skyes pa'i tshul yin te// yar la sreg dang mar la gso// gnas gsum nyi shu bzhir 'pho yin// phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma yis// rtsa rgyas bde ba ster ba dang // rin po che yi pho brang du
198b7(rgyud): sems 'dzin gsang ba'i sgong skas yin// nang gi 'dod pa'i mtshon cha yis// bde ba skye ba drod gsher skyes// gang gi rkyen gyis ma skyes par// gdod nas bde ba'i rgyur skyes la/ 
198b8(rgyud): bde ba skyes pa brdzos skyeso// gtum mo go bzlog rkyen gyis sbar// gtum mo rkyen gyis sbyor ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang // gtum mo rang bzhin sbar ba ni// mang
199a1(rgyud): mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher skyes// brdzus skyes rim par sbyar bar bya// du ma'i gzhi bcas gzhi bcas dang // gzhi med shin tu gzhi med de// mngal skyes sgong
199a2(rgyud): skyes drod gsher skyes// brdzus skyes bzhi char rim par sbyar// rgyu dang lom ste 'bras bu kun// skye ba bzhi yi ngo bor gcig/ de phyir sangs rgyas sems can gnyis// dngos po ro monyam gyu
199a3(rgyud): pa la// log tog sgyu mas gnyisu 'khrul// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// nang dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// sku yi dkyil 'khor spyi bor sgom// gsung
199a4(rgyud): ni mgrin pa thugs ni snying // yon tan lte ba phreng las ni// sna rtse dag tu bsam par bya// 'bar ba bzhi yi a la yang // // rdo rje phag mo rab tu grags// ha ni bde mchog he ru ka/ dpa' bo/ 
199a5(rgyud): gcig pa yin par 'dod// bdun pa dang ni dgu pa dag/ gsum ba hA las rab tu grags// bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa / bcu dgu oM las rab tu grags// nyi shu rtsa lnga nyi shu dgu/ 
199a6(rgyud): gi ngo bor yang dag gnas// sum cu bdun dang drug bcu bzhi// a yi dkyil 'khor yin par nges// rtsa ni rdo rje phag mo ste// g.yas g.yon phyag la dbu ma zhal// dpa' bo byang chub sems yin te// 
199a7(rgyud): skye mched bcu gnyis dngas ma yang // bcu gnyis phyag tu rab tu grags// 'byung bzhir dngas ma zhal bzhir ngas// mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan du bshad// gsung mchog bla ma'i zhal nas blang // 
199a8(rgyud): g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo bzhi ste// mdom gang mnyam pa grub zhi yin// bdud rtsi lnga ni tshon rtsi lnga// rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin te// ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do// so sen ba sputA ra sogs/ ma
199b1(rgyud): bas brtag cing shes par bya// 'di dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te// dper ni rang byung gser dang 'dra// 'di na bcos ma ma yin te// rang rig ye shes gzugs brnyan ni// gzugs brnyan
199b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sgom pa min// rdul tshon la sogs bri ba min// spos la sogs pas mchod pa min// rdo shing lha la phyag mi bya// rang bzhin gnas pa'i sangs rgyas la// rang bzhin mchod pas
199b3(rgyud): rtag tu mchod// sku ni dgun dus rang bzhin te// 'byung ba'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// gsung ni dpyid dus ngo bo ste// 'jug pa'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// thug ni dbyar dus ngo bo ste// gnas/ 
199b4(rgyud): bsku gsum zla ba gsum// ye shes ston gyi dus yin te/ sku gsung thugs ni zla gsum// dang po rgyu yis pa yin// / 'khor lo chags pa dmar po la// yi ge rnams ni dkar pos
199b5(rgyud): gnas// lam gyis pa rnam pa gnyis// ring ba dang ni nye ba'o// de nas 'bras bu'i sa pa yin// 'khor lo yang dag ga/ nas pa ste// 'khor lo rnams lha rnams kyang // sku mdog
199b6(rgyud): phyag mtshan kun dang bral// rang bzhin gsal ba dri ma med// shel ltar gsal ba dri ma med// mi mthong mthong ba'i ngo bo can// zab cing phra ba'i rang bzhin can// phyi ru sku mdog phyag mtshan
