199b7(rgyud): lhang nang gi shin tu phra ba'i gzugs// gsang ba'i bde ba lha runges// de las bzlog pa bzhi pa'i lha// lus las byung phyir lha zhe 'am// rgyud rnams dag byed phyir na lha// chags ba
199b8(rgyud): yin te// rgyal po shes rab rang bzhin te// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi// chags pa chen po'i rgyud gsungs so// de nas sa chen po yang cher g.yos par gyur te/ mchod pa'i sgra
200a1(rgyud): // kyi char chen po babs par gyur to// de nas dpa' bo dang mkha 'gro ma rnams kyang rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing mgu sde rje su yi rang nas mi snang bar gyur to// dngal chag
200a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogaso// // rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra ma le dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slo nga shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
200a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI DA ki ni sa ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha'agro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ga/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba chen
200a4(rgyud): po'i ros gang bas// thams cad stong par gyur nas kyang //  ha he mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// mkha'agro ma ni ji ltar lag sa// de yi sdom pa ji ltar lags// dam tshig srung ba ji ltar
200a5(rgyud): lags// rdo rje phag mo bdag la gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje phrag mo nyon// dang po dam tshig mtshan nyid kyang // rtswa ba dang ni yan lag bcas// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum
200a6(rgyud): dag/ kun nas 'khrugs te gzhan gyi yang // sgo gsum kun 'khrugs chen po ste// rang gzhan sgo gsum 'khrugs pa 'bring // nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// rang gzhan 'khrugs pa
200a7(rgyud): tha ma yang // nyams pa chung ngu yin par 'dod// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// nyams pa che 'bring dgu ru dbye// rang la mnar sems ma skyes kyang // gzhan la mnar sems skyes pa yi// bdag
200a8(rgyud): gi g.yeng bas rkyen byas pa// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad// rang la gnar sems cher skyes kyang // gzhan la nyes pa chung bas na// 'od lnga nyams pa 'bring du bshad// g.yeng ba'i rkyen gyi
200b1(rgyud): gang nyams kyang // 'di ni ltung ba yang dag gsungs// rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi// lha spyod gang la gzhan ma mos// zab mo'i don la skur 'debs pa// ltung ba che 'bring yang bar bshad// 
200b2(rgyud): rang gis ma nyes gzhan cher 'khrugs// 'di ni nyams pa chung ngur bshad// re re'i dbye ba gzhan nas shes// de nas snod kyi mtshan nyid kyang // phyi yis rang gi sgo gsum dag/ 'khrugs pa
200b3(rgyud): che chung rim pas dbye// rang sems 'khrugs na phyi rol pa// bsnun sogs nyams pa chen por 'gyur// g.yengs pas nyams pa 'bring chung ngu// mdor na rang bzhin dam tshig dang // bcas
200b4(rgyud): te bye brag dam tshig las// gnyisu med par mkhas pas ga/ sungs// dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang // de nas mkha 'gro'i mtshan nyid kyang // mkha' 'gro rtsa ru gnas pa ste// phag
200b5(rgyud): mo yungs kar tsam gyi tshad// gzhan ni lnga yi tshad tsam ste// gsal la rang bzhin med pa'o// ka nas g.yas bskoraka yi bar// mkha'agro drug cu bzhi ru nges// ka sogs zung rtsa
200b6(rgyud): mkha'agro te// phyi nas rtsa re mkha' 'gro ro// mal 'gro nas bskor mtshams kyi sar// sum cu rtsa bdun mkha 'gro ma// lte ba sprul par yang dag gnas// a sogs brgyad ni mkha'agro brgyad// de bzhin zung
200b7(rgyud): rtsa mkha' gro bzhi// snying ka ru ni yang dag gnas// zung rtsa gsum ni mkha' gro re// gzhan rnams rtsar mkha' 'gro ro// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi mgrin par gnas// rdo rje phag mo lta bar gnas// 
200b8(rgyud): gzhan ni spyi bor yang dag gnas// de nas sdom pa bshad bya ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// bde de sdom pa yang dag bshad// gang zhig bde ba khyad par can// nges par sdom pa yin/ 
201a1(rgyud): // par 'dod// rdo rje phag mo mi 'da' bas// sdom pa dam tshig tu ni bshad// mi phyed pas ni phyag rgyar gsungs// rdo rje bag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu
201a2(rgyud): gang lags// rkyen ni gang lags dus gang lags// tshad ni gang lags srung dus gang // lus ngag dam tshig ji ltar dbye// dang por nyams pa'i rgyu nyid kyang // 
201a3(rgyud): shes pa dang bag med dang // nyon mongs ldan dang ma gus dang // brjed ngas dran pa mi gsal ba// 'di drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu// bla ma ma bstan grogs ngan 'grogs// mdor na sgo
201a4(rgyud): gsum yengs pa'i yul// de dag nyams pa'i rkyen du gsungs // gdon gyis bar chod chang gis myos// log lta skyes dang khengs grags 'dod// nyon mongs zil non bla mas s+ho// / 
201a5(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po skyes pa dag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i dus yin te// spyir ni rtsod ldan dus su gsungs// gdon so/ gas gzhan gyis byin rlabs tshe// srung ba'i 'du shes sngon
201a6(rgyud): song na// chen po rdzogs kyang chung ngur gsungs// 'du shes sngon du ma song na// bgo med nyams pa so na gnas// gdon sogs rang gis ma mthong na// de yang nyams pa chung ngur gsungs// 'khor
201a7(rgyud): bas skyo dang rnam smin dran// bla ma dran dang 'dod pa skyes// bar chod bral ba bshags pa'i dus// sbyor ba dngos bzhi mjug dang gsum// gang rdzogs tshad ni mthar phyin te/ tshe 'bring dbye bas shes pa
201a8(rgyud): bya// spyir ba ltung ba chung ngu ste// dngos gzhi ltung ba 'bring du 'byung // 'jug rdzogs ltung ba chen po rangs// rgyan dang phyag rgya phyag mtshan dag/ 'tshang ba bsten pa'i dam tshig yin// sha lnga bdud rtsi
201b1(rgyud): la rnams ni// bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig go// sems can dpa' bo mkha' 'gro la// longs spyod mchod pa gang byed pa// blta bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/ rang gzhan sgyu mar gang shes pa// shes
201b2(rgyud): par bya ba'i dam tshig go// sgo gsum sku gsung thugasu bsam// bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshigo/ nyon mong gyi drug bzung 'dzin kun// rang gi skye ba med par bsgral// ba sgral ba'i dam tshig chen
201b3(rgyud): bo yin// dam tshig don du dam tshig deg/ dus drug dus gnyis le bar du// brtul zhugs can gyis dam tshig srung // dngos grub don du rtog tu srung // skad cing tsam yang gnang ba med// 
201b4(rgyud): rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las// gzhan gyi lus kyi nyes 'byung ba// / 'di ni sku yi nyes par bshad// rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las// gzhan gyi ngag gi nyes 'byung ba// bdag gi sku yi nyams
201b5(rgyud): ba ste// gzhan la gsung gi nyams par 'gyur// gzhan ya nga mkhas phra shes par bya// rang la rtsa ba'i nyes pa las// // gzhan la yan lag nyes 'byung dang // legs pa las ni
201b6(rgyud): nyes 'byung sogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya ste// 'bad de dam tshig bsrung bar bya// dam tshig de yi don rnams la// 'khor rnams 'jigs shing skrag gyur te// rdo rje phag mos yang zhu
201b7(rgyud): pa/ dam tshig 'di yi don rnams ni// zab cing rgya che rtogs par dka'// mgon po khyod kyis bzhes par zhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi khar zos slar la dor ba med
201b8(rgyud): ngan skyugs phyir dor slar la za ba med// rang rig byang chub bdud rtsi'i ro tshor na// log rtog 'khrul pa'i rgyu 'bras ga la tshol// de bas dam tshig kho na gtso bor gyis// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thad kyang rgyu/ 
202a1(rgyud): kyi don la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// mdu 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal ba rdzogaso// rgyag dkyim khan thog sa d+hA dang / ma ts+tshab dge slong shAkya ye sa
202a2(rgyud): kyis bsgyur ba'o// @6// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ag+ne mA le tan+tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal me'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// 
202a3(rgyud): hi hi he he kyi// bdag la khyed la zhu ba mchis// shri ni gang lags te gang lags// ru ni gang lags ka gang lags// dbang bzhi'i ha ru ka gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
202a4(rgyud): stsal pa// shrI ni gnyis medado ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs rnam par spangs// ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid// ni gang du mi gan so// de lta'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ rtag tu
202a5(rgyud): dang sems la gnas// de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi'i grangs kyi nges pa ste// dbang por bung dbang / ka/ sku dang phyag mtshan snang ba'i tshe// rang sems las su rung
202a6(rgyud): ba ste/ de tshe 'jig rten tha mal pa'i// rgyu drug rkyen bzhi 'bras bu bzhi// spangs pa'i phyir na he zhes brjod// las dang nyon mongs tshogs dang bral// de yi phyir na ru zhes brjod// 'jig rten tha
202a7(rgyud): mal rnam rtog gi/ gzung 'dzin gang yang mi gnas pa'i// phyir na ka zhes gsungs pa'o// thabs dang shes rab zung 'jug pas// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags gnyisu med// de yi phyi
202a8(rgyud): na shrI ru brjod// bskyed pa'i rim pa he ru ka/ phag mo la sogs tshogs dang ldan// zag med rgyu rkyen kun dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul// de nas gsang dbang he ru ka/ nyi zla
202b1(rgyud): mtshan ma yig 'bras tshogs// bskyed rims rgyu rkyen kun spangs te// rlung sogs las su rung bas na// de yi phyir na he zhes brjod// phyi yi sbyin sreg gtor ma dang / mchod pa dkyil
202b2(rgyud): 'khor la sogs pa'i// tshogs dang bral ba'i phyir na ru// bskrad pa'i rdo rje phag mo dang // dmigs dang lta spyod gang la yang // mi gnas phyir na ka zhes brjod// bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin gnyis
202b3(rgyud): med ma'o// phyir na shrI zhes gsungs pa ste// rgyu rnams lam la sogs dang ldan// rlung sogs thabs dang shes rab tshul// rlung sogs sgyu ma'i ngo bor gnas// rtsa rlung
202b4(rgyud): rang bzhin gnas la sogs// nang gi rgyu dang rkyen sogs/  ldan// nang gi dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nas shes rab/ ha ru ka/ rlung sogs rang bzhi ni gnas pa yi// rgyu spangs
202b5(rgyud): phyir na he zhes brjod// rlung sogs lam la brten pa yi// tshogs dang bral phyir ru zhes brjod// rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang // tsa nA li yi kha dog dang // dbyibs la mi
202b6(rgyud): gnas phyir na ka/ sems nyid bde bar gnas pa yis// nang gi thabs dang shes rab med// de yi phyir na shri ru gsungs// mig ser nad kyis btab pa ltar// rang sems bde bar gnas
202b7(rgyud): pabaso// sems nyid bde bar gnas pa dang // bde ba la rten tshogs dang ldan// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan// sems dang bde ba tha dad med// sems dang bde bar gang gnas pa// mtsho/ 
202b8(rgyud): dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// gsang ba'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nas bzhi pa'i he sa// rang rig stong par gnas pa'i tshe// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen dral// de yi phyir na ce zhes brjod// 
203a1(rgyud): rol phyir drug bde ba'i lam// thams cad stong par ro gcig pas// tshogs gnyis bral phyir ru zhes brjod// bde ba tsam la mi gnas phyir// ka zhes nges par brjod
203a2(rgyud): pab yin// sems nyid rang rig stong par gnas// stobs sogs phun sum tshogs pas na// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang // gzugs sku'i rgyu rkyen la sogs ldan// shrI zhes bya bar
203a3(rgyud): mngon par brjod// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// dngos po ro mnyam mtha' yas pa'i// sems kyi de nyid la gnas pa'i// bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ bdud rnams kun la
203a4(rgyud): thob 'tsham zhing // lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod rol// / mi gnas gsal ba'i rang bzhin med// me long ba/ bzhin 'dra chu zla bzhin// mkhas pas 'bad de 'khrul pa
203a5(rgyud): spang / de ltar don ni ma rtogs par// kha cig sku mdog phya ga mtshan la// he ru ka yi rnam par rtog/ kha cig ga zugs brnyan rnam par rtog/ kha cig rang gi ngo bor 'dod// 
203a6(rgyud): de bzhin rtsa dang rlung 'dod sogs// de bzhin rang rig he ru ka/ bla ma ma bsten brtson 'grus med// rigs dang rigs pa'i nga rgyal can// khe dang grags pa rnyed la dga'// rgyu des log tog/ 
203a7(rgyud): sna tshogs bskyed// de bas he ru kar grags pa// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dad dang gus bcas pha rol phyin// rdzogs byas bla ma dam pa las// man ngag yang dag blang bar bya// 
203a8(rgyud): me ma'i tshogs kyis yang zhus pa// he ru ka dpal de ltar ni// rdo rje phag ma dza ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje gsum ste phrag mo gnyis// don gyi rdo rje de nas/ 
203b1(rgyud): brtags// tha ma rdzas kyi rdo rje ste// don gyi rdo rje bzhi pa ste// gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// mi phyed phyir na rdo rje ste// dbang bzhis rdo rje re re'o// rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te// 
203b2(rgyud): gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu ste// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yin te// khams gsum sa dgu 'joms pa yi// rtag su rdo rje rtse dgu'o// rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te// 
203b3(rgyud): mi shes dri mchogs pa'i// dud 'gror skyes pa'i phag mo dang // shes rab char phyug lag mo ste// de nyid rnam pa bzhi ru ngas// bum dbang zhe sdang gti mug pheg/ gsang dbang rlung gi gti mug
203b4(rgyud): phag/ gsum pa chags dga' gti mug phog/ bzhi ba sa dbyings gti mug lag/ 'di nyid khyed la legs pa dar gtad// thams cad rje su yi rang ngo // dpal me'i phreng
203b5(rgyud): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka'i nges pa 'byung ba rdza gas so// // bla ma ga ya d+ha ra dang / dge slongashAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / 
203b6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shri badz+ra DA ki gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha'agro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// kyai ho mngon rdzogs rgyal po kye/ dbang
203b7(rgyud): rnams dam par yod dam ci// gtso 'khor khyad par med dam ci// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag tha dad med dam ci// dam tshig che chung med dam ci// de nyams bshags thabs
203b8(rgyud): yod dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang // rang rig ye shes glugs pa'i phyir// dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems
204a1(rgyud): / ngo bo ru// dbang ni nges pa kho na ste// lus ngag kun nas bslang bso// de phyir sems kyi dri ma ni// 'khrud dang 'thor dang sreg pa dang // mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 'byed pas// sad
204a2(rgyud): chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha' lta bur gsungs pa ste// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rim gyis ma bgrod dbang mi thob// bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la/ 
204a3(rgyud): thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang // mngon par rtogs pa'i yan 'go// 'di yis/ 
204a4(rgyud): ngan 'gro'i srid las grol// dbang dang man ngag 'brel paso// dade nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med// 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// slob dpon
204a5(rgyud): sems kyi rgyal po ste// 'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang // 'di ni/ sa thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sa/ sa bya// rdo rje 'gram 'bag sogs la// gzugs brnyan
204a6(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa yi// ras dang tshon la sogs pa yi// gzugs brnyan yongasu rdzogs pa la// byin rlabs ye shes byas nas ni// lha yin zer nas mchod sogs ste// bcos ma'i lha sog/ 
204a7(rgyud): de ltar na// phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la// ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa yi ni 'khrul gzhi dag/ bcos pa nye bar bcos ma dang // 'dra ba dang ni lta bu'o// 
204a8(rgyud): dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te// log pa'i srid pas srid par 'ching // 'khrul pas 'khor los 'khor bar bskor// de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // lha yi bu yi bdud sbas te// bla ma
204b1(rgyud): pa rtag tu bsten// yid ches rig dang nges shes skye// lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang // 'og ma spong zhing gos ma thob// man ngag tshad ma yin par blang // mos pa'i rjes su 'brang byed cing // che ba'i
204b2(rgyud): nga rgyal la gnas shing // 'jig rten lnga spyod 'dren po yi// snod bzung blas mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas kyi khyad par dbu su ste// rgyan gyi khyad par thal ba ste// rigs kyi khyad
204b3(rgyud): bar drug pa'i rigs// phyag dang zhal sogs khyad par gyis// gci 'khor la sogs khyad par 'phags// dper na pha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin med na// pha rol phyin pa'i ming
204b4(rgyud): mi 'thob// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gnas pa'i// de nyid kyi sra ni dkyil 'khor te// gang zhig dbus su mi gnas na// 'khor rnams dkyil du mi 'gyur te// dper na rgyal po med pa'i
204b5(rgyud): grong 'grong dang grong khyer ji bzhin no// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag/ kyang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dam/ tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// 
204b6(rgyud): sku gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dang ma byin len pa dang // 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i dam
204b7(rgyud): tshig de dang 'dra// tshul 'chos mi shes song ba tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // bral ba'i rin chen bdun pa de dag gis// 'khor los sgyur/ 
204b8(rgyud): ba'i ming ni mi thob bzhin// bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems can kyang // rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyang // rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag kyang // rang
205a1(rgyud): sems las su rung ba dang // ma rungs pa dang las kyi mtha'// log pa dang ni ma log pa// don byed nus dang mi nus pa// yongasu rdzogs dang ma rdzogs dang // sangs rgyas sems
205a2(rgyud): can gnyis snang // tha dad par ni mi brtag ste// chu khams gser dang na mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang sems rang gis rtogs pas na// sems can gdod nas
205a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas so// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// srog gcod la sogs dam tshig la// dbye ba khyed kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang gi lus ngag sems
205a4(rgyud): g.yos kyang // gsod pa'i 'du shes mo skyes na// srog bcad nyams pa chung bar nges// gzhan gyis gnod par tshor ba dag/ nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// de las bzlo/ 
205a5(rgyud): bapa chen por nges// gang zhig me byin chung blangs kyang // gzha/ la nyon mongs cher skyes na// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du ngas// cher blangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring // chen po
205a6(rgyud): las ni nyon mongs cher// de ni chen po kho nar nges// tshul 'chos ltung ba chen po ste// mi shes pa dang bag med dang // brjed ngas la sogs 'bring du gsungs// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams
205a7(rgyud): ba yi// che 'bring chung ngu'i ldan tshad dag/ rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka yi// rgyu rkyen dag las shes bya ste// ltung ba ngos sa zin pa dang // phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor
205a8(rgyud): chen po bzhengs// tshul dang 'thun par bshags pa bya// dam tshig gong 'og bye brag gi/ bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shes par bya// gzhan yang bshags pa'i bye brag los// sbyin sreg gis ni
205b1(rgyud): sdig sreg phyir// nang gi sbyin sreg chen po bas ma// rab pa'i me ni rgyun bzhag me// thabs kyi rgyun bzhag ma yin te// lo bdun dang ni lo gcig dag/ bye yi rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// zlab
205b2(rgyud): gsum dang bdun dang ni// 'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs// rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te// rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi// gtum mo ye shre/ 
205b3(rgyud): me rang bzhin// 'di ni rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// thog mtha' med par go nas pa'i phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ye shes me yi bud shing yin// man ngag can gyis bsre/ 
205b4(rgyud): byas na// nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges// dgang ga/ zar la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang / dang // rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // thams cad
205b5(rgyud): dga' zhing mgu bar gyur// dpal mkha' gro gsang ba rgyud kyi rgyu la po rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+hi ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur
205b6(rgyud): ba'o// shwa// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra bai ra ba bi dA ra Na tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tsha lo// 
205b7(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / ri rab kyi steng du bzhugs pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos// bcom ldan
205b8(rgyud): 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs rje che ldan bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje gang lags 'jigs byed gang // 'joms pa gang lags
206a1(rgyud): rgyud gang lags// rgyal po gang lags bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te// nyon mongs bdud sogs 'joms par
206a2(rgyud): byed// nyon mongs dgra sogs rnam par 'joms// rgyu yi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyud// mthar thug rgyud ni gang yin la// rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// re re'i
206a3(rgyud): bye brag ma 'tshal bas// de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te// don gyi rdo rje de nas rtags// rdzas kyi rdo rje dang ni gsum// de nas don gyi
206a4(rgyud): bshad// gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi phyed phyir// don gyi rdo rjer bshad pa'o// dbang bzhi rdo rje re re ste// rdo rje bzhi ru bshad pa yin// rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te// rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu pa// 
206a5(rgyud): rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi/ rtags// rtse dgu khams gsum sa dgu'i rtags// rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yino// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// sku mdog/ 
206a6(rgyud): phyag mtshan la sogs lha// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni// 'jig snang 'joms pas rdo rje'o// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le la// gzung 'dzin gnyisu gang rtogs
206a7(rgyud): po// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// shes rab ye shes dang 'brel bi'i// lhan cig skyes dga' lam sogs pa'i// gzung dang 'dzin pa gang rtogs pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje yin// 
206a8(rgyud): bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rang rig sems nyid stong nyid la// gzung 'dzin gnyisu gang rtog pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// de nas rtags kyi rdo rje ni// rtse gsum sku gsung thug su bshad// 
206b1(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje ste// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// ngargyal la sogs rnam pa lnga// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// de nas rdzas kyi rdo rje ni/ 
206b2(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi ru bstan pa ni// zur gsum rno la 'bigs pa dang // gru bzhi dag cing gsal bar byed// zlum pos rdzas rnams 'joms par byed// zur lngas 'dod sgrub sras rdo rje// rgyud kyi don ni rnam
206b3(rgyud): bapa bzhi// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i rgyud// mthar thug rgyud kyi rgyal po ste// de rnams kun la dbang byed pa// log lta'i rgyud sogs spong bar byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pad
206b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rje su yi rings te// g.yas phyogs nas la/ na gsum bskor ba byas te// so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gru/ 
206b5(rgyud): to// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogaso// bla ma ga ya d+ha ra dang / tsA ba shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
206b6(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ba la dz+nyA na rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal stobs chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sa phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag
206b7(rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la 'khor dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa mkha' gro ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor te bzhugs pa'i dus su// dpa'
206b8(rgyud): bo rdo rje mkha 'gro la sogs pas g.yon phyogs su bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dpa' bo rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la spyi bos gtums te// ha ha zhes pa gsum
207a1(rgyud): brjod nas// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// rtsa ni gang lags rlung gang lags// thig le gang lags grangs ni du// de la sems gzung ji ltar lags// 'khor lo rje
207a2(rgyud): ltar lags pa dang // de yi grangs ni du zhig mchis// rtsa rnams rang bzhin ji ltar lags// yi ge dgod thabs ji ltar lags// de rnams dbus kyi lte bar ni// yi ge dgod pa gang dang gang // gtum ma
207a3(rgyud): sbar ba ji ltar lags// zla ba nyi ma ji ltar lags// gnas ni gang du gzung bar bgyi// rkyen gnyis 'khor lo ji ltar lags// go bzlog tshul ni ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi gang lags// 
207a4(rgyud): de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang // de la dga' sogs ji ltara'abyung // stong pa bcu drug ji ltar lags// sa yi rim pa ji lta rwa lags// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang // dgos pa'i dgod
207a5(rgyud): pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsag/ nyon// cig dpa' bo rdo rje khyod// khyod la bshad kyis legs pa razung // rtsa rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ni// na mkha' gnyis med kyi/ 
207a6(rgyud): bskyed// der gnas rlung gi rang bzhin ni// g.yo ba rnam shes g.yo ba yin// thig le stong nyid ngo bo ste// stong nyid bsam du med pa'o// thig le grangs ni bcu drug ste// rtsa dang rlung yang de bzhin no// de na
207a7(rgyud): sems gzung bstan pa ni// rtsa dang rlung ni thig le la// gnyis med rtse gcig sems dang po// 'khor lo'i grangs ni bzhi yin te// bde chen 'khor lo longs spyod chos// de 'og sprul pa'i 'khor lo
207a8(rgyud): ste/ de re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug grangasu shes par bya// me rlung gnyis ni rkyen yin te// ro ma'i 'khor lo nyid dang ni// spyi gtsug 'khor lo dbang bskur gnas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo ban/ 
207b1(rgyud): yin te// bde skyong 'khor lo dang ba ste// mgrin lang spyod 'khor la yin// rig pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa'o// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhin yin no// nyi shu rtsab ni grang su bstan// rna rnams pa
207b2(rgyud): bzhin nga yis be shad// rtsa ni sa yi rang bzhin te/ rlung dang thig le'i rang bzhin no// de nas yi ge dgod pa ni// bde chen 'khor lo sum cu gnyis// gsel byed sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas
207b3(rgyud): nas bskor te dgod par bya// long spyod 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug/ dbyangs yig bcu drug g.yon nas dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo mdab ma brgyad// yum bzhi'i sa bon g.yon nas bskor// 
207b4(rgyud): thabs ni mtshams te g.yas nas bskor// sprul pa'i 'khor/ lo'i mdab ma ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi gang yin la// gsal byed g.yas bskor dgod par bya// dbyangs yig gnyis
207b5(rgyud): ldan g.yon nas bskor// bde chen 'khor lo'i lte dbus// zhi dkar po zur bltas bsam// long spyod 'khor lo 'i lto dbus// oM naM dkar po gyen bltas bsam// chos kyi 'gro
207b6(rgyud): lo'i lte dbus su// hUM ni sngon po thur bltas bsam// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbusu// AHni dmar po gye ni bltas bsam// rkyen gyi 'khor lo gnyis yin te// dang po'i gan su yi ge yaM/ 
207b7(rgyud): gtum mo 'bar ba'i yaM yin te// nag po yongasu gyur pa las// rlung 'khor mdog gnag gzhu yi dbyibs// dbus su d+ha lnga dgod byas nas// ba dan lnga ni mdzes pa'o// gru gsum gnasu ya ge raM// 
207b8(rgyud): me yi 'khor lo gru gsum dmar// dbus su oM AHhUM ni dgod// zur la rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan// rkyen gyi 'khor lo de ltar yin// rlung gis bskyod pas dam tshig mes// ye shes me ni bskul ba/ 
208a1(rgyud): // mkhas// 'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad// bde chen ma rtogs gnyis tsam bsregs// bde chen tsani bsros byas nas// nu ba 'chi med bdud rtsi ni// zla bzhu ba'i bdud rtsi
208a2(rgyud): yas srog gi rtsa yi nang nas 'bab// rgyun tu 'bab par gyur pa yis// 'chi med thigs pa gnyis yin te// gzung ba mdud pa'i nang du gzung // go bzlog lugasu bzlog pa ste// mthar thug
208a3(rgyud): gnas su gzung ba'o// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa ni// gsang ba bde skyong 'khor lo ste// hUM ni lte bar dgod byas nas// mdab ma lnga bcu brgyud kyi grangs// gas byed lugs bzhin dgod par
208a4(rgyud): bya/ dbyangs yig rim gnyis dag bkod nas// tha ma bzla dang ste spangs pa'o// sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong ste// de phyir bde skyong zhes ni bshad// rta mgrin 'khor lo'i 'dab bzung la/ 
208a5(rgyud): dbyangs yig lugs dang lugs min dgod// lte bar u ni da god par bya// bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba'i phyir// rta ma grin 'khor lo ru ni bshad// rig pa'i 'khor lo mdab ma lnga/ 
208a6(rgyud): bar ha ni dgod byas nas// mdab ma lnga la oM hA tra a// g.yas nas rims kyis dgod par bya// bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir// rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad// gsang ba'i 'kho
208a7(rgyud): lo rim pa drug/ lte ba mdab bzhi mdab ma brgyad// bcu drug sum cu rtsa gnyis te// drug cu rtsa bzhi bshad pa yin// lte bar a ni dgod pa ste// a baM ma ya de rnams ni// ma
208a8(rgyud): mgazhi la g.yon nas dgod// mdab ma brgyad la dgod bya ba// sde brgyad kyi ni dang po brgyad// g.yon gyi ram pas dgod par bya// mdab ma bcu drug gang yin la// ma mo bcu drug g.yon nas dgod// 
208b1(rgyud): mdab ma su bcu gnyis sogs la// dbyangs yig yi ge bcu drug ni// g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pas dgod// mdab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la// g.yas nas ka li lugs bzhin dgod// a la
208b2(rgyud): rim gnyis g.yon nas dgod// gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba yi phyir// gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad// de nas ro ma'i 'khor lo ni// mdab ma gnyis la lte bar bcas// ma ning bzhi yi mdab
208b3(rgyud): gnyis la// lce bar de nyid thur la dgod// rin chen rtse mo bsam bya ba// b+hU ni gyen la dgod par bya// yi ge gnyis ni dbus su ni// byang chub sems kyi bde ba'i ro// nyam su myong bar bya ba'i
208b4(rgyud): phyir/ nyams myong ro ma'i 'khor lor bshad// de nas dang dang bskur 'khor lo ni// steng gi tshangs sgo'i mdab ma brgya dad// lte bar a ni dgod pa ste// de laM khaM ru// g.yon nas
208b5(rgyud): brtsams te phyogs bzhir dgod// hUM traM hri a// g.yas na sa mtsham su rim par dgod// byang chub sems kyi chu na/ na gyis// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa dag/ 'khrud pa'i
208b6(rgyud): phyir na dbang bskur te// de phyir dbang bskur 'khor lor bshad// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// mdor bsdus sgom pa bshad par bya// gong du bstan pa gang yin pa// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// 
208b7(rgyud): rang rig sems las gzhan min te// rang gi sems kyi stong pa nyid// 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin du// ci yang mi rtog shes gyur no// ma bsgoms na yang sgom pa nyid do// de ltar sems la log
208b8(rgyud): par zung // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa'i// dpa' bo/ mkha'agro ma dang / ma mo la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rje su yi rang ba
209a1(rgyud): / phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas mi spang bar gyur to// dpal stobs chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rmad du byung ba rdzogs so// 
209a2(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya dA ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / 6// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra sid+d+h+ya dz+wa la saM ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje grub/ 
209a3(rgyud): pa'i dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na/ rin po che khang
209a4(rgyud): bzang gi nang na// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / dga' bo dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin ga
209a5(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs/ pa'i dus su// rigs rgyu ma'i dbang du mdzad de/ thams cad kyis lha'i phyi nang gi gsang bla na med pa'i mchod
209a6(rgyud): ba'i dus su// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// thal mo sbyar te gsol pa/ mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// de nyid don dam gang
209a7(rgyud): yin pa// dpal dang rdo rje'i don dang ni// dra ba sdom pa rgyud kyi don// nges bstan sdom po gang yin pa// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa la
209a8(rgyud): sogs 'khor rnams kun// phyi rol don la yengs pa'i sems// nang du bsdus la rtse gcig nyon// dpal ldan ye shes gnyis med de// de nyid mchod pa'i 'os yin la// gnyis med
209b1(rgyud): bde bas mchod par bya// rdo rje zhes bya ye shes lnga// gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi phyed phyir// rdo rje zhes ni bstan pa yin// de nyid don la rtse gcig pas// chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'o// 
209b2(rgyud): ni nges par thob pa'o// dra ba zhes pa mang po'i don// kun rdzob gzhan rag du bstan pas// grangs mang rgya tshar bstan pa ni// na mkha' dang mtshungs sdom pa'i doni// na mkha' dang mtshungs
209b3(rgyud): rang rig ni// sems kyi de nyid stong pa'o// skad cig de nyid rgyud nyid la// rgyud zhes bya bar bstan pa yin// dpal rdo rje dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las// mtshan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste dang ba'o// 
209b4(rgyud): de las gzhan ni nga yis bshad// ye shes skye ba'i rgyu dang gnas// rkyen dang de bzhin dmigs pa'i yul// bye brag/ ming gi rnam grangs dang // don gyi rnam grangs gang yin dang // 
209b5(rgyud): paphan yon dang ni 'bras bu dang // don dam de nyid chos kyi dbye/ ngas// de nyid 'dir ni bshad par bya// rgyu ni rang rig ye shes te// rgyu med rgyu yi rang bzhin can// rang rig rgyu mar byung ba ni// 
209b6(rgyud): bde chen 'khor lo nas brtsams te// 'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// ye shes skye ba'i rten yin la// gnas ni de dang mnyam pa'i rtsa// grogs ni ye shes rlu
209b7(rgyud): yin te// ye shes rlung gi bzhon pa la// zhon nas de nyid 'byung ba yin// grangs ni snga ma ltar du shes// ngo bo thig le nyid yin te/ thig le mdud pa'i grangasu shes// de yi phan yon gang yin pa// 
209b8(rgyud): gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// phyin ci log tu brtags pa yi// rnam par rtog pa spong ba yin// 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyu
210a1(rgyud): / las ye shes kyi rgyu dang gnas la sogs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'khor lo rnams kyi dbye ba ni// bde chen 'khor lo'i mdab ma ni/ 
210a2(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs yin no// de nas longs spyod 'khor lo ni// mdab ma bcu drug dag tu bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo mdab ma brgyad// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i mdab ma ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi dag
210a3(rgyud): yin no// bde chen 'khor lo sor bzhi ste// long spyod 'khor lo sor bcu drug/ chos kyi 'khor lo sor bcu gnyis// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug/ bde chen 'khor lor lte ba ru// haM ni dkar
210a4(rgyud): po zur bltas bsam// longs spyod 'khor lo'i lte dbus/ oM ni dmar po gyen bltas bsam// chos kyi 'khor lo 'i lte dbus su// hUM ni sngon po thur bltas bsam// sprul pa'i
210a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i lte dbus// AHni dmar po gyen bltas pas// / dang po'i 'khor lo'i mdab ma la// dbyangs kyi yi ge/ bcu drug ni// lugs 'byung lugs min dgod par bya// long sgra
210a6(rgyud): 'khor lo'i mdab ma la// dbyangs yig bcu drug rim bzhin dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdab ma la// l-I mAM ba tAM/ yi ge 'di rnams g.yon nas dgod// oM tr-i hri a/ mtshams nas g.yos
210a7(rgyud): su dgod par bya// sprul pa'i mdab ma bzhi rtsibs la// gsal byed yi ge sum cu gnyis// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog tshul dgod// sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa gsum ni// dbus nas drang
210a8(rgyud): por gnas po ste// hUM ni dkar po thar bltas pa// mar gyi rtsel thug par dgod// g.yas na thabs kyi rtsa gnas te// ka li sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// thabs la lan gsum bskor byas nas// 
210b1(rgyud): lugs 'byung 'og tu la bltas dgod// g.yon na shes rab rtswa gnas la// ma mo dbyang yig bcu drug ni// gyen la bltas pa dgod par bya// skal tshigs la gnas srog la rten// 
210b2(rgyud): rtsagasum 'dus pa'i gnas der ni// rin chen dang 'dra mdud pa ni// dgu por gnas pa byi gdong tshul// chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// bde ba rag ster ma ni bzhugs// gzhan yang rkyen
210b3(rgyud): gyi 'khor lo gnyis// gru gsum gnasu yi ge ra// de ni yongasu gyur pa las// me yi 'khor lo gru gsum pa// tshad ni sor gsum nyid yin te// lte bar raM ni dmar po bsam// mdab ma ga
210b4(rgyud): la oM AHhUM// gru gsum zur la dgod bya ba// rdo rje rtsegs dam bsam par bya// rlung gi gnasu yi ge yaM// de nyid yod su gyur pa las// mdog gnag gzhu yi dbyibs 'dral// tshad ni
210b5(rgyud): sor bzhi nyid yin no// dbus su mdab ma lnga yin te// lte bar yang ni nag po bsam// mdab ma lnga la d+ha lnga dgod// ba dan lnga yis mtshan pa'o// rlung gi dam tshig me sbar bas// 
210b6(rgyud): dam tshig me yis gtum mo bskul// ye shes mes ni gtum mo bskul// 'khor lo gsum bsregs rnyed pa tsam// yi ge ha ni bsros pa yis// haM bzhu bdud rtsi'i char yang bab// lte ba'i
210b7(rgyud): gnas su thig ler gyur// rgyun tu 'bar bar gyur pa yis// rin chen dbyibs 'dra'i nang slebs nas// rang bzhin dga' ba nyams myong bas// rang gi sems kyi snying po'i ro// bzhi pa'i
210b8(rgyud): dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nyid rtogs par gyur pa yis// chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo bzhi bstan pa'i
211a1(rgyud): / le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs pa'o// des don du ni nga yis gsungs// de yi don la khyed rnam kyis
211a2(rgyud): ses kyis 'de ba cag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byams pa dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs bdapa' bo dang // rnam 'byor ma'i 'khor dpa
211a3(rgyud): tu med pa thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas rje su yi rang nas lha'i mchod pa rnam bdums mchod pa ni mkha' la rin po che'i char dang / sgeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / dga' bo'i mchod pa'i rnam
211a4(rgyud): pa dang / pa ta hi la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang / gzhan ya/ nga lha'i me rtog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / zhal za sa kyi mchod pa ro brgya pa dang / gtum pa'i mchod pas mchod de// 
211a5(rgyud): gzhan yang nang dang / gsang ba dang // gsang ba'i gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po rmad du byung ba mchod nas lan gsum bskor byas te/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar
211a6(rgyud): gyur to// dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan bau g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slob shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// 
211a7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta gar+b+ha ar+tha tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po don gyi rgyud// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam
211a8(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa zad sku gsungs kyi rdo rje bdag/ snying po mchog ni bzhugs pa'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs te// sangs rgyas rnams
211b1(rgyud): kyi ye shes sku// sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni// mtha' dang bral ba yin mod kyi// srid dang 'khor bar rab tu grags// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yin// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
211b2(rgyud): gsol// kye ho rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// na mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs lus// gsung gi mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal// skye med dbyings nas snang byed 'khrungs// 'gro drug 'dren pa khyod
211b3(rgyud): kyis gsung // nyid kyi zhal nas thig pa shor// ka ka ru dang margad dang / spug dang rdo yi snying po dang // rin chen kha dog sna lnga pas// ye shos gzhol yas kha dog spras// nyid las mi gzhan 'jigs
211b4(rgyud): byed dang // rgyal sras dad pa gtam nyan dang // 'gro ba 'ang la ba'i 'khor rnams so// de nas bcom ldan shAka thA dab kyi// gsung gi dgongs pa mkhyen nas ni// sangs rgyas rnams
211b5(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi// rang 'byung ye shes bsdu ba mdzad// de ba zhin gshegs kyis 'di skad du// ched du brjod pa rnamabar mdzad// gang zhig rtsol med bde chen don// lhan cig skyes
211b6(rgyud): ba ma mthong na// sgrub dang rtsol ba ci spyad kyang // byis pa don med ga chad du// rdzas bzung ba ni 'ching ba nyid// rten 'brel sgom pa gnyis pa'o// don med nyams myong 'dod pa yang // 'ching ba'i rgyu
211b7(rgyud): ste gsum pa'o// kha cig e ri'i thal bas byugs// dbang phyug na mkha'i rdzas rnams sdud// 'ching ba'i rgyu ste bzhi pa'o// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // mtha' dang bral ba'i da
211b8(rgyud): bzhin la// gzung 'dzin nad kyis ci la 'ching // gdod nas dag pa'i nam mkha' la// bag chags mtshan mas ci la 'ching // skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid la// rgyu 'bras nad kyis ci la 'ching // 
212a1(rgyud): bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes la// rtog dpyod nad kyi cil 'ching // e ma'o rnam dag sems nyid glong // lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'od gsal sna tshogs dus na bde/ 
212a2(rgyud): rnam dag 'khor lo bde ba la// bsnun pa'i blo gros log pa yis// srid rgyu nges pa'i rtsa bar 'khyams// gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad gsungs// zhen chags can gyi gdul bye la// bde ba chen/ 
212a3(rgyud): bcos ma sbyin// khong khro can gyi gdul bya la// g.yo ba rlung gi bcos ma sbyin// 'dod pa chu bzhin gdungs pa la// bkri drang rang rgyud bcos ma sbyin// kun tu rmongs pa'i yid can la// stong pa ste// 
212a4(rgyud): rje bcos ma sbyin// ston pas de skad bka' stsal pa// 'khor rnams bsdu ba rnam mdzad de// de bzhin gsheg sa la 'di skad gsol// ye nas rnam par dag pas na// kham
212a5(rgyud): gsum 'khor ba la ltar lags// glo bur ba cig lags 'gyuran// thog mtha' yod par mi 'gyur ram// yang na rdo rje sems sogs pa// dmyal bar 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ram// 
212a6(rgyud): 'khor ba bde ba grub pa na// sbyang btub pa ni ci zhig gu/ de skad gsol nas mi snang gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// nga la nyan pa khyed leg so// rtse gcig yid kyis dang bar byos// ma
212a7(rgyud): des kha dog 'ja' tshon las// rigs kyi khyad par tha dad snang // ldan la lha mi gcig pa'o// ma bsdus gcig tu rdzogs pa'o// smra ba'i seng ge 'jig
212a8(rgyud): ba med// bka' yi dgongs pa shin tu zab// margad blo yi mching bu len// sna tshogs kha dog rigasu bsgyur// dper na sA sti ka bzhin no// ka ran ta yi skye bzhin no// brtags shing brtags
212b1(rgyud): shing skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku// khyab bdag na mkha'i sna tshogs gzugs// deng bdag sems dpa'i lus su 'gyur// 'gro ba'i mgon pos de skad du// bshad nas
212b2(rgyud): 'khor rnams dengs gyur te// phyogs gcig tu ni 'khor gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// lta ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bu// ma bcos ngo bo ji lta bu// ye shes spyod pa ji lta bu// 
212b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legaso 'dus pa'i tshogs chen pos// rnam pa drug gi mtshan nyid de// khyad par bdun dang mtshon pa'i dpe// bcu bzhi rnam pa ci rigasu// bcu gsu
212b4(rgyud): ma nor zhesu bshad// lhan cig skyes pa khyab gnas pa// mdo ngan sum dbang gi ngo bor shar// sbyin pas bzlog nas blta sa pa yis// na mkha' las 'bab bde skyong nas// thur du
212b5(rgyud): 'khor lo drug rim su// a ta rak+Sha bde ba len// ye shes zer zhing sdug bsngal ste// rmongs pas mya ngan sdig pas 'a dzin// de mi spong ba'i 'ching bar 'gyuraro// si dA'i tshul du
212b6(rgyud): dge slong gnyis// dbang rdzogs zer zhing bde ba spyod// 'chi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar song // rgyal po'i khab ni btsun mo can// chom du sdud cing rig pa yis// ye shes gzhan la 'chad cing ston// 
212b7(rgyud): 'chi 'phros dur khrod sa ga yi// smad 'tshong ma yi srin bur skyes// 'jig rten khams gzhan sems dmyal du// shin tu 'tshed cing 'bod par 'gyur// brig sha'i drung na a ko ta// bka' yis
212b8(rgyud): ba rnam par byed// kha sbyor ba ni ye shes ces// bzhin bzang ma lo legs par dgod// tshe 'phos nas ni ngu 'bod skyes// 'chad pa'i skyes bu de phyir ngas// khyod kyis 'di ba bstan par bya// sem
213a1(rgyud): / kyi rang bzhin ma bcos pa// mi rtog lnga ba mi dmigs shes// mi g.yong ba ma 'da' dam// de skad gsung nas mi snang gyur// 'dri ba'i rtog pa dang po chod// 'chad pa'i
213a2(rgyud): skyes bus yang gsol pa// 'gro ba'i bla ma gnyen gcig pu/ dam phog pa ni ji ltar lags// dbang gi rang bzhin ji ltar lags// rtog pa gnyis pa dris pa las// lta ba'i le'u ste gnyis
213a3(rgyud): po'o// / lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba yi// gang la ming de skad pa yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// mtshon pa'i dpe ni 'di skad gsungs// nag po brtsegs pa ba btang // 
213a4(rgyud): ta dang ni kang ka dang / phag dang glang po gzhon nu ma// zla chu shel glang seng dang // o nga chu bo gsum 'dres dang // gas dar dang na mkha'i ri bo ma// gsum pa bcu bzhir shes par gyi
213a5(rgyud): de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa ste// de las gang zhig 'da' byed pa/ dmyal bar yang dag 'tshod par bshad// e ma'o ra rig skal chen po// na mkha'i sprin la 'bud par byed// byis
213a6(rgyud): pa rang bzhin mi shes pas// bcos med rang bzhin spro bsdu byed// rnam dag 'od gsal sgrib pa med// ye shes rgya mtshor zhugs rmongs pas// kun tu 'ching ba'i mdad pa nyid// kun tu 'chi
213a7(rgyud): ba rgyun mi 'chang // lhan cig skyes pa'i mda' 'phangs kyang // bsnun pa'i blo gros log pa yis// gcig dang du mas sems bskrad pas// rmongs pa nga rgyal spel bar byed// rlung gi rgyu ba dral ba'i lha// yig
213a8(rgyud): 'bru kha dog go bar byed// yid dang hUM ni rgyu ba ni// snang ba 'gags pa ye shes so// de nyid log pas 'ching ba'i hU~M// tshangs pa yin tsan+da li// sba rabs lnga nyid 'od du zhu// ka sogs g.yas dang g.yon// 
213b1(rgyud): a2 yig mgo tshig dang gsos pa dang / stong phrag bdun bcu'i rtsalam nas// bab pa bde ba skyed par byed// don dam pa'o zhes su smra// rmongs pa bsdams pas mdud bgrol// zag pa skyes
213b2(rgyud): bas 'ching bar 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pas rigs pa yis// ci rigs pa ru gzhan la ston// grol bar 'gyur zhes nga mi smra// e ma'i blo ni gnyi su snang // ji ltar spyad kyang grol mi 'gyuraro// dbang
213b3(rgyud): gi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // gang la ming de skad bya ba'o// ting nge 'dzin la stobs par zhugs// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rtog pa gsum la bcad pa'i phyir// stan la langs te 'di
213b4(rgyud): skad gsol// na mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs lus// sbom po'i rang bzhin ji ltar lags// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpa' khyod la // phyag 'tshal rdo rje rang 'byung sems// phyag rnams dag pa'o// 
213b5(rgyud): gsal dbyings// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'ad// 'gro ba'i bla ma ye shes gzugs// gzung gi thigs pa lhan cig skyes// rnam dag rang gis dbyings la 'dud// 
213b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// kye ma sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// mngon du gyur pa sgom pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs 'bar ba ye shes drod// ci yang mthong la med rtogs na// ma mthong gnas na
213b7(rgyud): mthong ba ru// mthong ba 'gag cing bltas na skye// shes rab ye shes 'od po che// ci dgar bzhag na bde ba 'gog/ ye shes rgya mtsho yi gsal la// sangs rgyas sgom par mi mdzad do// de la
213b8(rgyud): gnyen po yod dam ci// rigs pas ston pa 'ching ba'i nang // 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// bde ba de ni ston mdzad dam// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod nyid kyis// bstan par nus sam 'on te ci// bsnya
214a1(rgyud): du med pas brjod dang bral// sgrub tu med pas dpe dang bral// mtshon du med pas tshig lam chad// lhan cig skyes pas sgrub tu med// mngon du gyur pas sgom du che/ 
214a2(rgyud): dpyad du med pas bcos dang bral// ma yengs blo ya sa rtogs pa'o// sgom pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe// 'chad pa'i skyes bu nyid kyang ni// brgya la nas sa la 'gyel 'gyur te// lha min
214a3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// so sor 'byed te dengs par 'gyur// lha yi bu mo stong phrag ni// chos la rdul mig rnam paro dag/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri yang // de ma thag tu mngon sangs
214a4(rgyud): rgyas 'jig rten khams ni drug g.yos pas// 'ur 'ur po dang chem chem gyis// khams gsum po na 'dar bar byed// / de yi modo la sems rdzogs pa// ngo mtshar skyes nas 'di/ 
214a5(rgyud): skad gsol// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi rje// rdzogs/ sangs rgyas pa bde ba'i mchog/ skal ldan 'dul byed gnyen gcig pu// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// khyo
214a6(rgyud): kyi thugs kyi ye shes kyis// ma rig sgo nga'i ling thog bsal// rnam dag ye shes khyod la 'dud// dga' mgu rangs nas gsol ba dang // thams cad 'dud cing 'dud bar byed// sgom po'i le'u
214a7(rgyud): ste bzhi pa'o// / de skad bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs te// bka' yi bsgri ba 'di skad mdzad// leg so 'dus pa'i tsho gas chen rnams// yang dag ye shes la
214a8(rgyud): zhugs pas// rnam rtog 'ching ba'i nad dang bral// mtha' dang bral ba'i rang bzhin la// bzlog pas bltas pa tha dad 'dzin// gnyug ma'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes// de yang bcings pas ci la
214b1(rgyud): mthong // gang gis de nyid mngon gyur pa// de la sdig pas ci la 'dzin// dus gsum 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa// de la byin gyis rlob par mdzad// de la gal te gzugs yod na// dpag
214b2(rgyud): gam gzhal du btub bam ci// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// de la ci rigs skyob par byed// gnod sbyin mthu chen thob pa yang // srung ba rgyun tu byed par 'gyur// grul bum srin po gdon rnam/ 
214b3(rgyud): kyis/ de yi bsam pa yongasu sgrub// nad dang shu ba 'bras dang rims// de yi lus la 'byung mi 'gyur// bskal par bsags pa'i sgrib pa yang // skad cig ma yis 'byang bar 'gyur// rgyun tu
214b4(rgyud): zhugs dang lan cig 'ong // phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dpa' yis// de yi gzi brjid 'phel bar byed// de bas sam das dpa' chen po nyon// khyab pa'i 'khor lo bde ba'i mchog
214b5(rgyud): de nyid pha rol phyin drug ldan// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung / dam pa'i don la 'jal bar nus// don gyis chos nyid 'jal bar ston// bla ma'i zhal nas dris na skye// rtogs na
214b6(rgyud): 'byor skyes bu de// na mkha'i rdul phran ston par 'gyur// ma rabs sgyu ma'i tshig la 'dzin// lhan cig skyes pa mthong ngam ci// gal te mthong na brtag par 'gyur// brtags na yongs te 'khyin
214b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// gnyis kyi tshul mya ngan snang // kha dog gcig tu bsgyur ba yi// bde ba chen po 'khor ma mchog/ rnal ma la gnas 'ching 'gral 'gyur// gang zhig tham 'dren shes ngas
214b8(rgyud): bamed pa nyid dusan// tha ma lo/ 'dri mo shes pa// de yis lha ni skyes kyil mthong // lhan cig skyes pa yis bcings// der 'gro ba skye zhing 'tshong / ya dang ga zengs pas nad du rdzam du
215a1(rgyud): dang gnas su bgrangs pas ldog/ bdag dang gzhan du bltas pas ldog/ 'di dang phyi mar bsnyad pas gol// skye med lhan skyes bcos pas 'ching // de skad bcom ldan 'ad
215a2(rgyud): kyis bshad// 'chad pa'i skyes bus 'di skad bstod// a ma'o rnam dag ye shes sku// khyab bdag gsung gi lde mig sgo// ma rig sgrib pa drol ba'o// bde bar gshegs pa ye shes sku// e
215a3(rgyud): ma'o rnal 'byor thugs kyi btsud// 'gro ba sdug bsnga ga'i lnga bsgral// ma skyes lhan cig 'gag med cing // byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// phan yon gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//

215a7(rgyud): thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhug so// de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyis phyi'i mchod pa dang // nang dang / gsang ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas

215b1(rgyud): de bzhin rgyud kyi rgyal ba tsa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te// 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi ru brjod// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid do// dang po phyi yi 'khor lo ni//

215b3(rgyud): mal gcod pas phyi ru bshad// gnyis pa nang gi 'khor lo ni// gnas sogs bcu yi rim pa rnams// mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og dang // 'khor lo sgo la dgod pa ni// phyi rol spros pa gcod pa'o// gsu
215b4(rgyud): pab gsang ba'i 'khor lo ni// sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang / de bzhin bde ba chen po ste// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis// / gnasu gyur pas sdug bsngal gcod// dga' ba dang ni mcho

215b7(rgyud): yi 'khor lor sdom// gdod nas lus la grub pa yi// rtsa dang rlung dang byang sems kyang // a ba d+hU tI'i nang du sde ma// bde ba stong pa mi rtog dang // dngos dang dngos med ye shes kyang // dbyer ma
215b8(rgyud): gnyug ma'i ngang du sdom// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te// gnas skabs gsum gyi dri ma dang // 'jug dang zhugs dang nges pa yis// rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste// dang po 'khor ba'i rang bzhin
216a1(rgyud): la// gnyis pa thun mong mya ngan 'das// rgyal po zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// 'od ma'i yon tan ldan pa dang // nges pa'i don la dbang byed dang // gnyen po ye shes che ba dang / gzhan

216a4(rgyud): tshang dang // 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i keng rus dang // 'jig sa sde rnams ni shar sogs kyi// phyogasu g.yon nas ba skor te gnas// ha har dgod pa dbang ldan te// dpal gyi nags/

216b4(rgyud): ldan dang ni dung skyong ni// g.yas kyi phyogs nas dgod pa'o// / sgra sgrogs pa dang rmugs pa dang // mun pa can dang kun tu 'khyil// shar nas byang gi phyogasu dgod// 'khrigs pa gang /

217a2(rgyud): khrod 'chi// gsang ba rig pa'i ye shes khrod// de nas dur khrod dgos pa ni// rnam shes dag pas dar khrod la// phyogs stong mi dag bcu po spong // sangs rgyas brgyad kyi mtshan mo shing //

217a4(rgyud): bya zab pa la// me sogs rtog pa bral ba'o// rdo rje snying pos yang ga sol ba// bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags// de ba bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung thug

217a6(rgyud): bu dang phung po'i bdud// bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom ldan 'das// skal ba yon tan drug nyid de// dbang phyug da ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang // ye shes phun
