217a8(rgyud): thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gnas// btsun mo zhes pa chos kyi dbyings// de la yod phyir b+ha ga ste// mi phyed pas na bzhugs zhes bya// rdo rje snying pos yang / 
217b1(rgyud): yang gsol ba// dpa' bo zhes pa gang la bgyi// de bzhin dpa' mo nyid kyang ci// de yi mchod pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// dpa' bo la yang rnam bzhi ste// bum
217b2(rgyud): pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// lha yi rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// tha mal pa yi rnam rtog spong // des na phyi yi dpa' bor bshad// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa rlung thig le bsgoms
217b3(rgyud): ba yis// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog 'joms pa ni// nang gi dpa' bor bshad pa yin// gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// dga' ba bzhi yi don bsgoms pas// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa
217b4(rgyud): 'joms// de ni gsang ba'i dpa' bo yin// bzhi pa'i dbang dang / 'brel ba yi// gnyisu med pa gang bsgoms pas// tha dad rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir// de kho na yi dpa' bor
217b5(rgyud): ba shad// dpa' mo la yang rnam pa bzhi// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// gdod nas spros bral lhun grub la// lta ba'i zhen pa spong ba ni// de ni phyi yi dpa' mor bshad// nang du rtsa
217b6(rgyud): dang thig le sogs// rang bzhin med par byed pas ma// gsang ba dga' ba bzhin rnams la// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pas ma// rang bzhin sems kyi ngo bo ni// nam mkha' lta bur gang sgom pa// den
217b7(rgyud): na yi dpa' mo'o// mchod pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi// phyis nang gsang ba de kho na// dang po phyi yi mchod pa ni// me tog bdug spos mar me dang // dri dang lha ba shos btung ba dang // rol mo sil snyan dbyangs
217b8(rgyud): nyid dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// ro dang reg bya 'jam pa dang // 'khor lo rin chen glang po rta// btsun mo dmag dpon blon po rnams// phyi yi mchod pa thun mong ngo // rang gi lus las byung ba
218a1(rgyud): // ba yi// bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba dang // sha lnga lhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni// phung po khams dang skye mched kyi// 'khor lo rnams la mchod pa nang // de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// 
218a2(rgyud): rang snang thabs kyi rig ma yis// sgra gzung b+ha ga ku tsa bcir// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le sogs// dga' ba mchog dga' dga' bral dang // lhan cig skyes pa'i bde bas mchod// rang rig stong pa
218a3(rgyud): rtogs pa yi// 'od gsal de nyid chos sku la// zhon pa rnams dang bral ba ni// bla na med pa'i mchod pa'o// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol ba// gtor ma zhes pa gang la bgyi// de yi phan yon ji ltar 'gyur
218a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gtor ma rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// phyi nang gsang bde kho na// dang po phye yig tor ma ni// thun mtshams lha yi mdun nyid du// ram las
218a5(rgyud): me dang yam las rlung // spyod gsum a las dum gcig 'o// nang du bdud rtsi sha lnga la// sku gsung thugs kyi sgra/ kha yis// lha rnams mnyes par byed pa dang // mkha' gro/ 
218a6(rgyud): dgyes par byed pa'o// gnyis pa nang gi gtor ma ni// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// lus ni lha yi 'khor lo la// rtsa ni ye shes mkha 'gro ma// srin bu las kyi mkha 'gro mchod// gsum
218a7(rgyud): pa gsang ba'i gtor ma ni// 'khor lo bzhi yi ka pA lar// rlung dang thig lo bdud rtsil// dga' ba gsum gyis byin rlabs te// lhan cig skyes pa mchod par ba// de nyid bzhi pa'i gtor ma ni// phyi
218a8(rgyud): nang dngos po'i gtor ma kun// chos kyi dbyings kyi pade snod du// don dam sems kyi sngags kyis su// bde ba chen po'i lha la mchod// phan yon dngos grub stor ba dang // phyi nang bar chad sel ba dang / 
218b1(rgyud): zas kyi dag 'tshams pa dang // khams dang skye mched rnas pa dang // rgas sra lus kyi mdangs ldan zhing // smyud kar gnyer ma spong ba dang // dngos pa'i gdon las grol ba dang / 'khor bzhi
218b2(rgyud): pha rol son pa'o// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu// de nas 'khrul nas ji ltar 'khor// ma 'khrul don la ji ltar lahA/ de las yon tan ji ltar 'byung // 
218b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas dang // sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan dag/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs shing // ma gsum
218b4(rgyud): gsung bar mi 'gyur te// des na sangs rgyas thams cad/ kyis// sems kyis gsang 'di gsang ba'i mchog/ khams gsum brtan dang g.yor bcas pa// snang
218b5(rgyud): myong zhing grub pa med// de phyir 'khor ba'i ming yang med// gamar ma skyes rang bzhin dag/ zla bur sangs rgyas mang yang med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ma yin// kun
218b6(rgyud): rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang gzhan rig pa 'od gsal sogs// slar med brjod du med pa ste// dper na lkugs pas ro myong 'dra// ras dang shel 'dra'i rang bzhin la// log rtog rtsi
218b7(rgyud): sogs rnam par 'khrul// khams gsum brtan dang g.yor spang zhing // 'dod pa'i byang chub sna tshogs dang / de dag spyod pa sna tshogs dag/ de nyid g.yeng dang rnam rtog ste// rang gis 'khrul
218b8(rgyud): nas rang gis 'ching // rang gis gcod cing rang gis za// rang gis ltung zhing rang sdug bsngal// ring gi ye nas spros bral la// sgra dang tha snyad 'jug na 'khrul// rang rig rang gis 'od gas
219a1(rgyud): la dam rig mun pas bsgribs na 'khrul// dngos po stong par ro mnyam la// blad dang dor bar byed na 'khrul// 'dod yon dang gis 'gags pa la// de dag dka' bas sngan
219a2(rgyud): na 'khrul// rang rig ye nas stong pa la// 'dod yon lnga la brtan na 'khrul// dman dang gya nam med pa la// spyi dang bskur ba 'debs na 'khrul// gdod nas spros bral lhun grul la// snum
219a3(rgyud): dang mi sgom byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med la// de dag gnyi su 'dzin 'khrul// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med la// ba den pa gnyis su 'byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas
219a4(rgyud): 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal// skye 'gag gang ltar 'dod kyang 'khrul // stong nyid ro la mi gnas par// dngos po mtshan dmar gzung na 'khrul// sems kyi glang chen mi 'dul bar// g.ye/ 
219a5(rgyud): ba'i sems 'dug na 'khrul// rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod pa'o// / rang rig ye shes 'dod na 'khrul// rang sems/ rang gis ma mthong bar// che ba'i nga rgyal sman 'khrul// rang rig
219a6(rgyud): nyam su ma myong bar// dkar po chos rnams spong na 'khrul// sangs rgyas ma 'khrul sems can 'khrul// rang bzhin ma 'khrul rang rig 'khrul// sems nyid ma 'khrul bag chags 'khrul// 
219a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas las 'khrul sems can de// rang rig las 'khrul gzhan rig snang // sems nyid las 'khrul bag chags 'byung // des na rang sems 'khrul pa dag/ don du snang ba rab tu smra/ 
219a8(rgyud): skye ba med bzhin skye bas 'khrul// lcags bsregs sa ga/ zhi rang gi sems// me sogs byed pa gzhan na med// bkres skom sdug bsngal rang gi sems// zas skem bkres pa gzhan na/ 
219b1(rgyud): med/ brdegs gcog lcag gzhus rang gi sems// srog gcod shan pa gzhan na med// 'gro ba thams cad rang sems kun// rang gi semasu ma shes na// de yis sangs rgyas spangs pa
219b2(rgyud): yin/  bla ma dam pa rtag tu bstan// theg chen zab mo'i mdo rgyud blta// sgrom du med pa'i don bsgoms nas// ma bsgoms na yang sgom pa'i mchog/ de ltar gyur pa'i mkhas pa la// stong
219b3(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur gang yang med// de las mya ngan las 'das pa 'byung // sku dang stobs la sogs pa kun// nor bu'i tshul du rang bzhin 'byung // de dag sems kyis rang bzhi no// lha mos gsol/ 
219b4(rgyud): ba bcom ldan 'das// rten gyi gang zag rnam pa du// rgyud kyi rnam grangs du zhig mchis// gdul bya gang la rgyud rnams bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can
219b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas// gdol pa ko lpags mkhan la/ sogs// gzugs ngan gsod pa'i don gnyer ba// theg pa 'di las 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rdzogs
219b6(rgyud): pabapar sgom pa dang // gtso bo yab yum sgom pa dang // dbu ma'i spyan la sems 'dzin pa// bskyed rims spros dang bcas pa'i lam// rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// lha sogs bu mo man/ 
219b7(rgyud): ldan la// chags pas chags pa spong ba ni// las kyi phyag rgya tshogs pa'i lam// gnas pa rtsi dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod par byang sems dman pa dbyibs// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // 
219b8(rgyud): mthar thug yan lag bdun bsgoms pa// chos kyi phyag rgya grol ba'i lam// rten yod ma yin rten pa med// dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal to// lhan cig skyes pa'i don sgom pa// phyag rgya
220a1(rgyud): / tsha pa nga sbyin napa//  rnams gnyis su bsrub ste// gang dag sa chog du las dang // las dang pal byin gnyis// mchogs man byin gcig/ 
220a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong chen po gsungs pa ste// 'di yis rgyud rnams 'grub par 'gyur// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa gsum// bshad rgyud sum curtsa
220a3(rgyud): gnyis te// yan lag rgyud ni grangs las 'das// rdzab chen po phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar bsdus pa yin// bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // dmangs rigs gdol ba gdul don du// rgyud
220a4(rgyud): kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// gnas gang du ni ga tso bo sgom// thabs ni rnam pa du zhig mchis// de bzhin thabs
220a5(rgyud): las byung ba ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ri ts+tsha/ dur khrod ro steng du// gcer bu skra ba shig lhor bltas te// / a li ka lis lus bsrungase la// dpa' bo'i 'khor lo
220a6(rgyud): bsgom par bya// smin par byed pa dbang bzhi la// grol ba bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi lam// lam gnyis la ni brten nas su// sngags pas byang chub bsgrub par bya// bum pas lus kyi dri ma 'khrud// 
220a7(rgyud): gsang bas ngag gi dri ma 'khrud// gsum pas sems kyi dri ma ste// de ni kun tu brtags pa la// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa// bkru ba'i phyir na bzhi pa bshad// gnas dang ldan pa nyid dang ni/ 
220a8(rgyud): 'jug dang yongasu rdzogs pa dang // byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang // ting 'dzin mchod pa bskyed rim lo// nye bar bsdu ba rdzogs pa'i rim// rim gnyis mnyam par gnas nas su// 
220b1(rgyud): can gyis chos 'chad do// stong ba mngon mur chos skul// mtshan dpe bde ba longs spyod sku// rol pa'i mdzad pa sprul skul// sku gsum dbyer med pade chen dang // lha mas gsol ba bcom ldan
220b2(rgyud): 'das// gang gis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// gang la rab chad 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'khor bas skyo nas sdom gsum ldan// thos tshe dang ldan mche/ 
220b3(rgyud): nyid bzang // dben par dkyil 'khor bris smra bcad// chos gos gyon la bdud rtsi spyad// thun bzhir bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhen pa che ba'i rnal 'byor la// 'bras bu'i bar chad 'byung bar
220b4(rgyud): 'gyur// g.yeng ba che ba'i rnal 'byor la// sgom pa'i bar cha/ dad 'byung bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor/ la// spyod pa'i bar chod 'byung bar 'gyur// le lo che ba'i rnal
220b5(rgyud): 'byor la// lta ba'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// lha mos gas la pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyud kyi ngo bo dza lta bu// rtsa ba'i daces gang la bgyi// bshad pa'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi// 
220b6(rgyud): 'byung ba'i dus ni ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin la// rgyud rnams kun gyi ngo bo 'dus// yod pa rgyu la sgrub pa lam// mngon 'gyur 'bras bu'i// 
220b7(rgyud): ngo bo ya ni// thog par gsungs ba rgya ba'i rgyud// byinas gsung ba bshad pa rgyud// don rnams ston pas rtsa ba la// gsal bar byed pa bshad pa'i rgyud// bskal pa rdzogs ldan gsum gnyis dang // rtsod ldan dus bzhi'i rim pa
220b8(rgyud): yis// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor pa med do// lha mos gsal ba bcom ldan 'das// zab mo'i rgyud 'di gang la swa// ji lta bu la sbyin par bya// ster na lung nod ji ltar
221a1(rgyud): // byang bka' 'di rgya yis ji ltar gdab// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// snying rje med cing khro la gdug/ khengs shing chags pa tshul khrims med// dad med rigs
221a2(rgyud): ngan bla mas skyo// zos chung snying ring rnams la swa// dpa' zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med// dang ldan rigs bzang gtong phong che// thos mang dam tshig ldan la sbyin/ 
221a3(rgyud): dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i sngags pa yis// sngon du bla ma mnyes byas la// yar ngo mar ngo'i tshes bcu la// dpa' bo rnal 'byor tshogs kyis mchod// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// lha mo rnams la rgyu
221a4(rgyud): gtad ltar// de bzhin gsang ba'i rgyu sde rnams// zung la sgrub ba ched du gyis// lan gsum brjod la rgyud rnams sbyin// phyi rabs dus kyi snyigs ma la// chags sems gyod
221a5(rgyud): pa'i slob ma ni// gus pas mi zhu g.yo sgyus 'dod// thos na sa khungs su ba rang che 'byin// de la bstan na dam ni ga nyams// nges par dad nas zhu ba yi// gcig nas gnyis la
221a6(rgyud): spel na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs rgyun 'tshod// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ye shes mkha'agro ma la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis rgyud kyi don rtags nas rjes
221a7(rgyud): yi rang ngo // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba rdzogs// paN+Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
221a8(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ a nA bi la tan+t+ra rA dz+nyA nA ma/ bde skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba/ rdo rje mkha 'a gro la phyag 'tsha lo// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// rnyog med
221b1(rgyud): rab tu bshad par bya// snang ba med cing dpe med pa// tshig gi yul las rnam par 'das// zhi zhing bdag med dag pa nyid// mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs// ngang gis sangs
221b2(rgyud): rgyas 'di nyid tshul// mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs// khyad par du yang mdor bsdus pas// bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa yin// rmongs pa rnams la phan 'dod pas// snying rjes
221b3(rgyud): 'di ni bstan pa yin// kha cig stong par 'dod pa dang // kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang // kha cig khyab 'jug tshul gyis ni// blo dman dag ni 'jog par byed// de nyid nges par yang dag par
221b4(rgyud): rgyu yi gnas kyi spyod yul nyid// rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub na// bsgoms pa med cing byang chub med// rgya yi yid ches ra spangs pa 'di// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ sgyu ma'i ye shes lnga/ 
221b5(rgyud): byung ba// rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed// kha cig drag rngo rang bzhin du// kha cig zhi ba chen po che// kha cig phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs// kha cig 'dir zhing g.yo ba dang / 
221b6(rgyud): glu gar de bzhin sil snyan dang // lha yi sngags ni brjod pa nyid// kha cig sngags ni yang dag dgod// kha cig dkyil 'khor bri ba dang // dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang // 'byung dang 'byung lnga/ 
221b7(rgyud): gyur pa'i lus// de ltar la sogs mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas la sogs rdo rje brtags// gang tshe sems ni legs gnas pa// de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul nyid// dkyil 'khor de bzhin/ 
221b8(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni// phan 'dod rnams kyis shes par bya// phung po la sogs tshogs rnams kyis// gang zhig khyad par gyis bcos pa// lus ngag yid gsum bcos pa'i phyir// rdul tshon
222a1(rgyud): / dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// phung sogs gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa ste// 
222a2(rgyud): rang bzhin med par bsgoms par bya// me long lta bu'i gcig nyid de// dang po grur ni rtogs par bya// so sor rtog pa zhes gsungs pas// shar gyi grur ni rnam par rgyan// bya ba nan tan khyad/ 
222a3(rgyud): 'phags pa// byang gi mur ni rnam par spros// mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ni// bag chags med glu rjes rtogs byed// gzhan du'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// grwa yi dbus ni thams cad du/ 
222a4(rgyud): nyid 'di ni rab 'jug pas// ye shes spyod yul du ni brtag/ sgo bzhir yang dag brjod pa ni// de bzhin dran pa bzhir byung ba// de bzhir grwa bzhir gsungs pa ni// sbyin pa bzhin// 
222a5(rgyud): rnam dag pa// dbus su dkyil 'khor gzugs ni// mi bskyod pa yi rnam par rgyan// zhi dang chos don rgyan pa la/ sa// de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor 'grub// dra ba dra phyed
222a6(rgyud): zla ba sogs// dkyil 'khor du ni bris pa dang // rta babs la sogs thams cad ni// ting 'dzin yan lag rta babs nyid// sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste// de nyid rang bzhin las
222a7(rgyud): ni gsungs// gang zhig sems kyi rab phel ba// ting 'dzin yan lag rnam par gnas// de nyid dra ba zhes su gsungs// dra ba phyed pa phyed du ste// dril bu do shal brtag pa ni// rang gi ba
222a8(rgyud): mo rtogs par byed// sgra brnyan rnam pa lta bur ni// chos rnams thams cad so sor rtogs// chos rnams ma skyes mthong ba'i phyir// de nyid rgyal mtshan phreng bar gsungs// bla re la sogs
222b1(rgyud): gang bres pa// dngos po la sogs dang po des// sems ni bla re zhes byar bshad// dam pa'i don las gsungs pa'o// gos phreng de dag thams cad ni// rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid// grwa
222b2(rgyud): zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems// dga' ba'i ye shes kyis ni mtshan// de yi 'og tu rtag tu gsungs// grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad du// rdo rje rin chen rtogs pa'i phyir// rdo rje rin po che yis
222b3(rgyud): spras/ zla ba nyi ma gang gsungs pa// thabs dang shes rab don mthong phyir// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sems// ye shes 'dis ni rnam par rgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// denyi/ 
222b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni gsungs// sku gsung thugs ni nye ba'i phyi dar// rnam pa gcig tu mtshan nyid med// bla ma slob ma rna/ mas gsal bar// rab tu 'jug pa de nyid gsu ngos// sbyin
222b5(rgyud): sreg yang ni bshad pa yang // lce rnams tshim pa nga yis brji/ rnam rtog med pa'i sems gang ni// thab khung sgra yis mtshan ma nyid// bye brag phyed pas me nang du// gzugs kyi
222b6(rgyud): phung sogs lnga po rnams// sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid// thams cad kyi ni bsreg lugs bya// gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba// yam shing zhes ni rab tu grags// de ltar sbyin
222b7(rgyud): sreg bshad nas ni// rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya// sku gsung thugs la rtag tu ni// gang zhig sems ni brtan gyur pa// de nyid rab tu gnas par brjod// phung po rnams kyi dngos po ci// gang zhig
222b8(rgyud): sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// de ni gsal bar brjod par bya// yid rnams kyis ni skad du yang // gang zhig gsang ba bdag gis brjod// skye ba med cing snang med pa// mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnam par spang/ 
223a1(rgyud): gsang ba'in na chags pa'i byer// 'do na las sngags su gsu sa// sngags ni gas pa par ba shad nas ni// rna rnams yang ni brjod par dag/ zung ba khams da skye
223a2(rgyud): mched kyi// rang bzhin gyi ni legs gnas gang // yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid// de kun yang dag rab brtags shing // gal te sems kyis nyer brtags gang // lha zhes bya bar yang dag po shad/ 
223a3(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las// de nyid du ni yang dag gsungs// lha la gsol btab rnal 'byor ni// gsal bar nga yis brjod par bya// de nas skyil klungs bcas nas ni// sna yi rtse mor bltas
223a4(rgyud): nas kyang // rang gi rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyis// de nyid mtha dpar bzhag par bya// snying ka'i gan su lag pa gnyis// 'bad bas mnyam par sbyar nas su// mi rtog pa yi rang ba ni/ 
223a5(rgyud): du/ gang tshe sems ni rab rgyu ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag// de ched la skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bodag/ myur bar byin gyis rlob pa
223a6(rgyud): 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtog pa'i bdag/ thugs kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thams cad 'gyur// nga yis gas/ 
223a7(rgyud): brjod pa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi grub sbyin pa// sangs rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i don// thabs dang shes rab spyod yul don// sems can don du snying rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub/ 
223a8(rgyud): ba'i sA rtsed kyil 'khor nga yis ga sungs// de dag thams cad dbyibs tsam du// mdor bsdus thams cad ma byas// ris 'ga' da mtshig 'khor lo yang // de nyid nis byam gsungs
223b1(rgyud): sa su 'ad tsam gyis ni// gang 'grub de ni re 'ga' yang // gsung gi 'khor lor gsungs pa yin// rnam rtog med par lhag mos pas// sgrub bo la bsgrub par bya// khrag dang khu ba de bzhin/ 
223b2(rgyud): sha/ bshang ba dang ni gci ba nyid// dam tshig zhes bya rab 'bad par// gang zhig bdag gis tshig gsungs pa// de rnams kun la de bzhin gshegs// de rnams tha snyad tsam gyis gnas
223b3(rgyud): gang tshe dam tshig 'dod chags sems// des ni de nyid rab tu spyod// gang tshe sems ni chags gyur pa// da ni sems can yod ma yin// de la kun tu rtog pa yi// khrag ni za bar 'gyur ba'o// 
223b4(rgyud): khrag ni chen po zos nas ni// 'od dpag med pa'ang bza' ba ra bya// gang zhig chos rnams las skyes pa// khu ba'i sgrar ni bsgrags par bya/ de tshe ma skyes rtogs pa'i phyir// bza'
223b5(rgyud): bar yang dag gsungs pa nyid// dngos po kun gyi mnyam pa nyid// sha chen du ni rab tu dbye// mi dmigs pa yin/ la 'byor gyis// bza' ba zhes byar mngon par brjod// 
223b6(rgyud): gang zhig rab tu 'dzag pa'i sems// nus pa'i rjesu sbyor ba las// phyag rgya las kyi sbyor ba yis// de yang gci ba'i sgra yis brjod// chos dang chos min nges pa'i sems// sbas pa'i
223b7(rgyud): char ni gnas pa 'di// chos rnams thams cad rab rtogs pa'o// bshang bza bar yang dag brjod// dam tshig nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di rnams thams cad gsal bar
223b8(rgyud): bshad// 'di rnams don ni rtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid 'gyur// dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa chen po
224a1(rgyud): mkha 'gro ma dra ba sdom pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po baN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha
224a2(rgyud): dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrIs par kha sa ma tan+ta ra dzA na ma/ bad skad du/ dpal bde mchog na mkha' dang mnyam pa
224a3(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshali// 'di snyed bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
224a4(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo ri b+ha ga la bzhugaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byinas brlabs kyis rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom
224a5(rgyud): ldan 'das gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba// gsang da chen po de bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje snying po khyod nyon cig/ srog dang
224a6(rgyud): lnga pa de bzhin te// lam dang 'bras bu nyid yin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das srog gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// srog ni 'dzin par byed pa
224a7(rgyud): ste sngags dang rlung dang rten nyid do// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das lnga gang legs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// sangs rgyas lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// lnga pa yang
224a8(rgyud): ni gcig nyid do// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ snying rje chen po la skyes pa/ dga' ba'i shugs las rnam
224b1(rgyud): par grub// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mchog/ bde ba chen po lam yin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni gang / dga' ba ni gang / thabs ni gang
224b2(rgyud): gnyisu med pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i mchog/ dga' ba gnyis med bde ba che// thabs ni he ru ka dpal nyid// shes rab rdo rje
224b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma// gnyisu med bzung 'jug mchog/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das he ru ka ni gang lags// rnal 'byor ma ni gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
224b4(rgyud): pa/ he ru ka ni phung po nyid// phung po yang ni he ru ka/ khams ni rdo rje ma dpal de// rje ma dpal lal+la nyid// skye mched de yang de bzhi don du// lha yi ngo bor shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos gsol
224b5(rgyud): pa/ bcom ldan 'das phung po'i he ru kA gang lags/ khams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma gang lags// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// he ru ka dpol bdag nyid dngos// dri ma
224b6(rgyud): med pa'i kha dog can// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste// drug gis rgyan cing dgu dang ldan// zla tshes sna tshogs rdo rje dang / rigs kyi bdag pos rnam par rgyan// spyan gsum dag gis mdzes pa ste// chag
224b7(rgyud): pa med pa'i sham thabs can// shes rab rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma// ban+d+ha rA ka'i kha dog can// gcer bu phyag rgya lngas rgyan cing // dag pa lnga bcu'i phreng pos mdzes// rdo rje pad+ma'i snod bsnams
224b8(rgyud): pa// yab la 'khyud cing brkyang bskum bzhugs// gnyis med bde ba la dgyes pa// chus skyes nyi ma'i dbus na 'gying // khams nyid kyang ni lha nyid do// dpal bde mchog na mkha' dang
225a1(rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgyud las bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u dang pa'o// / rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas
225a2(rgyud): lags// ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsol ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brtan dang g.yo ba thams cad kun/ shes rab rang bzhin ma nyid de// lnga pa'i ngo bo 'od
225a3(rgyud): gsal nyid// ma skyes rtog pa bral ba'i sku// brjod du med cing bsam mi khyab// brtag tu med pa na mkha'i dbus// gnyis med bde ba'i rnam pa can// gsal ba'i rang bzhin g.yo ba med// gnyis
225a4(rgyud): med pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'bras bu lam gyi rnam pa'o// dpal bde mchog na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las rdzogs pa 'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u gnyis pa'o// 
225a5(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtogapa rnam par dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sngags dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang // dang
225a6(rgyud): gi rnam par dag pa dang // maN+Dal dang ni de bzhin du/ bum pa'i ngo bo lhar shes pa/ sngags kyi de bzhin gnas pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang / sbyin sreg ni
225a7(rgyud): gang dgator ma ni gang / dbang ni gang / maN+Dal ni gang / bum pa ni gang / sngags kyi de bzhin ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags ni gsang sngags rgyal ba ste// 
225a8(rgyud): badzi ru ru A hU phaT/ DA ka n-i dz+wa las pa swA hA/ oM gr-i ha tsu hUM Ta/ oM sar+b+ba ba bki nI me 'jam d+hA ni ye hA hUM pra swA hA// ma badz+rarje tsinI ye hU~M hU~M Ta swA hA// gis sngags rgyal ba / 
225b1(rgyud): dag gis// bskal ba stong la sogs pa yi// sdig pa ma lus dag byed chu// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// 'khor lo dag gis rnam par mdzes// a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro dang // dur ba la sogs de
225b2(rgyud): bzhin du// bzhi pa'i ngo bor yang dag shes// sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// gyen du pheM gyi sgra bsgrags pas// dpa' bo rnam 'byor ma kun dgyes// dbang ni tha ma'i lam nyid do// bdud rtsi chu yis
225b3(rgyud): legs byugs nas// me tog dmar pos mchog pa'o// ga ni snod bzang blogyis mdzes// dpa' bo bdud rtsi dag byed chu// zhal bzhi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// bdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing // 
225b4(rgyud): spro dang bsdu ba'i rnam pa can// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// dkye bcom ldan 'das skye mched kyi mkha'agro ma gang la gas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcer bu
225b5(rgyud): thal ba'i mdog can te// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yul rnams 'grim// lnga pa dang ni drug pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ brtsa ma ldan 'das sngags ni gang / gtor ma ni gang lags// 
225b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// oM dz+wa la mu khi Da ki Ni kaM ka ni hUM phaT/ oM ba ri nA ya ni DA ki nI hU~M phaT/ oM ma DA ki ni hUM phaT/ oM be ra mu khi DA ko ni hUM phaT/ oM u lU ka ti DA ki ni hUM phaT/ 
225b7(rgyud): oM a ra Na ma DA ki ni hU~M phaT/ chu skyes dag gis rnam rgyan cing // bdud rtsi lnga yis rnam par mdzes// dpe' mo drug ni menyes par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das smin / 
225b8(rgyud): lam ni gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ngob ste// de yi rnam pa de la gnas// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i ngo bon gang / 
226a1(rgyud): / sprul pa'i ngo bo na gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa'i ngo bol nyid de// sprul pa tshogs kyi bdag por bshad// rdo rje snying po gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
226a2(rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag po ni gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dbang gi kha dog dmar po ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// sprul pa 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas// brkyang bskum
226a3(rgyud): tshul gyis gnan pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsnyen pa bya ba gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bsnyen par bya ba sngags nyid de// oM ga Na ba
226a4(rgyud): ta ye swA hA// nag po 'bru yi ril bu la// bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i ltar gnas pa// sngags kyi ngo bor shes par bya// dpal bde mchog na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las las sna tshos
226a5(rgyud): kyi dum bu ste le'u gsum pa'o// // bcom ldan langs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sem/ sa dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gno// 
226a6(rgyud): gnas la sogs pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dpag tu med pa'i 'khor de dag rje su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / kha che'i mkhan po dz+nyA na badz+ra/ 
226a7(rgyud): rang gyur du mdzad pa rdzogaso// @\u0f7f/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra ma hA kA la kro d+ha nA tha ra hA s+ye sid+d+hi b+hA ba tAn+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje nag po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gas pa
226a8(rgyud): bdangs grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ dpal he ruka la phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pa'i// ye shes mngon par mkhyen pa yis// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms byed pa/ 
226b1(rgyud): bka' yi 'khor lo bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med cing gdon mi zab bde ba che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces
226b2(rgyud): gsung so// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnasu ni// kun mkhyen bde gshegs bzhugs gyur pa// mya ngan 'da' bar mi mdzad cing // de srid mtshums med sems can don// rgyun mi 'chang bar 'gro ba
226b3(rgyud): kun / srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par// byams pa'i thugs kyi brtson 'grus kyis// rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad// na mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par// smon lam rnam
226b4(rgyud): par sbyong byed cing // snying rjes don brtson sems kyis ni// dang da' bos srid pa sbyong bar mdzad// sna tshogs gzugs ca na nor bu bzhin// 'di ni rgyun rnams kun tu yang // gla glo'i
226b5(rgyud): skad kyis sbas pa ste// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa/ 'o// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam gyur pa'i// rdo rje slob de na bdag nyid che// myur du dngos grub ster byed pa// 'phral du yang
226b6(rgyud): dag yid ches byed// bsam pa gang deng gang dag gis// mi rnams sems dang 'thun par 'jug/ de dang de yi gzugs sprul te// sna tshogs g.yogs te bde bar bzhugs// de phyir 'bad pa du
226b7(rgyud): ma yis// sna tshogs tshul gyis 'thun par bya// bdag nyid sangs rgyas he ru ka/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor mchogs can// rang gi lha yi rab sbyor bas// bdag nyid ye shes mchog 'grub 'gyur// 
226b8(rgyud): 'di yis rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang // dkyil 'khor ba dang zhing skyong tshogs// gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod gnas// mkha'agro'i dbang phyug mgon po che// sku gsung thugs dang phrin las chags
227a1(rgyud): // ye shes yon tan rigs kyi lha// nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas// lha mo chen mo bka' 'bangs bcas// rdo rje 'dzin pas dus kun tu// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// 
227a2(rgyud): phyi nang gsang ba'i mgon po che// bde ba chen po'i rol pa yis// ye shes gsang ba bsam mi khyab// tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// thams cad
227a3(rgyud): nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med// khams gsum po nam lus pa// 'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yis// 'gro ba dmigasu med pa ste// mthong ba
227a4(rgyud): dang ni thos la sogs// thams cad sgyu ma lta bar 'char// ga dgis skye bo 'ching gyur pa// de nyid yo ngas shes rnam par grol// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sa gsum bde ba
227a5(rgyud): chen por bsgyur// nyon mongs med ni ye shes med// nyan rang byang chub lam las ring // phung po khams dang skye ma ched dang // 'byung ba bzhi la sogs pa rnams// thams cad
227a6(rgyud): gdod nas de ga pa yi// ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dngos po du ma gsal bar snang // ye shes med par sku mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas ye shes kyis rab bskul// de bas bla med rgyud 'di/ 
227a7(rgyud): ru sa 'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya// gsang po'i sdom pa bla na meng // dang po bla ma'i dam tshig dig/ thob pas rgyu dang 'bros bu 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// brtan pa dag ni long spyod// 
227a8(rgyud): yinapa/ nges par brtan po mya ngan 'da'// rnal 'byor gyi ni dam tshig gnas// brda yi sbyor ba gsang ba dang // dbang bskur bas ni dngos grub ster// bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa dang // rgyal ba byeng
227b1(rgyud): chub sems dpar bcas// dkyil 'khor nag po bla na med// sngags pa gsang ba 'dir zhugs gang // yang dag bla ma bsten pa ga/ 'dir ni byang chub sems kyis ni// bsnyen pa nye bar bsnyen/ 
227b2(rgyud): par dang // sgrub pa sgrub pa chen po yi// khyad par rim pa rtags dang dus// las la sbyar ba shes par bya// ji srid las kyi sbyor ba yis// mgon po 'khor bcas mnyes gyur na// las dang da
227b3(rgyud): grub sna tshogs pa// myur du 'grub par the tshom med// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba mngon par byang chub pa'i le'u ste drang ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan
227b4(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub se mas dpa' thams cad kyis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gsung rmil khur nye bar gsan te// gsung rdo rje'i
227b5(rgyud): tshig 'di skad gsungaso// rdo rje 'dzin pa gang zhig gis// sgyu ma brag cha'i sgra brnyan ltar// yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas ngag tu// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrub// bskal pa
227b6(rgyud): bzang po 'di la ni// byung ba'i mgon po ma lus pa// kun gyi snying por gyur pa ni// gsang ba zhing skyong mgon po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi mgon po 'dis// bstan pa srung bar mdzad pa yin// 
227b7(rgyud): zhes gsung so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du rdo rje
227b8(rgyud): theg pa che// gsang ba bsdus pa'i yang dag lam// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa'i// snying po 'bras bu lam byed pa// snyigs ma lnga ldan dus nyid du// 'dren pa ye shes bstan bsrung // 
228a1(rgyud): 'di nyid gsang pa'i sgrub pagang // rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir bstan gsol// de skad ces gsas pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin bsdu // 
228a2(rgyud): stsal pa// shes rab snying rje zung 'jug pa// ting 'dzin gang du sgom gyur pa// bla med dkon mchog bstan pa ste// rgol ba ngan pa bzlog par mdzad// thub pa mchog gi bstan pa la// 'dzin dang / 
228a3(rgyud): skyong dang srung ba gsum// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar mdzad// sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan par// gsang ba gcig pu bsgrub par bya// zhes bka' stsal to// ga
228a4(rgyud): bde ba chen po dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das/ dpal he ru ka rdo rje rang rig pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbusu sangs rgyas thams cad
228a5(rgyud): kyi lhun gyi grub pa'i gnas gsang ba rang byung bla na med pa'i rdzarje rab tu rgyal ba'i snying po mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i snying po/ 
228a6(rgyud): ye shes kyi dad gro ba sgrub cing bdud kyi g.yul las rab tu rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos mi zad pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ston par mdzad do// rdo rje gzhi la gnas pa'i cha// gter gyi
228a7(rgyud): bum pa la skyer ldan// dus kyi rgyal po 'od gsal ba// chu 'dzin phyogs tsam phyed ldan nyid// sgra dang sgra las khyab pa ste// dum ma yin gnas pa'i yul// dam tshig gsang ba 'byung ba las// 
228a8(rgyud): pa rin chen 'bar ba'i gtso// phyogs dus med par rang byung ba// chos 'byung po brang dkyil 'khor du// rigs kyi yon tan ldan par ni// na mkha'i rgya mtsho 'bras ldan pa// phun sum tshogs pa
228b1(rgyud): lhun gyis 'grug/ mi byed lhan cig skyes pa rgyal// 'o brang gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor rin chen 'od 'khrug pa// ge sar rab d+ma'i dbus su ni// kun nas zlum thor/ 
228b2(rgyud): 'khor ba ni// tshad med phreng bas rgyan pa ni// bkod pa dpag med rim par ldan// ri rab lhun po mchog byung ba'i// de nyid kun nas yongs bskor ba'i// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rnams te// shin tu
228b3(rgyud): mnyam zhing mtshung bar 'khor// de nyid rim pa yongasu brtan// bye brag mtshungs med dmar chen mtsho// rim pas chu gter 'o ma'i gnas// 'byung ba bsdus pa mi lus kyi// phung po rus/ 
228b4(rgyud): pa'i ri bo la// phyi nang mnyam pa'i tshad can gyi// lhun gyis 'a grub par bstan pa yin// de las dngos po sna tshogs kyis nga // tha dad snang ba ye shes gzugs// rang byung bde ba chen po
228b5(rgyud): nyid// mnyam pa med pa kun tu 'byung // dus gsum de bzhi na gshegs pa yi// 'byung gnas snying po rdo rje'i ga na// rdo rje skyil krung mi phyed las// thog mtha' med pa'i rang
228b6(rgyud): bzhin can// gsang ba chen po'i rims dag pa'i// 'dod chags rdo rje'i skur ldan pa// lho phyogs bya rkang ri dang ni// dpal gyi ri la mdun phyogs pa// d+h+r-i na ka Ta barba ta// pad+ma ge sar rgyas pa
228b7(rgyud): dbus// chos kyi 'byung gnas rtag par gnas// dpal ldan dga' ba'i khang pa brtsegs// gsang ba sngags kyi rgya mtsho yin// ma lus rgyal ba bgrod pa'i yul// gsang ba chos kyi dbyangs
228b8(rgyud): chen po// dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor du// gla glo'i yul gyi mi rnams dang // lha dang lha min dri zar bcas// gsang ba yongasu rdzogs pa yi// rang byung ye shes pho brang du// tshangs
229a1(rgyud): dbang khyab 'jug dbang phyug bdag/ dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir bcug nas kyang // skye bo chags can rab 'dul phyir// mchog tu 'i gyu snying gsungs// phyogs bcur gnas/ 
229a2(rgyud): kyi sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i cho gas rnams dang // dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// khrag khrig ri rab rdul mnyam pa// de dbus seng
229a3(rgyud): ge'i khri bzhugs pa'i// thub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la// rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che// bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te// pus mo'i lhangs la btsugs// 
229a4(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te 'di don zhus// gsang chen khyad par 'phags dpa yi// lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya che// mi 'gyur ro/ rje theg pa'i lam// dus dang gnas dang gang zag ste// spyod
229a5(rgyud): yul bston pa'i khyad par gyi// sgrub dang sgrub pa phrin las tshogs// thabs dang stobs dang 'jug pa ste// rim ba mngon byed rgyur ldan pa// de nyid bcom ldan gsung du
229a6(rgyud): gsol zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// bla ma sangs rgyas bstan pa la// dga' zhing mgu la rab dad pa'i// sems dpa' chen pos gsang ba'i don// rab
229a7(rgyud): tu zhus pa legaso legs// shin tu rmad du byung ba yi// gdul dka' ma lus gdul don du// byang chub sems kyi ye shes mdzod// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// de nas dngos grub thams
229a8(rgyud): cad kyi// grub pa rab tu ster byed pa// rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste// gsang ba las kyi rim pa nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan bsrung zhing bka' la gnas// dam tshig
229b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i zhing skyong la// mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso// dpal ldan rig 'dzin thams cad la// mchog tu gyur pa'i las sgrub pa// dpal ldan nag po chen po ni// 'dis ni la min
229b2(rgyud): 'dus pa yi// g.yul las rgyal bar byed pa yin// lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pas// mchod 'os gtso bor gyur pa yin// dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang // nag mo re ma tir gyur pas// lcam
229b3(rgyud): dral gyur pas bstan pa srung // sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba// phyi nang de nyid kho na'i don// yon tan phrin las dbang phyug tu// dam tshig mgon po zhing skyong ba// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtso bo ste/ 
229b4(rgyud): gzhan dus gsum dbang byed pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po da ngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba spyi la dgongs dpa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gsang ba bshad
229b5(rgyud): bya ba// 'di nyid bla med sgrub pa po// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lha nga ba yi// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// ji lta ji ltar grol 'gyur ba// de dang de yi thabs ston mdzad// 
229b6(rgyud): dus ni bskal pa bzang po yi// rdzogs ldan tha mar gyur pa yi/ dpag med dus las 'das nas ni// gnyis ldan dang ni gsum ldan pas// rtsod pa'i dus kyi rim pa la// bcom ldan tsha lo brgya bI
229b7(rgyud): dus la de nyid bstan pa'i snyigs ma yi// lnga brgya pa yi dus kyi mthar// shin tu gdug cing rtsub pa yi// mi srun pa yi dus kyi tshe// de tshe mgon po'i bstan pa 'byung // gang zag la yang gnyis su/ 
229b8(rgyud): bshad// bsgral bar bya ba'i gang zag dang // sgrol bar byed pa'i sgrub po ste// dang po bstan pa 'jig byed cing // dkon mchog gsum po smod pa dang // bla ma la sdang bdag la smod// de dag la sog/ 
230a1(rgyud): bya bar bshad// sgrub pa po na rnam pa gsum// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor ma// dag cing sbyangs te ting 'dzin gsal// rim pa go 'phang thob pa ste// thun mong spyi dang bye brag tu// dam
230a2(rgyud): tshig gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin// gnas kyi khyab par 'gyur ba yang // bsnyen pa'i dus dang sgrub pa dang // las la sbyar ba'i dus shes pas// yid 'ong dben dang dur khrod sogs// bsam gtan
230a3(rgyud): 'phel dang khyad par bya'o// yul dang dbang po'i spyod yul du// mthong ba dang ni thos pa dang // / reg pa dang ni dran po yis// dkyil 'khor ba yi snang ba yang // ma lus dngos po gang shar ba// ba
230a4(rgyud): ba can du shes par bya// bstan pa kun las bsdus pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i lam las kyang // gsang ba 'bras dbu lam byed pa// rdo rje theg pa 'di nyid de// bstan pa 'dzin ste/ 
230a5(rgyud): srung dang gsum// 'di ni khyad par srung ba yin// grub pa sten pa'i ting 'dzin dang // nye bar bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang // dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che// rnam dag mtshan
230a6(rgyud): nyid kun grub pa// bde ba'i bsod nams rgyun gnas pa// rnam dag stobs ni rgyas par byed// bsnyen pa'i dus su rang lha yi// he ru kar ni gnas pa yi// mdun du bka' sdong dam tshig gi/ mgon po
230a7(rgyud): phyag bzhi bsgom par bya// de nas thugs kha'i rang sngags las// 'od 'phros 'khor ba'i bzlas pa las// khyad par du ni sgra bcas pa dang // shin tu dal bar bzlas pa bya// nye bar bsnyen
230a8(rgyud): ba'i dus su ni// bdag nyid he ru ka las ni// hUM phyung mdun du 'ong 'phros pas// bskyed cing mthar ni nye bar bsdu// sgrub pa'i dus su mgon po yi// rgyas 'debs spyi bor he ru ka/ de nyid gsang / 
230b1(rgyud): sngags phyogs bcas pa// de nyid sems dpa' sum brtseg bsam// gsang ba zhing spyong rgyal po che// cho ga gsum gyis sgrub pa'i tshul// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i bdag/ thams
230b2(rgyud): bde chen gnas pa la// dus gsum 'khor lo gsum du gnas// brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'thob par 'gyur// sgrub pa chen po bla na med// ye shes mgon po chen po nyid// khwa gdong la
230b3(rgyud): sogs lha mo brgyad// rim pa bzhin du yongasu bskor// dkyil 'khor pho brang dbus su yang // dur khrod du ni mgon po rol// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba// dam tshig spyod pa'i rang
230b4(rgyud): bzhin ni// rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa ste// rab tu 'bad de ga/ sang bar bya'o// phrin las khyad par gang yin pa// la/ sa la sbyor ba rim shes bya// rigs par byed dang skrod pa dang // 
230b5(rgyud): rmugs par byed dang brgyal du 'jug/ rnam par rmongs dang lkugs por byed// dug gis 'dzin dang 'on long dang / rang sha ring gis za byed cing // ga shis ngan dug dang khrag tu/ 
230b6(rgyud): skyug/ 'di dag dus min 'chi byed pa// las kyi khyad par yongasu bstan// char dbab pa dang sprin dral dang // thog dang ser ba dbab pa dang // rang phyogasu ni bzlog cing srung // byad ka bzlog dang ngag bcing
230b7(rgyud): de nga // nus pa gzhom dang cho 'phrul dang // phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba'o// thabs ni las kyi rim pa ste// rten gyi gang zag 'ga' zhig gis// dang por bla ma mnyes par bya// gnyis par dbang
230b8(rgyud): bzhi thob pa dang // gsum par byin gyis brlabs nas ni// bka' bsgo'i rjes gnang tshul bzhin du// ma nor 'jug pa'i go rams shes// rten tshul khyad par shes par bya// stobs ni chos rnam
231a1(rgyud): thams cad la// sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / yang dag bden pa'i stobs kyis ni// rang bzhin med par rtogs pas 'byung // 'jug pa thun mong ma yin pa// byams pa snyi
231a2(rgyud): rje byang chub sems// tshad med bzhi dang ldan pa yis// 'gro ba'i don la sems pa po// mngon du byed pa nyer sgrub ste// dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma ste// dang po bar dang tha mar yang // gca
231a3(rgyud): bo dang ni 'khor rnams kyi// gang grub rab 'bring tha ma ru// rtags kyi dbye ba bstan pa yin// rgyu ni thogs pa med pa yi// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste// mngon sum du ni 'byung ba la// gang
231a4(rgyud): gis dgag par mi nus pa// de las 'bras bu phun sum chog so// snying po smin pa bzhin du 'byung // gang du thogs ma dad rdo rje yi// snying po zad pa med pa'i don// yang dag ye shes sna
231a5(rgyud): ba pod bla ma'i drin las thob par 'gyur// dpal mgon po nA na po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba'i ri ma pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas dang
231a6(rgyud): ldan bdud 'joms pa'i// sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad// gsang ba'i mgon po chen po yi// sba sa pa'i yum dang bcas pa yi// gsang ba mkha'agro ma bzhi dang // lhan cig tu ni dgyes par
231a7(rgyud): rol/ zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// gdul dka' 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ni// zhal gcig pa la sman gsum pa// mi thung khros pa ut+pal mdog/ mgo skyes gyen 'greng rngam pa'i sku// ro yi/ 
231a8(rgyud): gdan la bzhugs mdzad cing // klu brgyad rgyan gyis brgyan pa po// khros pas char sprin nag po ltar// me stag phung po lta bu yi// spyan gsum drag po'i lte bas gzigs// glang po'i tshul can/ 
231b1(rgyud): stobs ldan pa// rgyu ma'i do shal sbyangs pa yi// mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas klags// shin tu mi srun sgeg pa'i sku// bdud 'dul chen po lnga yi lnga// nyams ldan gzi brjid phun sum chogs
231b2(rgyud): ma rig mun sel sgeg pa'i nyams// rmad byung chos sgrogs bzhad par ston// brtul zhugs spyod pa dpa' bo ste// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'jigs par ston// log lta spong byed gtsugs pa'i
231b3(rgyud): nyams// gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs par ston// ngo mtshar nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing // khro chags mi g.yo zhi ba'i thugs// g.yas kyi dang pos gri gug bsnams// g.yon gyi da
231b4(rgyud): bos thod khrag 'dzin// g.yas kyi gnyis pas ral gri 'di bas// g.yon pas kha T+wAM 'dzin par mdzad// gsu rang gis ha ha zhes sgrogs pa// log par lta ba 'joms par
231b5(rgyud): mdzad// stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can// sna chog sa chu skyes nyi mar bca se// rang byung rol pa'i sta sa kyis gnas// de yi mdun du gtum pa mo// lha mo zhal
231b6(rgyud): gcig phyag gnyis ma// mun pa'i mdog can zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis spyan gsum khro tshul can// gri gug thod pa bsnams par mdzad// yab la phyag rgya drug gis brgyan// yum la
231b7(rgyud): lha yis rgyas btab nas// sku dang gnyis med 'khril bar bzhugs// me 'od phreng bas yongasu bskor// ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'khor bsrungs ma// shar phyogs mkha'agro 'brog ma dang // lha
231b8(rgyud): phyogs glang snam zhes bya// nub kyi srin mo ral pa can// byang du sa yis gtsug yin no// gang du rgya mtsho chu dngos dang / nag po'i chu dang 'dra ba'i sku// ma rungs 'joms byed nag po che// 'bad
232a1(rgyud): / pas snying rje bskyed pa nyid// bsad par bya ba brjod pa nyid// snying rje med na mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje bskyed par bya// mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bas
232a2(rgyud): ba 'khrug byed pa// zhe sdang rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// re shig tsam du bsad par bya// gzas pa'i sha la rtag tu rol// kun tu gtumau ba'i shugs 'chang ba// yul dang yul du rol byed
232a3(rgyud): bas shing rnams la ni gnas nas kyang // dkyil 'khor zhing rnams skyong bar byed// dur khrod gnas kyis yongasu bskor// ma mo'i gnas sogs khyab par byed// klu yis mchod pa'i zhi
232a4(rgyud): skyong ba// ma yis phye mas yongasu bskor// sgo dang mig gi sa khyad par 'gyur// gtso bo'i sngags kyi lus can te// sgrub pa po yi lus la gnas// de dag rim par dus bsta/ 
232a5(rgyud): po/ dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// sgrub pa'i rdzas rna mas khyad par las// 'bru nag gtor ma rab tu shis// sha chen gyis ni rgyan pa yi// tshogs rdzas pu dza gus pas
232a6(rgyud): dbul// phyi nang gsang ba khyad par las// bsten pa'i tshul gyis phrin las las// bye brag rgyan dang gnas skabs pa// grub dang sgrub pas mngon du gyur// dus rnams kun tu zhes sdang gis// 
232a7(rgyud): pa kun tu gzhom mi bya// yul min pa las bsad byas na// rnal 'byor ma chog las nyams phyir// grub pa nam yang yod mi srid// khyad par ye shes bla med pa// dam tshig mgon por sgrub
232a8(rgyud): pa yid / dam tshig 'di ni smad po che// bde bar gshegs pa'i lam sbyor mdzad// byang chub sems kyi zla ba 'di// yang ngo mar ngo rab tu gnas// yar ngo yas ni bskyed byed la// mar ngol ni 'a
232b1(rgyud): par byed// yar ngo yi ni bco lnga la// byang chub sems kyis mkha 'gro yang // bde ba chen por 'du ba mdzad// 'di ni nges pa'i don du gsungs// dkyil 'khor lha nyid lus nyid yin/ 
232b2(rgyud): gzhan du lnga du dkyil 'khor ni// btsal yang rnyed par ma 'gyur zhes// 'dren pa dpa' bos rtag tu gsungs// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba la// drag po kun gyi srog gyur pa// yon tan phrin
232b3(rgyud): las dbang phyug gi/ phyi nang gsang ba'i bdag po yin// ston pa gnas pa'i rang bzhin las// 'khor lo dgug bye gnyis med bstim// dngas snyigs las ni rgyu 'bras dang // gnas pa khyad
232b4(rgyud): pabar rten 'brel te// 'khrul dang 'khrul pa ma yin pa// dmas gsum kun la dbang byed pas// 'jig rten las dang ye shes kyi// mgon po'i khyad par mngon du 'byung // ga
232b5(rgyud): batha snyad khyab pa po// thun mong bar ni bstan pa yin// 'dir ga las dang skye bo las// sgrub pa thun mong lnga yi cha// dngos dang rgyud pas lung bstan pa// srog dang srog ma
232b6(rgyud): yin pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen dang bskal pa yis// gsang sngags bzlas pa mngon par phye// 'di ni mngon du 'byung ba'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba mngon par
232b7(rgyud): 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// he ru ka dpal mgon nyid kyi ni// gsang ba'i sprul pa nag po che// 'di yi sgrub rim bshad par bya// gsang ba'i sgrub
232b8(rgyud): pa'i thabs mchog ste// skal ba can la sbyin par bya// gang du sgrub pa'i sa phyogs su// mi mthun g.yeng ba spang byas nas// de nas nag pos bsgrub par bya// 'gro ba kun la rab bltas nas// 
233a1(rgyud): / tshad med byang chub sems kyi blos// snying rje chen pos bskyed byas nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// lhor bltas sgra grol gcer bu yis// dang por skad cig tsam gyis na
233a2(rgyud): rang lhar bskyed pa'i snying kha ru// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // bsil zhing 'od dang bcas pa bsam// rang steng raM las nyi dkyil 'khor// rta bdun 'od zer tsha ba dang // me yi ra
233a3(rgyud): bzhin 'phro bo bsam// de dbus ya ga hUM nag po// ye shes lnga pa'i rang bzhin can// de yis 'od kyi snang ba las// dpag med kha dog bzhi bcas bsam// rang bzhin gan su 'phros pa las// 
233a4(rgyud): bla ma dang ni lhag pa'i lha// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcas pa dang // nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas// mdun gyi na mkhar bzhugs pa la// skyabasu 'gro dang mchod pa dbul// 
233a5(rgyud): sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya// bzod par gsol nas gshegasu gsol// de rjes dngos po thams cad kun// ma lus stong pa nyid gzhug cing // oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsa/ 
233a6(rgyud): d+harmA swa b+hA shud+d+ho ho/ oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA/ badz+ra shud+d+ho haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harma yo ga shad+d+ho ho// zhes brjod par bya'o// phyi dang nang gi dngos po kun// gdod nas dag pa'i ngang du bsam// 
233a7(rgyud): de nyid hUM dang bcas pa yang // mA da tsam du gnas pa las// na mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ni// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi khyab par bya// de las sa bon 'di dag ni// 'chang bzhin pa las rim pas
233a8(rgyud): bsam// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // raM las me yi dkyil 'khor dang // baM dkar chu yi dkyil 'khor te// laM las gser gyi sa gzhi nyid// de steng bru las ri rab 'byung // de dag bya/ 
233b1(rgyud): ngo bo nyid// de dag steng gi cha la yang // dbus su pa las pad+ma ni// sna tshogs pad+ma rgya che ba// lte ba ge sar bcas dbus su// ha las sna tshogs rdo rje ni// kha dog lnga dang ldan par bsam// de
233b2(rgyud): dbus raM las nyi ma yi// hUM yig sa bon las byung ba// sa gzhi ma lus rdo rjer gyur// steng 'og phyogs mtshams rdo rje dang // ral gri 'khor lo mda' dang ni// phur bu gri gug kha T+wAM ga/ 
233b3(rgyud): rje rtsa gcig pa dang ni// rtse gsum nyi shu rtsa lnga'i sngags// du ma rnam par 'phros nas ni// shin tu rgya che bsam par bya// bla ra ra ba sogs dang ni// gur gyi rnam par mtshams bcing bya// 
233b4(rgyud): me 'od 'bar ba khyad par 'gyur// 'di dag srung ba'i khyad pa dar ro// bruM las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs btso dab ni yongasu 'khor// de stongs raM las nyi dkyil 'khor// de yi/ 
233b5(rgyud): dbus su hUM mdzad do// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// ri na chen klu dbang rgyan dang ldan// rol pas rnam pa ra sgeg par bsam// ra las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus// de
233b6(rgyud): stengs hUM bcu rnam par bsam// de las khro bo'i rgyal po bcu// zhal phyir gzigs pa rnam par bsam// khro bo de dag re re zhing // phyogs skyong bcu po gdan la ni// bkug nas gnyis me/ 
233b7(rgyud): bzhugs par bsam// de la gsang sngags brjod tsam gyis// phung bus gdab dang brdung bar bya// des ni bla med mchog dag gyur// khro bo de dag re re zhing // brtan par bya phyir gsang
233b8(rgyud): sngags brjod// oM dkar 'khor lo dang bcas pa// 'od ldan de las spros bsdus pas// bcom ldan rang bzhin yangs shing khyab// 'od du zhu nas gzhal yas khang // rin chen sna chog
234a1(rgyud): las grub pa// gru bani sgo dang rta babs bcas// rdo rje dang ni nor bu yi// 'od zer 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa'o// bo drang nang ma zlum po la// re mig dgu pa rdo rjes bskor// byi ni
234a2(rgyud): pad+ma mu khyud bcas// de yi nang na a yi dbyibs// drag po'i gnas su bsam par bya// dbus ma'i nang du pa las ni// pad+ma nyi zlar bcas pa bsam// a li ka li 'dus pa las// de las na mkha'i
234a3(rgyud): sa bon te// nam mkha' las ni hUM byung ste// gnyis med zhugs las 'od du zhu// de la rdo rje gri gug bsam// 'od kyi snang bas khyab pa las// skad cig gis ni sku rdzogs pa// nag po chen po bsam/ 
234a4(rgyud): par bya// zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dang / da' bo chen po rol pas bzhugs// yab yum gnyisu med dpar bsam// de ltar yab yum rdzogs bskyed nas// mkha'
234a5(rgyud): gsang byin gyis brlab bya ste// sngags brjod pas ni dgyes pa bskyed// de las dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams// yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa las// yum gyi mkha' dbyings
234a6(rgyud): bde chen du// so sor tshogs bskyed byas la// phyi rol du ni rim gyis 'byung // dang por gtso bo'i rgyan dang bcas// rdzogs par phyung ste d+hU ti nas// gyen du thugs kha'i pad+ma las// 'thon te 'gro ba
234a7(rgyud): don byas la// slar 'dus rang la thim gyur pa// dpal ldan snying rje'i stobasu gnas// de las rim pa ji bzhin du// phyung nas so so'i gdan la su gas ma mye sa thag zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa
234a8(rgyud): ste// gar stabs ldan pa'i lha mo no// g.yas brkyang ba ni rnam par 'gying // dpa' mo bde ba'i skur bskyed pa'o// mtshams bzhir thod pa bdud rtsis bkang // sna tshogs pad mdapal gnas
234b1(rgyud): bdad nyi ma la gnas mgon po ni// shar du sku yi mgon po dang // lho ru yon tan mgon po dang // nub tu gsung gi mgon po dang // byang du las kyi mgon po ste// thams cad zhal gcig phyag ga nyi/ 
234b2(rgyud): pa gri gug thod pa bsnams pa'o// so so'i g.yon du yum re re// gtum mo dang ni drag mo dang // bzlog byed ma dang dpa' mo ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan dang bcas// de yi phyi yi gru chad
234b3(rgyud): la kheng 'dzin pa dang kha T+wAM ga/ gaN+DI 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin// so so'i yum dang bcas pa ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'bar ba'o// de yi phyi rol sgo dang grwar// lha mo brgyad po gar gyis
234b4(rgyud): rol// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// gar stabs ldan pas bzhugs pa'o// dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs rab dang // de nas gtso bo yab yum dag/ snyoms par zhugs
234b5(rgyud): bas 'od du zhu// de nas lha gzhi yis ni// rdo rje tshad med dbya/ kyi bskul// a baM si ta u Da na nI bA dza ti d+ha ma d+ha ma g+ha ma g+ha ma a~M ka ma/ d+ha d+hA sha ri d+ha re/ sa ni sa sas ni ga ma sesas/ 
234b6(rgyud): rig mo bu me te sa ri sa ra sa ri ri sa Shi/ ma hA ma a d+ha ma sa sa// shwa tra ni sA sa sA/ sa ni sa ri ta g+ha ma aM g+ni/ a ta ma ta ya/ sa sA ba ga/ mA ya a ba sa d+ha na ma a i// de ltar bskul bar gyur
234b7(rgyud): pa las// de ltar nye bar gsan nas ni// thugs rje'i ngang las bzhengs mdzad de// nag po gsang ba'i bu dang bcas// shin tu 'jigs shing 'bar ba'i sku// bdud 'dul chen po rgyan dang bcas
234b8(rgyud): spro ba dang ni bsdu bar mdzad// de nyid brtan dang mnyes par mdzad// sku gsung thugs ni rgyas gdab cing // ye shes gzhug dang dbang bskus// byin gyis brlabs dang mchod pa dang // sngags
235a1(rgyud): / kyis brtan ched bzlas 'bya// bdud rtsi myang dang bstod cing bskul// nga 'dzin don pas mnyer bsdu bya// de nas ldang bar gyur pan// gnyis ba lnga rnams thams cad kun/ 
235a2(rgyud): skad cig gis ni rdzogs bya ste// de yi ngang la ting nge 'dzin// gsang ba khyad par brjod par bya// rnam rtog bag chags kyis bcings la// rtog pa dag pa'i thabs mchog ldan// rnam
235a3(rgyud): rtog rang bzhin yongs shes na// de nyid thob du med pa ste// bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung // chags pa med pas kun tu spyad// 'di de'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa// rig ma rnams le rol byed
235a4(rgyud): na'ang // de nyid shes la bcing med de// rnam par rol pa'i tshul mchog go// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'a/ byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba lha'i gnas mngon par 'byung
235a5(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gang du sngags kyi yi ge dang // bzang po'i sdug sa kyi phreng ba 'di// rdza rnga bcings pa las shes bya// re mig/ 
235a6(rgyud): bdun pa'i grangs kyis ni// kun nas mnyan par dgod par bya// mkhas pas dbyangs dang gsal byed ni// sde tshan rim pas phye ba nyid// kun nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis ni// rim pa bzhin
235a7(rgyud): du btu bar bar bya// sde tshan drug pa'i lnga pa ni// ha yi mgo na gnas pa blang // usma Sha yi bzhi pa nyid// wa 'og gnas pa de nyid de// sna chen gnyis pa'i dang par ste// pa yi steng na gan/ 
235a8(rgyud): par blang // an+tam+ba yi gsum pa ste// ya yi steng ma yang dag blang // sde tshan brgyad pa'i bzhi pa ni// ma yi steng na gnas pa sbyar// sde chen dang po'i gnyis pa nyid// nya yi 'og nas gan
235b1(rgyud): ba sbyar// sde tshan dang po'i lnga pa ste// Da yi 'og na gnas par sbyar// sde tshan dang po'i bco lnga pa// d+ha yi steng na gnas pa yi// zla tshes thig les brgyan par bya// sde tshan dang po bcu
235b2(rgyud): bzhi pa// de yi 'og ma'i yi ge la// dbyangs kyi bco lnga pa yin te// d+ha yi 'og mas brgyan par bya// de nyid thog mar sprin bya yin// sde tshan drug pa'i gnyis pa yin// na yi 'og na gnas pa
235b3(rgyud): ste/ bzhi pa yi ni thog ma gang // ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas te// tha mar 'byung ba'i drug po ste// 'di ni yid sprin nor bu ste ro// che yi steng na gnas pa gang // b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par blang // Ta yi
235b4(rgyud): steng mas brgyan par bya// ha yi 'og na gnas pa dang // wa yi gra 'og ma bzung bar bya// ba yi steng mo nyi btu bya// ya yi steng na gnas pa las// nya yi steng mas las kun byed// / 
235b5(rgyud): ma yi steng gnas yi go nyid// ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas la// nyi sa 'gyur d+ha yi stong mas rgyan// tsa yi steng na gan i yi steng ma drung du bzhag/ 'di ni dngos grub 'byung ba'i
235b6(rgyud): gnas// da yi steng ma'i yi ge la/ d+ha yi steng mas yang dag rgyan// rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas// ma lus ye shes skur gyur pa'o// Sha yi 'og na gnas pa la// b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi
235b7(rgyud): ge dang // Na yi 'og nas rab sbyin dang // sa yi 'og ma yang dag blang / tha 'og Da 'og stan du sbya ra// tsas par gnas yi ge dang // dzA yi 'og ma bdag po ste// 
235b8(rgyud): yi bar na gnas pa bzung // khaM dang a yi bar gnas pa// ta yi 'og ma nya stengs ldan// ma yi steng gnas ri 'og sbyar// thig les rgyan pa nyis 'gyur sbyar// tsa laM steng na gnas pa la// a
236a1(rgyud): yi steng mas brgyan pa drung // 'di ni smras pa'i snying po ste// rang srog yi ger gsang ba'o// nga yi steng ma'i yi ge las// d+ha yi steng mas brgyan par bya// sangs rgyus kun gyi
236a2(rgyud): ye shes che// snying po bzlas pa'i rig pa ste// bkra shis pa ni thog mar sbyar// na yi steng mas yang dag rgyan// dza yi gong ma d+madra stengs sbyar// sa la bar gnas Da stengs sbyar// thig len des ba
236a3(rgyud): par bya// na 'og d+ha stengs mgo bor sbyin// 'di las ma stengs ri 'og ldan// thig le zla tshes dag gis mtshan// tsa yi steng na gnas po la// ra yi 'og ma drung du sbyin// b+ha stengs gnas pa la'o// 
236a4(rgyud): sbyar// nya yi 'og ma yang dag ldan// shes par gnas nya/ 'og sbyar// 'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa ste// bya ba stobs lnga na nyid yin no// gang du mngon par phyogs pa yi// dpal
236a5(rgyud): ldan nag po chen po yi// gsang sngags mchog tu gyur pa 'dis// stong dang brgya pa bcur 'gyur gyis// rigs ni dam pa'i sa la gnas// thob pa yul dang yul du gnas// pa yi 'og
236a6(rgyud): ma dang por blang // ha yi 'og ma blang byas la// tha yi steng ma sbyin par bya// Da yi steng ma'i drung nyid du// sha yi thog mas brten par bya// pha yi steng mas btu bar bya// la yi steng ma'i yi ge la// 
236a7(rgyud): Da yi steng mas stan du sbyar// nya yi steng ma nyis 'gyur la// phyi ma nya yi 'og mas rgyan// oM yi 'og gyur bsdus pa la// sha yi steng ma drung du sbyar// la yi 'og ma rgyan du byas// nya yi 'og gi
236a8(rgyud): sbyin par bya// oM yi 'og na gnas pa la// nya yi 'og mas brgyan par bya// nga yi 'og mar gnas pa la// thig le na da dag gis rgyan// nga yi 'go ma'i yi ge la// u yi steng ma sbyin par bya// tsha
236b1(rgyud): tsha yi steng na gnas pa gang // b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par blangs// ta yi steng mas brgyan par bya// d+ha yi 'og ma gnas pa dang // wa yi 'og ma bzung bar bya// sa yi steng ma nyid bsdus la// ya yi steng
236b2(rgyud): na gnas pa las// nya yi 'og gnas de la rgyan// nya yi 'og ma kun gyi rten// sa yi sten ma blang bar bya// b+ha yi steng na gnas pa la// la yi 'og mas brgyan par bya// ba yi steng ma nyid de blang // 
236b3(rgyud): dz+ha yi 'og mang steng dang // pa yi steng na gnas pa la// u yi steng ma yang dag blang // e yi 'og gnas yi ga la// dA yi steng ma mgo bor sbyin// la tha bar gnas pa la yang // Na yi steng mas brgya/ 
236b4(rgyud): par bya// ma stengs thig le nA ngas rgyan// dza 'og gnas pa'i yi ge la// da stengs sa yi sten ma dang // pha 'og ta yi 'og ma sa rgyan// dza yi gong na gnas pa dang // ma yi steng ma sa stengs
236b5(rgyud): gnas// ya yi steng ma nyid dang ldan// dza 'og nya yi steng ma/ la// d+ha yi steng mas mgo bor rgyan// Da yi 'og ma sha ste/ sa ldan// thig la na ngas rgyan pa'o// Da yi steng mas tsha nyid du/ 
236b6(rgyud): sha yi thog mas rten par bya// pha yi steng ma btu bar bya// la stengs gnas pa Ta stengs sbyar// nya yi steng du nyis 'gyur ba// phyi ma'i nya yi 'og mas rgyan// dbyangs yig dang po ka 'og can// sa
236b7(rgyud): stengs gnas pa nyid dang yang // u steng gnas pa yang dag bcas// sa steng gnas po thig les rgyan// nya yi steng ma'i gnas pa la// oM yi 'og gnas ga bdun gnas// ta yi 'og ma mgo
236b8(rgyud): bor sbyin// nga steng gnas pa Na 'og sbyar// la stengs gnas paT 'og bcas// la 'og zur gnas sbyar bar bya// b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi ge la// ma stengs gnas bstan du byas// sha yi
237a1(rgyud): 'og dza'i steng mar sbyar// Na 'og gnas pa nyid drung ste// b+ha stengs gnas pa'i 'og mas rgyan// sha stengs drung du sbyin par bya// la steng sha yi thog ma la// phyi ma
237a2(rgyud): nya 'og gnas pas mdzes// Ta 'og sha thog thig les rgyan// sha thog ri yi 'og mas rgyan// ba thog la stengs gnas pa sbyar// de la nye 'og sbyin par bya// ba steng gnas pa la 'og
237a3(rgyud): ldan// nya 'og dag gis yang dag mdzes// ka ga bar gnas pa nyid la// nyis 'gyur du ni bsdu bar bya// gA steng gnas pa de nyid la// nya 'og brgyan pa nyid du bya// ma yi thog mar Da 'og bcas// 
237a4(rgyud): g+ha stengs gnas pa nyid dang ni// wa 'og gnas pa tha 'og sprin // ha 'og Na yi 'og ma re ldan// de yi nyis 'gyur she sa par byas// kha dog mo yi yi ge la// u ri bar gnas sbyar
237a5(rgyud): bar bya// ma steng pha 'og 'og tu sbyin// de ni nyis 'gyur sbyor bar bya// tsha yi steng ma pha thog drung // Sha yi thog ma drung du gnas// de ni zung du sbyar bar bya// ma steng gnas pa sa
237a6(rgyud): thog drung // nyis 'gyur rim par shes par bya// sha thog gnas pa wa thog drung // lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya// ka 'og gnas pa bstan pa// ba 'og stan du byas pa nyid// nyis 'gyur dag
237a7(rgyud): tu shes par bya// b+ha stengs gnas pa Ta stengs drung // Sha yi 'og ma stan du byas/ sha yi steng Da'i 'og mas rgya no// d+ha 'og i thog stan du sbyar// pa yi steng ma drung du bzhag/ ha yi 'og ma NA 'o/ 
237a8(rgyud): ldan 'ab thog drag por 'gyur ba'o// sha stengs tha yi 'og mas rgyan// 'di nyid rim pa mngon spyod pa'i// mA ra ya yi thog mar sbyar// ma yi steng gnas ri 'og sbyar// nyis 'gyur thig len/ 
237b1(rgyud): ngas rgyan// tsa yi steng na gnas pa la// i yi steng ma rgyun ba drung // bla thog tha thog gnas bsgyur// de la nya yi 'og mas rgyan// ma steng gnas pa nya 'og ni// yang dag stan du bya ba'o// 'di
237b2(rgyud): ni dri med bde ba'i gter// snying po gsang sngags 'di nyid ni// gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogasu// nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas// ma lus zhing skyong 'khor dang bcas// dur khrod ro la lce spyang
237b3(rgyud): dang / sha za'i tshogs rnams 'du ba bzhin// nges par 'du bar byed pa ste// bstan po rgya mtsho srung byed pa'o// dpag tshad brgyad khri'i bar du ni// do yi bgegs rnams ma lus la// til 'bru tsam
237b4(rgyud): du byed par mdzad// snying po 'di ni zlos byed cing // gang du nyi ma gcig tu yang // ma chad mngon par sems pa yi// daru ka dpal rnal 'byor la// 'jigs pa kun las srung ba dang / 
237b5(rgyud): zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod la// gas pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi/ bar du 'bad de bsgrub par bya// mtshan ma byung na/ 
237b6(rgyud): bla ma yi// man ngag bzhin du las la sbyar// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yang dag ye
237b7(rgyud): shes bskyed pa po// gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// gtum po de yi gsang ba'i yum// lha mo bzhi dang bcas pa yi// gsang sngags btu ba bshad par bya// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dag la
237b8(rgyud): thig lenA ngas rnam par rgyan// rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas// drug pa yi ni lnga pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi ni dang po nyid// an+tas+tha yi gsum pa ste// dang
238a1(rgyud): po'i gsum pa thog tu sbyin// lnga pa'i lnga pa gsum pas rgyan// gnyis pa yis ni dang po la// um+b+ha yi gsum pas stan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis rgyan// drug pa
238a2(rgyud): yi ni dang po dang // dbyangs kyi dgu pas gnas der sbyar// gnyis pa yi ni dang po ni// an+tas+tha yi gsum pa dang // de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang // lnga po yi ni dang po la// dbyangs kyi bdun pas ste/ 
238a3(rgyud): 'og sbyin// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pa mgo bor sbyin// gsum pa yi ni dang po la// drung du lnga pa'i lnga pa sbyar// lnga pa'i bzhi pa dag dang sbyar// dang po'i dang po'i drung du ni// gnyi/ 
238a4(rgyud): pa'i gsum pa sbyar ba dang // mthar gnas las kyi phyi ma yi// / de la dbyangs kyi gsum pas rgyan// an+tas+tha yi de dpo la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis rgyan// brgyad pa
238a5(rgyud): yi ni bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig drug pa dag gis rgyan// thig le nA das mdzes pa'o// drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid// bzhi pa yi ni thog ma sbyar// 'di ni gsang ba'i gtum
238a6(rgyud): mo 'drag cing shin tu cher 'jims byed// yid bzhin nor bu'i rigs 'dzin gter// bkra shis pa ni thog mar sbyar// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig bdun pa steng 'og
238a7(rgyud): sbyar ba theg le nA das mdzes pa yig/ un+d+ra Sha yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig drug pa dang sbyar ba// an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar// de nyid thig les mdzes par byas// gnyis pa'i dang po
238a8(rgyud): blang byas la// dbyings kyi dgu pa blang ba nyid// drug pa yi ni lnga pa la// usma Sha yi bzhi pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // dbyangs yig bcu pa sbyar bar bya// bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang

238b5(rgyud): dang po sbyar bar bya// thig le nA das yang dag rgyan// drug pa yi zhi gsum pa dang // an+d+ra s+tha yi dang po ste// yi ge gsu ma gyi bdag nyid kyis// nyis 'gyur dag tu sbyar bar bya// umra
238b6(rgyud): Sha yi bzhi pa dang // dang po'i drug pa dang sbyar ba// an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar// thig le nA ngas rgyan par bya// 'di ni gsang ba'i yum dag gis// snying po sbas pa mchog gyur pa// lha mo nag mo
238b7(rgyud): ye shes che// sngags ni drag cing sdud pa'o// de nas ye shes lnga ldan pa'i// rig byed mngon sum dang por gzhan/ drug pa yi ni lnga pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// gnyis pa yi ni
238b8(rgyud): dang po nyid// an+tes+tha yi gsum pa ste// dang po'i gsum pa thog tu sbyin// dang po'i bcu drug pa mtha' bya// mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar bar bya// sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po la// an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa
239a1(rgyud): / sbyar bar/ dang po'i dgu pa blang ba nyid// drug pa yi ni lnga pa la// thig len das brgyan pa'o// gnyis pa yi ni dang po la// drug du de nyid lnga bsgyur// gnyis pa'i dang
239a2(rgyud): de nyid dang // dbyangs kyi dgu pa sbyar bar bya// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// bdun pa yi ni gnyis pasgyur// de la thig len ngas rgyan// gnyis pa yi ni dang po la// an+tas+tha yi gsum pa dang / 
239a3(rgyud): bdun pa yi ni gnyis bsgyur// lnga po'i dang po nyid la yang // dbyangs kyi bdun pa steng 'og sbyar// bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa// thig len ngas mdzes byas pa'o// 'di dag kun gyi thog ma dang // 
239a4(rgyud): tha mar yang dag brten par bya/ 'din ki bzhi dag gi/ snying po sgra das ma mchog tu gsungs// dpal mgon po chen po dang // sa grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las sngags rim par bstan pa'i

239a6(rgyud): rgyun 'bab pa'i ngang // gangs kyi thig pa bdud rtsi'i chu// me tog mdangs gsal snying po yi// ge sar ze 'brur ldan pa la// 'dab rgyas ye shes nyid shar bas// rang grol mdangs 'bar rab tu rgyas/ 
239a7(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen ral gri dang // 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs dag las// 'khor ba'i rgyu las 'od zer 'phro// steng 'og dag las rim pa ni// 'khrul cing gcod pa'i gri gug gis// las dang phrin
239a8(rgyud): las rang byung du// byed cing bskul ba'i las grub pa// phyi nang gsang ba rim bzhin du// dbab dang sngags pa bzlog pa ste// rtsa ba yan lag las bzhir 'gyur// dang po thun mong dgu pa ste// 
239b1(rgyud): gnyis pa bye brag phyed pa dang // bskyed pa'i ye shes mi bzlog pa// klungs su chud pa phyag rgya che// snying po gcig la dus gsum du// 'gyur med de nyid dbye ba nyid// gcig las du ma'i
239b2(rgyud): ngo bo can// 'jig rten pa dang ye shes che// mi 'gyur ba dang 'gags pa dang // las rnams byed pa'i srog gyur pa// gsang sngags 'khor lo 'di dag ni// bye brag rnal 'byor pas shes pa// / 
239b3(rgyud): oM ma hA kA la hUM hUM phaT// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kA waM ma hA lA ya hUM hUM phaT/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya// tad+ya thA/ oM shri ma hA kA la ya/ shA sa naM a ba hA rI NAM// e ShA ba shi ma kA la oM
