239b5(rgyud): ba tsa/ swar+b+ba dr-iSh+TaM/ di na me ke ne mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA kA li ni krod+ha sa ki li rak+Shi NI tsaN+Da ak+Shi ye hUM phaT/ a hIHhAM kA li maM hA kI li rak+ta maM se na/ b+hak+Sha Ni/ a mu ka s+ya/ 
239b6(rgyud): sar+b+ba ba laM staM b+hi ya hUM phaT/ oM AHmo hI ra hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ka ni li me hI phaT/ oM kaM kA laM hI hUM phaT/ oM kA la ra kri raM hUM phaT// de las dngos dang nyi ma su yang // nag po chen po'i zhal ston dang / 
239b7(rgyud): tha ma rmi lam lung ston pa// mi nag bong thung gsus 'phyang dang // bya nag khA ti la sogs 'ang // de yang rab 'bring tha ma yi// bye brag rtag su 'char bar 'gyur// grangs ni bdun 'bum dag gis ni/ 
239b8(rgyud): mngon sum gsal ba'i nges pa 'char// khri phrag bdun dang khri phrag dgu/ stong phrag bdun gyis nye bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab bcas pa yi// sngags kyi stong phrag bcu dag ni// dus ni
240a1(rgyud): zla drug zhag bdun par// rnal 'byor smra ba bcad de bzlas// mi tshig par mchod pa yi// gsang sngags phrin las nges par 'grub// thun mtshams mchod dang gtor ma dang // bstod
240a2(rgyud): dang bcol bskal las la 'bad// rang nyid heha ru kar gsal ba// ri rab steng du yum bcas bsam// de mdun nag po chen po nyid// gsal ba bskyed tshul byed pa yis// rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs
240a3(rgyud): pa ni// mngon sum lta bur blta bar bya// bdag dang bdun gyi mgon po yi// thugs kha'i sa bon rang sngags las// de las spro bsdus ting 'dzin bsam// de ltar dus dang gzhan du yang // rten
240a4(rgyud): bcas dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa dang // rten btsugs brtan bye dad de nyid bsnyen// de nas rten bcas tsam gyis ni// de sa bar de yi mdun song ba// mchod dang gtor ma bsham par
240a5(rgyud): bya// sha chen sreg spos phul nas ni// dmigs pa gtong bar bye da pa dang // gang la bya ba'i bsgrub bya de// dmigs pas bkug cing bstab pa dang // gtor mar dbul zhing bka' bsgo
240a6(rgyud): byad/ lha dang bral zhing nyes pa bsgo// de nas ma nyes nyes pa bsgrag/ dbang btsugs los la ba tsal bskal bya// de yis nges par 'grub par 'gyur// de las khyad par phrin las ni// lha
240a7(rgyud): sbyin dang ni mchod sbyin sogs// bsgral ba'i zhing de gang yin pa// de yi zag pa'i rdzas rnams dang // phung shul sa dang g.yul sprad sa// grog mkhar sa la sogs pa rnams// bdud changs
240a8(rgyud): la bong bu'i chus// spras te ling gi sta gon bya// de nas dben par song nas ni// mar ngo yi ni tshes brgyad dam// bcu bzhi la sogs sgrub dus la// gza' skar shin tu drag po la// de nas
240b1(rgyud): 'khor lo bri bar bya// rgyu ni ro ras shing shun dang // zhing lpags dag la dug sna dang // khrag dang dug gi me tog gi/ du ba mtshan ngan thod chags la// mchog phur bstong pa'i snag tshas praM// d+ha
240b2(rgyud): skyegs dag gis bsres la bri// tshad dang ldan pa'i mu khyud ni// rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa la// nang du le tshe dgu pa bya// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga por ni// gru gsum nag po sa bon bcas// las
240b3(rgyud): rnams byed pa rlung yig dang // ma hA ka la 'bru bzhi dang // steng non o dang badz+ra ste// de yi phyi rim rtsibs brgyad lo// a mu ka dang ba yi ni// yi ge bcu gsum gnyis gnyis pa// g.yas
240b4(rgyud): bskor dag tu dgod par bya// de yi phyi rim pad mdab brgyad// sgo mtshams lha mos 'khor lo'i sngags// ming sde la bcas pa dgod par bya// de yi nang gi gru chad bzhir// hUM ga nyi
240b5(rgyud): phaT dang bcas pa la// ming spel bcug la bri bar bya// khyad pa ra sbas pa'i 'khor lo ni// dbus su rlung gi sa bon nyid// phyogs bzhir mkha'agro ma bzhi gnas// phyogs
240b6(rgyud): bzhir sngags kyi phreng ba las// phyi rol rtsibs la gcod pa'i sngags// mdab brgyad cha la tsaN+Di ka/ mtha' rten snga ma dag dang mtshungs// yang na rim pa gsum pa yi// gsang sngags ma hA kA/ 
240b7(rgyud): la yi phrin las khyad par dgod par bya// 'dis ni shing tu mngon spyod myur// thabs dang shes rab khyad par dang // steng 'og bar gyi dbye ba yis// zangs dang lcags kyi gri gug gis// bla dang tshe sri
240b8(rgyud): don snying la// myur du 'khor bas gcod par byed// sdud byed 'phrog cing len pa'i srog/ bsgral pa rdo rje rigs kyi las// thun mong du ni bya ba yin// khyad par 'khor lo dril bya ste// dus kyi rim pas
241a1(rgyud): / las la sbyar// 'di ni kun tu mnan pa ste// las kyi gshin rje'i gnasu gtad// 'khor lo la yang bsnyen pa dang // sgrub pa go rim nor mi bya// 'dis ni bya ba mi 'grub med// 
241a2(rgyud): dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang sngags dang 'khor lo sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de ni sa gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dpal ldan nag po chen po
241a3(rgyud): yi/ rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la zhugs te// mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya// khyad par dur khrod pa yi shing // lha 'dre gtum po gnas pa las// ma mo'i bye brag brtags pa las// bcad pa mgo mju/ 
241a4(rgyud): ma nor bar// gnyis bshags de nas sngags bris lo// ba sngams te blang ba mig gis ni// phye ba'i bdun phrag gsum pa wa// legs par bzhag te tshad du bya// dkyil 'khor gru gsum
241a5(rgyud): pa la gzugs// gzhan yang bsgrub bya'i gzugs dag ni// zur gsum tshud pa sngags dang bcas// ming spel bskul/ tshig ldan pa ni// grangs ni rab 'bring tha ma ste// ci rigs par/ 
241a6(rgyud): ni bya bar gsungs// yang ni ro sgro ma shing la yang // byang bu byas la ling ga bri// gzhan du mgon po yab yum gyi// 'khor lo legs par bris pa dang // bsgrub bya srog gi 'khor lo ni// gri gug
241a7(rgyud): lnga pa 'khor ba dag/ de dag bar du bcug pa dang // yang na mgon po'i 'khor lo dang // bsgrub bya du yod ling ga rnams// de yi nang du dril bar bya// 'khor lo tshon sku de rnam pas bkri/ de yi phyi rol ku sha
241a8(rgyud): yid/ rtsa yi mi gzugs byas nas kyang // rang mdun gru gsum nag po yi// nang du gzugs de gzhug par bya// de la lha dang dbye ba dang // nyes pa bsgo zhing bsgrag par bya// de nas bdag nyid lha dang ni/ 
241b1(rgyud): mdun du nag po chen po ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs// yum dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang // spyan drang mchod cing bstim par bya// las mgon rnams dang ma mo bzhi// 
241b2(rgyud): rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu// lha srin sde brgyad ma lus dang // gzhan yang dur khrod sha za dang / ma mo ro langs lce spyang dang // stag dang dred dang bya gcan sogs// bya rog khA ta la sogs
241b3(rgyud): pa/ yongasu bskor cing phrin las byed// de nas rang dang mgon po dang // lha mo bzhi la sogs pa yi// sa bon las ni 'od zer yang // lcags kyu lta bu dpag med pas// bsgrub bya de dag ma
241b4(rgyud): lus pa// snying gi srog rtsa nas drangs te// rang dbang med pa ra rlung gis btag/ myur du 'ong ba mdog nyams pa// rid cing skra 'dzings shin tu 'dar// yid yod sdang zhing skrag
241b5(rgyud): pade sa zhabs pas bcings dang bsdams pa dang // dril bu la sogs sgra yis ni// shin tu dbang po myos gyur te/ de yi rnam par shes pa ni// ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs
241b6(rgyud): la bstim// de yi dus su gsang sngags ni// phrin las sngags rings mtha' ru ni// A kaR+Sha ya dza/ zhes brjod/ mgon po nag po yab yum gyi// lte bar gru gsum lcags khang ni// btson dong / 
241b7(rgyud): mun khang gnas pa bsam// de las thar dus med par bya// de nas dong de ro g.yam la// rdo rje rgya gram bris pas mnan// mtha' mar las sbyor dus su yang // bsgrub bya'i them pa 'am lam dag
241b8(rgyud): rgya mnan pa byas la phrin las bcol// gal te de nyid sbyin sreg gis/ las sbyor bsgrub bya'i chu rjes sogs// dri ma gos dang sgra sogs dong // tshe ba gsum dang dug sna dang // khrag dang skye che
242a1(rgyud): tshe dang // da d+hur dang de la sogs// sa sna gzhan dang sbyar bar bya// bong bu'i chu dang bsreg nas ni// 'jim pa byas la g.yog par bya// dug chu ro sol dag gis ni// de la byuH
242a2(rgyud): cing gnas lnga ru// seng ldeng lcags phur btab la bzhag/ de yi lus po thams cad la// spra tshil gyis ni byug par bya// de la drag po'i shing gi ni// tshor ma sna tshogs gtsugs la bzhag/ gru
242a3(rgyud): gsum e ye nang du ni// de gzugs phyi gan dag tu bzhag/ kha nang dur khrod thal bas brdzang // de nas dong kha bcad la bzhag/ de la thun bzhir bya ba 'am// dus drug dag tu bya ba ni// rnal 'byor pa
242a4(rgyud): yis lhor bcas la// nyi phyed mtshan phyed dus su bya// yang na dus bzhir las la sbyar// phyogs kyi DA ki bzhi yis ni// dgug gzhug bstim dang bsngags par bya// de nas thod pa
242a5(rgyud): mtshan ngan du// nyungs kar nyungs nag la sogs pa'i// thun rdzas rnams la sngogs bzlas shing // dus dus dag tu brdeg par bya// skabs skabs dug gi chu yis brdag/ 
242a6(rgyud): gal te gu gul nag po dang // sha chen dag gis bdug par bya// yang na 'bras bu me la ni// spra tshal ma zhu tsam du bsro// de nas sngags kyi brdeg par bya// 'di ni nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar cho
242a7(rgyud): ga'i thabs 'di yis// dgra yi khang par bya rog dag/ mang po 'ba' zhig skad 'don dang // lus la tsha bas thebs la sogs// du ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung bar 'gyur// dang por nang rtags gsal
242a8(rgyud): bar 'char// phyi rtags rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las drag po'i mngon spyod bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gdug pa
242b1(rgyud): 'dug don du// nag po chen po khros pa yi// sgrub pa'i rim pa mchog gyur pa// gzhan yang rab tu bshad par bya// rje btsun he ru ka dpal dang // nag po chen po'i lha tshogs rnams// na mkha
242b2(rgyud): mngon par bltas nas ni// bdun po yongasu dag par bya// bzod par gsol ba gshegasu gsol// de rjes stong pa'i ngang las ni// tshad med bzhi po bsam par bya// byang chub sems kyi ngang
242b3(rgyud): las ni// pad+ma zla nyir gnas pa yi// hUM yig nag por bsam par bya// de yi 'od kyis khyab pa las// bsdus shing skad cig yongs gyur pa// dpal ldan nag po chen po ni// zhal gcig pa la
242b4(rgyud): spyan gsum pa// phyag gnyis sku mdog shin tu gnag/  buM skra kham nag gyen du rjes// g.yas pa gshin rje'i lce la dadra ba'i// gri gug rnon po 'dzin par mdzad// g.yon pa thod pa
242b5(rgyud): khrig bkang bsnams// thod pas skra mtshams bcings pa dang / yan lag thung zhing rags pa'i gzugs// man gtsigs 'jig su rung ba ste// ltos 'gro brgyad dang rin che/ 
242b6(rgyud): brgyad// rgyu ma'i ga sha stag lpags can// mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba 'phyang // zhal nas khrag 'dzag gang rgyangs can// phyag rgya drug gis sku la smras// drag po'i nyams dang ldan pa ste// skad cig
242b7(rgyud): tsam gyis bskyed par bya// de yi thugs khar nyi ma la// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar dmigs// ting 'dzin sems dpa' dang bcas pa// rten dang brten par bcas pa bsam// de la 'di
242b8(rgyud): yi gsang sngags byung // oM badz+ra ma hA kA lA ya hUM hUM phaT/ ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa// gsang sngags phreng ba bzlas par bya// de nas sha chen spros sreg cing // gzhan yang dug dang khrag la sogs
243a1(rgyud): / bdug pa'i du bsod par bya// ma shwa 'bras dang so ba dang // 'bru nag me tog byug pa dang // sgron ma lnga dang mi 'chi lnga// khur ba chan dang chang la sogs// gtor ma nag po che
243a2(rgyud): la dbul// mchod dang bstod pa tshul bzhin bya// 'di yi nye bar spyad pa ni// bsgrub bya'i zag pa'i rdzas rnams dang // tsha ba gsum la sogs pa la// gang gi ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs// byas
243a3(rgyud): te dug gis byugs nas kyang // tshir mas bkang ste thab khung du// 'bras bu'i mo la gdung la sogs// bya ba sna tshogs las byas na// skad cig gis ni brlag par byed// rdo rje slob dpon
243a4(rgyud): smod byed cing // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig byed pa// dkon mchog gsum la sdang ba dang // sems cani kun la/ 'tshe ba rnams// 'di dag nag po chen pos sgrol// yan lag
243a5(rgyud): ngag gi sha chod la// mgon po nag po'i zhal du gsol// ya na de yi spyi nas ni// til tsam du ni mdzad du gsol// ga gi rgyun yang 'thung bar mdzod// de ltar phrin las las btsam
243a6(rgyud): bya de nas sbyin sreg brtsam par bya// pung shul g.yul sprad la sogs pa// dur khrod sol bas byug byas te// gru gsum rim pa kha khyer ldan// de yi nang du drag po'i shing // tsher ma can gyis
243a7(rgyud): brtsig par bya// mchod dang sreg rjes gtorare ma dang // bsgrub bya'i ling ga sha chen dang // nyungs kar bcas pas yongasu bskor// sngags pas lhor bltas ting 'dzin zhugs// me lnga baspyad
243a8(rgyud): dgug gtsug bya// ling ga pur bta' thu bas byas la/ gi.oM slar bsregs pas lha la mi tshad// gsang sngags 'dang yin bsgyur ldan pa// phrag gtsag gis ni lan gcig ste// lan gros
243b1(rgyud): rim mtsho'i khyad par gyis// phyir mi bzlog cing srog gtor byed// de rjes gsol gdab bcol bskul bya// shin tu myur bar rtags rnams 'grub// nag po chen po'i gsang pa'i
243b2(rgyud): las// ma grub lan gsum stobs pa dang // sa ban 'brag cing gzung bas 'grub// dpal mgon mtshan pa dngas gru'i 'byung ba'i rgyud las drag pa'i sbyin sreg bstan pa'i le'us
243b3(rgyud): bcu pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen pa yi// dur khrod gnas pa'i zhing skyong dang // nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhing skyong bcas// de dag rim pa'i shad par bya// rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya mo// drug rtsa
243b4(rgyud): bzhi'i phrin las dang // 'di nyid gsang pa'i mgan pa yi// thab sa mchog 'di ni kun tu smras// dpal ldan mgon po can// khro bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// dkyil 'a
243b5(rgyud): dbus bzhugs dpa' bo ni// shin tu 'gying zhing 'bar ba sku// le che dgu po'i dbus su ni// sna tshogs pad+ma ni/ dbus la// dpa' bo chen po phyed dkyil tshul// zhal gcis
243b6(rgyud): bal phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum b+hi rul ltar dmar// sku mdog sngon pa 'jigs chen po// thong pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// phyag rgya lnga ldan gar gyis rol// dang pos gri gugazod pa dang / 
243b7(rgyud): gnyis pa ral gri kha T+wA~M ga/ klu brkyang rgyan gyi phrin las can// de yi thugs khar gnas pa yi// sa bon spro dang bsdu ba'i dngos// oM ma hA kA la A kaR+Sha ya ma pra sha ma nA ya ha sa ma ya s+t+waM// thad
243b8(rgyud): sdud cing dbang byed pa// skad cig tsam gyis bskyed par bya// de yi shar gyi le tshe la// drag po shin tu 'jigs pa ste// zhal gcig phyag bezho spyan gsum pa// mthing nage rngam pa'i tshul du gnas/ 
244a1(rgyud): / de yi mdun du rgan byed ma// g.yasu me sdug drug po che// g.yon du 'jigs ma gnas pa dang // rgyab tu u ma rnam par rol// nag po'i lho yi phyogs su ni// drag po chen po du
244a2(rgyud): mdog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// thod phreng gis rgyan gtsigs pa'i tshul// de yi mdun du rnam rgyal ma// g.yasu rnam par rgyal ba ma// rgyab tu mi sdug ma gnas la// g.yon
244a3(rgyud): du gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o// lha gtar mnyam gnas nub phyogasu// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// mdog ser rgyu ma'i phreng bas dkris// shin tu bzhad pa'i tshul du gnas// de yi
244a4(rgyud): mdun du nag mo che// g.ya su drag ce drag shul chen// rgyab tu nag sbom ma ni gnas// g.yon du bzang mo mche ba can// nag po khyab byed byang phyogasu// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan
244a5(rgyud): gsum pa// char sprin nag po'i mdog 'dra ba// shin tu gdang sa shing ljags 'dril ba// de yi mdun du dbang mo ste / g.ya su zla ba mo zhes bya// rgyab tu drag tu sdang ba la// g.yo/ 
244a6(rgyud): du rna ba 'phyang ba'o// gtso bo nag po chen po ni// shar lho mtshams kyi gnas bzhugs pa// gtsigs pa can ni shel gyi mdog/ stag lpags gos kyis dkris pa'o// mdun du lha mo 'phrog
244a7(rgyud): byed ma// g.ya su 'bar byed ma gnas la// de yi rgyab tu 'jib byed ma// g.yon du yul skyong ma gnaso// gtso bor gyur pa'i sku yi ni// lho nub mtshamasu bzhugs pa ni// mi sdug pa ni du ba'i
244a8(rgyud): mdog/ shin tu mi srun gzugs 'chang ba// gzig gi ko brlon pas dkris// mdun du 'jigs byed drag mo che// g.ya su gzugs chen mo zhes bya// rgyab tu mche ba gtsigs ma ste// g.yon du/ 
244b1(rgyud): zod can ma yin no// nag po chen po'i sku yi ni// nub byang mtshams kyi grwar zhugs pa// dga' bar ldan pa pang dmar mdog/ glang po'i lpags pa 'dzin pa'o// de yi mdun du thod phreng 'a
244b2(rgyud): g.ya su phreng ba 'dzin ma ste// rgyab tu tri shul 'dzin ma'o// g.yon du ltos 'gro bsnams pa'o// gtso bo nag po chen po yi// byang shar mtsham su gnas pa ni// log sred can gyi rdzagasar
244b3(rgyud): mdog/ spre'u'i lpags pa 'dzin pa'o// de yi mdun du ral gri ma// graya su dgra ste 'dzin ma ste// rgyab tu rdo rje mda' thogs ma// g.yon du rdo rje'i gzhu ma'o// khro bo'i pho nya 'di dag ni// zhal
244b4(rgyud): gcig phyag bzhi gar gyis rol// dang po gri gug thod pa'i/ dzan// gnyis pas Da ma ru dang ni// tri shu la ni 'dzin dpar mdzad// pho nya'i rnal 'byor ma 'di dag/ 'di dag phal
244b5(rgyud): cher zhal gcig la// phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa can// nag mo sar dang dmar ljang ste// phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o// dur khrod gnas su rol par mdzad// pho brang de yi phyi rol du// 
244b6(rgyud): zhing skyong rnams kyis yongasu bskor// ka Ta ha re ka ta shing / shan+ti pa la yab yub can// ko la ki ra ni ro yi shing // g+han d+ha ba la yum dang ldan// d+ha ra parta ba yi shing // aM gi ba laM yab
244b7(rgyud): yum sbyor// ko Ti ri d+hi ba pa d+hi shing // dz+wa la pa la yab yum sbyor// b+hi ra tsaN+De a mra'i shing // sha ra d+ha sa gnyis med gnas// o Ta dbyangs can ka na ka'i// ka ba la yi lha srub byed// sa Ta bA

245a1(rgyud): / shing // 'byin pa k+She tre pA lar ldan// nA ga ba raras shing can// keng rus ldan pa rol bar 'gyur// sud+d+he pa ra ri dza lu'i shing // pa yi rkang pa rtag tu rol// dzA lan d+ha ra ra khang /

245a4(rgyud): bcas// kI ri ke bar sa la'i shing // lhun po 'bar ba dang dang phyug bcas// k+Shi ri ki sar sa la'i shing // lhun po 'a dbar ba lhan cig bcas// b+ha yang ma 'bur 'byung po'i shing / 
245a5(rgyud): stobs chen 'jigs pa gnas byed pa'o// pu Ta nar ni dA du pa'o// a b+ha ke ba burtul zhugs 'dzin// rA dza g+hi ha ra dza pa na// sna chen dzi li sgra gcan no// khang pa can du rang byung
245a6(rgyud): brag/ thub dka' rgyal mtshan 'dzin mar bcas// ma hA tra yer tsan dan shing // sna tshogs dbang phyug dbang bskur bcas// 'di dag k+She ta pA la ni// zhing skyong zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// 
245a7(rgyud): gri gug cang te g.yas pa na// g.yon pa thod khrag rtsa gsum can// yum ni so so'i phyag mtshan ldan// skye gnas las byung sgra sgrogs mdzad// rtag tu sgrub pa po rnams kyi// lus la yang dag
245a8(rgyud): / gnas nas ni// dngos grub ster byed stobs mchog byed// 'di dag zhing skyong thugs brtse bas// rtag par mtshan mo du bsas/ 'di dag sa gsum khyab pa ste// sna tshogs mdog can 'bar ba'o// 
245b1(rgyud): oM shIn+ti k+She ba hUM phaT/ oM ma hA smi ti hUM phaT/ oM b+ha laM pu hUM phaT// oM shaM ka ri hUM phaT/ oM kA lA d+hi ba hUM phaT/ oM dza ya b+ha la hUM phaT/ oM bi bu b+ha ga hUM phaT/ oM bar+Na san hU~M phaT/ oM k+She tra pA laH/ 
245b2(rgyud): hi hUM pabe/ i ko li ki li pheM pheM pheT leT/ k+ShAk+ShA k+Shu k+ShA/ ka ha ka ha/ hI hI hi hI/ ba tsa bi tsa/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ ha hA/ ta tA ra rA rA rA/ kr-i kle kA kra/ khaM khaM kha kha~M d+hu d+hA d+hA d+hA/ rkan na Ni/ rke rka rka ka/ #
245b3(rgyud): kr-i kri kr-i kr-i/ saM saM saM saM/ yayaM yaM ya yaM/ pi pheM pheM pa~M/ b+hU b+h+rUM b+hU b+h+yAM/ k+ShaM k+ShA k+ShA k+ShaM/ gluglu g+hu glai/ baM baM baM baM swAhA/ yul ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// drag po'i zhing skyong nyi shu bzhi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor
245b4(rgyud): lo yi/ sa gsum rnam par khyab nas gnas// 'di dgadagasang ba'i sngags yin te// gzhan du nam yang 'khrul pa/ dar 'gyur// oM DA ki nI/ ka ka kA ta na/ b+ha ba bad+ma na/ kha kha khA
245b5(rgyud): gI ban d+ha na/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAM/ ha na ha na/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya/ g+hA tA ya/ sarba pA pa a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru hUM hU~M phaT swA hA// 'di dag grub pa'i rnal 'byor me// dngos grub stsol bar the tsom med/ 
245b6(rgyud): 'di nyid dkyil 'khor dgod pa yis// sna tshogs phrin las byed pa ste// dur khrod brgyad kyi bdag po mchog/ pho nya legs brten 'khor lo yin// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i
245b7(rgyud): rgyud las dur khrod kyi bdag po rnams// pho nya ba khyad par rnams dang // ma mo dang zhing skyong gi phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang nyi shu bzhi// gsang
245b8(rgyud): ba'i mgon po 'di nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor pho brang gnas pa'o// mkha' 'gro'i gsang sngags bstan par bya// pho nya legs skyes rnal 'byor ma// rgya mtsho dang ni ro yas ni// phye ba'i rdo rje
246a1(rgyud): nor bu dang // pad+ma ral gri'i rigs dang ni// bde gshegs ye shes dam tshig gis// sna tshogs sha za'i ma mo rnams// gnas skyes yul dang grong gnas pa/ klu yis mtshon
246a2(rgyud): bas kun tu phye// oM b+hai ra khi ni sAh+na/ Da tri ni/ DA sha ka ra li ni/ dzA la mu khi ni/ bA yu be ga ni pra tsar+t+ti Ni// ru dra ak+Shi Ni// ma hA Na se ni/ a se ni ya ma nau// kIr+Nani/ lak+ShA Ni/ bi dza ye ni/ shr-i dza na ye// 
246a3(rgyud): dza ya ka ra Ni/ shrI badz+re Ni/ kaM kA li naM/ kA la rA tri Ni/ pra kro d+ha mu khi ni/ kA la dzi hA ni/ ka rA li ni/ badz+ra be ra ba ka ra Ni/ d+hu ru si naM/ ya ni ma na a ka ri ni/ mr-i ka ras ti sA ni// rat+na mA li ni/ su kra a k+Shi ni/ !
246a4(rgyud): su li ni/ khat+ti Ni/ badz+ra pra b+ha Ni/ badz+ra kA la ya ni/ sa ma ba tsa ni8/ ka ma ni b+hi/ tsi tra li ga ni/ shu ki ni/ sarba d+hi ni/ su tra rI Ni/ g+ha las sa ni/ bad mAk+Shi ni// dza la dza la kha Di b+ha ba b+hu d+hi ni// shr-i
246a5(rgyud): g+ho ra Ni/ tsaN+Da li kha ne/ tsaN+Da mu khi ni/ he sa warmi Ni/ wa ki me shA ra Ni/ g+hi ta ru dra ya/ ka ra Ni sA ka b+hi ru sa ni mr-id+h+we/ ni d+hi/ g+ha ri Na sho sha Ni/ su shI g+h+ra/ b+haM du b+ha ra Ni/ shri mu khi ni/ pa
246a6(rgyud): ka li ni/ ka li ni/ ha ri Ni thA ye/ pad+me ni/ na gra ba a k+Shi ni/ b+hi ma la tsa gri ni swA hA/ bak+Sha pak+Sha sarba yo gi ni kA me sha ri// sarba duSh+Ta gar+dz+dza gar+b+ha gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ tshe so brgyad dang ni nye ba dang // nyi shu dag
246a7(rgyud): dang dgu stong dang // zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi// las ni the tsom med 'grub pa'i// dbyug gu dag pa'i pho nya dang // chu tshod kyi ni ma mo dang / 'pho ba gnod sbyin brgya phrag gnyis// thun ni pho nya brgya
246a8(rgyud): dag go// dus sbyor bcu gnyis gnas pa'i yul// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de yi phyed// rtsa rlung yi ge khams la rgyu// 'ching grol tshar gcod rjes 'dzin pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i
246b1(rgyud): rgyud las phyi dang nang gi dngos po pho nya ma'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba// nag po chen po gtum po na// zhal gdangs mche
246b2(rgyud): gtsigs ljags 'dril cing // a la la'i sgra sgrogs pa// rab 'jigs bzhengs pa'i stabs kyis ni// gsang ba mchod byed lha mo brgyad// kun nas gar gyis rol pa ste// 'di yis phrin
246b3(rgyud): las dbang thob byed// oM badz+ra ka wu ma hA kA lA ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-i d+ha sa gA ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+ha ga byA g+hA ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+ha na su ba ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM so ma la ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+ha na She Na s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ 
246b4(rgyud): oM kro na d+ha ka rA s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM u lU ka s+ye hA hUM pheM Ta/ oM dag na gu s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ 'di ni dpal nag po chen po 'khor lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa'i sngagaso// mtshan phyid dus na/ 
246b5(rgyud): gtor ma 'bul// shi lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// myos byed stobs dang bcas pas mchod// gsang ba sgrub pa na mchog tu bshad// bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis// dben par
246b6(rgyud): dug dang tsha ba dang // sa la dgra bo'i gzugs bya ste// gro ga 'am ni ro ras la// rgya skyegs dug dang khrag rnams kyis// bya rog mo yi rus pas ni// gzugs bris de yi snying khar ni// a yi rnam
246b7(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo la// mA ra ya yi mtha' can gyi// man ngag bzhin du bri bar bya// de nas rkang pa nas brtsams te/ dril la dur khrod skra yis dkris// sngar gyi gzugs kyi snying kha ru// bcug ste tshigs
246b8(rgyud): dang lci ba sogs// dug dang bcas pa'i tsher ma gzugs// de nas sngags pa 'dod lha yi// nga rgyal chen po rab ldan pas// snying kha'i hUM las 'od 'phro bas// lha la bka' bsgo rnams zhes ni// 
247a1(rgyud): man ngag can gyis dgug par bya// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la che ge mo A kaR+Sha dza dza hUM ba hos dgug pa dang / gzhug dang bcing dang myos par bya// de nas tsha bdug gis brab// de bzhin
247a2(rgyud): bdun phrag nyi shu gsum// zla ba gcig tu las sgrub la// drag po'i thab tu tsher ma dang / bra ma'i me la bsro bar bya// des kyang mdud par mi byed na// bstan pa bde la gnas pa'i phyir// snying rje chen
247a3(rgyud): por rab bskyed de// gri lcags las byas mtshon gyis gdug/ khrag dang dug dang tsha ba dang // tsher ma ling gar bcas te bsregs// thal ba bla ma'i man ngag ltar// mnan dang chu bor dor bar
247a4(rgyud): byad gzhan yang mi shes thod pa la// dug gis myu gus gzugs dbris te// de yi lce la ud ma ni// ming sbrel bris la thod dab gnyis// kha sbyar skud pa nag pos dkri// nag po'i gos kyis
247a5(rgyud): btums nas ni// mi shes sa phyogs dag tu mnan// bsnyen dang sgrub pas mnyes gyur na// 'chi dang spro bar gyur pa ni// the tsom yod pa ma yin no// yi dgas sam ni dgra bo dang // 
247a6(rgyud): / gro ga la ni gzugs bris la// snying khar sngags 'dis bskor bar bya// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la che ge mo mA ra yo hUM hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags bris gtor ma gzhug/ de nas smrab sngags bzlas pa
247a7(rgyud): bya/ de yi rjes la gtor ma dbul// mgon po nag po 'khor bcas la// sha khrag bskang sogs bstab byas nas// gtor mas bsad pas bsgrub bya ste// dmigs par bya bar myur du
247a8(rgyud): brlag/ gzhan yang gdug pa pha rol te// nus bcung na yod gyur na// rang shed rang la dbab phyir// ngag mnan sbyor ba 'di ltar bya// gro ga 'am ni re ras la// khrag dang dug dang bdug pa yis/ 
247b1(rgyud): gzugs ni lces khengs sngags bri ba// stam+b+ha ming spel ldan pa bskor// phyin ci log tu dril la bcings// zag pa'i rdzas sogs sa la ni// tsha tsha byas pa'i nang bcug la// bstim zhing mnan la
247b2(rgyud): mdus byas la// rnal 'byor spro bsdu phyag rgya bcing // thun gyis brabs la bzlas pa bya// las bcol zhag bdun thun bzhir bya// de la sngar bzhin byas nas ni// gnod pa'i sa phyogs dag tu
247b3(rgyud): mnan// myur du 'grub par the tshom med// thod pa'am ni snod gzhan du// sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de// thun rdzas kyis brab lang gar bcas// yang na drag po klu la gtad// gru gsum dong bcug brdzi bar
247b4(rgyud): byas kha bcad nas ni drag po yi// nges par thob par the tshom med// de ltar las la sbyor dus su// nyes pa bsgo ba'i thabs shes nas// srung byed nyes pa 'di ltar skrag/ bstan pa 'jig
247b5(rgyud): par byed pa yi// dgra bo srung byed lha khyod nyon// gdug pa'i sems ldan dgra 'di yis// dkon mchog bla ma la smod cing // rnal 'byor la sdang sems can 'tshe// sgrub pa po la brnyas
247b6(rgyud): gyur pas// dpag tshad stong du ltung ba yin// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong gyur pas// bdag gis myur du bsgral nas ni// gzugs kyis lha rnams mchod pa yin// khyed kyis srung bar ma byed par// 
247b7(rgyud): sdig can 'di ni myur du spongs// zhes brjod par bya'o// bstan pa srung ba'i bsam pa dang // snying rje chen po ldan pa yis// yengs pa med par byas gyur na// nges par 'grub par gdon mi za// barmya byin
247b8(rgyud): dag gi srog kyang g.yo// sdig can dgra bgags smos ci dgos// byang chub sems dang rab ldan na// ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mgon po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las lha mo'i 'pho/ 
248a1(rgyud): lo dang las sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i cho ga nyams dga' ba// dpal ldan lcam dral thams cad kyis// 
248a2(rgyud): sgrub pa rab tu nyams dga' ni// mgon po kun gyi gnas 'di ni// zhal gcig pa la phyag drug pa// dang po gri gug thod khrag 'dzin// spyan gsum mthing nag rngam pa yi// g.yas g.yon bar mas
248a3(rgyud): phreng ba dang // Da ma ru ni 'dzin cing rdung // tha ma gnyis kyis kha Ta dang // sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'ching bar mdzad// klu brgyad kyis rgyan khrag 'dzag zhal// sa bon rang sngags phreng ba can// rgyas btas
248a4(rgyud): bas ni byin rlabs shing // rdo rje sems dpa' dbu rgyan pa// n+ya gro d+ha yi shing la brtan// bi na ya ka mnan par bsam// oM badz+ra ma hA kA lA k+Shi k+She tra big+h+nAM bi nA ya ka naM hUM hUM phaT swA hA// 
248a5(rgyud): sha chen bsregs spos phul nas ni// skyo bar gyur na gsang sngag/ sa bzlas// de la gtor ma dbul bar bya// khyad pa/ ra byin rlabs gyur par bya// phri na les thogs pa med par
248a6(rgyud): 'grub// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ma hA kA lA ya hUM phaT/ sku'i mgon po'i sngags so// oM ma hA kA lA gu Na hri da hUM phaT/ yon tan gyi mgon po'i sngagaso// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la rak+Sha ru dri b+ha Sha
248a7(rgyud): hUM phaT// gsung gi mgon po'i sngagaso// oM badz+re kriSh+Na tsaN+Da mA ra ya ma hA kA la tsit+ta la hrIHdzaHlas kyi mgon po'i sngag so// oM badz+ra ma hA kA li ha na badz+ra hU~M phaT/ yi ge bcu pa'i gsang ba'i mgan
248a8(rgyud): po'i sngagaso// oM tsaN+De shwa rI ye swA hA// gtum po ma'i sngags so// oM tsiN+Da kA ye swA hA/ drag mo'i sngagaso// oM ka li kA ye swA hA// bzlog byed ma'i sngagaso// oM ku li she shwa rI ye swA hA// dpa'
248b1(rgyud): mo'i sngagaso// oM shri ma hA kA la ga Na mai tri dzaHbeng 'dzin ma'i sngagaso// oM re dan+ti ma hA kA li tri shU la sar+b+ba sha tAM dza/ rtse gsum 'dzin pa'i sagaso// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la ko Ti gaN+De sa ya/ 
248b2(rgyud): hUM phaT/ gaN+DI 'dzin pa'i sngagaso// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la te tsi tsau ta ka re mA ra NaM hUM phaT/ rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i sngags so// gsang ba beng 'dzin mgon po yi// lha ma yin gyo grong khyer ni// 
248b3(rgyud): sum brtsegs la sogs khang bzang rnams// khro bi tsan beng bsnams kyis// lha dmag bye ba dung phyur rnams// phyug nas brlag par mdzad pa yi// grong khyer 'bum phrag brgyad cu 'am// brlag
248b4(rgyud): byad bdud 'dul chen po ste// 'di nyid g.yon gnas lha mo ni// ku dan tu dgyes nas gar stabs gnas// oM shrI ma hA kA dal du be ma ni dza a mu ru Ta b+h+yo/ oM shri ma hA kA la tra ga rak+Sha/ 
248b5(rgyud): bini dzaM/ mu nig shig b+h+yo// mu shi b+h+yo/ che ge mo mA ra ya phaTabadz+ra ma hA kA la rak+Sha tri yAH/ rA d+ha sa ma ya/ sad+d+he/ tA ru ru tsa ba lA ya/ mA ra Na rbad rba // nr-i rbed pu rbad pu/ 
248b6(rgyud): pa tshal ba na shi ku ru sa ma ya// che ge mo btubs btubs dzadza/ oM ru ru ma ma sha b+h+rU~M/ ma ma sh+le tsi ta la hr-i gI/ ma ra ya chung drud / ren g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ a lo ya b+ha sha na ma hA ka ya k+Sha shAs na/ 
248b7(rgyud): a pa ka ri di ni ke na me ru ru ma ma b+h+yo// tsat+ta la hri hi rbad// tri ri tri bi tri ka hi swA hA/ ti ka pa tA hUM/ a tra ka ti swa mo sha mo sna/ tig bug shig/ ku mi ti rbad shig rdung sod/ gar+b+he gar+b+he 'dzin pa'i khro bo/ 
248b8(rgyud): che ma rungs klad pa 'gems par byed// tsa muN+Di ldan rol pa ste// gdug pa 'dul ba'i las la shis// kha Ta rtse gsum 'dzin pas ni// dgra bgegs lus ngag yid la 'debs// gtum
249a1(rgyud): bo thog 'bebs mig sgyur ma// sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong ba'o// gang du keng rus rgyal mtshan bsnams// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs skrag byed// 'di nyid legs ldan rgyal
249a2(rgyud): / po chen/ rdo rje bse dod sna tshogs ga do// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs 'di dag gis// gsang sngags rim pas bstan pa'o// thun mong khyad par bye brag gis/ lus kyi mtshan nyid rtags bcas pa// grub pa
249a3(rgyud): kun tu 'grod pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor ba'i mgon po dang yum dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags dang phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / 
249a4(rgyud): de nas bden pa tsam gyis ni// grub pa stsol bar mdzad pa'o// dngos grub 'byung gnas rim pa ni// yang dag nyid du bshad dpar bya// bya rog g.yang gzhis rgyan pa yi// nag po bya
249a5(rgyud): bzhi pa yi sku// gsang zhing dam tshig ldan pas bri// de yis/ sku yi rten du bshad// gser dngul la sogs kyis bris pa'o// nag po chen po'i snying po dang // nye ba'i snying po
249a6(rgyud): bris pa rnams// gsung gi rten du 'dod pa'o// phyi gsogs dang ga ni kyi'i rnye da mi mi skyed// rin chen lnga dang bcas pa rnams// thugs kyi rten tu du bzung byar bya// snying gi rnam pa thams cad dang // nya sha
249a7(rgyud): la sogs 'bru yi chan// sman gyi rnam pa thams cad dang // bsnyen pa'i gtor ma bya ba yin// rdzas dang rta gtor stong dang 'og/ steng nas dar nag gur gyis dbug/ sha lnga sman lnga myos
249a8(rgyud): byed bcas// rgyud du thugs dam bskul phyir mchod// rten galug nag g.yag rog la// mgul du snying po bris la gdags// de yi ngo bo legs phul la// phyi yi rten du bya bar bshad// 
249b1(rgyud): nag poras sam dar la yang // rin chen lnga dang bcas pa yis// nag po khal gcig phyag bzhi pa// bris pa nyin gcig gis rdzogs nas// bar chad med par rab gnas bya// gsang rte
249b2(rgyud): lus la bcang ba'o// sna tshogs 'bru nag dpal byas pa'i// gtor ma mi shas rgyan po dag/ pho brang rten dang brten par bcas// nang gi rten du slob pa'o// skyes pa grir shi thod phreng ni// yon
249b3(rgyud): tan ldan phyir rtag tu sba// mi bsad mtshan las byas pa yi// rdo rje gri gug ts+tsha bris pa// phrin las byed pa'i khyad par ro// dam tshig gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// nyams dga' dben pa'i
249b4(rgyud): gnas nyid du// lha mo'i rten yang 'di ltar ro// rigs med kyi ni thod pa la// gsang sngags yi ge 'di dag ni// bris pa tsam gyis las 'grub byed// sgrub mi dgos par nus pa
249b5(rgyud): 'byung // dur khrod sol bas sngags 'di bri// oM shri de dzA tsa muN+Da rak+Sha tsa muN+Di// saM ka mo ra/ d+ha ke saM ha si ta// mu She ka ra ha ra/ kI la kI la/ pre k+Sha ti ta sa na sa ta b+hA b+haM laM la ta/ 
249b6(rgyud): ya/ ka pA lA mA lA d+hA ra Ni hA hUM phaT phaT swA hA// thod pa'i nang du 'khor bar bri// phyi yi rten du bshad pa yin// bon bu nag mo'i thod pa la// rten pa lha mo'i sku bris pa// nang gi rten du bshad
249b7(rgyud): pa yin// nal gri'i snying ni ma nyams pa// mtshon gyi rtsel dkon pa bzhag/ gsang ba'i rten du gzugs par bya// bu mo'i thod pa dza ril dang // gri gug dar gyis btums pa dang // dri bzang mcho
249b8(rgyud): gyis bdug par bya// de kho na nyid rten du bshad// de nas nub phyogs dag nas ni// gsum gyis khur nas 'ongs pa'i rdo// mi nag gsum gyis 'di skad brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag
250a1(rgyud): // nyid can// rdo rje mgon po 'khos bcas pa// rang bzhin gnas nas sku bzhengs la// 'dir ni bstan srung bzhug su gsol// lan gsum brjod nas bzhugs par bya// rom ma
250a2(rgyud): sgra dang spos dung dang // sna tshogs rol mos bsu nas kyang // phrin las gang 'grub rim shes bya/ 'di ni rang bzhin rten yin no// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las// phyi nang
250a3(rgyud): gsang ba dang sku gsung thugs kyi rten gzugs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// bka' yi tshogs kyis 'tsha
250a4(rgyud): gyur pa// 'di ni kun tu shes par bya// las kyi mgon po rnams dang ni// lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas// lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pa// pho nya mngag gzhug las byed pa'o// gzhan yang
250a5(rgyud): phyogs skyong bcu dang ni// klu chen brgyad dang lha chen brgyad// gza' chen brgyad dang rgyal chen bzhi// rgyu skar nyi shu ru / rgyad de// gnod sbyin brgya de dang 'brog mo'i bu// sha za dang ni
250a6(rgyud): ma mo dang // 'jig rten pa dang dam tshig gnas// zhing skyong ma lus 'khor dang bcas// 'di dag las kun byed pa yi// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcas pas// grub pa rab tu stsol mdzad pa// lha dang lha
250a7(rgyud): min mi 'am ci// lto 'phye grul bum srul po dang // lus srul grib gnon skem byed sogs// nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang // 'byung po mo lus 'dus pa kun// 'di dag sgrub la grogs byed cing // mthu sta
250a8(rgyud): dpung dang nus pa yis// srung zhing bar chad nges par sel// sgra gcan 'dzin pa'i ra hu la// 'di la sogs pa thams cad la// tshogs kyi gter mas tshor mchod na// dpal dang rdzu 'phrul myur du ster
250b1(rgyud): 'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa yi// nye dang nye ba'i mtshan ma dang // rtags dang cho 'phrul du ma 'thung // sku gsung thugs kyi rtags dang ni// phyi nang gsang brtags gyur pa// dngos dang nyams sna/ 
250b2(rgyud): rmi lam dang // sprul pa'i phrin las ngas 'byung ba// gtso bo nyid dang 'khor rnams kyi// rim pa rjes su 'brel par 'byung // rtags byung nas ni las la bskul// dpal mgon po chen po dngos
250b3(rgyud): grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gtso bo dang 'khor du bcas pa mchod par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dpal ldan mgon po chen po yi// thar pa
250b4(rgyud): grong khyer nyams dga' bar// dbang bskur cho ga bshad par bya// 'dis ni bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs// de las rgyal ba dar byed pa yi// cho ga bzang po bla na med// dkyil 'khor
250b5(rgyud): bzang po bzhengs par bya// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// rgyud shes yang dag bla ma la// snod ldan dag pa'i sla ba ma yis// gsol ba lan gsum gdab byas la// maN+Dal me/ 
250b6(rgyud): tog sngon 'gro yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa ma lus dang // rgyal ba mgon po ma lus dang // dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // dbang bskur gnang bar mdzad du gsol// lan gsum brjod nas gan
250b7(rgyud): gyur pas// dang po bsnyen pa brtsam par bya// mtshan ma nye ba 'am tshul shes nas// de nas sngon 'gro brtsam par bya// dang po bgegs rnams nyer zhi yi// phrin las mchod pa gtor ma yi// ye shes lnga
250b8(rgyud): rnams mchod pa dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// sdig pa bral zhing bgegs dbyung ba'i// sngags dang bcas pa'i yungs kar gyis// me sbar sreg dang bral bar bya// de rjes sa phyogs gtsang ma
251a1(rgyud): / las/ ras brtag pa dang sbyang bar bya// sa blangs nas ni bka' thob pas// brko zhing ro lnga bsal bar bye// de nas srung zhing bcag par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhengs nas ni// 
251a2(rgyud): gom pa'i gar stabs kyis// hUM hUM drag po'i sgo brjod pas// phyogs kun bcing ba byas nas ni// bgegs la bka' bsgo gtor ma sbyin// slob ma kun lo srung byas la// rdo rje mgon po chen de/ 
251a3(rgyud): yid/ ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa la// gsol ba gdab pas gnang ba sbyin// khyad par bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrungs// yang dag ye shes sems dpa' che// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal byed
251a4(rgyud): bang rgyal ba ma lus bstan skyong che// de nas lhag par ga nos pa brtsams// saM 'dzin lha mo nyid mchod pa sa// bka' byin nas ni thim par blta// bum pa bkra shis yid
251a5(rgyud): dag ldan// ma nyams mtshan nyid ldan pa lnga// kha tshar ma nyams ras zung dkri// snying po sman dang 'bru lnga so// sa// spros drang rin chen dag gis dgang // rgyun 'bab chu yis
251a6(rgyud): gang ba dang // 'bras ldan shing gis kha rgyan pa'o// de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo so// dka' yi khro bo rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor dri yi thig le la// me tog gcal bkra mi lha rnams ni// 
251a7(rgyud): bskyed cing mchod la gnyis med bstim// so shing dor dang las brtag pa// srung skud ku sha sbyin par bya// de nas sems bskyed sdom gnas pas// dam tshig gsang ba sbyin par bya// 
251a8(rgyud): paro lha la gsol btab nas// rdul mtshon dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// dang po yi shes thig gdabacing // phyi nang dam tshig nges par gdag// go rims ma nor nges pa'i tshul// srad du/ 
251b1(rgyud): shes rab can thig gdag/ tshon ni byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // ba brtag rdul tshon rim par dgye// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes pa yi// zlum bskor po brang
251b2(rgyud): tshe dgu/ dbus ma a dbyibs drag po nyid// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// lha khyams bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'dod yon rin chen sked bad dang // dra phyed ba ku li yi phreng // yang // 
251b3(rgyud): na kha bod mdzes pa'i rgya no// chos 'khor ri dgas gdugs dang bcas// zod skam pad+ma'i phreng bar ldan// dur khrod brgyad kyis yongasu 'khor// rdo rje me 'od 'bar bso 'khrigs// dam tshig ye
251b4(rgyud): gnyis med pa'i// gsang sngags nye bsngags par gnas// dbastan zhing mchod la gsol ba gdab// nye bar rgyan cing yongasu bskor// de nas slob dpon bdag 'jug bya// sbyin sreg
251b5(rgyud): las ni rab tu shis// dpal mgon pa chen po dngos grub byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// 
251b6(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang rnam bshad bya// yang na ling tshe dag ldan pa'i// pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyi rol du// mu khyud 'khor lo rim gsum la// a dbyibs zhing stong rim pa dgrod// lha dang sa bon phyag
251b7(rgyud): mtshan ni// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyas mtshan// slob ma khrus byas rgyan btags te// maN+Dal me tog phyag bya zhing // ras kyis mig ni bkab nas su// dang por me tog dor bar bya// mtshan
251b8(rgyud): ma mthong bas legs par drang // sgo bzhi nas ni nang 'jug cing // gu gul 'dug cing ting 'dzin gyis// nag po chen po'i lnga tshogs kyang // nges par spyan drang bstim par bya// de las nges par
252a1(rgyud): / rtags rnams byung // yang na so so'i mgon por bskyed// ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlab// bla ma dkyil 'khor gtso bcas las// 'od 'phros rang byin rlabs par
252a2(rgyud): 'gyur// mthong ba dri dang bdud rtsis gtor// gdong g.yogs dkrol zhing lha ngo bstan// de nas dbang po'i bye brag gis// nges par rim pas dbang bskur te// bstan pa 'dzin cing bstan pa
252a3(rgyud): skyong // bstan pa srung bar byed pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel mdzad pa// sku yi mgon po 'khor bcas kyis// bla mad dngos grub sbyin pa'i phyir// yang dag ye shes dbang bskuro// sku gsu/ 
252a4(rgyud): thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las lha yi khyad par ro// me lo/ ye shes dbang nyid can// rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po yi sa// dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni// zhe sdang dge bas dbang / 
252a5(rgyud): bskur ro// mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang // bya ba nan tan rjod/ kyi dbyings// ye shes lnga yi rigs kyi gtsang // nges par dbang bskur brtan par bya// phrin las bzhi yi dbang yang
252a6(rgyud): bskur// lha mo brgyad kyis las rnams 'grub// bum pa spyi bor byin pa dang // thod pa'i bdud rtsi blugs pa yis// gsang ba bde chen ye shes nyid// rang byung dri med dbang bskur ba'o// de rjes pa lig
252a7(rgyud): gtad pa yis// nus pa thogs med sbyin byed yin// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba mchog/ lha dang sngags kyi zab pa'i chos// ting 'dzin chen po'i phyag rgya che// 'di nyid dngos grub kun gyi gter// 
252a8(rgyud): zab cing rgya che 'din sgrub pa// skal po can la sbyin par bya'o// he ru ka dang nag po che// bla ma tha dad med pa la// tshogs kyi 'khor los legs mchod cing // zhabs la gtugs la smon lam btag
252b1(rgyud): ni thob par the tsom med// phrin las kun tu grub ster byed// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ske bco brgyad pa'o// 
252b2(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dpal ldan mgon po de nyid kyi// phyogs bzhi yongasu skyong ba yi// rgyal po chen po rnam pa bzhi// shar phyogs nas ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs nas ni 'phag
252b3(rgyud): skyes po// nub phyogs nas ni spyan mi bzang // byang phyogs nas ni rnam thos sras// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa// 'di nyid grub pa ster byed pa'o// rab tu dben zhing gtsang ba dang // bkra shis
252b4(rgyud): nyams dga'i sau phyogasu// rnam thos sras ni bsgrub par bya// sa bzhi pa yi lci bas byug/ dri bzang tsAn dkar da mar dang // a ka ru dong du ru swa// kha cha gi wang sna tshogs sman// sreg
252b5(rgyud): cing tshogs pa'i sman du bya// maN+Dal gru bzhi ma da' gang ba// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi rta babs dang // rin chen kha' pa yid 'ong ba// pi brang rin chen las grub pa// sna tshogs pad+ma ni
252b6(rgyud): chen gling // gter dang dpog bsam ljon shing bcas// ka ba stong phrag du ma yis// rab tu rgyas shing yongasu bskor// lte ba rin chen mu khyud la// lha mo brgyad kyis yongasu bskor// bar ma lha khyams
252b7(rgyud): mdzes pa la// gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor// phyi ma rabs bskor ba la// klu chen brgyad kyis yongasu bskor// sgo bzhir gnod sbyin bzhi bkod pa// dbusu rin chen seng ge'i khri// sna tshogs pad+ma
252b8(rgyud): ge sar bcas// de dbus zla ba dar gyi gdan// de la sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// sa bon phyag mtshan sku dgod bya// sna tshogs mchod pas yongs bskor te// 'bras dang gro dang 'bru sA la// gtor ma
253a1(rgyud): / shin tu bzang bar ba sham// khyad par me tog sna tshogs ni// nA ga ge sar ku mu dra// pun ta ke ba bku li// par shi ka dang tsam pa ka/ d+ha nu swa ri ma li ka/ su ti ka dang ut+pal// pad+ma man
253a2(rgyud): rab dang // daN+Dod pa la sogs pa'o// sna tshogs chu dang sreg spros tshogs// gu gul khyad par bsreg par bya// kar bu ram sbram rtsi dang // khur ba 'bras chan zhun mar dang // zhal zas bye brag thams cad dang
253a3(rgyud): snang gsal mar me byug pa dang // sgra snyan sna tshogs mchod pa'i rdzas// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // 'phan dang bla re la sogs pa// sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi dang // de ltar bkod pa legs rgyan
253a4(rgyud): nas/ bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas kyang // rang ltar bskyed pa'i sa dpon las// 'od 'phros mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la// rab tu 'phros pas 'od du 'bar// de las dbus rgyan chen no// 
253a5(rgyud): sku mdog gur gum mdog 'dra ba// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyi sa brgyan// seng ge'i khril legs bzhugs pa'i/ phyag g.yas yid bzhin nor bu ste// rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyal
253a6(rgyud): mtshan can// g.yon pa ne'u la'i snod can las// kha nas rin chen skrag par bsam// gnod gnas dbang po gang ba bzang // nor bu bzang dang rta yi bdag/ yang dag shes dang 'brog gnas dang // lnga
253a7(rgyud): rtsen pi tsi kuN+Da li// sna tshogs rgyan dang phyag mtshan bcas// re re'ing du mas yongs bskor nas// shin tu gsal zhing brtan par bsam// de nas sa bon las 'bros te// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan
253a8(rgyud): drangs la// mchod cing bstod do/ gnyis med bstim// khyad par gsol ba gdab par bya// rgyal ba mgon po 'khor bcas pa'i// yid 'ong khang bzang po brang 'di// yid bzhin no/ 
253b1(rgyud): bu'i char 'bebs pa'i// rin chen gter gyis dngos grub gsol// oM bai swA hA/ oM be shra ma NA ya swAhA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhA// oM pUr+N+Na b+hadrA ya swAhA/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM ku be rA ya sAH
253b2(rgyud): / oM saM pa dza nA ya swA hA/ oM gu h+ya d+ha na ya swA hA/ oM pA tsa kA ya swA hA/ oM pa tsi kuN+Da lA ya swA hA/ dang po lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste// gnyis pa rin chen 'bar ba nyid// gsum pa ken nas bstod par bya/ 
253b3(rgyud): de nas gtor ma dbul bar bya// gsol ba btab nas phrin las bcol// de nas ye shes gshegasu gsol// des gnas pa ni bzhugs par ba// phyi rtan nang rten khyad par bya// rim pa 'khor
253b4(rgyud): lo sngags dang bcas// mis mi mthong bar sbas te bcang // khyu dad par rtags ni gsal bar 'byung // nye ba'i mtshan ma denges mthong nas// dngos grub blang zhing gtor ma dbul// sbyin sreg
253b5(rgyud): las kyis myur du 'grub// gsang sngags 'bum phrag bcu yis ni// 'bras bu yid la 'dod kun 'grub// kha skyong ma yi mchod pa bya// gtor ma chen po dang bcas pas// lan bdun nye/ 
253b6(rgyud): par bsnyen pas 'grub// 'di ni lha rnams kun gyi gter// sgrub pa po la stsol bar mdzad// dpal mgon pa chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las khyad par du 'phags pa rnam thos sras gnod sbyi
253b7(rgyud): chen po brgyad dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'phags pa chen po de nyid la// klu chen brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba// rim pa 'di ni bstan pa
253b8(rgyud): bya/ khyad par sa bcu'i dbang phyug che// dpal ldan thugs rje'i bdag po nyid// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa nyid// spyan gsum cung zad khro bo'i tshul// sku mdog dmar dang ljang ku'i mdog/ rin che/ 
254a1(rgyud): 'bar ba'i dbu rgyan can// sku la dar ber sum rim la// sna tshogs cod pan rgyan gyis sbas// phyag g.yas rin chen 'bar ba bsdams// lha yi bdan mdzes pa 'phyar// g.yon pa/ 
254a2(rgyud): mchod rten sku gdung bsnams// ne'u le'i rgyal ba nor skyug 'chang // 'khor du khyad par klu chen brgyan// sku lus mi yi rnam pa la// sbrul mgo bdun pa'i gdengs ka can// phyag gnyis thal mo sgyu
254a3(rgyud): banas// yid bzhin nor bu legs bsnams pa// sems dpa'i 'dug stangs phyed dkyil can// thams cad gcol 'dud par byed// nor rgyas pad+ma nyid dang ni// stobs kyi rgyu dang 'jog po nyid// pad+ma tsho
254a4(rgyud): dang hu lu che// dung skyong rigs ldan brgyad po nyid// rgya mtsho chen po nang dag gi/ pad+ma la ni gnas bcas te// de ltar bskye da la ye shes pa// spyan drangs mcho de la gnyis med bstim/ dgyes
254a5(rgyud): ba'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor la// yid 'ong dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur// oM shrI badz+ra yak+Sha be shrA ma NA ya hUM phaT/ oM bra~M ru NA ya swA hA// oM oM nan+ta ya swA hA/ oM tak+Sha kA ya swA hA/ oM
254a6(rgyud): kha pa lA ya swA hA// oM karko Ta ya swA hA// oM pad+ma ya swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+ma ya swAhA/ oM ku li kA la swA hA/ der ni gsang sngags bzlas pa yis// sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya// de nas klu rnams tha
254a7(rgyud): la/ yid 'ong gtor ma dbul bar bye// nA ga gi sar bus pa dang // rgya mtsho spyib a ru ra// dze ti be le gur gum dang // tsan dan dkar dmar pu shil tse// dbang po lag dang snying zho sha/ chu srin sde/ 
254a8(rgyud): mo lab rgan dang // 'gron bu dung dang mu tig dang // nya phyis bla gor zho sha dang // mkhal mazho sharma bya'i mdengs// ta ru rgun 'brum mngar gsum dang // gser gyi bye ma ras skud dang // 'o ma dang / 
254b1(rgyud): ni 'bru sna lnga// rin chen sna tshogs ma lus pa// khyad par du ni dbul bar bya// de nas mchod cing bstod bya ste// dngos grub gang 'dod stsol bar bsam// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya// gsang
254b2(rgyud): sngags ze brag bcu bzlas nas// rtags byung nas ni dngas rje' thang // dpal mgon pa chen podangs gruba'i byung ba'i rgyud yis rtul po rnam thos sras la klu chen po brgyad kyis bskur pa ma gyu / 
254b3(rgyud): // de nas gzhan yang bshang bya'o// drang srong sras mchog de nyid la// lha mo brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba'i// thabs nyid rnal 'byor pas shes bya// rin chen bdun pa'i khang bzang sa// 
254b4(rgyud): nor bu sna tshogs gdan bzhugs pa'i// 'phags pa skum dog bai DUR+Ya// zhal gcig phyag drug spyan gsum pa// rin chen sna tshogs du mas spras// gdug ba klu yis nyer rgyan rtsa/ 
254b5(rgyud): g.yas kyi dang po rgyal mtshan 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po rin no/ snod// bar ma gnyis ni rdo rje dang // 'ad+mo 'bar ba bsna mas padang // thams zhags pa thob 'phyir// steg gi lpags ni
254b6(rgyud): sham thabs can// dar gyi cod pan dag gis mdzes// skad cig gis ni bsam par bya// oM badz+ra bai ru ka/ ku be ra At+ma ka/ ma hA yak+Sha rA dza rat+na sid+d+hi hUM swA hA// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pa yis// 
254b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo rnams mdun du 'gugs// oM tsan+d+ra kAn+te swA hA// oM su b+ha drA ye swA hA/ oM dat+tA ye swA hA/ oM gu h+yA yai swA hA/ oM su dat+ta ye swA hA/ oM da byi swA hA/ oM Ar+yA yai swA hA/ oM sa ra sA t+ye swAhA/ 
254b8(rgyud): zla 'od can ma rab bzang mo// sbyin byed ma dang gsang ba me// rab sbyin ma dang dang le lha mo// 'phags me dang ni dbyangs ldan te// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// kun tu rgyal ba 'od 'phro mi/ 
255a1(rgyud): / gdu bu dpung rgyan mgul rgyan dang // zhabs gdub do shal legs rgyan cing // dar dang nor bus rnam par mdzes// dkar dang ser dang dUr ba'i 'od// gser 'od pad+ma rAg dang // u
255a2(rgyud): pad+ma rA ga dang / ut+pal can du ri ka dang // pal sha yi mdog mtshungs pa// 'od kyi phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i nang // rin chen sbom bu gter gyi snod// rin chen gnong bdung chos dang // be cur dang nor
255a3(rgyud): bu ma// dpal be bany+dza li ka ste// g.yon pa kun tu pad+ma bsdams// sgeg cing 'gying dang ldan par bsam// gtso bos lha mo brgyad po bskul// lha mo brgyad po thams cad kyis// rin chen char ba pab nas
255a4(rgyud): nin dka' bzhin bgyid pa rnam par bsam// mgon po myur du skul ba'i tshe// gtso bos mi 'jigs seng ge che bas// thu na steng ga ni las byed pa'o// stobs ldan glang chen rab brtan ching/ 
255a5(rgyud): khyad par sgrub pa'i las rnams byed// g.yu 'brug sngon po tsho/ si nas ni// snang srid ma lus dbang du bsdud// dbang du byed pa'i las rnams dang // khyad par sbyin sreg drag po ni/ 
255a6(rgyud): dang rngam pa'i tshul gyis ni// myur du las la 'gro ba yin/ phyi nang gsang ba'i rim shes pa'i// stong phrag bcu yis 'grub pa ste// 'di ni rin chen ga'u'i nang // rin chen 'bar ba'i 'khor lo la// gas
255a7(rgyud): sngags yi go'i phreng ba can sa bin spro bsdus ting 'dzin skom// na mo bo shra ba Na badz+ra mus la// mu su na sti/ tri shU la a~M ku sha/ bA sha par shu/ pad+ha mung ga ra lA la k+Shi dang / haswa s+ya/ na mo na maHsar+b+bA
255a8(rgyud): de wa ta su tsiH// kr-i ta Ta s+ya/ ma hA kI la kI la ya/ sarba gra hA/ a ka ri ba ni ya bi dza ya/ dza ya du/ b+ha ga gA nA da ku bai rA/ k+Sha ti sa ti/ tsakra ti ni/ ka la ka la/ nA da ku be ra ki ro ki li/ nA da ku be ra/ kAta / 
255b1(rgyud): tsakra ti ni// bi dzi ma hA b+ha ga pa ne/ na dA ku be ra/ b+hu krata/ drang srong kar la/ ban d+ha na/ rek+kha d+hi h+yas/ guh+Na/ ka nA ga na pa ri br-id/ be shra ma Na/ b+hen b+ha ne/ thi ba na pas ti/ ku ti kA te/ ku ber/ nang
255b2(rgyud): ku be ra/ na mastu ste swA hA// 'di ni khyad par sgrub bo ste// gsang sngags gnod sbyin stong sde'i tshogs// ma lus 'di yis bskul bar byed// gar mkhan mchog ces bya ba yi// lhan du mas yongs
255b3(rgyud): bskor ba'i// 'di ni bskyed cing spyan drang ba// spyan drang mchod cing bstod pa dang // gang sgrub las la bskul par bya// 'di yis rnal 'byor dgos pa sgrub// zhi bas nad gdon ma lus pa// dbang gis
255b4(rgyud): khams gsum ma lus bsgyur// rgyas pas nor dang 'bru sog/ sa 'phel// mngon spyod kyis ni gdug po 'dul// nor dbu bzang pos gter la spyod// yang dag shes kyis dus gsum
255b5(rgyud): mthong // gang ba bzang pos longs spyod 'phel// gtsug na khyil pas tshe dpal ster// 'brog gnas rgyal bas dud 'gro sA la// gnod sbyin lnga po 'di dag gis// sa gsum g.ye/ 
255b6(rgyud): bar byed pa ste/ 'di dag sgrub pos mchod gyur na// phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal rnams ster// rang nyid lhag pa'i lha yis ni// sa bon las 'phros lcags kyus ni// 'di dag srog gi dbang po la// dbang
255b7(rgyud): byed las byed mi bzlog 'gyur// gnod sbyin rnams la shing thog dang // klu rnams gtor mas kun tu mchod// lha mo a ru ra yi 'bru// ma lus myur du mchod pa'o// gang po dang ni mdzes ma dag/ 
255b8(rgyud): khyad par mngag gzhug gyur pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras 'khor dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// 
256a1(rgyud): / gas gzhan yang bag ba// sems can rnams kyi na gyur// 'khor ba'i srid pa srid papa/ byung chu sems tshas rnams spyan nga nags sa zugatu
256a2(rgyud): 'gram dang shing gtsigs// gdong nas grub pa'i dur khrod de// gnas 'di dag tu bsam gtan sgom// las kyi mgon po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ gru gsum po brang la gnas pa// dur khrod ga/ 
256a3(rgyud): yas 'bar ba ni// me dpung 'bar ba 'phro ba'i dbus// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// sku mdog nag cing mche ba rno// yan lag thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang // thod pa skam po'i dbu rgyan byas// 
256a4(rgyud): spyan gsum sdang mig khro tshul ston// bzhin sgyur mi sdug lus can ni// phyag g.yas rdo rje gri gug 'phyar// g.yon pad/ nyams snying khrag gis// thos pa bkang nas gsol bar mas
256a5(rgyud): dug sbrul gdug pas lU tshigs rgyun// dbu skra dmar se gyen du brdzes// mi thod rlon pa'i do shal byas// ro yig/ na la brdzis nas kyang // drag po 'ang ro sgrogs pa'i gnas// sku
256a6(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi mgon pa ni// gsod byed rngam byed sgrol byed che// bsgrub byangs par sgrol ba'i tshe// sku yi mgon po dam nyams kyi// lte ba'i srog rtsa gcod par byed// gsung gi mgon pos dam nyam
256a7(rgyud): kyis mgrin pa nas ni khrag rnams 'dren// rdo rje thugs kyi mgon pa yis// snying gi dkar nag mtsham su yang // bya rog mchu ni btsugs nas kyang / srog tu myur du gcod par byed// pho nya sha za'i gan
256a8(rgyud): can gyis// spyi gtsug nas ni rtsal 'jib// las byed ma mo tsaN+Dikas// gsang ba'i 'doms sor dang sa ma jug// rtsa 'jib ma dang khrag 'thung ma// sroga'i phrog mas ni la so la sbyor// nyan mtshan
256b1(rgyud): dus las 'dab mi byed// 'di dag gsang sngags ma yengs bzlas// dus gsum dag tu ting 'dzin 'bad// rtsa ba'i sngags ni srog yin te// gsung gi dngos grub snying po yin// nye ba'i snying pos
256b2(rgyud): thugs bskul ba'o// ye shes sa bon mi shigs pa// dngas ma'i gnas par de bshad do// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// rim par bzlas pas bsam gtan 'grub// rtags rnams nye
256b3(rgyud): bar ma byung ni// 'bad pas bsten cing mchod par bya// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyu ro// oM ma hA kA la gu Na hrid hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA Thag shad dzaHma hA ka la sid+d+hi yi du dza/ a li ka li mnyam ldan pa'i/ 
256b4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad phreng ba rab tu bsgrags// rim par byin rlabs ldan bya'i phyir// bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// bgrang phreng nas dpar ldan pa yis// las ni myur bar shes pa yin// shel gyis
256b5(rgyud): zhi ba chen po 'grub// mu tig gis ni rgyas pa la// dred po so yis bsad pa 'grub// de gnyis 'gyur ba bong bu'i so// sdang dang bskrad parnga mo'i so// ka sogs rnam dag yum
256b6(rgyud): bcu drug/ byis pa 'tsho byed dbang sogs la// dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams bsres pas// bzhi yis lhag pa'i bad 'bras shing // lung tang dmar po bdun gcig drug/ yang na na 'bru dgu 'am// rgyu ska
256b7(rgyud): byed pos grangs mnyam pas// lung tang nag pos rmongs byed nus// dbyangs dang gsal byed phyed sbyangs pas// ru rag sha ni mngon spyod la// de lta'i cho ga shes pa yis// tshar bcad pan gdags las
256b8(rgyud): rnams spyad// gsang sngags yi ge'i 'khor lo ni// 'gal me bzhin du bskor bar bya// de ltar dus bzhir bsgrub par bya// des ni nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// rang nyid ye
257a1(rgyud): / shes nag po yi// gdug pa 'dul bar bsams nas ni// las byed mgon po'i srog rtsa 'phrog/ de ltar bskul bas las la sbyor// gzas pa po de sgrol bar byed// gal te las/ 
257a2(rgyud): la 'gyangs pa na// srog gi thigs pa blang ba dang // gsang sngags snying po go bzlog cing // lte ba dkrugs pa'i las byas na// shi sa bstan par 'gyur ba ste// srog ni dmar lon byed par 'gyur// 
257a3(rgyud): ma rungs 'dul ba'i las 'di dag/ sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba las// gzhan du byas na nyes par 'gyur// sbyin sreg dang ni mnan pa dang // de bzhin zor dgyes las bya ba// bsad pa rang gshed
257a4(rgyud): gnad la dbab// de las myur bar rtags byung tshe// thugs dadam bskang zhing gtor ma 'bul// tshogs kyi 'khor lo de'i mchod pa dang // rnal 'byor nar mar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal
257a5(rgyud): mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las nye bar sgrub par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// dpal ldan lha mo 'khor dang / 
257a6(rgyud): bcas// nag mo mngon par 'byung ba yi// las kyi dngos grub cho ga bshad// dam tshig gsang ba'i sngags pa yis// brag nag rtse mo rno ba yi// kha lhor bltas pa'i brag phug gam// 
257a7(rgyud): gzhan yang ri bo'i zom mam rtse// shing gcig dur khrod ma mo'i gnas// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas mchog tu// maN+Dal dang ni mchod pa dang // gtor ma legs par bshams nas ni// sha chen
257a8(rgyud): bsregs spros phul nas kyang // bar chad bgegs rnams bskrad par bya// gru gsum khrag dang dug gis byug/ dug shing tsher ma can gyis rtsigs// gzhan yang ling ga byas pa la// mi bsad lcags
257b1(rgyud): kru tri shU la// de yi lus la gdab par bya// tshil chen mar me zur gsum pa// btang nas bdag nyid lhur bskyed la// dkyil 'khor gru gsum legs gnas pa// ma hA kA la phyag bzhi pa// mngon/ 
257b2(rgyud): nag khrag 'dzag me dpung dbus// zhal gcig spyan gsum 'bar ba ste// g.yas kyi dang po chu gri dang // 'og ma tr-i shU rtse gsum pa// g.yon gyi dang pos mda' gzhu dang // gnyis pas mgo bo khrag
257b3(rgyud): 'dzag bsnams// dur khrod kyis rgyan sham thabs can// de yi g.yas dang g.yon gnyisu// sha za gnyis ni gnas par bsam// las kun byed pa'i pho nyar bskul// dang po lha mo chen mo ni// 
257b4(rgyud): e dbus gsang sngags las grub pa'i// zhal gcig pa dal phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum shin tu sku mdog gnag/ shin tu rngam zhing sgeg pa'i sku// g.yas kyi dang po ral gri 'chang
257b5(rgyud): 'og ma shag ti 'bar ba can// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag 'a dzin// 'og ma kha T+wAM bsnams pa'o// ral ba kham nag gyen du brdzes// mche gtsigs thod pa dug sbrul brgya// glang po'i
257b6(rgyud): stod g.yogs stag sham dang // re lde nag po'i sham thabs gsol// bong bu ga dmar stengs nas ni// phyed krung 'bar bas bzhags pa'o// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// ral gri ne'u le'i
257b7(rgyud): rkyal ba 'dzin// dam tshig bskyed la ye shes dgug/ phrin las bcol bar bya ba'o// oM shrI ya de bi kA li kA li ma hA kA li b+h+yAM hUM/ oM ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha bA to si tri tsa pa la a shug me b+h+yo dzaHma hA/ 
257b8(rgyud): kA li di wI ka rA li bi kr-i ta kA la ra tri ni tsaN+Da rU pi Ni hUM hUM phaT/ rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma hUM b+h+yo/ oM ma hA kA lI di wI gr-ih+Na ba lci da kha kha~M khA hi khA hi da ha da ha ha de te/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya
258a1(rgyud): / s+pho Ta ya/ khA hi hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // skyes pa grir shi'i snying khrag gis// nag po chen po'i gtor mar thugs// ma nyams grer sho' ba blangs la// ma hA ru/ 
258a2(rgyud): dra bstims nas ni// mgo bo lho nub mtshamasu bstan// rkang pa byang shor mtshamasu bstan// gan rgyal bzhag la bsgral bar bya// de yi sha dang khrag dang ni// lpags pa tshil bu rkang mar bcas
258a3(rgyud): klad pa klad rgyas zhag dang ni// dbang po lnga dang don snying lnga// rus pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis// ye shes nag po chen po dang // dpal ldan nag mo ra ma ti// las kyi mgon po 'khor dang bcas// 
258a4(rgyud): nya bran g.yog dur khrod gnas// DA ki'i tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang // de yi chu rgyus rus pa rkang // sha za 'bum dgyi thugs dam bskang // mkha'agro lnga dang lha mo brgyad// de yi
258a5(rgyud): phrin las mgon po dang / sha za 'khor dang bcas la dbu la// phung po bstan la sdang zhing 'tshe// sgrub la gnod na las 'di bya// gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur// de yi sha
258a6(rgyud): la sbyin bsreg bya// tshal ni zhu chen mar me bya// klas rgyas thod pa'i lnga lpags bya// lpags pa tshogs kyi gdan du bya// bsregs pa'i rus pa che tsha bya// 'di ni mgon po 'khor bcas tshogs// 
258a7(rgyud): mnyes par gyur cig thugs dam bskang // gzhan yang phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba rab tu bshad par bya'o// dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i phrin las kyi rnal 'byor dang rab tu ldan pas zhi ba'i las
258a8(rgyud): sgrub pa la ni// bil ba la sogs pa la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o// 'bras ldan gyi shing gang las rgyas pa'i las sgrub na stong phrag gis bya'o// khA Di ri'i shing dang dmar pa'i shing gis
258b1(rgyud): ni dbang gis sgrub na khri phrag gis byas// shin tu rtsub pa'i tsher ma dang ldan pa'i shing dag gis ni mngon spyod la 'bum phrag gis bya bar shis so// bskung ba ni shing gi lo ma rlung mar
258b2(rgyud): byung ba'i tshes lo ma lhung bar blangs te/ gzugs brnyan bris nas yul gzhan gyi hor khral btags te btang bar bya'o// gal te bzlog par 'dod na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi thal bas gtor zhing bse
258b3(rgyud): spyi'i 'o mas lus bkrus na zhi bar byed do// rus phye sna tshogs pa la khrag byugs te gzugs brnyan bris la dgra bo de'i phyog su gtor bas ni sha za chen pos 'jigs par byed do// yang na lce spyang gi sha
258b4(rgyud): la sbyin sreg byas te dur khrod du thal ba phyar nas lhag ma bza sa pa po'i sgo la gtor nas btang na dur khrod kyi lce spyang gi tshogs rab tu 'dra zhing du la sgo la sdor mos 'brad par 'gyur ro// 
258b5(rgyud): de lta bu lan gsum byas na lce sbyang gis za bar 'gyur ro// gang du thog gis shi ba'i rus pa la rab tu bsngags ta ri/ khong gi thod par bcug ste shing rkang gcig pa'i rtse mo la btag
258b6(rgyud): na thog 'bab pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// yang na de nyid kyi gzugs byas te de nyid dang rigs 'thun pa'i rus pa rnyed na yungs kar gyis brdeg cing pha mes kyi dur khrod du gri so lhags pa dang sbas te gton
258b7(rgyud): mas mnan cing dong brus par sbas la ro bsregs pa'i g.yam pas mnan na rigs 'chad par 'gyur ro// grog mkhar gyi sa la gzugs byas la// de la dug dang til mar gyis byugs la 'bras
258b8(rgyud): phub kyi me la rab tu bsro zhing sngags brdeg na rims tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur ro// gzhan pa la ni spra tshal gyis byugs shing tsher ma'i rigs mang po btab par byas nas dus ma yin pa'i rlung la/ 
259a1(rgyud): // phyur na yul gzhan du gshis ngan du 'chi bar byed do// mtsho nang gi nya se ba bzung ste gro ga la ling ga bris pa de brag zan gyi gzugs dang bcas pa la rab tu bsngags de slar btang na
259a2(rgyud): chu gri myur du 'chi bar byed do// bse shing la ling ga bsregs te sgo khang du smras na skrangs pa chen pos btab par 'gyur ro// gal te grog mkhar gyi sa la gzugs byas te// mchod rten rnying pa'i
259a3(rgyud): 'og tu 'byung po'i nyi ma la mnan nas ro g.yam gyis kha bcan ni 'khor dang bcas pa nus pa med cing rab tu gnon par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi zag pa gang yin pa dang phung shul nas sa blangs
259a4(rgyud): te gzugs brnyan byas la gnas kyi sar rus pa'i phur bus btab na ni 'on pa dang long ba dang yan lag nyams pa dadang lkugs par 'gyur te/ klu gnas pa'i sar sbas na dbang
259a5(rgyud): po nyams pa nyid byed do// gal te sa phyogs der char mi 'a bab par gyur na ka ra bi ra'i shing btsugs la ba dmaraser gyi 'o ma gtor bar byas pas klu gnas pa'i sar so
259a6(rgyud): nas rang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas bka' bsgo na char chen po 'bab par byed do// bal po se'u shing dang 'brug shing du bcas pa g.yab cing klu gzir na char 'bab cing sbyin sad par byed do// 
259a7(rgyud): gal te sprin dral bar 'dod na rlung lha'i gtor ma byas la rlung gi ba dan g.yab par bya'o// khrag sna tshogs pa nyungs kar nyungs nag tu sbyar te klu gnas pa'i sar sbyin sreg tu byas na bzlas pa'i
259a8(rgyud): bun par du gtor na ser ba med la 'bab par 'gyur ro// nyungs kar nyungs nag thal chen la rib tu bsngags nas gtor na ser ba mad la gcod par byed do// d+ha du ra'i shang la sbyin sreg byaH/ 
259b1(rgyud): nasmyo bar 'gyur ro// nim pa'i shing gis ni rengs par byed do// me tog ban d+hu ri ka dang pa la sha yis 'gugs par 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg byas na gang la yang gso
259b2(rgyud): bar byed do// a ru ra'i sbyin sreg gis myur du zhi bar byed// ma he'i 'o mas bklas na bcings pa thams cad grol lo// a ga ru'i shing 'bras bu dang ldan po'i shing dang gcig tu bsregs te
259b3(rgyud): mtshor dor na rgyas par 'gyur ro// glang po che'i rus pa la gi wa nga dang bcas pa'i glang sna can gyi me tog dang ser ba'i rigs kyi me tog dang bcas pas kun dga'i ra bar sbyin sreg byas na 'byor
259b4(rgyud): pa phun sum tshogs par byed// de dag thams cad sngags dang bcas pa'i nus pas 'grub bo// drang srong gi rus/ pa ri bo'i rtser sbas te 'bru snas mchod pa byas te chu bo rgyun
259b5(rgyud): tu 'bab pa mthong ba'i sar spyod yul du gyur na rigs tha mas cad rab tu 'phel bar byed// a mra'i 'bras bud nga shing thog dzaM tsin ta ka dang dzi lu dang dzi ba ka rnams la snang
259b6(rgyud): du bkang ste gtor ma byas nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du phul na ni gnod sbyin gyis 'byor pa thams cad spel bar 'gyur ro// phur bus gdab cing nyungs kar thal chen gyis mtshams bcad
259b7(rgyud): par gyur na gnod pa thams cad las srung bar 'gyur ro// dpal mgon pa chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las sna tshogs pa'i las kyi rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum
259b8(rgyud): ba'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// shin gsang ba bla na med// nag po mngon par 'byung ba yi// las kyi dngos grub chog bshad// dpal nag pa chen po'i phyogs kyi phrin
260a1(rgyud): las kyi lha mo la// shar gyi lha mo 'phrog mas 'gugs pa'i las byed pa'o// lho'i lha mo glang snga mas 'chi ba'i las byed do// nub kyi lha mo rol pa can gyis sdom pa'i las/ 
260a2(rgyud): byed do// byang gi lha mo sa'i gtsug gis myos cing dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// lha mo bya rgod mgo bo can mas rengs pa'i las byed do// stag gi mgo bo can mas bskrad ba'i las byed do// phag
260a3(rgyud): rgod kyi mgo bo can mas rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i las byed// lci spyang gi gdong gis dbye ba'i las byed do// khyi gdong mas ni rnam par rmongs pa'i las byed do// khwa'i gdong gis rnam par gnon
260a4(rgyud): pa'i las byed do// 'ug pa'i gdong gis ni khrag drang po'i lasabyed do// khyung gi gdong gis ni rgyal ba'i las byed do// gzhan yang grong khyer dkrug pa'i las bya bar 'dod na grog 'a
260a5(rgyud): shing shun la dbyangs dang gsal byed spel zhing go bzlog tu bri sa la bsnol bar byas la rlung gi shugs kyis bsgrub/ gang gi gzugs dang ming sbal gyis 'khrul 'khor go bzlo
260a6(rgyud): dubrisi la bsnol bar bya ste// rlung gi shugs kyi bsgrub bya dag gis gzugs dang ming spel gyi gnas de myur du bskyod be rlung dang me dang chu bsnol ma rnam par 'khrug par byed// de nas yang kha s+thA
260a7(rgyud): dbye ba'i las dag gis pha rol gyi sde dag gi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi dab bas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis bskul nas la ni bdun myur du 'grub par 'gyuraro// gal te klu'i dug
260a8(rgyud): gis bzas pa po 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod na ti tha la'i 'bru la byas pa'i dug sbrul gyi gzugs mgo gsum pa lce brkyang ba'am ci rigasu byas pa de'o khe'i nang du gang la dmigs pa'i rdzas de ming
260b1(rgyud): ming dang bcas pas gru gnas pa'i sa phyog su btang na sbrul gyis 'dzin pa'i las byed do// ma he dang rta'i 'khrul 'khor 'thung ba'i nyi ma las ti tsa'i khubs zos te// de cad kyi sha khrag dang sa
260b2(rgyud): khas bskul bar gyur na ni shin tu 'khrug cing 'bye bar 'gyuraro// yang nabi tan ro bo la tre zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i thabs kyis bgegs chen po bsgral ba'i gzugs la brten nas cho ga phyag mtshan dag
260b3(rgyud): btsugs te lasu bya'o// yang nas nag po gru gsum pa la nag po'i tshogs kha phyir bltas pa dang nang du bltas pa dag bkod de// phyi rol rgol ba'i phyogasu bskyal na ni myur du yul dang bcas pa
260b4(rgyud): brlag par byed do// sha za chen po'i gzugs shin tu 'jig sa pa kha gdags pa nag po gri gug dang zhags pa zo dgas pa mdun du dmigos la phur bus btab pa dang bcas hUM
260b5(rgyud): thabs kyis pha rol gyi dpung g.yo ba dang bcas pa bzlog par byed do// gtor ma chen po byas te yang gtor na g.yul shams pa las rnam par rgyal bar byed do// 
260b6(rgyud): brnyan bkod de phyin las sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i phyag rgyas btab na g.yul chen po las rgyal bar byed do// dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i tshul du bya ba las a sho ka 'am bi Da ka'i
260b7(rgyud): shing la brten nas thabs dang ldan pa'i yul phyogs de yongasu rgyas pa'i gnas thob par byed do// rdo rje bya khyung gi phyag rgyas bcas la des kla non par byas na de nyid kha dog dkar por gyur pa'i
260b8(rgyud): 'jam pa'i spyod kyis 'dul ba la nag por bsgyur ba'i rtsub pa'i thabs kyis dkrugs pos klu'i gnas thams cad du ltas chen po drug byung bas thams cad 'dar zhing mgo bo ardza ka'i
261a1(rgyud): // dog pa bzhin du 'gas pa snyam byed nas myur bar 'ongs te bka' nyan cing 'dzam bu'i gling du char gyi rgyun chen pos rab tu gang bar byed par 'gyur// gang du skyes pa g.yul ngo
261a2(rgyud): bsad pa'i mgal dum dang lag ngar gyi rus pa la dpal nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan ji lta bur byas la bskyed pa dang bstims te bzlas pa ba/ dben par sbas nas gsol ba btab na gang
261a3(rgyud): 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sa kun la yang srung bar 'gyur ba dang 'das pa la sogs pa'i don shes pa dang / de'i mdun du khrus byas te/ nyalo na lung ston pa'am// dge mi dge gsal po ste/ 
261a4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// yang na dur khrod kyi ras sam dang nag po la yang rung ste/ dam tshig dang ldan pas bis te/ mchod pa da gtor mar ldan pas// rab tu gnas par byas na sku byin rla
261a5(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyang rin po tsha las byas de'i / dun du gsol ba btab na zla ba drug gis nges par yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na nag pa chen po'i gsong sngag
261a6(rgyud): sngon du byas te shes rab yongasu 'dzin pa khri brag gcig bzlas na thos pa'i gzungs yongasu 'dzin pa dang / blo yongasu dag pa dang / mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// srung bas srung
261a7(rgyud): zhing bcings pa thams cad las yongasu grol lo// gang du sgrub pa po phun sum tshogs pas sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi rten la rab tu gnas pa mtshan nyid dang ldan par byas na dngos
261a8(rgyud): grub thams cad 'grub pa dang bar chad thams cad las 'azlog par 'gyur ba yin no// khyad par du yang gsang ba chen po 'dam tshig la nges par gnas pa nyid kyis phyogs dang dus thams cad du/ 
261b1(rgyud): ye shes kyi nag po chen pos rjesu skyong ba dang rgyang ring po nas kyang nges par gzigs par mdzad// 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu sgrol bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang tshe dang dpal rab tu ster
261b2(rgyud): cing mi zad pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa dang / nyam nga ba dang bag tsha ba med par seng ge'i stobs kyis rgyu zhing bdud kyi rigs kyi phyogs ma lus pa pham zhing // skrag ste mgo 'gyes pa tsam byed/ 
261b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i mthar thug par 'byer bar 'gyuraro// gang gis gtum pa dang dpa' ba dang drag pa'i brtul zhugs kyis kun tu spyod la rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mi shigs par
261b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis khyab par rgyu ba'o// gnas gyi ma kha 'gro ma dang pho nya'i mkha' gro ma dang 'jig rten gyi mkha'agro ma dang dom tshig gi mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za'i mkhan
261b5(rgyud): 'gro ma'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' gro pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis kyang phrin las thogs pa med bar 'grub par byed do// zhing skyong chen po dang nye ba'i zhing skyod
261b6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi po dag gis kyang / phrin las thogs pa med pa sgrub par byed pa'o// gdul dka' ba ma lus pa 'dul zhing 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bar bya'o// gang du rgyad
261b7(rgyud): 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa dang sems dpa' dang de bzhin du gang gnas pa dang rnal 'byor du gang gnas pa la nye bar skyob par byed do// nye bar dgongs pas mkhyen par 'gyur ro// dpal
261b8(rgyud): mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las sa gsum du sgrub pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba mngon
262a1(rgyud): par 'byung ba'i gnas// drang srong thub par yang dag bstan// nges par gsang ba 'dzin gyur pa// rgyal ba yon tan 'byung ba'i gter// ye shes mgon po chen po dang // 
262a2(rgyud): las kyi mgon po du mar bcas// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo ni// 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor bstan pa ste// skal ldan lam 'di 'dzin pa gang // nga yis lung bstan gyur pa yin// gdug pa
262a3(rgyud): rnams ni gzung ba'i phyir// mkhas pas snying rje bskyed nas ni// cho ga kun mchog gis rab sgrub// bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can de// de bzhin bdag de dam pa'i bdag/ dpal he ru kaM yi/ 
262a4(rgyud): go 'phang gnas// 'di la the tsom mi bya ste// sun 'byin pa sa ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rnam dag rnam pa can sems kyi// rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das// ma rungs pa ni gang dag
262a5(rgyud): gis// skye bo bcings par gyur pa gang // de nyid thabaso dang / ces pa yis// srid pa'i bcings las grol bar 'gyu// de ltar grub pa'i lam brten cing // thun mong khyad par gyu ra su/ 
262a6(rgyud): dus bzhi dag tu gtor ma 'bul// bgegs med bsod nams 'phel byed pa'o// 'dir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal ye shes kyi mgon po lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa
262a7(rgyud): rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ sha chen po dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bshams la/ oM ba la~M ma Ni ra hUM dza/ rak+Sha Ni rak+Sha Ni kA ni/ kag bA hi khA hi gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA ba liM/ ma hA bi Sha NaM
262a8(rgyud): sAd+ha ya pra sA d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu phaT/ kha kha la mA ra mA ra// sar+b+ba ta sa na sa traM/ wA rA hI d+hi ra pra yats+tshan+tu swAhA/ oM AHhUM zhes pas mtshan phyed na gtor ma srog spos dang bcas pa dngul bar bya
262b1(rgyud): oM hA ka ha kA ha mA li ni mu khe ya sA d+ha ya/ ma hA kA la bad+hA \u0f7f/ pra ti to se/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ pra duSh+TAn/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na mA ra mA ra/ kha kha khA hi khA hI/ shIg+h+ra/ da ha daha/ bcab tsa/ pur gyur/ ma
262b2(rgyud): phaT/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ shri sar+b+ba oM AHhUM/ dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud les gsang ba grub pa dang gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu rtse lnga pa'o// // dpal mgon po chen
262b3(rgyud): po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa bstan pa 'dzin pa/ bstan pa skong ba/ bstan pa srung nges pa// gsang ba bdud dpung 'dul bar byed pa'o// dpa'
262b4(rgyud): mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi snying po gyur pa gdod nas grub pa'i bla ma yin no rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra gup+ta'i zhal
262b5(rgyud): snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mkhas pa chen po kha rgad 'khor lo grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// @/ rgya gar skad du/ he badz+ra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ kye'i rdo rje
262b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po// kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po
262b7(rgyud): rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba las shin tu ches gsang ba 'ang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
262b8(rgyud): stsal pa/ e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rdo rje snying po snying rje chen po lags legaso// rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dam tshig sems dpa' che
263a1(rgyud): // po snying po kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba nyon cig/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags// ji ltar sems dpa' chen po lags// gang gis dam tshig sem
263a2(rgyud): dpa' lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje mi phyed ces byar brjod// sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa// 'dis ni
263a3(rgyud): shes rab rigs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// ye shes chen po'i rol gang ba// sems dpa' chen por brjod por bya// rtag tu dam tshig la spyod phyir// dam tshig sems dpar brjod
263a4(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ ming bsdus pa ni ji lta bu// / gang gis kye'i rdo rje lags// he yi rnam pas ci zhig pa shang // badz+ra yis kyang de bzhin ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis
263a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ he ni snying rje chen po nyid// badz+ra'ang shes rab/ brjod par bya// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud // den nga yis bshad kyis nyon// lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang / 
263a6(rgyud): don byed rnam mang brjod pa dang // rengs par byed dang smod pa nyid// sde rengs byed dang mngon spyod dang // ji ltar rigs par rnal 'byor ma'i// bskyed dang gnas dang byed rgyu dang // don byed ye shes rnam
263a7(rgyud): shes dang // lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba'o// he ru ka ni bskyed pa'i rgyu// dang por gcig ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing // dngos po'i 'ching bas
263a8(rgyud): 'ching bar 'gyur// de yongs shes pas grol ba yin// dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas// dngos po sgom 'gyur shes rab can// dngos po med pa yongs shes pas// de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya// 
263b1(rgyud): lus la ye shes chen po gnas// rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// dngos po kun la khyab pa bo// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol ba// kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
263b2(rgyud): lus la rtsa du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te// byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa bde ba chen po'i gnasu 'dzag pa'o// de rnams
263b3(rgyud): kyi nang nas rtsa rnam pa gsum ni gtso bo ste// brkyang ma dang / ro ma dang / kun 'dar ma'o// brkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis// thabs kyis ro ma yang dag gnas// kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas/ 
263b4(rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// brkyang ma mi bskyod dbab pa ste// ro ma de bzhin khrag 'bab cing // shes rab tu ba 'bab bshad pa// de ni kun 'dar ma rab grags// mi phyed ma
263b5(rgyud): dang // phra gzugs ma dang / rtse ba ma dang / g.yon pa ma dang / thung ngu ma dang / ru sAl skyes ma dang / sgom pa ma dang / dang nga ma dang / skyon ma dang / 'jug ma dang / ma mo dang / mtshan mod
263b6(rgyud): bsil sbyin ma dang / tsha ba ma dang / brkyang ma dang / kun 'dar ma dang / ro ma dang / gzhol ma dang / rengs ma dang / shin tu gzugs can ma dang / spyi ma dang / rgyu sbyin ma dang / sbyor bral ma dang / sna
263b7(rgyud): gu ma dang / grub ma dang / 'tshed ma dang / de bzhin du yod bzang ma dang / sum bskor ma dang / 'dod ma dang / khyim ma dang / gtum mo dang / bdud dral ma'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di namA ji lta bu lagaN
263b8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// yang na thabs ni thams cad kyis// dngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtag/ sdom
264a1(rgyud): pa'i dbye ba'ang bshad par bya ste// a li ka li ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / shes rab dang / thab so// chos dang / long spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa dang ni sku dang / gsung dang / thug so// 
264a2(rgyud): e baM ma ya ni/ e yi rnam pa lha mo spyan// baM gi rnam pa bdag mar brjod// ma ni lha mo gos dkar mo// ya yi rnam pas sgrol mar brjod// sprul pa'i'akhor lo la pad+ma mdab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi
264a3(rgyud): dang / chos kyi 'khor lo mdab ma brgyad dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la mdab ma bcu drug dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la mdab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis// 'khor lo'i grangs kyi
264a4(rgyud): rim pas rnam par bzhag pa// skad cig ma bzhi ni rnam pasna tshogs dang / rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par nyed pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// 'phag
264a5(rgyud): pa'i bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal pa dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo// de kho na nyid bzhi ni bdag gi de kho na dang / sngags kyi de kho na dang / lha'i de kho na dang / ye shes
264a6(rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid do// dga' ba bzhi ni dga' dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o// sde pa bzhi ni gnas brtan pa dang / thams cad yod par smrad
264a7(rgyud): dang / kun gyis bkur ba dang / dge 'dun phal chen no// zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / a li dang / ka li dang / 'pho ba bcu drug dang / dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / thun tshong
264a8(rgyud): bzhi ste/ de ltar thams cad bzhi'o// lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing / spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te/ bsregs pas ri bong can te 'dzag/ rdo rje rigs
