264b1(rgyud): kyi le'u ste dang pa'o// sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// / oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nuta pan+d+ha tAta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngag so// pru aM hrI khaM hUM/ 
264b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon no// oM de ba bi ts+tsha pa badz+ra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ kye rdo rje'i snying po'o// sngags thams cad kyi rkang par dang po oM gyi rnam pa dang / mthar ni swAh+ma dang / hUM phaT kyi rnam pa
264b3(rgyud): ni nang du gzhugo/ oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha swA hA/ grong khyer dkrug pa'i sdigaso// a A i I u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i lAM/ e ai/ o k+ko sa rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sa bon no// oM trai li k+sha k+She ba hu hUM hU~M phaT swAH
264b4(rgyud): phyag gnyis pa'i'o// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hu huM hu~M phaT swA hA/ phyag zhi pa'i 'o// oM ki Ti ki Ti badz+ra hu huM hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag du gu pa'i'o// oM AHhUM/ sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab/ 
264b5(rgyud): pa'i sngagaso// oM rak+Sha rak+Sha huM huM huM phaT swA hA/ sa sbyang ba'i swA/ gas so// oM hUM swA hA/ rengs par byed pa'i re// oM a swA hA/ dbang du byed pa'o// oM khaM swA hA/ skrod par byed pa'i'o// 
264b6(rgyud): oM dz+r-i swA hA/ sdang bar byed pa'i'o// oM buM sIhA/ mngon spyod kyi'o// oM hU~M swA hA/ 'gugs par byed pa'i'o// oM g+hu swA hA/ gsod bar byed pa'o// oM ku ru kul+le hrI swA hA/ ku ru ku l+le'i sngag so// a
264b7(rgyud): rnam pas mtha' yas kyi gzugs brnyan byas la bdud rtsi lngas ni drugs/ me tog nag pos ni mchod// klu 'dul bar byed pa'i khu bas ni byug/ glang po che'i chang gis ni byug/ kham por kha sbyar du ni
264b8(rgyud): bzhag/ ba nag mo'i 'o mas dgang / gzhon nu ma nag mos bkal ba'i skud pas ni dkri/ rlung gi phyogasu rdzing bu byas te mtha' yas der bzhag go// de'i 'gram du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par
265a1(rgyud): // byA ste/ dur khrod kyiso la bas ni rdul tshan nag go// skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye mas ni rdul tshon dkar po// ldong ros kyis ni rdul tshon ser po// dur khrod kyis phag gis ni rdul tshon dam
265a2(rgyud): po/ rkun me'i lo ma dang / skyes pa'i rus pa'i phyi ma dag gis ni rdul tshon ljang ku ste/ rdul tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs so// dur khrod kyi srid bus thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor khru/ 
265a3(rgyud): gsum pa bya ste/ de'i dbus mtha' yas mnan pa'i kye ro rdo rje zhal brgyad pa/ zhabs bzhi pa/ phyag bcu drug gis rgyan pa/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis che ba/ 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par mdzad pa bri'o// 
265a4(rgyud): de nas slob dpon gyis nang gi ma rungs pa'i sems kyis dben dpa'i gan su sngags bzla s+t+wa~M/ oM g+hu ru g+hu ru g+ha Du g+ha D+ha mas maM sa g+ha Ta g+ha Ta g+ho Ta ya g+ho Ta ya/ a nan k+Sho b+ha ka rA ya nA gA d+hi pa/ 
265a5(rgyud): taye he he ru ru kaM sap+ta bA tA la ga tAn nA gA nA kaR+Sha ya b.rA ya/ gar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/ phuHphu/ phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHhUM hUM r+thA phaT swA hA// gal te char mi 'bab na de'i tshe sngags 'di bzlog
265a6(rgyud): te char 'bab bo// gal te maM 'bab na de'o che mgo ardza ka'i dog pa ltar 'gas so// char dbab pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o// sprin dril ba bshad de// dur khrod kyi ras la nye bar 'dug nas sngags bzlas shi
265a7(rgyud): dral te/ oM AR+tha ya shA shAn pri yA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ sprin dral ba'i cho ga'o// pha rol gyi sde rnam par gzhig par bya ba'i phyir kha Ti ka'i sgrub pa bshad de kha Ti ka dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / ku ThA ra ts+tshin+da
265a8(rgyud): dang lhan cig btegs le rim bu bye ste/ sdigs ni oM badz+ra karta ri he badz+ra ya hUM hUM hU~M phaT/ dngos grub kyi don tu bye ba bzlas shing sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ de bsgrubs la ril ba spyi blugs kyi
265b1(rgyud): par bskor zhing bskor nas bcad na dgra thams cad kyi mgo med par 'gyur ro// rdo rje gri gug gi cho ga'o// lha rnams dgas par 'dod pas thig le sgrub te tshangs pa'i sa bon rgyal la bsgrubs
265b2(rgyud): nasadaku thA ra ts+tshin+da dang bsres la nyi ma gzas zin pa na mi bskyod pa dang btag cing btags nas dgra sta byas te/ de rkang pas mnan nas sngags ba sa te/ oM badz+ra kuSh+Ta ra pA Da ya pA Di ya
265b3(rgyud): hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ bye ba bzlas la thig le byas te gang la phyag byas pa de 'gaso// lha dgas pa'i cho ga'o// tshabs gdung bar 'dod pas ar+g+ha'i lo ma la dug dang ske tshe dang tsi tra ka'i khu bas/ 
265b4(rgyud): dgra bo'o mong bri zhing 'bras phub kyi me lo gdungs te sngog sa khri bzlas so// oM he badz+ra dzA ra dzA ra sha trUM b+hU hUM hUM hUM/ phaT swA hA// tsha ba'i cho ga'o// khri bzlas pas 'grub bo// chang
265b5(rgyud): skyug par bya bar 'dod pas bsgrub bya'i lte bar yi ge rnam pa sgom zhing mi gi rnam par gyur pa las chang lte bar NA/ ma par bsgoms te skyug par byed par bltas na chang skrag go// 
265b6(rgyud): rib tu myos ma dbang du bya ba 'dod pas mya ngan med pa'i brgyad la mya ngan med pa'i 'og tu song ste gos dmar po bgos nas myos byed kyi 'bras bu bza' zhing / ka kA ma tsaM ka'i khu bas
265b7(rgyud): thig le byas nas sngags bzlas te/ oM a mu ka me hI ba sI b+ha ba tu swA hA/ khri yis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma dbang du bya bar 'dod pas sa lu btags pa'i 'gyur ba la zla ba dang nyi ma byas
265b8(rgyud): nas rdo rje'i tshul gzhug cing sngags bzlas te/ oM badz+ri ar+k+ka mA tsa la mA tse la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha he badz+ra ya hrI hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ bye ba phrag bdun bzlas te nyi ma dang zla ba dag yang dag par gnas shing nyin moH
266a1(rgyud): // bye brag med par 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o// oM na grA na gra zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dus ma yin pa'i dus don sgrub pa'i phyir gzhon nu ma
266a2(rgyud): mig dag la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa las yang dag par mchod cing snyan gsan dbab bo// bcu bzhi pa'ame'i rgyad zhi ba'i dusu bum pa li so/ 
266a3(rgyud): babazhag cing 'bru mar dang a lak+Sha'i khu ba la sngags 'di nyid kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsdugo// de nas mngon par bsngags pa'i a la k+ta re khu bas bsngags pa'i mthe bong rgan pas
266a4(rgyud): bskus nas 'bru mar gyis kyang thugs la gzhon nu ma la stan te/ nga'i rdzas sus khyer smras/ de la des smras pa/ dge mo zhes bya bas khyer ro// rdo rje skar ma'o// be Du la becus
266a5(rgyud): zhes brjod na glang po che 'bros par 'gyuraro// mad+hA marmA zhes brgyad na stag 'bros par 'gyur// ti wi yA tim+ma yA naM sa brjod na bsre 'bros par 'gyur ro// i li ma~M li lu du
266a6(rgyud): zhes brjod na sbrul 'bros par 'gyur ro// nor skye nga 'dul ba'i phyag gis lag pa rab tu bstan na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ma dang / dkar ma dang / chum dang / rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dang / bdag/ 
266a7(rgyud): med ma dang / sa sbyong ma dang / mkha' spyod ma'i rnal 'byor las rangs par byed pa la sogs pa brtul zhugs can gyis byed do// sngags kyi le'u sde gnyis pa'o// de nas lha'i le'u bsha
266a8(rgyud): pabar bya'o// dang por byams pa bsgom por bya// gnyis pas snying rje rnam sdom zhing // gsum par dga' pe sgom pa dang // kun gyi mthar ni btang snyam so// yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ste// gnyis pa la/ 
266b1(rgyud): ni sa bon bsdu// gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs// bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod// re phas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas// nyi der hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste// rdo rje de nyid kyis ni rab dang / 
266b2(rgyud): gur bcing ba yang rnam par sgom pa nyid// dang por ro ni rnam bsgoms pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod// de stengs rnal 'byor pa gnas nas// he ru ka nyid rnam par sgrom// rang gi snying khar
266b3(rgyud): re ba sgom// de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor// der ni hUM gi rnam pa nyid// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can// hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje ni// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen pos// rdo rje lte ba'i dbus
266b4(rgyud): gnas par// yang ni hUM gi de nyid sgom// hUM gi rnam par gyur pa daltas nas// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par sgom// rdo rje skye ba na dag po che// 'dam skyes sngon po 'dra ba'i mdog/ lag rjod kyi da/ 
266b5(rgyud): ma pa sa pa zhos/ na mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni// rdo rje skye snying rje che// rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi// lha na/ brgyad po rnams kyis mchod// dkar mo ri dgas mtshan pa
266b6(rgyud): 'dzin// chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod// ro langs ma ni chu lag ma// g+hasma ri ni sman 'dzin cing // puk+ka si ni rdo rje'i lag/ de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin// gdol pa mo ni cang te'u rdul// 'di
266b7(rgyud): rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// g.yung mos sku la 'khyud pa nyid// a li zla ba ka li nyi// sa bon nang du son gyur pa// de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod
266b8(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi// rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro// bsdus nas snying kar dkug pa na// yo ge zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur// sngo dang / 
267a1(rgyud): // nyi ma mtshungs pa'i mdog/ ban du dmar po'i spyan dang ldan// skra ser gyen du 'khyil ba dang // phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par rgyan// 'khor lo rna cha nor bu dang // lag gdub dang / 
267a2(rgyud): ni sku rags nyid// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa// 'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags// sdang mig brgyad gnyis lo yi tshul// g.yon na rdo rje thod pa dang // g.yon pa nas kyang kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas
267a3(rgyud): na rdo rje nag po nyid// hUM gi yi ge 'don pa'i bdag/ rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor nas// dur khrod du ni mgon po rol// dbugs rgyu zhes bya'i rigs pa 'dis// dur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod// 
267a4(rgyud): phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba rnam par dag dpa ste// gong du brjod pa'i gzugs dang // sku mdog dang / da hUM las byung ba'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang po na skyes pa'i thod pa
267a5(rgyud): lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis bkang ba// de bzhin du gas sa kyi phyag na rdo rje// phyag lhag ma dag gis shes ra/ la 'khrung ga/ shes rab rdo rje phag mon bcom ldan 'das kyi
267a6(rgyud): gzugs cano// phyag drug pa/ zhal gsum pa// g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas zla ba dang nyi ma lta bu dang po sngon po'o// gcer bu gong bu brjod pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can/ phyag rnams ni pha rol tu phyi/ 
267a7(rgyud): ba rnam par dag po'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje/ phyag g.yon gyi gnyis pa na dril bu/ phyag g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug/ phyag lhag ma dag gis
267a8(rgyud): rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la snyoms par 'jug pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar shes rab ste/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na gri gug dang thod pa/ khams gsum gyi bdag nyidan gyi ro mnan pa'o// 
267b1(rgyud): le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u bshang bar bya'o// rang gi snying khar sa bon bsam mo// sa bon las ni 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis
267b2(rgyud): phyung nas/ des khams gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la ma mo brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mA
267b3(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta zhes sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pa lngas dbang bskur bar bya'o// dbang bskur ba na/ 
267b4(rgyud): me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// rnga'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur// / gur gum gyi char 'bab par 'gyu ro// gzugs kyi ngo// rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// rdo rje'i glusgra
267b5(rgyud): la sogs pa rnams kyis blang bar bya'o// dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// 'dis ni he/ rdzogs pa nyid do// thun gsum du byin gyis brlab pa'i sgom
267b6(rgyud): ba rnam par bsgoms nas langs te lha'i gzugasu bzhago// dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// ngo bos gzugs med mthong ba bo// sgra med thos pa po// 
267b7(rgyud): yang med// dri med sdom pa po yang med// ro med myong ba po yang med// reg med reg pa po yang med// sems med sems las byung ba'ang med// skyed byed ma dang sring ma nyid// rnal 'byor rig pas/ 
267b8(rgyud): rtag tu mchod// gar ma chos ma rdo rje ma// gdol ma de bzhin bram ze mo// thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis// de nyid rig pas rtag tu mchod// ji ltar byed par mi 'gyur bar// rab tu 'bad pas
268a1(rgyud): / bsten pa nyid// ma gsang sbrul dang chom rkun dang / sa spyod me yis sdug bsngal byed// rigs lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba// thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya// rdo rje 'dis ni gdab pa
268a2(rgyud): nyid/ ngas phyag rgyar brjod par bya// rdo rje pad+ma de bzhin las/ de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen nyid// snying rje chen po dam pa yi// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru brjod// rdo rje'i phyag rgya g.yung mo nyid// de
268a3(rgyud): bzhin pad+ma'i gar ma nyid// las ni chos mar rab tu bshad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bram ze mo// rin chen gdol mar shes par bya// phyag rgya lngar ni rnam par ngas// 'di rnams de bzhin gshegs/ 
268a4(rgyud): pa'i rigs// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing // de bzhin slar yang ga/ shegs pa nyid// 'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis// de bzhin
268a5(rgyud): gshegs zhes brjod par bya// rigs ni rnam pa drug brjod cing // mdor bsdus pas ni rnam pa lnga// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// rigs pa/ 
268a6(rgyud): 'byung ba lnga rnams dang // phung po la yi rang bzhin gyis// rigs dang bgrang bya 'di yis ni// rigs zhes mngon par brjod par bya/ sgom pa po med sgom pa'ang med// lha med sngags kyang yod ma
268a7(rgyud): yin/ spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// sngags dang lha ni yang dag gnas// rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang // rin chen dpag med sems dpa' bo// tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang // thams ca/ 
268a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas de nyid brjod// tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid// 'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya// rtag tu dge bas zhi ba nyid// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas// dam pa'i bde bas de
268b1(rgyud): nyid de// bde ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas// gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid// lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya// sangs rgyas 'di la blag mnga'// bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya/ 
268b2(rgyud): b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod// dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun// yang na nyon mongs la sogs bdud// bcom phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya// gang phyir skye 'gro skyed pa yi// shes rab ma
268b3(rgyud): zhes brjod par bya// gang phyir skal ba ston pa yi// shes rab srin mo zhes bya nyid// gtso blag pa dang bu mo dang // gar mkhan ma zhes brjod par bya// sems can thams cad 'tshed pa'i phyir// btso blag
268b4(rgyud): ma zhes de bzhin brjod// yon tan 'jo phyir shes rab na/ dbu mo zhes ni brjod par bya// snying rje chen po g.yo ba'i phyi// shes rab gar mar brjod par bya// gang phyir bcom ldan mi
268b5(rgyud): reg pa// de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya// a li ka li ra brtags pas// brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad/ rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor nyid// nyed phyir dkyil 'khor
268b6(rgyud): brjod par bya// lag pa bsgyur ba phyag rgya yin// sor mo nyid pa'ang de bzhin no// gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni// gang bsams de ni bsam gtan no// ji ltar pha las bde thob pa// de yi
268b7(rgyud): bde ba rang gis bza'// bde ba gang gis 'chi ba 'di// de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod// de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// spyod pa pha rol
268b8(rgyud): phyin mchog nyid// gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba// kye'i rdo rje dngos grub rgyus// sbom po po yis rnam 'dzin pa// rna ba dag la rna cha bzang // spyi bor 'khor lo
269a1(rgyud): rnam par 'dzin// lag pa dag la lag gdub nyid// rked pa la yang ska rags nyid// rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub bo// lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid// mgrin par
269a2(rgyud): rus pa'i phreng ba ste// bgo ba stag gi lpags pa nyid// bza' ba mi'i chi bcu phyed de// he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste// kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas// rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa// rigs ni
269a3(rgyud): gcig tu rnam par brtag/ kha dag du ma nyid kyis ni// gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mo bya// shing gcog dang ni dur khrod dang // ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang // yang na dben pa 'am bas mtha' ru/ 
269a4(rgyud): sgom pa bzang por brjod par bya// cung zad drod ni thob pa na// gdal te spyod pa byed 'dod pas// gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na// 'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa nyid// shin tu bzhin pa
269a5(rgyud): mig yangs ma// rang gis dbong bskur snying rje can// rdo rje'i mo 'di khyer nos// spyod par bya bar rtogs par bya// rigs kyi dngos mngon// ring 'dod lnga yi rigs kyis bya/ 
269a6(rgyud): yang na gzhan gyis rigs byung ba// byang chub sa bon gdab pa dang // sbyang ba yis ni bzung bor bya// gal te dga' bas glu blang ste// de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no// gal te dga' ba skyes pa na// thar pa'i
269a7(rgyud): rgyur ni gar bya ste// de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar// yo gis mnyam par gzhag pas byed// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa// rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med// mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen
269a8(rgyud): bidag/ lag gdub rnam par snang mdzad brjod// ska rags la ni ngan yong gan so// la T+Ta/ zugs shes rab ste// thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nying // zhes sdang rna ma dag rnal 'byor pa// glu/ 
269b1(rgyud): ni rnam dag sngags su gnas// gar ni sgom pa byas pa nyid// de yi phyir na glu dang gar// yo gis rtag tu rtag tu byas// sman ni rnam par bzang ba ste// chu ni rtag par btung ba nyid// rga shis zil
269b2(rgyud): gyis mi gnon cing // rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin// rkun ma'i skalas cad par byas// de la hUM byung sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin// thod
269b3(rgyud): sor lnga pa yi tshad// byas pas cod pan 'dzin par byed// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// skra yi ska rags nyid bskor nyid// thal ba skra yi mchod phyir thogs// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas/ 
269b4(rgyud): 'dzin// cang te ru s+tha ni bzlas pas ste// kha T+wAM ga sgom shes ra nyid// rdo rje thod pa'i spyod pa yis// 'di dang bzlas dang sgro dam pa yin// brkam dang rmongs dang 'jigs dang gro/ nga tsha'i 'bras
269b5(rgyud): rnam par spang // bdag nyid kyi ni gnyid spangs nas// the tsom ma dpar spyod par bya// lus kyis sbyin pa byin nas ni// phyi nas spyod par dag spyad// skal dang skal min rnam spyad pas
269b6(rgyud): de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya// bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu bza'o// yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir// zhon pa tsam du mi bya'o// bza' dang bza' min spyod pa dang // de bzhin
269b7(rgyud): btung dang btung min nyid// bgrod dang bgrod min sngags pa yis// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang // yang dag ye shes snang ba po// mnar med spang ba'i rgyud yi phyir// 
269b8(rgyud): / grub pas bla ma mngon phyag btsal// bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol// de bzhin ngo tshe'i 'bras bu nyid// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi// yo gis rnam dpyad snying rje chen// sbyin sreg mchog sbyin da// 
270a1(rgyud): // thub 'das// sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs// dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ldan par spyod pa byed// nges par sngon du lha min gang // brgya byin lta bu/ 
270a2(rgyud): yin na yang // de la 'jigs par mi bya ste// seng ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rtag tu snying rje btung bar bya// rnal 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa// gzhan gyi
270a3(rgyud): btung bas bzi ba med// spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas ts+tsho ma'i le'u bshad par bya'o// gang gis sprin dang sring mor yang // the tsom med par shes par bya// gang zhig sor mo gcig ston/ 
270a4(rgyud): dang / gnyis kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin// g.yon pa'i ma the bong bcangs pa las// bsnyun gyi phyag rgyar rnam pa dar shes// gang zhig srin lag ster ba la// de yi the'u chung na/ 
270a5(rgyud): par sbyin// gang zhig gung mo ston pa la// de yi mdzub mo rnam bar sbyin// gang zhig srin lag ston pa la// de yi mgri na pa rab tu bstan// gang zhig gos ni ston pa la// de yi rtseg
270a6(rgyud): rab tu bstan// gang zhig nu ma ston pa la// de yi mtshams ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig so ni ston pa la// de yi kha ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la// gtsug pud dgrol bar brjod
270a7(rgyud): bya gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la// de yi rgyab ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig rkang mthil ston pa la// lho yos rnam par rtse bar bya// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lam gyis ni// dam tshig gi zhi rnam par dbye// 
270a8(rgyud): de la rnal 'byor mas smras pas// e mduni snying rje tshe// gal ta phreng ba'i lag ston na// 'du bar bya shes smra ba yin// phreng ba mngon par gtad byas na// dam tshig la gnas brtul zhugs pa/ 
270b1(rgyud): de la phyi rol zhes 'du ba// bzang po'i spyod yul gnas pa ni// de la 'du bar rnal 'byor mas// gang smras de ltas thams cad bya// kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas du lags// bcom ldan
270b2(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing nyid dang // ts+tshan+do nye ba'i ts+tshan+do dang // de bzhin 'du ba nye 'dra ba// 'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid// dur
270b3(rgyud): khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid// 'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid// 'dis ni gzhan gyis brjod ma bya// kye bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags// 
270b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas ni dzA lan d+hi rar bshad// de bzhin du ni u Di nyid// gnas ni ko/ l-I gi rI nyid// de bzhin du ni kA ra nyid// nye gnas mA la wa zhe/ 
270b5(rgyud): brjod// sin d+hu na ga ra nyid do// zhing ni mum+ba nir bshad de/ zhing ni byed pa'i brang nyid do// de wi ko Ta de bzhin zhi / zhing ni lcags pa'i brang nyid do// nye zhing ku lu ta zhes brjod/ 
270b6(rgyud): de bzhin arbu ta nyid dang // bA yi mchog sbyin khA ba'i ra// nye ba'i zhing ni mdor bsdus pa'o// tsAn+do ha ri ke la dang // lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang skyes dang // la ba kA dang kany+tsi nyid// de bzhin soraSh+Ta nyid// 1/ 
270b7(rgyud): ba'i ts+tshan+do ka ling ka/ gser dang ldan pa'i gling dang ni// ko kaN+Da yang nye tsAn+dor// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya/ 'thung gcod grong khyer gyi dang yang // 'thung gcod grong gi mthar gnas pa/ 
270b8(rgyud): rihA ta ki sa la// bin d+ha gzhon nu grong khyer ro// rdo rje snying bstong rje che// nyi ba'i 'thung gcingad de nye ba'o// dur khrod rab son dge 'dun dang // dur khrod rgya mtsho'i 'gram nyid do// bskyed tshal rab rje
271a1(rgyud): // bu'i 'gram// nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rnal 'byor ma rgyud kyi rdo rje// rnal 'byor ma yi legs 'du ba// nyin par nyid kyang rab bshad bya// kye
271a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yi dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang // de bzhin du yang brgyad pa nyid// rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid// lan bdun pa'ang/ 
271a3(rgyud): bza' bar bya// 'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa yis// bsad par bya bar brjod par nyid// snying rje med na mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid// thams cad bdug par gzhug pa ste// cho ga'i gca
271a4(rgyud): bos dag go par bya// de la 'di ltar blta ba nyid// nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can// mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya// mi bya cung zad yod ma yin// rtag tu mi bza' yang ma yin// di
271a5(rgyud): la mi bsam yod ma yin// bzang ngan mi smra gang yang med// rje lter bdag nyid de ltar gzhan// de bzhin bdag nyid ngam/ tshig nyid// 'di ltar sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ bza'
271a6(rgyud): dang btung ba la sogs spyad// yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang // tshig rnams rab tu rgyas pa nyid// he ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs pas// de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya yin/ shrI ni gnyis med ye shes/ 
271a7(rgyud): hi ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid// ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyi// shin mkhas pas bze' bar bya// sems can/ 
271a8(rgyud): de dbang du 'gyur// brda dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas rnam 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o// nam kha'i khams su b+ha ga bsam// dbus su rnam par sgom pa ni
271b1(rgyud): 'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// 'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngo// ji ltar rigs par byin za dang // lha rnams kyis ni rlung chen dang // ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'ang // 
271b2(rgyud): chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo nyid// 'bar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa// ze 'bru las ni gcig 'gyur te// gru gsum gyis ni phyi mar brjod// de dbus shib bco lnga yi// gdan gyi bdag nyid rnam
271b3(rgyud): par bsam// de yi steng du zla ba yin// zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid// phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan// gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po// a li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas// ka li'i gzug
271b4(rgyud): kyis snang byed do// zla ba nyi ma 'dus pa las// dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags// zla ba me long ye shes ldan// ba dun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan// rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan
271b5(rgyud): ni// so sor rtog par brjod par bya// thams cad gcig gyur na na tan nyid// rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste// ma khas pas cho ga gsungs pa yos// rnam pa lnga po sgom pa nyid/ 
271b6(rgyud): a li ka li mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan// yi ge las byung gong bu la// hUM phaT rnam pa'ang 'dod mi bya// sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor bdag
271b7(rgyud): po rnam par sgom// phyog mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin// zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhini las// 'di ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid// zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas// 
271b8(rgyud): a li shes rab ka li thabs// 'di las dkar mo la sogs pa// kha dog dbye bas so so yin// re shig nang gi 'phar ma la// rnal 'byor ma lnga nges gnas pa// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// 
272a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu sgom// dbang por rdo rje gshin rje dkar// chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lus ngan rdo rje mkha' gro ma// dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma// 
272a2(rgyud): phyi rol gyi ni 'bar ma la// dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma// g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI// ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo// brgyad pa Dom+b+ha ni ru brjod// 'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid// mkha' spyod ma dang / 
272a3(rgyud): sa spyod brjod// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// snying rje chen po 'di dag gnas// lha mo thams cad kha dog gnas// phyag chen phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan// zhal gcig spyan ni dmar ba dang // lag pa/ 
272a4(rgyud): kri gug thod pas khyab// 'khor lo rnam mgul rgyan gal/ dpar lag gdub ska rags ni// sangs rgyas ldan rnam ga pas// 'di lnga phyag rgya dag po'o// ji ltar bdag med rnam
272a5(rgyud): 'byor ma// de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad// lag gcig ni thod pas brel// g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pas kha T+wA~M ga nyid do// stag gi lpags pas rnamapa
272a6(rgyud): shing // rol zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar// phyag gnyis gyen du dbu skyes ser/ nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug rnams// gcod phyir gri gug rnam par gnas// dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi/ ma
272a7(rgyud): bo bad+ma'i snod du ni// bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag/ dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya// stong pa'i rnam pas kha T+wAMg/ thabs kyi ser ni rnam par brtag/ 'dis ni 'khor lo rnams bsgoms
272a8(rgyud): na ding sa gru'i myur du thob par 'gyur// dang por nag porab tu sgom// gnyis par dmar pa rnam par sgom// gsum be la ni ser ba skam// bzhi par ldang gu bzhin no// lnga pa pa kha dag sngon pa dang / 
272b1(rgyud): drug par dkar po'i lus can te// yan lag drug sgom rnal 'byor pas// dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no// bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni// rdzogs pa yi yang rim pa nyid// rim gnyis mnya
272b2(rgyud): par gnas nas ni// rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do// bskyed pa yi ni cha bshad do// na mkha'i khams ni pad+ma la// b+ho ga zhes bya ye shes brjod// sgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug nyid// de
272b3(rgyud): bde ba 'khor lor brjod// sngon du byung ba zhu ba nyid// rig pa ji bzhin rang rig nyid// lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems// ji ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin// lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis// re shig
272b4(rgyud): mo shes rab yin// skyes bu thab su brjod pa nyid// kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las// phyi nas de yi rnam pa gnyis//  shig skyes bu rnam pa gnyis// de yi khung 'ang bde ba nyid// skyes
272b5(rgyud): bu ji bzhin shes rab lo'ang // de yi khub bde ba nyid// de nyid phyir na dga' ba nyid// bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba yis// skye med/ rim po'i phyogs las ni// 'di ltar lhan cig skyes rnamapani
272b6(rgyud): dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid// mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma// shin tu bde dga' thams cad ngas// de bde'i thabs las thams cad rig// dga' ba bde ba cung zad de// mchog tu dga' bde bas lhag
272b7(rgyud): dga' bral dga' bas chags bral yin// lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// dang po reg par 'dod pa dang // gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa dang // gsum pa 'dod chags 'jig pa nyid// des na bzhi
272b8(rgyud): pa bsgom par bya// mchog tu dga' ba srid par brjod// dag 'brel las ni mya ngan 'das// dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de// 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs// 'dod chags med cing chags bral me/ 
273a1(rgyud): / dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// 'di las thabs dang shes rab med// yang dag de nyid snang ba'o// gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes// gang du yang ni mi rnyed de// bla ma
273a2(rgyud): dus thabs bsten pa yis// bdag gi bsod nams las shes bya// dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang // gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams kyang // ro monyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis// 
273a3(rgyud): kun mnyam pa nyid du blta// dman pa rnams ni phra ba'i don// mchog ni dngos por brjod par bya// dbu ma gnyis kyis spangs pa nyid// gzhan rnams zhes bya dbang po drug/ gang rnams de rnams
273a4(rgyud): brtan dang g.yo// 'di kun zhes byang nyid de// mnyam nyid mtshungs par 'dod pa nyid// ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa ni// mnyam zhes bya ba mtshungs par brjed// de yi 'khor me
273a5(rgyud): zhes brjod// sgom pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid// 'dis ni don gyis brjod par bya// nga las 'gro ba thams cad 'brur/ nga las gnas gsum po yang 'byung // nga yis 'di kun tu
273a6(rgyud): ba ste// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong // de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes na// shin tu mnyam gzhag gang goms pa// bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang // de ni 'grub par the tsom med// bza' dang / 
273a7(rgyud): btung dang blugs pa dang // nyal dang log dang sems pa na// phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas// de nas mngon du 'gro bar 'gyur// gang phyir yid kyis mi sgom par// 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya// 
273a8(rgyud): thams cad chos ni yongs shes na// sgom pa nyid ni sgom pa min// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gang // rtswa lcug 'khril shing la sogs pa// bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las// dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya/ 
273b1(rgyud): rnams dam pa gcig yod min// rang rig bde ba chen po nyid// rang rig nas ni byang chub 'gyur// rang rig phyir na skom pa nyid// rang gi rig pa'i 'gyur ba las// mnan pa las ni las skyes te// 8
273b2(rgyud): gis 'phrog cing rang gis byed// rang rig rgyal po rang gtso bo// 'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog dang // de bzhin gti mug nga rgyal nyid// de kun gnas ni nyams dga' bar// bcu drug char yang mi phod// 
273b3(rgyud): chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni// mkha' mnyam lhan cig thabs dang bcas// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// 'jig rten gsum po de las skyes// khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan yin// de gi
273b4(rgyud): bde ba 'dod mar brjod// gcig dang du ma bral ba ste// skadacig gcig las mchog dga' ba// rang gi rig pa'i ye shes 'di// ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul te// 'di ni byin rlabs
273b5(rgyud): rim pa'i phyir// kun mkhyen ye shes de lta bu// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang na mkha' nyid dag ni// rang gzhan/ rig pa'i tshor ba yis// kun gyis skad cig mi gnod te// mtho ri
273b6(rgyud): mi yul rkang 'og go/ skad cig las ni gzugs gcig 'gyur// rang bzhin cha yi rnam rtog gis// gnod pa nyid ni nus pa min// thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang // de bzhin las rgyas la sog
273b7(rgyud): pas// srid ba dag pa'i dngos grub min// yang ni srid mthar skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du// de med pas kyang dngos grub med// gang gis mi shes kye'i rdo rje// de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur// 
273b8(rgyud): bobo'i rgyun ni rab 'bab dang / mar ma'i rtse mo rab bcings ltar// rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor gyis// nyin dang mtshan du mnyam par gzhag/ rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes byang 'du ba'i le'us brgyang ba'o// 
274a1(rgyud): // de nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o// nges par dngos po thams cad kyi// dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod// phyi nas re re'i dbye ba yis// lha rnams kyi ni brjod par
274a2(rgyud): bya/ phung po lnga dang dbang po drug/ skye mched drug dang 'byung chen lnga// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag/ nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib byang ba// rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min// 
274a3(rgyud): yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir// rang gis rig pa'i bde chen mchog/ gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang / gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas mthong ba// dngos po kun dag pa ste/ 'di ltar 'gro bas
274a4(rgyud): rgyas 'gyur// kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lag sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la sogs pa'o// ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos
274a5(rgyud): po'i phyir ro// rdo rje snying pos bsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das pa zung ba dang 'dzin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya// sgra ni na
274a6(rgyud): bas mnyan par bya// dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya// lce yis ro ni tshor bar bya// dngos po lus kyis reg par bya// yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni// dag pas dag mad byas nas ni// bsten bya 'di dag
274a7(rgyud): bsten pa nyid// gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin to// tshor ba la yang dgar mor brjod// 'du shes chu yi rnal 'byor ma// 'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni// bdag med rnal
274a8(rgyud): 'byor ma gnas so// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur// nang gi 'bar ma'o// de nas phyi yi 'bar ma bshad// dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI// mar ni de bzhin ri khrod sa
274b1(rgyud): bden bral gdol pa mo bzhag cing // rlung du gsung mo rnam par bzhag/ khyim lha mo dkar mo sogs// dbang dka ga shin rjer chom rkun ma// chung dag phyog su ro langs ma// lus ngan/ 
274b2(rgyud): ni g+hasma ri// 'og tu sa spyod ma zhes brjod// steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// lha mo 'di gnyis rnam par gnas// gzug
274b3(rgyud): la dkar mor rtag tu bshad// sgra la chom rkun ma rab grags// dri yi cha la ro langs mo// ro la g+hasma ri rab grags// rag la sa spyod ma zhes bshad// chos kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma// rtag tu
274b4(rgyud): 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur// phyag gi dag pa stong pa nyid// bdud dag pa las zhag/ sa rnams nyid// rnam thar brgyad kyis zhal rnams nyid// rdo rje/ 
274b5(rgyud): gsum gyis dag pa'i spyan// sa ni puk+ka sI zhes bshad// chu khams rngon pa ma zhes brjod// me ni gtum mor shwe bar bya/ rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags// zhe sdang zhes bshad rdo/ 
274b6(rgyud): ma/ 'dod chags chu yo rnal 'byor ma// brag dog rdo rje mkha' gro ma// ser sna gsang ba'i dkar mo nyid// gti mug de bzhin rdo rjer bshad// zhe sdang la sogs rnam sbyong ba// bskyed pa'i rim
274b7(rgyud): pa'i phyogs la ni// 'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya// gang dang gang gis 'jig rted 'ching 'gyur ba// de dang des ni 'ching ba las grol te// de nyid mi shes 'jig rten mi grol zhing // de nyid rnam spangs
274b8(rgyud): dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// de phyir dri med su me gdugs nyid med// ro dang sems kyi rnam par dag pa med// reg med chos med thams cad rnam par dag/ rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la 'gro bar shes// 
275a1(rgyud): // rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi// rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// cho ga 'ang rab tu bshad
275a2(rgyud): bar bya// dang po lnga yi bdag nyid kyi// rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin sbyang // 'bad pas hUM las rdo rje can// byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri// tshal dang skye bo mo gnas dang // byang chub sems
275a3(rgyud): khyim dang ni// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du gi dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs// rdu'i mtshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni// yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te// rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras la
275a4(rgyud): sogs pa so// de nas dkyil 'khor khru gsum dang // the bong ga/ sum ni lhag par bya// der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i// rig ma bzang mo rnam par gzhug/ yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de// de
275a5(rgyud): ltar bcu drug lon pa nyid// ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa// de srid bya gi rgya bsten par bya// phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang // thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no// bsten pa de las gang byung
275a6(rgyud): ba slob ma'i khar ni btung bar bya// ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid// de nyid la yang bya bar bya// rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur// rang bzhin yang dag rig pa spangs// mkha' mnyam rdul dral
275a7(rgyud): stong pa nyid// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog/ thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres// chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres// de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid// de ni
275a8(rgyud): 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de// de nyid thams cad khyab pa po// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// dngos dang dngos med de las byung // gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams dang // rnam par shes
275b1(rgyud): kun gyi tshul// skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang // bdag dang gso ba sems can dang // dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas
275b2(rgyud): dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de// gnyis pa'i grangs las mchog dga' nyid// gsum pa las ni dga' bral bshad// bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang ni// 
275b3(rgyud): rdo rje snying po la sogs kun// mkhas pas de skad nges thos nas// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni// brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur// dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs// de bzhin mchog
275b4(rgyud): dga' 'gro ba nyid// dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid// gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med// bcom ldan bka 'a stsal kye'i rdo rje// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa// rdo rje
275b5(rgyud): snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir// the tsom legs par sel ba ni// 'dod chags med cing chog bral med// dbu mar dmig sa par mi 'gyur ro// gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir// lhan ci
275b6(rgyud): skyes pa byang chub brjod// yang na de nyid thams cad bdag/ yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs// de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon// dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs// dang po sgron dang 'dra ba
275b7(rgyud): yin 'grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur// gnyid log sad par mi byed par// nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las// rtag tu rmi lam 'am 'dra bar 'gyur// dngos grub mtshan nyid mi phyed pa'i// 
275b8(rgyud): phyag rgya rnal 'a byor pa las 'grub// snyan pas dkyil 'khor 'od skad gsungs// gru bzhi yang dag 'bar ba nyid// sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen po ste// do shal do shal phyed pas rgyan// phreng ba
276a1(rgyud): // sna tshogs rnga yab ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar rgyan// rdo rje srad bu mnyam par ldan// me tog sna tshogs nye bar rgyan// gdug pa mar me de bzhin dri// bum pa brgyad las/ 
276a2(rgyud): pas ldan// de yang yal ka la sogs ldan// mgrin pa gos kyis dgab pa dang // rin chen lnga ni yongasu gzhug/ rnam par rgyal ba shad du sbyin// rang 'dod lha yi gzugs kyis ni// sar pa
276a3(rgyud): legs par bkal ba dang // shin tu tshad mar mdzes pa yi// srad bus shes rab can gyis bdag 'khor po po bzlas pa 'bum// dkyil 'khor can gyi de bzhin khri// gong du gsungs pa'i
276a4(rgyud): sngags nyid kyis// mkhas pas nor 'dzin rnam par sbyang // dgong gi A sogs sngags kyis ni// de la gtor ma rnam par sbyin// ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir// srung ba ji lta
276a5(rgyud): gsungs pa nyid// gang zhig dbang ni rab phye ba// rang gi dkyi/ 'khor tshogs sbyin// mchod dang gsol ba gdang ba nyid// ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin 'dir// 'bar ma gnyis ba
276a6(rgyud): rnam bris nas// myur du dkar mo la sogs bri/ mdu sh+le khri khyo gul lazhen// byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni// bden bral rlung du'ang de bzhin no// dbang ldan du ni ci gsungs pa// de lta de ltar 'og
276a7(rgyud): steng // rdo rje sems dpa'i snyems byas nas// rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// phyag gnyis kye'i rdo rjer sbyor// slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid// khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus// sna chog
276a8(rgyud): rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// hA hA snyoms pa byas nas ni// hi hi rnam par 'jig byed dag/ phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad// rnam par ye shes gzugs can dang // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ khyang
276b1(rgyud): par cung zad yod ma yin// mchog dgar sgom pa med cing sgom pa po'ang med// lus kyang med cing gzung ba med dang 'dzin pa'ang med/ sha dang khrag kyang med cing gshang dang gci
276b2(rgyud): ba'ang med// skyug bro rmongs med gtsang sbra mchod phyir thogs med dang // chags med sdang ba med dang rmongs med phrag dog med// ser sna med dngang rgyal med cing mthong bya med// sgom dang skom papo// 
276b3(rgyud): med pa shes deng dgra med cing // rlom sems med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa sna tshogs nyid// rdo rje snying pos 'di skad gsol// gzod nas rang bzhin med pa yi// lus kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni// 
276b4(rgyud): slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjen// mkha'agro bde ba sbyin pas gsungs// rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin bdag// thams cad lus la rnam pa
276b5(rgyud): gnas// kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po ma sa gyur pa'i phung po logs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i cho
276b6(rgyud): kyis ni// sa ni de las skye bar 'gyur// byang sems khu ba'i rnam pa las// chu yi khams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bskyod pa las ni drod skye ste// 'gro bas rlung du rab tu grags// bde ba na mkha' nyid kyi
276b7(rgyud): khams// lnga po rnams kyis yang su bskor// gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba// de phyir bde ba de nyid min// lhan cig smyos pas gang skyes po// lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya// rang bzhin ldan cig skye
276b8(rgyud): zhes brjod// rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig/ phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las// yo ge snying rje thab su 'gyur// stong nyid snying rje dpyor med pa// byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod// sngags kyi bzlas
277a1(rgyud): med dka' thub med dang sbyin sreg med// dkyil 'khor can yang med cing dkyil 'khor yang ni med// de ni sngags bzlas de dka' thub dang de sbyin sreg/ de ni dkyil 'khor
277a2(rgyud): can dang de ni dkyil 'khor nyid// mdor bsdus nas ni sems ni 'das pa'i gzugs can no// dbang gi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o// // mnyam par ma rungs dpral ba can// rtag tu ltung bar
277a3(rgyud): byed par brjod// dbang gi lta stangs g.yon na gnas// g.yon pa nas ni gzugs brnyan gnyis// g.yas pa'i tshe la dgug pa nyid// steng nas kyang ni gzugs brnyan gnyis// dbu ma rengs pa'i
277a4(rgyud): lta stangs nyid// sna yi rtse mo'i dbus su gnyis// 'byung ba nyi/ da kyis ltung bar byed// rngub pa yis ni dbang du byed// dgang ba yis ni dgug pa nyid// zhi ba yis ni rengs par byed
277a5(rgyud): rlom pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid// dbang ni me tog rab tu grags// / rdo rje'i shing la dgug pa nyid// g.yo bcas rtsol reng sa byed nyid// zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur
277a6(rgyud): 'di la the tsom med// 'di la 'khrul par mi bya ste// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni// mkhas pas sems can gzhag par bya// bsad par 'di la
277a7(rgyud): bya ba yin// dam tshig nges par nyams par 'gyur// sems can slub spangs nas ni// bya ba ma yin thams cad bya// sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni// phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// / 
277a8(rgyud): la dam tshig bza' bya ba// na dang ga ha dang po dang // mtha' yi shwa dang dang po'i shA/ kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub phyir// bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza'// kye rdo rjes gsungs mtshan nyid// skye ba bdun
277b1(rgyud): pa'ang de nas mtshon// dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa// lan bdun pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// skad snyan mig dang ldan pa dang // dri lus gzi brjid chen po dang // de yi grib ma bdun/ 
277b2(rgyud): 'gyur// mthong nas rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon// de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni// skad cig la ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste// gong du brtag pa bcu gnyis par// rgya saM hA
277b3(rgyud): gsungs pa mdo ru bsdu// hriMHlas byung ba'i lha mo ni// kha dog dmar zhing phyag bzhi ma// mda' dong gzhu yi lags pa ma// ut+pal dang lcags kyu 'dzin// 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig
277b4(rgyud): rten gsum po dbang du byed// 'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal dpo rnams// khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid// bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs// 'bum phrag bdun gyis lham/ 
277b5(rgyud): yin/ 'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid// brgya phrags cig gis sngags pa nyid// kye'i rdo rje mkha'agro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa zhes
277b6(rgyud): ba brtag pa'i rgyal po rdzogaso// / rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid// rim
277b7(rgyud): ji bzhin bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci gsungs sbyin sreg byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs pa dang // snga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang // sta gon la
277b8(rgyud): sogs byas nas ni// na mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// sku gzugs snying khar rab tu gzhag/ rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa// rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son// oM badz+ra puSh+pe
278a1(rgyud): / AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra dI pe AHhUM swA hA// oM badz+ra gan+d+he AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra ne we AHhUM swA hA// sna tshogs hUM na rdzogs pa dang // me tog la sogs dbu
278a2(rgyud): ba nyid// gong ma'i rgyud kyi cho ga rim pas// mchod yin zhabs bsil gong mi bzhin// zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po nyid// rgyas pa nyid kyi gru bzhi pa// bsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod// 'di nyid la ni lhag
278a3(rgyud): ma sgrub// khru gang dang ni khru phyed nyid// zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin// khru do dang ni khru gang nyid// rgyas pa'i steng dang 'og tu brjod// sor mo nyi shu'am de yi phyed// bsad pa'i steng dang 'og tu yang // zhig
278a4(rgyud): kha do ga dkar po 'gyur// rgyas par ser po de bzhin no// bas du ba la ni kha dog gnag/ dbang la dmar por rab tu grags// dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug/ bsad la ji ltar zhe sdang sogs
278a5(rgyud): zhi la til dang rgyas la zho// bsad la tsher ma de bzhin no// sAng la sogs pa'ang cher mar brjod// dbang dang dgug la/ ut+pa la// oM ag+na ya ma hA ti dza sarba kA ma pra sA d+ha kaH/ ku ru
278a6(rgyud): Ni kri ta sa twAr+tha asmin san+ni hi to b+ha bAHme dgug pa'o// ma ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin// kye'i rdo rje khros mchod pa'i// lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur// che ge bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri// sAr+tha ny+tse ba pa
278a7(rgyud): rAR+YAny+dza sA d+hi ta gats+tsha ha bya b+hu ka/ A ga mi Sh+ya si ya thA kA le sarba sid+d+hi ku ru Sh+wa me// me dga' ba'i sngags so// oM dzaHhUM baM hoHbai raM mcho de yon gyi sngagaso// oM na ri ti hAM khaM/ zhabs bsil gyi sngags
278a8(rgyud): oM d+hi d+hi lha bshos kyi sngag so// kye'i rdo rje mkha'agro ma dra ba'i sdom pa lis brtag pa gnyis pa rab gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ na mkha' lta bu'i chos kun la// rgya
278b1(rgyud): mtshor dru ba ji lta bar// rang 'dod lnga yi gzugs las ni// sems can ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa 'am// yang na he ru/ 
278b2(rgyud): dpal brtson// gzhan pa'i sems kyis skad cig kyang // dngos grub 'dod pas mi gnas so// dang po goms par byed dus kyi// gnas ni gang du sngags pa'i sems// gcig tu mnyam gzhan
278b3(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur ba'i// gnas ni bzang por nges par brtag/ rang gi khyim du mtshan dus su/ bdag nyid 'grub pa'i sems kyis ni// rnal 'byor mi sgom shes rab can// yang na he ru ka dpal
278b4(rgyud): gzugs// rkang pa 'khrud dang za ba dang // 'thor 'thungaso rtsi za ba dang // tsan dan gyis ni lag nyed dang // smad g.yo dgas kyis ni rkyed 'gebs dang // 'byung dang sgra dang 'gro ba dang // 
278b5(rgyud): 'dug dang khro dang rgod pa dang // bcom ldan 'das ma bste/ pa dang // shes rab brtul zhugs can nyid kyis// rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par sgom// gzhan gyi tshul gyis skad cig
278b6(rgyud): kyang 'dug pa'i sems ni ma rigs pas// dngos grub 'dod pas dngos grub phyir// mkhas pas 'bad pas mi gnas so// bsam gtan nyon mongs 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje snying po nga yis
278b7(rgyud): bshad// brtsabs dngos grub don du yang // zla ba phyed du yongasu rtogs// bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas// lha yi gzugasu sems pa yis// nyi ma gcig tu ma chad par// sgom
278b8(rgyud): pas yongasu brtag par bgyis// rang gzhan don no rab sgrub phyir// 'khor bar thabs gzhan yod ma yin// rig ma lhan cig goms byas pas// 'phral du mngon du byed pa nyid// 'jigs
279a1(rgyud): / myong bzhin sdug bsngal dang // mya ngan gdung ba 'che ba dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// sgrub pa 'o na nyon mo mongs// phan dang gnod pa'i 'bras 'byung bar// / 
279a2(rgyud): ltar nges par shes nas ni// ji ltar da ni skad cig kyang // rnal 'byor pa rnams ngu 'bod gnas// mtshams med lngani byed pa dang // srog chags gsod la dga' ba dang // gzhan yang skye ba
279a3(rgyud): dman gang dang // rmongs dang ma rungs las byed dang // gzugs ngan yan lag ma tshang bas// bsams pas de rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dge ba bcu la goms pa dang // bla ma la gus
279a4(rgyud): dbang po dul// nga rgyal khro las rnam par grol// des ni re shi gra nges 'grub 'gyur// rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor/ dgyis// mnyam par gzhag pas dngos grub thob// zla ba gcig
279a5(rgyud): tu gsang la spyad// ji srid phyag rgya ma rnyed par// gnang ba rnyed 'gyur sngags pa la// rnal 'byor ma yis boste/ na par bya// phyag rgya che ge mo khyer la// sems can don gyis
279a6(rgyud): rje 'dzin// rnyed pa dbang rig sa pa/ gzugs dang lang chos rnam par rgyan// si h+la ga bur yang dag ldan// byang chub sems kyis rnam par sbyang // dge ba bcu las brtsams nas ni// de la chos ni
279a7(rgyud): rab tu dpe// lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni// dam tshig sems dang gcig banyid / zlab cig gis pa ldan pa/ 'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med// mchog thob pa yi bud med gang // rtog pa thams cad
279a8(rgyud): yang dag spangs// yang na bdag gi nus pa yis// lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // gnod sbyin mi 'am ci las kyang // phyag rgya bkug la 'ag brtag/ de yang khyer la spyod pa spyad// bdag gi la
279b1(rgyud): mngon du'i phyir// gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyi// spyod pa longs spyod phyir ma gsungs// yid ni brtan nam g.yo 'am ci// rang gi sems ni so sor brtag/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ 
279b2(rgyud): bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// phyag rgya nyid ces ji ltar brjod// phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis dag gis// phyag rgya'i dngos grub ji ltar 'grub// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bud med
279b3(rgyud): gzugs ni spangs nas ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugasu bya// nu ma spangs pa po las 'gyur// kak+ko la dbus yang dag gnas// 'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur// ze 'bru bo la can
279b4(rgyud): du 'gyur// lhag ma bdag nyid chen po 'di// dga' chen he/ ru kaM yi gzugs// he ru ka sbyar skyes bu nyid// 'bad pa ma dra bar skyes bu 'gyur// gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 
279b5(rgyud): de phyir phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur// 'chags dang 'jinabadag gis kyang // thabs dang shes rab gnod mi 'a/ gyuraro// gang phyir thabs ni 'byung ba nyid// 'jig pa shes rab
279b6(rgyud): srid mthor byed// des na rab 'jig yod ma yin// de nyid la ni chags pa med// la la 'jig pas 'jig par 'gyur// 'jig pa'i dngos med zad pa med// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis
279b7(rgyud): brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa sgom// spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas// slob pa nyid ni sgro med bye// ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam dang // ji ltar bar ma'i srid yin pa// rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba las// dkyil 'khor
279b8(rgyud): nyid de bzhin 'dod// phyag rgya chen por dbang bskur bar// ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po// 'di ni de yi byin rlabs yin// gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med// bde ba gnag cing bde ba ser// 
280a1(rgyud): / bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar// bde ba ljang ku bde ba sngon/ bde ba rgyu dang mi rgyu kun// bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs// de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde// bde ba dngos po dngos med pa/ 
280a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod// rdo rje snying pos gsol ba// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di// de yi bde ba bde chen brjod// rdzogs pa sgom pa med pa ste// bskyed pa yis ni ci zhig
280a3(rgyud): 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' che// dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyams// lus kyi dngos med gang las bde// bde bo smra bar mi nus so// khyab
280a4(rgyud): dang khyab byang tshul gyis ni// bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid// ji da ltar me tog la gnas dri// me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur// de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas// bde ba nyid
280a5(rgyud): kyang dngos med 'gyur// dngos dngos po med pang // dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga // gang zhig le los pas na pa dang // rmongs pa gang gling mi shes// rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga/ 
280a6(rgyud): ni// e yi rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ bde ba can du rtag tu bzhugs// 'chad pa po ches kyang // rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pang // 'jig rten ston pa bsgrub bya
280a7(rgyud): 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pang // lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga // mchog dga' dga' bral dang por ni// mun pa la ni mar me ltar// de bzhin bus kyang yid ches kyis// btsun mo'i byu ga/ 
280a8(rgyud): bde chen du// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso bo dbye byad brgyad cur ldan// khu ba zhes bya'i rnam par gnas// de med pas na bde med 'gyur// bde ba med na de med 'gyur// nus pa med
280b1(rgyud): phyir ltos dang bcas// lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba// de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po min// de nyid dngos med tshul yang med// zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid// mchog tu bde ba gzug
280b2(rgyud): med pa// de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par brjod// rnam dag rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa nyid// lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// bzhin
280b3(rgyud): lag kha dog gnas pa ni// skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas/ 'on kyang bag chags phal pas so// dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis// skye bo thams cad 'chi ba
280b4(rgyud): 'gyur// dug gi de nyid shes pa des// dug gis dug ni 'big das par byed// ji ltar rlung gis zin pa la// mon sran sde 'u bza' ba sbyin// bzlog pa'i sman ni brtags pa yis// rlung
280b5(rgyud): gis rlung la snun par byed// rnam rtog las ni rnam rtog dag/ srid pa nyid kyis srid pa dag/ ji ltar rna bar chu zhags ba// chu gzhan dag gis 'gugs par byed// de bzhin dngas
280b6(rgyud): po'i rnam rtog kyang // rnam par nges par sbyang bar bya// ji ltar 'tshed pas tshig pa yang // me yis kyang ni gdung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags mas tshig pa// 'dod chags me yis gdung ba
280b7(rgyud): bya// skye bo mi bzad pa yi las// gang dang gang giso 'ching 'gyur ba// thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur// chags pas 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba// 
280b8(rgyud): 'dod tshogs nyid kyis na gro 'gyur// bzlog pa'i sgom pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes// 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las// kun tu ru las lnga ru 'gyur/ dga' ba chen pa
281a1(rgyud): gcig nyid las// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i bag chags nyid// sra ba gti mug chos kyi phyir// gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod// 
281a2(rgyud): gang phyir byang sems gsher ba nyid// gsher ba chu yi khamasu brjod// chu ni mi bstod gzugs kyi phyir// zhe sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod pa// gnyis kyis bstod pa'i sbyor ba las// drod ni ga skye bar 'gyur// 
281a3(rgyud): 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin// 'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur// kak+ko lo ra ni gang zhig sems// de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can// phrag dog don yod grub pa yin// don yod rlung las 'byung ba nyi
281a4(rgyud): bde ba 'dod chags khrag tu 'gyur// dga' ba na mkha' mtshadan nyid de// nam mkha' ser sna rdo rjer 'gyur// ser sna nam kha' las byung nyid// sems ni chen po gcig nyid la// lnga yi
281a5(rgyud): gzugs kyis rnam par mtshan// rigs ni lnga po de nyid las// stong phrag du ma skyes pa nyid// de phyir 'di dag rang bzhi na gcig/ bde chen mchog tu rtag pa nyid// 'dod chags la
281a6(rgyud): sogs sems lnga yi// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// gang ga klang bcu'i bye snyed nyid// rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// rigs kyi tshogs la rigs ni du ma rnams// de
281a7(rgyud): rnams rigs la rigs ni rnam pa brgya// de rnams la yang 'bum phrag rigs tshan rnams// bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par 'gyur// de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams nyid// mchog
281a8(rgyud): tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams// kye'i rdo rje mkha'agro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las dngos grub gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje can gyis rnal 'byor ma
281b1(rgyud): rnams la rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs bka' stsal ba// sdom pa dang ni dbang dung yang // de bzhin dgongs pa'i skad nyid dang // dga' dang skad cig dbye ba dang // gzhan yang
281b2(rgyud): bza' ba la sogs pa// de la sdom pa bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// e baM rnam par rab tu gnas// oM baM rnam pa'i bde chen po// dbang las yang dag shes par 'gyur/ 
281b3(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan ston pa 'gro ba'i bla// mkha'agro ma yi sdom pa nyid// e ba rnam paca
281b4(rgyud): brjod// rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol// bcom ldan// das kyis bka' stsal ba// e yi cha byad bzang po ga// dbus su bgyis rnam par rgyan// bde ba thams cad kyi na
281b5(rgyud): gnas// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ skad cig dbye ba/ sa phye ba nyid// dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur// skad ce ga shes nas bde shes pa// e baM rnam par rab tu gnas// sna
281b6(rgyud): tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang // rnam nyid de bzhin mtshan nyid bral// skad cig bzhi ni rab shes pas// de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes 'gyur// 'khyud dang 'o byed la sogs pa// sna tshogs rnam pasna
281b7(rgyud): tshogs bshad// rnam par smin pa de las bzlog/ bde ba'i ye shes za ba nyid// bdag gi bde ba zos pa yi// gros ni rnam par nyed par brjod// mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhani// chags dang
281b8(rgyud): chags bral rnam par spangs// sna tshogs dang po'i dga' ba nyid// rnam smin la ni mchog dga' nyid// rnam nyid dga' ba dag 'bral nyid// mtshan bral lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// slob dpon gsang / 
282a1(rgyud): shes rab dang // bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// dbang ni bzhi yi grangs kyis ni// dga' ba la sogs rim shes byas// dgod pa dag pa slob dpon nyid// lta ba gsang ba de bzhin// 
282a2(rgyud): lag bcangs las ni shes rab nyid// gnyis gnyis 'khrud la de yang nyid// sems can rnams kyi dngos grub phyir// dbang ni rnams bzhi rubashad// gtor dang blugs pa zhes bya 'dis// das na
282a3(rgyud): dbang zhes brjod par bya// shes rab bcu drug lon pa la// lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud// rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor bas// slob dpon dbang du rab tu brjod// shin tu bzhing bzang mig yangs
282a4(rgyud): gzugs dang lang chos rnam par brgyan// mthe bong srin lag/ dag gis ni// slob ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya// de nyid du ni ma nyam pa'i ro// slob ma'i spyod yul dag tu bya// ston pas she
282a5(rgyud): rang rab tu mchod// rjed par byas nas gtang bar bya// ston pas// sa pa sems dpa' che// phyag rgya bde baljon pa khyer/ dz+dza/ dog khro ba rnam spangs pa'o// sbeng mcher gyur shes nas/ 
282a6(rgyud): ston pas de la gnang ba sbyin// kun tu ru gyis rdo rje 'dzin// ji ltar dbang bskur gsol btab pa'i// slob ma'i bya ba bshad par bya// bla ma phyag rgya ldan mthong nas// bstod dang mchod pa rda bzhin bya/ @
282a7(rgyud): ldan zhi ba chen po kye// rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhed pa// mi phyed phyag rgya sgrub pa po// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba// ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che// mngal bdag bdag la'ang de ltar mdzod// 'khor ba
282a8(rgyud): 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu// bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs// zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dang // ba la che mchog ma dan// bdug pa lha bshos phreng ba dang // dril bu rgyal mtshan byug pa yis// 'di
282b1(rgyud): rnams mchod pa rnams kyis ni// spob mas rdo rje 'dzin par mo// mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob// sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la// ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che// bde ba chen po rnam pa
282b2(rgyud): zung 'ji srid byang chub bar du ni// sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin// slob ma snying rje can mthong nas// rdo rje can gyis 'di skad smras// 'di ni ye shes chen po nyid// thams cad lus la rnam par gan/ 
282b3(rgyud): gnyis dang gnyisu med pa'i tshul// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// brtan dang g.yo ba khyab nas gnas// sgyu ma'i gzugs can nyid du 'dod// dkyil 'kho 'a khor lo'i thabs kyis ni// rtag tu
282b4(rgyud): nges par 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje snying pos rnal 'byor ma rnams la bzod par gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'a dadi skad ces gsol to// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo tsa zhes brjod// 
282b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun bdag grong khyer la// bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas// rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil ni snying po zhes brjod de// byang
282b6(rgyud): chub sems ni bde chen po// dang po mthar byed zhes bya ba// 'dus pa dkyil 'khor nyid du brjod// 'khor lo zhes bya na mkha'i khams// yul la sogs pa rnam par sbyong // bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// de yi bde ba
282b7(rgyud): shes par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// sdom pa zhes bya gang gis dang // dam tshig gang gis gnas par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis srog chags bsad pa dang // 
282b8(rgyud): brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra ba dang // khyod kyis ma byin par yang long // pha rol bud med bsten par gyis// sems gcig srog chags gsod pa nyid// gang phyir srog ni semasu brjod// 'jig rten bsgral pa
283a1(rgyud): / zhes bya ba// brdzun gyi tshig tu rab tu bsgrags// btsun mo'i khu ba ma byin par// gzhan gyi bud med rang mtshungs mdzes// de nas rnal 'byor thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la
283a2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// yul de rnams kyang ci lags// dbang po ni gang lags// skye mched ni ci lags// phung po rnams ni gang lags// khams rnams de yang ci lags// 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin
283a3(rgyud): ni ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yul drug ni// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin nyid// 'di rnams yul ni drug tu ba
283a4(rgyud): dbang po rnams ni drug ste// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid// 'di rnams dbang po drug po ni// gti mu ga rdo rje la sogs ldan// yul dang yul can dag gis ni/ 
283a5(rgyud): skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu 'gyur// phung po lnga ni gzugs la sogs// mthar ni rnam shes snying rje che// dbang po dang ni/ yul nyid dang // dbang po'i rnam par shes pa nyid// rnal
283a6(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams go cha'i phyir// khams ni bco brgyad rnamasu bshad// rang bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa// brdzun min bden min de bzhin du// thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar// 'dod pas rnal 'byor mas
283a7(rgyud): shes kyis// 'di lta ste/ gtsub shing dang gtsub stan dang skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las glo bor du me skye bar 'gyur ro// me 'di ni gtsub shing la yang mi gnas/ gtsub stan la yang ma yin// 
283a8(rgyud): skyes bu'i lag pa dag la yang ma yin te// rnam pa thams cad du yongasu btsal na gcig na yang yod pa ma yin pas me de yang bden pa yang ma yin zhing brdzun pa yang ma yin no// de ltar chos
283b1(rgyud): thams cad rnal 'byor mas yid la gyis shig/ de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa rdo rje mkha'agro ma thams cad bdud rtsi lnga thogs shing dam tshig gi rdzas thogs pas bcom
283b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la mchod par byed// kun tu ru'i sbyor bas rje su chags par byed// bdud rtsi'i lnga'i ro yang 'thung bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas rang byin gyis
283b3(rgyud): brlabs pa bstan pa// kye kye rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa// de nyid bdag gis gsang mdzad pa// rdo rje mchod pa'i byin rlabs kyis// bshad kyis
283b4(rgyud): 'dod pas rab tu nyon// lha mo thams cad dga' bar gyur// rangs/ par gyur te// dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btu
283b5(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan no// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang // bgro/ da dang bgrod min mi spang zhing // khrus dang gtsang sbra mi
283b6(rgyud): ste/ grong gi chos ni rab tu spangs// blo ldan sngags nyid mi bzla zhing // bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya// gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste// dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go/ ba la thams cad bza'
283b7(rgyud): bar bya// kha dog lnga la mnyam par sprad// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// btsun mo thams cad dga' bar ba// mdzab po sdug par mi bya zhing // de bzhin gdug la zhe sdang nyid// rdo shing 'jim
283b8(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid kyi// lha 'di rnams lo phyag mi bya// g.yung mo gdol pa ko lpags mkhan// phyag dar mkhan sogs reg ring dang // bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rmangs rnams// bdag gi lus ltar
284a1(rgyud): // reg pa nyid// bdud rtsi lnga dang bu ram chang // dug dang nim pa bu btsas skyes// skyar dang mngar dang ska la sogs// kha ba lan tshwa tsha ba dang // dri nga dri zhim mchi rnag dang // byang chub sems
284a2(rgyud): kyis rab tu bza'// gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni// mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin// rang byung me tog rnyed nas ni// pad+ma'i snod du bzhag pa dang // lud pa dang ni snabs dag gis// bsres
284a3(rgyud): nas brtul zhugs can gyis btung // smad g.yogs kha dog sna tshogs dang // ro bsregs thal bas de bzhin rgyan// me tog rab song gnas rnyed pas// mgo skyes legs par bcing bar bya// de
284a4(rgyud): nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// thams cad yul gyi rnam dag/ pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis lngar gsungs na// nges par dbang po drug gi grangs// rnam par dag par ma mdzad pa// btsa
284a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mig la gti mug rdo rje ma// rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma// sna la ser sna ma zhes bshad// kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma// lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma// yi/ 
284a6(rgyud): la bdag med rnal 'byor mi// dbang po rnams ni dag bya'i phyir// 'dis ni go cha sems dpa' che// rdo rje snying pos gsol ba// dgongs pa'i skad ni ci zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis nges
284a7(rgyud): gsung gsol// rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che// nyan thos la sogs mi shes pa// dgod dang lta ba dag gis dang // 'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyi// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// dgod
284a8(rgyud): pa'i skad ni ma bsgrags po// bcom ldan nges par gsung du gsol// dgongs pa skad ni skad chen po// dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru// rdo rje snying po ngas bshad kyis// khyod ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon
284b1(rgyud): ma ngan chang ba la sha/ 'du ba ma la ya dza brjod// 'gro ba khe Ta ro ni shra ba// rus pa'i rgyan ni ni ra sha/ 'ong ba pre kha Na ru brjod// cang te kr-i bi ta ru brjod// skal med du du ra zhes brjod// skal lnga/ 
284b2(rgyud): ka liny+dza raM brjod// reg min DiNI ma zhes brjod// thod pa pad+ma b+ha dza naM// bza' ba traM pi ta zhes bya// tshe de ma mA la tIn+t+ra naM// bshang ba tsa tu sa ma brjod// gci ba ka stu ri zhes brjod// rang byung si h+la ra
284b3(rgyud): par bya// khu ba ka pu ra zhes brjod// sha chen sha li dza zhes brjod// dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru// rdo rje bo la zhes bshad de// pad+ma kak+ko la zhes zer// kha dog dbye bas phye ba las// rigs ni rnam
284b4(rgyud): ba lnga ru bshad// 'di ni gsang ba'i skad yin no// phyag rgya la ni bsdus pa nyid// g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigasu bshad// gam de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs// rang 'tshed ma ni rin chen rigs// 
284b5(rgyud): skyes gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod// chos ma las kyi rigs nyid de// phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub sbyin// 'di rnams khu bu ba rdo rjer 'gyur// brtul zhugs can
284b6(rgyud): gyos mchod nas btung // rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che// gsang ba'i skad ni mtshar che ba// nga yis khyod la gang bshad po// de rnams thams cad gus pas zung // kye rdo rje 'dir dbang bskur ga
284b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i skad kyis mi smra ba// de yi dam tshig nyams par ni// 'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med// 'tshe ba dang ni rkun ma dang // gdon dang rims dang dug gis kyang // gal te sangs rgyas gsang ba'i sra/ 
284b8(rgyud): mi gsung na yang 'grongs par 'gyur// rang gi dam tshig rigs rnyed na// gal te tshig 'di mi smra ba// gnas bzhi las skyes rnal 'byor ma// de yi tshen khro bar byed// kye'i rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dra ba'i
285a1(rgyud): / sdom pa las rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang ba'i skad ces bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i rdo rje ma' 'gro ma thams cad the tsom
285a2(rgyud): du gyur// yid gnyis su gyur te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das the tsom gsal du gsol/ sprod pa'i le'u las gang bshad pa// glu dang gar ni/ 
285a3(rgyud): dngos grub sbyin// de la bdag ni the tsom mchis// gla ni ci lags gar kyang ci// lha'i le'u las gang gsungs pa// zhe sdang la sogs phyag rgya rnams// de la bdag ni the tshom mchis// gang gi phyag rgya
285a4(rgyud): phyag rgya ci// sngags btu ba las gang gsungs pa// bdag medal sogs sa bon nyid// de la bdag ni 'khrul bar 'gyur// // gang gi sa bon sa bon gang // rigs kyi le'u las gang bshad
285a5(rgyud): paHbcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtsa// bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas// de rnams rnam dag bshad du gas la// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// kol+la i re TI a
285a6(rgyud): bo lA mum+ma Na ra kak+ko la/ g+ha Na ki bi Ta ho bAdz+nyA i ka ru Ne ki a i na ro lA/ ta haM ba la khadz+dza i ga De ma a Na bidz+nyA i a ai/ ha laM kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i dung+ku ra badz+rI sa i/ tsi u sa ma kAts+tsha ri sih+la/ 
285a7(rgyud): kab+hU ra lA i a i/ mA la i in+d+ra Na shA liny+dza ta hi b+ha ru khA i a i/ pe kha Na khe Ta ka ran+te shud+d+ha shud+d+he na mu Ni a i/ ni ra shu aM gi tsa TA wi ti ha dza sa rA ba ba Ni a i/ ma la ya dze ku nA ru bA Ta/ 
285a8(rgyud): i DiN+Di ma hir+N+Na bA dzI a i// dran pa ni 'phrogs rnal 'byor pas// he ru ka'i gzugs kyis gar// chags bral min goms sems kyis ni// 'dod chags sems kyis sgom pa nyid// rdo rje
285b1(rgyud): chos dang sangs rgyas dang // rnal 'byor ma dang ma mo yis// glu dang gar ni 'di dag gis// legs par glu blang gar kyang bya// 'di nyid kyis ni tshogs srung zhing // de bzhin bdag kyang srung ba nyid// 
285b2(rgyud): 'dis ni 'jig rten dbang du byed// 'dis ni sngags kyis bzlas pa nyid// gang du gus pas glu len dang // gang du gus bcas gar byed pa// tshogs kyi bdag pos sngar byas nas// de la dri ni maH/ 
285b3(rgyud): par bya// sgog pa'i dri ni dang po nyid// de nas yang ni bya rgod dri// ga bur ma la yang dza nyid// ngang pa dang ni bung ba'i sgra// glu yi mtha' nas mnyan par bya// ba lang 'tshe yi sgra yang ni// phyi rol tshal du
285b4(rgyud): mtshon bya ba// glu yi byin rlabs mtshan nyid do// phyag rgya rtag sa dang mtshan ma ste// 'dis ni rigs ni mtshon par bya// // rigs 'chol sgom pa'i sbyor ba las// dngos grub med
285b5(rgyud): cing sgrub bo'ang med// zhe sdang phyag rgyas bdag med ma// gti mug phyag rgyas rdo rje ma// se ra sna'i phyag rgyas do/ kar mo nyid// chags pas chu ma phyag rgyas gdab// phrag de/ 
285b6(rgyud): phyag rgyas mkha' grem// zhe sdang phyag rgya puk+ka si// gti mug phyag rgyas r-i khrod ma// ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdol pa mo// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g.yung mo nyid// yang ni dkar mo zhe sdang las/ 
285b7(rgyud): gti mug phyag rgyas chom rkun ma// ser sna'i phyag rgyas ro langs ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g+hasma rI// gti mug phyag rgyas sa spyod ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas mkha' spyod ma// 'dod
285b8(rgyud): bas phyag rgyar shes par bya// a li dang po bdag med ma// a li gnyis pa rdo rje mo// a li gsum pa dkar mo nyid// bzhi pa chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lnga pa rdo rje mkha'agro mo// drug pa buk+ka/ 
286a1(rgyud): // sI zhes brjod// bdun pa nyid ni ri khrod ma// brgyad pa sme sha can du brjod// dgu pa yang ni g.yung mo nyid// yang ni lnga gnyis dkar mo nyid// bcu gcig chom rkun pa zhes pan/ 
286a2(rgyud): bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes brjod// bcu gsum pa ni g+hasma ri// bcu bzhi pa ni sa spyod ma// bco lnga pa ni mkha' spyang ma// rnal 'byor ma yi sa bon nyid// rigs kyi le'u las rtsa rnams gang / bcu drug
286a3(rgyud): gnyis kyi bdag nyid gsungs// rtswa ni gnyis rnal 'byor ma// re re rnam pa gsum du brjod// brkyang ma ro ma kun 'dar ma// bdag med rnal 'byor ma zhes brjod// gang phyir bcu drug cha med pas// 
286a4(rgyud): 'bad pas kun gyi lha ma spangs// ci'i slad du zhe na/ don gyi bya ba mi daphyed phyir// bco lnga'i cha yi bdag nyid kyi// zla ba byang chub semasu 'gyur// bde ba chen po a le'i gzugs// rnal
286a5(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams de yi cha// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// rnal 'byor ma/ kun las byung ba// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nyid// 'grib med btung mchog na mkha' nyid// ga pur nges pa
286a6(rgyud): cis mi spang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// thabs gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
286a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs dang ni// rang byin rlab pa'i rim pas kyang // kun rdzob don dam gzugs can gyi// byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed// kun rdzob kun da lta bu nyid// don
286a8(rgyud): dam bde ba'i gzugs can no// bud med k+ko la bde ba can/ e baM rnam pa'i rang bzhin du// bde bsrung ba nyid kyi phyir// bde ba can zhes rab tu bsgrags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rdo rje
286b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas// 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste// 'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid// 'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni// mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur// 'khor ba gzugs dang sbrul/ 
286b2(rgyud): sogs// 'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa// 'khor ba dbang po rnams nyid do// 'khor ba zhe sdang la sogs pa// 'di rnams chos ni mya ngan 'das// rmongs phyir 'khor ba'i gzugs can nyid// rmongs
286b3(rgyud): med 'khor ba dag pas ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni mya ngan 'das// kun rdzob don dam tshul can no// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang tshor na
286b4(rgyud): par rgyan// sngo bsangs dal la rigs bzang ma// si h+la ga pura'aM dbyung ba'i gnas// rang gis dbang bskur kye'i rdo rje// skra dbazang sgrub pa po la dga'// de yi chang yang btung bar bya// 
286b5(rgyud): de nas rang yang btung bar bya// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir// phyi nas phyag rgya rjes chags bya// bo le kak+ko lar bcug nas// kun tu ru byed brtul zhugs can// der ni sbyar
286b6(rgyud): ba las byung ba'i// ga pur mkhas pas mi spangs te/ de ni lag tu mi blang zhing // nyo phyis dung chos nyid du min// nges par blo dang stobs kyi phyir// mi 'chi lce yis blang ba nyid// bur nyid ni bdag med pa/  / 
286b7(rgyud): med tshul can nyid// de yi bde ba phyag rgya che// lta ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas// dang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin te// blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i
286b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor las// de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma// de ni ring min thung ba min// gru bzhi ma yin zlum po min// dri dang ro dang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa can// de las skyes pa'i rnam
287a1(rgyud): 'byor pas// de yi bde ba myong ba nyid// de dang lhan cig phyag rgya che// bde ba sbyin pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro rang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi
287a2(rgyud): dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang // shes rab nyid kyis dpyad par bya// de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs// bde chen bza' bo'i rnal 'byor ma// de nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // ye shes lnga yi
287a3(rgyud): rang bzhin can// de ni me long ye shes gzugs// mnyam nyid ye shes dngos po can// yang dag gyur pa so sor rtog/ de nyid bya ba nan tan te// chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag ma// de nyid dkyil 'khor
287a4(rgyud): bdag pong // de nyid bdag med rnal 'byor ma// chos kyi dbyings dkyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// 'khor lo bsgoms pa'i lam dang ni// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// 
287a5(rgyud): thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsungs na// sdom pa yang dag bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa/ pa// rnal 'byor ma yi lus dbus su// a yi rnam pa'i sngo
287a6(rgyud): pa gnas// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang // sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye// bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje skye mched thabs chen nyid// 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas// phyi rol gnyis ni bstan tu med// 
287a7(rgyud): sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis brjod par bya// sku gsum yongasu shes pa ni// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor brjod// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // de bzhin du yang bde
287a8(rgyud): chen nyid// skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bor yang // sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas// ma lus pa yi sems can gyi// skye ba gang la brjod par bya// gang phyir sprul pa ga nas brtan phyir// lte ba sprul pa
287b1(rgyud): gnas brtan phyir// gang gis bskyed dang sprul byed pa'i// sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod// sems ni chos kyi rang bzhin te// chos kyi sku yang snying khar 'gyur// ro rnams drug gi gzugs can gyi// 
287b2(rgyud): bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod// ma grin par longs spyod 'khor lo'o// spyi bor bde ba chen po gnas// e ba rnam par rgyu'i thun nyid// rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las// long spyod skyes
287b3(rgyud): bu'i byed pa nyid// bde ba'i 'khor lo dri med nyid// rgyu 'thun sogs par rab phye ba'o// 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis// las la bcom ldan shes rab spyod// 
287b4(rgyud): ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod// rgyu 'thun zhes ni rab tu bsgrags // las chung 'bras bu phye ba'i phyir// rnam par smin pa de de las bzlog/ rnal 'byor dag phyir dri med de nyid// bskyed pa skyes
287b5(rgyud): bu byed pa nyid// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas brtan nyid// chos kyi smra ba 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lor thams cad yod// gang phyir mgron
287b6(rgyud): par kun bskur phyir// longs spyod 'khor lor kun bku ra nyid// gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas pas// bde ba'i 'khor lor dge 'dun che// sde ba zhes bya sku ru brjod// lto ba gnasu brjod par bya// skye
287b7(rgyud): gnas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur// mngal gyi khru ma chos gos nyid// de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid// mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas// sngags kyi bzlas pa a dang ha~M// 
287b8(rgyud): skyes gnas 'khor lo'i rnam pa a// bde chen gyi yang rnam pa ha// gcer bu sgra dang kha spu bregs// sngags 'don skyes po dge slong nyid// 'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams// sangs rgyas nyid du the/ 
288a1(rgyud): // com med// zla ba bcu yangs rnams yin// sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad la/ 'di lta ste spyan dang / mAm/ 
288a2(rgyud): ki dang / gos dkar mo dang / spros ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / tsun dA dang / pat+ta ra khrod ma dang / 'og zhal ma dang / de dag la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor
288a3(rgyud): ma rnams tshig 'di dag zas nas mchog tu mtshar du gyur cing ba rgyal ba dang / skrag pa dang / sal 'gyel ba dang / 'dar bar gyur to// yang rdo rje can gyis lha med rnams thams cad la gzigs
288a4(rgyud): nas bsnang ba'i phyir yang dag par bstod gas dang chu rlung byin/ yi// lha mo snang can khyed nyid la/ gang zhig sus kyang mi shes pa// de nyidang yis sgro mos nyon// bcom ldan 'das kyi
288a5(rgyud): gsung rmi lam lto bu nye bar thos nas de rnams thams cing sa garnyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa/ pa/ sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid// 'on kyang glo ba
288a6(rgyud): drims bsgribs// de nyid bas pa na sangs rgyas nyid// lha mos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ de yang ma mangs shing brdzun pa yang ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar
288a7(rgyud): sprul pa// gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa// bcan du gzos pas brgyal bar 'gyur// rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni// de yis de nyid yong su gcod// de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing // 
288a8(rgyud): '-i'i rje ngam bsos nas// ma rig sogs pas mi 'dzin cing// gti mug la sags 'tshang bas mas// rang dang rang gis rtogs pa las// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni// gcig kya
288b1(rgyud): yod pa ma yin no// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song dang // lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa// lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang // bde ba gang phyir mi shes pa// rtag tu rang bzhi
288b2(rgyud): bde ba can// 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang // sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur// sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med// gdol pa smin mkhan la
288b3(rgyud): sogs pa// gsod don don du sems pa po// de rnams kye rdo rjer shes na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa// 'di yi bgrod po mi shes pa// 'gro ba drug gi srid
288b4(rgyud): pa'i mthar// gang zhig rmongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur// rdo rje da snying pa snying rje che// kye'i rdo rje'i thabs rnyed pas// gang de zhig yul rnams rnam sbyong ba// de ni bla med rnyed par 'gyur// 
288b5(rgyud): snying pos gsol pa// sa ni puk+ka sIr bshad pa// gang phyir/ gti mug sra ba nyid// sku ni rnam snang nyid gsungs pa// ji ltar mi bskyod phyag rgya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 
288b6(rgyud): sprul pa// sems spangs nas ni lus kyis ni// mdzes po gzhan du mi 'gyur// de phyir rnam par snang mdzad sems// sku la thugs kyi phyag rgya so gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ chu khams ri
288b7(rgyud): khrod mar bshad pa// mi bskyod khu ba'i gzugs can nyid// gtso bo mi bskyod phyag rgyas ni// ri khrod ma la phyag rgya rigs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lus spangs nas ni sems
288b8(rgyud): kyis ni// gnas pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur// de phyir sems ni gti mug 'gyur// thugs la gti mug phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol ba// me ni gdol pa mor bshad pa// 'dod cha/ 
289a1(rgyud): / phyag rgyas gdol pa mo// rigs te phyag rgya gzhan min na// ji ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang phyir 'dod chags khrag bshad pa/
