289a2(rgyud): khrag ni rin chen 'byung gnas nyid// drod ni khrag gi rang bzhin phyir// 'dod chags ser sna phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol ba// gang phyir g.yung mo rlung nyid de// don yod rlung gi gzugs
289a3(rgyud): can nyid// don yod phyag rgyas g.yung mo la// gtso bo phyag rgya rigs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dag ni// gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin te// 
289a4(rgyud): de phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis// mkhas pas g.yung mo phyag rgyas gdab// gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid// dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid// sngar gsungs nyid kyi
289a5(rgyud): rim pa yis// sems kyi bdag po phyag rgyas gdab// de nyid rim pas chom rkun ma// de bzhin ro langs ma nyid dang / de la rigs pas g+hasma rI// ma log pa las phyag rgya'o// 
289a6(rgyud): rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// snyoms 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la// sems can don phyir gtor ma che// de la bdag med mas zhus pas// e ba rnam par bzhugs nas ni// bgegs dang log par 'dren
289a7(rgyud): pa las// sems can rnams kyi srog srung phyir// rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan// oM in+d+ra dza ma dza la dza kA b+hu daM ba hI bA u rak+Sha/ tsan+da sud+d+ha med bA bA ta la pA tA le aT+TA sap+pa sA hA/ aM/ 
289a8(rgyud): daM pa li b+huny+dza dzaM g+ha pulA d+hU ba mAM sa ba~M g+ha/ oM b+ha ka dz+nyA sap+pa sA da khan+ti khu Ni pe Da gA da// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nut+pan+na ta ta oM eHhUM phaT swA hA// gang gi tshe 'dir gtor mas 'bru/ 
289b1(rgyud): po thams cad mchod par byed na rnal 'byor pa rnams legs par 'gyur te// de rnams la bde ba dri ma med pa dang // lha mo rnams dang / 'gro ba rab tu 'byor pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// 
289b2(rgyud): gal te 'dir 'byung po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag tu gtor ma byin na dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgra'i sde 'jigs pa dang / bskrad pa dang / bsad pa dang / dgug pa dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas par yang
289b3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ phyag rgya gang gis mkha' spyod ma// gang gis phyog rgyas sa spyod ma// gtso bo bdag gis sder ma 'tshal// bcom ldan ji ltar phyag rgya bgyi// bcom ldan 'ad
289b4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang gsum 'khor lo'i dbusu ni/ sku gsung thugasu phye ba las// steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas pa'i// 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas// sa spyo
289b5(rgyud): sku yi phyag rgya can// stang zhal sku yi rdo rje ma// mkha' spring 'dod chags phyag rgya can// 'og zhal gsung gi rje rje ma/ thugs kyi rdo rje bdag med ma/ sems ni bdag med tshul
289b6(rgyud): can nyid// sems ni dbus kyi gan su ste// des na bdag med ma dbus skye// rgyas par rab tu phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod// rnam gsum rnam pa lnga nyid kyang // bshad kyis
289b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma nyid nyon// mi bskyod rnam snang rin chen 'byung // dpag mo de phrag dog rdo rje sems// zhe sdang gti mug sar sna dang // 'dod chags phrag dog bde ba dag/ 'dis ni rim pas skom
289b8(rgyud): banyid// rdo rje sems dpa' spangs nas ni// phyi nas rigs ni rnam pa lnga// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis// de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// mi bskyod zhe sdang gzugs can gyi// thugs kyi/ 
290a1(rgyud): bdag po rig gcig nyi// zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di// rigs ni drug dang lnga ru brjod// kye'i rdo rje las rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya ba'i
290a2(rgyud): le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhab sa bzhi pa dang 'jigs pa po// dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can// bdag med mas ni mgule nas 'khyud// phyag rgya lnga ni
290a3(rgyud): 'dzin lha la// bdag med ma ni nyid kyis zhus// bco lngas yongasu bskor ba yi// bdag gis 'khor lo khyod bshad na// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma
290a4(rgyud): 'tshal// bdag med tsum b+ha ni mdzad nas// rdo rje thod pa sprul nas ni// lha yi num mnyes mdzad de// dkyil 'khor yang dag rab tu dbye// 'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa/ 
290a5(rgyud): do shal do shal phyed pas rgyan// mtshams bzhi pa la sgo ba zhi ba// rdo rje srad pus yang dag rgyan// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes tshogs pas// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang
290a6(rgyud): bzhin las// khyod dang lhan cig bzhin bzang ma// de la dbus su nga yod de// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// phyag ni bcu drug dag gis rgyan// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid// 
290a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa po// mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal mdzad// nyi mar bzhags shing rol mor bcas// kha dog nag po 'jigs papo// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// nyid
290a8(rgyud): kyi zhal nas hUM spro zhing // thal bas lus la byugs pa nyid// bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing // dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas// dba' rlabs mod pa'i bde ba thog
290b1(rgyud): rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin can// rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che// g.yas pa la ni kun dmatshungs// g.yon pa dmar zhing char 'jigs pa// spyi bo'i zhal ni gtsigs pa can// spyan ni// 
290b2(rgyud): shu rtsa bzhi che// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin// grong khyer nyams dga' khyod dang ngo // dga' bas shin tu rol pa las// dkar mo dbang gi phyogs phyung nas// shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas
290b3(rgyud): srub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las// chom rkun ma yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas lho yi sgo ru ni// chom rkun ma ni sgro srung ma// bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// ro longs ma yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas nub
290b4(rgyud): kyi sgo ru ni// bdud 'joms ma ni rnam par gnas// dga' ba chen po'i snyoms 'jug las// g+hasma rI ya phyug nas ni// phyung nas byang gi sgo la ni// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can
290b5(rgyud): ma nyid gnas// gnyis kyis bskyed pa'i sbyor ba las// puk+ka/ sI yang phyung na ni/ byang dang ldan mtshamasu ni// drage po'i ga thugs can ma nyid gnas// yang ni srub pa'i sbyor ba yis// 
290b6(rgyud): 'tshed pa'i mtsham su ri khrod ma// srin po'i mtsham su gdol ba mo// rlung gi mtsham su g.yung mo nyid// de nas rdo rje chags chen las// rig mar bcas pa khu bar 'gyur// sna tshogs klu yi
290b7(rgyud): mchod pa las// de nas lha mo rnams kyis bskul// rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig/ puk+ka sI ni bdag la stobs// stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhe
290b8(rgyud): mdzod// khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas// kye'i rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spangs la// ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod// dga' gtso 'jig rten 'gron gnyer ba// 
291a1(rgyud): stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci// khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas// gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid// bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis// mig 'phrul mnga'
291a2(rgyud): ba khyod bzhengs shig/ g.yung mo bdag ni dran nyams pas// snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig/ glang po rta bong glang rnga mo// mi dang shar b+ha byi la// g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la// gnyis 'thu
291a3(rgyud): la sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang zla ba nyi ma nyid// mthar byed dang ni nor sprin nyid// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa// dgod cing drag shal
291a4(rgyud): 'jigs rung ba// snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba yis// gar dgu'i ro/ dang ldan pa nyid// aM dang hU~M gis rdo rje che// khu ba'i gtudags las bzhengs nas ni// zhabs rnams sa la rdebs pa
291a5(rgyud): dang / lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad// ga tsa baM g+haM baM shaM laM Da// 'di yi sa bon phyung ba dang // bdag po'i sa bon dang ga gis ni// aM hUM sngon po 'bar 'jigs pas// ma mo'i
291a6(rgyud): 'khor lo grong nyams dgar// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po// bdag med bde ba sbyin pa po// gtso bo 'di ltar sgom pa nyid// dkar mo g.yas na gri gog ste// de bzhin g.yon na ro ha ta// chos
291a7(rgyud): rkun ma g.yas cang te'u ste// g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa nyid// ro langs ma g.yas ru sbal te// g.yon pa yis ni pad+ma'i snod// g+hasma rI yi g.yas na sbrul// g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung
291a8(rgyud): bzeng nyid// bak+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste// g.yon pas dgra sta de bzhin no// ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste// g.yon pas gsil byed de bzhin no// gdol pa mo g.yas 'khor lo ste// g.yon/ 
291b1(rgyud): pas thod pa de bzhin no// g.yung mo g.yas na rdo rje nyid// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub de bzhin no// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas// dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyis brjod// spyan gsum sku
291b2(rgyud): ni gyen du ste// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// gau rI la dog nag por 'gyur// chom rkun ma ni btsod dang mtshungs// ro langs ma ni gser bcos bzhin// g+hasma rI ni mar gang mtshungs// puk+ka swA
291b3(rgyud): ni dbang sngon mtshams// ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od// gtum mo na mkha'i sngo bsangs ma// g.yung mo sna tshogs pa zhes brjod// tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag/ gshin rje dang ni nor bdag dang // 
291b4(rgyud): bden bral dang ni thags bzang ris// gau rI la sogs pa'i gdan// bo la gzhib par mdzad nas ni// dam du 'khyud ni dang 'o mdzad pas// bcom ldan gus pas mchod nas ni// bdag
291b5(rgyud): med ma yis sngags zhus so// bud med rnams kyi dbang byed snga gas// de bzhin gdug pa bsdigs pa dang // klu rnams bsdigs par byed pa nyid// lha dang lha min rnam nyed pa// de ni
291b6(rgyud): yis bshad pa yis// lha mo bde ba sbyin ma nyon// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// bdag gis gzhan du ma bstan no// 'di yi sngags kyis gong byung dang // rdo rje sems dpas gang mdzad pa/ 
291b7(rgyud): lha mo shin tu 'jigs pa ste// ngo mi tshogs pas khyod la bshad// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug pa yis// dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni// rdo rje snying po dbang sbyin phyir// thig le mchog ni bkug
291b8(rgyud): pa nyid// bzlas pa khri yid gsal ba dang // skra ring ba dang bzang ba yis// kye'i rdo rje sbyor ldan pas// btsun mo thams cad dgug par bya// bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag/ kye'i rdo rje'i rnal
292a1(rgyud): / 'byor gyis// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// 'di yis las rnams thams cad byed// rigs byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin// zla phyed thig les rnam par rgyan// de nas/ oM aR+tha nan/ 
292a2(rgyud): ya bi ga ur+d+ha ke sha bar+t+ta ne/ tsa tu rbi sha ti ne tA ya/ de'i rje su Sho Da Sha b+hu dzA ya/ kriSh+Ta dzI mU ta wa pu She kau bA la mA lA ne ka d+ha ri Ne/ A d+hA ta krU ra tsit+ta ya ar+d+hen dudaSh+Ti Ne/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ye kI
292a3(rgyud): ra ya/ gar+dz+dza ya gar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sap+ta sA ga rAn/ ban+d+ha b+hA na gASh+Ta kaM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sha truM/ ha hA hi hI/ hu hU/ he he/ hi ho/ he haHphaT swA hA/ de nas lha mo de dgyes nas// srub
292a4(rgyud): dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las// dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas// dkyil 'khor yid du 'ong ba zhes// de la ston pa ye shes che// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mnyamags
292a5(rgyud): pas/ nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzad// 'phar ma gcig/ dang sgo bzhi pa// sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag 'khru/ gas// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje srid bus mnya
292a6(rgyud): par rgyan// ra khA lnga dang yang dag ldan// de nas bum pas rgyad po bri// rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras la sogs pa yis// dur khrod kyi ni so phag gam// de bzhin dur khrod sol ba ldi/ 
292a7(rgyud): de dbus pad+ma mdab ma ni// brgyad pa ze bar bcas pa bri// snying por skyes pa'i thod pa nyid// mdog dkar cha ni gsum pa bri// dbang ldan dri sha ra bya// me yi mtsham su dge slong bri// bden bral du ni
292a8(rgyud): 'khor lo bre// rlung du rigs kyi bdag po bri// shar sgor de bzhin gri gug nyid/ lho ru cang te'u bri ba nyid// nub tu ru sbal bri ba nyid// lto 'phye byang du de bzhin no// lha mo kha/ 
292b1(rgyud): dog dbye ba yis// phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags// dbus su thod pa dkar po yang // sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri// de nas rnam rgyal bum pa nyid// yal ga'i rtse mo gos bzang can// lto ba/ 
292b2(rgyud): rin chen lngas gang ba// sa lu skyes pas yongs bkang bzhag/ mang du rab tu brjod pas ci// ji ltar de nyid bsdus pa yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga de bzhin bya// bcu gnyis brgyad gnyis lon pa yi// 
292b3(rgyud): rig ma bde chen brgyad po nyid// do shal rkang gdub kyis rgyan nas// dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu gzhug/ ma deng sring mo nyid dang yang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang // de bzhin zhang po'i chung ma dang // 
292b4(rgyud): ma yi spun dang sgyug mo dang // de bzhin pa yi sring mo nyid// rig ma brgyad du rab tu grags// dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed dpas// 'di rnams rnal 'byor pa yis mchod// de las ga
292b5(rgyud): bur btung ba nyid// des ni dkyil 'khor btang gtor bya// de na mas rnal 'byor pas btung bya// dngos grub myur du tho par 'gyur// de la chang yang btung ba dang // sha dang sa lu skyes
292b6(rgyud): pa bza'// de yang gos dang bral byas nas// b+ha gar 'o ni yang yang byed// des kyang po la bzhipa par bya// gar bya glu yang blang bar bya// blo la kak+ko la sbyar nas// de la rtsed mo rtse bar bya// de nas thun
292b7(rgyud): tshod gnyis pa la// gos kyis mig ni bkab na su// der ni slob ma gzhug pa nyid// phyi nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan// mtshan mo skye bo med khyim du// slob dpon la sogs rab phye nas// dbang
292b8(rgyud): ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// de la dbang ni sbyin par bya// ji ltar mchod dang bstod pa// slob ma bzang po sngar shes bya// de la de nyid bstan pa ni// dge' bral dang po mchog mthar can// thad rgyu/ 
293a1(rgyud): du sbas pa ste// mtha' yi mtha' yis phye ba nyid// rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas// de la lha mo des zhus pa// de'i skad cig ji ltar lags// gtso bo chen po bshad du
293a2(rgyud): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med// srid med mya ngan 'das pa med// 'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid// bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid// 
293a3(rgyud): long sprod bani rlabs gnyis la// rang gi g.yas dang lag gzhan gyi// mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis// de ni rnal 'byor pa yis btsir// de nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur// de las ci zhig skye zhe na/ 
293a4(rgyud): / gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta 'am// lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta ba'o// // mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral dbus// stod dang da stong min he ru ka kye'i rdo rdzalas kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya'i la'u
293a5(rgyud): ste lnga pa'o// // lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing // bo la thod par bcug nas ni// dam du nu ma gzung mdzad nas// skye sa pa'i sna ni gzhibs nas kyang // tshems kyis ma mchu bci
293a6(rgyud): nas ni// mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de// mnyam sbyor bde ba myang mdzad nas// phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba// bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la// phyag 'tshal don du 'khor lo 'dzin// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin
293a7(rgyud): ba la// smon tshig mi nyan pa yi phyir// rna ba dag tu rna cha 'dzin// sngags kyis bzlas pa'ang mgul rgyan nyid// gdub bu srog chags gsod pa spangs// phyag rgya snyeng ba ske rags nyid// sa / 
293a8(rgyud): rgyas lnga yi phyag rgyas ni// rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab// de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas// tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba// lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can
293b1(rgyud): nyid de la lha mo des zhus pa// gtso bo tshig gang gis dang // de bzhin bya ba gang gis ni// kye'i rdo rje'i bris sku yi// byed pa bde ba chen pos gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 
293b2(rgyud): 'dir ni 'dri mkhan dam tshig can// sgrub po'ang dam tshig can gyis ni// bris sku 'jigs pa bri ba nyid// skyes pa'i thod gnas kha dog lnga/ ro yi skra yi bir nyid kyis// bris sku bla ma bri ba nyid// 
293b3(rgyud): gang gang skud pa mkhal ba dang // gang gang ras yug ma thag pa yang // de yang dam tshig can nges pas// dam tshig byin rlabs rnal 'byor las// zla ba zla ba'i mar ngo yi// bcu bzhi pa la khyim dben
293b4(rgyud): bar/ phyed na ma rungs sems kyis ni// chang gi btung ba cung za da las// lus la ni raM shu bsams nas// de bzhin gca dar bur gyur pas kyang // 'phags pa dang ni ma dag pas// de nas
293b5(rgyud): dam tshig rab tu bza'// bzhin bzang snying rje ldan pa dang // gtsu gas dang lang tsho skal bzang ma// me tog bcas shing sgrub por dga'// rang gi phyag rgya g.yon du bzhag/ kye'i rdo rje
293b6(rgyud): las bris sku cho ga'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas de la lha mos zhus// bo la kak+ko la sbyar nas// tshems kyi ma mchu btsir nas ni// glegs bam yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam
293b7(rgyud): sbyar nas// dgyes pas lha yis rab phye ba// glegs bam nga yis bshad bya yis// lha mo skal ba chen mo nyon// sbrang chen snag tsha byas nas ni// mi yi rus pa'i smug gus ni// glegs bam sor
293b8(rgyud): ni bcu gnyis pa// gro gar dam tshig can gyis bri// glegs bam dang ni bros sku nyid// gal te skal med mthong na ni// skye ba 'dir ni dngos grub med// 'jig rte na pha rol spyod yul med// 5ya
294a1(rgyud): // dag rab sbyin ldan pa la// res 'ga' tsam zhig bstan pa nyid// glegs bam lam gyi spyod yul du// skra dang mtshan khung nyid du sgra// bla gang ling ga rab bzhag nas// 
294a2(rgyud): dang yang du'o mdzad nas// bodade chen mnyam par myang mdzad de// rdo rje can gyis bza' ba bstan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bza' ba ni// nyon cig lha ma mag yangs ma// gang du zos pas 'dod
294a3(rgyud): don kun// sgrub pa can gyis dngos grub 'gyur// dur khrod ri yi bya skyabs dang // de bzhin mi med grong khyer dang // yang na dben pa 'am rgya mtsho'i mtha'// bza' ba 'di ni rab tu bza'// de la
294a4(rgyud): gdan du brtag pa ni// ro yi gzugs can dgu dang ni// ya dang ni stag gi lpags pa dang // dur khrod ras ni bzhin// / dbus su kye'i rdo rje'i gzugs// ji ltar sngar bzhin gnas
294a5(rgyud): shes nas// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu yang // de nasarnal 'byor ma rnams dgod// dam tshig mA la tin+t+ra na/ stag gi lpags pa'i steng du bza'// 'bad nas rgyal po
294a6(rgyud): sa lu yi// bza' ba der ni bza' ba nyid// der ni bza' ba zos nas yang // der ni ma mo mchod par bya// sring mo bu mo rgyug mo dang // gal te ma sring yin na yang // de rnams rtag tu leg
294a7(rgyud): mchod na// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur// skyes pa'i thod chen cha gcig par// chang ni bzang pos yongs bkang ste// bla ma la dbul skal chen ma// phyag mtshan nas ni ra
294a8(rgyud): yang btung // pad+ma'i lag pas blang ba dang // de nyid kyi ni lago bas dbul// yang nas yang du rab 'dud pa// de ltar bsgrub pa po yis bya// kye'i rdo rje las bza' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// 
294b1(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor mas zhus pa// phyag chen po ji lta bu// kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// bde ba sbyin pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// shin tu ring min
294b2(rgyud): thung ba man// gnag pa ma yin dkar ba min// pad+ma'i mdab ma'i rnam pa 'dra// da yi dbugs ni dri zhim ldan// rdul kyang dri zhim ldan 'gyur te// ri dgas lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs// pad+ma la yang
294b3(rgyud): dbang mchog dri// skad cig pad+ma lta bur 'byung // de yi ga pur si hA dag/ mkhas pas dri bzang mtshon par bya// ut+pa la yi drir 'gyur zhing // a ga ru ni nag po mtshungs// dal zhing mi g.yo ba nyid
294b4(rgyud): dang / snyan par smra zhing yid 'ong ma// skra bzang dbusu gnye dar ma gsum// phal bas pad+ma can du brjod// lhan cig/ skyes pa'i gzugs can ma// de snyed nas ni dngos grub 'gyur// 
294b5(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med mas gsol ba// bcom lda na 'das smon lam ji ltar gdab par bgyi// bcom ldan 'ongs kyis bka' stsal pa// rigasu skye dang dam tshig can// sgra
294b6(rgyud): med kye'i rdo rje ston// bla ma la gus snying rjes ldan// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ las pas rdo rje dril bu 'khrol// zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang / btsun mo'i khu bo mnyam zas can// skye
294b7(rgyud): zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ de nas lha mo de dgyes naso// tshi ga ni 'di nyid yang zhus pa// skal med sems can gdul dka' ba// gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das// 
294b8(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya// de rjes bslab pa'i gan sa bcu nyid// de la bye brag smra ba bstan// mdo sde pa yang de bzhino// de nas rnam 'byor spyod pa nyid// de yi rjesu
295a1(rgyud): / dbu ma bstan// sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas// de rjes kye'i rdo rje brtsam// slob mas gus pas blangs nas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// kye'i rdo rje las 'dul ba'i
295a2(rgyud): le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas kha sbyar 'byad pa yi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i rtsa ba
295a3(rgyud): la/ burtul zhugs can gyis lag pas gdon// he ru ka mnyam rnal 'byor gyis// nang gi ma rungs sems kyis ni// 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas kyang ni nge sa par 'jig/ bsta/ 
295a4(rgyud): la gnod pa byed pa dang // bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig pa ni// bla ma thub pa la zhus nas// snying rjes bsad par bya ba nyid// da ltar phyugs kyi gzugs mthong nas// khrag ni skyug pa nyid dang / 
295a5(rgyud): yang // 'dar zhing mgo skyes grol ba dang // kha ni 'og tu rnam pa ra sgom// de yi lam du khab ni me'i// gzugs can 'a/ jug par bsam pa ste// snying khar byin za'i sa bon nyid// dmig/ 
295a6(rgyud): nas skad cig gsod par byed// rgyud 'di la ni sreg blugs med// phyag rgya bcing dang bya ba'ang med// rgyud chen bklags pas 'grub pa nyid// bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rtog med
295a7(rgyud): dngos grub sbyin pa po// srid pa sbyong ba nyams dga' bar// gsang ba mchog ni bshad bya yis// nyon cig lha mo bzhin bzang ma// rin chen gzi brjid 'bar ba yi// phreng ba 'khrugs pa lha mo ltos// 
295a8(rgyud): mjug pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur// phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa'o// de ltar 'khor bar 'dod pa yi// yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid// mdag pas ni dug du 'gro// dag pas bdud rtsil bur 'gyur/ 'a
295b1(rgyud): ba'i rnam pa he ruka/ 'gro ba sgrol pa'i gtso bo nyid// gang gis gzugs kyi 'gyur ba nyid// de ni nga yis sgra yis nyon// snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la// byams pa'i thugs las yan lag gnag/

295b3(rgyud): khro ba nyid// sha ni puk+ka sI ru brjod// de bzhin khrag ni ri khrod ma// gdol ba mo ni khu bar brjod// g.yung mo rkang dang tshil bu dag/ lpags pa byang chub yan lag bdun// rus pa bden pa bzhi pa nyid
295b4(rgyud): bdag med mas gsol pa// sngags btu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur// // gang gi sngags kyis skye bo yi// las kyi dngos 'grub 'a gyur pa nyid// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan/ 
295b5(rgyud): 'das rdo rje can chen po rdo rje snying po gzi brjid chen pos pa ka' stsal pa/ sngags ni khyod la ngas bshad kyis// lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon// dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// 
295b6(rgyud): uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa las// puk+ka sas rgyan stong pas mnan// mdog dkar mthar ni swAhA sbyar// 'dis ni bzlas pa 'bum gyis ni// 'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed// dang por yi ge'i bdog po/ 
295b7(rgyud): bzhag/ de rjes mkha' spyod ma de nas// mthar ni swA hA sbyar byas na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbong du byed// rig byed rnams kyis dang po sbyin// dang po yi ni gnyis pa lo// stong bcas mtha' ni swA hA/ 
295b8(rgyud): sbyar// sangs rgyas kyang skrod shes rab can// dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la// ra dang ldan zhing chums rgyano// stong bcas swA hA yang dag ldan// mi rnams thad sdang ba
296a1(rgyud): // byed/ dang por yi ge'i dbang phyug bzhag/ lnga pa nyid kyi gsum pa la// stong pa mkha'agro ma dang ldan// mthar ni swAhA mngon spyod che// yang ni yi ge'i thu bo sbyin// hUM ni khrag dang / 
296a2(rgyud): 'dra ba la// mtha' ni swAhA thig le mchog/ dga' bzang ma sogs rtag tu 'gugs// gti mug rigs ni dang por sbyin// g+ha ni yang dag rab tu sbyar// mthar ni swAhA yang byas na// lha dang mi rnams
296a3(rgyud): gsod par byed// dang por rnam par snang mdzad bzhag/ dang po nyid kyi dang po la// rdo rje mkha'agro ma dang sgra/ mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa la// rdo rje mkhar 'gro mi dang ldan// yang ni dang po'i rtse mo
296a4(rgyud): rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dang ldan// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa/ dal// yang ni de nyid yang dag ldan// steng du chom rkun ma yis rgyan// da rje sa hIHyis rnam par sbyar// mthar yang sA/ 
296a5(rgyud): spyod pa nyid// ku ru kul+le yi sngag so// oM ni dang po bzhi pa yi// gsum pa chom rkun ma yis rgyan// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// bi tsu badz+re sbyar ba dang // uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi
296a6(rgyud): po la/ puk+ka sI yas rnam par rgyan// stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA/ kye'i rdo rje'i snying po'o// snang mdzad dang por dz+wa la gnyi
296a7(rgyud): sbyar nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po ldan// g+hasma rIs ni rnam par rgyan// uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa la// rdo rje mkha 'gro ma yis rgyan// stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur ni
296a8(rgyud): lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA// phyag bzhi pa'i sngagaso// dang por rnam snang dang po yi// dang po nang gi dkar mos rgyan// gsum pa nyid kyi dang po la// nang gi dkar mos
296b1(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// nyis 'gyur lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // gnyis pa'i gsum pa me yis rgyan// hUM gi rnam par gsum sbyar nas// lnga pa nyid kyi gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA/ 
296b2(rgyud): phyag drug pa'i sngag so// dang po rnam snang bzhi pa yi// dang po byin za yang dag ldan// ro langs ma yis rnam par rgyan// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la// g+hasma rI yis rnam par rgyan// dang po ma
296b3(rgyud): ni dang po la// mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang // rdo rje ma yis rnam par rgyan// k+Sha ni chom rkun ma yis rgyan// lnga pa nyid kyi dang po dang // uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa la// rdo rje mkha 'gro ma yis rgyan// stong
296b4(rgyud): pas mnan cing sum 'gyur te// phaT dang mthar ni swA hA nyid// phyag gnyis pa'i sngag so// bdag med dang po'i dang po dang / gnyis pa nyid kyi dang po dang // gsum pa nyid kyi dang po dang // bzhi
296b5(rgyud): ba yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas rnam sa kyi dang po dang // uSh+ma rnams kyi dang po nyid// dang por rnam snang mthar swA hA// grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ni
296b6(rgyud): 'bum mo// mthar gnas rnams kyi gnyis pa dang // k+Sha yi rkang pa gnyis 'gyur nyid// hUM gi rnam pa gsum dang ldan// dang po rnam snang phaT nyid kyi// rnam pa nang bcug mthar swA hA// sa sbyong ba'i sngag
296b7(rgyud): so// dang por rnam snang de rje su// rdo rje mi yi mthar ru hUM// bza' ba dang btung ba byin gyis brlab pa'o// dang por rnam par snang mdzad nyid// de rjes a kA ro mu khaM// uSh+ma rnams kyi gsum pa dang / 
296b8(rgyud): mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa ni// steng du me yis rnam par rgyan// d+harmA NAM de rjes rdo rje ma// byin la d+ya nut+pan+na tAH/ oM A hUM phaT swA hA// 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngagaso// kye'i rdo rje las
297a1(rgyud): // sngags btu ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas chom rkun sdom cig pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byas gsungs// bdag med ma la' mdzad nas// bzlas pa'i yul
297a2(rgyud): ni rab tu dbye// shes kyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid// dbang la tsan dan dmar po nyid// lung btang gi ni ngon spyod nyid// ni raM shus ni sdang ba la// rta yi rus pas skrod pa nyid// bram ze'i rus pas
297a3(rgyud): dgug pa nyid// glang po'i rus pas char pa la// ma ha yis kyang bsad pa la// rengs pa 'o ma'i btung ba nyid// dbang la rang gis 'dun pas spyad// bsad pal ni si h+la nyid// dgug pa la ni bzhi
297a4(rgyud): mnyam nyid// sdang la sa lu skyes pa brjod// bsgra dang nyid la gla rtsir brjod// yang na mtha' shA dang / dang po'i shwa dang / na dang po dang / ga dang po dang / ha dang po nyid kyang de bzhin no// 
297a5(rgyud): rdo rje las bzlas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// / kye'i rdo rje la dam 'khyud cing // tshems kyis ma mchu ba/ tsir nas ni// lus can rnams kyi rigs kyi gzugs// de
297a6(rgyud): bdag med mas zhus pa// b+ha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni// 'khor lo'i 'dren pas 'di skad gsungs// lus can rang gi rigs bshad kyis// shes rab pha rol byin mnyon// 
297a7(rgyud): bud med dam ni skyes pa yis// gang gi srin lag rtsa ba la// rdo rje rtse dgu par gyur pa// mi bskyod pa yi rigs mchog nyid// rnam mdzad kyi 'khor lor 'gyur// dpag med mgon gyi 'dam skyes nyid// 
297a8(rgyud): rin chen 'byung gi rin chen nyid// las kyi rigs kyi ral gri nyid// rnal 'byor pa gang nag po nyid// de yi lha ni mi bskyod pa// rnal 'byor pa gang dkar po che// de yi lha ni rnam snang mdzad// rnal
297b1(rgyud): 'byor ba gang sngabasangs che// de yi ldan don yang nyid// rnal 'byor ba gang ser ba cha// rin chen bdag pa rigs kyi la// rnal 'byor ba gang dkar dmar nyid// da dpag med pa rigs kyi lha// / 
297b2(rgyud): 'byor pa gang dkar dang ser// de ni sems dpa'i rig su 'gyur// skye bo rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas// nga rgyal mi gcig tho ma brtsam// kun rdzob gzugs gnas nas ni// de rnams bde gshegs
297b3(rgyud): rigasu 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi mtshan nyid 'di// ji ltar skyes pa de bzhin no// kun rdzob tha snyad tshul las ni// de yi rig su 'ang de 'gyur ro// b+ha gar ling ga'i 'o mdzad nas// de la rdo rje che mnyen
297b4(rgyud): nas bdag med ma yis go mdzad pa// lha mo rab tu mchod pa nyon// tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang // bdag gyi khyim gyi nang du yang // gcer bur phyag rgya che byas nas// rnal 'byor
297b5(rgyud): rig pas rtag tu mchod// 'o dong 'khyud pa byas nas ni// de bzhi/ b+ha gar reg par nyid// skyes pa'i sna ni gzhib pa nyid/ ma mchu'i sbrang rtsi btung ba nyid// rtag tu myos pa'i mtshan
297b6(rgyud): ma las// bo la ldan pas lag pas bya// khyogs dang brla zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin shin tu bskol ba yis// yang yang rdo rjes 'dod pa bya// stang dang 'og tu blta ba nyid// dngos grub rgyas pa thob
297b7(rgyud): ba ste// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de lag pur btung bar bya// de lag bur rgyu ba'i phyir// sha ni bza' ba nyid du 'gyur// khyad par du ni chad nyid do// kye'i rdo rje las lhan cig/ 
297b8(rgyud): skyes pa'i sbyor ba don gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyis dbang // bzhi pa'i don ni bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje nyid// tshe dang dril bu chen po zung / 
298a1(rgyud): / de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur// slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba// bdag gis gsang ba'i dag
298a2(rgyud): gis ni// sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur to// lha mo dga' sbyin gnas sbyin ma// sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma// khyer cig khyer cig sems dpa' che// khyer la mchod pa
298a3(rgyud): dag tu gyis// ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing // rdo rje na mkha'i dkyil lta bu// rdul bral thar pa zhi ba nyid// khyod rang yang ni de yi pheM// rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni// oM pad+ma
298a4(rgyud): su khA dA ra ma hA rA ga su khaM da da tsa tu rA nan+da swa b+hA ga bi sha hA hUM hA kAHsha ru Sh+wa mai// oM badz+ra ma hA dwe Sha tsa tu rA nan da ya kaHkha ga/ mu khe ka ra si na tha hA hA hUM kAr+yaM ku ru She me/ oM AHhUM/ 
298a5(rgyud): spyi bor ni oM gyi rnam pa// snying khar hUM gi rnam pa// ze 'bru le ne nA/ 'i rnam pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po skye ma'i brtag pa zhes bya ba brtag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis las phyung ba brta/ 
298a6(rgyud): bo gnyis kyi bdag nyid// kye'i rdo rje mkha 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan 'o ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis
298a7(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya DA ki ni badz+ra bany+dza ra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza kalpa na ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal
298a8(rgyud): pa chen po'i brtag pa/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag rgya tshal lo// namakha' bems bcas dang bi dang // go skabs med dang 'byed pa dang // sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzhi gnas khang // sems can khams dang / 
298b1(rgyud): yid 'ong dang // sems can snron dang 'jig rten dang // sa dang sa 'og par snang dang // yid dang lus dang ngag dang ni// gcig dang gnyis dang mkha' bde dang // drug dang lnga dang drug gnyis dang
298b2(rgyud): bzhi dang skye 'gro rnams dang ni// gcig gis nyi shur ma tshangs dang // khams gsum ma lus pa dang ni// pha dag bu dang ma mo dang // phyi rol dang ni nang dang 'am// btsun mo kun dang ches dang ni// 
298b3(rgyud): thams cad las dang bdag med dang // 'bras bu rgyu dang bya ba zhes// bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdo rje dang // de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes dang // chos kyi dbyings dang ma byung dang // na mkha'i khams dang rang
298b4(rgyud): dbyings dang // bdag med pa dang bdag ces dang // dngos po medad dang dngos med min// bde ba can dang gru gsum dang // a skyes dang ni skyon bral dang // rdul bral dang ni sdig bcom
298b5(rgyud): dang / dbang rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin dang // mthar ni zhi ba'i 'ardo gdang // gsang dang mchog dang dgyes pa la// sangs rgyas kun khyab sems dpa' ni// mel 'gro ma yi rdo rje gur// 
298b6(rgyud): 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das lha yi bdag po gcig pu nyid// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye'i rdo rje// las ni dkyil 'khor la gsungs pa// rdo rje can dang pa
298b7(rgyud): pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid ni/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // rta bdun rgyal po lnga po'o// rdo rje mkhe 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dkar mo rkun ma ro langs ma// g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI/ ri khrod gdol pa
298b8(rgyud): g.yung mo'o// rdo rje phan pa'i dkyil 'khor du// skam pa zhags pa nyi ma dang // dol zlum ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin// me tog ma sogs mtshams kyi char// rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// nyi lag ma
299a1(rgyud): / ma dang mar me dang // rin chen sgrom grog lag ma// lA s+ye la sogs mtshams char ro// pad+ma chos 'byung lcags sgrog dang // 'khyud ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor du// gling bu ma
299a2(rgyud): sogs mtshams kyi char// bdag nyid cha byad sbyar bso// rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sgo lcags lnga kyog ma// sgom dang ni gos 'dzin ma// de bzhin mtshamasu spyan la sogs// rdo rje mkhan
299a3(rgyud): 'gro de rnams kun// rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang pos gnas// snying khar g.yon bcangs bsdigs mdzub ste// kha dog sna tshogs che 'bar ba'o// shin tu zhe sdang zhe sdang che/ gau rI la sogs rab tu
299a4(rgyud): grags// shin tu gti mug rmongs chen las// skams pa ma sogs cher gzung ngo // shin tu gzi brjid cher gsal ba// nyi ma la sogs rab tu grags// shin tu 'dod chags
299a5(rgyud): chen po las// pad sogs chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o// phra dog/ chen po sgrib chen las// sgo lcags ma sogs myur 'gro/ bdag/ rgyal ba mgon po phan pa ni// gti mug thams cad
299a6(rgyud): zad par mdzad// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che// rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'phrog/ rta mgrin 'dod pa chen po ni// 'dod chags can gyi byang chub ster// rdo rje mgyogs 'gro phrag dog che// theg pa
299a7(rgyud): gzhan ni rnam par spangs// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mi bskyod ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas// skye 'gro ma zad 'gron gnyer phyir// sgrib pa lnga ni 'jom pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
299a8(rgyud): pabar dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags ser sna skye bo rnams// bsdu phyir rang gi 'khor lo la// rdo rje gzugs ni du ma 'dzin// shin tu gdug pa
299b1(rgyud): drag po la// zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te// 'di mkhyen rdo rje can chen ni// rang gis kye'i rdo rjer 'gyur// shin tu stong par zhen rnams kyi// yod min brtul zhugs 'dzin rnams kyi// sangs rgyas ga
299b2(rgyud): mug spyod don du// rdo rje rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// shin tu nga rgyal gdugs rnams kyi// skye 'gro'i nga rgyal zad par mdzad// rdo rje nyi ma bdag nyid rgyal// nga rgyal chen po'i mun pa 'joms// byang
299b3(rgyud): chub tshogs bral las skyes spangs// sems can gang zhig bde byed pa// chags pas byang chub rab grub phyir// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i las gnas shing // gang zhig
299b4(rgyud): lam gzhan nas 'gro ba// de rnams byang chub rab sbyin phyir// rdo rje mgyogs 'gro rang gtso bo// dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid// de dang de yi ngo bor 'gro// mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byo
299b5(rgyud): gyis/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// gong dang gang ni/ sa dngos po yis// skyes pa rnams kyis yid sbyor la// de sa na de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs nor
299b6(rgyud): bzhin no// gang dang gang gis 'dul ba yi// sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste// de dang de yi rnam pa yis// chos kyi bshad pa bya ba'o// sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i// sems can sna tshogs rang
299b7(rgyud): bzhin can// sems ni rang gi rnam rtog gis// skye bo'i dri mas nag por byas// de bas kun tu rab 'bad pas// sems kyi rdo rje rnam par snang // sems dag pa ni bde ba yin// nyon mongs dug ni thams
299b8(rgyud): cad 'phrog/ gal te stong pa thabs yin na// de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// 'bras bu rgyu las gzhan min phyir// thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin// lta ba rnams la log rnams kyi// bdag tu lta
300a1(rgyud): // chol rnams kyi// bdag zhen bsam pa bzlogs pa'i phyir// stong pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// de phyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes// thabs ni bde ba'i sdom pa ste// sangs rgyas
300a2(rgyud): ngargyal rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du myur bar 'gyur// stong pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso ba dpe byad bzang cur ldan// de phyir thabs kyis bsgrub bya dang // de ni thabs kyi gzugs can
300a3(rgyud): non thams cad kyi rnam pa mchog tu zhi ba sems can 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang ba'o// // de nas rdo rje khams gsum thob// rnal 'byor ma ni rdo rje gu ra// dam tshig mchod pa yid 'ong ba// 'kho
300a4(rgyud): la rab tu bka' stsal pa// glu ni rdo rje can la dbul// gar ni sangs rgyas rnam la 'bul// hi rA mchog la de bzhin dri// 'jig darten rjel bza' dang btung // gos kyis mchod pa rtag cho ga
300a5(rgyud): la 'di rnams dam tshig dam pa ste// rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yin// rdo rje can kun mnyes par byed// a ga ru gnag kyi rdo rje// phan pa la ni tsan dan dkar// dmar po 'jig rten rje la
300a6(rgyud): 'bul// kha che rdo rje snang ba la// bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad te// hUM rdo rje las byung ba'i dri// 'di rnams dri yi rab sbyor bas// dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob bo// tsha ba kha ba rdo rjer 'bul// mngar ba rdo rje
300a7(rgyud): rtag pa la// sbyar ba rdo rje nyi ma la// de bzhin lan tshwa 'jig rten rjer// rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam// bska ba rab tu brtag par bya// kye'i rdo rje rdor can gyis// me tog mdog gnag rkang 'thung byung // ma
300a8(rgyud): l+li kA dang ma li ti// kun da rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bul// shing gi dbang mchog dri med do// snang byed la ni sbyor bar bya// dbang mchog dmar po chu skyes dang // b+han d+ha dmar po pa ta lar// pad+ma gar gyi dbang
300b1(rgyud): la 'bul// rta mchog rdo rje can la kun// rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa// snang byed la ni khye lnga nyid// pad+ma gar dbang drug pa ste// lcags kyi rgyal po de bzhin bdu/ 
300b2(rgyud): bza' ba rdo rje nyi ma yi// lam du lcags kyu mchog gi dang // gnyid la sangs rgyas mgon po yi// shin tu bde la gar dbang gi/ glu gar de bzhin rol mo'i sgra// sa gzhi longs gzung dusu ni// rdo rje'i
300b3(rgyud): gzugasu bzhag na su// bdag gi rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub// rdo rje'i dbang po sngon po ste// zla ba chu shel thub chen gyi// mkhar phyin skyes pa'i me tog dmar// pad+ma dmar po spyan ras gzigs// rta yi yang
300b4(rgyud): ma ra ka ta ste// rin lnga'i rdul gyi rdul mtshon mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha'agro ma'i rdo rje guraHphung po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhug so// dam tshig yang dag
300b5(rgyud): rab phye ba// kun tu bzang po'i sa bon bdag/ dbang po sngan po lta bu'i 'od// phyag bzhi 'jigs byed chen po ste/ marje sa pa'i khro ba yini lus// dbang ldan 'byung po mnan pa ste// 
300b6(rgyud): g.yas pas rigs kyi bdag po nyid// lag pa g.yon pas mi lpags nyid// gnyis po dag gis phyag rgyar sbyor// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas yang dag gnas// cung zad mche bas 'jigs par byed
300b7(rgyud): mgo bo'i phreng ba'i rgyan mchog ste// mgo 'dzangs phyed du bcings par mi// ri yi rtse mor bsgom par bye// 'byung po 'dal bar 'grub par 'gyur// gnod sbyin du ma 'byung po dang // gnod sbyin mo dang / 
300b8(rgyud): klu mo dang // mi mo lha yi mdzes ma ni// sgrub pa po yos nges par 'grub// sngags ni/ oM b+hU ta Da ma ra b+hU ti ba ti ak+Sho b+ha ki ri Ti na sarba b+hU ta pre ta bi shA tsi sA dA ya hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can ma
301a1(rgyud): 'gro ma'i rdo rje gar stobs po che'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhug so// char chen rab tu dbang bya ste// pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa bsam// der ni klu brgyad dgad par bya// stobs po tshar na/ 
301a2(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// de rnams rnga ma yang dag gnan// char med stobs po che las ni// chu yi cho gas ni dbab par bya// kha dog gnag cing cher gsal ba// 'jig pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad// phyag
301a3(rgyud): brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste// skar nyi rdo rje gdan mdzad pa// phyag rnams kyis ni klu bdag bsnams// phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags bzlos shing // hUM dag nang du chud byas te// phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar bar bya// 
301a4(rgyud): bo'i zhal ni nag po ste// gnyis pa zla 'od bzang po nyid// gsum ba ser po'i mdog lta bu// bzhi pa dmar po nyid du brjod// / sbrul gyi rgyan gyis yang dag brgyan// rdo rje sems dpas
301a5(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// klu rnams kyis ni char dbang phyir// stobs po che ni rab bsgrub bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa rdo rje gur
301a6(rgyud): ba pos sangs rgyas kyi de kho na dbye bar bya'o// rdo rje pad+ma'o byas dang // ri dgas rgyan pa zos pa dang // rdo rje chu 'thung nor ldan pa// sangs rgyas de nyid 'di rigs// dag pa'i
301a7(rgyud): gnas ni gnas chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang ba// rdo rje rin chen kun khyab pa// gang gyur nga yis bshad par bya/ phan pa'i grong khyer yid 'ong bar// mkha' gro rdo rje lug rgyud// zhen pa
301a8(rgyud): chen po sangs rgyas kun// lcags sgrog rdo rjes bcing l+ya/ dga' ldan du ni ldeg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa thob// rgyal ba mgon po byams pa ni// ye shes spyan gyis rnam par gci
301b1(rgyud): rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas// rgyal po'i tshogs rnams bcings par bya// gang zhig dngos grub mi ster na// sgrog gis bcings nas dgug par bya// rdo rje kyo ba dkar mo che// rdo rje zhags mchom
301b2(rgyud): rkun ma// rdo rje lcags sgrog ro langs ma// rdo rje dril bu g+hasma ri// sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang du byed// bzlas dang sgom pa mngon dga' ba'i// dngos grub gal te mi ster na// de tshe mkha'agro ma bzhi yis/ 
301b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni drag shul sgrub// de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi rgyal bam 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'bum phrag lnga bris pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni dkyil 'khor
301b4(rgyud): 'bum// rdo rje can gyi de bzhin 'bum// 'bum gyis rdo rje nyi ma yi// 'bum gyis rdo rje chos kyi'o// 'bum phrag phyed kyis rdo rje ste// 'byung po 'dul ba stong phrag lngas// lnga yis las ni/ 
301b5(rgyud): rab rgyas pa// lnga yis sangs rgyas gar mkhan nyid// stong phra ga su cu dag gis ni// ku ru kul+lA brtag pa'o// lhag ma stong phrag lnga yis ni// cho ga'i rim pa rgyud kun gyi'o// rdo rje
301b6(rgyud): mkha'agro kye'i rdo rje'i// 'bum phrag lnga ni bris pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa blo dang ldan pa mkha'agro ma rdo rje gur sangs rgyas kyi gar gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// gar dang glu la rab zhen pa'i// sa
301b7(rgyud): rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rdo rje yis// 'dod chag can ces rtsa sgrub// de nas rdo rje can 'byung ste// me tog snyam pas rab sbyor bas// 
301b8(rgyud): sems can kun la phan ldan pa'i// dam tshig der ni bshad par bya// sems can ji snyed pa rnams sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal las skyes pa 'am// drod gshe
302a1(rgyud): las skyes pa 'am// brdzus te skyes pa 'am// gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs med rnams sam/ 'du shes med pa can nyid rnams sam/ 'du shes med pa rnams sam/ 
302a2(rgyud): sems can de rnams thams cad bdag gis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la dgod par bya'o// dam tshig che ba shad de nas ni// zur mig mi g.yo mgon byung ste// mi bskyod ye shes brnyes ldan
302a3(rgyud): pa'i wa ston pa la ni rnam par smod// ci khyod dam tshig hUM zhes bya// thub pa chen po gzhu can yin// nga mig snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan// bdag stobs bcom pa min nam ci// ci khyod dom tshig oM zhes bya// 
302a4(rgyud): khyod ni tshangs pa thub pa rnams// nga ming rnam par snang mdzadadapal// khyod ni ma bcom 'dod pa bral// ci khyod dam tshig a zhes bya// mnga' bdag mkha' lding mkhyen nam ci// nga ming pad+ma
302a5(rgyud): gar dbang dpal// khyod ni gar mkhan nyer bzhad mkhan// ci khyod dam tshig tA zhes bya// khyod ni gdugs te tsha ba 'phro/ ga/ nga ming rdo rje nyi ma dpal// gdugs kyi rnam khyod ji ltar min// 
302a6(rgyud): ci khyod dam tshig khaM zhes bya// khyod ni mkha' stong rang bzhin no// nga ming rdo rje mgyogs 'gro yin// khyod ni rta ste pha rol 'gro// ci khyod dam tshig snying rje 'chang // e ma tshang 'tshong mdzes ma'o// mig sa
302a7(rgyud): bdag min mA ma ki/ zhang po'i grong khyer 'dzin nam ci// ci khyod dam tshig zhi ba nyid// bud med g.yo sgyu 'dzin nam ci// bdag ni ma yin lha mo spyan// spyan yin na ni g.yo dang bcas// ci khyod dam tshig
302a8(rgyud): 'dod chags che// smad 'tshong ma la sgrar ci yod// bdag ming lha mo dkar mo'o// ji ltar dri ma dkar ba yin// ci khyod dam tshig dbang byed che// btsun mo'i lo nya min nam ci// bdag ming zur mig smom/ 
302b1(rgyud): ma'o// sgrol ma mig ni btsam pa yin// mig yon bdag ni nor ldan dpal// de ltar ngo cha med pa legags da rgya 'i mthong dang mi mthun myur du smros// de nas rdo rje migayon pa spod pos gsungs pa/ 
302b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' zhe sdang che// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad rmongs// 'dod la zhen pa 'jig rten bdag/ ser sna rdo rje snang byed do// don yod spyan ni thams cad byed// 'dren pa lnga ni skyon ldan no// sgong skyes
302b3(rgyud): mngal nas skyes pa 'am// drang ga sher skyes dang mtha' 'khob bzhin// gzugs can rnams sam gzugs med dme// brdzus nas skyes pa nyid dang ni// thams cad sangs rgyas bya'o zhes// khyod
302b4(rgyud): kyis dang po gsungs pa ni// khyod nyid sangs rgyas gyur nas ni// de rnams ji ltar rgyal ma mdzad// de nyid phyir na brdzun gsungs pa// mnga' bdag ji ltar 'di ma gsungs// san
302b5(rgyud): bslus na khyod kyi gang // sangs rgyas nyid deng mtshar rmad// 'chi bdag tshe'am mu ge 'am// phas kyi 'khor lo na gnod pa dang // rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // char
302b6(rgyud): med pa dang zhi ba dang // sngags dang bsgoms par ldan par ni// gang zhig bdag ni rtag rol pa// de yi mdun du bdag 'dug sde// der ni brdzun du mi 'gyur ro// slob dpon lnga dang lha mo bzhi// mi g.yo/ 
302b7(rgyud): bdag nyid smod pa'o// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i gnas nyid du// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad// khams gsum de bzhin rtsa ba 'am// ma dag pa'i yang rgyan rnams kyis// sangs rgyas
302b8(rgyud): rnams kyi gar mkhan gang/ bde ba dga' bar byed dang bcas// chos 'byung grong khyer nyams dga' bar/ rdo rje ngam tshig glu yis dang // rdo rje rkang pa'i goms pas gar// mthar ni rdza rnga la s+ye sogs
303a1(rgyud): / phyag rgya chen po rab ster ba'i// de nyid 'dir ni cher gsang ngo // rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' ji bzhin// rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya// glu sna tshogs dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gar dang / 'dul bar
303a2(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / char dbab pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i bdag nyid che ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha'agro ma rdo rje gur gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ 'byung po'i
303a3(rgyud): gtor ma gsungs pa// na mkha' khams kyi dbus gnas par// mdab ma ni brgyad bsgom par bya// dbang po shar gyi mdab mar bsam// mthar byed lhor ni dgod par bya// chu bdag nub kyi mdag
303a4(rgyud): ma la// byang du nor sbyin dgod par bya// mer ni byin za chen po da nyid// bden bral mtshams skyong de bzhin no// rlung du gnas med bsam par bya// dbang ldan du ni 'byung po'i gtso// zla nyid
303a5(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs dang // tshangs pa'i ris ni dam pa dang // tshangs pa'i 'dun 'du nyid dang // dga' ldan 'thab bra/ la gnas pa dang // rgyal po chen por gyur pa dang // gzhan 'bru/ 
303a6(rgyud): dbang sgyur nyid dang ni// gang zhig 'phral dga'i gnas rnams dang // gtsang ma'i gnasu gang gnas dang // bde ba can du 'dug pa dang // 'og min du ni gnas pa dang // 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten
303a7(rgyud): khams// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa dang // de kun steng du gnas pa bya// chos 'byung nang du son pa ni// stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang // de bzhin mtha' yas nor rgyas bu// 'jog po dang ni rigs
303a8(rgyud): ldan nyid// pad chen pad+ma bzang po can// lha min dmyal ba sems can rnams// chos kyi 'byung gnas 'og tu'o// aM las tshangs pa la sogs lha// hUM las ma chags pa la sogs// AHlas
303b1(rgyud): stobs kyi rgyu la sogs// lag gnyis gdong gcig ldan pa ste// steng gi lha rnams dkar po che// dbang po la sogs nag por mtshungs// stobs kyi rgyu sogs dmar po che// rab mtshungs rig
303b2(rgyud): ma lus sprad ldan// rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel// g.yas brkyang bas ni stan la gnas// tshangs sogs rtag pas phyag rgyas gdab// mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis// stobs kyi rgyu sogs
303b3(rgyud): gar bdag gis// thams cad rigs gsum las skyes pa'o// dkar mos dgug par byas nas ni// chom rgan mas ni zhags bcings pas// ro langs mas ni sgrog bcings pas// g+hasma rIs
303b4(rgyud): ni dril bus dbab// de nas mchod de zhabs bsil dbul/ sngags ni 'di yis bsang gtor bya// oM AHhUM/ phyi nas 'thor 'thung dbul bar bya// sngags ni 'di yis gshegs su
303b5(rgyud): gsol// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa/ tI no pa tiSh+Tha dri D+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo ma b+ha wa/ su pe Sh+yo ma b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ hri da yam+me d+hiSh+Tha/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me ba yaH/ 
303b6(rgyud): sarba kaR+Ye bu me met+ta shra yaM/ ku ru hA he he ha ha ho/ b+ha ga waM sarba ta thA ga to badz+ra mA ma muny+dzu badz+ra ba wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa AHmuHde nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha 'gro ma rdo rje gur rdo rje ming gi
303b7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te rdo rje ming phye ba'o// ming gi dbang gi dus su ni// slob ma bdag nyid dbang bskur ba// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bya// skye ba 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid// bzhad pa'i rdorje
303b8(rgyud): dang sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang / mdzes pa'i rdo rje dang / rol pa'i rdo rje dang / shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin tu dga' ba'i myu gu'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma rdo rje dang / pad+ma myu gu rdo rje dang / a la la rdo rje dang / 
304a1(rgyud): / pad+ma lcags kyu rdo rje dang / ye shes rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang / yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang // shes rab myu gu'i rdo rje dang / snying rje myu gu'i rdo rje dang / dam par dga' ba
304a2(rgyud): rdo rje dang / shin tu bde bar dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi rdo rje dang / 'bebs pa'i rdo rje dang / na mkha'i rdo rje dang / shes rab rdo rje dang / pha rol phyin pa'i rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje
304a3(rgyud): ni dag pa'i gnasu phyag rgya chen po grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i ming 'di rnams yin no// bud med rnams kyi 'byung ste/ rdo rje snyigs pa dang / rdo rje mtshon cha dang // rdo rje a ma'o bde ma dang // rdo rje bdag man
304a4(rgyud): mdang // rdo rje spyan ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dang / rdo rje sgyu ma dang / rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rje 'dril shing dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje ro longs
304a5(rgyud): ma dang / rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje lA s+ya ma dang / rdo rje bzhad ma dang / rdo 'khyud pa dang / rdo rje phye ma dang / rdo rje pad+ma dang / rdo rje 'byung ma dang / rdo rje chen mo dang / rdo rje 'dod chags ma
304a6(rgyud): dang / rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rdo rje do shal ma dang / rdo rje sgeg mo dang / rdo rje kong ka NA dang / rdo rje lA ma dang / rdo rje dbugs dbyung ma dang / rdo rje rnam par ma ni mkha'agro ma rnams kyi'o// de bzhin gshegs
304a7(rgyud): pa rnams kyi mtshan du gyur pa/ kye'i rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rnam snang chen po dang ni rang byung dang // rdo rje a ral+li skems pa'i khro bo dang // de bzhin du yang rdo rje'i khro bo nyid// rdo rje bdud rtsi tha
304a8(rgyud): sbyor dang / he ru ka dang snying rje'i stobs nyid do// rtag pa dang ni gti mug rdo rje dang // rnam par snang mdzad dang ni thams cad skyog// sgyu 'phrul dang ni de nas oM mdzad dang / sku yi rdo rje rab tu grag
304b1(rgyud): pa dang // sa snying dang ni gti mug chen po dang // gshin rje gshed dang tho ba'i dbang phyug dang // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang // sangs rgyas zhes bya rab tu grags pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma de/ 
304b2(rgyud): nas rin chen bdag/ rin chen rgyal po da de bzhin du yang // rdo rje gzi brjid dang ni rgyal po che// rdo rje bdud zil gnon dang snang byed do// rta mgrin dang ni 'jig rten bdag po dang // rdo rje chos
304b3(rgyud): dang spyan ras gzigs dang ni// pad+ma gar dbang dang ni 'dod chags dang // 'jig rten mgon po rab tu grags pa'o// dam pa'i rta dang rta yi rgyal po dang // bdun gyi rgyal po de nas lcags
304b4(rgyud): rgyal dang / dam tshig rdo rje dang ni rta mchog dang // de bzhin du ya dang las kyi rdo rje nyid// don yod dang ni don grub dang // rdo rje mgyogs 'gror rab tu grags pa'o// rdo rje sems
304b5(rgyud): dpa' de nas rdo rje can// rnam par rgyal ba phyag na rdo rje dang / dpe med ro mnyam shin tu dga' ba dang // dam pa dang po bde ba chen po'o// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / 
304b6(rgyud): dam tshig sems dpa' nor bu ni// 'di rnams rigs ni drug tu brjod// 'dod pa'i thar rab sgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// 
304b7(rgyud): rdo rje snying po mngon byang chug/ brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po nyid// sgyu ma'i brtag pa gnyis pa ste// rdo rje gar gyi gsum pa'o// bzhi pa sna tshogs brtag pa ste// rdo rje brtag pa lnga pa'o// 
304b8(rgyud): brtag pa drug pa stobs po che// brtag pa bdun pa mi g.yo mgon// brgyad pa gzugs kyi brtag pa ste// mkha' gro ku ru kul+le dgu/ bcu pa 'dul ba'i brtag pa ste// rnam par snang mdzad
305a1(rgyud): // bcu gcig la// dngos grub brtag pa bcu gnyis pa// sgrol ma'i brtag pa bcu gsum pa// rdo rje phrag mo bcu bzhi pa// bco lnga pa ni gzi brjid che// bdag med brtag pa bcu
305a2(rgyud): drug pa// gshin rje gshed kyi bcu bdun pa// hA mdzad la ni bco brgyad pa// dbyangs can gyi ni bcu dgu la// sbyin sreg brtag pa nyi shu pa// rab gnas nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// dkyil 'khor chen/ 
305a3(rgyud): bopo'i brtag pa ni// nyi shu rtsa ni gnyis ni 'dod// gtor ma'i brtag pa nyi shu gsum// nyi shu bzhi pa stegan gnas// mngon par rtogs pa nyi shu lnga// de bzhin phyag rgya nyi shu drug/ byed pa nyid/ 
305a4(rgyud): rtsa bdun pa// klu ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// gar gyi dbang phyug/ brtag pa ni// sum cur gcig med sum cu pa// brtag/ ba sum cu par ni bshad// stong sum cu yi grangs kyis ni// 
305a5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro mkha 'gro mo rnams kyi// 'bum phrag lnga yi rgya/ tshatsha// kye'i rdo rje rdor 'chang gi/ rgyud ni e ma rgyas bstan pa// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye rdo rje// dag pa'i snying pa yongs
305a6(rgyud): gzung // rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsungs pa ste// 'di ni rgyud kyi nges pa'o// kye ye rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyud// dang por rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// de nyid bud med gzung
305a7(rgyud): phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na spros pa las bsdus pa lags/ bskal pa bzang po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang so so'i skye bo rnams tshe thung bar 'gyur na// ji ltar na de rnams
305a8(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur// ji ltar na de rnams thos par 'gyur// ji ltar na sems par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na skye bo phal pa tshe thung bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal ba// / 
305b1(rgyud): shig gang dag slob dpon rnam su 'gyur ba de rnams rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // gang dag spyod pa po de rnams kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag
305b2(rgyud): so so'i skye bo de rnams srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba dang // gang dag bud med kyi tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dod pa la zhen par 'gyur ba ste// de'i phyir rgyud rnams thams cad rgyas par bstan
305b3(rgyud): pab ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gsung thos nas mnyes par gyur cing dgyes pa brnyed nas tshig 'di gsungs pa// snying rje chen po
305b4(rgyud): kye'i rdo rje// nga ni dur khrod chu 'gram dang // nags tshal skye bo med grong du// bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// mtsho sres rnam pa'i 'gram yid 'ong // sku gdung zab mo'i mchod
305b5(rgyud): rten dang // rkang 'thung rlon pa'i 'og tu ni// nga ni sangs rgyas/ dngos grub ster// tshang dus tshong rdal nyid dang ni// tshong // dus rnam pa'i khyim du ni// rdo rje nyi ma brten pa nga // bsnyen
305b6(rgyud): bkar can la dngos grub ster// glu gar rab tu 'ching ba dang // chang 'tshong ma yi khyim du ni// 'di ltar pad+ma gar mkhan nga // bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// rtag tu 'gro mgyogs zhon
305b7(rgyud): 'gyur dang // res 'ga' lam du 'gro ba na// rta ni don yod brtan pa nga // dngos grub rdo rje rnams ster ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur phyag rgya rnam par rgya
305b8(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang dag par bshad pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi brtag pa las// phyag rgya rnam gsum shes par bya// sku la lag pa'i
306a1(rgyud): // phyag rgya yin// sngags bzlas pa las ngag phyag rgya// sems la mtshan ma phyag rgya yin// de nyid bsam gtan dkyil 'khor lalo// lag pagams na skam pa ste// gam
306a2(rgyud): ni sdig mdzub de bzhin no// mkha'agro skam pa ma 'jigs ma// gdug pa rnams kyi 'khur ba 'don// g.yas pa'i lag na zhags pa ste// gdug pa rnams bcing rnam par dgug/ de 'di zhags pa
306a3(rgyud): ma shes bya// g.yon pas gdug pa sdig mdzub ma// g.yas na nya rgya zlum po ste// gdug pa rnams ni bkri bar 'dod// 'di ni rtag tu del zlum bshad// g.yon pas gdug pa bsdig mthub
306a4(rgyud): mdzad// lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu ste// gdug pa rnam das ni dgug par 'dod// 'di de rdo rje gyo mar bshad// ga yon pas bdud la bsdigs mdzub ma// lag be g.yas pa
306a5(rgyud): nyi ma ste// gti mug mun pa rnam par dral// g.yon pa bsti gas mdzub mar ni bshad// de ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod// ga g.yas mar me'i sdong snod de// de bzhin g.yon par
306a6(rgyud): bsdig mdzub po// 'di de rdo rje mar mer bshad// rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'joms// lag pa g.yas na rin po che// sems can rnams la sbyin ba ster// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin
306a7(rgyud): ba mo// rin chen sgron ma 'di rab brjod// glog ni lag pa g.yas par ste// rnam par rtog pa'i chu 'dzin 'joms// de 'di glog lag mar shes bya// de bzhin g.yon pas bsdigs mdzub ma/ 
306a8(rgyud): lag pa g.yas par 'dra ste// pad+ma'i 'dod chags brjod par bya// g.yon pas bsdigs mdzub ma nyid de// 'di ni mkha 'a gre pad+mar brjod// g.yos par b+ha ga'i pad+ma ste// bde ba chen po rnams
306b1(rgyud): 'phel// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste// 'di ni chos 'thung mar ni brjod// g.yas pa'i lag na lcags sgrog ste// byang chub zhen pas kun 'ching ba// g.yon na bsdigs ma
306b2(rgyud): 'dzin ma ste// 'di ni rdo rje sgrog mar brjod// sangs rgyas rjes chags 'ching ba yis// bdag nyid 'khyud par 'dod pa ste// byang chub chags pas rab sgrub ma// de 'di rdo rje 'khyud mer bshad
306b3(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lag na sgo lcags te// ye shes kun gyi srung ba mo// g.yon na bsdig mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di de rdo rje sgo lcags brjod// g.yas pa'i lag tu lde kyog ste// ye shes blangs nas/ 
306b4(rgyud): gcod pa mo// g.yon na bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di de rdo rje lnga kyog brjod// g.yas pa'i lag tu sgo mo ni// ye shes skyes pa ma spangs pa/ g.yon na bsdigs mdzub
306b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa mo// 'di ni rdo rje sgo mar brjod// lag pa g.yas pa ra yol ba ni// ral mtshungs btsun mo srung ba nyid// ga yon na po sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// rdo rje yol ba mar ni
306b6(rgyud): brjod// de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' gro ma ni dam pa'i tshogs// mkha'agro lnga ni rab sgrub phyir// mkha'agro ma yi rgyud gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams tha
306b7(rgyud): mkha'agro ma'i rdo rje'i gsung thos nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya 'phrog pa 'di ci nyi tshe ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya 'phrog pa lags sam// de bcom ldan 'das kyis
306b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams// 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya
307a1(rgyud): ba'i lung bstan pa yod de 'di ni de'i yin te// De be ha ya sa ga ma ne'i skad kyi dbyings 'dir rnam par rtogs pa ste/ thams cad kun tu na mkhar spyod par grub pas 'di ni
307a2(rgyud): mkha 'gro mar rab tu grags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad tshig 'di thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba nye bar skyes par 'gyur ba dang tshig 'dir gsol ba// e ma
307a3(rgyud): mkha'agro ma yi rgyud// rgyud kun las ni phyi ma dang // rtogs sla rtogs par dka' ba dang // rig dang mi rig pa nyid pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rdo rje de bzhi
307a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sem sa bskul ba'i phyir// 'di skad gsungs so// bcom lnga/ na 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di la rdo rje gu
307a5(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po 'dir ji ltar rnal 'byos rnams dang / mkha 'gro ma rnams kyi bsdu ba yin// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa// sgo nga las
307a6(rgyud): skyes pa la sogs pa mtha' yas po ngas srid pa las bsgral bar bya'o zhes smon lam sngon du 'gro ba'i byang chub gong du rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs na/ ci'i phyir na srog chags rnams bsad
307a7(rgyud): pa dang / gcig tu 'dod pa'i btsun mo rnam spangs lags lta ba rnams las log rnams dang // btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// mkha'agro ma yi rgyud bshad do// bde ba'i thabs ni
307a8(rgyud): 'dor bsdus pa// gzhung nyung don no rgyas pa ste// blo dman rab tu sad byed pa// rgyud kun gyi ni snying por nges// sngags rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o// rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
307b1(rgyud): 'di ni bshad pa tsam gyis ni// bdag med rnal 'byor ma nyid kyis// sngon du gar gyis mchod byas te// rang gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // ga
307b2(rgyud): rdo rje chos dang ni/ rta mchog rdo rje nyi ma yang // bdag gi spang na mi 'grub ste// nga nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yum gyi gzugs kyis bskyed par byed// de rnams kyi ni mdzes ma dang // de la
307b3(rgyud): nga ni dngos grub ste// mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang // ral gri sa 'og sgrub pa dang // ril bu mkha' la spyod pa dang / mi snang ba dang bcud kyis len// rig 'dzin 'khor lor bsgyur nyid dang
307b4(rgyud): bu mo dam pa dgug pa ni// bdag mnyes pas ni bsgrub sa pa pas// dngos grub rdo rje rnams thob bo// spros pa rnam pa mang por ni// smras pa 'dir ni ci zhig bya// bdag spo ngas nges
307b5(rgyud): par mi 'grub cing // byang chub med cing sgom pa med// gang zhig rtag tu bdag dran zhing // rtag tu klog cing sem/ sa dpa' dang // sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas pa dang / nga yi sku
307b6(rgyud): ni sgom byed pa// gal te sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sam// gal te rmi lam 'dra bar lta// shin tu bsgoms pa'i rim pa las// mngon sum du ni mthong bar 'gyur// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba
307b7(rgyud): las de yi dngos grub sbyin par bya// rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas// shin tu bde chen sbyor ba las// gang zhig bdag la 'dod ster bya// lus can de la smos ci dgos// gang zhig nyi ma gcig sgom
307b8(rgyud): pa/ rdo rje'i mchod ze'i sbyor ba las// shes rab pha rol phyin dngos grub// ster de 'di la the tsom med// bdag nyid he ru kar byas shing // rang gi btsun mo rang bsgoms nas// gang zhig rnam
308a1(rgyud): 'byor cher 'dod pa// de rnams la ning mnyes 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan zhing // spro ba dga' bar ldan pa dang // glu gar rob sgra'i rnam pa dang // 'ang kun ba/ 
308a2(rgyud): bsgo ba dang // sna tshogs sgeg par ldan pa dang // sna tshogs ro ya btung ba dang // sna tshogs gos ni rimo can// sna tshogs 'di yi byug pa yis// gang zhig bdag dang rtag nyal ba// de yi
308a3(rgyud): dngos grub ster ba dang / phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug pa// de yi 'dod pa mar gyur to// oM a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e AM ai AM e swA hA// gang zhig 'dis nga bskul bar byed/ 
308a4(rgyud): ba'i rgyal ba'i sras de rnams kyi lag tu bud med kyi sgyu ma'ibade ba yang dag par gnas kyi 'dug/ rdo rje ma ni shar du sbyin par bya'o// l-I phyagasu dkar mo'i gzugs can mo
308a5(rgyud): nub phyogs ni chu yi mkha' gro ma'o// byang du ni rdo rje mkha' / ma'o// dbus su bzhag ste snying po dang bcas pa'i rnga kyil 'khor du gang zhig bsam byed pa de'i bdag mdzes
308a6(rgyud): ste/ phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma'o// gri gug dang skyes pa'i thod pas brel pa// stag gi lpags pa bgos pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan pa/ 
308a7(rgyud): shar gyi sgor ni dkar mo chen mo'o// lhor ni tshem rkun mo'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor ni chu ma'o// de bzhin byang du ni g+hasma rI'o// dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI'o// 'tshod pa'i mtsham su ni ri khrod ma'o// 
308a8(rgyud): srin mo'i phyogasu ni gdol ba mo'o// rtag tu 'gro bar ni g.yung ma'o// 'di rnams ni mtshams dang bral du sbyin no// gang zhig bdag rab tu sgom par byed pa de'i lag mthil du
308b1(rgyud): phyin pa'i dpal sus kyang dbrog par mi nuso// thams cad kyang kha dog nag por mtshungs pa rab tu son pa'i steng du gar dang bcas pa khro ma chen mo dpal mo// g.yon pa kha T+wAM ga li
308b2(rgyud): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can mkhe 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur mchog tu dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te// rig ma'i dbang yang dag par bshad pa// rang gi rig ma skyes bu'i chus/ 
308b3(rgyud): bum pa brgyad po thams cad kyis// rdo rje thugs ni rab bsgoms pas// rdo rje can bsam dbang bskur bya// rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgoms pa// der ni dbu rgyan sbyin par bya// thams cad sngon sbyin de
308b4(rgyud): bsams nas// rdo rje'i tshigs bcad sbyor ba las// rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa// snying khar rang gi leg ba bya// slob ma'i 'jigra rten dbang phyug byas// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur bya// 
308b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni// de rong khyod ni dbang bskur/ 'gyur// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// bzang // sgrub phyir ni rdo rje bzung // slob ma lcags mchog lha mo ni// 
308b6(rgyud): sgrol mas 'khyud par bsam par bya// lag pas rdo rje dril 'khor zhing // rdo rje bdag pos dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra dI pa ti tAM/ oM b+hi Shiny+tsA mau tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ slob ma rnam snang byas nas ni/ 
308b7(rgyud): ming gis kyang ni dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra satwa b+hi Shiny+tsA mi badz+ra na mA b+hi She ka ta/ kyai che ge mo rdo rje/ gang gang kun gyis rang gtsor gyur// de de bdag nyid he ru ka/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung ba'i/ 
308b8(rgyud): phyir 'a chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o// 'di ste sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas// rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // oM badz+ra ta thA
309a1(rgyud): gta sid+d+ha 'adz+ras ma ya tiSh+Tha sa ma ya trA e Sha ts+tshat+pa d+hAr mA ma hUM/ kun kyang chag gcig pa yis// rtag tu bla med mchod pas ni// srab mardo rje brtul zhugs sbyin/ 
309a2(rgyud): phyis ni rdo rje lag nas lag/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje snying po'i bdag po'i bdag/ yang ni der ni dril bu sbyin// 
309a3(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin skyes pa'i// rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// rgyal bas byang chub
309a4(rgyud): mchog brjod pa// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // dbugs byin thams cad byin nas ni// shAkya thub par rang gyur/ pas// slob ma chen po lung bstan te// sangs rgyas nyid du/ 
309a5(rgyud): the tsom med// khyod kyis 'chi 'jigs mya ngan med// de bzhin nad dang tsha ba med// bde chen theg pa chen po ni// 'od la sa nga yis lung bstan du// oM e Sho tsa byA ka ro mi tA badz+ra
309a6(rgyud): satwa ta thA ga ta/ srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bsgral te// shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub phyir// kye 'grub 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa yi// ming ni rdo rje zhes byar 'gyur// de ltar bcom ldan 'das
309a7(rgyud): kyis rig ma chen mo'i dbang gi dam tshig bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ston pa pos// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba bton te// tshig 'di skad bka' stsal pa/ 
309a8(rgyud): bla ma rdo rje rnams mchod cing // bdun po rnam par dag par bya// byang chub sems dpa' ni bskyed na su// chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par sgom// de la sangs rgyas gnas bsams nas// rnam
309b1(rgyud): ba lnga ni bsgom par bya// dang po skyes bu bsam de nas// mkha'agro ma yi 'khor lo spro// dri za mnyam par zhugs pa ni// khu bar rjesu dran par bya// 'tshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya// 'khor ma/ 
309b2(rgyud): 'dren pa bskul nas ni// mig lo sogs pa gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// phyi nas rjes chags rdo rje ste// ye shes rnam par gzhug pa dang // dbang ni rig ma
309b3(rgyud): brgyud rnams kyi// yang ni bdud rtsi myang ba dang // lha mo brgyad kyi mchod pa nyid// 'khor lo'i 'dren pa bstod pa'o// rang byin rlabs pas byin rlabs te// de la yan lag drug bsgom bya// phyi nas
309b4(rgyud): yang ni dam tshig gi/ cho ga'i go rims rim pa yis// mtshan ma yang dag mtshon par bya// dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba yin// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa yin/ 
309b5(rgyud): bzhi pa mar me nye 'bar ba// lnga pa rtag tu snang ba te// sprin me da na mkha' 'dra ba nyid// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu// dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ba yin// phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa
309b6(rgyud): ltararmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu yi// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// ji srid rdo rje'i lus can rnams// ye shes
309b7(rgyud): phung po'i blo ldan pa// de yi rdza su thams cad 'brang // ji srid skye gnas las byung ba// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// phyag rgya chen po rab sbyar bas// de rnams thams cad bza'
309b8(rgyud): bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi rdo rje rnam thos nas// dga' zhing rangs par gyur nas ni// smra ba'i rdo rje mdzad par ldan// rig ma chen mo bdag med dang // rdo rje
310a1(rgyud): // rnam sna mnga' bdag dang // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen dang // rta mchog thub pa chen po dang // rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid che// rtamagrin mnga' bdag chen pon// sku gsung thugs nin/ 
310a2(rgyud): dang yang // lus kyi gong bu 'gul bar 'gyur// lan cig rgyal po ston pa yis// 'phral du mngon sum byed pa po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa
310a3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te// tshig 'di skad gsung so// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor lo zhugs pa// zhal brgyad pa la stobs pa chi// phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan// da
310a4(rgyud): bopo sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzi brjid chen po zhabs zhi dang // sgeg cing khro bo'i gzugs can te// skyil kru sa phye ba'i gar gyis gnas// rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par
310a5(rgyud): brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// dkar po dmar pos rnam par rgyan// lhag pa'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa ste/ spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ 
310a6(rgyud): der ni rdo rje mdog nag po// 'od zer chen po'ang bsgom par bya// dbang bskur ba yi gnas nyid du// sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par rgyan// glang po rta bong glang rnga mo// mi dang sar b+ha byi la// 
310a7(rgyud): g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad du ni// gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// drod dang zla ba nyi ma nyid// mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na
310a8(rgyud): skyes bu chen po bzhengs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// gti mug rdo rje mig la dgod// zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba la// ser sna 'dod chags de bzhin du// reg dang bdag med bsgom par bya// 
310b1(rgyud): phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa yin// sna tshogs gzugs ma btsun mo nyid// lag pa'i gri gug thod pas brel// srog song steng du yang dag gnas// sa spyod mkha' spyod ma nyid dang // de ba/ 
310b2(rgyud): rkang 'og gnas pa mo// 'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// gnas gsum du ni gnas par sgom// oM mdzad rgyal po chen po ni// sku yis rdo rje rnam par rgyan// thugs kyi rdo rje rgyal po che
310b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas na bzhugs// a ni mchog gi de nyid de// ngag gi lam ni gsal byed brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// chos can las ni rigs gsum 'byung // nyi ma'i
310b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dkar mo gzugs can pa sgom par bya// lcags kyu'i bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o// kha dog dkar mo 'od chen mo// dkar mo rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i
310b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin to// dmar po dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// chom/ rkun ma yi gzugs can sgom// bcom gser gyi ma/ dog 'dra ba// rdo rje zhags pa mtshon chen po// rdo rje dkyil 'kho
310b6(rgyud): dbus gnas par// ro langs ma ni khrag dang mtshungs// rdo rje lcags sgrog nga rgyal byed// byang chub 'ching bar mdzad pa mo// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// de nas g+hasma rI bsgom
310b7(rgyud): bya/ rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel// margad ud pa la 'dra ba'o// rdo rje sgo skong ma rdo rje btson ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mtshams lha mo bzhi rnams ni// cho ga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// 
310b8(rgyud): byang sems bum pa ri rab dang // ma yi thab khung rgyal mtshan che// phyi bcos gnyis med rnal 'byor pas// mgon po de ltar bsgom par bya// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas// dpa'
311a1(rgyud): / rlabs med pa'i bde ba 'thob// 'byung ba bzhi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po theg pa gsum gyi dam pa ston pa 'o// thams cad kyi rnam
311a2(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te// dbyangs 'di gsungs pa// hUM las byung ba'i khro bo ni// rtag tu zhe sdang ldan pa'o// nang du ma rungs sems kyis ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// na maH
311a3(rgyud): sa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo// na mo badz+ra mung ga ra hastA ya tsaN+Da maN+Da lAk+She pa ka rA ya hUM phaT// de nas 'dir khro bo chen po bshad pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams
311a4(rgyud): 'jigs shong 'dar bar gyur nas mngal bdag rdo rje 'dzi/ na po dran par byed do// skyes pa'i pad+mags chag med// bsrubs gcig pa dang bsrubs gnyis pa// rig ma bzhi
311a5(rgyud): yi rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang // / nga rjes rdul gyis sbyor ba yis// rkang pas mnan cing bsdigs par bya// sku gsum bskyed pa'i sgom pa yis// bu/ 
311a6(rgyud): mochen mo dgug par bya// gshin rje gshed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ ma hA dat+tA d+ha ra bi bid+yA su rA su re mdzan b+hU tan+tir+m+ma thaM hUM phaT// de nas khro bo chen po gzhan
311a7(rgyud): gyis mi thub pa'i stobs po che bshad pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang 'dar bar gyur cing de dran par byed// 'byung po yi dgas sha za nyid// 
311a8(rgyud): mkha' gro grul bum zin pa la// hUM gis drags byas phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje btsi bas bde ba nyid// gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he d+hA/ a/ 
311b1(rgyud): hu lu hu lu/ ma hA pad+ma a mr-i ti ku ru ma hA biSh+TAn AHbtsan dug chen po dgug par bya'o// brgyal ba bslang ba de bzhin no// pad+ma'i dregs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa
311b2(rgyud): man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo// na ma~M badz+ri kro d+ha ya mo hA daSh+Tot+ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ badz+ra son+do ha dar+thA ya/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT// de nas khro bo bgegs 'joms rdo rje bshad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 
311b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid mi dga' ba gyur to// rlung gis brtag pa po dang // rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs nas bsgrub bya de'i ming byas bzung ste// tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i 'o/ 
311b4(rgyud): tu dgad cing hUM phaT ces bya ste/ hUM gis nga rgyal byas nas rdo rje bdud rtsi ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa// khro bo sdug ngas kyis rab tu sbyar bas sangs rgyas rnams kyang smod pa
311b5(rgyud): byed do// rdo rje baidud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// tu legs par gsang bar ni// byo ba 'di ni rab bas la bar// ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste// nyi ma bdun gyis 'gru
311b6(rgyud): par 'gyur// na maMHsa man+ta bud+d+ha b+h+yo// oM ya ma daN+DA ya ni lA ya ni la daN+Da ya/ tu ru tu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sarba duSh+Ta na mA ra ya mA ra ya hA phaT// de nas khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po skas
311b7(rgyud): bu chen po bshad pas sems can thams cad da nga // sangs rgyas rnams sreg la the tshom du gyur to// brgya phrag brgyad bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang shin tu sgom par sbyar ba'i cho gas bsku
311b8(rgyud): ba las gdug pa thad 'ching bar 'gyur ro// dbyig pas mnan pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo// na mo ma hA ba lA ya/ u ts+tshaSh+ma kro d+ha rA dzA ya sar+b+bA nA gA nA hr-i da ye/ 
312a1(rgyud): / tA Da ya hUM phaT// de nas gtum po chen po bshad pas/ dug gis gdong 'jigs shing stobs dang bral ba dang / skrag cing 'dar bar 'gyur te stobs po che dran par byed do// 
312a2(rgyud): stobs kyi spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo// na mo a tsa la kaM tsiT+Ta tsan+d+ra moT+Ta moT+Ta th+ya l+ya g+hA ta yag+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba skas bu chen po
312a3(rgyud): bshad pas lha dang klu dang gnod sprin chen mo brgyal te sa la 'gyel to// 'di ni khro bo rgyal po yis// seng ge zhon pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor las// skos pa dang ni lha
312a4(rgyud): rnams khugs// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hAM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ grah+NA pa ya grah+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga waM bid+ya rA dza hUM phaT// rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa yis// khro bo chen po bshad pa yis// 
312a5(rgyud): lha min bu mo klu mor bcas// nu ma 'dar zhing na ra ba 'am// rdza/ rje zhags pas nges bcings te// lcags kyu yis ni dral nas ni// sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pa yis// bu
312a6(rgyud): mo thams cad dgug par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje chos ni char sprin che// rdo rje sems dpa' char mchog ste// rdo rje nyi ma dge 'dun che// rta mchog chag
312a7(rgyud): ni chen po dang // len pa'i yang ni char sprin gyi// zhags pa lcags kyu'i sgom pa yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gugs brjod na// so so skye bo smos ci dgos/ rang gi rig ma skyes bu bsam
312a8(rgyud): sku gsum rdo rjes rnam par rgyan// lcags kyu la sogs sbyar ba yis// bu mo bkug la bza' bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chen pos dgug pa'i dam tshig bko' stsal to// 
312b1(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bude b+h+yo/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaHkha ti dang ni bcag la yang // rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// zla ba nye bar chags dus su// khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya// ming ni bris pa tsam gyis
312b2(rgyud): brgya ni gsal bar bzlas pa yin// sgra ldan gnas med dbang po drag/ chung mar bcas po dgug par bya// dam tshig lcags kyu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan sngags dang ting
312b3(rgyud): 'dzin gnas// rang gi rig ma skyes bu bdag/ dgug pa'i gnas su bzung bar bya// thub pa gzhan du ni 'gyuraro// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ namaHsa man+ta d+har+m+ma NAM/ na maHsa man+ta sa g+ha nI/ oM si/ 
312b4(rgyud): ta pa tra/ oM bi ma la/ oM shaM ka ra/ oM pra t+yaM gi ra/ oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha tsakra wan+ti sar+b+ba yan+ta man+t+ra mU la kar+m+ma ban+d+ha na tA Din+ti kI la naM bA ma ma kr-i ta ye nai ke na tsit+ta kr-i taM tat+taMta/ sarben+da ts+tshin+da
312b5(rgyud): ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ tsi ri tsi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ ma ra ma ra/ hUM hUM hA hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ bdag nyid srung ba'i spyib la// sbyor ba rgyud sogs gzhig pa la// dpung ba'i rig mar
312b6(rgyud): gyur byas nas// 'jig rten gsum gyis mda' mi nus// khro bo chen po 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dben po'i nags tshal nyid du yang // yid gnyis thams cad rnam spangs
312b7(rgyud): la// rnal 'byor mchog ni 'di bsgrubs na// thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyuraro// khro bo chen po 'khor lo'i sngags la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje
312b8(rgyud): can// sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba// yang dag nges par rab tu dbye// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgom bya// 
313a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te// rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs
313a2(rgyud): brnyan rab bsgoms nas// 'dod chags rdo rje rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam bsgom// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam bsgoms te// rta yo don yod rab bsgom bya/ 
313a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor rnams ni rtag bsgom bya// thams cad rnams kyi sngags 'di yis// snying khar ye shes gnasu dgod// ye shes sems dpar rag
313a4(rgyud): sbyor bas// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// rang ste gas yi ge rdzogs pa dang // phyag rgya dang ni phyag mtshan pa rtag/ spro dang bsdu ba byas pa ni// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'a
313a5(rgyud): bo nyid// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la na dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sem sa dpa' grags chen po// gzugs la rnam gsum shes/ 
313a6(rgyud): byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rgyal po ni// rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag nyid/ dril nam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom
313a7(rgyud): ldan sangs rgyas ni// rin chen phung po rab tu grags// ro la rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams lha yang dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags nyid// rdo rje chos ni de bzhin gshegs
313a8(rgyud): rig la rnams sum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod 'bras bu ster ba'o// srung ba'i dam tshig bsdus pa yis// dkyil 'khor lnga ni bas
313b1(rgyud): par bya// lnga lnga'i bdag nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes lnga ni rnam par sgom// 'dod pa'i yan tan lnga dang ldan// 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu khyab/ sna tshogs las ni byed par brjod
