313b2(rgyud): bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// rdul tshon gyis kyang bri bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// phung ba lnga ni dang grags// sangs rgyas mgon par
313b3(rgyud): 'khor ni// shar gyi char ni rab tu grags// g.yos rdo rje nyi ma yi// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje yi/ byang du rta yi rgyal po la// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' mo// shed du dka ba chen po ste// lha nas
313b4(rgyud): yang dag ldan// dmar mo nub kyi cha nyid du// brtsod ni byang du yang dag ldan// 'tshams kyi char ni thams cad dang // sgra yi/ gras dang ya phub su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis d+hun/ sna tshogs
313b5(rgyud): snang ba rnams kyis mdzes// sangs rgyas mgon po gang nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'gyur ba ni// de nyid kyi ni da/ kyil 'khor brjod// snying po yongs gzung dkyil 'khor te// 
313b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor re rer sgom pa 'am// yang na bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// brgyad brgyad dbus su gnas pa'am// yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga ru// gang tshe dkyil 'khor bsdus pa// sgor ni lcags kyu
313b7(rgyud): zhugs pa dang // lcags sgrog de bzhin rdo rje nyid// 'jug pa'i sgo srung dgod par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdus pa chen po'i dam tshig 'di bka' stsal to// dam dang bya rgod de bzhin pas
313b8(rgyud): sdug glang dang ni stag nyid dang // spre'u dang sna thung ba glang 'tshe// rdo rje chos kyi g.yas na'o// khwa 'ug chu skyar seng ge dang // mtshan gnas de bzhin ra dang ni// ri dgas phag dang yang dag ldan// 
314a1(rgyud): g.yas min par ni rtag tu gnas// rma bu ma he chu srin dang // nyi ma'i rgyal po rus sbrul dang // 'og gi rlung dang ngang ba dang // ri bong phan pa'i g.yas pa na// sbal bathu bo sprin du
314a2(rgyud): kyi/  kha chu mig sman mtshungs byil// g.yag dang dri ldan de bzhin bzhad// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// ka ran da dang 'khor lo ngag/ lug dang tsa ko ra dang ni// bye khra hor mo 'ol ba dang // kur
314a3(rgyud): nyi ma'i g.yas na'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang // rigs ldan pad+ma bad bzang dang // 'jog po nor rgyas mtha' yas ni// rin chen rgyal po'i g.yon na'o// gza' lag phur bu mdzag rings dang
314a4(rgyud): sgra gcan mig dmar pa ba sangs// spen pa khyab 'jug rta rgyal nyid// g.yas pa nyid du rab tu grags// dbang po tshangs pa de bzhin drag/ 'dod lha de bzhin thod pa can// gcer bu dang ni
314a5(rgyud): thag bzangs ris// stobs ldan zhes bya g.yon na'o// glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin 'bog/ khong skam mdze dang rkang / shu dang // mchin pa mcher ba'i rang bzhin yang // glang po la
314a6(rgyud): sogs rab tu grags// lcags stegs dang ni brjed byed dang // khrag rdo gcong nad rgyal po dang // gzhang 'brum skran dang bkres nad dang // mig ser dom la sogs pa'o// rdzi ma byi dang so nad dang
314a7(rgyud): mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung // bad kan 'dzag dang lag skam dang // skya rbab 'bras ni rma bya sogs// rkang 'bab tshil nad rlig skrangs dang // rgyu ma 'phel dang gsud pa dang // tshad pa rims
314a8(rgyud): dang rab sags ni// ka raN+Da sogs rab tu grags// rlung mkhris de bzhin mo zhu ba// sgrib g.yogs rab rib gcin sri ba// gzhogs phyed na dang lkog 'bras dang // rlung rgyas gza' lag laso// 
314b1(rgyud): ba'o/ mi yi 'gro ba dam pa ni// rab mchog de lta bu 'gro ba// thams cad nad kyis khyab mthong nas// sangs rgyas lngar ni cher grags pa// bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya// sems can
314b2(rgyud): rnams la gdungs ma gyur// nad rnams zhi phyir sangs rgyas ni// glang po la sogs nad 'dzin to// de ltar bsgoms par gyur pa la// nad med ru dza trang gru med// 'chi med nges par bya d+hi med// 
314b3(rgyud): nga rgyal med cing gti mug med// bkres pa med cing sgom pa med// sdug bsngal ngan 'gro de bzhin med// lha dang lha min mi rnams sam// gang gis kyang ni nad byed min// nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba
314b4(rgyud): dbugs dbyung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// do// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lus thams cad 'dzi/ na pa po mkha'agro ma'i yid 'phrog pas tshig 'di bka' stsam
314b5(rgyud): pa/ sems kyi rjes dran dmigs nas ni// sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsgom// sems kyi rin chen bsams nas ni// sa ni rje su dran pa sgom// las rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 
314b6(rgyud): 'khor lo chen po rab bsgom bya// rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab ste// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje rnam snang
314b7(rgyud): bsams nas ni// phyag rgya bsgoms pas phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// rin chen phung po rab bsgom bya// chos kyi phyag rgya rab sbyor bas// las kyi rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab// 
314b8(rgyud): zhe sdang rgyal po rgyal po che// skyon rnams thams cad zad par mdzad// spro zhing sbyor bar bsgom par bya// bsdu ba yang ni yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas mgon po rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas
315a1(rgyud): / sprin gyis kun tu khyab// sgo dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya// sems kyi rin chen rin po ches// bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par mdzad/ 
315a2(rgyud): sems kyi char sprin sbyor ba yis// yang ni bsdu ba bstan par bya// chos kyi rgyal ba gti mug che// spro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs can de// thun tshod bzhir ni byin rlabs pa// bsgoms na myur du/ 
315a3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// si mu ni gro 'gyogs ltar bsams// gzhal med 'bras bu stsol ba'o// rta mchog char sprin chen po yis// bsdu ba yang ni bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyi sgram
315a4(rgyud): dang bsdu ba'i dam tshig chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// rlog med dkyil 'khor dbus
315a5(rgyud): gnas par// sku yi yi ge rnam par sgom// khrag gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyi rin chen ge dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par// gsung gi/ 
315a6(rgyud): yi ge rnam par snyam// las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dan yod yi ge gzugs can te// sku gsum mi phyed sgom pa yis// ye shes rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' mi
315a7(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rnam snang la// rin chen sems kyi rin po che// pad+ma bzang po mdab mar dmar// shes rab rol gri don yod kyi// shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin gyi// rnam rtog ri bo
315a8(rgyud): bcang nas ni// phyag rgya chen pa ldan par 'gyur// dpag chad bye ba brgya bar ni// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// phan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang / rin chen zung ba'ang chen dang / 
315b1(rgyud): chos kyi phung po mgon chen dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje las// sna tshogs 'od zer cher 'bar ba// sangs rgyas sprin gyis rnam par rgyan// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas pa/ 
315b2(rgyud): ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis gang // thams cad du ni sna tshogs gzugs// mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya// mtshams kyi lha mar sbyar ba
315b3(rgyud): yis/ ye shes rgya mtsho rab bsgrub bo// dam tshig 'khor lo bcug pa yi// ye shes rdo rje chen po 'bar// sangs rgyas kun mnya ma rnal 'byor pas// skad cig la ni gnyis med 'gru
315b4(rgyud): ru rak+Sha dang dung ral gri// bu yi lo tshob pad 'bras dang // mu tig la sogs byi ru sogs// bsam gtan ldan pa sngags bzlas bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
315b5(rgyud): dang / mkha'agro ma dang rang btsun mo// mngon sum du ni d+hi ba'i phyir// sngags ni snyan gsan 'bebs par bya rjod// dper na skyes chen la la zhig/ skad cig nga ros pas
315b6(rgyud): pa na// zos pa tsam gyis 'ongs gyur pa// de ltar skad cig sangs rgyas gshegs// 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang // na mkha'i khams kyi mkha' grong du// phyag rgya chen
315b7(rgyud): po'i bde gnas kyi// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// de rnams sngags rig drung ni gshegs// rdo rje spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// gang gis sngags kyi rim thob pa/ 
315b8(rgyud): e ma de yis byang chub thob// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / sngags kyi spyod pa dang por 'dzin// rdo rje sngags ni rab sbyor bas// mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes 'thob// 
316a1(rgyud): de ltar shes pa'i sangs rgyas te// sngags kyi spyod pa'i rim gnas pa/ 'bras bu nyid la mi gzigs te// de ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa brjod// sangs rgyas nga rgyal dmigs nas ni/ 
316a2(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal ba// gang zhig sgom pa de bas no// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur// 'jig rten ji ltar sangs rgyas te// ji ltar chos kyang dge 'dun te// sems
316a3(rgyud): can khams ni de ltar bshad// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// ngan par brtags pa'i rnam rtog gis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// sems dag pas ni dag par 'gyur// ji ltar na mkha'
316a4(rgyud): mi 'jig pa// na mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin sems// sems dkyi rin chen bskal pa las// sems nyid sgom pa sangs rgyas te// skye bar sangs rgyas dam pa nyid// rin chen sems
316a5(rgyud): las phyir gyur pa'i// sangs rgyas med cing gang zag med// rnam par shis pa'i gnas don nam// phyi rol gyur pa/ cung zad momed// yid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// 
316a6(rgyud): khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po che// sems gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya'i rang bzhin te// chos kyi
316a7(rgyud): dbyings ni mchog tu zhi// 'di ni rin chen mchog tu brjod// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid// 'di dag thams cad sems las skye// thub pa 'di
316a8(rgyud): ni gzhan mi 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// 'dod don 'bras bu rab sbyar ba// sems kyi danyid nga bzhin gi/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ster// de nyid phyir na sangs rgyas kyis// sems
316b1(rgyud): kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// zab mo'i rnam panges ldan pa'i// phyed par dga' ba'i dngos grub ster// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po snang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas rdo rje chen po rdoH
316b2(rgyud): can mkha' gro ma'i gur bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te// bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa// sangs rgyas gnas ni rab rdzogs dang // rnam pa lnga po bsgoms pa
316b3(rgyud): dang // kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin dang // rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sgrub dang // dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang // mchod bstod bdud rtsil sogs pa// rims pas rje su bsgom par bya/ 
316b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a da b+hi She ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ho// bcom ldan 'das de/ bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka'/ 
316b5(rgyud): stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga tA mri tA sA da badz+ra b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs be tshe dpag med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga/ 
316b6(rgyud): ta stA ti badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga tA pU dza dz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// bcom ldan 'das
316b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rta mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pas de ska
316b8(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// spro ba dang ni bsdus pa'i sku rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad de// chas dbyings yi ge las skyes pa// des ni sangs rgyas gnas dgod bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ni
317a1(rgyud): / yang badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha// rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// 'byung bzhi'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor nyid// de
317a2(rgyud): yi steng du sangs rgyas bsam// spros nas gzhal yas gnas dgod bya// rdo rje lta bu mi phyed phyir// des na mi bskyod bsgom par bya// ma skyes rjes su dran pa las// rnam par snang mdzad pan
317a3(rgyud): pa nyid// rin chen rnams kyi mchog gi mchog/ 'di ni rin chen semasu bshad// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// 'dod chags mtshan nyid 'dzin pa las// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug
317a4(rgyud): pa'i/ sems ni 'dod chags zhes byar bshad// gang phyir 'bras bral mi 'grub ster// de phyir don yod rab tu gra dgas// rig ma mdzes ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
317a5(rgyud): to// bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste// gnyis pa la ni gsang / ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes te// ltar lus ni de bzhin gshegs// dkyil 'khor dam
317a6(rgyud): bris nas ni// dam tshig khu ba'i cho ga yis// ha dang bsam gtan bskyed byas nas// de tshe dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya// mkha'a'agro lnga dang ldan pa dang // dam tshig lnga yis bkang ba dang // 
317a7(rgyud): mkha 'gro ma yis tshogs ldan pas// rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor bas// rang gi lhag pa'i ltar byas la// slob ma rtag par nges bsams te// rgyun gyis rigs kyi ming gis ni// slob
317a8(rgyud): mdze rje can dbang bskur/ sbyin dang bdag ma skal ma dang // dkar me la sogs bdag gzugs kyis// rdo rje btsun mo rab sbyor bas// rdo rje bla mi bshad par bya/ blan med pa de nyi sa
317b1(rgyud): gnyis med cing yi ge med// chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal byed// bde ba bzang po'i ro myang gis// skye med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// gdang sa zhes bya ba dang / dang
317b2(rgyud): mthar yang shA ldan pa'i// rab tu gsal ba dam pa nyid// dngos grub thams cad rab stor ba// tshogs kyi rdo rje bdud du mang // 'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun mnyam rna
317b3(rgyud): 'byor pa// rdo rje dang ni mnyam par 'gyur// nad rnams thams cad rab tu zhi// de ni gzi brjid lus chen po// 'jig rten kun gyi yi 'phrog pa// phas kyi rgol ba kun las rgyal// 'jig
317b4(rgyud): rten kun gyi bdag pos rgyan// lha rnams kyi ni 'dren par ba/ rjod// mkha'agro lnga yi bdag nyid 'gyur// chos kyi zas ni zab po// dam tshig chen po'i bsam gtan zos pa
317b5(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// mi bskyod brten pa'i rnal 'a byor pa// nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs// rtagabar chu shel chen por ldan// rdo rje nyi ma rgas pa med// 
317b6(rgyud): don yod rgyal po chen po ni// rdo rje srog gi yan lag 'byung // don kun sgrub cing dpal dang ldan// des ni rnal 'byor par ni brjod// mi bskyod btung ba'i sbyor ba las// stong phrag lngas ni/ 
317b7(rgyud): 'tshe bar 'gyur// phan pa'i sa ni khri ru brjod// rdo rje nyi ma rdo rje'i 'bul// tshe dpag med kyis dpag med dang // bdun gyis na mkha' ji srid bo shad// rdo rje nyi ma dpag med dag/ 'khor ba'i/ 
317b8(rgyud): sgrub thabs rtsa ba nyid// 'di dag bsten pas rnal 'byor pa// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes// 'di ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod// chos rnams zad kyi ni gnas// 
318a1(rgyud): / bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med// sangs rgyas rdo rje can nyid kyis// thabs dang shes rab zhon pa dag/ khams gsum dag ni thams cad du// sa dang sa 'og par snang la// khrag dang khwa
318a2(rgyud): bas khyab pa'i lus// rigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'di gsungs// sen mo ba spu de bzhin khams// khu ba la ni rnam par gzigs// lpags dang khrag la gzi brjid che// tshal dang rkang la rdo rje 'dzin// dza
318a3(rgyud): mgon po rnam snang mdzad// rtsa dang sha la bdun rgyal po// 'di rnams la ni sangs rgyas lngar// rdo rje mkha' gros rnam par bshad// sa yi khams ni rnam dag pa// spyan ni 'khor lo mdzes pa nyid// 
318a4(rgyud): / rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste// pad+ma'i bu mo che ba nyid// sgrol ma rlung ni rnam dbar dag/ rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste// rdo rje mkha 'gro zhes bya'o// gur gyis de rnams bka' stsal to// sngags thad rnam par dag
318a5(rgyud): par bdud rtsi lnga mchog tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin te/ le'u bdun pa'o// khyod ni zhe sdang rdo rje yongs skyong ba// thugs dang chos ni shin tu rnam dag pas// lha yi lu/ 
318a6(rgyud): ni yang dag rgyan mdzad pa// puk+ka sI ni bdag la myur du gzigs// dam par 'dren pa 'jig rten don gyi phyir// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba zhes por mdzod// khyod ni gti mug rdo rje yongs spyong ba// sku yi bad/ 
318a7(rgyud): bachos kyi gzugs brnyan gyis// lha yi lus ni yang dag rgyan mdzad pa// mgon por khrod ma ni bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba
318a8(rgyud): bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni 'dod chags rdo rje yongs spyod ba// gsung dag legs par so sor rtog pa yis// lha yi lus ni yang dag rgyan mdzad pa// gtum par ldan pa bdag la myur du gzigs// 
318b1(rgyud): rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten smang slad du// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba zhes par mdzod// khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs spyong ba// gzugs kun nan tan thams cad mnyam nyid kyis// 
318b2(rgyud): yi lus ni yang dag rgyan mdzad pa// Dom bi bdag la mgon pa myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyid spong bye zhes par mdzod// thams cad bzhes par
318b3(rgyud): mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'khor lo can rnams thams cad kyi// 'dis ni bskyed par 'gyur bar ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya// dkyil 'khor bdag po de skad gsungaso// oM
318b4(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tA khe tsa rI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa/ oM sarba ta thA/ gA b+hU tsa ri badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA pA tA la wa si nI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ sku gsung thugs kyi/ 
318b5(rgyud): rnams kyi// byon rlabs gnasu rtag par ni// ye shes can gyis bya// ri ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag pos de ska
318b6(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor ba// sku yi rin chen sbyang bar bya// bsam gtan rdo rje bsams nas ni// sems kyi rin chen rab sgrub byed// rdo rje bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis// nga
318b7(rgyud): gi rdo rje dri ma med// gti mug rdo rje rab sbyor bas// mig gi rnam par shes pa sbyang // zhe sdang rdo rje bsams pa yis// sgra yi sgo yi bsams pa'o// sI nr-i ser sna rdo rje yas// ro drug 'dod chags rdo/ 
318b8(rgyud): yis lus ni phrag dag rdo rje yis// yid ni kun tu bzang po yis// de nyid mkha 'gro bdag med ma// 'di rnams kyis ni rnam par spyad // gal te 'gal ba yod pa ma yin yang // de'i
319a1(rgyud): // rgyal ba'i dngos po sbyang ba yod// kun rdzob bden par yang dag gnas nas ni// 'khor lo gzugs kyi chos tsam rnam par sdom// chos kyi dngos po ma byung spyad pa las/ 
319a2(rgyud): gang zag thams cad rnam spangs 'jig rten pa// 'jig rten 'gro bar bsam par mi nus te// chos kyi tshul gyis thams cad rnam par dag/ tshig pa rnams kyi gdung dang dug khyab pa'i// lus
319a3(rgyud): kyi sman ni gzhan gyi dug nyid de// ji ltar chu ni rna bar zhugs pa la// yang ni chu ni thabasu 'gyur pa nyid// ji ltar rlung gis dkrugs pa'i sems rnams kyis// de bzhin mkhas pas mos sran
319a4(rgyud): gre'u bzhin// 'dod chags kyis kyang rmongs pa yi// skye bo la 'dod chags me yis gdung // 'dod chags kyis bskyed 'jig rten pa// 'dod chags smad pas zad par 'gyur// 
319a5(rgyud): 'dod chags rdo rje yongs shes pas// yid ni rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhags pas 'ching ba y-i/ sa// 'jig rten chags pas khyab par brjod// 'dod chags
319a6(rgyud): bral ba'i mngon byang chub// 'dod chags mthar phyin rnams mi 'dod// de nas rdo rje sgrol ma yi// sgrub thabs sbyin sreg las kyi ni// go chas 'dod don thams cad kyi// sgrub thabs yang dag rab
319a7(rgyud): bshad bya// de la 'di rnams ni sngags kyi rkang pa yin te/ oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya// Ar+yA ba lo ki ta sha ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya// ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu ra
319a8(rgyud): sarba duSh+NI ma ma kri te dza b+ha ya/ sem+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba dun+d+ha sta b+ha na tA re swA hA// ma mo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lha ma sgrol ma bsgom par bya/ 
319b1(rgyud): phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste// rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar sgom// gzhon nam yi mtshan nyid 'bar// rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang skyes pa'i// sangs rgyas
319b2(rgyud): bzhi yi dbu rgyan can// lang tsho la ni bab pa'i lus// g.yo ba gser gyi rnacham// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'od zer dmar pos rnam par rgyan// rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin
319b3(rgyud): dung g.yas pas mda' ni 'gengs pa'o// rdo rje lcags kyu ud pa la// bsdigs mdzub g.yon pas 'dzin pa mo// rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba yis// gnas gsum pa ni bsgrub par bya/ 
319b4(rgyud): shar du me tog sgrol ma ste/ kha dog dkar zhing yid 'ong ma// yi ge oM las skyes pa'o// me tog phreng bas lag pa khyab // phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig ma nyid// rgyan rnams kun
319b5(rgyud): gyis rnam par brgyan// g.yasu bdug spos sgrol ma ste// ma dog gnag mdzes pa'i gzugs can ma// spos dang / dung gis lag pa brel// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par
319b6(rgyud): brgyan// nub tu mar me sgron ma ste// mar me sdong bus lag pa khyab// mdog ser rnam par rgyan chen mo// g.yo ba ser gyi rna cham// byang du dri yi sgrol ma ste// dri yi dung gis lag khyab pa// khrag
319b7(rgyud): gis mdog ltar lha mo ni// dkyil 'khor snying po bsgom par bya// lcags kyu la sogs rab dbye bas// der ni sgo yi srung ma bsam// steng du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma// 'og tu gnod mdzes
319b8(rgyud): ma rab sgom// 'khor lo klu zhags bsnams nas ni// spro zhing sngags ni bzla bar bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu// pha rol phyin bcu la gnas ma// 'bras bu thad rab sgrub gyi/ 
320a1(rgyud): // rab tu 'bad pas sgom par bya// sngags ni mchog dang phul du phyin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa// bklags pas 'gyur byed drag pa ste// rdo rje gur gyis bshad
320a2(rgyud): sngags 'dis gos kyi thubar bdun// mngon par bsngags pa bya ba ste// mdung pos bcings te nags tshal du 'gro 'gro na'ang sus kyang mi 'khyer te// stag dang / chom rkun dang / chu srin sna 'thu
320a3(rgyud): dang / seng ge dang // sbrul dang / mche ba can dang / ma he dang / dom dang / smug glang la sogs dran pa tsam gyis nyams shing yib po// sngags 'dis ud pa la la sbyin sreg ji srid du// lan brgya rtsa
320a4(rgyud): brgyad ji tsam bsku bar bya ste/ oM ta re tut+tA re a mu ka me wa/ Sham+ma na ya swA hA/ yang sngags de nyid kyis khwa'i sgrol lan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongasu bzlas te/ dgra'i khyim du sbas
320a5(rgyud): naHnyi ma bdun gyis skrod par byed do// aM ta re tut+ta re tu retsal bA tsa la shI g+h+r-i gA mi ni we dat+ta/ uts+tsha Ta ya tsA phaT/ nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ au tA re tut+tA re tu raM/ a/ 
320a6(rgyud): mu kA b+hi d+ha na ku mA rI ma dA mud+ga he na ta sa si ta dzA yAts+tsha nA me swA hA/ spra tshal dang gtum pa'i sa bon dang / myos byed dang a sho ka'i lo ma dang // me tog bsreg blugs bya zhing // mar dang s+tha
320a7(rgyud): rtsi bu ram du bcas pa stong phrag lnga'i sbyin sreg ni bu mo'i dngos grub la rab tu bsngags te// nyi ma bdun gyis de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas rang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob bo// de nas gzhan yang rab tu/ 
320a8(rgyud): sbyor bar 'gyur// oM tA re tut+tA re tur a mu kA b+hi d+hA naM sas+thAn ta A kaR+Sha ya mA n+ti ke dzaHsngags 'dis pad ra'i tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog bsreg lugs bya bar brjod pa
320b1(rgyud): 'di byas pas skyes pa skyong ba rnams kyi bu mo yang 'gugs par byed do// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig
320b2(rgyud): ma lag pa lcags kyu dang / ud pa la dang zhags par bcas pa rnam par bris te/ de'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas me tog 'di rnams bza' zhing legs zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod nas/ 
320b3(rgyud): phyi nas sgom pa dang ldan par sngags bzlaso// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kI ma me bI taM/ swa pI ka thA ya hUM phaT// stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyuraro// zhags pa dang mgrin par bcings te/ lcags
320b4(rgyud): kyur drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams te//  dal mo'i tshul gyis bza' bar bya'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par
320b5(rgyud): sngags par bya ste/ bdag gi mig gnyis mig sman bsku bar bya zhing rgyal po'i rigs kyi drung du 'jug par bya'o// de nas rgyal po slob ma dang 'dra bar gus par byed cing 'ag
320b6(rgyud): bar mi byed pa dang / bka' drin stsol zhing snyan par brjede par byed pa dang / bran du yang dag par 'gro zhing khros pa yang dbang du 'gyur ba te/ 'di ni mngon sum du mthong ba dang ngo mtshar dang bcas
320b7(rgyud): pa'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ kha gnyis pa'i so dug thal bar byas// ba kha dog dmar mo'i mar dang // arka'i shing bal las
320b8(rgyud): sdong bu rab tu sbar la migo sman bsdu bar bya'o// mig sman rdo rje nyi ma dang // rdo rje chos dag mnyes la rta mchog gos bdug par bya'o// thal ba dang lhan cig mig la bsku bar bya ste/ rdo
321a1(rgyud): mig gis gang bltas pa de// gal te pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug mi 'bab na de'i tshe bdag sgrol ma ma lags te// bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dkrongs pa lag
321a2(rgyud): so// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba byis pa so med pa'i lce blangs la sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun pa par bsngags par byas bung ba'i rgyal po'i rtsa ba dang / ba glang gi gi wang lhan cig byas
321a3(rgyud): pas dpral bar thig le yongasu bzung ste// gang bltas pa de dbang du byed do// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba lto ba'i srin bu la gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags pa bya ste/ rdo rje dang lhan cig/ 
321a4(rgyud): byas pas dpral bar so rtsis byas la byin te// sbyor ba mtsho/ gzos pa ni mi spong ba dang / gzhan du mi dga' ba dang // gzhan du mi 'gro ba dang / rang gi bdag po yang spong ngo // de nas
321a5(rgyud): gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba mar khu chen pos nye bar byug/ sa la// sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas la de bsgom par bya 'o// bzlas pa'i mthar sa lu btags pas mdag gu'i dri ma la
321a6(rgyud): khub byas te// gang la byin pa de lnga por yang mi spong ngo // de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla ba la nye bar chags pa'i dusu sgrol ma'i gzungs zlos shing brten pa byas la de las byung ba'i 'jig rte/ 
321a7(rgyud): dbang phyug blangs te/ dung gi thal ba dang mnye bar bya zhing rab tu dregs ma nyid la sbyin te// ji srid du sngar yang rje su 'brang // de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs kyis ma dan pa
321a8(rgyud): la la lan brgyad yong su bzlas te/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu des rta mgrin dang / lhan tsog pas bskus ni dbang du 'gyur// e tA re tutA re tu ra a mu ka s+ya ban+d+ha na mu k+Shi ku muHswA hA// zhes bya ba'i sngags pa/ 
321b1(rgyud): arka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming nang du bcug par bris la ne'u le'i khung bur sbas na bcings pa las grol bar 'gyuraro// de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byung gnas yang dag
321b2(rgyud): par rab tu bshad par bya'o// gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis pas kyis rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur// lha mo phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma// sku mdog dkar ba yid 'dras
321b3(rgyud): ma/ sku phyed du li ba/ chu skyes shin tu dkar ba la yang dag par gnas ma/ lag pa gnyis par pad+ma mdog dkar ba yang dag par bsgoms shing // g.yon na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje
321b4(rgyud): skyil krungasu gnas pa// rkyen thams cad kyis rnam par ba rgyan pa/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o// oM las skyes ma// mchog tu dga' bar byed ma// dam tshig
321b5(rgyud): sems dpa' bskyed nas ye shes sams bsgom par bya zhing rnal 'byor zla ba drug tu goms pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo bdun du sbyor bas
321b6(rgyud): bstan bcos thad shes par byed do// 'bum bzlas pa'i sbyor bas nyi ma re re lo tshigs bshad brgya brgya byed par 'gyur ro// rab tu 'bad pa med par gzhang brgya yang 'dzin par byed do// 
321b7(rgyud): de la sngags kyi rkang par gyur pa// oM bi tsu bi tsu pradz+nyA bar+t+ta ni/ dz+wa la dz+wA la me d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri bud+yA ba d+ha ni swA hA// khwa mi zer ba na/ sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ ma
321b8(rgyud): bslangs pa sangs po skyur po ji srid zla ba drug du gang 'thungs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// de yis nye bar bstan pa'i sngags
322a1(rgyud): / sgrub pa po yis dri bar 'grub// dal zhing zab mo chos dang ldan// thams cad rig par mkhas dang bcas// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor sngags shes shing // rab gnas gtor ma'i
322a2(rgyud): pha rol son// de nyid bcu ni rnam par rig/ nyan thos spyod pa srang ba po// sngags spyod rim pa gus pa dang // gzugs ldan mthong na dga' ba dang // dkyil 'khor 'dri zhing bzlas par ldan
322a3(rgyud): rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'joms pa po// sngags dang lus skyob spor ba yis// 'jog rten rnams ni bde bar byed// de ldan bla mar bcas nas ni// gang zhig bla ma smod byed cing // skye bo bla ma smod pa
322a4(rgyud): gang / dmyal ba chen por 'tshal bar 'gyur// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dang bor ma chod// rdo rje gur gyis 'gro ba yis// de ltar bla ma'i nan ta/ 
322a5(rgyud): byang bla ma'i grib ma bud med dang // lha ma dang stan dang mal stan rnams// rmongs chen gang zhig 'gong byed na// skyes pa de ni spu gri 'dzin// legs par dbang bskur slo
322a6(rgyud): ma gang // bla ma'i bka' las 'da' byed pa// 'jig rten 'dir ni 'on par 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol dmyal bar gnas// g.yo dang sgra yi sbyar ba yis// brdzun gyis mi nus smra ba las
322a7(rgyud): khong skam mdze nad chen po can// dmyal ba la sogs skye bar 'gyur// de ltar shes pa'i slob ma yis// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur pha rol phyin// bla ma'i bka' ni rab bsrungs na// dngos
322a8(rgyud): grub rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur// tshogs kyi zas ni rtag tu bya// zhi ba la sogs rab tu bskul// snga bar dge 'dun chos ston bya// bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya// bla ma la ni
322b1(rgyud): yon dbul zhing // de yi rjesu tshogs kun la'o// bdag gi las ni bsams nas ni// cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub par bya// yan lag rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// rdo rje dril bu blangs nas
322b2(rgyud): ni// lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma btang // me tog bdag spos mar me dang // de bzhin dri yi dung sogs g.yas// g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod// mdun du snod ni bzhag par
322b3(rgyud): bya zhabs bsil gong ma'i cho ga yis// me tog spos sogs rim pa bzhin// lA s+ye la sogs mchod pa yis// mchod par byas na bzang por sbyin// me tog sgyur ba'i tshul gyi
322b4(rgyud): dang // dri ni 'thor ba'i tshul las dang // sdong pos mar me'i mchod pa dang // byugs pa'i lus kyis rjesu dris// // lA s+ye'i lag pa lA s+ye ste// phreng bas phre nga ba'i mkha'
322b5(rgyud): 'gro ma// glu yis hA gi dam tshig glu/ brla bskums pas ni gar nyid de// mchod pa 'di rnams bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// sangs rgyas rnams ni
322b6(rgyud): mchod pas mchod// 'dod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur// bzlas dang sgom pa mngon dga' zhing // rtag tu 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bka' ji bzhin// 'di rnams bla med/ 
322b7(rgyud): mchod pa'o// me tog spos sogs mngon sum du// 'jig rten spyod par gnas pa yis// sna tshogs mchod pa mchog nyid min// de nyid byang chub yan lag min// / dkar po zhi bar byed par
322b8(rgyud): brjod// ser po rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs la// dbang dang dgug par dmar po ste// tha ma'i las la nag po'o// zhi ba la ni me tog dkar// ser po rgyas pa'i rdo rje la// me tog nag po tha mo la// dab
323a1(rgyud): dang dgug la dmar po bzang // rnal 'byor pa gang dbang bskur med// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhags dang // gang zhig rab gnas ma mthong dang // gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas pa// 
323a2(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// de yi dngos grub mchog nyid med// gang gis slob dpon gsol ma btab// 'dir ni rigasu skye ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// gang gis
323a3(rgyud): byang chub ma thob na// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gnasu de'i// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur ba'o// yang na sa yi bdag po nyid// dag pa'i gnasu mngon par 'gro// bde ba can dang mkha'agro dang // dga' ldan
323a4(rgyud): du ni blo ldan skye// 'jig rten 'dir ni gang 'grub pa// sangs rgyas de ni ci zhig smos// khams gsum bdag po che na po 'di// 'chi med rgas pas khyab pa med// tshangs pa brgya
323a5(rgyud): byin de bzhin drag/ sgra gcan ma dang rlung dang ni// 'dod pa'i lha dang thong ldan nyid// 'di rnams de yi 'khor du 'gyur// / lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha ma yin dang mi// mi la/ 
323a6(rgyud): ci dang mkha' spyod gang // de rnams 'khor 'gyur the tshom med// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rigs dang byang chub byed pa dang / de bzhin du ni lhar gshegs
323a7(rgyud): dang / khyim nas 'byung ba byed pa dang // rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa dang // skye ba yongasu len pa dang // yongasu mya ngan 'das pa ston// 'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong nas ni// 'di ni gzugs ni dum
323a8(rgyud): byed sangs rgyas sems can bskyab bzhed pas// sangs rgyas gar ni rol pa mdzad// ri bong stag dang seng ge dang // glang po rnams kyi rigasu yang // snying rjes phan pa'i sems kyis ni// 
323b1(rgyud): phyag rgyas grub pa skye bar 'gyur// bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis// 'dod chags can la chos gsung ngo // bud med sgyum sangs rgyas nyid// sgyu ma thams cad sel bar byed// shes
323b2(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin gzugasu// bud med rtag tu yang dag gnas// sgyu ma chen mo gnas 'dug nas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ster// g.yo zhing dad tshe ngo tsha med// rtag tu 'dod chags
323b3(rgyud): pha rol 'gro// dngos grub kyang ni rab tu ster// gzugs dang yon tan nor la yang // 'di de ba gang yang btsun mo med// rdo rje 'dod chags yid 'dod pas// rang gi bde ba myang bar ldan// 
323b4(rgyud): skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa dang // bder gshegs bka/ Ta las mi 'da' zhing // bla ma bsnyen bkur snying rje can// // kye'i rdo rje rab phye ba'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma/ 
323b5(rgyud): gtso mo dang / mkha'agro ma rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa// zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// gti mug rdo rje phyag la tos+ho// ser sna rdo rje bad
323b6(rgyud): la stobs// 'dod chags rdo rje bdag la stsol// yid dang phrag dog chen po dang // rdo rje kun gyis dam tshig mgon// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// rdo rje can kun dgyes par mdzod// de nas
323b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mkha' gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig la gnas te// dbyangs 'di gsungs pa// thig skud sar pa mdzes par ldan// shin tu tshad ma gtsang ma yis// he zhes bya ba'i dkyil
323b8(rgyud): 'khor gyi// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya// de la 'di ni slob ma chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa'i dam tshig go// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhi// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
324a1(rgyud): gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'dren pas bshad du gsol// dkyil 'khor gyis rdo rje la gsol ba gdab pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i/ 
324a2(rgyud): nge 'dzin to// nga ni snying rje stobs dpal ldan// srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba po// rdo rje yis ni gsal ba'i lus// sku gsung las ni skyes pa spro// gal te la la 'da' byed na// 'jig ste 'di la
324a3(rgyud): the tsom med/ lus srul po dang kha cig gang // bde chen ye shes 'byung ba dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes// zur cig bgegs ni chen po rnams// 'khor lo yis ni brgyad nyid kyi/ 
324a4(rgyud): yis sgo ni rab tu grags// stong khang lha yi snam bu ni// sgro tshad kyi tshad du bya// sgo yi phyed kyi cha ru ni// ya phubs dadang ni 'gram nyid do// rigs byed nyid kyang de bzhin bya// dra ba'i
324a5(rgyud): snam bu rig byed phyed// dang por tshangs pa'i thig dang ni/ gnyis par 'tsham sa kyi thig dang yang // gsum par ngos ni bzhi yi bzhi// thig ni
324a6(rgyud): rab tu gdab par bya// tshangs thig cha gnyis bor nas ni// cha drug du ni gdab par bya// de nas sgo yi tshad bor nas// dgu yi char ni rab tu gdab// de la 'di ni sa sbyang ba'i dam tshig go// oM khaM hA b+ha/ 
324a7(rgyud): de la 'di ni ye shes spyan drang ba ste/ oM me di ni badz+rI b+ha ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM/ de la 'di ni thig gdab pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM sa ma ya su tra mA ti kra ma hA// de la 'di ni rdul tshon bri ba'i dam tshig ste/ 
324a8(rgyud): 'di ni chos dbyings dog pa ste// sems can khams ni thar bar byed// kye'i rdo rje rgyal po ches// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya// dbang ldan du ni sa ra b+he// me yi mtsham su dge slong bri/ 
324b1(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bden bral du// rlung du rdo rje bri bar bya// lcags kyu shar du bri bar bya// lho la sgor ni zhags pa nyid// nub sgor de bzhin lcags sgrog ste// byang du rdo rje dril bu'o// dbus su thod pa da/ 
324b2(rgyud): po ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos sbyin srog gi grong khyer rab tu phye ba rdo rje thab khung sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i sreg rdzas sbyor ba las// zlum por zhi bar byed par
324b3(rgyud): brjod// rgyas pa raba'i rdzing bu'i gzugs// dbang ni zla ba phyed pa 'dra// dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs// bsad dang zhe sdang las la ni// na mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin skrod byed skal ngan
324b4(rgyud): dang / yan lag nyams pa'i sbyor ba yis// tsan dan a ga ru da shing dang // gzhan yang dri yi rkang 'thung gis// sbyin sregayan lag me sbar nas// phyis ni yang ni dgug par bya// oM e h+ye hi ma
324b5(rgyud): hA b+hU ta de ba ri'i dri dzasatwa ma gr-i h+Na tA ma khye rdzas smin+da nI hi ta b+ha ba/ lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug par bya// zhags pa nyid kyis gzhug bya zhing / lcags sgrog gis ni zhags dag bcing // dril bu
324b6(rgyud): 'khol bas dbang du byas// lA s+yai la sogs mchod pa brgyad// mchod yon cho ga byas nas ni// mar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba las// yang ni men mnyes par bya// de la 'di ni rdo rje mchod yon gyi dam tshig ste// 
324b7(rgyud): oM pra ba ra sat+kA ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA// de la 'di ni zhabs bsil gyi dam tshig ste/ oM sarba pA pa da ha na badz+ra ya satwa s+ya sarba pA paM da ha swA hA// de la 'di ni sreg rdzas thams cad 'chu ba'i dam tshig gi sngags te/ 
324b8(rgyud): oM badz+ra na la maM hA b+hU ta dz+wa le ye/ sarba b+hasmiM ku ru sarba duSh+Tan hUM phaT/ dri sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ phyi nas rang 'dod pa'i lha spyan drang ba ste/ oM e h+ye he b+ha ga wan+ti ha b+hak+Sha Na sa ma yin tsa
325a1(rgyud): / a gan+d+ha sa ti tsi pU dza dzA da pra sid+d+ha me// de la 'di ni dgyes pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM kr-i to ga/ sarba sa twAR+thaHsid+d+hirbad+d+hA ya thA nug/ gats+tsha dA bud+d+ha bi Sha ya pun rAg ma nA ya muH/ bzhes
325a2(rgyud): ba dang // las sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba dang // sbyin sreg gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// rdo rje sems de pa'i rab gnas ni// 'jig rten tha snyed la gnas te/ 
325a3(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni bstan po rag/ dang po re shog rig ma 'dzin// dril bu 'khrol bar 'dod pa dang // rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba las// g.yas par rdo rje gsor ba dang // son thun skad ni ma
325a4(rgyud): ba ni/ gos kyis mgrin pa bcings pa dang // rin chen sman gyis yongs gang ba'i// bum pa sta gon gnas par bya// oM de wa pi tsu badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM mo ha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ a/ 
325a5(rgyud): dwe Sha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM rA ga ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Thi/ oM badz+ra ra/ ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badz+ra gau rI A kaR+Sha ya dzaHoM badz+ra ts+tshapra be sha ya hUM/ oM badz+ra/ tA lI ban+d+ha ya baM/ oM badz+ra g+hasma rI/ 
325a6(rgyud): wa sh+yaM ku ru hoH// 'di ni ye shes dgug pa'i cho ga'o// shun pa lnga dang ba spu lnga// khyad par du yang dri lnga dang // lus bshal la ni blugs par bya// mchod yon li sog sa sngar bzhin bya// yang
325a7(rgyud): na de nyid sbyor bar bya// snga bar blugs shing byin gyis brlab// mig la sogs par gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// dbang ni rang gis rigs nyid kyis// mchod
325a8(rgyud): pal sogs rim pas brtsam// rang gi snying nas ye shes bsam// sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bsang gtor bya// ye shes rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// rim pas mchod pa'i lha mo spro// byang chub sems
325b1(rgyud): mchog bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas bstod pa yang dag brtsam// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// stong pa snying rje tha dad med// khyod ni rnal 'byor mtshogs yongasu bskor// khyod ni nyid kyi thug
325b2(rgyud): kyi mchog mnyes pa// khyod kyi rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba kun bsgrubs shing // snying rje'i thugs kyi sems can sad mdzad pa// sgyu ma'i spros pas rdo rje 'phel mdzad pa// he ru ka dpal rdo rje yid
325b3(rgyud): kyis dgyes// rdo rje se gol sbyar ba yis// rdo rje sgom pa bsgom par bya// rdo rje yi ge blangs nas ni// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje phung / 
325b4(rgyud): po rnam par bsgom// de nas rdo rje mched pa bsam// rdo rje lce yis sbyor ba las// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rjes bcug nyid // rdo rje'i sngags kyi bas dag s+ho// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i
325b5(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba'i rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to// nam kha'i khams kyi dbus son par// rtse mo lnga pa bris pa yi sa// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// stobs kyis
325b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas phur bus gdab// chos 'byung grong khyer yid 'ong bar// rdo rje mdzub mo'i sbyor ba las// gal te dngos grub mi gter na// rdo rje sems dpa' bsad par bya// oM du ru dA ru/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ 
325b7(rgyud): hA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phur bus gdab pa chen po rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rta mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje
325b8(rgyud): chesa~M/ phyag rgya chen por brjod pa las// pad+ma dmar ba spyi bor 'dzin// sku mdog dmar ba stobs po che// gos dkar gnyis med sbyor ba'i las// bcu drug phyag gi rnam par rgyan// g.yas pa/ 
326a1(rgyud): zhal ni nag po ste// g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma med// dang po dmar po shes par bya// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// 
326a2(rgyud): ni gzi brjid che// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa'o// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya// dbu rgyan rdo rje 'chi
326a3(rgyud): pa bsam// sku mdog dkar po gzi brjid che// phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs papo// chos kyi 'khor lo spyi bor 'dzin// 'dod chags tshon po rjes chags
326a4(rgyud): pa/ spyan dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// 'jigs pa' did ni 'jigs par mdzad// dang po'i zhal ni dkar po// ste// nag po dmar pos rnam par rgyan// lhag pa'i zhal
326a5(rgyud): ni bung ba mtshungs// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje nyi ma rnam par sgom// cod pan rin che na 'dzin par bsam// rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che// phyag ni
326a6(rgyud): bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po// sems kyis rin chen spyi bos 'dzin// bcom gser ltar gzi brjid che// dang po'i zhal ni ser po ste// g.yas pa sngon
326a7(rgyud): ba 'dra ba'o// g.yon pa zla 'od bzang po ste// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rta mchog rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan ral gri 'dzin
326a8(rgyud): bapar bsam// mar gad ud pal mtshungs pa'o// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ bcu drug phyag gi rnam par rgyan// dang po'i zhal ni stobasangs te// rta yi gzugs te 'jigs pa
326b1(rgyud): g.yas pa kha dog nag po ste// g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma med// ral gri dngos grub spyi bor mdzin// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// rdo rje nyi ma rta nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'di ni sgrol ma'i
326b2(rgyud): gzugs// lha mo rnams kyi phyag gnyis brjod// gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kye rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog/ ral gri dag ni rtag pa nyid// phan par me long de bzhino// rta mgrin la ni
326b3(rgyud): gos bzang ste// rdo rje nyi ma la ni gsar// rta mchog la ni 'gro mgyogs te/ mchog du phan pa nyid kyi yon// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// bla ma la rtag rgyun tu dbul/ skal ba
326b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bdag/ skal bzang thub pa rnam snang mdzad// skal bzang dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang // skal bzang nyi ma bdun rgyal po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
326b5(rgyud): rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa pos ma nga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig mchog gsungs pa// oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra ya d+hA ra ya/ marda marda/ badz+ra d+h+r-i ka phaT
326b6(rgyud): swA hA/ de nas sngags chen bshad pa ni// rdo rje skye ba'i snying rje che// 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni// rdo rje'i dngos grub rab du stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi rnam pa'i ting 'dzi/ 
326b7(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te// rta mgrin gyi sngagaso 'dri gsungs pa// oM badz+ra d+har+m+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hu lu hu lu/ oM A ro lo ka phaT/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam na// rdo rje chos ni grags chen po// 'jig
326b8(rgyud): shing skrag par gyur nas ni// chos kyi dngos grub rab du stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// phan pa'i sngags 'di
327a1(rgyud): / gsungs pa// oM sA shA taM pa ra sA sha ta e h+ye hi dzi na dzi ka phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin gshegs// brgyal zhing 'jigs
327a2(rgyud): par gyur nas ni// de nas sangs rgyas dngos grub stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje gzi brjid kyi sngags 'di gsung
327a3(rgyud): pa// oM badz+ra sUr+yA ta mo bi d+ha ma na sa ma ya s+t+waM a ha rat+na d+h+r-ika phaT swA hA// de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che// 'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni// nyi ma'i dngos
327a4(rgyud): grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rdo rje zhes byi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhags te/ rta mchog rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungaso// phuHphuHphuHhi hi hi/ pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika phaT/ 
327a5(rgyud): swA hA// de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// rdo rje don yod rigs byung ba// 'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni// de rnam sa don yod dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
327a6(rgyud): de nyid de// rdo rje can gyi zla phyed mtshungs// rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma 'dra/ nyi mi'i yid bzhin nor bu sbyin// rta mchog zhes bya de yi ni// thams cad du ni gru gsum mo// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// phan/ 
327a7(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya nyid dang ni// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// rin chen tog gi 'od byed ma// don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya che// rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par ldan// stag gi lpags pa bsnams pa dang // dbu
327a8(rgyud): sgra thod pa phyed pa ste// mchod par brtson pa'i sems dpa' yis// chags pa mig dmar mthong nas ni// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las// chags pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// las sna
327b1(rgyud): tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rdo rje spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje phyag rgya yang dag brtsams// 
327b2(rgyud): me tog lo bras sogs kyis rgyan pa// nags chen po yi mtha' nyid du// sems dpa'o chen po 'gro bar bya// nags tshal du ni slong mo rgyu// zas ni bzang po rgyan pa nyid// de rnams 'jig
327b3(rgyud): shing skrag nas ster// nags tshal bdag po'i rigs kun ni// rdo rje can ni 'khor du 'gyur// skyes pa dang ni skye ba kun// skye bo gang zhig skye 'gyur ba// gti mug rdorje'i sbyor ba las// rdorje'i mig gis
327b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' da bar// sgra ni gang zhig rab grags pa/ rna ba'i drung du/ gnas pa bzhin// zhe sdang rdo rje'i sbyor ba las// drang srong / 
327b5(rgyud): mngon par shes pas thos// sems can kun gyi sem sa chen po// mtshon ka lta bu'i mtshan nyid ni// lag mi thil skya ru ra lnga bzhin// rdo rje'i sems kyis she bar 'gyur// 
327b6(rgyud): dbye ba stong phrag du/ rang gi rigs ni stong phrag gcig/ rdo rje sbyor bas dran 'gyur te// nyi ma gsum bzhin dran par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba du ma y-i sa// 'dis ni snang bar byed par 'gyur// mngon shes
327b7(rgyud): lnga yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mngon shes thob par 'gyur// rdo rje skye mched rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// phan pa nyid kyi zhi ba ste// rdo rje nyi mas rgyas pa'o// rdo rje
327b8(rgyud): chos kyis dbang zhes bya// rdo rje sems dpas bsad par bya// zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste/ dbang ni yang dag brtsam par bya// rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa ste/ rdo rje char sprin rab bsgom
328a1(rgyud): bya// rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni// bu mo bkug nas bza' bar bya// me yi cha sprin 'bab pa dang // gdug pa'i sems kyis bsad par bya// 'phrog pa las
328a2(rgyud): ni dkar mo ste// skye gnyis pa las tshangs pa nyid// dpal ni sred med bu las kyang // ma bcag pa las ra b+ha nyid// rgam chu srin rgyal mtshan las// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis// de
328a3(rgyud): rnams thams cad nye bar bza'// shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyi rtse// 'dod pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// mthar ni swA hAs zhi ba ste// rgyas pa'i dus su bau ShaT/ mthor ni hUM phaT bas
328a4(rgyud): pa la/ dbang dang dgug la dzaHdang hiH/ las thams cadad pa'i le'u sa bcu gcig pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgya la ni/ mkha'agro ma ni rdo rje gur// 
328a5(rgyud): rje mkha' 'gro rab sgrub phyir// thug pas tshig 'di bka'/ stsal to// me tog 'bras bus rgyan byas pa'i// ri khrod dang ni sman ljongasu// rdo rje skyil krungs bcas nas ni// bla ma
328a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas mchod par bya// dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyi
328a7(rgyud): gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la// byang chub bar du skyabasu mchi// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// byang chub mchog gi sems ni
328a8(rgyud): bskyed bgyis nas// sems can thams cad bdag gi 'gron du gnyer// byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ tshangs pa'i/ 
328b1(rgyud): gnas ni bzhi po las/ sems kyi ngal nigs par bya// phyi nas byang chub sems gnas te// rdo rje srung ba'i dam tshig go// bden dang rdzun par spyad pa yis/ brtag pas nye bar mi dag/ 
328b2(rgyud): te/ ma skyes pa yi sbyor ba yis// skye ba 'dir ni rab tu brjod// oM shun tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+maka tsi// ni mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ snun
328b3(rgyud): bcu yi sbyor ba yis// khro bo btsu ni rim pas dgod// gshin rje mther byed shes rab mthar// pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// Tak+ke khro ba dbyug pa sngon// mi g.yo bdong stabs/ 
328b4(rgyud): chen dang // gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dang // rdo rje na dbas 'gro gnas pa dang // bdud rtsi zhabs 'og gnas dpa no// bdud rtsi sbyor bas thams cad du// khro bo'i sgom pas
328b5(rgyud): bsgom par bya// dpag tshad brgyar ni khyab pa ru// bas/ sa nas bgegs ni bskrad par bya// na mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya
328b6(rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// ma~M le dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yang ni chu ni bsgom par bya// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// brtul zhugs can gyis dbang chen sna
328b7(rgyud): dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni// bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya// bruM las gnas ni bsams nas// rnam pa lnga ni rab brtag bya// ye shes lnga las byung ba yis// sems dpa'i gzugs
328b8(rgyud): brnyan bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// rig ma'i skyes bu bsgom par bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra swa b+hA At+ma ko ha/ rdo rje bzhings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mig la sogs
329a1(rgyud): / par gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// thugs kyi rdo rje mkha' spyod ma// gsung gi rdo rjes spyod ma// sku la zhabs 'og gnas ma ste/ oM AHhUM las byung
329a2(rgyud): ba'o// rdo rje dkar mo chu bdag ma// rdo rje mkha' gro bdag med ma// zhe sdang rdo rje'i gnas mnan cing // dkyil 'khor snying por bsgom par bya// dkar me chom rkun ro langs ma// g+hasma rA na
329a3(rgyud): sgo srung ma// puk+ka sI dang ri khrod ma// rdol ba g.yung mo mtshamasu dgod// steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad// 'og tu de bzhin sa spyod mo// dbus su bdag med mkha 'gro ma// mkha' gro
329a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid du sgom// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ ji ltar mchod pa che stsal pa// bdag kyang rab tu bskyab pa 'i phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol// dbang skur rdo rje chen
329a5(rgyud): po ni/ khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// gnas las byung ba stsol pa mdzad// ye shes kyi dbang la gsol ba gdeng rdo rje zhas
329a6(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rig ma'i skyes bu dbang chen la// cod pan rang gi lhag pa'i lha// des ni dkyil 'khor dbang dang ni// bstod dang mchod pa la sogs bya// ye shes gzhugs
329a7(rgyud): pa de bzhin yang // lce yis rdo rje bdud rtsi myang // nang du brjod pa'i sbyor ba las// brtul zhugs can gyi sngags bzlas kyang // rnal 'byor ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 
329a8(rgyud): de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ces spyad par bgyi// 
329b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// rnal 'byor ma zhes mngon par brjod// phyag rgya chen po rab sbyor las// gang phyir de nyid brten pa yi// rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gur// 
329b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud ces bshad// pha rol phyin pa kun gyi thabs// bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// dga' mdzes mkha 'gro ma yis mtsho// mkha' dang gser gyi char pa dang // dga'
329b3(rgyud): chen ma dang gAsma ri// shin tu dgyes rol gsang yig 'phrog/ rdo rje mkha'agro pan rgyud brgyad// kyai rdo rje sangs rgyas kun// gsang mdzod rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang // 'khor lo sdom pa gur gyi
329b4(rgyud): 'byung gnas ni// rnal 'byor ma rgyud du ni rab tu grags// skyes bu/ rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor rgyud ni yang dag bshad// btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ rnal 'byor
329b5(rgyud): ma yi rgyud bshad// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya bo rnal 'a khyor de ltag la// sems can mchog la rnal 'byor ma cho ga/ rnal 'byor gang med de lta ga la/ de nas byang chub
329b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// re shig bdag cag gi yul rnams ni 'tshal na// sems can gzhan rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'tshal
329b7(rgyud): ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// stong pa snying rje tha dad med// gang du sems ni rab bsgoms pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o// mu stegs can
329b8(rgyud): sun dbyung ba yang // rgol ba rnams char gcod pa dang // rang gi sde'i gzhung mngon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bdag gi byang chub thob bya'i phyir// gang phyir gzhan dag bsgral ba'i phyir// 
330a1(rgyud): des na sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o// bdag 'dzin zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// chos dbyings bdag nyid sgrub thabs ni// thab dang shes rab 'dus pa yis/ 
330a2(rgyud): des ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang // rgyal ba'i sras po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung 'di thos nas dga' bar gyur te/ tshig 'di skad smras pa/ e ma/ 
330a3(rgyud): kun tu bzang po yi// bstan pa na mkha' las byung ba// na mkha'i dbusu sbyor ba yis// ye shes rgya mtsho nyan par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// bde ba chen po rnam 'phel bas// dam tshig thams
330a4(rgyud): cad bshad par bya// sangs rgyal 'dod pa yis// bad dang ra dngas shing gar dang ni// glu gar rol mo sgra byed pas// dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis// rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu 'grub// ji
330a5(rgyud): ltar bde ba bde bzung nas// ji ltar 'dod pa spyad par bya// ji lta ra gnasu gnas nas kyang // yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyu 8// bza' dang btung ba'i sbyor ba dang // bzang po'i rgyan gyis
330a6(rgyud): brgyan pa yis// nyi ma gcig tu bskal ba yis// dam pa de nyid 'grub par 'gyur// rtag tu rang gi dam tshig myang // rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul// bla ma sangs rgyas
330a7(rgyud): kun dang mnyam// ji ltar mgon po rnam snang mdzad// rdo rje 'dzin sbyin bla ma nyid// ji ltar na mkha' rgya mtsho che// ji ltar thub pa rgya mtsho chos// ji ltar mgon po bdun rgyal po// de ltar rdo rje slob dpon brjod/ 
330a8(rgyud): des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che// dge ba mchog tu gsal ba po// nam yang smad par mi bya'o// rdo rje sdom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// 
330b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po rdo rje gsor bar bzhed pa'o// mkha 'gro bdag med mas 'khyud pas// bzang po spyod pa dbye bar bya// rdo rje'i gzugasu bzhag nas ni// ji ltar 'dod par
330b2(rgyud): 'dod pa yis// rig 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid// dogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// dri lnga yang dag blangs na su// rdzas lnga dang ni bsre bar bya// lcags gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni// ril
330b3(rgyud): bu'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// gur gu me a ga ru ldan pa// nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// ril bu kha ru bcug byas nas// nyi ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// sha lnga dang ni ldan pa ru// lcug
330b4(rgyud): gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni// rdo rje nyi ma rab sbyor bas// nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// tsan dan dmar po kha che dang // dga' ba sbas par sbyar ba ni// lcags gsum gyis ni dkri
330b5(rgyud): byas pa/ rta yi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po rnam bsgoms nas/ tsa na'i rus pa'i tshad tsam las/ gu gul lcags kyis dkris pa ni// mgon po'i rig pa 'dzi
330b6(rgyud): par 'gyur// ril bu sgrub thabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// klu yi rgyal po'i mgo bsregs nas// rang byung khrag gis bsgo bar bya// rdo rje phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mig sman rig pa 'dzin
330b7(rgyud): 'gyur// ba bla'i sa boni ldan pa dang // stag gi lpags pa'i tshil bu mnye/ sku yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// rkang pa'i byug pa 'grub par 'gyur// yan lag med pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus// dbang ba
330b8(rgyud): / brag phug 'gram du ni// rdo rje rkang 'og rnal 'byor gyis// lha yi bu mo rab bsgrub bya/ oM Da'i yul du nye ba na/ a mra 'bras chen pa yi ni// rdo rje gnod mdzes sbyor ba yis/ rkang 'og rig pa 'dzin pa
331a1(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// yang nas yang du bskul bar bya// de nyid dngos grub thams cad kyis// yid bzhin nor sasu mtshungs// rdo rje gdod mdzes sku chen po// phyag
331a2(rgyud): gnyis zhal ni gcig pa can// sdig mdzub klu yi zhags pa dang // kha dog nag por bsgom par bya// rdo rje mdzod ni blangs nas ni// rnam pa thams cad bsgom par bya// mi bskyod pa yi yang dag
331a3(rgyud): mnan// phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do// rab tu byung ba dang mig sman rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos nas/ dga'
331a4(rgyud): zhing mgu ba skyes par gyur te tshig 'di skad smras so// e ma he/  rdo rje// oM ma rdo rje'i bstan pa ni// chos rnams thams cadu stong pa la// gang phyir dngos grub rab gnas pa// snying po
331a5(rgyud): med pa'i chu shing la// ji ltar snying po'i 'bras zhim pa// de ltar snying po med lus la// dngos grub 'bras zhim de bzhin/ na mkha' 'byung po thams cad dang // chos rnams kun gyi
331a6(rgyud): gnas yin te// sems ni na mkha' lta bur dag/ dag pa'i sems ni mchog tu bde// don dam dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis// sems las phyi rol 'gyur ba med// gzugs sogs so sor 'dod// 
331a7(rgyud): pa yi// sems nyid du ni 'dod par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar sems stong la/ 
331a8(rgyud): sems las phyi rol gyi don sems mi stong pa rab tu 'byung zhes bgyi// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ thog med srid pa'i bag chags kyis/ phyi rol don ni rnam par brtags/ sems
331b1(rgyud): kyis thams cad rnam par brtags// sems ni kun tu 'gro bar brjod// byang chub sems rab tu 'byung ba bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// shin tu gzhin mdzes mig yangs ma// si
331b2(rgyud): ga bur 'byung ba'i gnas// dbang zha gzhug par byas nas ni// ska nas bzung bar yang dag brtsam// rdo rje'o yis 'o byas shing // rdo rje nyid pas mnye bar bya// rdo rje 'khyud pas yang dag blang // rdo rje ma
331b3(rgyud): mchu rab brtsir bya// rdo rje mtshub mo'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gnas ni rab bskul bya// rdo rje sems ni phyung ba yis// rdo rje lce yis yang dag bza'// phyi nas de yi bde can du// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag
331b4(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje 'chi' ba'i sbyar ba yis// rdo rje mchod pa yang da dge brtsam// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba la// sems ni/ brtul zhugs can gyi dbrog/ pad+ma me tog ldan pa yis// 
331b5(rgyud): pad+ma dmar pos mchod par bya// pad+mas mnyes pa'i rdo rje can/ pad+ma dmar pos khyad par du'o// dri nga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis// rgyal mtshan ga pur mchod pa ni// 'di ni brtson
331b6(rgyud): 'grus bde chen dang // stobs dang rgyas par 'gyur ba dang // mthong ba nyid kyis bskul ba yis// 'jig rten 'di ni dbang du byed// gang gis dkon mchog gsum bsad dang // gang gis
331b7(rgyud): sems can bsad byas dang // gang gis slob dpon smod pa dang // sangs rgyas lam la 'phya ba rnams// lcags kyu yis ni yang dag dgug/ lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcing // zhags
331b8(rgyud): pas mgrin pa dam par bcing // rdo rje bdag gis dgug par bya// mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas bsams nas ni// de rnams dbang por gsol bar bya// 'dis ni sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang // rdo rje/ 
332a1(rgyud): / sems dpa' bkrongs pa ste// 'di ste sdig pa chen po ste// mnar med 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de// 'di ni dmyal ba chen por ltung // de ltar bsams nas bsad par bya// rdo rje'i gzu
332a2(rgyud): ni bsams nas su// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje dbyigs pas brdung byas nas// rdo rje can gyi gnasu skye// lcags kyu la sogs mi nus na// zan kyis kyang ni 'du bya zhing // de nyid kyis
332a3(rgyud): ni gzugs bsams nas// rdo rje dkyil 'khor nyid du bzhag/ Tik+ka rgyal po lcags kyu ste// dbyug sngon can la rang gi ming // stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa// mi g.yo gri rtsi'i dkyil 'khor can/ 
332a4(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa chen po gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// thams cad dbyugs dbyung rab gsol bas// dam tshig rdo rje srung don du// sbas
332a5(rgyud): pa'i spyod yul 'di gsungs pa// rdo rje khro bo'i skyes bu che//  mas cad zhal cig phyag gnyis pa// snying khar g.yon/ kha'i khu tshur mdzug// g.yas na rang gi mtshon cha 'phyar// 
332a6(rgyud): gshin rje gsod pa'i dbyig to can// gzhan gyi mi thub rdo rje dbyig/ rta mgrin la ni dbang mchog dmar// mi phyed bdud rtsi'i thab sbyor las// Tak+ki rgyal po lcags kyu ste// dbyig sngon can la/ 
332a7(rgyud): rang gi ming // stobs kyi rgyal po rtsa gsum pa// mi g.yo yi ge'i dkyil 'khor rtse// tshad skyob rgyal po rgyal po la// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par sgom// gtun shing rdo rje rkang 'og la// zhabs
332a8(rgyud): g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o// dbang po sngon po'i rnam pa ltar// mthar byed rnam par bsgom par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje ni// 'jigs byed zla ba'i nor bu 'dra// pad+ma'i khro bo dmar po che// 
332b1(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid gnag/ mtshams kyi phra batshar gnag cing // spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan// gshin rje rnam snang nyid kyis te/ rdo rje sems dpa' dbyig pa can// 'dra'i khra ba rnams
332b2(rgyud): gzigs rjes// rdo rje sems dpa' la sbyor ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya// 'og tu pad+ma'i gdan bsams nas// khro bo bcu rnams rab bsgom bya// 
332b3(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje rang dngos su// bcu phyed dkyil 'khor bdag nyid de// bdud rnams zhabs kyi 'og bsams nas// dkyil 'khor lnga po bsgom par bya// srung ba'i 'khor lo gzi brjid che/ bskal pa
332b4(rgyud): me ltar 'bar ba ste// 'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo bar// dpagatshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsam mo// srung ba'i dam tshig stobasakyi rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// / 
332b5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan dpa' chen po// rang gi byin rlabs rims pa/ nas te// rang gi byin rlabs rnal 'byor gyis// de nyid la/ zhi bshad par bya// snying gi dbusu zla bar 'gyur// gzugs
332b6(rgyud): brnyan zla bar ma bcos pa// sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag khyab// de las rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje bdag med mkha 'gro ma// cho gas bskul bas bsgom par bya// mkha 'gro sna yi mthar gnas
332b7(rgyud): pa yungs kar tsam du rnam par sgom// yungs kar la ni 'gro ba kun// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// de ltar sgom par byed pa yi// rang gi byin rlabs rab tu 'grub// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri
332b8(rgyud): dang ni// ro dang reg bya mngon 'dod pa// der ni rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni// mi 'dzin de phyir bdag gzhan med// ji ltar rdor pad las byung ba// zhi ba'i bde ba'i rnam par 'dod// rba rlabs med cing snang ba med// 
333a1(rgyud): ma rtog med cing yi ge med// myos byed cung zad rab 'thungs pa'i// bdag gi bdag nyid mi rig go// dga' bral dga' ba dag gi mthar// rtog pa'i dra ba rnam par spangs/ 
333a2(rgyud): 'gyur med 'khrul pa las 'das shing // kye'i rdo rje rnam par gsal// bems min rnam pa he ru ka/ rnam pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor// rang nyid mgon po he ru ka/ de yis bdag nyid mi rig
333a3(rgyud): cing // de yis dus na thams cad rig/ 'byung po 'gro dang 'ong ba ni// rang gi kun mkhyen lta bur gzigs// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras po dang // yan lag kun dang bu ga kun// mgon po dra ba'i
333a4(rgyud): skud par bcas// lus ni yod min ltar gzigs shing // ska/ da cig kye'i rdo rje'i gzugs 'dzin// ji ltar na mkha' mig/ dazigs shing // mtshan ma med cing ma byung dang // gos pa med
333a5(rgyud): cing 'khrul pa med// sgrib pa lnga ni rnam par spangs// ji ltarame long gzugs brnyan ni// rtogs nas bde ba rnam spang sa pa// de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka'i// rnam pa lta bur
333a6(rgyud): gsal bar mthong // de nyid don dang dbang po dang // phung po na mkha' lta bur yod// lus ni bde ba nyid brjod cing // 'du byed rnams kyis zil mi mnon// gzugs ni mig gi mi 'dzin te// sgra
333a7(rgyud): ni thos pa po yi min// lce yis ro ni mi tshor te// dri s+t+re yis yang ma ya ni// reg bya lus kyi gong bus min// 'on kyang bde chen tshul las ni// bud med bzang mo rig pas bde// rna bas glu yis
333a8(rgyud): bde bas bzang // snum pas dri yis bde ba che// skye gnas reg pa'i bad chen dang // ro yis btung ba'i sbyor ba las// gang gis bde ba 'gog par byed// bde ba chen pos 'gro ba byas// 
333b1(rgyud): bde ba ma rtogs mi sheso// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// mkha'agro ma dang btsun mo bzang // sangs rgyas lnga dang du ma ni// bde bar phyin cing rnam par bsad// de nas byang chub
333b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bde ba chen po'i tshig 'di skad smras pa// phal pa'i rnam rtog gzhom pa'i phyir// sgom pa yang dag rab tu bsgrags// phal po'i
333b3(rgyud): gnas skabs gzhol ba'i phyir// sgom pa yang ni sgom pa min// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa de bzhin de// 'on kyang mi gtsang ba'i tshad mnyam par sbyang ba'i phyir// de bzhi
333b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bsgom par bya'o// phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das lus can sgom pa'i tha dbas kyi dgos pa nyid de ci lags// bcom ldan 'das
333b5(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po dgos pa yod de// bcom ldan 'das ming ci lags// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas nyid ci
333b6(rgyud): lags// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci lags/ lus can 'di ni bden pa'o/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nga ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
333b7(rgyud): ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mi 'dra ba'i phyir sgrub pa yin no// phyag ni rdo rjes gsol pa// ci bcom ldan 'das bems po lags sam// rdo rje 'dzin pas
333b8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ nga nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes// me long lta bu'i ye shes de ci lags// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal ba// bden pa ma yin pa dang / brdzun pa ma yin pa dang / rgyu ma yin pa dang / skyes
334a1(rgyud): ba ma yin pa ste/ de ltar nga nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang // nga nyid so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes dang / nga nyid bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang / de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam
334a2(rgyud): par dag pa'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa dang bral ba'i byang chub de skad ma smra shig/ nga nyid dngos dang dngos me dang // dang po'i de bzhin gshegs par brjod// gzugs dang gzugs
334a3(rgyud): med ldan pa'i mchog/ zab mo zhi ba'i chos dang ldan// sems dpa' chen po he ru ka/ bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor nga // bde chen las ni bems min nga // 'jig rten kun rdzob bems pong // skyes pa
334a4(rgyud): bud med ma ning dang // 'gro ba nga yis yang dag khyab// de phyir 'a dus pa zhes bya nyid// rgyal ba rgya mtsho bdag gis bshad// / rdo rje can dang byang sems rnams// ma ning gnasu yang dag grub// 
334a5(rgyud): gang zhig lha mo bdag med de// rang bzhin gyis ni btsun mo yin// sangs rgyas he ru ka nga yin// de nyid phyir na ma ning ste// 'gro ba'i dngos po gnyis mthong nas// thabs dang shes rab
334a6(rgyud): bdag nyid nga // shin tu mnyam sbyor rnal 'byor gyis// mi bstod med cing bdag ma'ang med// dam pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang
334a7(rgyud): po chen po rdo rje 'dod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje yan lag med pa shin tu dga' ba chen pos tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa// phyag drug pa dang sgeg par bcas// zhal gcig ral pa 'dzin pa dang / brgyad gnyis la/ 
334a8(rgyud): dang ser mo ni// rdo rje yan lag med pa 'grub// dpa' bo'i g.yas par mda' nyid de// lag pa gnyis par ral gri nyid// gsum par me long rig par bya// lag pa g.yon par gzha nyid de// gnyis pa/ 
334b1(rgyud): la ni dbang mchog nyid// ka kel+li yal ga ste/ phyag drug nyid du bsgom par bya// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas par ni// bu ma'i snying khar bsams nas ni// rdo rje btsun mo 'gru bar gyur// mda'/ 
334b2(rgyud): yis 'o ma 'dzin pa 'bigs// a sho ka yis snying khar brab// ral gris skyes ma bsdigs par bya// de nas me long bstan par bya// gzhu yis rkang pa bcings nas ni// ud pal zhags pas dgug
334b3(rgyud): par bya// skra grol 'ong bar 'dod pa dang // snyan pa'i skad ni rab tu smra// ha dang si ni byed pa mo// rangs shing yan lag ched mas rgyan// kha ni so rtsis gang ba dang // 'dod pa stobs dang bral ba bsams// rdo rje/ 
334b4(rgyud): mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// mi 'gyur sems kyis rjes chags bya// 'dod pa'i sngags ni ma bcos pas// de yi snying ni pa skul bar bya// oM a mu kI ma A rA ya many+dzu g+ho Sha hrIHdzaHde ltar
334b5(rgyud): sgom pa byas pa yis// 'jam pa'i mgon po'i btsun mo ni// sgrub pa po la 'dod pa dang // dbang du byed cing 'ong bar/ 'gyur// zla ba phyed kyi sbyor ba yis// bzlas pa khri yis sbyor ba la/ 
334b6(rgyud): g.yo ba gser gyi rna cham// shin tu dag pa'i sems kyis sgrub// haM gi sa bon las skyes pa// thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// chang gis btung ba'i rab sbyor bas// rdo rje yan lag med pa
334b7(rgyud): sgrub ma bcos mchog gi sa bon ni// bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin can// bde ba chen po mchog tu zhi// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// 'di ni srog ni chen po ste// mchog tu dga' ba mdzes
334b8(rgyud): ma nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal rtag du de'i// dran pa de ltar rab tu grags// mya ngan 'dod chags de bzhin gdungs// dga' dang dga' bral de bzhin no// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de nyid dbyangs
335a1(rgyud): yig drug par brjod// zla ba phyed pas yang dag ldan// thig les mgo bo nyid du mchod// sems can gyi ni kun gzhi ste/ rgyud rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o// de nas bcom ldan
335a2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sem chen po rdo rje sa bon gyi yi ge thos nas sems sgrub pa gsal ba nye bar gyur nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/ sems
335a3(rgyud): dpa' med cing sgom paste/ sngags med lha yang med pa ste// sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba// 'di ni byang chub rim brtan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// bsod nam/ 
335a4(rgyud): med cing sdig pa med// byang chub med cing sangs rgyas med// ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni brtan dpa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i dam tshig gis de skad
335a5(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// sngags med bzlas pa'ang yod ma yi na// 'gro ba gsum po thams cad med// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis// sgom pa dang ni sgom pa med// bcom ldan
335a6(rgyud): 'das rin ba dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// kun rdzob 'jig rten pa yang yod// dpyad na gang du 'jig rten pa// rtag tu 'jig rten pa nyid 'khor// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom
335a7(rgyud): ldan 'das pad+ma dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ma skyes pa dang mi dmigs pa// mi phyed na mkha' lta bu ste// zab cing zhi ba'i rang bzhin ni// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan
335a8(rgyud): 'das ral gri'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// skyo ma ji ltar me long ltar// na mkha' ji ltar bde ji ltar// ji ltar dngos po yongs shes pa// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom
335b1(rgyud): ldan 'das ma mkha' 'gro ma bdag med mas de skad ces bka' stsal to// stong nyid dri med dam pa'i gnas// rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// ji srid ma zhig bar du ni// sems kyi rang bzhin sgom/ 
335b2(rgyud): par gyis// ma mA ki'o// srid med mya ngan 'das pa med// 'di de bde chen rdo rje ste// gang zhig yid kyis sgom pas sgom// de ni mchog gis sgom pas sgom// spyan gyi'o// sngags kyi rang bzhi
335b3(rgyud): rnam par spangs// 'di ni sems med thig le med// 'di de dam pa'i bde chen ste// bri ba med cing gang ba med// gos dkar ma'i'o// gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ji lta bar// de ltar dngos po bsgom pa/ 
335b4(rgyud): bya/ stong nyid dri med mchog gis gnas// de ni bsod nams sdig pa med// sgrol ma'i'o// ji ltar chu nang zla ba ste// bde nu min brdzun pa min pa ltar// de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor la
335b5(rgyud): yi/ lus kyi rang bzhin rnyog pa med// 'khor thams cad kyi/ sa de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ sna tshogs byed pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi
335b6(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te// mda' gzhu char 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // muHtsA Di dang ser rna yis// chang gzugs khu tshur bzung ba yis// g.yon ni 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis// 
335b7(rgyud): bsdams pas dgra rnams bsdigs par bya// yan lag kong kor bzung nas ni// mtshon pa'i khu tshur bzung nas ni// hUM gis mda' ni btang bya zhing // bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bsdigs par bya// brla ni/ 
335b8(rgyud): bskum par byas nas ni// lus ni dbugs kyis dgang bar bya// lus la khu tshur bzung nas ni// brang ni rgyas pa nyid du bya// sems dang dmigs ni 'ben la bya// hUM gis kha ni dgang ba dang // g.yas rkyang la sogs
336a1(rgyud): // sbyor ba yis// gshin rje srin po bsad par bya// 'dir mang brjod pas ci zhig bya// kun rdzob du ni bsdus pa tsam// gzhu yi rig byed rtsa ba gang // de ni rdo rje 'dzin spyad do// de nas ba/ 
336a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje ram mo'i sgra zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rol mo'i sgra'i sgeg pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tha hi tha hi/ thaMka tha ka/ thu tha thuH/ 
336a3(rgyud): bA hi thA hi/ ba hi ba he/ ur+d+ha ur+tha/ kaM ka kra ka/ tha ka tha ka/ tsi T+Ti hi D+hi/ te Da wa ta Da wat+ta/ cha lang dang ni rnga dang yang // rje rje kha cig pi wang rgyas/ mnga' ba can dang gling bu dang // rgyud gsung kar ta/ 
336a4(rgyud): rnam gsum brdungs pas brdungs par bya// chung ngur brdungs sa rgyal bas te// dkyil 'khor gsol gdapal sog/ sa pa// mchod pa 'di ni bla na med// rang gi tshogs bcad mang ba
336a5(rgyud): ni/ bstan pa'i des ni ci zhig bye// ji snyed rol mo'i bstan brtse/ su// de ni rdo rje rol mo'i sgra// de nas bcom ldan 'das dri bzang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge la snyoms par zhugs/ 
336a6(rgyud): bdug spos kyi mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tsan dan nyid dang gur gum dang // brag zhun de bzhin 'dod ma ni// 'di rnams rdzas ni bdug spos che// he ru ka laM rab
336a7(rgyud): dbul// ka cor dang ku ma nyid// de bzhin du yang skra sgra nyid// bdug byed snying po 'di rnams ni// phan pa la ni sbyar bar bya// kun du ru dang po la ka/ ri dgas lte ba sen mo ni// rin chen rgyal po'i bdug
336a8(rgyud): pa'adi/ kun la mi 'jigs gur gum dang // phreM trai'-i yi sha hri dang / sha lI dang shil ka/ 'jig rten migan gyi bdug pa 'di// ga tu rdorje 'dzin pas gsungs// sna chags drin khyang pa / 
336b1(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje mchod pa las// bdun gyi rgyal po mchod pa 'di// kun tu stobs kyi bsgrubs pa ste// ji snyed dri yi bstan bcos su// gong bu'i dum bu'i bdug pa mchog/ de kun phyag na rdo rje'o// rdo rje'i
336b2(rgyud): mchod pa rab tu grags// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gom pa rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje gar 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung

336b5(rgyud): g.yon pas so// de nas rgyun gyi gar byas nas// g.yon pas la nga ni gar bya zhing // myur du brdungs pas de bzhin gar// byas nas 'khor lo lta bur bskor// phyi nas gru bzhi dgang bar
336b6(rgyud): byang phyi nas 'dod pa'i lag pas bskor// sa la pus ni gnyis btsugs nas// lag pas mchod rten legs par bya// ji snyed gar gyi bstan bcos su// byed pa'i cha lugs brjod pa ni// de snyed rdo/

341b1(rgyud): ki dang bde ba sdom// rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchog pas// skad cig gis ni gnyis med ldan// rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyar bas// rdo rje gus pa'i pha rol son// rdo rje pad+ma mchod bya zhing // pad+ma'i 'dod pa spang bar bya// 
341b2(rgyud): bdag nyid rang bdag bsams nas ni// rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas// rdo rje bu mo char grags pa// rdo rje nag po lta bu mchod// rang gi skyes bu bsams nas ni// rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas// bu/ 
341b3(rgyud): mo de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ phyag rgya'i dngos grub don du mchod// rang gi rig ma skyes bu bsams// rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pos// gdol pa chen po las byung ba// phyag rgya'i dngos grub
341b4(rgyud): don du mchod// phyag rgya chen po rab sgrub pa// rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma cig gi/ nas 'grub par 'gyur// nyi ma gnyis kyi cho ga dang // nyi ma
341b5(rgyud): gsum gyi sbyor ba dang // de bzhin du ni nyi ma bzhi// nyi ma lnga pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// me tog la sogs mchod byas nas// sems gtan gnas
341b6(rgyud): 'dug pa dang // phyag rgya lhan cig zhugs nas ni// rdo rje sbyor ba yang dag brtsam// rdo rje nyi ma nub pa na// sbyor ba 'di ni yang dag brtsam// nyi ma shar ba'i dusu ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// 
341b7(rgyud): 'dod chags chen pos rjes chags pas// 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin las// chags chen ting 'dzin gnas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrib bya// shin tu dga' ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
341b8(rgyud): nge 'dzin to// pad+mar rdo rje can bcug nas// rang gi rig ma bdag mar bya// de dang lhan cig 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni phyag rgya chen por brjod// mi yi phya ga rgya blangs nas ni// de la 'khor lo rab tu
342a1(rgyud): dbye// dri dang me tog 'thun byas nas// 'khor lo goms par yang dgra brtsam// spyan dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang // dkar mo shin tu yid 'phrog ma/ me tog dri yis 'thun byas nas// 
342a2(rgyud): rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam// sngags pas phan pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // phyag na rdo rje 'grub pa dang // rdo rje nyi ma 'grub pa dang // dam pa'i yi ge 'grub pa dang // bdun pa'i rgyal po 'grub pa dang / 
342a3(rgyud): thams cad 'dren pa 'grub par 'gyur// chu yi dbang ni dang po ste// cod pan dbang la gnyis pa'o// rdo rje'i dbang gis gsum pa ste// rang gi bdag po bzhi pa nyid// ming gis dbang bskur
342a4(rgyud): lnga pa ste// drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// bdun pa bum pa'i dbang gis te// gsang ba'i dbang gis brgyad pra'o// shes rab dbang las dag pa ste// de nyid rdo rje'i sbyor ba
342a5(rgyud): yis/ kun gyi de nyid brtul zhugs brjod// ston pa rang gis lung bstan ste// de 'dir dbang gi cho ga'o// slob/ dpon smad par mi bya ste// bde gshegs bka' las 'da'
342a6(rgyud): mi bya// spun la smad pa nyid mi bya// sems can rnams la gdug byams dang // skal med de nyid gtam mi bya// skal ldan sems can smad mi bya// bdag gi lus la nges mi smad// chos nyid
342a7(rgyud): cha do ni bzung mi bya// gzhan gyi chos la smad mi bya// bud med nyid la'ang smad mi bya// rtsa ba'i ltung bar du spang ba mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// 
342a8(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum ni spang mi bya// rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya// rdo rje dril du'ang bzang bar bya/ gtsug tor rtag tu bzung bar bya// rtag tu sbyig sreg dgang bar bya// rtag tu dkyil 'khor
342b1(rgyud): bzhengs par bya// rtag tu bde gshegs rab gnas bya// 'byung po tshal gtor ma sbyin// phyag rgya bcing ba rnam spang zhing // mchod rten las ni mi bya ste// rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya// dkyil
342b2(rgyud): 'khor la sogs lus kyi las// rmi lam du yang mi bya zhing // slob dpon gzhan la phyag mi bya// bla ma'i rgan rabs phyag 'tshal lo// rtag par rgyun du sngags bzla zhing // bsam gtan nyid kyang
342b3(rgyud): 'bral mi bya// rtag du slob ma bsdu bya zhing // rtag pa ru ni bshad par gyis// rtag du sems can bskyang bar bya// rtag du sangs rgyas tshar gnyer bya// dzaM b+ha la la chu sbyin zhing // las rnams
342b4(rgyud): thams cad yang dag spyad// bye ma'i mchod rten las la ya dang // mkhas pas tshig bzhin du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // pho nyam
342b5(rgyud): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje nges par brjod pa 'di thos nas tshig 'di dag gsung sa pa/ sems can kun gyi thams cad khyod// sdig pa thams
342b6(rgyud): rnam sbyong ba// chos rnam da yongasu rtogs// rdo rje mkha' gro phyag 'tshal bstod// sdang bas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// gti mug thams cad zad bya'i phyir// rgyal ba mgon po rnam
342b7(rgyud): snang mdzad// gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba bud med 'dul gzigs nas// bdag med rnal 'byor mar gyur gang // phyag 'tshal pha rol phyin thub la// sgyu ma'i phyag
342b8(rgyud): bstod// gti mug nan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// zhe sdang thams cad zad mdzad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// nga rgyal mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs
343a1(rgyud): // nas rgyal thams cad zad mdzad pa'i// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che// 'dod chags rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// chags pas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// 'dod chags thad
343a2(rgyud): zad mdzad pa// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste// ser sna rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba phra dog mnan gzigs nas// phrag dog thams cad zad mdzad pa// bdun gyi rgyal po rgyal po che// thams ca
343a3(rgyud): gzugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
343a4(rgyud): ba thams cad dpal kye'i rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon ji/ daltar blta bar bgyi// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// slob dpon ston par gyur pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi
